GEN 1:1 K'ittẹwọr, Ibinọkpaabyi osi ẹrọng ọmaana irerek.
GEN 1:2 M'ogbe nwuma ọttọhk manda vani kode, ọyagbin ode idukhi, ibe kpenamkpen ipyi erungi bi kaang. Egwugwuma ch'Ibinọkpaabyi erenga ẹbaabha asi.
GEN 1:3 Mẹ wọ osi, Ibinọkpaabyi, oben bi, “Tte iyaan iwobha.” Wa iyaan iwobha.
GEN 1:4 Ibinọkpaabyi ore bi, iyaan ikk'ijibha, Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaangi iyaan ide ngọmi ttara ipyerungi.
GEN 1:5 Mẹ wọ osi, Ibinọkpaabyi oyeri iyaan nnuma, ẹya, obiro oyeri ipyerungi, erungi. Wa ekpebha ọmaana ẹchọhkha bọ asi echedenwu m'ọyagbin.
GEN 1:6 Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Tte ọrọngkpakpa oyin k'ottem kw'asi. Tte ọbhaangi asi p'ẹrọng ọmaana asi p'irekh-irek.”
GEN 1:7 Mẹ wọ osi, Ibinọkpaabyi osi ọrọngkpakpa ọbhaangi asi. Asi bani awobha k'ọrọngkpakpa ebir-ebir, bani awobha k'ọrọngkpakpa irekh-irek. Iwa kwẹ ode mando.
GEN 1:8 Ibinọkpaabyi oyeri ẹrọng, ọrọngkpakpa. Wa ekpebha ọmaana ẹchọhkha bọ asi ottong iwu ifa m'oyagbin.
GEN 1:9 Ibinọkpaabyi obiro oben bi, “Tte asi p'awobh k'ọrọngkpakpa irekh-irek atzobha ibe rani, ifha ogbin oyin.” Iwa kwẹ ode mando.
GEN 1:10 Ibinọkpaabyi oyeri irerek, ogbin, obiro oyeri asi p'atzobh ibe rani, araanga p'ideden. Ibinọkpaabyi ore bi, okk'ojibha.
GEN 1:11 Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Tte irerek imen ekpo k'adem-k'adem: araraari p'áwọm amọma p'ámen ka ngera sabẹ ọmaana nchi si ńwọm aduk p'ási amọma pabẹ, k'odem kwa sẹ nde.” Iwa kwẹ ode mando.
GEN 1:12 Irerek imen araraari k'adem-k'adem, araraari awọm amọma p'afon k'amọma pabẹ ka for, nchi nwọm aduk p'afon k'amọma p'achiduk pabẹ ka for. Ibinọkpaabyi ore bi, okk'ojibha.
GEN 1:13 Wa ekpebha ọmaana ẹchọhkha bọ asi ottong iwu ittaan m'oyagbin.
GEN 1:14 Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Tte mkpon nwobha k'ọrọngkpakpa, sa ḿmaangi ẹya k'ipyerungi, tte sẹ nde ẹkhọhkha ch'igbe s'ọdadaami, ch'iwu ọmaana cha cho.
GEN 1:15 Tte mkpon nnuma mmaani k'ọrọngkpakpa, ifha sẹ ńnang iyaan k'irerek.” Iwa kwẹ ode mando.
GEN 1:16 Ibinọkpaabyi osi mkpon mfa sa ndeden. Wa osi ch'ẹbar-ọbar bi ẹkhaama ẹfa k'ẹya, ch'ẹkhar-ọkhara bi ekkeri erungi. Wa obiro osi ndodori.
GEN 1:17 Ibinọkpaabyi ohok mkpon nwobha k'ọrọngkpakpa bi, sẹ nnang iyaan k'irerek,
GEN 1:18 ọmaana bi, sẹ nkkeri ẹya ọmaana erungi, ọmaana bi sẹ mmaangi iyaan k'ipyerungi. Ibinọkpaabyi ore bi, okk'ojibha.
GEN 1:19 Iwa ekpebha ọmaana ẹchọhkha bọ asi ottong iwu inna m'ọyagbin.
GEN 1:20 Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Tte nden k'adem-k'adem mfu k'asi, sa nhaabh-ọhaabh, nwobha akpen. Tte ọnọhn f'ẹrọng okhur k'iwokhi s'ọyagbin k'ọrọngkpakpa.”
GEN 1:21 Mando wọ kw'Ibinọkpaabyi osi nden sa ndeden s'asi, ọmaana ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'orukhi akpen, obiro orenga k'asi, ọmaana ọnọhn k'adem-k'adem f'ọkhaam mbabaang. Ibinọkpaabyi ore bi, okk'ojibha.
GEN 1:22 Ibinọkpaabyi odo nden nnuma biphyir s'ọkk'ọsa, oben sẹ bi, “Bọng maan ayok k'ọhaabh abira afu k'asi p'araanga. Tte ọnọhn ọn-ọhaabh k'ọyagbin.”
GEN 1:23 Wa ekpebha ọmaana ẹchọhkha bọ asi ottong iwu izen m'ọyagbin.
GEN 1:24 Ibinọkpaabyi obiro oben bi, “Tte irerek itzima nden sa nnukhi akpen k'adem pabẹ iyin, nden s'otzer, ọmaana ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'oreng k'irerek ttara nden s'ẹtzam otzor k'adem pabẹ.” Iwa kwẹ ode mando.
GEN 1:25 Mando wọ kw'iwa Ibinọkpaabyi osi nden s'ẹtzam, ọmaana nden s'otzer otzor k'adem pabẹ, ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'oreng k'irerek otzor k'adem pabẹ. Ibinọkpaabyi ore bi, okk'ojibha.
GEN 1:26 Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Tte mosi anọngẹya ka ngera saman, p'akher man. Tte bẹ abaabha nden s'asi, ọmaana ọnọhn f'ẹrọng, ọmaana nden s'otzer, ọmaana irerek biphyir ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'oreng k'irek.”
GEN 1:27 Mẹ wọ, wa Ibinọkpaabyi oyok anọngẹya, oyok bẹ ka ngera sẹ. Wa oyok bẹ, ojinọng ọmaana kwanọng.
GEN 1:28 Ibinọkpaabyi odo bẹ, oben bẹ bi, “Bọng maan ayok, abira ahaabh, tte va pabọng afu ọyagbin, abira abaabha ọyagbin, ọmaana nden s'asi, ọmaana ọnọhn f'ẹrọng, ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'owobh akpen, f'oreng k'irerek.”
GEN 1:29 Mẹ wọ osi, Ibinọkpaabyi oben bẹ bi, “Bọng kkeri, nkk'bọng achiduk ttara achimọma kpenamkpen p'awobh k'irerek nnanga, nchi biphyir sa nwọm aduk p'amọma awobh k'ẹtzaanga bi, sẹ ńde ọchattọhk fabọng.
GEN 1:30 Onode nden biphyir si nnukhi akpen k'irerek, ọmaana ọnọhn f'ẹrọng biphyir, ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'oreng k'irerek, obiro oruk akpen, nkk'bẹ akwongitzọhng p'ẹtzam nnanga bi, bẹ achi, mach'ọchattọhk fabẹ.” Iwa kwẹ ode mando.
GEN 1:31 Iwa Ibinọkpaabyi ore bi, ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ọkk'ọsa okk'ojibha kpọng-kpọng. Wa ekpebha ọmaana ẹchọhkha bọ asi ottong iwu izadani.
GEN 2:1 Iwa Ibinọkpaabyi okyera ọtzọhm f'ẹrọng, ọmaana irerek osisi, ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'owobh k'ẹtzaanga kwabẹ.
GEN 2:2 Ottong iwu izenamfa, Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ọtzọhm okyera f'om-osi, m'ewu ch'ettong iwu izenamfa okwokha ọwọhng k'ọtzọhm f'ọkk'ọm-ọsa.
GEN 2:3 Ibinọkpaabyi odo ewu nda ch'ettong izenamfa, ohok chẹ mach'ewu ch'ewur-owur, okhuri bi, m'ewu nda dọ ch'okwok ọwọhng, k'ọtzọhm f'ọyagbin osisi.
GEN 2:4 Ma wọ ode odem kw'iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oreng oyok ẹrọng ọmaana irek. K'ogbe kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi ẹrọng ọmaana irerek,
GEN 2:5 iwa echi manda dani kemeni, ọraraari manda wani kobiro ommen, okhuri da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oni ẹrọng otzim ọsa bi, etzebh k'irerek, ttara bi, iwa ọnọng kw'ọyaabh irerek kode.
GEN 2:6 Yina, asi am-ayin k'irerek, asi irerek biphyir idiri.
GEN 2:7 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzima idọdọhbh ọbanga ojinọng, oji ọwọhng kw'akpen ọkhẹ-ẹ k'ahungmma, ojinọng nwa on-oruk akpen.
GEN 2:8 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi owoni, kẹ da ewuchen em-eyin, k'Iden. Ọtzọkha ojinọng nwa kw'ọkk'ọbanga okhe mẹ.
GEN 2:9 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi irerek imen nchi kpenamkpen k'adem-k'adem, nchi si njibhi ka chen, mbiri njibh k'ọchattọhk. Nchi mfa mbe k'ewonittem, echi dani ede ch'akpen, ndonggo ede ch'etzim-nonga ch'ejibha ọmaana epyibha.
GEN 2:10 Kẹ kw'ọraanga, kw'ofon k'Iden obhobhi ọkwọbha, obiro ọkhe asi m'ewonittem nduma, mẹ kw'ọraanga nwuma, obiro ọbhaangi k'araanga anna.
GEN 2:11 Ọraanga kw'ocheden okpen Pishọn, kẹ wọ obhobhi ochina k'irek sa Havila biphyir, kẹ da gol owobh.
GEN 2:12 Gol kw'irerek nnuma ode ọkkakkakwẹ. Wa ibe nnuma ibiri ikhaama ana p'adaami eruk, ọmaana atza p'ọniks.
GEN 2:13 Ọraanga kw'ottong afa okpena Gihọn, kẹ wọ obhobhi ọkhọri irek sa Kush biphyir.
GEN 2:14 Ọraanga kw'ottong attaan okpena Tigiris, kẹ wọ obhobhi k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin k'Asiriya. Ọraanga kw'ottong anna okpena Yupharetes.
GEN 2:15 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọkha ojinọng nwa ohok k'owoni kw'Iden, ifha ọyaabha owoni nwa obiro okker-ẹ.
GEN 2:16 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọn-ọsana ojinọng nwa bi, “Kọ akhaam ọphaangi kẹ bi, achi achiduk kpenamkpen pa nchi si mbe m'owoni nwa.
GEN 2:17 Onode echi ch'etzim-nonga ch'ejibha ọmaana epyibha, kọ kàkhaambi, achi. Ewu ch'achi chẹ, akhaambi da ápe.”
GEN 2:18 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi on-oben bi, “Kojibhi bi, ojinọng nwa owobha mancheni, kaam ńsi oyok-ẹkhaan kw'ọ́baan-ẹ nnang-ẹ.”
GEN 2:19 Ode ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'idọdọhbh otzima ọbanga nden kpenamkpen s'ẹtzam, ọmaana ọnọhn f'ẹrọng. Ọtzọkha pyẹ biphyir ochena ojinọng nwa, ifha ore che-dema p'okpe pyẹ. Che ch'ojinọng nwa okpe ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'orukhi akpen, mando kwa fẹ okpen.
GEN 2:20 Mẹ wọ osi, ojinọng nwa okpe nden s'otzer biphyir che, ọmaana ọnọhn f'ẹrọng ttara nden s'ẹtzam biphyir. Yina, onode ojinọng oyok-ẹkhaan, kw'ọbaan-ẹ kode.
GEN 2:21 Mẹ wọ osi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi ojinọng nwa ọttaabha ẹdadim. Mada ojinọng otzim ọttaabh-ọttaabha, ọrọbh-ẹ ọtzẹtzẹngchikpa wani, obiro ọraakha ibe nnuma s'ọrọhbh ọtzẹtzẹngchikpa nwa ttara etzen-yaara.
GEN 2:22 Mẹ wọ osi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọkha ọtzẹtzẹngchikpa kw'ọkk'ọrọbha k'ojinọng, otzima osi kwanọng, ọtzọkh-ẹ ochena ojinọng.
GEN 2:23 Ojinọng nwa oben bi, “Ma wọ on-ode ọkhọbhi kw'akhọbhi paam, ẹyaara ch'ẹyaara chaam. Kẹ bẹ áyer-ẹ, kwanọng, okhuri da bẹ arọbh-ẹ k'ojinọng ka for.”
GEN 2:24 Ofona mẹ, ojinọng óbina oji otte ttara ọkka, ọn-ọgbakha for sẹ ttara kwanọng kwẹ, ifha bẹ anọng afa an-ade ọnọng wani.
GEN 2:25 Wa ojinọng nwa ọmaana kwanọng kwẹ awobh irinikhum, bẹ mgbar karọbhi.
GEN 3:1 Iwa jọhk dọ edongi, ẹyọhnga nden s'ẹtzam biphyir, s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọsa. Wa jọhk ẹtza ẹbọbh kwanọng nwa bi, “Ode odik-ọkka bi, Ibinọkpaabyi obeni bi, bọng aningi echi kpenamkpen m'owoni nwa achi o?”
GEN 3:2 Kwanọng nwa oben jọhk bi, “Nnh, nnh! Kwẹ mando kode! Ibinọkpaabyi obeni man bi, mofho ochi achiduk pa nchi si mbe mowoni ochi e,
GEN 3:3 yina, Ibinọkpaabyi on-obiro oben man bi, man kọ̀khaambi, ochi achiduk p'echi nduma ch'ebe m'ewonittem, man kọ̀khaambi ọttọhmi chẹ, oni mando ode, mópope.”
GEN 3:4 Jọhk nda eben kwanọng nwa bi, “Bọng kápe e,
GEN 3:5 okhinggẹ ode bi, Ibinọkpaabyi orong bi, idikha bọng achi achiduk mba, bọng are idik ittaani bọng bi ttaaan, bọng an-abira ade mach'Ibinọkpaabyi kw'orong ejibha ọmaana epyibha.”
GEN 3:6 Mẹ wọ, mada kwanọng nwa ore bi, achiduk p'echi nda ajibh-ojibh k'ọchattọhk, bẹ abira anyu-onyu ka chen, ttara bi, bẹ afha anang ọnọng etzim-nonga, ọtzọkha bani ochi, obiro ọtzọkha ọnang odim kwẹ, kw'owobh mẹ ttara kẹ, odim obiro ọtzọkha ochi.
GEN 3:7 Mẹ ẹbaa nduma, chen attaani bẹ anọng afa, bẹ atzin bi, bẹ an-awobh irinikhum. Mẹ wọ, bẹ an-atzọkha akwongitzọhng p'echi cha fig, akhum ekpo abubha irinikhum sabẹ.
GEN 3:8 Okwu opyiri ma nchọhkha-bọhk, ojinọng ọmaana kwanọng kwẹ, an-abhaanga da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi om-orenga m'owoni. Ofona mẹ, bẹ an-achubha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi k'ottem kwa nchi s'owoni nwa.
GEN 3:9 Yina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ogwon ojinọng, ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Awobh man o?”
GEN 3:10 Kẹ obhina bi, “Kaam mmaang ndọkhi sọ, da am-arenga m'owoni, ojora osi-m, okhuri da ndim irinikhum, kẹ wọ osi nchubha e.”
GEN 3:11 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọn-ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ anyi wọ ọgbaakh-ọ bi, atzim irinikhum? Akk'achiduk p'echi cha nsan-ọ, acha o?”
GEN 3:12 Ojinọng nwa obhin-ẹ bi, “Kwanọng kw'anang-m wọ ọnang-m achiduk p'afon m'echi nduma, yina kaam nchi e.”
GEN 3:13 Mẹ wọ osi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọn-ọbọbh kwanọng bi, “Bọng odik kw'asi ma?” Kwanọng nwa obhin-ẹ bi, “Jọhk dọ ẹbọhr-m, yina kaam ndọkha achiduk mbuma nchi e.”
GEN 3:14 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben jọhk bi, “Okhuri odik nwa kw'asi ma, ópyibh-ópyibh ọnang-ọ, ọyọhnga nden s'otzer biphyir ọmaana nden s'ẹtzam biphyir, kọ átzọr ẹbhọr k'irek, ábira áchi ọkpọhm k'akpen pọ biphyir.
GEN 3:15 Kaam ńge ittattaanga k'ottem kwa kọ ọmaana kwanọng nwa, ttara k'ottem kwa va pọ ọmaana va pẹ, bẹ awobha k'ittattaanga ttara ayok. Nnwa kwẹ ótzukhi eho chọ, kọ ákhimi ibhokhọkhọri sẹ.”
GEN 3:16 Ibinọkpaabyi on-oben kwanọng nwa bi, “Kaam ńttar-ọ ihem s'ideden, k'ogbe kpenamkpen kw'ám-amaan nnwa. Kaambi mẹ wọ, kọ ọm-ọdaakh-ọ bi, tte awobha abaanga odim kwọ, yina, odim wọ ọbaabh-ọ.”
GEN 3:17 Obiro oben Adam bi, “Kọ ayong kwanọng kwọ itzọhng, achi ochiduk kw'echi cha nsaan-ọ bi, aninga achi, kaam ńnang irerek ẹmma okhuri kọ. Kọ ám-are ihem s'ọtzọhm, yina áchi ọttọhk m'irek nna, k'akpen pọ biphyir.
GEN 3:18 Afhodima ọmaana akkaangi ámen m'irerek. Kọ abira achi araraari p'owoni.
GEN 3:19 Kọ ám-asi ọtzọhm maa arunga, yina ákhaama ọchattọhk f'áchi, ttẹwọr ma maa atza apyiri k'ogbe kw'ákpa nnam k'irerek, okhuri bi, bẹ atzim idọdọhbh asọ-ọ, m'idọdọhbh nnuma rani rọ s'ábira ábhakhi akpa nnam.”
GEN 3:20 Wa Adam okpe kwanọng kwẹ Iv, okhuri bi, kẹ wọ óde ọkka kw'anọng biphyir p'arukhi akpen.
GEN 3:21 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọkha ndenkpa, otzima osi ekpo ẹfhọrapyẹ, ọnang Adam ọmaana kwanọng kwẹ, ifha bẹ afhọra, atzima abubha irinikhum sabẹ.
GEN 3:22 Mẹ wọ osi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Ojinọng nwa ọkk'ọn-ọda macha man, okk'ejibha ọmaana epyibha on-oronga. Kẹ kọ̀khaambi, onemi ọbọhk ọpha ochiduk m'echi ch'akpen ochi, oni mando ode, kẹ oruk akpen maa ogbe ode.”
GEN 3:23 Mẹ wọ osi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okhubh Adam k'owoni kw'Iden, ifha ọyaabha irerek s'otzim ọbang-ẹ.
GEN 3:24 Mada Ibinọkpaabyi okhubhi Adam, ohok achẹrubim k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin k'owoni kw'Iden, ọmaana ọkkangkkaang kw'ode mach'okpondaak kw'ọwọm bi wuruwuru, ọbhakhi iriring okkeri k'ibe kpenamkpen, ifha bẹ akpa eden ch'echin k'echi nduma ch'ẹnangi akpen.
GEN 4:1 Iwa Adam oyima kwanọng kwẹ Iv abẹ, Iv otzima ibhọr ọmaan Ken. Iv oben bi, “K'ẹkkaana ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang-m, kaam nkk'nnwa kw'ijinọng mmaana.”
GEN 4:2 Wa Iv obiro otzima ibhọr ọmaan ọgbaanọkka kwa Ken, kw'ode Ebẹl. Iwa Ebẹl ode okkeri arukhimaan. Ken ode ọnọng kw'ọyaabh owoni.
GEN 4:3 Okwu otzuma k'ogbe mẹ, Ken otzima achiduk p'owoni kwẹ, osi ẹnanga ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
GEN 4:4 Ebẹl ọtzọkha acheden-va p'arukhimaan pẹ p'ajibhi for, otzima osi ẹnanga. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọdaam ettem ttara Ebẹl ọmaana ẹnanga chẹ.
GEN 4:5 Onode Ken ọmaana ẹnanga chẹ, Ibinọkpaabyi ettem kẹ kẹdaami. Mẹ wọ osi, Ken ettem epyibh-ẹ, on-obhor itzitzikha.
GEN 4:6 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbọbh Ken bi, “Ode yan kw'ettem epyibh-ọ? Osi yan kw'abhori itzitzikha?
GEN 4:7 Idikha ira kọ akk'ejibha asa, ira kaam ettem kindaam ttar-ọ o? Yina, da ani ejibha asi, epyibha ẹm-ẹbaami bi, ẹbọkh-ọ. Kọ akhaambi, akhema chẹ.”
GEN 4:8 Wa Ken okwu ọkhaama nttọhna ttara ọgbaanọkka Ebẹl, oben-ẹ bi, “Tte moyin k'ẹtzam.” Mada abẹ awobh k'ẹtzam, Ken ottum ọgbaanọkka Ebẹl ofhu.
GEN 4:9 Mẹ wọ osi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbọbh Ken bi, “Agbaanakka Ebẹl ko o?” Ken obhina bi, “Kaam kinnong, kaam wọ mminkkeri ọgbaanọkka kwaam o?”
GEN 4:10 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Bọng odik kw'asi ma? Izi s'agbaanakka im-ibhomi iyer-m k'irek, mach'ẹmọng ch'ebhomi eror ẹkkaana.
GEN 4:11 Mẹ wọ osi, nnang-ọ ẹmma, mbiri ngwubh-ọ k'irerek s'igwong ẹmma igwo izi s'agbaanakka kw'afhu.
GEN 4:12 Kọ ayaabh irerek, ekpo dọk kéjibh ẹnang-ọ. Kọ ẹwọr k'ibe rani kábọkha, án-ade ottettena-nọng m'ọyagbin.”
GEN 4:13 Ken oben Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “Ihem saam ibari iyọhng-m bi ndọhkha.
GEN 4:14 Mayina akk'aam akhubha m'irerek nna, ọmaana k'itzitzikha sọ, kaam nna nnọbh ebhon, mbiri nde ottettena-nọng m'ọyagbin, ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'óre-m ófhu-m ofhu.”
GEN 4:15 Yina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi on-oben Ken bi, “Ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'ọfhọ-ọ, ọ́tzọkha ọmmamma kw'ọ́yọhnga kwọ, igbe izenamfa.” Mẹ wọ osi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okhe Ken ebhora ka for, ifha ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'ọ́rẹ-ẹ oning-ẹ ófhu.
GEN 4:16 Ken obina k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ottena, otza oruk k'irek sa Nọd, k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin k'Iden.
GEN 4:17 Wa Ken oyima kwanọng kwẹ abẹ, kwanọng otzima ibhọr ọmaan Ẹnọk. M'ogbe nwa, wa Ken om-osi obhon. Che cha nnwa kwẹ Ẹnọk, ch'ọtzọk okpe obhon nwa.
GEN 4:18 Wa Ẹnọk obhoni Irad. Irad obhon Mehujayẹl, Mehujayẹl obhon Metusayẹl Metusayẹl obiro obhon Lamẹk.
GEN 4:19 Wa Lamẹk ọtzọk panọng afa; wani okpen Ada, nwonggo okpena Zila.
GEN 4:20 Wa Ada ọmaan Jabal, kẹ wọ iwa ode otte kw'anọng p'iwa am-aruk k'okhira, abira atzir nden.
GEN 4:21 Ọgbaanọkka kwẹ okpena Jubal, kẹ wọ ode otte kw'anọng p'abhaa ogim-ogim okhikhir, am-abira agyi ophoropho.
GEN 4:22 Zila, obiro ọmaan Tubal-Ken, kw'om-oduk brons ọmaana akkonga otzima osi ekpo k'adem-k'adem. Ọgbaanọkka kwa Tubal-Ken kw'ikwanọng ode Naama.
GEN 4:23 Wa Lamẹk on-oben panọng pẹ bi, “Ada ọmaana Zila, Bọng panọng paam, bọng bhaanga atzim paam. Kaam nkk'ọnọng mfha, kw'omumum-m ọttọhk, odikkobh, kw'orim-m abẹ, kẹ wọ kwa mfhu.
GEN 4:24 Idikha ọnọng manda wani ofhu Ken, kẹ óre ihem s'iyọhnga sa Ken igbe izenamfa, Yina, idikha ọnọng ofhu kaam Lamẹk, okhuri odikkobh kw'akaam mfhu, kẹ óre ihem s'iyọhnga s'ọnọng kw'ofhu Ken, igbe arọbh attaan obhiri chi obhiri afa.”
GEN 4:25 Wa Adam obiro oyima kwanọng kwẹ abẹ, kwanọng otzima ibhọr ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng, ọkpẹ-ẹ Sẹt, oben bi, “Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'aam nnwa ọdọdọk ọnanga kw'otzer eho ch'Ebẹl, kwa Ken ofhu.”
GEN 4:26 Sẹt obiro obhon nnwa kw'ijinọng, ọkpẹ-ẹ Ẹnọs. Wa k'ogbe kw'Ẹnọs wọ kw'anọng attẹwọr akpobha che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
GEN 5:1 Ma wọ ode nnwẹr kw'odem kw'efonamma ch'Adam. Mada iwa Ibinọkpaabyi oyokhi anọngẹya, wa osi bẹ ka ngera sẹ.
GEN 5:2 Wa oyokhi bẹ, ojinọng ọmaana kwanọng, odo bẹ, oyeri bẹ, Anọngẹya.
GEN 5:3 Wa Adam okk'cho arọbh azadani obhiri jobh orukha, yina on-obhoni nnwa kw'ijinọng ka ngera sẹ, ọkpẹ-ẹ Sẹt.
GEN 5:4 Mada Adam okk'Sẹt obhona, wa obiro oruk cho nnọhna mfa, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 5:5 Biphyir-phyir, wa Adam orukhi cho nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh azadani obhiri jobh, yina on-ope.
GEN 5:6 Mada Sẹt okk'cho arọbh azen obhiri azen orukha, obhon Ẹnọs.
GEN 5:7 Mada Sẹt okk'Ẹnọs obhona, wa obiro oruk cho nnọhna mfa obhiri azenamfa, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 5:8 Biphyir-phyir, wa Sẹt orukhi cho nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh azen obhiri jobh obhiri afa, yina on-ope.
GEN 5:9 Mada Ẹnọs okk'cho arọbh anna obhiri jobh orukha, obhon Kenan.
GEN 5:10 Mada okk'Kenan obhona, wa obiro oruk cho nnọhna mfa obhiri chi, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 5:11 Biphyir-phyir, wa Ẹnọs orukhi cho nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh azen obhiri azen, yina on-ope.
GEN 5:12 Mada Kenan okk'cho arọbh attaan obhiri jobh orukha, obhon Mahalalẹl.
GEN 5:13 Mada okk'Mahalalẹl obhona, wa obiro oruk cho nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh afa, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 5:14 Biphyir-phyir, wa Kenan orukhi cho nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh azen obhiri jobh, yina on-ope.
GEN 5:15 Mada Mahalalẹl okk'cho arọbh attaan obhiri azen orukha, obhon Jarẹd.
GEN 5:16 Mada Mahalalẹl okk'Jarẹd obhona, wa obiro oruk cho nnọhna mfa obhiri ẹrọbh obhiri jobh, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 5:17 Biphyir-phyir, wa Mahalalẹl orukhi cho nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh anna obhiri chi, yina on-ope.
GEN 5:18 Mada Jarẹd okk'cho arọbh azenanttaan obhiri afa orukha, obhon Ẹnọk.
GEN 5:19 Mada Jarẹd okk'Ẹnọk obhona, obiro oruk cho nnọhna mfa, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 5:20 Biphyir-phyir, wa Jarẹd orukhi cho nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh azenanttaan obhiri afa, yina on-ope.
GEN 5:21 Mada Ẹnọk okk'cho arọbh attaan obhiri azen orukha, obhon Mẹtusẹla.
GEN 5:22 Mada okk'Mẹtusẹla obhona, Ẹnọk ochina ororo ọtzọn Ibinọkpaabyi abẹ ka cho arọbh chi adọdọk, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 5:23 Biphyir-phyir, wa Ẹnọk orukhi cho arọbh chi obhiri arọbh attaan obhiri azen.
GEN 5:24 Wa Ẹnọk ochina ororo ọtzọn Ibinọkpaabyi abẹ, mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi otzim-ẹ ofona m'oyagbin nwa.
GEN 5:25 Mada Mẹtusẹla okk'cho arọbh ọhawani kwa jobh obhiri azenamfa orukha, obhon Lamẹk.
GEN 5:26 Mada okk'Lamẹk obhona, wa Mẹtusẹla obiro oruk cho ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh chi obhiri azenanttaan obhiri afa, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 5:27 Biphyir-phyir, wa Mẹtusẹla orukhi cho nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh azenattaan obhiri ọhawani kwa jobh, yina on-ope.
GEN 5:28 Mada Lamẹk okk'cho arọbh ọhawani obhiri afa orukha, obhon nnwa kw'ijinọng,
GEN 5:29 ọkpẹ-ẹ Noa. Lamẹk on-oben bi, “Nnwa nwa ótzima ẹwọhngkwokha ochena man, k'ọtzọhm faman, ọmaana k'ihem saman, s'ifon k'irerek s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹmma ọnanga.”
GEN 5:30 Mada Lamẹk okk'Noa obhona, wa obiro oruk cho ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh ọhawani obhiri chi, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 5:31 Biphyir-phyir, wa Lamẹk orukhi cho ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh chi obhiri attaan obhiri chi obhiri afa, yina on-ope.
GEN 5:32 Mada Noa okk'cho ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh azen ọda, obhon va p'ijinọng attaan, p'ade Shẹm, ọmaana Ham, ọmaana Japhẹt.
GEN 6:1 Iwa anọngẹya attẹwọr ahaabh m'ọyagbin, bẹ abira amaan va p'ipanọng anang bẹ,
GEN 6:2 va p'Ibinọkpaabyi are bi, va mba p'ipanọng p'anọngẹya ajibh-ojibh. Mẹ wọ osi, bẹ an-atzekha ayok bani, atzọkha bẹ macha panọng pabẹ.
GEN 6:3 Mẹ wọ osi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Egwugwuma chaam ch'esi anọng aruk akpen, ttara ọnọngẹya dọk kewobha matzẹmaa ikhina ogbe ode, okhuri bi, ọnọngẹya ode ọkpakpa. Ttẹwọr madeden, anọngẹya akpen dọk káruk ayongi cho arọbh azadani.”
GEN 6:4 K'ogbe nwuma, ttara kw'oyongi mẹ, wa aNẹphilim awobh m'ọyagbin, mada va p'Ibinọkpaabyi ayim aminava p'anọngẹya abẹ, aminava mba atzima ọbhọr, amaan bẹ va. Va mba bọ iwa ade afa-nọng, bẹ abira ade ajinọng p'atza che.
GEN 6:5 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ore bi, itzama s'anọngẹya ikk'ibara kpọng-kpọng m'ọyagbin, ttara bi, achibhi p'anọngẹya biphyir an-ade epyibha, k'ogbe kpenamkpen.
GEN 6:6 Wa Ibinọkpaabyi for sẹ isẹ-ẹ nkwo, ettem ebire ẹmmẹ-ẹ, k'anọngẹya p'ọkk'ọsa m'ọyagbin.
GEN 6:7 Mẹ wọ osi, on-oben for sẹ bi, “Kaam ńdimi anọngẹya biphyir pa nkk'nsa, manda wani m'ọyagbin kórik. Kaam mbiri ńdimi nden biphyir, ọmaana ọnọhn f'ẹrọng biphyir, ọmaana ekpo py'ereng k'irerek biphyir. For saam isi-m nkwo bi, kaam nkk'pyẹ nyokha.”
GEN 6:8 Yina, iwa Noa ọtzọk ọphyaam k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
GEN 6:9 Ma wọ ode odem kw'okhuri Noa. Wa Noa ode ọnọng kw'otzor-otzor, oponga-pyibha kobiro ọkhaama mach'anọng p'ogbe kwẹ. Kẹ wa ọtzọni Ibinọkpaabyi abẹ.
GEN 6:10 Wa Noa obhoni ajinọng attaan p'ade Shẹm, ọmaana Ham ttara Japhẹt.
GEN 6:11 Wa Ibinọkpaabyi on-ore bi, ọyagbin okk'okhibhi, obiro ore bi, ọyagbin on-ofu ttara ọgbaan.
GEN 6:12 Ibinọkpaabyi ore odem kw'ọyagbin okk'okhibhi opyiri, da anọngẹya biphyir k'ọyagbin akk'akpen pa bẹ akhibhi.
GEN 6:13 Mẹ wọ osi, Ibinọkpaabyi oben Noa bi, “Kaam nkk'ochibhi nsa bi, ńdimi anọngẹya biphyir, da ọyagbin on-ofu ttara ọgbaan, okhuri ọnọngẹya. Kker e, kaam ńdimi anọngẹya odimi biphyir ttara ọyagbin nwa.
GEN 6:14 Kọ Noa, tzima agbaakhakpa p'echi ch'ẹgaang-ọgaangi, amun ọkpaar kw'ideden anang for sọ. Si mmanggọ k'ọkpaar nwa ẹtzaanga, atzima ẹbaanttim akpa aphaangi pẹ k'iyaan, ọmaana k'ẹtzaanga, ifha asi aningi k'ọkpaar ẹtzaanga adimi.
GEN 6:15 Manda wọ kw'arenga amun ọkpaar nwa. Adum pẹ áde ndọkhi ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh afa obhiri jobh, ẹ̀kpá chẹ éde ndọkhi arọbh attaan obhiri chi, ebe chẹ éde ndọkhi arọbh afa obhiri nzen.
GEN 6:16 Si ittakhọhnga abubh-ẹ, ttẹwọr k'amma-kpabem pyiri k'ittakhọhnga, ahok ọphaangi kw'óde ẹtzọkhi k'obungi ọmaana igbokha makhọra. Si ọmma k'ẹbhabhaanga ch'okhubha wani kw'ọkpaar nwa, asi nyọng nttaan, dani k'irekh-irek, dani m'ottem, ndongo k'ẹrọng.
GEN 6:17 Kaam ńdọhm asi p'áchi ọttọhk kpenamkpen m'ọyagbin, ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'orukhi akpen. Ọttọhk kpenamkpen m'ọyagbin óbiro ópope.
GEN 6:18 Onode kọ, kaam ńsi echekhi chaam nnang kọ ọmaana va pọ, ttara kwanọng kwọ, ọmaana panọng pa va pọ, bọng biphyir adim k'ọkpaar nwa ẹtzaanga.
GEN 6:19 Kọ átzọkha adem afa-afa p'ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'orukhi akpen, ojinọng ọmaana kwanọng, adim k'ọkpaar nwa ẹtzaanga, ifha pyẹ eruk akpen ttara kọ k'ọkpaar.
GEN 6:20 Adem afa-afa p'ọnọhn kpenamkpen, ọmaana pa nden kpenamkpen, ttara p'ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'oreng k'irerek, ékwu ifha ahok pyẹ akpen.
GEN 6:21 Kọ tzobha ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ode ọchattọhk ọnang bọng, f'obiro ode ọchattọhk ọnang nden nnonggo biphyir, aye k'ọkpaar.”
GEN 6:22 Noa osi odik kpenamkpen mach'Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhn-ẹ.
GEN 7:1 Mẹ wọ osi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Noa bi, “Kọ tzima ẹhọhmmọr chọ adim k'ọkpaar, okhuri bi, kaam nkk'nna bi, kọ wọ ade ọnọng kw'otzor-otzor m'ọgbọ nwa e.
GEN 7:2 K'ottem kwa nden sa mbaan bi, anọng atzima afọhni ẹja, k'adem kpenamkpen pabẹ, tọkha mfa-mfa, k'obe ozenamfa, odim ọmaana kwa, ayikha k'ọkpaar nwa. Onode nden sa nni k'ẹjafọhni mbaan, k'adem kpenamkpen pabẹ, tọkha odim ọmaana kwa,
GEN 7:3 abira atzọkha ọnọhn ozenamfa-ozenamfa, k'adem kpenamkpen pabẹ, odim ọmaana kwa, ifha fẹ oruk akpen obiro ohok adem pabẹ m'ọyagbin.
GEN 7:4 K'iwu izenamfa k'itzitzikha, kaam ńsi ẹrọng etzebh m'ọyagbin, k'iwu arọbh afa ọmaana ka nnungiwu arọbh afa, ńdima chẹ ńdimi ekpo kpenamkpen pya nkk'nsa, py'erukhi akpen m'ọyagbin.”
GEN 7:5 Iwa Noa osi odik kpenamkpen kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhn-ẹ.
GEN 7:6 Wa Noa ode ojinọng kw'ode cho ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh jobh, mada asi anwa achi ọyagbin.
GEN 7:7 Wa Noa otzima va pẹ ttara kwanọng kwẹ ọmaana panọng pa va pẹ, bẹ adim k'ọkpaar nwa, ifha bẹ arọbh anaanga asi p'anwa.
GEN 7:8 Nden mfa-mfa sa mbaan k'ẹjafọhni, ọmaana sa nni k'ẹjafọhni mbaan, ọmaana ọnọhn, ttara ekpo biphyir py'ereng k'irerek,
GEN 7:9 odim ọmaana kwa, nnenga nkhebha Noa, mbiri ndim k'ọkpaar nwa, mach'Ibinọkpaabyi okk'Noa ọtzọhna.
GEN 7:10 Mada iwu nnuma izenamfa ikk'ikwọbha, asi anwa achi ọyagbin.
GEN 7:11 K'ogbe kw'iwa Noa okk'akpen orukha opyiri cho ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh jobh, k'iwu chi obhiri ifa s'ophe kw'ottong afa, m'ewu nduma akhekhaho amaam asi haabhada k'irerek, bẹ abira akwunga amma p'asi p'ọrọngkpakpa.
GEN 7:12 Wa ẹrọng etzebh m'ọyagbin k'iwu arọbh afa ọmaana ka nnungiwu arọbh afa.
GEN 7:13 M'ewu nduma dani, Noa ọmaana va pẹ p'ade Shẹm, ọmaana Ham, ọmaana Japhẹt ttara kwanọng kwa Noa ọmaana panọng pa va pẹ, adim k'ọkpaar nwa.
GEN 7:14 Wa bẹ awobh k'ọkpaar nwa ttara nden s'ẹtzam biphyir, atzor k'adem pabẹ, ọmaana nden s'otzer biphyir, atzor k'adem pabẹ, ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'oreng k'irerek, otzor k'odem kwẹ, ọmaana ọnọhn biphyir atzor k'adem pabẹ, ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ọkhaam mbabaang.
GEN 7:15 Ekpo ẹfa-ẹfa biphyir py'erukhi akpen, ẹtza ekhebha Noa, edim k'ọkpaar nwa.
GEN 7:16 Wa nden sa mmindim k'ọkpaar nwa nde odim ọmaana kwa, f'ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'orukhi akpen, atzor mach'Ibinọkpaabyi okk'Noa ọtzọhna. Mẹ wọ e, Ọvaar Ibinọpkaabyi obhen ọmma okpori Noa k'ẹtzaanga.
GEN 7:17 Asi achina ororo achi ọyagbin k'iwu arọbh afa, asi achina ororo anwa maa bẹ ayebh ọkpaar nwa anana k'asi ebir-ebir.
GEN 7:18 Asi anwa k'ọhaabh, bẹ achina ororo afu k'ọyagbin bi pyẹrrr, ọkpaar on-obiro obhobh k'asi ebir-ebir.
GEN 7:19 Asi anwa maa bẹ abhọri mgbegbeho si ngor-ogori biphyir m'ọyagbin.
GEN 7:20 Asi anwa abhọri mgbegbeho maa ododong kw'asi ọyọhnga ndọkhi ẹrọbh.
GEN 7:21 Ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'oreng m'irerek ope, ọnọhn, ọmaana nden s'otzer, ọmaana nden s'ẹtzam ọmaana ekpo biphyir py'efu m'ọyagbin, ttara anọngẹya biphyir.
GEN 7:22 Ọttọhk kpenamkpen k'ogbin f'oji ọwọhng kw'akpen k'ahungmma, ope.
GEN 7:23 Mando kw'Ibinọkpaabyi odimi ekpo kpenamkpen py'erukhi akpen k'ọyagbin, anọngẹya ọmaana nden, ọmaana ekpo py'ereng k'irerek, ttara ọnọhn f'ẹrọng odimi pyẹ biphyir. Wa on-orik Noa ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'owobh k'ọkpaar nwa ttar-ẹ.
GEN 7:24 Wa asi anwa achi ọyagbin k'iwu arọbh azenamfa obhiri jobh.
GEN 8:1 M'ogbe nwuma kw'iwa asi akk'oyagbin acha, wa Ibinọkpaabyi Noa kọraam. Wa nden biphyir s'otzer ọmaana s'ẹtzam sa nwobh k'ọkpaar ẹtzaanga ttara Noa, kobiro ọraama. Ọn-ọtzọhm ọphapha ogwuma k'ọyagbin, kw'osi asi awọhri.
GEN 8:2 Akhekhaho p'irerek akka, bẹ akk'amma p'asi p'ọrọngkpakpa abira akpa, ẹrọng ẹkk'ẹkwọbha otze-tzebh k'ọyagbin.
GEN 8:3 Asi achina ororo awọhri k'ọyagbin. Okwu ottonga iwu arọbh azenamfa obhiri jobh, asi akk'an-awọhri.
GEN 8:4 Ottong iwu chi obhiri ifa, s'aphe azenamfa, ọkpaar ọtza ottima ka mgbegbeho s'Ararat.
GEN 8:5 Asi achina ororo awọhri maa opyiri echedenwu ch'aphe jobh, mgbegbeho ngọhkha.
GEN 8:6 Mada iwu arọbha afa ikk'ikwọbha, Noa okwunga ọphapha-mma kw'ọkpaar kw'ọkk'ọsa.
GEN 8:7 Ọtzọhm ẹtzọrikhukhu, ch'ekhuri echina ororo ẹkpa nnam, matzẹmaa opyiri k'ogbe kw'asi akk'akka k'ọyagbin.
GEN 8:8 Obiro ọtzọhm igbegbaa, ifha oronga idikha asi akk'akka k'irerek.
GEN 8:9 Yina, wa igbegbaa ibe s'ibe mmo kire, okhuri da asi atzima awobh k'irerek. Sẹ ikhuna itzor Noa k'ọkpaar. Noa onemi ọbọhk ọbọkha sẹ, okhe k'ọkpaar.
GEN 8:10 Noa owobha iwu izenamfa ọdọdọk, obiro ọtzọhm igbegbaa nnuma iyin k'ọkpaar.
GEN 8:11 Mada igbegbaa ikhun itzor-ẹ k'ẹchọhkha, itzima ikwongitzọhng s'oliv s'idẹkh-ọdẹkhi k'ẹmma. Mẹ wọ, Noa oronga bi, asi akk'awọhri k'ọyagbin.
GEN 8:12 Owobha iwu izenamfa idọdọk, obiro ọtzọhm igbegbaa. Yina, m'ogbe nwa sẹ kikhun.
GEN 8:13 K'echedenwu ch'ophe kw'ocheden, ch'esi Noa cho ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh jobh obhiri wani, asi akk'akka k'ọyagbin. Noa ogbe ẹpaho ch'ọkpaar, okkeri, ore bi, irerek ikk'ittẹwọr igwu.
GEN 8:14 K'iwu ẹrọbh obhiri izenamfa s'ophe kw'ottong afa, irerek ikk'in-igwa biphyir.
GEN 8:15 Mẹ wọ osi, Ibinọkpaabyi on-oben Noa bi,
GEN 8:16 “Tzima kwanọng kwọ, ọmaana va pọ, ọmaana panọng pa va pọ, bọng ayin k'iyaan.
GEN 8:17 Kọ biri tzima ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'orukhi akpen k'adem-k'adem, f'owobh ttar-ọ, ọnọhn, ọmaana nden ttara ekpo py'ereng k'irerek, ifha py'ẹhaabh k'irerek, py'ebire ẹ́maan ayok, ébire ẹ́haabh-ọhaabh k'obhik.”
GEN 8:18 Mẹ wọ, Noa oyin k'iyaan ọmaana va pẹ p'ijinọng, ọmaana kwanọng kwẹ, ttara panọng pa va pẹ.
GEN 8:19 Nden biphyir, ọmaana ekpo biphyir py'ereng k'irerek, ọmaana ọnọhn biphyir, ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'oreng k'irerek oyin k'ọkpaar nwa, k'adem pabẹ.
GEN 8:20 Mẹ wọ osi, Noa osi ijafọhnibe ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọtzọkha etzen dani-dani k'adem pa nden sa mbaan k'ẹjafọhni, ọmaana ọnọhn f'ọbaan k'ẹjafọhni, otzima osi ẹjafọhni ch'ẹnanga ẹkwọmichẹ m'ijafọhnibe nna.
GEN 8:21 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaang eruk damandaam ch'ẹja nda, on-oben k'ettem chẹ bi, “Kaam ikhina ọyagbin ẹmma dọk kińnang, okhuri ọnọngẹya, kaambi ode bi, ettem ch'ọnọngẹya en-efu ttara itzama ttẹwọr k'ẹvava. Yina rang ọdọk kwa kaam ndimi ekpo py'erukhi akpen biphyir, macha ndimi m'ogbe nwa.
GEN 8:22 Ttẹwọr madẹdẹn maa apyiri k'okpong kw'ọyagbin, ogbe kw'ekpo ọyayaabha, ọmaana ogbe kw'ipha, ogbe kw'etzetzebhi ttara iyoma, ogbe kw'ẹya ttara erungi, idik nna biphyir okpong kíkhaama, íchina ororo matzẹmaa ogbe ode.”
GEN 9:1 Mẹ wọ osi, Ibinọkpaabyi odo Noa ttara va pẹ, oben bẹ bi, “Bọng mon va, tte va pabọng ahaabh-ọhaabh, abira anyaami, aruk k'ibe kpenamkpen m'ọyagbin.
GEN 9:2 Nden s'ẹtzam biphyir, ọmaana ọnọhn f'okhuri k'ẹrọng, ttara ekpo py'ereng k'irerek biphyir, ọmaana nden s'asi biphyir, pyẹ biphyir éruk ẹkhaama ojora fabọng. Kaam nhokhi pyẹ biphyir k'irekh-irek kwọ bi, akkeri.
GEN 9:3 Ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'orukhi akpen obiro oreng-orenga óde ọchattọhk ọnang bọng. Mach'iwa nnangi bọng araraari, nna mbiri nnang bọng ọttọhk kpenamkpen mach'ọchattọhk.
GEN 9:4 “Yina, ọkhaam ọttọhk f'án-achi. Kọ etzen ch'etzim ẹkhaam izi kachi, okhuri bi, izi rọ ide akpen.
GEN 9:5 Idikha ọnọng ofhu oyok ọnọngẹya, kaam ńnor akpen p'oyok mbọbh-ẹ. Etzen ch'efhu ọnọngẹya, ńnang chẹ ettuma. Ọnọng kw'ofhu oyok, ńnang-ẹ ettuma ch'ẹbaan-ẹ.
GEN 9:6 Ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'ofhu oyok ọnọngẹya, mando wọ kw'ọnọng óbiro ófhu kẹ, okhuri bi, kẹ Ibinọkpaabyi osi ọnọngẹya ka ngera sẹ.
GEN 9:7 “Bọng mon va, tte va pabọng ahaabh-ọhaabh, anyaami aruk k'ibe kpenamkpen m'ọyagbin.”
GEN 9:8 Mẹ wọ osi, Ibinọkpaabyi oben Noa ọmaana va pẹ bi,
GEN 9:9 “Kker e, kaam nsi echekhi nnang bọng, ttara va pa va pabọng.
GEN 9:10 Echekhi nda ewobh ẹnang ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'orukhi akpen, ọmaana ọnọhn, ọmaana nden s'otzer, ttara nden s'ẹtzam, nnuma biphyir sa nyini k'ọkpaar ttara bọng, sa nnukhi akpen m'ọyagbin.
GEN 9:11 Kaam nsi echekhi nnang bọng bi, ogbe dọk kóde kw'asi an-abira achi ekpo py'erukhi akpen biphyir, ogbe dọk kóde kw'asi abira akhibhi ọyagbin.”
GEN 9:12 Ibinọkpaabyi obiro oben bi, “Ma wọ ode ẹkhọhkha ch'Echekhi chaam, cha mmingaama ttara bọng ọmaana ekpo py'erukhi akpen biphyir, echekhi nda éwobha ẹnang igbọ s'ikwu k'ogbe ororo.
GEN 9:13 Kaam nkk'esididibha chaam nhokha k'eboni, ch'éde ẹkhọhkha ch'Echekhi cha kaam ngaam ttara bọng, ọmaana ọyagbin biphyir.
GEN 9:14 Ogbe kwa ndọhmi eboni k'ọyagbin, esididibha eyini,
GEN 9:15 kaam ńjima echekhi chaam, ttara bọng ọmaana odem kpenamkpen kw'ekpo biphyir py'erukhi akpen. Ogbe dọk kode kw'asi ánwa adimi ekpo biphyir py'erukhi akpen.
GEN 9:16 Mẹ wọ osi, ogbe kpenamkpen kw'esididibha eyini k'eboni, ńne chẹ, mbiri ńjima echekhi nduma ch'Ibinọkpaabyi ọkhaam ọmaana ekpo biphyir py'erukhi akpen m'ọyagbin, k'adem-k'adem, py'ewobha m'ọyagbin maa ipemanitzor.”
GEN 9:17 Mẹ wọ osi, Ibinọkpaabyi oben Noa bi, “Esididibha dọ ede ẹkhọhkha ch'Echekhi cha kaam nsi nnang ẹkpo kpenamkpen py'erukhi akpen k'ọyagbin.”
GEN 9:18 Iwa va p'ijinọng pa Noa p'ayini k'ọkpaar nwa ade; Shẹm, ọmaana Ham, ttara Japhẹt. Ham wọ iwa ode otte kwa Kenaan.
GEN 9:19 Iwa ofon ma va mba attaan pa Noa, ọmaana va pabẹ, anọngẹya anyaami afhu ọyagbin bi pyẹrrr.
GEN 9:20 Wa Noa ode ọnọng kw'ọyaabh owoni. Kẹ wọ iwa ode ocheden-nọng kw'ọttẹwọr ogbon nchi si mminwọm aduk p'agrep. Nchi nna s'agrep mminwọm aduk pa bẹ am-atzima asi atzuk.
GEN 9:21 K'ogbe wani, wa Noa ogwo atzuk p'achiduk mbuma matzẹmaa obumma, oyima irinikhum k'ikhira sẹ.
GEN 9:22 Mẹ wọ, Ham otte kwa Kenaan, ore irinikhum s'otte, ọtza ọgbaak abagbaanọkka k'iyaan.
GEN 9:23 Mẹ wọ osi, Shẹm ọmaana Japhẹt atzọkha ibara s'ideden anana ka mbabaang sabẹ, bẹ arenga nnama-nnam, akpa nnam abọra otte, abubh-ẹ irinikhum, ifha bẹ aningi irinikhum s'otte are.
GEN 9:24 Mada Noa ọn-ọphyọbh, da atzuk akk'ẹ attoni, oronga odik kwa Ham, kw'ode nnwa kwẹ kw'ikhakhari ọkk'ọsa, ọnang-ẹ ẹmma oben bi,
GEN 9:25 “Ẹmma ẹbọkha Kenaan! Kẹ óde obira kw'owobha k'irekh-irek kw'abira pa vọkka pẹ biphyir.”
GEN 9:26 Wa obiro oben bi, “Tte ẹtzọhnga ewobha ẹnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kwa Shẹm okpobh, tte Kenaan obiro ode obira kwa Shẹm.
GEN 9:27 Tte Ibinọkpaabyi ọmmẹma nnem sa Japhẹt, tte Japhẹt oruk k'okhira fa Shẹm, tte Kenaan ode obira kwa Japhẹt.”
GEN 9:28 Mada asi p'achi ọyagbin akk'akka biphyir, Noa obiro oruk cho arọbh-chi-obhiri-afa obhiri jobh.
GEN 9:29 Mẹ wọ oyini bi, biphyir-phyir, wa Noa orukhi cho nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh azenamfa obhiri jobh.
GEN 10:1 Ma wọ ode odem kw'efonamma cha Noa ch'ede Shẹm, ọmaana Ham, ttara Japhẹt. Wa va mba akk'abhakhi abhon ayok, k'ogbe kw'iwa asi p'achi ọyagbin akk'akka.
GEN 10:2 Va pa Japhẹt p'ijinọng wa bẹ ade: Goma, ọmaana Magọg, ọmaana Madai, ọmaana Javan, ọmaana Tubal, ọmaana Mẹshẹk, ttara Tiras.
GEN 10:3 Wa va p'ijinọng pa Goma ade: Askenaz, ọmaana Riphat, ttara Togama.
GEN 10:4 Va p'ijinọng pa Javan ade: Elisha, ọmaana Tarshish, ọmaana Kitim, ttara Dodanim.
GEN 10:5 Wa va pa va p'anọng mba, bọ iwa arukhi k'araanga akhaan-ọkhaan, an-abhaangi aruk k'orerek fabẹ, ka mfonamma sabẹ, ọmaana k'ibhon k'ibhon, anọng-ọnọng agbaak ebhon chabẹ. Ma wọ iwa ode ẹnọmma cha Japhẹt.
GEN 10:6 Va pa Ham p'ijinọng bẹ ade: Kush, ọmaana Ijip, ọmaana Put, ttara Kenaan.
GEN 10:7 Kush ọn-ọbhakhi obhon: Seba, ọmaana Havila, ọmaana Sabata, ọmaana Rama, ttara Sabateka. Wa va pa Rama ade: Sheba, ọmaana Dedan.
GEN 10:8 Kush wọ iwa obiro ode otte kwa Nimrọd, kw'iwa ode okkenggitza kw'ideden k'ọyagbin.
GEN 10:9 Nimrọd wa ode ọgbaajijaa kw'ideden k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Kwẹ kwọ osi bẹ am-aben bi, “Macha Nimrọd, kw'ode ogbaajijaa kw'ideden kw'Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọwọbh ọnanga.”
GEN 10:10 Ichedenmon s'iwa kẹ ọdabhi ẹvaar ide ibhon sa Babẹl, ọmaana Ẹrẹk, ọmaana Akad, ttara Kalnẹ. Ibhon nna biphyir wa s'iwobh k'okhubha kwa Shina.
GEN 10:11 Ma kw'iwa on-obin ochina k'okhubha kw'Asiriya, otza osi ibhon sa Ninevẹ, ọmaana Rehobot-Ir, ọmaana Kala,
GEN 10:12 ọmaana Resen, kw'owobh k'ottem kwa Ninevẹ, ttara odedenmon kwa Kala.
GEN 10:13 Wa Ijip ọbhakhi obhon abaLud, ọmaana abAnam, ttara abaLehab, ọmaana abaNaphatu,
GEN 10:14 ọmaana abaPatarus, ọmaana abaKasalu, ttara abaKaphatọr. AbaKasalu bọ iwa an-abira abhakhi abhon ẹkhọma cha Philistiya.
GEN 10:15 Kenaan, kẹ wa ocheden obhon Sidọn, obiro obhon abaHet.
GEN 10:16 Wa ngọma sa mfon ka Kenaan nde: abaJẹbus, ọmaana abAmọr, ọmaana abaGirgash,
GEN 10:17 ọmaana abaHiv ọmaana Ak, ọmaana abaSin,
GEN 10:18 ọmaana abAvad, ọmaana abaZẹma, ttara abaHamat. Wa nnọmma nna biphyir sẹ mfon ka Kenaan, nnyaami
GEN 10:19 Wa ẹkhọma cha Kenaan etzim maa epyiri Sidọn, ebir etzima ka Gẹra maa etzuma ka Gaza, ebir etzima echina ka Sodom, ọmaana Gomora, ọmaana Adama, ọmaana Zeboyim, maa apyiri ka Lasha.
GEN 10:20 Ma wọ iwa ode ẹnọmma cha Ham, ka mfonamma sabẹ, ọmaana ka mmon sabẹ, ọmaana k'orerek fabẹ ttara k'ibhon sabẹ.
GEN 10:21 Shẹm, kw'iwa Japhẹt otzori nnam, wa obhoni Ẹbẹr, ttara va p'Ẹbẹr obhoni biphyir.
GEN 10:22 Wa Shẹm obiro obhon va adọdọk p'ade: Ẹlam, ọmaana Ashur, ọmaana Arphaksad, ọmaana Lud, ttara Aram.
GEN 10:23 Wa va p'Aram ọbhakhi obhon ade Uz, ọmaana Hul, ọmaana Gẹta, ttara Mash.
GEN 10:24 Arphaksad obhon Shẹla, kw'obiro ọbhakhi obhon Ẹbẹr.
GEN 10:25 Ẹbẹr, wa obhoni va p'ijinọng afa: Ocheden okpen Pẹlẹg, kw'oyini, ẹbhaangi. K'ogbe kwẹ wọ kw'iwa anọng abhaangi k'ọyagbin, bẹ anyaami aruk k'ibe kpenamkpen; ọgbaanọkka kwa Pẹlẹg okpena Jọktan.
GEN 10:26 Jọktan wa obhoni Almodad, ọmaana Shẹlẹph, ọmaana Hazamavẹt, ọmaana Jẹra,
GEN 10:27 ọmaana Hadoram, ọmaana Uzal, ọmaana Dikala,
GEN 10:28 ọmaana Ọbal, ọmaana Abimayẹl, ọmaana Sheba,
GEN 10:29 ọmaana Ophir, ọmaana Havila, ttara Jobab. Anọng mba biphyir wa bẹ ade va pa Jọktan.
GEN 10:30 Wa ẹkhọma ch'anọng mba arukhi ẹttẹwọr ka Mẹsha maa achina ka Sẹphar, ka mgbegbeho sa nwobh k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin.
GEN 10:31 Ma wọ iwa ode ẹnọmma cha Shẹm ka mfonamma sabẹ, ọmaana ka mmon sabẹ, ọmaana k'orerek fabẹ, ttara k'ibhon sabẹ.
GEN 10:32 Ma wọ iwa ode mfonamma sa va pa Noa, atzor ka va pa va k'idibhon sabẹ. Wa ofon k'anọng mba, idibhon s'ọyagbin biphyir in-inyaami, k'ogbe kw'asi p'iwa achi ọyagbin akk'akka.
GEN 11:1 Iwa anọng m'ọyagbin biphyir akhaam ebhon dani, bẹ am-abira agbaak odik wani.
GEN 11:2 Mada anọng areng achina k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin, bẹ akwu are ẹttẹri dani k'okhubha kwa Shina, bẹ atzima mẹ asi oruk kwabẹ.
GEN 11:3 Mẹ wọ ofon, bẹ an-aben ayok bi, “Bọng kwu ifha mọbanga idọdọhbh k'apyi, mọyaan sẹ maa, sẹ igwu igaangi bi kpọkhọdọ.” Mẹ wọ ofon, bẹ abanga adọdọhbh-pyi atzima atzera atza p'ihọhm, bẹ atzima ana p'abang-ọbanga abira pyi bi kaang, atzima atzera idọdọhbh idukhasẹ.
GEN 11:4 Mẹ wọ osi, bẹ aben bi, “Bọng kwu mosi odedenmon ttara ẹnyọhng ch'egori bi kotoong maa, epyiri k'ọrọngkpakpa, ifha mosi che ọnang for sa man. Oni mando ode, mọraam-ọraami m'ọyagbin.”
GEN 11:5 Mẹ wọ ofon, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọhakha okwu ore obhon nwa, ọmaana ẹnyọhng gorang-gor cha va p'anọngẹya am-asi.
GEN 11:6 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, oben bi, “Ojemi da bẹ atzima ade anọng p'ẹkhọma dani, p'agbaakhi ebhon dani, bẹ attẹwọr afha asi ọttọhk-dema mva, kw'oyini bi, ọttọhk fa bẹ ákham bi bẹ asi, fa bẹ án-afha asi kóde.
GEN 11:7 Bọng kwu mọhakha, mọtza ọdama ebhon chabẹ, ifha bẹ aningi ayok dọk abhaang.”
GEN 11:8 Mẹ wọ osi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi anọng mba araami k'ibe kpenamkpen m'ọyagbin, obiro ọkwọbha bẹ odedenmon nwuma osisi.
GEN 11:9 Kwẹ kwọ osi bẹ ayeri ibe nnuma Babẹl, okhuri bi, m'ibe nna rọ s'iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọdam ebhon ch'ọyagbin biphyir. Ttẹwọr mẹ wọ kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi opfuri bẹ, bẹ araami makhọra ọyagbin.
GEN 11:10 Ma wọ ode ẹnọmma cha Shẹm. Wa cho afa akk'akwọbha kw'asi achi ọyagbin, k'ogbe kwa Shẹm on-ode cho arọbh azen, mẹ kw'obhoni Arphaksad.
GEN 11:11 Mada okk'Arphaksad obhona, wa Shẹm obiro oruk cho ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh azen, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 11:12 Mada Arphaksad okk'cho ẹrọbh obhiri chi orukha, obhon Shẹla.
GEN 11:13 Mada okk'Shẹla obhona, wa Arphaksad obiro oruk cho ẹnọhna obhiri attaan, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 11:14 Mada Shẹla okk'cho ẹrọbh obhiri jobh orukha, wa obhon Ẹbẹr.
GEN 11:15 Mada okk'Ẹbẹr obhona, wa Shẹla obiro oruk cho ẹnọhna obhiri attaan, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 11:16 Mada Ẹbẹr okk'cho ẹrọbh obhiri ọhawani-kwa-chi orukha, obhon Pẹlẹg.
GEN 11:17 Mada okk'Pẹlẹg obhona, wa Ẹbẹr obiro oruk cho ẹnọhna obhiri ẹrọbh obhiri jobh, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 11:18 Mada Pẹlẹg okk'cho ẹrọbh obhiri jobh orukha, obhon Rewu.
GEN 11:19 Mada okk'Rewu obhona, wa Pẹlẹg obiro oruk cho arọbh jobh obhiri ọhawani, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 11:20 Mada Rewu okk'cho ẹrọbh obhiri jobh obhiri afa orukha, obhon Serug.
GEN 11:21 Mada okk'Serug obhona, wa Rewu obiro oruk cho arọbh jobh obhiri azenamfa, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 11:22 Mada Serug okk'cho ẹrọbh obhiri jobh orukha, obhon Nahọr.
GEN 11:23 Mada okk'Nahọr obhona, wa Serug obiro oruk cho arọbh jobh, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 11:24 Mada Nahọr okk'cho ẹrọbh obhiri ọhawani orukha, obhon Tẹra.
GEN 11:25 Mada okk'Tẹra obhona, wa Nahọr obiro oruk cho arọbh azen obhiri ọhawani-kw'ẹrọbh, obiro obhon ajinọng ọmaana panọng adọdọk.
GEN 11:26 Mada Tẹra okk'cho arọbh attaan obhiri jobh orukha, obhon Abram, ọmaana Nahọr ttara Haran.
GEN 11:27 Ma wọ ode ẹnọmma cha Tẹra. Tẹra obhoni Abram, ọmaana Nahọr ttara Haran. Haran obiro obhon Lọt.
GEN 11:28 Wa Haran ocheden ope, oji otte. M'ogbe nwuma, wa bẹ awobh ka Ur k'okhubha kw'abaKaldi kw'ode obhon kw'iwa Haran ọmaan.
GEN 11:29 Wa Abram ọmaana Nahọr an-abira atzọkha panọng. Kwanọng kw'Abram wa okpen Sarai. Yina, wa Nahọr ọtzọkha kwanọng kw'okpen Milka. Milka ọkhaam ọgbaanọkka kw'okpen Iska, Haran wọ iwa obhoni bẹ anọng afa.
GEN 11:30 Yina, Sarai wa ode ojididima, wa kẹ nnwa kọmaani.
GEN 11:31 Wa Tẹra ọtzọkha Abram kw'ode nnwa kwẹ, ọmaana Lọt kw'ode nnwa kwa Haran, ttara Sarai, kw'ode kwanọng kwa nnwa kwẹ Abram, bẹ biphyir abina orenga achina kw'okhubha kw'Ur kw'abaKaldi, ifha bẹ achina k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan. Yina, mada bẹ areng maa aphyiri ka Haran, bẹ an-aruk mẹ.
GEN 11:32 Wa Tẹra okwu ope ma Haran da ode cho arọbh jobh obhiri azen.
GEN 12:1 Wa k'ogbe wani, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obeni Abram bi, “Bina ji ẹkhọma chọ, ọmaana anọng pọ, ttara ẹhọhmmọr ch'atte, achina k'ẹkhọma ch'akhaam ńdim-ọ nda.
GEN 12:2 Kaam ńsọ-ọ ade otte kw'ẹkhọma ch'ideden. Kaam ńdọ-ọ, mbiri ńsọ-ọ atza che. Kaam ńnenga ka kọ ndo anọng haabhada.
GEN 12:3 Ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'ọdọ-ọ, kaam mbiri ńdẹ-ẹ. Ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'ọrọ-ọ ọkhara, kaam ndim-ẹ m'ebubuni. Ayagbin bi waam arenga ma kọ, atzọkha ẹdaa.”
GEN 12:4 Mẹ wọ ofon, Abram obina ọttẹwọr orenga mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹ obena, Lọt obiro ọtzọhn-ẹ abẹ. Wa Abram ode cho arọbh attaan obhiri chi, mada obin k'obhon kwa Haran.
GEN 12:5 Abram otzima kwanọng kwẹ Sarai, ọmaana Lọt kw'ode nnwa kw'ọgbaanọkka, ọmaana ẹkhakhaama chabẹ biphyir, ttara anọng pa bẹ akk'akhaama ka Haran, bẹ abina orenga achina k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan maa, bẹ apyiri kẹ.
GEN 12:6 Wa abAbram arenga ma Kenaan maa, bẹ apyiri kẹ da echi ch'ideden cha Morẹ ebe, ka Shẹkẹm. M'ogbe nwuma wa anọng pa Kenaan atzima am-aruk m'ẹkhọma nduma.
GEN 12:7 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oyin oben Abram bi, “Ńtte ẹkhọma nda ọbọhk ńnang efonamma chọ.” Mẹ wọ, Abram osi ijafọhnibe mẹ, ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ọkk'ẹ abẹ oyina.
GEN 12:8 Mada Abram obin ka Shẹkẹm ochina ororo orenga maa opyiri ka mgbegbeho sa nwobh ka Bẹtẹl, osi ikhira sẹ mẹ, k'ottem kw'Ayi kẹ da ewuchen em-eyin ọmaana Bẹtẹl kẹ da ewuchen em-edimi. Mẹ kw'Abram osi ijafọhnibe ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, om-obiro owobha mẹ okpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
GEN 12:9 Mẹ wọ, Abram obina orenga, ochina ororo okkeri itzitzikha k'okhubha kwa Nẹgẹv.
GEN 12:10 M'ogbe nwuma, wa okwo f'ideden owobh m'ẹkhọma nduma. Mẹ wọ, Abram obina, ochina k'Ijip ọtza oruk kẹ k'igbegbaa bi kọbh, okhuri okwo f'ideden.
GEN 12:11 Mada bẹ an-akkekkeni apyiri k'Ijip, Abram oben kwanọng kwẹ bi, “Sarai, kaam nkk'nnonga bi, kọ ajibhi kwanọng.
GEN 12:12 Idikha anọng p'Ijip arong bi, kọ ade kwanọng kwaam, mada bẹ áre ajibhada pọ, bẹ áfhu-m ofhu. Yina, bẹ átte kọ ọbọhk otte aruk.
GEN 12:13 Kọ gbaak bi, ade ọgbaanọkka kwaam, ifha bẹ atzim-m k'eden-ọkka o, ifha ńwobha akpen okhuri kọ.”
GEN 12:14 Mada Abram opyiri k'Ijip, anọng p'Ijip are bi, Sarai ode kwanọng kw'ojibh kpọng-kpọng.
GEN 12:15 Mada akhaan-nọng pa Phero, abira are kwanọng nwa, bẹ atzọhnga ajibhada pẹ anang ọvaarnọng. Bẹ atzim-ẹ achina k'ẹvaar-ttọhmma.
GEN 12:16 Wa Phero oreng ka nnam sa Sarai, ojibh idik otzima otzor Abram. Mẹ wọ osi, ọnang Abram nnanga sa nhaabh-ọkhaabh mach'arukhimaan, ọmaana abhaam, ọmaana anyanyaang-dim, ọmaana anyanyaang-papẹ, ttara abira p'ijinọng, ọmaana p'ipanọng, ọmaana akamẹl.
GEN 12:17 Mẹ wọ osi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi ikhọhmana s'ideden idim k'ẹhọhmmọr cha Phero, ibọkha kẹ ọmaana anọng p'ẹhọhmmọr chẹ biphyir, okhuri Sarai kw'ode kwanọng kw'Abram.
GEN 12:18 Mando kwa Phero ọtzọhmi bẹ ayeri Abram, ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Bọng odik kw'asi ma? Osi yan kw'asi-m k'ọgbaan? Osi yan kaam kagbaakhi bi, Sarai ode kwanọng kwọ?
GEN 12:19 Areng mbọng-apfẹ agbaakh-m bi, kọ ọmaana kẹ bọng ade agbaanakka, abira akhera bi, kaam ndọkh-ẹ k'ọbada? Kkeri kwanọng kwọ mẹ e. Kọ tzọkh-ẹ, atzima arọhng e!”
GEN 12:20 Phero ọnang anọng pẹ ndọhna bi, bẹ atza atzọkha Abram atza arik k'enem ch'irek s'Ijip. Mẹ wọ, Abram obina oji Ijip, otzima kwanọng kwẹ ttara ekpo pyẹ biphyir ofona.
GEN 13:1 Mẹ wọ ofon, Abram obina orenga k'obhon ebira kw'Ijip, otzima kwanọng kwẹ ọmaana ekpo pyẹ biphyir, ochina k'ẹkhọma cha Nẹgẹv, wa Lọt ọtzọn-ẹ abẹ.
GEN 13:2 Wa Abram ọkk'ọkkọkkaa ọn-ọda, kw'ọkhaam etzirakpo, ọmaana silva ttara gol k'ọhaabh.
GEN 13:3 Ttẹwọr ma Nẹgẹv, Abram ochina ororo k'orenga kwẹ, om-obhing k'obe-k'obe matzẹmaa okwu opyiri ka Bẹtẹl, obiro owobha m'ibe nna s'iwobh k'ottem kwa Bẹtẹl ọmaana Ayi, kw'ode ibe s'iwa ikhira sẹ ichi eden iwobha,
GEN 13:4 kw'ode ibe s'iwa ọkk'eden ọcha osi ijafọhnibe. Ma wọ kw'iwa Abram owobh okpobha che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
GEN 13:5 Iwa Lọt kw'ọm-ọtzọn Abram abẹ, obiro ọkhaama arukhimaan, ọmaana abhaam, ttara okhira f'atzọhmnọng arukhi.
GEN 13:6 Yina, wa araraari p'abira abenga etzirakpo pyabẹ m'ibe nna dọk kade, da iwa ẹkhakhaama chabẹ ẹn-ẹhaabhi ẹyọhnga irek sa bẹ arukhi, maa bẹ ibe rani dọk kafha aruk.
GEN 13:7 Wa ẹkhọhr etto k'ottem kw'akkeri-etzirakpo py'Abram ttara akkeri-etzirakpo pya Lọt. M'ogbe nwa, aKenaan ọmaana aPẹriz bẹ atzọn aruk m'ẹkhọma nda dani.
GEN 13:8 Mẹ wọ osi, Abram on-oben Lọt bi, “Kọ ttara kaam mode votte. Tte ẹkhọhr eningi k'ottem kwaman anọng afa eyini, tte akkeri-etzirakpo pọ ttara paam aningi ẹkhọhr abira akhaama.
GEN 13:9 Irerek nna biphyir s'iwobh ma, iwobh ka maan ka mbọhk. Tte mọkhọm ayok ẹkhaan. Kọ tzekha okhubha kw'ọdaakh-ọ, ifha aruk. Idikha kọ atzọk okhubha kw'odimbọhk, kaam ńdọkha okhubha kwa kwabọhk. Idikha atzọk okhubha kwa kwabọhk, kaam ńdọkha okhubha kw'odimbọhk.”
GEN 13:10 Mẹ wọ ofon, Lọt otzini chen okkeri irek s'ẹttẹri cha Jọrdan, ore bi, sẹ ijibh-ojibh, okhuri da sẹ ihaabhi asi mach'owoni kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ibiri ijibh mach'irek s'Ijip k'okhubha kwa Zoar. (M'ogbe nwa, wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ibhon sa Sodom ọmaana Gomora otzima odimi.)
GEN 13:11 Mẹ wọ osi, Lọt otzekha ẹttẹri cha Jọrdan k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin ọnang for sẹ. Mando wọ kwa Lọt ọmaana Abram areng akhọm ayok ẹkhaan.
GEN 13:12 Wa Abram, orukhi k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan, k'ogbe kwa Lọt orukhi k'ibhon s'ideden k'ẹttẹri, ottima ikhira sẹ ọbaanga Sodom.
GEN 13:13 Wa anọng pa Sodom ade anọng p'asi ọmmaana-tzama, bẹ am-abira asi ẹkhọngkwuri ayong-oyongi k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
GEN 13:14 Mada Abram ọmaana Lọt akk'ayok ẹkhaan akhọma, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okwu oben Abram bi, “Tzini chen ttẹwọr mẹ da abe, akkeri k'ebir-ebira, ttara k'ẹrakha-ẹrakha, abira akkeri kẹ da ewuchen em-eyin, ọmaana kẹ da ewuchen em-edimi.
GEN 13:15 Ẹkhọma nduma ch'are mẹ biphyir, kaam ńdọkha chẹ nnang kọ, ọmaana va pọ, ttara va pa va pọ, maa ogbe ode.
GEN 13:16 Kaam ńsi va pa va pọ ahaabh, akher oyeyeng kw'irerek kw'ọnọng on-ofha obhik.
GEN 13:17 Bina, arenga akhọri ẹkhọma nda k'adum ọmaana ẹ̀kpá chẹ biphyir, okhuri bi, chẹ dọ cha kaam ńnang-ọ.”
GEN 13:18 Mẹ wọ osi, Abram, orenga ọkhọri ẹkhọma nda maa opyiri ka Hẹbrọn. Okwu osi oruk kwẹ ọbaanga nchi sa ndeden sa Mamrẹ. M'ibe nna rọ s'iwa obiro osi ijafọhnibe ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
GEN 14:1 M'ogbe nwa, wa Amaraphẹl wọ ode ọvaarnọng kwa Shina, Ariyok ode ọvaarnọng kw'Ẹlasa, Kedor-laomer ode ọvaarnọng kw'Ẹlam, Tidal ode ọvaarnọng kwa Goyim.
GEN 14:2 Wa avaarnọng mba anna biphyir an-akwu abhuna ẹfa, atza arima egbong ttara avaarnọng azen adọdọk. Avaarnọng mba azen p'iwa ayok atza arima abẹ akpen: Bera, ọvaarnọng kwa Sodom, Birasha, ọvaarnọng kwa Gomora, Shinab, ọvaarnọng kw'Adama, Shemebẹr, ọvaarnọng kwa Zeboyim, ttara ọvaarnọng kwa Bẹla, kw'obiro okpena Zoar.
GEN 14:3 Wa avaarnọng mba azen biphyir akwu abhuna ẹfa, bẹ atza arima egbong ọmaana Kedor-laomer k'Ẹttẹri cha Sidim, ch'ede ẹttẹri ch'Ọraanga kw'Onung.
GEN 14:4 Wa avaarnọng mba asi ọtzọhm anang Kedor-laomer ka cho jobh obhiri afa. Yina, ka cho kw'ottong jobh obhiri attaan, bẹ an-abhum ẹvaar chẹ.
GEN 14:5 Okwu opyiri cho ọhawani kwa chi, Kedor-laomer ọmaana avaar mbongo p'abhun for ọmaana kẹ, bẹ akwu arima egbong ọmaana avaarnọng mbongo p'ani dọk akher bi, awobha k'irekh-irek kwẹ. Bẹ akhema ẹkhọma cha Rephayim, ch'ewobh k'okhubha kw'Ashtẹrọt-Karnayim, bẹ abira akhema ẹkhọma cha Zuz ch'ewobh ka Ham, ttara ẹkhọma ch'Ẹm k'okhubha kwa Shavẹ-Kiriyatayim.
GEN 14:6 Bẹ abira atza akhema anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Họr p'arukhi ka mgbegbeho sa Seir, bẹ akhubh bẹ maa bẹ apyiri ka Ẹl-Paran kw'ọbaang k'ebherede.
GEN 14:7 Mada bẹ apyiri mẹ, bẹ akpa nnam k'Ẹn-Mishphat kw'obiro ode Kadẹsh, bẹ abira atza akhema anọng p'ẹkhọma ch'Amalẹk, ttara anọng p'ẹkhọma ch'Amọr ch'erukhi k'okhubha kwa Hazazọn-Tama.
GEN 14:8 Mẹ wọ osi, avaarnọng mba azen p'adabhi Sodom, ọmaana Gomora, ọmaana Adama ọmaana Zeboyim ttara Bẹla kw'obiro ode Zoar, abina ayin k'iyaan atza abe egbong k'Ẹttẹri cha Sidim,
GEN 14:9 arima avaarnọng mbongo anna abẹ, p'ade ọvaar Kedor-laomer kw'ọdabhi Ẹlam, ọmaana ọvaar Tidal kw'ọdabhi Goyim, ọmaana ọvaar Amaraphẹl kw'ọdabhi Shina, ttara ọvaar Ariyok kw'ọdabhi Ẹlasa. Kw'oyini bi avaarnọng anna an-abe k'okhubha wani, avaarnọng mbongo azen abe k'okhubha nwonggo bi, bẹ arima ayok abẹ.
GEN 14:10 Wa Ẹttẹri nda cha Sidim, ẹkhaam ape p'afu ttara ana p'abang-ọbanga abira apyi bi kaang. Mẹ wọ ofon, mada iwa avaarnọng pa Sodom ọmaana Gomora an-arọbhi, ayok bani atto m'ape mba ẹtzaanga. Ayok mbongo arọbh achina ka mgbegbeho.
GEN 14:11 Wa avaarnọng mba anna, abọkha ayok ẹkhakhaama chabẹ kpenamkpen, ọmaana ọchattọhk fabẹ biphyir ka Sodom ọmaana ka Gomora ana, bẹ atzima afona.
GEN 14:12 Wa bẹ abira abọkha Lọt, kw'ode nnwa kw'ọgbaanọkka kw'Abram, ọmaana ẹkhakhaama chẹ. Wa obiro ode ọnọng wani kw'iwa bẹ abọk k'ẹmmọri, okhuri bi, kẹ wa orukhi ka Sodom k'ogbe kw'iwa egbong nda etto.
GEN 14:13 Yina, ojinọng wani kw'iwa ọrọbhi egbong ọnaanga, okwu ọgbaak Abram, kw'ode oHiburu-nọng bi, bẹ akk'Lọt abọkha k'ẹmmọri. M'ogbe nwa, wa Abram orukhi ọbaanga nchi sa Mamrẹ kw'ofon Amọr, ttara vọkka pẹ anọng afa, p'akpen Ẹshkol ọmaana Anẹr, p'iwa ade ayokh-ẹkhaan pẹ.
GEN 14:14 Mada Abram ọbhaang bi, bẹ akk'Lọt kw'ode nnwa kw'ọgbaanọkka abọkha k'ẹmmọri atzima afona, oyeri agbongnọng pẹ p'akk'arima-bọhk akpebhi, p'ade anọng p'amaan m'ọhọhm kwẹ, abira aruk ttar-ẹ. Wa agbongnọng mba ade anọng arọbh chi obhiri chi obhiri attaan. Wa otzima agbongnọng mba pẹ eden, okhubh anọng p'abọk Lọt, maa bẹ apyiri ka Dan.
GEN 14:15 Okwu opyiri m'erungi, Abram ọbhaangi ajinọng pẹ ka ngaan ka ngaan, bẹ akhọri attattaanga-nọng pabẹ akhe k'ottem. Mada bẹ akk'bẹ akhọri, bẹ arima bẹ abẹ, bẹ akhubh bẹ maa apyiri k'ẹkhọma cha Hoba, k'okhubha kwa Damaskọs.
GEN 14:16 Mẹ wọ, Abram ọbọkha anọng mba ekpo pya bẹ atzọk ka Sọdọm ọmaana Gọmọra ọna, obiro otzima Lọt, ọmaana ẹkhakhaama chẹ biphyir, ọmaana panọng pa bẹ abọk k'ẹmmọri, ttara anọng adọdọk pa bẹ abira abọkha k'ẹmmọri, okhuna.
GEN 14:17 Mada Abram on-okhun-okhuna da okk'ọvaar Kedor-laomer ọmaana avaarnọng mbongo p'awobh ttar-ẹ okhema k'egbong, ọvaarnọng kwa Sodom ofon otza okhebh-ẹ, k'Ẹttẹri cha Shavẹ, ch'ebire ekpena “Ẹttẹri ch'Ọvaarnọng.”
GEN 14:18 Mẹ wọ osi, Mẹlkizẹdẹk, kw'ode ọvaarnọng kwa Salẹm, obiro ode ọfọhnẹja kw'Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ọyọhng, wa otzim brẹd ọmaana atzuk ochena Abram.
GEN 14:19 Kẹ Mẹlkizẹdẹk, osi Abram ittabọhng, obiro oben bi, “Tte Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ọyọhng, kw'ọdabhi idik biphyir, kw'osi ẹrọng ọmaana irerek, odo kọ Abram.
GEN 14:20 Tte ẹtzọhnga ewobha ẹnang Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ọyọhng kw'ọdabhi idik biphyir, kw'ọkk'ọ ẹfa ọnanga ch'atzim akhema attattaanga-nọng pọ.” Mẹ wọ osi, Abram ọtzọkha ekpo kpenamkpen py'otzim k'egbong okhuna, okkema k'akhung jobh, ọtzọkha okhung wani k'akhung jobh, ọnang Mẹlkizẹdẹk.
GEN 14:21 Mẹ wọ osi, ọvaarnọng kwa Sodom on-oben Abram bi, “Kọ tzọkha ekpo kpenamkpen biphyir py'atzim k'egbong akhuna, yina, tte anọngẹya biphyir p'atzim k'egbong akhuna ọbọhk anang-m.”
GEN 14:22 Abram obhina ọvaarnọng kwa Sodom bi, “Kaam nkk'mbọhk saam ndini k'ẹrọng ndena Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ọyọhng, kw'osi ẹrọng ọmaana irerek. Kaam nkk'mbiri nchekhi bi,
GEN 14:23 kaam ọttọhk manda vani f'ode fọ, fa kaam ńdọkh-otzọkha kode, ttẹwọr k'ẹnaanga-dik maa, apyiri ka ndik s'ekpo-pya-mmo, ifha kọ aninga abeni bi, ojibhada kw'Abram ofon ka mbọhk sọ e.
GEN 14:24 Kaam ọttọhk kpenamkpen fọ, fa kaam ńdọkh-ọtzọkha kode, oyongi ọchattọhk f'ajinọng paam akk'acha, ttara ekkema ch'ajinọng p'atzor-m arima egbong. Tte Anẹr, ọmaana Ẹshkol ttara Mamrẹ, atzọkha ekkema chabẹ.”
GEN 15:1 Ayongi mẹ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oyin Abram abẹ k'idachen, ọgbaakh-ẹ atzim, oben-ẹ bi, “Abram, oning-ọ ojor, kaam wọ nde ọkhọhnkpa kw'ókker-ọ, ńnang-ọ echora ch'ideden.”
GEN 15:2 Mada Abram ọbhaang idik nna, obhina bi, “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir, mbọng fa kọ asi anang-m, da kaam nni nnwa mmoni, ọnọng kw'óchi-m obo ode Eliyeza kw'ofon Damaskọs.”
GEN 15:3 Abram oben bi, “Kọ kaam va atzima ananga; mẹ wọ, obira k'ẹhọhmmọr chaam wọ óchi-m obo.”
GEN 15:4 Mẹ wọ ofon, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọgbaak Abram atzim, oben-ẹ bi, “Mma e, kwẹ mando kode. Obira nwa araang ọ́chọ-ọ obo, nnwa kw'ofon k'adima pọ, wọ ọ́chọ-ọ obo e.”
GEN 15:5 Mẹ wọ ofon, Ibinọkpaabyi otzim-ẹ oyin k'iyaan, ọkhọhkh-ẹ ndodori sa nwobh k'ọrọngkpakpa, oben-ẹ bi, “Akk'ara odem kwa ndodori nhaabhi, idikha afha abhik sẹ, mando kwa va pa va pọ ikhina bẹ áhaabh.”
GEN 15:6 Abram okhera idik nna s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọgbaakh-ẹ, k'odik-ọkka. Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọkh-ẹ mach'ọnọng kw'otzor-otzor k'itzitzikha sẹ.
GEN 15:7 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obiro oben Abram bi, “Kaam nde Ọvaarnọng kwọ, kaam wọ iwa ndọkh-ọ k'obhon kw'Ur k'ẹkhọma ch'anọng pa Kaldi, ndim-ọ nkwu nnang irerek nna, ifha atzọkha sẹ mach'ekkema chọ.”
GEN 15:8 Abram obhin-ẹ bi, “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir, yan kwa kaam ńdima ńnonga bi, kaam ndọkha irek nna mach'ekkema chaam o?”
GEN 15:9 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhin-ẹ bi, “Kọ rọhng, atza aror ọbhaamnwa-kwakwẹ, ọmaana ovu-gbokha, ttara erukhimaan-dim, p'ade cho attaan-attaan, ọmaana igbegbaa ttara ikpomikha, atzima akwu.”
GEN 15:10 Abram ọtzọkha nden nnuma biphyir otzima okwu, ọbhaakha kpenamkpen k'obe ọfa, ohok igbokha kpenamkpen ikkeri oyok. Yina, ọnọhn fẹ-fẹ f'oni agbokha afa ọbhaak.
GEN 15:11 Mada opyiri k'ogbe kw'attẹrẹ ahak bi akwu achi abukhi p'ekpo mbya, Abram okhubh bẹ.
GEN 15:12 Mada opyiri k'ẹchọhkha k'ogbe kw'ewu ẹn-ẹhak, ọda osi Abram, ọttaabha maa ọmọm, ipyerungi bi kaang ibubha Abram maa ojora f'ideden ọsẹ-ẹ.
GEN 15:13 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Abram bi, “Ronga k'odik-ọkka bi, va pa va pọ áde akhekhen-nọng k'obhon kw'oni kwabẹ ode. Bẹ áruk mẹ mach'abira, anọng ahok bẹ k'ebira, bẹ ábira anang bẹ ihem, ọttọhk ka cho ẹnọhna.
GEN 15:14 Yina, kaam ńnang ẹkhọma nda ch'ekhe bẹ k'ebira ettuma. Ogbe kw'ebira ọkk'ọkwọbha, bẹ atzima ojibhada kw'ideden anaanga ebira ch'obhon nwuma.
GEN 15:15 Onode kọ, ma for sọ, áruk akpen matzẹmaa atzam, yina aning ape bẹ anọhng-ọ atzor abatte k'odidiri.
GEN 15:16 Ottong igbọ inna sa va pa va pọ, bẹ ákhuna m'irerek nna, okhuri bi, ogbe otzim opyiri, kwa kaam ńgwubh anọng p'Amọr m'ibe nna, okhuri itzama sabẹ.”
GEN 15:17 Mada okwu opyiri ogbe kw'ewuchen ekk'edimi, erungi epyi bi kaang. Abram ore irọhkha s'irorong s'ekpon ewobh k'ẹtzaanga, ttara ikhebh sa iwọm ekpon, ch'ereng k'ottem kwa nden nna sa bẹ ajọhkhi k'abiri-biri, ẹkwọbha efona.
GEN 15:18 Mẹ ewu nda, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi echekhi oben Abram bi, “Va pa va pọ bọ, pa kaam ńdọkha irerek nna ttẹwọr k'ọraanga kw'Ijip, maa apyiri k'ọraanga kwa Yupharetes ńnang, bẹ akhaama.
GEN 15:19 Anọng p'arukhi m'irerek nna ade: abaKen, ọmaana abaKeniz, ọmaana abaKadamọn,
GEN 15:20 ọmaana abaHet, ọmaana abaPẹriz, ọmaana abaRephayim,
GEN 15:21 ọmaana abAmọr, ọmaana abaKenaan, ọmaana abaGirgash, ttara abaJẹbus.”
GEN 16:1 Wa Sarai kw'ọba Abram, nnwa kọmaani. Ayongi mẹ, kẹ wa ọkhaam obira kw'ikwanọng kw'ofon Ijip kw'okpen Hagar.
GEN 16:2 Mẹ wọ osi, on-oben Abram bi, “Mada Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọni kaam ọmaan ọnangi, kaam mben bi mphyem-ọ bi, atzọkha obira nwa kwaam ayima abẹ. Asi mẹ, kaam mfha nnenga ma ndaak sẹ ngaama nnwa.” Abram okhera bi osi macha Sarai obeni.
GEN 16:3 Mada Abram okk'orukha k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan ka cho jobh, Sarai ọtzọkha Hagar kw'ode obira kwẹ kw'ofon k'Ijip ọnang Abram bi, oyim-ẹ abẹ.
GEN 16:4 Abram oyima Hagar abẹ, okwu otzima ibhọr. Mada Hagar orong bi, okk'ibhọr otzima, ọttẹwọr ore ọkka kw'orukhi abẹ ọkhara.
GEN 16:5 Mẹ wọ ofon, Sarai ọdọkh-ẹ maa, on-oben Abram bi, “Ọmmamma kwaam ofon ka kọ e. Kaam wọ ndọk obira kwaam nnang-ọ bi, ayim-ẹ abẹ, yina, mada orong bi okk'ibhọr otzima, ọttẹwọr ore-m ọkhara. Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọttọhna aponga pa kaam ọmaana kọ.”
GEN 16:6 Mẹ wọ ofon, Abram oben Sarai bi, “Kker e, ominanwa nwa ode obira kwọ, kọ sẹ-ẹ mach'ọdaakh-ọ.” Mẹ wọ osi, ttẹwọr mẹ, Sarai, Hagar k'eden ọkkakka dọk kotzim, ofona mẹ, Hagar ọrọbh.
GEN 16:7 Mada Hagar ọkk'ọrọbha, orenga-eden kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọrẹ-ẹ k'esipe ch'ewobh k'ebherede, esipe ch'ewobh k'ọkkadeden kw'achin ka Shur.
GEN 16:8 Mẹ wọ osi, orenga-eden nwa oben Hagar bi, “Hagar, obira kwa Sarai, kọ afon maan o? Am-atza maan?” Hagar obhin-ẹ bi, “Kaam mminnọbh-ọrọbh k'inna kwaam ka mbọhk ma e.”
GEN 16:9 Orenga-eden kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ kpa nnam atzor akka, abira ahakha eho anang-ẹ.”
GEN 16:10 Orenga-eden nwa kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obiro oben-ẹ bi, “Kaam ńsi va pa va pọ ahaabh-ọhaabh. Bẹ ahaabh k'odem kw'ọnọng ọni bẹ ofha obhik.”
GEN 16:11 Orenga-eden kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obiro oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ akk'ibhọr atzima, ámaan ojinọng, Kọ ákpẹ-ẹ Ishimayẹl, okhuri bi Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ẹmọng ch'ihem sọ ọbhaanga.
GEN 16:12 Kẹ ọ́raari mach'ẹnyanyaang ch'ẹtzam cha bẹ ani otzitzir atziri. Kẹ óde ọnọng kw'ọ́wọhngi akpen p'anọng biphyir, anọng biphyir ábira awọhngi akpen pẹ, kẹ óruk k'ittattaanga ttara votte pẹ biphyir.”
GEN 16:13 Mẹ wọ osi, Hagar on-oben for sẹ bi, “Ode bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ kwa kaam nne ma, yina ndimi nnukhi akpen ma o?” Mẹ wọ ofon, oyer-ẹ che ch'ikpokpobha bi, Ẹl-Roi. On-oben bi, “Kaam nkk'Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Okker-m nna.”
GEN 16:14 Mẹ wọ ofon, anọng am-ayeri esipe nda, Beer-Lahai-Roi, kw'oyini “Esipe cha kẹ kw'orukhi akpen, kw'ore-m.” Esipe nda ewobh k'ottem kwa Kadẹsh ọmaana Bẹrẹd.
GEN 16:15 Iwa Hagar ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng ọnang Abram. Abram ọkpẹ-ẹ Ishimayẹl.
GEN 16:16 K'ogbe kw'Abram ode cho arọbh anna obhiri azadani, Hagar ọmaan-ẹ Ishimayẹl.
GEN 17:1 K'ogbe kw'iwa Abram on-ode cho arọbh anna obhiri ọhawani kw'ẹrọbh, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oyin Abram abẹ, oben-ẹ bi, “Kaam wọ nde Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir, kọ hok aphaangi paam, abira aruk akpen p'atzor-otzor.
GEN 17:2 Kaam ńsi mach'iwa nkk'nchekhi nnang-ọ bi, va pa va pọ, ikhina bẹ áhaabh-ọhaabh.”
GEN 17:3 Mada Abram ọbhaang idik nna, ọrakha ottima itzitzikha k'irerek. Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi oben-ẹ bi,
GEN 17:4 “Ma wọ ode odik kwa kaam nchekhi nnang-ọ: kọ áde otte kwa ngọma haabhada.
GEN 17:5 Kaam mbiri ńnang-ọ che ẹbhachẹ, Abram dọk kàkpena, kọ án-akpena Abraham, kw'oyini otte kw'idibhon k'ọhaabh.
GEN 17:6 Kaam ńsọ-ọ abhon va k'ọhaabh, ngọma sa nhaabh-ọhaabh ḿfona ma kọ, ọmaana avaar p'ideden.
GEN 17:7 Kaam ńsi echekhi nda cha kaam ttara kọ ebire ede echekhi cha va pa va pọ, k'igbọ s'ikwu k'ogbe ororo m'ipemanitzor. Kaam ńde Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ, ọmaana Ibinọkpaabyi kwa va pa va pọ.
GEN 17:8 Kaam ńdọkha irek sa Kenaan biphyir sa kọ arukhi mach'okhekhennọng madẹdẹn nnang kọ, ọmaana efona chọ, bọng akhaama sẹ m'ipemanitzor. Kaam wọ ńde Ibinọkpaabyi kwabẹ.”
GEN 17:9 Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi oben Abraham bi, “Onode kọ, akhaambi ahok echekhi nda chaam, kọ ọmaana va pa va ttara igbọ s'ikwu k'ogbe ororo.
GEN 17:10 Ma wọ ode echekhi cha kaam ttara kọ, ọmaana va pa va pọ, echekhi cha bọng áhok ede bi, ojinọng kpenamkpen kw'owobh ttara bọng ósi ọkpakkọrikkọ.
GEN 17:11 Bọng ási ọkpakkọrikkọ kw'ẹkpakpa, kw'óde ẹkhọhkha ch'Echekhi cha kaam ttara bọng.
GEN 17:12 K'igbọ s'íkwu k'ororo, ijinọnọnga kpenamkpen kw'ode iwu izenanttaan, bẹ akhaambi asẹ-ẹ ọkpakkọrikkọ. Ajinọng biphyir, p'amaan ka bọng k'ọhọhm, ọmaana ayok pa bọng adebhi k'agbukha p'ani va pa bọng ade, bẹ akhaambi asi ọkpakkọrikkọ.
GEN 17:13 Kaambi p'amaan kabọng k'ihọhm bọ, obiro ode pa bọng adebhi k'agbukha o, bọng akhaambi, asi bẹ ọkpakkọrikkọ. Mando wọ kw'echekhi chaam ch'éde ebhora ka bọng ka for, éde echekhi ch'ipemanitzor.
GEN 17:14 Ojinọng kpenamkpen kw'oni ọkpakkọrikkọ kw'ẹkpakpa osi, bọng kọm-ẹ ẹkhaan, okhuri bi, kẹ okk'echekhi chaam obhuma ohohok.”
GEN 17:15 Ibinọkpaabyi obiro oben Abraham bi, “Onode kwanọng kwọ, Sarai, kẹ Sarai dọk kokpena, kẹ ón-okpena Sara.
GEN 17:16 Kaam ńdẹ-ẹ, mbiri ńsẹ-ẹ ọmaan-ọ nnwa kw'ijinọng. Kaam ńdo Sara bi, óde ọkka kwa ngọma sa nhaabh-ọhaabh. Avaar p'ideden ábira afona ka ndaak sẹ.”
GEN 17:17 Mẹ wọ, Abraham otto okhubha itzitzikha sẹ m'irerek, ọnang Ibinọkpaabyi ikpokpobha, ọmma aha k'ettem oben bi, “Na ọnọng kw'on-ode cho arọbh azen macha kaam, obiro obhon nnwa o? Na Sara, kw'on-obiro ode cho arọbh anna obhiri jobh, obiro ọfha ọmaan nnwa dọkh o?”
GEN 17:18 Mẹ wọ, Abraham oben Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “Ira ode bi na ọdaakh-ọ, ira Ishimayẹl oruk ttara ẹdaa chọ.”
GEN 17:19 Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Mma e! Sara kw'ode kwanọng kwọ, wọ ọ́maan nnwa kw'ijinọng ọnang-ọ. Kọ ákpẹ-ẹ Isaak. Kaam ńttima echekhi chaam ttara kẹ aranga. Éde echekhi ch'ewobha ẹnang va pa va pẹ, m'ipemanitzor.
GEN 17:20 Onode odik kw'okhuri Ishimayẹl, kaam nkk'ọ mmaanga e, k'odik-ọkka kaam ńdẹ-ẹ odo e, kaam ńsẹ-ẹ obhon va, mbiri nttaar-ẹ ọhaabh. Kẹ óbhon avaar-va jobh obhiri afa. Kaam ḿbiri nsẹ-ẹ ode ẹkhọma ch'ideden.
GEN 17:21 Yina, kaam ńgaama echekhi chaam ttara Isaak, kwa Sara ọ́maan ọnang-ọ ikhina cho nnamanda.”
GEN 17:22 Mada Ibinọkpaabyi okk'odik nwa ọgbaakha okyera, ofona oji Abraham mẹ.
GEN 17:23 M'ewu nduma dani, Abraham osi mach'Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹ ọgbaakha bi, osi. Ọtzọkha nnwa kwẹ Ishimayẹl, ọmaana ajinọng biphyir p'amaan m'ọhọhm kwẹ, ttara ayok p'odebhi k'agbukha, ojinọng kpenamkpen k'ọhọhm kwẹ, osi ọkpakkọrikkọ kw'ẹkpakpa.
GEN 17:24 Wa Abraham ode cho arọbh anna obhiri ọhawani kw'ẹrọbh, k'ogbe kwa bẹ asẹ-ẹ ọkpakkọrikkọ.
GEN 17:25 Nnwa kwẹ, Ishimayẹl, ode cho jobh obhiri attaan, mada bẹ asẹ-ẹ ọkpakkọrikkọ.
GEN 17:26 Wa bẹ asi Abraham ọmaana nnwa kwẹ Ishimayẹl ọkpakkọrikkọ, m'ewu nduma dani.
GEN 17:27 Wa Abraham ọmaana ojinọng kpenamkpen kw'owobh k'ọhọhm kwẹ, ọmaana ayok p'amaan m'ọhọhm kwẹ, ttara ayok p'odebhi k'agbukha ka mbọhk s'okhekhennọng, bẹ abira asi bẹ ọkpakkọrikkọ.
GEN 18:1 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oyini Abraham abẹ k'ogbe kw'owobh ẹwọr k'ẹhọhmma ch'ikhira sẹ, ọbaanga kẹ da nchi sa Mamrẹ mbe, k'ọyakpattem kw'ewu ẹkhọmi bi gbaang.
GEN 18:2 Mada Abraham otzini chen ore da ajinọng attaan abe abaang-ẹ, obina k'ẹhọhmma ch'ikhira sẹ, otzini mmo m'ẹbhar-ẹbhar ọtza okhebha bẹ, ọrakha ottima itzitzikha k'irerek orima bẹ.
GEN 18:3 Oben bi, “Itta kwaam, idikha kaam nkk'ọphyaam ngaama k'itzitzikha sọ, kọ kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, kakwọbha.
GEN 18:4 Tte bẹ atzima asisaa akwu, ifha bọng agbobhi mmo, bọng abira akwokha ọwọhng m'echi nda irekhirek.
GEN 18:5 Tte ndima ichattọhk-ttọhkha nkwu bọng achi, ifha bọng akhaama ẹfa cha bọng achina ororo k'orenga kwabọng, mada bọng akk'apyiri m'ibe sa kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwabọng.” Bẹ abhin-ẹ bi, “Ojibhi kẹ, si mach'ettem chọ ẹpaan-ọ.”
GEN 18:6 Mẹ wọ ofon, Abraham obina ẹbhar-ẹbhar ọtza okhebha Sara k'ikhira ẹtzaanga, oben bi, “Kọ yoma agbobhi-mbọhk attaan p'abubuma atzima asi brẹd ẹbhar-ẹbhar.”
GEN 18:7 Mẹ wọ osi, Abraham ọrọbh ochina k'ivukwuri, ọtza otzekha ọbhaam-nwa ọkkakka ọnang nnwa wani kw'orukh-ẹ abẹ, ofhu chẹ m'ẹbhar-ẹbhar otzima osi ọchattọhk.
GEN 18:8 Yina on-obiro ọtzọkha abasi p'abang-ọbanga, ọmaana abasi ttara etzen ẹbhabhachẹ ch'ọbhaam-nwa, obera bẹ. Mada bẹ am-achi ọchattọhk mva, kẹ Abraham obe m'echi nduma irekhirek, cha bẹ awobh achi ọchattọhk.
GEN 18:9 Anọng mba an-abọbh Abraham bi, “Kwanọng kwọ, Sara khi?” Obhina bẹ bi, “Owobh k'ikhira ẹtzaanga e.”
GEN 18:10 Mẹ wọ ofon, ọnọng wani k'ottem kw'anọng mba, oben bi, “K'odik ọkkọkka, ikhina cho nnamanda kaam mbiri mkpa nnam nkwu ndibh bọng m'ibe nna. Sara kw'ode kwanọng kwọ, ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng.” Wa Sara owobh k'ekhiramma ẹtzaanga, ọkpa nnam ọbọra, om-oyonga bẹ itzọhng.
GEN 18:11 Iwa Abraham ọmaana Sara akk'an-atzama kpọng maa, Sara ọkwọbha ọphaangi kwa for ottotto.
GEN 18:12 Mẹ wọ ofon, Sara ọmma aha, oben for sẹ bi, “Mada nkk'ndama, itta kwaam ọtzam, na kaam mbiri mfha ngaama idadaakha s'ojinọng, sa mobiro ọtzọn oyima o?”
GEN 18:13 Mẹ wọ osi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbọbh Abraham bi, “Sara oreng mbọng apfẹ ọmma aha, oben for sẹ bi, ‘Na kaam, mbiri mfha mmaan nnwa, m'atzam mba dọkh o?’
GEN 18:14 Odik owobh kẹ, kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi on-ofha oso o? Ikhina cho nnamanda kaam ḿbiri mkpa nnam nkwu ndibh bọng, Sara, ọ́maan nnwa kw'ijinọng.”
GEN 18:15 Mada Sara ọbhaang odik nwa, ojor-ẹ. Mẹ wọ, okhona, oben bi, “Kaam aha kimma.” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben-ẹ bi, “K'odik ọkkakka, kọ akk'aha amma e.”
GEN 18:16 Mada anọng mba attaan abin bi, bẹ afona, bẹ atzini chen akkeri k'obhon kwa Sodom. Wa Abraham ọtzọn bẹ abẹ, ọtza orik bẹ k'eden.
GEN 18:17 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben for sẹ bi, “Odik nwa kwa mbeni bi nsi ma, kọbaan bi, ndubha Abraham.
GEN 18:18 Ode odik ọkkakka bi, va pa va p'Abraham akwuma akwu ade afanọng ọmaana ẹkhọma ch'ideden, on-orenga ma kẹ, idibhon s'ọyagbin ikhaama ẹdaa.
GEN 18:19 Da kaam nkk'ẹ ndekha bi, ọtzọhn va pẹ ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chẹ bi, bẹ ahok abhaangi p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, obiro oruk akpen p'atzori k'eden ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ifha osi ẹjaakhi k'echekhi ch'ọkk'ọsa ọnang Abraham.”
GEN 18:20 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Obhoma kw'okhuri idik-ttama sa Sodom ọmaana sa Gomora ọbari kpọng: ẹkhọngkwuri chabẹ ebire epyibh eyong-oyongi,
GEN 18:21 kw'osi kaam ńhakha, ifha nda ńne, s'itzama sa bẹ akk'asa ipyibhi ipyiri obhoma kwa kaam mmaang. Kwẹ oni mando obiro ode, kaam ńnonga-oronga.”
GEN 18:22 Mẹ wọ, ajinọng mba abhakhi nnam akkeri itzitzikha k'okhubha kwa Sodom. Yina, Abraham ochina ororo obe Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi k'itzitzikha.
GEN 18:23 Abraham orenga otzor Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ka for, ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Ma, na kọ atzọkha anọng p'asi ẹmmaana ọkkakka, afhu attara k'anọng p'asi ẹmmaana-tzama o?
GEN 18:24 Idikha ira kọ are, anọng arọbh afa obhiri jobh, p'asi ẹmmaana ọkkakka m'obhon nwa, na ira kọ akhọkha anọng mba nkwu-osisi, atte obhon nwa ọbọhk o?
GEN 18:25 Tzọmi-tzọmi okponga k'idachen bi, kọ atzọkha anọng p'asi ẹmmaana ọkkakka attara k'ayok p'asi ẹmmaana-tzama afhu. Ka yan wọ kw'ira ọkpaar-aponga kw'ọyagbin biphyir, oni odik kw'otzor-otzor osi o?”
GEN 18:26 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhin-ẹ bi, “Idikha kaam nne anọng arọbh afa obhiri jobh, p'asi ẹmmaana ọkkakka m'obhon nwa, kaam ńnenga anọng mba abẹ, ńtte obhon nwa ọbọhk.”
GEN 18:27 Mẹ wọ, Abraham obhin-ẹ, oben bi, “Tzotzokhaan, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kwaam, kaambi, ode bi, nde idọdọhbh, mbiri nde itzọtzọhng macha nde ma, kaam mbar ettem mgbaak atzim nnang-ọ.
GEN 18:28 Idikha on-ode bi, anọng azen kade k'anọng arọbh afa obhiri jobh ma obhon nwa, p'asi ẹmmaana ọkkakka khi, ma na ira kọ adimi obhon nwa, okhuri anọng azen o?” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhin-ẹ bi, “Mma e, idikha kaam nne anọng arọbh afa obhiri azen, p'atzor-otzor, kaam ngọkha bẹ nkwu-osisi ọkhọkha, ńtte obhon nwa ọbọhk.”
GEN 18:29 Abraham ochina ororo ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Idikha ira on-ode bi, kọ are anọng arọbh afa, p'asi ẹmmaana ọkkakka, ma na ira kọ adimi obhon nwa o?” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhin-ẹ bi, “Mma e, okhuri anọng mba arọbh afa, kaam ńgọhkha bẹ nkwu-osisi ọkhọkha, ńtte obhon nwa ọbọhk.”
GEN 18:30 Mẹ wọ, Abraham obhin-ẹ bi, “Tzotzokhaan Itta, oning-ọ obhemi, tte nchina ororo mphyem-ọ. Idikha ira on-ode bi, kọ an-are anọng ẹrọbh obhiri jobh ma obhon nwa khi?” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhin-ẹ bi, “Mma e, idikha kaam nne anọng ẹrọbh obhiri jobh, kaam ira ntte obhon nwa ọbọhk otte.”
GEN 18:31 Mẹ wọ, Abraham oben bi, “Mada kaam nkk'ettem mbara bi, mphyem-ọ, tte mbiri mbọbh-ọ. Idikha ira on-ode bi, anọng ẹrọbh bẹ-bẹ bọ p'are ma khi?” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhin-ẹ bi, “K'odik ọkkakka, ira nne ọnọngmik-dema nwa, ka nho s'anọng mba ẹrọbh, kaam ira ntte obhon nwa ọbọhk otte.”
GEN 18:32 Mẹ wọ, Abraham oben bi, “Tzotzokhaan Itta, tte oning-ọ obhemi, tte nna mphyem ogbe nwa wani. Idikha ira bẹ an-ade anọng jobh bẹ-bẹ khi?” Obiro obhin-ẹ bi, “K'odik ọkkakka, ira nne ọnọngmik-dema nwa, ka nho s'anọng mba jobh, kaam ira ntte obhon nwa ọbọhk otte.”
GEN 18:33 Mada Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'atzim ọgbaakha biphyir ttara Abraham, ofona. Abraham obiro ọkpa nnam k'ikhira sẹ.
GEN 19:1 Okwu opyiri k'ẹchọhkha, arenga-eden mbuma afa p'Ibinọkpaabyi p'ahak Abraham, apyiri ka Sodom. M'ogbe nwa, Lọt owobh ẹwọr k'ẹbaakhamma cha Sodom. Mada ore bẹ, obina orenga otzor bẹ ka for, obiro ọrakha ottima itzitzikha k'irerek orima bẹ.
GEN 19:2 Oben bẹ bi, “Abitta paam, tzotzokhaan bọng kwu hakha k'ọhọhm kw'ọtzọhmnọng kwabọng, ifha kaam nnang bọng asi, pa bọng agbobhi mmo sabọng, bọng ayima ma m'erungiwu nda, ewu ekk'ehobha, k'ekpekpebha, bọng achina ororo k'orenga kwabọng.” Abẹ abhin-ẹ bi, “Mma e, maman ọtza oyima k'ipha.”
GEN 19:3 Yina, Lọt ochina ororo ọgbana bẹ maa, yina bẹ an-akher bi, atzọn-ẹ abẹ adim k'ọhọhm kwẹ. Osi brẹd kw'oni yist ọkhaam, ọnang bẹ, bẹ achi.
GEN 19:4 Yina Lọt ọmaana akhekhennọng pẹ, aninga yima, ajinọng biphyir adikkobh ttara adedennọng, p'obhon kwa Sodom akk'ọhọhm kwẹ akhọri akhe k'ottem.
GEN 19:5 Mando kwa bẹ agwoni Lọt abọbh-ẹ bi, “Akhekhen-nọng mbuma p'ahakh-ọ m'erungiwu cha mayina khi? Tzima bẹ yin k'iyaan, moyima bẹ abẹ.”
GEN 19:6 Lọt oyin k'iyaan ọtza okhebha bẹ, obhen ọmma okpori akhekhen-nọng pẹ k'ẹtzaanga,
GEN 19:7 oben bẹ bi, “Mma e, abayi, bọng itzama-dema nna kasi.
GEN 19:8 Bọng kker e, kaam ngaam aminava afa, p'ani ajinọng atzima aronga. Tte ntte bẹ ọbọhk nnang bọng, ifha bọng atzima bẹ asi, odik kpenamkpen kw'ọdaakhi bọng. Onode ajinọng mba, bọng bẹ itzama-dema nna kasi: kkeri bẹ awobh k'irekh-irek kw'ẹfa chaam.”
GEN 19:9 Bẹ an-abhina bi, “Kebh man eden, okhekhen-nọng macha kọ wọ ira on-okwu ode ọsi-aponga kwaman o? Ani man eden akhebhi mọkwọbha, itzama sa mọsọ-ọ iyọhnga s'ira mosi bẹ.” Anọng mba achina ororo ayak Lọt atzim maa, bẹ aben bi avọhkhi ọmma.
GEN 19:10 Yina, ajinọng mbuma p'awobh k'ọhọhm ẹtzaanga an-anemi mbọhk sabẹ, atzọr Lọt atzima adim k'ọhọhm ẹtzaanga, bẹ abhen ọmma.
GEN 19:11 Mẹ wọ e, bẹ asi ajinọng mba biphyir p'abe k'iyaan adikkobh ọmaana adeden-nọng akpa chen, ọn-ọkhọn bẹ, bẹ ẹhọhmma ọdọk kare.
GEN 19:12 Mẹ wọ, akhekhen-nọng mba abọbh Lọt bi, “Kọ akhaam, anọng adọdọk kẹ o? Rọhng atza atzọkha adim pa va pọ, ọmaana va pọ p'ijinọng, ttara p'ipanọng, ọmaana ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'ode kwọ, atzima bẹ biphyir abina m'obhon nwa,
GEN 19:13 okhuri bi, mon-odimi obhon nwa e. Itzama s'anọng p'obhon nwa akk'asa, ikk'ihaabha kpọng-kpọng k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kẹ wọ osi ọtzọhm man bi mokwu odimi obhon nwa e.”
GEN 19:14 Mẹ wọ, Lọt oyin k'iyaan ọtza ọgbaak ajinọng p'akk'for ada bi atzọkha va pẹ p'ipanọng k'ọbada. Oben bẹ bi, “Bọng s'ẹbhar-ẹbhar abina aji obhon nwa, kkeri Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi on-odimi obhon nwa e.” Chibhi da okk'bẹ ọgbaakha mẹ, adim pa va atzọkha kwẹ mach'okhiri-dik.
GEN 19:15 Mada ewu en-ehobh, arenga-eden mba adukha Lọt aben bi, “Tzima kwanọng kwọ ọmaana va pọ p'ipanọng p'awobh ma ttar-ọ, abina m'obhon nwa ẹbhar-ẹbhar. Oni mando ode, kọ abira atzọkha ekkema k'ọmmamma kw'ótto okhebha odedenmon nwa.”
GEN 19:16 Chibhi da arenga-eden mba adukh-ẹ, Lọt osi ma for bi zẹmẹnẹ. Mando kw'arenga-eden mba aji Lọt ọmaana kwanọng kwẹ ttara aminava pẹ afa mbọhk bi kpẹẹbh, atzima ayin k'obhon nwa, da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkhaam inọngkwo ttara bẹ.
GEN 19:17 Mada bẹ akk'ayina k'iyaan m'obhon nwa, ọnọng wani k'ottem kw'arenga-eden mba oben bẹ bi, “Bọng nọbh k'odem kwa bọng akkaana akpen pabọng o. Bọng nnam kàbhakh o, bọng k'ẹttẹri manda dani kàbira abe o. Bọng nọbh achina k'ibe sa mgbegbeho nwobh. Oni mando ode, bọng ápe-ope.”
GEN 19:18 Mẹ wọ, Lọt oben bẹ bi, “Mma e, abitta paam, tte nsi bọng nkwo.
GEN 19:19 Bọng akk'aam ọphyaam akhọkha, bọng akk'ejibha ch'ideden abira asa anang-m, akkaana akpen paam. Yina, ẹfa kaam kede cha mfha nnọbh nchina k'ibe sa mgbegbeho nwobh, okhuri bi itzama nna íkhọhbh-m ọkhọhbha, kaam ḿbiri mpe-ope.
GEN 19:20 Bọng kkeri obhon nwana kw'owobh ọbaanga ma, bina ma pyiri kẹ kpọng kobhiri. Ode ibhobhona, tte mọrọbh ochina kẹ ifha moruk akpen.”
GEN 19:21 Iwa orenga-eden nwa obhin-ẹ bi, “Kaam ńsi-osi mach'aphyem-m. Kaam ńtte obhon nwa ọbọhk otte, kẹ kíndimi.
GEN 19:22 Kọ rọbh ẹbhar-ẹbhar achina kẹ, okhuri bi, kaam odik manda wani kinkponga nsi ma kọ apyiri kẹ.” Kẹ wọ osi bẹ ayeri obhon nwuma Zoar.
GEN 19:23 Lọt ọmaana anọng pẹ apyiri ka Zoar k'ogbe kw'ewu ẹkk'ẹnyaana.
GEN 19:24 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhm atza p'awọm ekpon p'afon k'ẹrọng atzebh ka Sodom ọmaana Gomora.
GEN 19:25 Mando kw'iwa Ibinọkpaabyi oreng odimi ibhon nna, ọmaana ibhon biphyir s'egbegbeho nda, ttara anọng biphyir p'arukhi m'ibhon nna, ttara ekpo py'emeni m'irek nna.
GEN 19:26 Yina, kwanọng kwa Lọt ọbhakhi nnam, on-orengi ọtza kw'onung kw'obe bi gbẹẹng.
GEN 19:27 Mada ewu en-ehọbh, k'ekpekpebha, Abraham obina ochina k'ibe s'iwa obe k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
GEN 19:28 Mada ọhak chen okkeri ka Sodom ọmaana Gomora, k'irek s'ẹttẹri biphyir, ore ororong-bina kw'om-oyin k'okhubha nwuma, mach'irorong s'ekpon cha nkwukha.
GEN 19:29 Mẹ wọ, mada iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi odimi ibhon nna biphyir s'iwobh k'ẹttẹri, ojima Abraham. Ofona mẹ, ọrọbha Lọt ka mbọhk s'itzama s'itto ikhebha ibhon nna s'iwa Lọt orukhi.
GEN 19:30 Wa ojora osi Lọt bi, ọtza oruk ka Zoar, on-otzima va pẹ p'ipanọng afa ọtza oruk k'okhubha kwa mgbegbeho. Wa kẹ ọmaana va pẹ afa arukhi k'ọmma kw'itzakpa.
GEN 19:31 Ewu dani, ochedennwa kwa Lọt, oben ọgbaanọkka bi, “Otte kwaman ọkk'ọtzama; akker-okkeri ojinọng ma ibe nna kode kw'oyima man abẹ mach'ẹmaana ch'ọnọngẹya ede, makhọra ọyagbin.
GEN 19:32 Tte mọnang otte kwaman atzuk ogwo obuma, ifha moyim-ẹ abẹ, morenga k'otte kwaman osi echimma chaman eningi edimi.”
GEN 19:33 M'erungiwu nduma, bẹ anang otte atzuk ogwo obuma, ochedennwa ọtza oyima otte abẹ. Otte ogbe kwa nnwa okwu oyima mẹ, ọmaana ogbe kw'obiro obina korong.
GEN 19:34 Ewu ehobh mẹ, ochedennwa oben ọgbaanọkka kw'ikhakhari bi, “Erungiwu ch'ikhena, kaam nkk'otte kwaman abẹ nyima e. Mobiro ọnang-ẹ atzuk ogwo mach'ikhena, m'erungiwu cha mayina, kọ rọhng abira atza ayim-ẹ abẹ, ifha morenga k'otte kwaman mosi echimma chaman eningi edimi.”
GEN 19:35 M'erungiwu nduma, bẹ anang otte atzuk ogwo obuma. Ọgbaanọkka kw'ikhakhari obiro ọtza oyima otte abẹ. Otte ogbe kwa nnwa okwu oyima mẹ, ọmaana ogbe kw'obiro obina korong.
GEN 19:36 Mẹ wọ, va mba pa Lọt afa p'ipanọng atzima ọbhọr anang otte kwabẹ.
GEN 19:37 Ochedennwa ọmaan ojinọng, ọkpẹ-ẹ Moab, kẹ wọ ode otte kw'ẹkhọma cha Moab maa apyiri ma.
GEN 19:38 Ọgbaanọkka kw'ikhakhari obiro ọmaan ojinọng, ọkpẹ-ẹ Bẹn-Ammi, kẹ wọ ode otte kw'ẹkhọma ch'Ammọn ma apyiri ma.
GEN 20:1 Abraham obina ochina k'ẹkhọma cha Nẹgẹv, oruk k'ottem kw'ibhon sa Kadẹsh ọmaana Shur. Ayongi mẹ, wa obiro obhing ka Gẹra k'igbegbaa.
GEN 20:2 Mẹ wọ kw'iwa Abraham ọgbaakhi anọng bi, kwanọng kwẹ, Sara, ode ọgbaanọkka kwẹ. Mẹ wọ, Abimẹlẹk kw'ode ọvaarnọng kwa Gẹra ọtzọhm anọng bi, bẹ atzima Sara akwu k'ọvaar-dimpa kwẹ, ọtzọkh-ẹ.
GEN 20:3 Yina, erungiwu dani Ibinọkpaabyi oyin Abimẹlẹk abẹ k'idachen, osi ẹjaakhi ọnang-ẹ bi, “Kọ an-ape e, okhuri bi, kwanọng nwa kw'atzọk ahok m'ọhọhm kwọ, ode kwanọng kw'ọkhaam odim e.”
GEN 20:4 Yina, wa Abimẹlẹk ọmaana Sara bẹ ayok for atzima aronga. Mẹ wọ, Abimẹlẹk ọbọbh Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “Itta, ma na kọ atzọkha ọnọng kw'oni itzama otzima ọsa afhu-o?
GEN 20:5 Abraham ma for sẹ wọ ọgbaakh-m bi, Sara ode ọgbaanotte kwẹ. Sara ọkhaam ma for sẹ obiro ọgbaakh-m bi, Abraham ode ọgbaanotte kwẹ. Ettem chaam ttara achibhi paam bẹ m'odik nwa kapyibhi.”
GEN 20:6 Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi oben Abimẹlẹk k'idachen bi, “K'odik ọkkakka, kaam nkk'nnonga bi, odik nwa k'ọgbaan kasi, kẹ wọ osi kaam mkpọ-ọ eden ifha aningi ẹkhọngkwuri k'itzitzikha saam asi, mbiri mkpọ-ọ eden ifha bọng aningi ayok abẹ ayim.
GEN 20:7 Mẹ wọ, tte kwanọng nwuma ọbọhk anang odim kwẹ. Kkeri odim kwẹ ode ọsẹjaakhi, kẹ ózi njọhm ọnang-ọ áruk akpen. Yina, idikha anẹ-ẹ ọbọhk atte, kọ ronga k'odik ọkkakka bi, kọ ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chọ biphyir ápe-ope.”
GEN 20:8 Mẹ wọ, k'ekpekpebha ch'ewu ehobh mẹ, Abimẹlẹk oyeri akhaan-nọng pẹ biphyir akwu, ọtzọkha odik kpenamkpen ọgbaak bẹ. Ojora f'ideden osi bẹ.
GEN 20:9 Mẹ wọ, Abimẹlẹk oyeri Abraham, ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Bọng odik-dema kw'asi anang man ma? Yan wọ kwa kaam nkk'ntta ka kọ k'itzitzikha o, kw'ira arenga kwẹ abẹ anang kaam ttara ọvaarbhon kwaam ettuma-dema nda o? Odik nwa kw'asi anang-m ma, kọbaan.”
GEN 20:10 Abimẹlẹk ochina ororo ọbọbh Abraham bi, “Bọnga nttak kw'atzim asi odik nwa?”
GEN 20:11 Abraham obhin-ẹ bi, “Nsi mando da nchibhi bi, anọng p'obhon nwa ojora Ibinọkpaabyi kakhaam, bẹ afha afhu-m okhuri kwanọng kwaam.
GEN 20:12 Ayongi mẹ, kwanọng nwa ode ọgbaanotte kwaam, kw'otte wani obhoni man, yina, mọkhọmi abakka. Kaam mbiri ndọkh-ẹ macha kwanọng kwaam.
GEN 20:13 K'ogbe kw'iwa Ibinọkpaabyi osi-m mbina nji ẹhọhmmọr ch'otte kwaam, nnenga nchina k'obe-k'obe. Wa kaam mbeni Sara bi, k'ibe kpenamkpen sa mọtza, kọ gbaak anọng bi, kaam nde ọgbaanotte kwọ, ifha atzima mẹ akhọkh-m idadaakha.”
GEN 20:14 Iwa Abimẹlẹk ọtzọkha arukhimaan ọmaana abhaam, ttara abira p'ijinọng ọmaana p'ipanọng, ọnang Abraham. Ọtzọkha Sara ọkpa nnam ọnang Abraham.
GEN 20:15 Abimẹlẹk on-oben bi, “Kker e, irerek sa kaam ndabhi biphyir iwobh-ọ m'itzitzikha, kọ ruk k'ibe kpenamkpen s'idaakh-ọ.”
GEN 20:16 Abimẹlẹk on-obiro oben Sara bi, “Kker e, kaam nnaangi agbaanatte kwọ ashẹkẹl pa silva nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh. Ma wọ ode ẹkhọhkha bi, odik nwa ọkk'ọha e, ttara bi mbọhk sọ m'odik nwa kinde.”
GEN 20:17 Mẹ wọ, Abraham ozi njọhm ọnang Ibinọkpaabyi. Ibinọkpaabyi orenga ma njọhm nna osi Abimẹlẹk, ọmaana kwanọng kwẹ, ttara abira p'ipanọng bi, bẹ abira akhaama va,
GEN 20:18 okhuri da iwa Abimẹlẹk ọtzọk Sara kw'ode kwanọng kw'Abraham, wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'panọng p'ẹhọhmmọr ch'Abimẹlẹk biphyir ọkpaana.
GEN 21:1 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi odo Sara, mach'iwa okk'ochekhi.
GEN 21:2 Sara okwu otzima ibhọr, ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng ọnang Abraham k'atzam. Wa nnwa nwa ọmaan otzor k'ogbe kw'iwa Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ochekhi bi ọmaana.
GEN 21:3 Mẹ wọ, Abraham okpe nnwa nwa kwa Sara ọmaani, Isaak.
GEN 21:4 Okwu opyiri iwu izenanttaan sa nnwa nwa kwẹ Isaak ọmaan, Abraham ọsẹ-ẹ ọkpakkọrikkọ otzor k'odem kw'Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹ ọtzọhna.
GEN 21:5 Wa Abraham ode cho arọbh azen, k'ogbe kwa nnwa kwẹ Isaak, ọmaan.
GEN 21:6 Mẹ wọ, Sara oben bi, “Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'aam ọsa bi mma aha. Ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'ọbhaang odik nwa kw'Ibinọkpaabyi osi ọnang-m, obiro otzor-m ọmma aha.”
GEN 21:7 Ochina ororo oben bi, “Anyi wọ ira ọgbaak Abraham bi, na kaam Sara mfha nnọk nnwa? Yina, kaam nkk'nnwa kw'ijinọng mmaana nnang Abraham k'atzam pẹ.”
GEN 21:8 Nnwa nwa ọbar, ọkka otzim-ẹ ẹba, okwu opyiri k'ewu ch'ọkka otzimi Isaak ẹba, Abraham osi ọdadaami kw'ideden.
GEN 21:9 Wa Sara ore da nnwa nwa kwa Hagar kw'ofon Ijip ọmaani ọnang Abraham, om-osi ẹyaanga-tzama ttara Isaak.
GEN 21:10 Mẹ wọ, Sara oben Abraham bi, “Khubh obira-kwanọng nwa ttara nnwa kwẹ, bẹ arọhng afona. Nnwa nwa kw'obira-kwanọng kọbaan bi ọkhaama ekkema k'ojibhada kwọ, kwa nnwa kwaam Isaak ọ́tzọkha.”
GEN 21:11 Wa odik nwa ọyakhi Abraham atzim k'ettem kpọng-kpọng, da ore bi, Ishimayẹl obiro ode nnwa kwẹ.
GEN 21:12 Yina, Ibinọkpaabyi oben Abraham bi, “Ettem ening-ọ atzim ẹyakhi okhuri nnwa nwa ọmaana obira-kwanọng kwọ. Si odik kpenamkpen kwa Sara oben-ọ bi, asi, okhuri bi, orenga ma Isaak va pa va pọ, áhaabh-ọhaabh atzor k'echekhi ch'iwa nkk'nnanga.
GEN 21:13 Kaam ńsi nnwa kw'obira-kwanọng nwa obiro ọkhaama ẹkhọma chẹ, okhuri da kẹ obiro ode nnwa kwọ.”
GEN 21:14 Mẹ wọ e, Abraham obina k'ekpekpebha ọtzọkha ọchattọhk, obiro ọtzọkha asi, okhe k'ẹkpa ch'ede etzenkpa, ọnang Hagar. Abraham ọtzọkha pyẹ ọnan-ẹ ka mbabaang, okhubh-ẹ ọmaana nnwa kwẹ. Mẹ wọ, Hagar obina ochina k'ebherede, k'okhubha kwa Bẹrshẹba.
GEN 21:15 Mada asi mba p'awobh k'ẹkpa ch'ede etzenkpa akk'an-aha, Hagar ọtzọkha nnwa oruri k'ochi-gbagba wani.
GEN 21:16 Ọn-ọpaangi owobha ẹwọr k'oden-mir, oben for sẹ bi, “Kaam ettem kingaama nwobha ma nne nnwa kwaam ope.” Mada otzim owobh ẹwọr mẹ, nnwa kwẹ osẹ-ẹ nkwo, on-obhom ẹmọng k'ẹrọng.
GEN 21:17 Wa Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaanga ẹmọng cha nnwa nwa obhomi. Orenga-eden kw'Ibinọkpaabyi kw'ẹrọng oben Hagar bi, “Bọng odik wọ o? Oning-ọ ojor, mada nnwa kwọ oyim mẹ, Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ẹmọng chẹ ch'obhomi, ọbhaanga.
GEN 21:18 Bina atza atzini nnwa kwọ, kkeri kaam ńsẹ-ẹ ode otte kw'ẹkhọma ch'ideden.”
GEN 21:19 Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi osi Hagar ore esipe. Otzima ẹkpa ch'ede etzenkpa, ọtza ọkhaabha asi maa chẹ efhu, ọnang nnwa ogwo.
GEN 21:20 Wa Ibinọkpaabyi owobha ttara nnwa nwa mada ọm-ọbar. Wa nnwa nwa oruk k'ebherede, ode ọgbajijaa kw'ideden.
GEN 21:21 Mada iwa nnwa nwa orukhi k'ebherede ka Paran, ọkka kwẹ ọtza ọtzọkha ominanwa kw'ofon Ijip, ọnang-ẹ k'ọbada.
GEN 21:22 K'ogbe nwuma, Abimẹlẹk otzim Phikol kw'ode oho kw'agbongnọng pẹ, ọtza oben Abraham bi, “Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ttara kọ k'odik kpenamkpen kw'asi.
GEN 21:23 Mẹ wọ, kọ chekhi anang-m m'itzitzikha s'Ibinọkpaabyi bi, kaam kàbọhra ọmaana va paam, ttara va pa va paam. Kọ si ẹmmaana ọkkakka atzima atzor-m, ọmaana ẹkhọma nda cha kọ arukhi mach'okhekhen-nọng, atzor macha kaam nsi nnang-ọ.”
GEN 21:24 Abraham oben bi, “Kaam nkk'nchekhi.”
