GEN 21:25 Mẹ wọ e, Abraham ọgbaak Abimẹlẹk odik okhuri esipe chẹ, ch'atzọhmnọng pa kẹ Abimẹlẹk akk'ẹ abọhkha ana.
GEN 21:26 Yina, Abimẹlẹk obhin-ẹ bi, “Kaam ọnọng kw'osi odik nwa kinnong, kọ kaam odik-dema nwa atzima am-agbaakha, mayina wọ kwa kaam nna mmaang kwẹ.”
GEN 21:27 Mẹ wọ, Abraham ọtzọkha arukhimaan ọmaana abhaam, ọnang Abimẹlẹk, bẹ anọng mba afa asi echekhi anang ayok.
GEN 21:28 Abraham ọtzọkha arukhimaan-papẹ azenamfa k'etzirakpo pyẹ, ọkhọm ohok.
GEN 21:29 Abimẹlẹk ọn-ọbọbh Abraham bi, “Arukhimaan-papẹ mba azenamfa p'akhọmi ahok ka, ayini yan o?”
GEN 21:30 Abraham obhin-ẹ bi, “Kọ khera bi, atzọkha arukhimaan-papẹ mba azenamfa pa kaam nnang-ọ, mando wọ ọkhọkha bi, kọ akk'akhera bi, kaam wọ ndumi esipe nda.”
GEN 21:31 Mẹ wọ, anọng ayeri ibe nna Bẹrshẹba, okhuri bi, mẹ wọ kw'ajinọng mba afa awobh asi echekhi anang ayok.
GEN 21:32 Mada bẹ akk'echekhi nda asa ka Beershẹba, Abimẹlẹk otzima Phikol nwa kw'ode oho kw'arim-egbong pẹ, ọkpa nnam abhana k'ẹkhọma cha Philistiya.
GEN 21:33 Wa Abraham ogboni echi cha tamaris ka Bẹrshẹba. M'ibe nna rọ sa kẹ, om-owobha okpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'ipemanitzor.
GEN 21:34 Wa Abraham oruk m'ẹkhọma nda cha Philistiya k'ogbe-bhirada.
GEN 22:1 K'ogbe wani mẹ, Ibinọkpaabyi oyom nnam-ophephe kw'Abraham, oyer-ẹ bi, “Abraham!” Abraham obhina bi, “Kkeri kaam ma e.”
GEN 22:2 Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi oben Abraham bi, “Kọ tzọkha nnwa kwọ Isaak, nnwa nwuma kwọ wani kw'ọdaakh-ọ ọdaak, achina k'ẹkhọma cha Moriya. Tzim-ẹ asi ẹnanga ẹkwọmichẹ k'ottem kwa mgbegbeho sa ńdibh-ọ.”
GEN 22:3 Ewu ehobh mẹ k'ekpekpebha, Abraham obina ọmaana atzọhmnọng pẹ afa, ttara nnwa kwẹ Isaak, ọtzọkha ekpo ọdabh k'ẹnyanyaang chẹ. Mada okk'ommen ọkpaara f'obenga ẹnanga ẹkwọmichẹ nda, obina orenga ochina k'ibe nnuma s'Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹ otzibha.
GEN 22:4 Ottong iwu ittaan s'orenga nwa, Abraham otzini chen, ore ibe nnuma k'ororo.
GEN 22:5 Ofona mẹ, Abraham on-oben atzọhmnọng pẹ bi, “Bọng wobha ma ttara ẹnyanyaang atzik man, da kaam ttara Isaak, mochina k'ororo, mótza okpobha Ibinọkpaabyi. Mokyerkyer, mọ́kpa nnam ọkpa okhebha bọng m'ibe nna.”
GEN 22:6 Wa Abraham otzini ommen fa bẹ atzima abaanga ekpon ch'ẹnanga ẹkwọmichẹ, ọnana nnwa kwẹ Isaak. Kẹ Abraham otzima ekpon, ọmaana imaana k'ọbọhk. Mada bẹ anọng afa areng m'eden,
GEN 22:7 Isaak, oben otte bi, “Itta kwaam.” Abraham okhera bi, “Nnwa kwaam.” Isaak ochina ororo oben bi, kaam mben bi, mbọbh-ọ bi, “Mada ommen owobh ma, ekpon ewobha, orukhimaan kw'am-otzima osi ẹnanga ẹkwọmichẹ kho o?”
GEN 22:8 Mẹ wọ, Abraham obhin-ẹ bi, “Nnwa kwaam, Ibinọkpaabyi ọkhaam ma for sẹ wọ, ọ́nang man orukhimaan kw'ẹnanga ẹkwọmichẹ nda e.” Mando wọ kwa bẹ anọng afa achin ororo arenga afona.
GEN 22:9 Mada bẹ apyiri k'ibe s'Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹ ọgbaakha, Abraham osi ijafọhnibe mẹ, ọtzọkha ommen otzobha nkwukha. Yina ọn-ọtzọk nnwa kwẹ Isaak, ọdabh ndik biphyir, otzin-ẹ ọnana k'ommen nvuma ebir-ebir.
GEN 22:10 Mẹ wọ, Abraham onemi ọbọhk ọtzọkha imaana bi, ofhu nnwa kwẹ.
GEN 22:11 Yina, orenga-eden kw'Ọvaar s'Ibinọkpaabyi owobha k'ẹrọng oyer-ẹ bi, “Abraham! Abraham!” Abraham obhin-ẹ bi, “Kkeri kaam ma e.”
GEN 22:12 Orenga-eden nwa oben bi, “Nnwa nwuma ọbọhk kàtọhmi, kẹ ọttọhk kàsi o! Kaam nkk'nna nnonga bi, kọ akhaam ojora f'Ibinọkpaabyi, okhuri da kọ akher bi, atzima nnwa kwọ wani kẹ-khẹ afọhni ẹja anang-m.”
GEN 22:13 Mẹ wọ, Abraham otzini chen ore erukhimaan-dim ch'etzim abhik ẹdama k'ọran, ofona ọtza ọtzọkha chẹ, otzima osi ẹnanga ẹkwọmichẹ k'eho cha nnwa kwẹ.
GEN 22:14 Mẹ wọ e, Abraham oyeri ibe nnuma bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọ́nang-ọnang.” Maa apyiri mayina, anọng an-ayeri ibe nnuma, “K'egbegbeho ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọ́nang-ọnang.”
GEN 22:15 Wa orenga-eden kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobha k'ẹrọng oyeri Abraham ottong igbe ifa,
GEN 22:16 oben bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ochekhi ka che chẹ bi, okhuri da kọ akher bi atzima nnwa nwa wani kwọ afọhni ẹja anang-m,
GEN 22:17 k'odik-ọkka kaam ńdọ-ọ, mbiri ńsi va pọ bẹ ahaabh macha ndodori sa nwobh k'ọrọngkpakpa, ọmaana opfong kw'owobh k'ọraanga. Mẹ wọ, va pa va pọ abira atzọkha idedenmon s'iwobh m'ẹkhọma nduma ch'attattaanga-nọng pọ.
GEN 22:18 Órenga ka nnam sa va pa va pọ, ngọma s'ọyagbin biphyir ńdọkha ẹdaa, ọkhuri da, kọ ahak eho anang ndọhna saam.”
GEN 22:19 Mando kw'Abraham ọkpa nnam ọtza okhebha atzọhmnọng pẹ kẹ da bẹ atzikh-ẹ. Bẹ biphyir abina abhana ka Bẹrshẹba. Wa Abraham osi oruk kwẹ mẹ.
GEN 22:20 Wa k'ogbe wani, bẹ agbaakhi Abraham bi, “Milka, kw'ode kwanọng kw'agbaanakka, Nahọr, okk'va p'ijinọng obiro ọmaana ọnang-ẹ. Wa va pa Milka ọmaani ọnang Nahọr bẹ ade:
GEN 22:21 Uz, kw'ode ocheden-nwa. Wa Uz ọkhaam agbaanọkka p'akpen Buz, ọmaana Kẹmuẹl. Kẹmuẹl kẹ wa ode otte kw'Aram,
GEN 22:22 obiro ode otte kwa Kẹsẹd, ọmaana Hazọr, ọmaana Pildash, ọmaana Jidlaph ttara Bẹtuẹl.”
GEN 22:23 Bẹtuẹl, ode otte kwa Rẹbẹka. Wa Milka ọmaani va azenanttaan ọnang Nahọr kw'ode ọgbaanọkka kw'Abraham.
GEN 22:24 Wa ọkkọra-kwanọng kwa Nahọr kw'okpen Reuma obiro ọmaan-ẹ va p'ade: Tẹba, ọmaana Gaham, ọmaana Tahash ttara Maaka.
GEN 23:1 Wa Sara orukhi akpen ka cho arọbh azadani obhiri azenamfa.
GEN 23:2 Ope ka Kiriyat-Arba, kwa bẹ abira ayeri Hẹbrọn, k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan. Wa Abraham ọtzọkha ogbe, obhom Sara kw'ọkk'ọpa.
GEN 23:3 Mẹ wọ, Abraham obina oji obukhi kwa kwanọng kwẹ ọtza okhebha anọng pa Het, oben bẹ bi,
GEN 23:4 “Kaam nde okhekhennọng ma bọng k'obhon. Bọng kpe-m irerek sa ndima nsi inọhng-anọng, ifha ode mẹ, ńnọhnga obukhi kwaam.”
GEN 23:5 Iwa anọng pa Het abhina Abraham bi,
GEN 23:6 “Itta, yonga man itzọhng, kọ ade ọvaar-nwa kw'ideden ma man k'ottem e, nọhnga kwanọng kwọ k'epekhubh kpenamkpen ch'ẹdaakh-ọ ọtzam, ma mpekhubh nna sa man. Ọnọng mada wani kw'ọraam-ọ ibe sa anọhnga kwanọng ma kode e.”
GEN 23:7 Mẹ wọ, Abraham obina ochunga eho k'ikpokpobha ọnang anọng pa Het.
GEN 23:8 Oben bẹ bi, “Idikha ọdaakhi bọng kẹ bi, kaam nnọhnga kwanọng kwaam manya bọng k'irerek, tte mphyem bọng odik wani bi, bọng aphyem Ẹphrọn, nnwa kwa Zoha anang-m,
GEN 23:9 ifha okpe-m ọmma kw'itzakpa, kw'owobh ka Makpẹla k'ikpiho s'owoni kwẹ. Bọng ben-ẹ bi, okpe-m sẹ k'ẹphya ch'ẹdaakh-ẹ, ifha ndima sẹ nsi inọhng-anọng ma bọng k'obhon.”
GEN 23:10 Iwa Ẹphrọn kw'ofon Het owobh ẹwọr mẹ ttara anọng pa Het, k'ogbe kw'Abraham ọm-ọgbaak odik nwa. Obina m'ottem kw'ayok, ọnang Abraham ebhina k'odik kw'ophyemi. Wa ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'owobh m'ẹbaakhamma ch'obhon ọbhaanga ebhina ch'Ẹphrọn kw'ofon Het ọnangi Abraham.
GEN 23:11 Wa Ẹphrọn on-obhina bi, “Mma e, itta kwaam yong-m itzọhng, kaam nnang-ọ irerek nna biphyir ttara ọmma nwa kw'itzakpa kw'owobh mẹ. Kaam nsi mando k'itzitzikha s'anọng mba paam biphyir, ifha kọ anọhnga obukhi kwọ.”
GEN 23:12 Iwa Abraham obiro ochunga eho ọkhọkha ikpokpobha k'itzitzikha s'anọng p'obhon nwa.
GEN 23:13 On-oben Ẹphrọn k'itzitzikha s'anọng mba bi, “Yong-m itzọhng, idikha ọdaakh-ọ, kaam ndebh irerek nna odebh. Kọ tzọkha agbukha pa kaam ńnang-ọ m'irerek nna, ifha nnọhnga kwanọng kwaam.”
GEN 23:14 Mẹ wọ, Ẹphrọn on-obhina Abraham, oben bi,
GEN 23:15 “Itta kwaam, yong-m itzọhng, irerek nna ipe ashẹkẹl ẹnọhna pa silva, yina, bẹ ape mbọng k'ottem kwaman anọng afa o? Nọnhga kwanọng kwọ k'irerekh e.”
GEN 23:16 Wa Abraham okhera mach'Ẹphrọn obeni, ọnang Ẹphrọn ogbukhabhik m'itzitzikha s'anọng pa Het otzor k'ẹphya ch'ọgbaakhi. Wa ọnang-ẹ ashẹkẹl ẹnọhna pa silva otzor k'ẹphya ch'aphya-phyaa.
GEN 23:17 Mẹ wọ, Ẹphrọn ọtzọkha irerek s'iwobh ka Makpẹla ọbaanga Mamrẹ, ọmaana ọmma kw'itzakpa ttara nchi kpenamkpen sa mbe m'ibe nnuma okpe pyẹ biphyir
GEN 23:18 ọnang Abraham, en-ede py'Abraham k'itzitzikha s'anọng pa Het biphyir, p'awobh m'ẹbaakhamma ch'obhon nwa.
GEN 23:19 Mada ntọhna s'irerek nna nkk'nha, Abraham ọnọhnga kwanọng kwẹ, Sara, k'ọmma kw'itzakpa kw'owobh ka Makpẹla, ọbaanga Mamrẹ kw'ode Hẹbrọn, k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan.
GEN 23:20 Mẹ wọ e, anọng pa Het atzọkha irerek nnuma, ttara ọmma nwuma kw'itzakpa, akpe anang Abraham, otzima osi inọhng-anọng.
GEN 24:1 K'ogbe kw'iwa Abraham ọkk'ọn-ọtzama, obiro ọhaabh cho. Iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹ ọda ttara idik biphyir.
GEN 24:2 Wa Abraham oben oho kw'atzọhmnọng p'ẹhọhmmọr chẹ, ọmaana odik kpenamkpen kw'ode kwẹ bi, “Kọ khe ọbọhk kwọ ka ọtzaak kwaam irekhirek.
GEN 24:3 Kaam nnori bi anwọhngi ka che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'ẹrọng ọmaana kw'irerek bi, kọ kwanọng k'ottem kw'aminava p'anọng pa Kenaan, pa kaam nnukhi ma ttara, kátzọkha anang nnwa kwaam.
GEN 24:4 Yina, kọ áchina k'ẹkhọma chaam, k'anọng paam, atza atzọkha kwanọng anang nnwa kwaam, Isaak.”
GEN 24:5 Ọtzọhmnọng nwa kwẹ, ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Idikha kwanọng nwuma onokher bi, ọtzọn-m abẹ okwu m'irek nna khi? Ode bi kaam ńdima nnwa kwọ mkpa nnam k'ẹkhọma chọ o?”
GEN 24:6 Abraham oben-ẹ bi, “K'eden kpenamkpen kọ kàkhaambi, atzima nnwa kwaam akpa nnam kẹ.
GEN 24:7 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'ẹrọng. Kẹ wọ otzim-m obina k'ẹhọhmmọr ch'otte kwaam, ọmaana k'ọmmaana-bhon kwaam. Kẹ ọgbaakh-m atzim obiro ọnwọhngi ọnang-m, oben bi, ‘Kaam ńnang va pa va pọ irerek nna.’ Kẹ ọ́tzọhm orenga-eden kwẹ, kw'otzibh-ọ eden ch'arenga ifha atzọkha kwanọng kẹ anang nnwa kwaam.
GEN 24:8 Idikha kwanọng nwa on-okher bi ọtzọn-ọ abẹ, ọnwọhngi nwa kọ kọ́bọkha. Yina, kọ nnwa kwaam kàtzima akpa nnam kẹ o.”
GEN 24:9 Mando wọ kw'ọtzọhmnọng nwa, okhe ọbọhk kwẹ k'ọtzaak kw'itta kwẹ, Abraham, ọnwọhngi bi kẹ osi-osi mach'itta kwẹ obeni.
GEN 24:10 Iwa ọtzọhmnọng nwa ọtzọkha akamẹl jobh p'itta kwẹ, obiro ọtzọkha ekpo ọkkakka k'adem-k'adem p'itta kwẹ, ọnana akamẹl mba. Obina orenga ochina k'Aram-Naharayim, orenga opyiri k'obhon kw'iwa Nahọr orukhi.
GEN 24:11 Okwu opyiri ma nchọhkha-bọhk, m'ogbe kwa panọng am-atza akhaabha asi, mando wọ kw'osi akamẹl mba attima ndudungi abaanga esipe ch'ewobh k'obhon ọkhaan-ọkhaan.
GEN 24:12 Mẹ wọ, on-ozi njọhm, oben bi, “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'itta kwaam, Abraham, si kaam ngaama ọwọbh k'ewu cha mayina, abira asi ọphyaam anang itta kwaam, Abraham.
GEN 24:13 Kker e, kaam mbe m'esipe nda ọkhaan-ọkhaan, da aminava p'obhon nwa am-akwu akhaabha asi.
GEN 24:14 Tte kwẹ ode bi, isaa mbeni ominanwa bi, ‘Tzotzokhaan, kọ nang-m asi ibebaa m'isi-rọhkha sọ ngwo,’ oben-m bi, ‘Gwo, ifha mbiri ńnang akamẹl pọ,’ tte ode bi, kẹ wọ kw'akk'atzekha anang ọtzọhmnọng kwọ Isaak. Ofona mẹ kaam ńnonga bi, kọ akk'ọphyaam asa anang itta kwaam.”
GEN 24:15 Yina okyera njọhm ozizi, Rẹbẹka oyin ka ttara isi-rọhkha ka mbabaang sẹ. Kẹ wa ode ominanwa kwa Bẹtuẹl kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Milka ọmaani ọnang Nahọr, kw'ode ọgbaanọkka kw'Abraham.
GEN 24:16 Wa kẹ ojibhi ominanwa, ojinọng otzim oronga. Mando kw'iwa ọhak k'esipe, otzima isi-rọhkha ọkhaabha asi maa sẹ ifu, otzima ovura.
GEN 24:17 Iwa ọtzọhmnọng kw'Abraham odukha ọtza okhebh-ẹ, oben bi, “Tzotzokhaan, kebh-m asisaa p'isi-rọhkha sọ, ngwo.”
GEN 24:18 Rẹbẹka oben-ẹ bi, “Itta kwaam, tọkha asi agwo.” Ọhakha isi-rọhkha m'ẹbhar-ẹbhar otzima ka mbọhk, ọnang-ẹ asi ogwo.
GEN 24:19 Mada ọkk'ẹ asi ọnanga ogwo, on-oben bi, “Kaam ḿbiri ńgaabha nnang akamẹl pọ, bẹ agwo maa bẹ abenga bẹ.”
GEN 24:20 M'ẹbhar-ẹbhar, ọtza ọwọna asi p'isi-rọhkha k'ọgbaakha, obiro ọrọbh ọkpa nnam k'esipe ọtza ọkhaabha asi ọnang akamẹl pẹ, bẹ agwo maa bẹ abenga bẹ.
GEN 24:21 Odik okkoni ojinọng nwa, ọn-ọkhẹ-ẹ otzum, ifha ore s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ejibha ọsa, k'orenga kw'ọtza.
GEN 24:22 Mada akamẹl akk'asi akyera, ọtzọhmnọng nwa ọtzọkha ẹbaanga cha gol ch'ahung ch'ẹdọhbhi epyiri ẹdọhbh ch'ishẹkẹl-gbokha, obiro ọtzọkha agimma afa pa gol pa mbọhk, p'adọbhi apyiri ẹdọhbh ch'ashẹkẹl jobh.
GEN 24:23 Ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ ade ominanwa kw'anyi o? Tzotzokhaan gbaakh-m, na iyimabe iwobha k'ọhọhm kw'atte, sa kaam mfha nyima ttara anọng paam k'erungiwu cha mayina o?”
GEN 24:24 Rẹbẹka obhin-ẹ bi, “Kaam nde nnwa kwa Bẹtuẹl, kwa Milka ọmaani ọnang Nahọr.
GEN 24:25 Maman ọkhaam araraari-bukhi ọmaana ọchattọhk fa nden kẹ k'ọhaabh, fa nden sọ nchi, ọmaana iyimabe sa bọng ayima k'erungiwu cha mayina.”
GEN 24:26 Iwa ọtzọhmnọng nwa kw'Abraham ochunga eho, ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ikpokpobha,
GEN 24:27 oben bi, “Ẹtzọhnga ewobh ẹnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'itta kwaam, Abraham. Kẹ itta kwaam ọphyaam ọmaana idadaakha sẹ kọrami. Onode kaam, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'aam eden otzima bi bẹẹm, nkwu ndim k'ọhọhm kw'anọng p'itta kwaam.”
GEN 24:28 Iwa ominanwa nwa ọrọbh ọtza ọgbaak ẹhọhmmọr ch'ọkka idik nna biphyir.
GEN 24:29 Wa Rẹbẹka ọkhaam ọgbaanọkka kw'ijinọng kw'okpen Laban, kw'obin m'ẹbhar-ẹbhar oyin k'iyaan, otza okhebha ojinọng nwa k'esipe.
GEN 24:30 Mada Laban ore ẹbaanga ch'ahung ọmaana agimma p'ọgbaanọkka okhe ka mbọhk, akwu attara k'idik s'ọkk'ọbhaanga sa Rẹbẹka ọgbaakhi okhuri ojinọng nwa, on-obina otza okhebha ojinọng nwa kẹ da obe ttara akamẹl, ọbaanga esipe.
GEN 24:31 Oben bi, “Kọ kwu, kọ kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọda, ode yan kw'atzima abe k'iyaan o? Kwu mofona, kkeri kaam nkk'ibe nda nhokh-ọ, ọmaana ibe s'akamẹl abira awobha.”
GEN 24:32 Mẹ wọ, ojinọng nwa ochina k'ọhọhm, bẹ achaari akamẹl ndọhkha, bẹ anang bẹ araraari-bukhi ọmaana ọchattọhk fa nden, bẹ abira anang ojinọng nwa ttara anọng p'atzọn-ẹ abẹ asi, bẹ agbobhi mmo sabẹ.
GEN 24:33 Bẹ abera bẹ ochattọhk, yina oben bi, “Kaam ọchattọhk kinchi maa, mgbaak bọng odik kwa ngaam bi, mgbaak.” Laban oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ gbaak man.”
GEN 24:34 Mẹ wọ, oben bi, “Kaam nde ọtzọhmnọng kw'Abraham.
GEN 24:35 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'itta kwaam ẹdaa ch'ideden ọnanga maa, on-ode ọkkọkkaa. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹ arukhimaan, ọmaana abhaam, ọmaana silva, ọmaana gol, ọmaana atzọhmnọng p'ijinọng ttara p'ipanọng, ọmaana akamẹl ttara nnyanyaang ọnanga.
GEN 24:36 Sara kw'ode kwanọng kw'itta kwaam, okk'ẹ nnwa kw'ijinọng ọmaana k'atzam. Itta kwaam okk'ẹkhakhaama chẹ biphyir ọtzọkha ọnang nnwa nwa.
GEN 24:37 Itta kwaam osi-m ndọkha ọnwọhngi, oben bi, ‘Kọ kàkhaambi atzọkha kwanọng k'aminava p'anọng pa Kenaan, pa kaam nnukhi ma ttara, anang nnwa kwaam.
GEN 24:38 Yina, kọ rọhng k'efona chaam, ọmaana k'ẹnọmma chaam, atza atzọkha kwanọng anang nnwa kwaam.’
GEN 24:39 “Mẹ wọ, kaam mbọbh itta kwaam bi, ‘Kaam nsi yan, idikha kwanọng nwa onokher bi, ọtzọn-m abẹ?’
GEN 24:40 “Itta kwaam obhin-m bi, ‘Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kwa kaam nkk'mkpobha k'eden ọkkakka, ọ́tzọhm orenga-eden kwẹ otzim-ọ eden, ọnang-ọ owujibha k'orenga kwọ, ifha kọ afha atzọkha kwanọng k'efona ch'otte kwaam, k'ẹnọmma chaam, anang nnwa kwaam.
GEN 24:41 Ọnwọhngi nwa kọ kọ́bọkha, idikha achin k'ẹnọmma chaam, kaambi ode bi, bẹ kọ ominanwa nwa kanangi, ọnwọhngi nwa kọ kọ́bọkha e.’
GEN 24:42 “Mẹ wọ e, mada mpyiri m'esipe nda mayina, mben bi, ‘O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'itta kwaam, Abraham, idikha ode ochibhi kwọ, tzotzokhaan, nang-m owujibha m'orenga nwa kwa nkk'nkwa ma o.
GEN 24:43 Kker e, kaam mbe m'esipe nda ọkhaan-ọkhaan, idikha ominanwa kw'obhon nwa okwu bi okwu akhaabha asi, mben-ẹ bi, “Tzotzokhaan kọ nang-m asi m'isi-rọhkha sọ ngwo ibebaa,”
GEN 24:44 idikha oben-m bi, “Kọ gwo, kaam ḿbiri ńgaabha nnang akamẹl pọ,” tte kẹ ode ominanwa nwuma kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'otzekha ọnang nnwa kw'itta kwaam.’
GEN 24:45 “Yina nkyera njọhm ozizi k'ettem chaam, Rẹbẹka oyin ka ttara isi-rọhkha sẹ k'ẹbabaang, ọhakha k'esipe, ọtza ọkhaabha asi. Kaam mben-ẹ bi, ‘Tzotzokhaan nang-m asi ngwo.’
GEN 24:46 “M'ẹbhar-ẹbhar, ọhakha isi-rọhkha k'ẹbabaang, oben bi, ‘Kọ gwo, mbiri ńgaabha nnang akamẹl pọ.’ Mẹ wọ, kaam ngwo, obiro ọkhaabha ọnang akamẹl paam.
GEN 24:47 “Kaam mbọbh-ẹ bi, ‘Kọ ade ominanwa kw'anyi o?’ “Obhina bi, ‘Kaam nde nnwa kwa Bẹtuẹl, kwa Nahọr obhoni ka ndaak sa Milka.’ “Mẹ wọ, kaam ngẹ-ẹ ẹbaanga ka hung, mbiri ngẹ-ẹ agimma ka mbọhk sẹ.
GEN 24:48 Nchunga eho mkpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'itta kwaam, Abraham, kw'ọkk'aam eden otzima k'eden-ọkkakka maa, nkwu ndọkha nnwa-mmona kw'ọgbaanọkka kw'itta kwaam, nnang nnwa kwẹ-ẹ k'ọbada.
GEN 24:49 Mẹ wọ, idikha ási ọphyaam f'odik-ọkka osi anang itta kwaam, gbaakh-m. Idikha án-asi, gbaakh-m, ifha nnonga eden cha ńsi.”
GEN 24:50 Laban ọmaana Bẹtuẹl abhina bi, “Mada idik nna biphyir ifon k'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, maman odik kw'ojibh-ojibh ttara kw'opyibh-opyibh kọkhaam kwa mọfha ọgbaak.
GEN 24:51 Kkeri Rẹbẹka manya, tzọkh-ẹ atzima rọhng. Tte kẹ on-ode kwanọng kwa nnwa kw'itta kwọ, mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obeni.”
GEN 24:52 Mada ọtzọhmnọng kw'Abraham ọbhaang odik kwa bẹ agbaakhi, ochunga eho k'irerek, ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ikpokpobha.
GEN 24:53 Mẹ wọ, ọtzọhmnọng nwa ọrọbha ẹfanginẹkpo pya gol ọmaana pya silva, okwu ọttara k'ọbara k'adem-k'adem, ọnang Rẹbẹka. Obiro tzọkha ekpo py'epe agbukha ọnang ọgbaanọkka kw'ijinọng ọmaana ọkka kwa Rẹbẹka.
GEN 24:54 Kẹ ọmaana anọng p'atzọn-ẹ abẹ achi ọchattọhk abira agwo atzuk, bẹ abira ayima mẹ maa, ewu ehobha. Mada bẹ aphyọbh k'ekpebha, oben bi, “Bọng dọhm-m mmana, ifha mkpa nnam ndor itta kwaam.”
GEN 24:55 Yina, ọgbaanọkka kwa Rẹbẹka ọmaana ọkka an-abhina bi, “Tte ominanwa nwa owobha ttara man k'iwu jobh yina bọng atzọn afona.”
GEN 24:56 Yina, ọtzọhmnọng nwa obhina bẹ bi, “Bọng kaam ka bọkha akhok manya, da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'orenga kwaam ọsa ojibh. Bọng dọhm-m mmana ifha mkpa nnam ndor itta kwaam.”
GEN 24:57 Mẹ wọ, bẹ an-aben bi, “Tte moyeri ominanwa ọkhaam, ifha mọbhaanga ka kẹ dọk.”
GEN 24:58 Wa bẹ ayeri Rẹbẹka abọbh-ẹ bi, “Na ọdaakh-ọ bi átzọn ojinọng nwa abẹ afona o?” Obhina bi, “Kaam ọdaakh-m kẹ bi, ndọn-ẹ abẹ mfona e.”
GEN 24:59 Mẹ wọ, bẹ atza arik ọgbaanọkka kwabẹ, Rẹbẹka k'eden, ọmaana ọrọrọkha kwẹ, ọmaana ọtzọhmnọng nwa kw'Abraham, ttara anọng p'atzọn-ẹ abẹ.
GEN 24:60 Bẹ abira asi Rẹbẹka ittabọhng, aben-ẹ bi, “Ọgbaanọkka kwaman, tte ọmaan ojibh-ọ, amaan va k'ọhaabh. Tte va pa va pọ ade nnọhna nabhik. Tte va pa va pọ atzọkha idedenmon s'attattaanga-nọng pabẹ.”
GEN 24:61 Mẹ wọ, Rẹbẹka ọmaana aminava p'arukh-ẹ abẹ, ado for avura akamẹl, atzọn ọtzọhmnọng kw'Abraham abẹ. Mando kw'ọtzọhnmnọng nwa otzim abaRẹbẹka ofona.
GEN 24:62 Iwa Isaak kw'orukhi k'okhubha kwa Nẹgẹv okk'ofona ka Beer-Lahai-Roi okhuna.
GEN 24:63 Wa k'ẹchọhkhawu dani, Isaak ofona ochina k'owoni bi, ọtza ọtzọkha ọphapha. Mada otzini chen okkeri k'ororo, ore da akamẹl am-akwu.
GEN 24:64 Rẹbẹka obiro otzini chen okkeri k'ororo ore Isaak, mando kw'ọhak ka kamẹl kwẹ,
GEN 24:65 ọbọbh ọtzọhnmnọng nwa bi, “Bọng ojinọng wọ kana kw'om-orenga otzor man ka o?” Ọtzọhmnọng nwa obhina bi, “Itta kwaam wọ ẹ.” Mando kwa Rẹbẹka ọtzọk ọphyọhng kwẹ obubha k'itzitzikha sẹ.
GEN 24:66 Mẹ wọ, ọtzọhmnọng nwa ọgbaak Isaak idik s'ọkk'ọsa biphyir.
GEN 24:67 Isaak otzim-ẹ odim k'ikhira s'ọkka kwẹ Sara, kw'ọkk'ọpa. Rẹbẹka on-ode kwanọng kw'Isaak. Isaak ọkhọhkha Rẹbẹka idadaakha, otzima mẹ odini for sẹ ettem k'obo kw'ọkka kwẹ.
GEN 25:1 Wa Abraham okwu ọtzọkha kwanọng ọdọdọk kw'okpen Kẹtura.
GEN 25:2 Kẹ wọ ọmaan-ẹ Zimran, ọmaana Jọkshan, ọmaana Medan, ọmaana Midiyan, ọmaana Ishbak ttara Shua.
GEN 25:3 Jọkshan wa ode otte kwa Sheba ọmaana Dedan; va pa va pa Dedan ade abAshur, ọmaana abaLẹtush, ttara abaLeum.
GEN 25:4 Va p'ijinọng pa Midiyan ade Ẹpha, ọmaana Ẹphẹr, ọmaana Hanọk, ọmaana Abida, ttara Ẹlda. Va mba biphyir wa bẹ ade va pa va pa Kẹtura.
GEN 25:5 Wa Isaak ọtzọk ekkema k'ẹkhakhaama chẹ biphyir ch'Abraham ope oji.
GEN 25:6 Yina, Abraham ọn-ọbhaangi va mbonggo pẹ biphyir, p'akkọra-panọng oruk, ttara ekpo pyẹ ẹdọdọk, oben bẹ akhọm aruk achina k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin, abhir Isaak eden.
GEN 25:7 Biphyir-phyir wa Abraham orukhi cho arọbh azenanttaan obhiri chi.
GEN 25:8 Mẹ wọ, wa Abraham oji ikponga-nnam-wọhng sẹ, ope k'atzam, bẹ anọhng-ẹ otzor anọng pẹ p'akk'apa.
GEN 25:9 Wa nnwa kwẹ Isaak ọmaana Ishimayẹl, anọhnga otte kwabẹ, k'ọmma kw'itzakpa kw'owobh ka Makpẹla, ọbaanga Mamrẹ, k'irerek s'iwa ide s'Ẹphrọn, kw'ode nnwa kwa Zoha kw'ofon Het.
GEN 25:10 Wa Abraham odebhi irerek nna ka mbọhk s'anọng pa Het. Wa bẹ anọhnga Abraham m'ibe nna rani s'iwa bẹ anọhng kwanọng kwẹ, Sara.
GEN 25:11 Mada Abraham ọkk'ọpa, Ibinọkpaabyi odo nnwa kwẹ Isaak, kw'iwa on-orukhi ọbaanga Beer-Lahai-Roi.
GEN 25:12 Ma wọ ode efonamma ch'Ishimayẹl, kw'ode nnwa kw'Abraham obhoni ka ndaak sa Hagar kw'ofon Ijip, kw'iwa ode obira kwa Sara.
GEN 25:13 Ma wọ ode che pa va p'Ishimayẹl k'odem kw'obhoni bẹ: Nẹbayọt kw'ode ocheden-nwa, ọmaana Kẹda, ọmaana Adbẹl, ọmaana Mibsam,
GEN 25:14 ọmaana Mishma, ọmaana Duma, ọmaana Masa,
GEN 25:15 ọmaana Hadad, ọmaana Tẹma, ọmaana Jetur, ọmaana Naphish, ttara Kẹdẹma.
GEN 25:16 Ma wọ iwa ode va p'ijinọng p'Ishimayẹl p'adabhi ngọma jobh obhiri mfa, sa mkpen che mmina bẹ, atzor k'aruk pabẹ ọmaana k'obhingabe fabẹ.
GEN 25:17 Biphyir-phyir wa Ishimayẹl orukhi cho arọbh azadani obhiri chi obhiri afa, ope, bẹ anọhng-ẹ otzor anọng pẹ p'akk'apa.
GEN 25:18 Wa va pa va pẹ arukhi ttẹwọr k'okhubha kwa Havila maa, apyiri k'okhuba kwa Shur, kw'owobh ọbaanga k'enem ch'Ijip, kẹ da achin k'okhubha kw'Ashur. Wa bẹ arukhi k'ittattaanga ttara votte pabẹ biphyir.
GEN 25:19 Ma wọ ode efonamma ch'Isaak, kw'ode nnwa kw'Abraham. Abraham wọ iwa obhoni Isaak.
GEN 25:20 Iwa Isaak ode cho arọbh afa, k'ogbe kw'ọtzọk Rẹbẹka k'ọbada. Rẹbẹka ode nnwa kwa Bẹtuẹl kw'ofon Aram, kwa Padan-Aram, obiro ode ọgbaanọkka kwa Laban kw'ofon Aram.
GEN 25:21 Wa Rẹbẹka ọkpaan-ọkpaana, mẹ wọ, Isaak ozi njọhm ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi k'eho chẹ. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaanga njọhm sẹ, osi Rẹbẹka otzima ibhọr.
GEN 25:22 Wa va afa p'awobh-ẹ k'ẹbhọr am-arima ayok abẹ. Mẹ wọ, Rẹbẹka ọbọbh bi, “Bọng odik wọ om-okhebh-m ma o?” Mando kw'orori odik nwa ọbọbh Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
GEN 25:23 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhin-ẹ bi, “Ngọma mfa rọ nwobh-ọ mẹ ẹbhọr, ngọma nna mfa s'iwobh-ọ m'ẹbhọr, ikhina sẹ ḿmaangi ayok, ẹkhọma dani ẹ́khaama ẹfa ẹyọhnga oyok. Ẹkhọma ch'echi eden ẹmmaana, ési ọtzọhm ẹnang ẹkhọma ch'ekpong nnam.”
GEN 25:24 Mada ogbe opyiri kw'ọmaan, va p'ijinọng afa bọ awobh-ẹ k'ẹbhọr.
GEN 25:25 Nnwa kw'ochi eden oyin okhor-okhor, ttara iphyubha ka for mach'ẹnọhmakpa ch'ede iphyubha-iphyubha. Mẹ wọ, bẹ akpẹ-ẹ Ẹsau.
GEN 25:26 Mada ocheden okk'oyina, ọgbaanọkka obiro oyin, ọbọkha Ẹsau k'ibhokhọkhọri. Mẹ wọ, bẹ an-akpẹ-ẹ Jekọb. Wa Isaak on-ode cho arọbh attaan, k'ogbe kwa Rẹbẹka ọmaani va mba.
GEN 25:27 Mada va mba akk'abara, Ẹsau okwu ode ọgbaajijaa kw'ideden, obiro ode ọnọng kw'orukhi k'ọyaankpa. Yina, Jekọb kẹ ode ọnọng kw'odiri akpen, kw'om-okwora k'ẹttọhmma.
GEN 25:28 Wa Isaak kẹ ọdaakhi ẹgbatzen ochichi, ofona mẹ, Ẹsau kw'ode ọgbaajijaa ọdaakh-ẹ idik. Yina, wa Jekọb wọ ọdaakhi Rẹbẹka.
GEN 25:29 K'ogbe wani kw'iwa Jekọb ọm-ọwọhn ọchattọhk, Ẹsau ofona k'ẹgbaaji okhuna, ttara okwo f'ọkk'ẹ ọkhaama maa, for imọm-ẹ.
GEN 25:30 Mẹ wọ, oben Jekọb bi, “Kebh-m ẹbọhnga nduma ch'ekhor-okhor nchi ẹbhar-ẹbhar, kkeri ẹfa ẹkk'aam ẹha itzam-itzama!” (Mẹ wọ ofon bẹ am-ayer-ẹ Edom).
GEN 25:31 Jekọb obhin-ẹ bi, “Kọ chi eden anang-m ededen chọ ch'ocheden-nwa.”
GEN 25:32 Ẹsau on-obhin-ẹ bi, “Bọng ejibha ch'ededen ẹnang-m o, kwa kaam nwobha ma, okwo ofhu-m o?”
GEN 25:33 Yina, Jekọb oben bi, “Kọ chi eden chekhi bi, anang-m ededen chọ ọnang.” Mẹ wọ, Ẹsau ọtzọkha ọnwọhngi kw'ọnangi Jekọb ededen chẹ.
GEN 25:34 Mando kwa Jekọb ọtzọk brẹd ọttara k'ẹbọhnga ch'achen-meni ọnang Ẹsau, Ẹsau ochi obiro ọttaakhi ẹbọhnga, obina ofona. Mando wọ kw'iwa Ẹsau oreng olukhi ededen chẹ ch'ocheden-nwa.
GEN 26:1 M'ogbe nwa, wa okwo f'ideden owobh m'irek nna akhiri okwo f'ideden f'iwa ochi eden owobha k'ogbe kw'Abraham. Wa Isaak obina ochina ka Gẹra ọtza okhebha Abimẹlẹk kw'ode ọvaarnọng kw'ẹkhọma cha Philistiya.
GEN 26:2 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oyin Isaak abẹ, oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ k'Ijip kahakha o. Kọ ruk m'irek nna sa mben ọ bi, aruk.
GEN 26:3 Kọ ruk m'irek nna k'igbegbaa bi kọbh, kaam Ibinọkpaabyi ńwobha ttar-ọ, ḿbiri ndọ-ọ. Kaam ńdọkha irerek nna biphyir ńnang kọ, ọmaana va pa va pọ. Ḿbiri nsi idik s'iwa nchekhi nnang atte kwọ, Abraham.
GEN 26:4 Kaam Ibinọkpaabyi ńsi va pa va pọ ahaabh macha ndodori s'ọrọngkpakpa, ḿbiri nnang bẹ irerek nna biphyir. Orenga ka nnam sa va pa va pọ, idibhon biphyir íkhaama ẹdaa,
GEN 26:5 okhuri da, Abraham ọhak eho ọnang-m, osi odik kpenamkpen mach ndọhn ẹ. Obiro ohok asana paam, ọmaana akpebhi paam, ndọhna saam ttara aphaangi paam.”
GEN 26:6 Mẹ wọ, Isaak owobha ka Gẹra.
GEN 26:7 Mada ajinọng p'obhon nwuma an-abọbh-ẹ odik okhuri kwanọng kwẹ, okhuri ojora, ọn-ọgbaak bẹ bi, “Kẹ ode ọgbaanọkka kwaam.” Ochibhi k'ettem bi, “Ajinọng p'obhon nwa afha afhu-m, okhuri ajibhada pa Rẹbẹka.”
GEN 26:8 Mada Isaak okk'orukha mẹ k'ogbe-bhirada, Abimẹlẹk kw'ode ọvaarnọng kw'ẹkhọma cha Philistiya orenga k'ọphapha-mma, ore da Isaak om-osi idadaakha ttara kwanọng kwẹ, Rẹbẹka.
GEN 26:9 Mando kw'Abimẹlẹk oyeri Isaak oben-ẹ bi, “K'odik-ọkka, kwanọng kwọ wọ manya e. Kọ areng mbọng afẹ agbaakh-m bi, kẹ ode ọgbaanọkka kwọ o?” Isaak obhin-ẹ bi, “Nchibhi bi, bẹ afha afhu-m ofhu, okhuri kẹ.”
GEN 26:10 Iwa Abimẹlẹk ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Osi yan kw'asi odik-dema nwa? Idikha ira ọnọng wani k'ottem kw'ajinọng p'obhon nwa, okk'kwanọng kwọ abẹ oyima, ira akk'man oponga-pyibha anana k'eho.”
GEN 26:11 Mando kw'Abimẹlẹk ọnangi ọsana makhọra obhon bi, “Ọnọng manda wani kw'osi ojinọng nwa ttara kwanọng kwẹ ọttọhk m'obhon nwa, bẹ akhaambi, afhẹ-ẹ.”
GEN 26:12 Ma cho nwuma wani, Isaak ọyaabha owoni m'irerek nna, ọpha ekpo p'ọyaabh k'ọhaabh, okhuri da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọdẹ-ẹ.
GEN 26:13 Wa okwu ọkhaama ẹkhakhaama. Ojibhada kwẹ ochina ororo ọbar maa, ọn-ọkhaama ikkọ k'ọhaabh.
GEN 26:14 Wa ọkhaam etzirakpo k'ọhaabh, ọmaana atzọhmnọng k'ọhaabh maa, ettem ẹmma anọng pa Philistiya etzima etzor-ẹ.
GEN 26:15 Mẹ wọ, nsipe s'iwa atzọhmnọng p'otte akk'atzuma, k'ogbe kw'otte Abraham owobh k'akpen, anọng pa Philistiya akpa sẹ biphyir ttara idọdọhbh.
GEN 26:16 Iwa Abimẹlẹk oben Isaak bi, “Bina, aji obhon kwaman, akk'ẹfa an-akhaama kpọng-kpọng ayọhnga man.”
GEN 26:17 Mẹ wọ, Isaak obina mẹ, ọtza oruk k'Ẹttẹri cha Gẹra.
GEN 26:18 Obiro otzum nsipe nnuma s'anọng pa Philistiya akk'akpa, k'ogbe kw'Abraham ọkk'ọpa. Okpe sẹ che p'iwa otte Abraham okk'sẹ ọtzam ọnanga.
GEN 26:19 Yina, mada atzọhmnọng p'Isaak, abira atzum esipe ọdọdọk k'ẹttẹri maa, bẹ ayin k'esipe ch'asi akkakka p'abhobh-obhobh,
GEN 26:20 akkeri-etzirakpo p'obhon kwa Gẹra, attẹwọr asi ẹtta ọmaana akkeri-nden p'Isaak, bẹ aben bi, “Asi mba ade paman!” Ofona mẹ, okpe ẹsipe nda Ẹsẹk, okhuri da bẹ akkaan esipe nda ttara kẹ.
GEN 26:21 Bẹ abira atzum ẹsipe ẹdọdọk, yina, bẹ abira asi ẹkhọhr okhuri esipe nda. Isaak okpe chẹ Sitina.
GEN 26:22 Obina mẹ, ọtza otzum esipe ẹdọdọk, ọnọng kw'osi ẹkhọhr kode. On-okpe chẹ Rehobot, oben bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'man ọphaangi ọnanga. M'irerek nna rọ sa mówobha mosi ikkọ.”
GEN 26:23 Isaak on-obina mẹ ochina k'obhon kwa Bẹrshẹba.
GEN 26:24 M'erungiwu nduma, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oyin-ẹ abẹ, oben-ẹ bi, “Kaam wọ nde Ibinọkpaabyi kw'atte Abraham. Oning-ọ ojor, kaam nwobh ma ttar-ọ, kaam ndọ-ọ, mbiri nsi va pa va pọ ahaabh, okhuri echekhi cha ngaam ttara ọtzọhmnọng kwaam, Abraham.”
GEN 26:25 Iwa Isaak osi ijafọhnibe mẹ, owobha mẹ okpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obiro ottima ikhira sẹ mẹ, atzọhmnọng pẹ abira atzum esipe mẹ.
GEN 26:26 M'ogbe nwa, Abimẹlẹk okk'Ahuzat kw'ọm-ọtzọhn-ẹ atzim ọmaana Phikol kw'ode odenho kw'agbong-nọng, otzima obina ka Gẹra okwu.
GEN 26:27 Isaak ọbọbh bẹ bi, “Ode yan kwa bọng am-aror-m, kw'iwa bọng attaang-m maa bọng akhubh-m k'obhon kwabọng o?”
GEN 26:28 Bẹ abhina bi, “Mọkk'ọra k'odik-ọkka bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ttar-ọ. Ofona mẹ, moben bi, ọbaan bi, echekhi ewobha k'ottem kwa kọ ọmaana maman. Tte mosi echekhi ttar-ọ
GEN 26:29 bi, kọ man itzama kási, mach'iwa maman ọnọ-ọ itzama osi, yina, mojibh akpen ttar-ọ maa, mottọ-ọ ọbọhk abina k'odidiri. Manya, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọ ọda.”
GEN 26:30 Mẹ wọ, Isaak ohok bẹ ewobha ch'ọdadaami, bẹ achi, abira agwo.
GEN 26:31 K'ekpekpebha ch'ewu ekhobh mẹ, bẹ atzọkha ọngwọhngi ttara ayok. Mẹ wọ, Isaak ọtza orik bẹ k'eden, bẹ akpa nnam abhana k'odidiri.
GEN 26:32 M'ewu nduma, atzọhmnọng p'Isaak akwu agbaakh-ẹ odik kw'okhuri esipe cha bẹ akk'atzuma. Bẹ aben bi, “Mokk'asi ọra e”
GEN 26:33 Mẹ wọ, Isaak oyeri esipe nda Shiba, ttẹwọr mẹ ewu nduma obhon nwuma on-okpena Beershẹba.
GEN 26:34 Mada Ẹsau on-ode cho arọbh afa, ọtzọk kwanọng kw'okpen Judit kw'ode ominanwa kwa Beeri kw'ode ojinọng kw'ofon Het, ọmaana Basemat kw'ode ominanwa kw'Ẹlọn kw'obiro ofona Het.
GEN 26:35 Panọng mba afa, asi akpen akhọhn Isaak ọmaana Rẹbẹka.
GEN 27:1 K'ogbe kw'iwa Isaak ọkk'ọn-ọtzama, owonikpa dọk kore, wa oyeri ocheden-nwa kwẹ, Ẹsau, oben-ẹ bi, “Nnwa kwaam.” Ẹsau obhina bi, “Itta kwaam, kkeri kaam ma e.”
GEN 27:2 Isaak oben bi, “Kaam nnande ọtzaminọng, ebowu chaam kimbiri nnonga.
GEN 27:3 Mẹ wọ, kọ tzọkha ẹgbaajikpo pyọ py'ede ọkhọhn-pa kwọ ọmaana oyuk kwọ, atzima ayin ẹgbaaji, atza afhu nden achen-m.
GEN 27:4 Si ọchattọhk f'ọdaam-ọdaam f'ọdaakh-m, achen-m nchi, ifha nsọ-ọ ittabọhng yina ḿpe.”
GEN 27:5 Wa Rẹbẹka om-oyonga itzọhng ọbhaanga idik s'Isaak ọm-ọgbaak nnwa kwẹ, Ẹsau. Mada Ẹsau okk'ẹgbaaji oyina bi ọtza ofhu nden otzima okhuna,
GEN 27:6 Rẹbẹka ọbhakhi kẹ ọtza oben nnwa kwẹ Jekọb bi, “Kker e, mfhu mmaang da atte om-oben agbaanakka Ẹsau mẹ bi,
GEN 27:7 ‘Rọhng atza afhu nden, atzima asi ọchattọhk f'ọdaam-ọdaam anang-m nchi, ifha nsọ-ọ ittabọhng k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, yina ḿpe.’
GEN 27:8 Nnwa kwaam, tzọkha ogbe ayong-m itzọhng, asi odik kwa mgbaakh-ọ.
GEN 27:9 Rọhng kẹ da avu awobh, atzekha avu adem akkakka manda afa p'ajibhi for, ifha ndima nsi ọchattọhk f'ọdaam-ọdaam, nnang atte mach'ọm-ọdaakh-ẹ.
GEN 27:10 Kọ tzọkha fẹ chena atte ochi, ifha ọsọ-ọ ittabọhng yina ópe.”
GEN 27:11 Jekọb on-oben ọkka bi, “Ọgbaanọkka kwaam Ẹsau ọkhaam iphyubha s'ihaabh-ọhaabh ka for, yina, kaam nkwọhng ẹkpakpa.
GEN 27:12 Idikha otte kwaam ọn-ọttọhm-m ki? Okher mana kaam mbọhr-ẹ ọbọhra, kw'ọsẹ-ẹ ọn-ọnang-m ẹmma ottu kw'osi-m ittabọhng.”
GEN 27:13 Ọkka on-oben-ẹ bi, “Nnwa kwaam, tte ẹmma ch'atte ọnang-ọ ẹbọkha kaam e. Si macha mben-ọ, rọhng, atza atzọkha avu pa ndọhm-ọ, achen-m.”
GEN 27:14 Mẹ wọ e, Jekọb ofona ọtza tzọkha avu ochena ọkka. Ọkka otzima bẹ osi ọchattọhk f'ọdaam-ọdaam macha fẹ ọm-ọdaak otte.
GEN 27:15 Rẹbẹka ọtzọkha nnya nkkakka s'ocheden-nwa kwẹ kw'ode Ẹsau, ọfọra Jekọb kw'ode okponga-nnam-nwa kwẹ.
GEN 27:16 On-obiro ọtzọkha ndenkpa s'avu k'adem-k'adem sa ngaam ophyubha obubh-ẹ ka mbọhk, ọmaana k'obe vani f'ọkwọhng-ọkwọhnga f'ẹdọhngi chẹ.
GEN 27:17 Mẹ wọ, ọn-ọtzọkha ọchattọhk daama-ndaam mvuma, ọttara ka brẹd kw'ọkk'ọsa, ọnang nnwa kwẹ Jekọb.
GEN 27:18 Mando kwa Jekọb ofon ochina k'otte, oben bi, “Itta kwaam.” Otte obhina bi, “O o! Nnwa kwaam, kọ anyi wọ o?”
GEN 27:19 Jekọb obhin-ẹ bi, “Kaam ocheden-nwa kwọ Ẹsau wọ e, nkk'nsa mach'aben-m bi, nsi e. Tzotzokhaan, bina wobha ẹwọr achi ọchattọhk, ifha asi-m ittabọhng, sọ e.”
GEN 27:20 Isaak ọbọbh nnwa bi, “Nnwa kwaam, areng yan are etzen ẹbhar-ẹbhar mando?” Jekọb obhina bi “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ, kẹ wọ ọnang-m owujibha e.”
GEN 27:21 Mẹ wọ, Isaak oben Jekọb bi, “Rọkhi atzor-m ka for ifha nttọhm-ọ, ifha mbiri nnonga k'odik-ọkka s'ode kọ nnwa kwaam Ẹsau wọ.”
GEN 27:22 Mẹ wọ, Jekọb ọrọkhi otzor otte Isaak ka for, kw'ọttọm-ẹ, oben bi, “K'ọwọhng akheri Jekọb, yina, mbọhk sọ nde macha mbọhk s'Ẹsau.”
GEN 27:23 Wa Isaak, Jekọb kotzini, okhuri bi, wa mbọhk sẹ nde ophyubh-ophyubha macha s'Ẹsau. Ofona mẹ, Isaak ọsẹ-ẹ ittabọhng.
GEN 27:24 On-obiro ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ nnwa kwaam Ẹsau wọ, k'odik-ọkka o?” Jekọb obhin-ẹ bi, “Itta, kaam wọ e.”
GEN 27:25 Mẹ wọ e, on-oben bi, “Nnwa kwaam, chen-m ọchattọhk fọ nchi, ifha nsọ-ọ ittabọhng saam.” Jekọb ochen-ẹ ọchattọhk ochi, obiro ọnang-ẹ atzuk ogwo.
GEN 27:26 Mando kw'Isaak oben-ẹ bi, “Nnwa kwaam, kwu baakh-m.”
GEN 27:27 Jekọb ọrọkhi otzor otte ka for, ọbaakh-ẹ. Mada Isaak ọbhaang eruk ch'ẹnya ch'ọfọr ka for, on-okhera bi, Ẹsau wọ, ọsẹ-ẹ ittabọhng, oben bi, “K'odik ọkkakka eruk cha nnwa kwaam ede mach'eruk ch'owoni kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọda.
GEN 27:28 Tte Ibinọkpaabyi osi ẹrọng etzebh, obiro osi irek s'ayaabh ekpo ijibh, tte kẹ ọnang-ọ ọchattọhk ọmaana atzuk k'ọhaabh.
GEN 27:29 Tte idibhon biphyir isi ọtzọhm inang-ọ, anọng biphyir ahakha nho anang-ọ. Kọ wọ áde ọvaarnọng kwa vọkka pọ, tte echimma chọ ẹhakha eho ẹnang-ọ. Tte ẹmma ẹbhakhi ẹbọkha anọng p'anang-ọ ẹmma, tte ẹdaa ebire éwobha ẹnang anọng p'adọ-ọ.”
GEN 27:30 Mada Isaak okk'Jekọb ittabọhng ọsa okyera, Jekọb ofona. Obin k'otte k'itzitzakha bi kpaarr, ọgbaanọkka Ẹsau okhuna ẹgbaaji.
GEN 27:31 Wa Ẹsau obiro osi ọchattọhk f'ọdaam-ọdaam ọtzọkha ochena otte. Mẹ wọ, oben-ẹ bi, “Itta, tzotzokhaan bina achi ọttọhk fa nnwa kwọ, ifha asi-m ittabọhng sọ.”
GEN 27:32 Otte Isaak ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ anyi wọ?” On-obhina bi, “Kaam nnwa kwọ Ẹsau kw'ode ocheden-nwa kwọ wọ e.”
GEN 27:33 Isaak ọfhọni ka for bi tzikhi-tzikhi, oben bi, “Anyi wọ ọn-ọtza ofhu nden otzima osi ọchattọhk ọnang-m o? Nchi fẹ, yina an-adimi ma e, nkk'ẹ ittabọhng mbiri nsa e. K'odik-ọkka, kẹ ójibh-ẹ ojibh e!”
GEN 27:34 Mada Ẹsau ọbhaang idik s'otte ọgbaakhi, otzini adimmọng obhom k'idọdọkhi, oben otte kwẹ bi, “Itta kwaam, si-m ittabọhng, biri si kaam ittabọhng!”
GEN 27:35 Yina, otte obhin-ẹ bi, “Agbaanakka ọkk'ọkwa, ọkwu ọbọhr-m, nsẹ-ẹ ittabọhng sọ e.”
GEN 27:36 Ẹsau on-oben bi, “Bẹ atzor-otzor akpẹ-ẹ Jekọb. Igbe ifa rọ ma s'okk'aam chen ọsa. K'ochedengbe, ọtzọk ededen chaam ch'ocheden-nwa. Manya, kẹ okk'ittabọhng saam obiro ọtzọkha.” Mẹ wọ ofon, Ẹsau ọn-ọbọbh otte bi, “Ode bi, kọ kaam ittabọhng manda rani karikh o?”
GEN 27:37 Isaak obhina Ẹsau bi, “Kaam nkk'ẹ ittabọhng nsa bi, ode oho kw'idibhon biphyir, ọmaana bi, anọng pẹ biphyir ade atzọhmnọng anang-ẹ. Nkk'ẹ mbiri nda ọmaana ọchattọhk k'ọhaabh ttara atzuk. Nnwa kwaam, bọng odik ọdọdọk kwa kaam mbiri ifha nsi nnang-ọ?”
GEN 27:38 Ẹsau ọbọbh otte bi, “Itta kwaam, ode bi kọ akhaam ittabọhng rani sẹ-sẹ o? Itta kwaam, biri si kaam ittabọhng!” Ofona mẹ, Ẹsau obhom adimmọng k'ẹrọng.
GEN 27:39 Isaak, obhin-ẹ bi, “Kker e, oruk kwọ k'irerek s'im-ijibh ekpo kówobha, ówobha kẹ da ẹrọng en-emetzebh.
GEN 27:40 Kọ áruk agbong-kpen, ábira asi ọtzọhm anang agbaanakka. Yina, atzim ọmmakkakkari aruk akpen, árọbha ọyak kwẹ, k'ẹdọhngi chọ ọrọbha.”
GEN 27:41 Ẹsau ọdọkhi ettem, okhuri ittabọhng s'otte okk'Jekọb ọsa, on-oben for sẹ bi, “Iwu sa nkwu-osisi s'obo kw'otte kwaam im-ifor e. Ọkk'ọpa, mosẹ-ẹ obo, kaam ḿfhu ọgbaanọkka kwaam Jekọb.”
GEN 27:42 Mada bẹ agbaakhi Rẹbẹka odik kwa nnwa kwẹ Ẹsau ọm-ọkham okhuri Jekọb, oyeri nnwa kwẹ Jekọb okwu, oben-ẹ bi, “Kker e, agbaanakka Ẹsau ọkhami bi ọfhọ-ọ, otzima odini for sẹ nttem.
GEN 27:43 Mẹ wọ, nnwa kwaam, ogbe kàkhibhi, si macha mgbaakh-ọ. Bina do for ẹbhar-ẹbhar arọbh achina k'ọgbaanọkka kwaam Laban, kw'orukhi ka Haran.
GEN 27:44 Kọ wobha mẹ ttar-ẹ maa, idọdọkhi s'agbaanakka iha.
GEN 27:45 Ikhina agbaanakka okk'odik kwa sẹ ọraama, idọdọkhi ibiri ihẹ-ẹ k'ettem, mẹ kwa kaam ńdọhm ẹkkaabha nnang-ọ akhuna. Okhuri yan kwa bọng anọng afa an-adim-m k'ewu dani o?”
GEN 27:46 Mẹ wọ e, Rẹbẹka ọgbaak Isaak bi, “Akpen akk'aam abenga, okhuri panọng mba p'afon Het. Idikha Jekọb obiro ọtza ọtzọkha kwanọng k'anọng pa Het, yan kw'akpen paam án-ade o?”
GEN 28:1 Mẹ wọ, Isaak oyeri Jekọb ọsẹ-ẹ ittabọhng, ọtzọr-ẹ itzọhng, oben-ẹ bi, “Kwanọng kpenamkpen kw'ofon m'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan kàtzọkha o.
GEN 28:2 Kọ rọhng ka Padan-Aram atza atzokha kwanọng k'obhon k'echimma cha Bẹtuẹl, kw'ode otte kw'akka, k'ottem kw'aminava p'agbaanakka kw'akka, kw'ode Laban.
GEN 28:3 Tte Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir, ọdọ-ọ ttara va k'ọhaabh, obiro osi va pa va pọ bẹ ahaabh maa, bẹ an-asi ngọma sa nhaabh-ọhaabh.
GEN 28:4 Tte kẹ ọnang kọ ọmaana va pa va pọ ẹdaa ch'iwa ọnangi Abraham, ifha kọ afha atzọkha irerek nna s'arukhi mẹ mach'okhekhennọng, irerek nna s'iwa Ibinọkpaabyi ọnangi Abraham.”
GEN 28:5 Mẹ wọ, Isaak ọtzọhm Jekọb, ochina ka Padan-Aram, okhebha Laban kw'ode nnwa kwa Bẹtuẹl kw'ofon Aram, kw'obiro ode ọgbaanọkka kwa Rẹbẹka, kw'ode ọkka kwa Jekọb ọmaana Ẹsau.
GEN 28:6 Mada Ẹsau orong bi, otte kwabẹ Isaak, okk'Jekọb ittabọhng ọsa, obiro ọtzọhm-ẹ bi, ọrọhng ka Padan-Aram ọtza ọtzọkha kwanọng kẹ, obiro ọtzọr-ẹ itzọhng bi, “Kwanọng kw'ofon Kenaan kàtzọkha o.”
GEN 28:7 Obiro oronga bi, Jekọb okk'atzim p'otte ọmaana p'ọkka ọbhaanga, ochina ka Padan-Aram.
GEN 28:8 Wa Ẹsau on-otzin bi, panọng pa Kenaan bẹ otte Isaak kadaakhi.
GEN 28:9 Mando kw'Ẹsau obin ochina k'Ishimayẹl, ọtza ọtzọkha kwanọng ọdọdọk kw'okpen Mahalat, kw'ode ọgbaanọkka kw'ikwanọng kwa Nẹbayọt, kw'obiro ode nnwa kw'Ishimayẹl, kw'ode nnwa kw'Abraham.
GEN 28:10 Mada Jekọb obin ka Bẹrshẹba, ochina ka Haran.
GEN 28:11 Okwu opyiri k'ibe rani, ọtzọkha ọtza oji, oyima ọnana eho mẹ ọttaabha, okhuri da erungi ẹkk'ẹpya.
GEN 28:12 Wa ọttaara idachen s'ore ọgbaakha kw'ottim ttẹwọr k'irerek, maa ebir-ebir ọttọhmi k'ọrọngkpakpa, obiro ore da arenga-eden p'Ibinọkpaabyi am-arenga m'ọgbaakha nwuma avura, abira am-arenga ahakha.
GEN 28:13 Obiro ore da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obe k'ebir-ebir kw'ọgbaakha nwa oben bi, “Kaam wọ nde Ibinọkpaabyi kw'abatte, Abraham ttara Isaak akpobh. Kaam ńnang kọ ọmaana va pa va pọ irerek nnuma s'ayim mẹ.
GEN 28:14 Va pa va pọ áhaabh akher oyeyeng kw'irerek, bẹ abira anyaami k'ibe kpenamkpen, kẹ da ewuchen em-eyin, ttara kẹ da ewuchen em-edimi, ọmaana k'ebira-ebira ttara k'ẹrakha-ẹrakha. Orenga ma kọ ttara va pa va pọ, ọyagbin biphyir, ọkhaama ẹdaa.
GEN 28:15 Kaam ńwobha ttar-ọ, mbiri ḿbaabh-ọ, k'ibe kpenamkpen s'áchina, ḿbiri ndim-ọ mkpa nnam m'irek nna. Kaam kọ ọbọhk kintte maa, nsi ẹjaakhi m'odik nwa kwa nkk'nchekhi nnang-ọ.”
GEN 28:16 Mada Jekọb ọphyọbh k'ọda, oben bi, “K'odik-ọkkakka, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobh m'ibe nna, yina, kaam ira kinnong.”
GEN 28:17 Wa opoma ọsẹ-ẹ, on-oben bi, “Bọng ibe rọ ijor manda! Ibe nna idọdọk kifha ide iyongi ọhọhm kw'Ibinọkpaabyi; ma wọ ode ẹbaakhamma ch'ọvaarbhon kw'Ibinọkpaabyi.”
GEN 28:18 K'ekpekpebha ch'ewu ehobh, Jekọb otzini ọtza nwuma kw'ira oyim ọnana eho, ọfhẹ-ẹ iduduma k'irerek, ọtzọkha ana obyengi m'ọtza nwuma.
GEN 28:19 Kaambi ode bi iwa obhon nwa ochi eden okpena Luz, wa Jekọb on-oyer-ẹ Bẹtẹl.
GEN 28:20 Iwa Jekọb osi echekhi k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, oben bi, “M'orenga nwa kwa nda ma, idikha Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ttar-m, okker-m, ọnang-m ọchattọhk fa nchi, ọmaana ọbara fa mfọra,
GEN 28:21 maa ikhina ngwuna k'otte kwaam k'ọhọhm k'odidiri, kẹ Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ óde Ibinọkpaabyi kwa kaam ḿkpobha.
GEN 28:22 Ọtza nwa kwa nkk'mfha mach'ekpọmmachi, óde ọhọhm kw'Ibinọkpaabyi. Ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'anang-m, kaam mbiri ńkkema fẹ k'obe jobh, ńdọkha rani nnang-ọ.”
GEN 29:1 Wa Jekọb ochina ororo k'orenga kwẹ, matzẹmaa opyiri k'anọng p'arukhi k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin.
GEN 29:2 Ọtza opyiri m'ibe nnuma, ore esipe ch'ewobh mẹ, cha bẹ atzim ẹtzakpa ch'ẹbari ẹkpa abubha, obiro ore ngaan nttaan s'etzirakpo, py'eyim m'esipe nduma ọkhaan-ọkhaan, cha bẹ akhaabh asi anang bẹ.
GEN 29:3 K'ogbe kpenamkpen kw'akker-arukhimaan an-anang etzirakpo pyabẹ asi, bẹ am-abingi ẹtzakpa nduma ch'ebubh m'ẹmma ch'esipe ebir-ebir, ahok ọkhaan-ọkhaan, akhaabha asi anang arukhimaan, yina bẹ an-abira abingi chẹ abubha.
GEN 29:4 Mẹ wọ, Jekọb ọbọbh akkeri-arukhimaan mba bi, “Abayi paam, bọbọng afon man o?” Bẹ abhina bi, “Maman ofon ka Haran e.”
GEN 29:5 Obiro ọbọbh bẹ bi, “Bọng arong ojinọng kwa bẹ ayeri Laban ma, kwa Nahọr obhon o?” Bẹ abhin-ẹ bi, “O o, morong-ẹ ma e.”
GEN 29:6 Mẹ wọ, Jekọb ọn-ọbọbh bẹ bi, “For igaang-ẹ khẹ?” Bẹ abhin-ẹ bi, “K'odik ọkkakka, for igaang-ẹ khẹ e. Nnwa kwẹ kw'ikwanọng kw'okpen Rachẹl, kẹ wọ om-otzima arukhimaan okwu kana.”
GEN 29:7 Jekọb oben bi, “Kker e, ekpekhira etzim ẹkhọhm-ọkhọhm; ogbe otzim obenga kw'atzobha arukhimaan mba k'ibe rani, anang bẹ asi, ifha bọng atzima bẹ atza anang ọchattọhk.”
GEN 29:8 Iwa bẹ abhina bi, “Mma e, man kofha osi e, mọkhaambi otzobha arukhimaan biphyir k'ibe rani, yina mon-obingi ẹtzakpa ch'ebubh m'ẹmma ch'esipe. Mosisi mando, man biphyir mọ́nang arukhimaan paman asi e.”
GEN 29:9 Mada Jekọb, otzim ọm-ọgbaak atzim ttara akkeri-arukhimaan mba, Rachẹl otzima arukhimaan p'otte opyiri m'esipe nda.
GEN 29:10 Mada Jekọb ore Rachẹl kw'ode nnwa kwa Laban, kw'ode ọgbaanọkka kw'ọkka kwa Jekọb ttara arukhimaan pa Laban. Jekọb, ọrọbh otzor Rachẹl, ọtza obingi ẹtzakpa ch'ebubh m'ẹmma ch'esipe, ọkhaabha asi ọnang arukhimaan p'ọgbaanọkka kw'ọkka.
GEN 29:11 Mada Jekọb okk'mando ọsa, ọtza ọbaakha Rachẹl, obiro obhom ẹmọng k'ẹrọng.
GEN 29:12 Obiro ọgbaak Rachẹl bi, kẹ ode ochimmanọng kw'otte, Laban, obiro ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Rẹbẹka. Mẹ wọ, Rachẹl ọrọbh ọtza ọgbaak otte.
GEN 29:13 Mada Laban ọbhaang idik nna s'ikhuri Jekọb kw'ode nnwa kw'ọgbaanọkka kwẹ, obina m'ẹbhar-ẹbhar otza okhebh-ẹ kẹ da owobh. Mada bẹ are ayok, Laban ọbaakh-ẹ, obiro otzim-ẹ ochina k'ọhọhm kwẹ. K'ọhọhm wọ kwa Jekọb ọn-ọgbaakhi Laban idik biphyir s'ikk'itta.
GEN 29:14 Mẹ wọ, Laban obhin-ẹ bi, “K'odik ọkkakka, kọ ade ochimmanọng kwaam e, mode izi rani e.” Mẹ wọ, mada Jekọb okk'ophe wani owobha k'ọhọhm kwa Laban,
GEN 29:15 Laban on-oben-ẹ bi, “Kaambi ode bi, kaam ọmaana kọ mode anọng bani, mando rang osi, kọ an-asi ọtzọhm anang-m k'idukhi. Kọ gbaakh-m agbukha p'ọtzọhm fọ ope.”
GEN 29:16 Wa Laban ọkhaam va p'ipanọng afa, ocheden-nwa okpen Lea, ottong afa, okpena Rachẹl.
GEN 29:17 Wa Lea ọkhaam adadaakha-chen, yina, Rachẹl wọ ode ominnanwa kw'ojibhi for obiro ojibh ikkekkeri.
GEN 29:18 Wa Jekọb ọkhaam idadaakha ttara Rachẹl, oben bi, “Kaam ńsi ọtzọhm nnang-ọ ka cho azenamfa, k'eho cha Rachẹl kw'ode nnwa kwọ kw'ikwanọng kw'ikhakhari.”
GEN 29:19 Mẹ wọ, Laban oben bi, “Ode odik kw'ojibh-ojibh bi, ndọkh-ẹ nnang kọ, ọyọhnga bi, ndọkh-ẹ nnang ọnọng ọdọdọk. Kọ wobha ma ttar-m.”
GEN 29:20 Wa Jekọb osi ọtzọhm ka cho azenamfa, k'eho cha Rachẹl. Yina, okhuri idadaakha sa Jekọb ọkhaam ttara Rachẹl, wa cho azenamfa an-akher-ẹ awuwa.
GEN 29:21 Iwa Jekọb okwu oben Laban bi, “Cho p'ọtzọhm faam akk'attonga, kọ na nnang-m kwanọng kwaam, ifha nyim-ẹ abẹ.”
GEN 29:22 Laban obher anọng p'ibe nnuma biphyir atzobha, bẹ asi ọdadaami kw'ọbada.
GEN 29:23 Yina, okwu opyiri m'ẹchọhkha, Laban ọn-ọtzọkha nnwa kwẹ, Lea, ọnang Jekọb. Jekọb oyim-ẹ abẹ.
GEN 29:24 Wa Laban ọtzọkha ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ Zilpa, ọnang nnwa kwẹ Lea bi, orukh-ẹ abẹ.
GEN 29:25 Mada ewu en-ehobh, Jekọb on-ore bi, Lea wọ oyim kẹ. Ofona mẹ, Jekọb ọbọbh Laban bi, “Itta, ode yan kw'asi-m manda o? Kaam nsi ọtzọhm k'eho cha Rachẹl, mando arang o? Kọ an-asi yan abọhr-m?”
GEN 29:26 Mẹ wọ, Laban obhin-ẹ bi, “K'ẹmmaana cha man, kọbaan bi, otte kw'ọnọng ọtzọkha nnwa kwẹ kw'ikhakhari, ọnang k'ọbada, k'ogbe kw'ocheden oni odim otzim ọba.
GEN 29:27 Kọ kyera ẹphyawu dani chọ ch'ọdadaami kw'ọbada, akk'akyera, mobiro ọ́tzọkha oyok kw'ikhakhari ọnang-ọ. Yina, kọ abira asi ọtzọhm ka cho azenamfa adọdọkh e.”
GEN 29:28 Wa Jekọb okhera ttar-ẹ. Mada okk'ẹphyawu dani ch'ọdadaami okyera ttara Lea, Laban obiro ọtzọkha nnwa kwẹ Rachẹl ọnang-ẹ k'ọbada.
GEN 29:29 Wa Laban ọtzọkha ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ kw'ikwanọng, kw'okpen Bilha, ọnang Rachẹl bi, orukh-ẹ abẹ.
GEN 29:30 Jekọb obiro oyima Rachẹl abẹ. Wa Rachẹl ọdaakh-ẹ ọtzam ọyọhnga Lea. Mẹ wọ, wa osi ọtzọhm ka cho azenamfa adọdọk ọnang Laban.
GEN 29:31 Mada iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ore bi, Lea Jekọb idik kọdaakhi, on-odo Lea ttara ọmaan. Yina, osi Rachẹl ọkpaana.
GEN 29:32 Iwa Lea okwu otzima ibhọr, ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng, ọkpẹ-ẹ Reubẹn, oben bi, “Ofon da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọmmamma kwaam ọra. K'odik-ọkka, yina wọ kwa kaam nna ńdaak odim kwaam e.”
GEN 29:33 Lea obiro otzima ibhọr, ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng, ọkpẹ-ẹ Simeọn, on-oben bi, “Okhuri da, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaang bi, kaam odim kwaam kindaakhi, okk'kaam nnwa obiro ọnanga.” Mẹ wọ, Lea okpe nnwa kwẹ, Simeọn.
GEN 29:34 Lea obiro otzima ibhọr ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng oben bi, “Kaam nkk'odim kwaam va p'ijinọng attaan mmaana, yina wọ kwa kaam nna ndaak odim kwaam.” Mẹ wọ, ọkpẹ-ẹ Lẹvi.
GEN 29:35 Lea otzima ibhọr ottong igbe inna ọmaan ojinọng, oben bi, “M'ogbe nwa, kaam ńnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ẹtzọhnga.” Mẹ wọ, ọn-ọkpẹ-ẹ Juda. Mada okk'nnwa kw'ottong anna ọmaana, ọn-ọkwọbha ọmaan.
GEN 30:1 Mada Rachẹl ore bi, ibhọr igaang-ẹ ọgaangi, ọn-ọkhaama ottem-mamma otzima otzor ọgbaanọkka Lea. Mẹ wọ, on-oben Jekọb bi, “Nang-m va oni mando ode ḿpe-ope.”
GEN 30:2 Jekọb ọdọkhi ettem ttara Rachẹl, ọbọbh bi, “Kaam wọ nde Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ọkpọ-ọ bi, aningi va amaan o?”
GEN 30:3 Rachẹl oben bi, “Ode mando, kkeri Bilha kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kwaam mẹ. Kọ tzọkh-ẹ ayima abẹ ifha ọmaan va ọnang-m, mbiri nnenga ma ndaak sẹ, nsi echimma chaam.”
GEN 30:4 Mando kw'ọtzọk ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ Bilha, ọnang Jekọb oyim-ẹ abẹ.
GEN 30:5 Bilha okwu otzima ibhọr ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng ọnang Jekọb.
GEN 30:6 Rachẹl okpe nnwa nwa Dan, oben bi, “Ibinọkpaabyi okk'aponga paam ọba, obiro ọbhaanga njọhm saam, ọnang-m nnwa kw'ijinọng.”
GEN 30:7 Iwa Bilha kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kwa Rachẹl obiro otzima ibhọr, ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng kw'ottong afa ọnang Jekọb.
GEN 30:8 Rachẹl oben bi, “Kaam nkk'ẹfa ndima nsi erima ttara ọgbaanọkka kwaam Lea, mbiri ngem-ẹ.” Mẹ wọ, okpe nnwa nwa Naphtali.
GEN 30:9 Mada Lea ore bi, ọkk'ọmaan ọkwọbha, ọn-ọtzọkha ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ Zilpa ọnang Jekọb macha kwanọng kwẹ.
GEN 30:10 Zilpa ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng ọnang Jekọb.
GEN 30:11 Mẹ wọ, Lea oben bi, “Ma wọ ode ojibhaada ọkkakka.” Wa okpe nnwa nwa Gad.
GEN 30:12 Wa Zilpa kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kwa Lea, obiro ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng kw'ottong afa ọnang Jekọb.
GEN 30:13 Mẹ wọ e, Lea okpe nnwa nwa Ashẹr, oben bi, “Ettem ẹdaam-m o, da ayokhi-panọng an-ayer-m, idadaama.”
GEN 30:14 K'ọphagbe kw'awit, Reubẹn oyin k'iwoni otza ore asitzen-kwongi otzima ochena ọkka kwẹ, Lea. Mẹ wọ, Rachẹl oben Lea bi, “Tzotzokhaan kebh-m akwọngitzọhng bani pa nnwa kwọ, otzim okhuna.”
GEN 30:15 Yina, Lea ọbọbh Rachẹl bi, “Kw'oyini bi, odim kwaam kw'atzọk kọ kobeng? Kw'bira akwu bi, akwu atzọkha asitzen-kwongi pa nnwa kwaam o?” Rachẹl oben bi, “Ojibhi kẹ, ode mando, kọ tzọkha eyimawu cha mayina, anang-m asitzen-kwongi pa nnwa kwọ otzim okhuna.”
GEN 30:16 Mada Jekọb okhun eyina k'ẹchọhkha, Lea ọtza okhebh-ẹ, ọgbaakh-ẹ bi, “Mayina on-ode eyimawu chaam e, okhuri bi, kaam nkk'asitzen-kwongi pa nnwa kwaam ndima ndebh chẹ. Mẹ wọ, Jekọb oyima ọmaana Lea m'erungiwu nduma.”
GEN 30:17 Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaanga njọhm sa Lea, otzima ibhọr, ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng kw'ottong azen ọnang Jekọb.
GEN 30:18 Lea oben bi, “Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'aam ochora, okhuri da nnangi odim kwaam ọtzọhmnọng kwaam bi, oyima abẹ.” Wa okpe nnwa nwa Isaaka.
GEN 30:19 Lea obiro otzima ibhọr ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng kw'ottong azadani ọnang Jekọb.
GEN 30:20 Mẹ wọ, Lea oben bi, “Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'aam ẹnanga ch'ideden obiro ọnanga, yina kwa kaam nna mbar odim kwaam odik, okhuri bi, nkk'ẹ va p'ijinọng azadani mmaana.” Mẹ wọ, okpe nnwa nwa Zẹbulun.
GEN 30:21 Ayongi mẹ, Lea obiro ọmaan nnwa kw'ikwanọng, ọkpẹ-ẹ Daina.
GEN 30:22 Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi okwu ojima Rachẹl ọbhaanga njọhm sẹ, okwung-ẹ ẹbhọr.
GEN 30:23 Rachẹl okwu otzima ibhọr ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng, oben bi, “Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'aam ka mgbar ọrọbha.”
GEN 30:24 Okpe nnwa nwa Josẹph, oben bi, “Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obiro ọttar-m nnwa kw'ijinọng ọdọdọk.”
GEN 30:25 K'ogbe kwa Rachẹl okk'Josẹph ọmaana, Jekọb oben Laban bi, “Tte-m ọbọhk mmaana ka man k'obhon.
GEN 30:26 Kọ nang-m panọng paam ttara va paam pa nkk'ọtzọhm nsa nnang-ọ, ndima mfona. Kọ arong ọtzọhm-dema fa kaam nkk'nsa nnang-ọ kẹ.”
GEN 30:27 Yina, Laban oben-ẹ bi, “Idikha kaam nkk'ọphyaam ndọkha k'itzitzikha sọ, tzọtzọkhaan kọ kàfona, kkeri kaam nkk'ose mmari, nnonga bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'aam ọda okhuri kọ.”
GEN 30:28 Laban obiro ọttara bi, “Kọ gbaak-m ekkema ch'ọtzọhm fọ, kkeri kaam ńnang-ọnang.”
GEN 30:29 Jekọb obhin-ẹ bi, “Kọ arong ọtzọhm fa nkk'nsa nnang-ọ kẹ, abira aronga eden cha nneng nkkeri etzirakpo pyọ, ejibh ẹnang-ọ.
GEN 30:30 Yina iwa kaam nkwu, wa etzirakpo pyọ kẹhaabhi macha pyẹ ẹn-ẹhaabhi madẹdẹn. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọ ọda k'ọtzọhm kpenamkpen fa nkk'nsa nnang-ọ. Yina, kọbaan bi abira atte kaam ọbọhk, mbiri nda nnor f'ẹhọhmmọr chaam, ebire etzima eruk akpen o?”
GEN 30:31 Laban ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Mbọng f'áror bi, nsi nnang-ọ?” Jekọb on-obhina bi, “Kaam echora manda dani ka mbọhk sọ kinnori. Odik obungikwẹ kwa kaam nnori ode bi, kọ abira atte etzirakpo pyọ ọbọhk, anang-m nkkeri.
GEN 30:32 Tte nnenga k'ottem kwa arukhimaan-va pọ pa kaam mmi nkkeri, ndekha arukhimaan p'ade akkẹr-ankkẹr, ọmaana avu p'asi attẹttẹr, mach'echora chaam.
GEN 30:33 Mada ópyiri k'ogbe kwa kọ akwu akkeri etzirakpo pyọ, tte odik ọkkakka kwaam ọkhaama ẹjaakhi bi, idikha kọ are orukhimaan-nwa kpenamkpen kw'oni akkẹr-ankkẹr ode, ọmaana evu kpenamkpen ch'eni attẹttẹr esi k'ottem kwa nden saam, kọ tzọkha bi, mfhu-ofhu.”
GEN 30:34 Laban oben bi, “Kaam nkk'nkhera k'odik ọkkakka bi, kwẹ ode mach'agbaakhi.”
GEN 30:35 M'ewu nduma dani, Laban orenga ọrọbha avu-dim p'ade akkẹr-ankkẹr, ọmaana p'asi attẹttẹr, ọmaana avu-gbokha biphyir p'ade akkẹr-ankkẹr, ọmaana p'asi attẹttẹr, ttara arukhimaan-bina biphyir, ọtzọkha ọnang va pẹ bi, bẹ akkeri.
GEN 30:36 Mẹ wọ, otzima va pẹ obina orenga kw'iwu ittaan, bẹ aji Jekọb kẹ da okkeri etzirakpo mbyonggo pya Laban.
GEN 30:37 Mando kwa Jekọb ọtzọk achi-bọhnga abhapẹ p'echi cha pọpula ọmaana, abọhnga p'echi ch'almọn, ọmaana p'echi ch'ede bi waaar obori akpakpa, osi bẹ an-awur bi gwaang.
GEN 30:38 Mẹ wọ, Jekọb ọtzọkha achi-bọhnga p'okk'akpakpa obori, ohok m'agbaakha biphyir p'etzirakpo em-ekwu egwo asi, ttara nttak bi, idikha pyẹ eyim ayok abẹ m'ibe nnuma sa pyẹ em-egwo asi,
GEN 30:39 pyẹ ekkeri achi-bọhnga mba itzitzikha, pyẹ ẹmaan akkẹr-ankkẹr.
GEN 30:40 Mẹ wọ, Jekọb ọbhaangi arukhimaan-va ohok ngọmi, yina on-osi mbonggo p'arikhi bi, bẹ akkeri akkẹr-ankkẹr pa Laban itzitzikha. Mẹ wọ, kẹ ọn-ọkhaama etzirakpo pya kẹ ọkhaam, py'oni ka pya Laban dọk attar.
GEN 30:41 Ogbe kpenamkpen nwa kwa Jekọb ore bi, etzirakpo py'ipanọng py'egwengi for en-eyima ayok abẹ, ọtzọkha achi-bọhnga p'okk'akpakpa obori ohok m'agbaakha k'itzitzikha s'etzirakpo, ifha pyẹ eyima ayok abẹ ẹbaanga mẹ.
GEN 30:42 Yina, etzirakpo py'eni egwengi, pyẹ achi-bọhnga mbuma kọkpa. Mẹ wọ, mbuma py'egweng-ogwengi en-ede pya kẹ Jekọb. Py'eni egwengi ede pya Laban.
GEN 30:43 Mando wọ kw'iwa Jekọb otzim okpena ọkkọkkaa kw'okhaam etzirakpo k'ọhaabh, ọmaana atzọhmnọng p'ipanọng ttara p'ijinọng, ọmaana akamẹl ọttara nnyanyaang.
GEN 31:1 K'ogbe wani, wa Jekọb okwu ọbhaanga bi, va pa Laban an-am-aben bi, “Ọnyẹ kwaman Jekọb, ọkk'ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'otte kwaman ọtzọkha biphyir ọkhaama. Ẹkhakhaama chẹ biphyir efon k'otte kwaman e.”
GEN 31:2 Jekọb on-obiro ore bi, Laban kẹ itzitzikha ọkkakka dọk kọm-ọnang.
GEN 31:3 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Jekọb bi, “Kọ rọhng abhana atzor anọng pọ, ttara ẹhọhmmọr ch'atte. Kaam ńwobha ttar-ọ, mbiri ńkkaan-ọ.”
GEN 31:4 Iwa Jekọb ọtzọhm ọnọng bi, bẹ ayeri panọng pẹ, Rachẹl ọmaana Lea, ifha bẹ akhebh-ẹ kẹ da om-okkeri etzirakpo pyẹ.
GEN 31:5 Mada bẹ akk'apyiri, oben bẹ bi, “Kaam nkk'nna bi, atte kwabọng kaam itzitzikha ọkkakka dọk om-okkeri m'iwu nna. Yina, kaam nnong bi, Ibinọkpaabyi kw'otte kwaam okpobh okk'owobha ttar-m.
GEN 31:6 Bọng anọng afa arong bi, kaam nkk'ọtzọhm nsa ttara ettem-obungichẹ nnang atte kwabọng.
GEN 31:7 Yina, atte ọkk'aam echora ch'ọtzọhm faam ọbọhra k'igbe jobh. Kaambi mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi kẹ ọbọhk kotte bi, osi-m itzama manda rani.
GEN 31:8 Idikha obeni bi, ‘Etzirakpo py'esi akkẹr-ankkẹr bọ éde echora chọ,’ etzirakpo biphyir ẹn-ẹmaan ayok p'asi akkẹr-ankkẹr. Yina, obeni bi, ‘Etzirakpo py'esi attẹttẹr byọ éde echora chọ,’ etzirakpo biphyir ẹn-ẹmaan ayok p'asi attẹttẹr.
GEN 31:9 Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi okk'etzirakpo py'atte kwabọng ọtzọkha ọnang-m.
GEN 31:10 “Wa ewu dani, k'ogbe kw'etzirakpo em-eyima ayok abẹ, nttaar idachen. K'idachen, ndini chen nne da, avu-dim p'am-avura avugbokha bẹ asi attẹttẹr, bẹ abira asi akkẹr-ankkẹr.
GEN 31:11 K'idachen, orenga-eden kw'Ibinọkpaabyi oyer-m bi, ‘Jekọb.’ Kaam nkhera bi, ‘O o, kkeri kaam ma e.’
GEN 31:12 Kẹ on-oben-m bi, ‘Kọ tzini chen akkeri k'ẹrọng, are bi, avu-dim p'avur ayok biphyir asi attẹttẹr, abira asi akkẹr-ankkẹr. Kaam nsi kwẹ ode mando okhuri da nkk'odik kpenamkpen kwa Laban ọkk'ọsa nna e.
GEN 31:13 Kaam wọ nde Ibinọkpaabyi kwa Bẹtẹl, kẹ da abyengi ọtza ana k'eho, abira asi echekhi ọnang-m. Kọ na bina aji obhon nwa, akpa nnam abhana k'ọmmaana-bhon kwọ.’ ”
GEN 31:14 Mando kwa Rachẹl ọmaana Lea an-abhin odim kwabẹ, Jekọb bi, “Ọttọhk fa maman obiro ochi otte kwaman obo k'ẹkhakhaama chẹ biphyir dọk kode.
GEN 31:15 Otte kwaman ọn-ọtzọk man mach'akhekhennọng, okpe-okpe kẹ-khẹ arang kw'okpe man, okk'amina-gbukha paman obiro ọcha mancheni.
GEN 31:16 K'odik ọkkakka, kọ si odik kpenamkpen kw'Ibinọkpaabyi okk'obena bi asi, k'eden bi, Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ẹkhakhaama ch'otte kwaman ọtzọkha, ọn-ọnang maman, ttara va paman.”
GEN 31:17 Mẹ wọ, Jekọb obina ọtzọkha va pẹ ọmaana panọng pẹ afa, ọnanna k'akamẹl,
GEN 31:18 on-otzima etzirakpo pyẹ biphyir, ọmaana ẹkhakhaama chẹ biphyir ch'ọkk'ọkhaama ka Padan-Aram obina orenga, okhuna otzor otte kwẹ, Isaak k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan.
GEN 31:19 Mada Laban okk'ofona bi, ọtza ophyiri ophyubha f'arukhimaan pẹ, kwanọng kwẹ, Rachẹl ofona ọtza ofhu agbatza p'ẹhọhmmọr ch'otte.
GEN 31:20 Ayongi mẹ, wa Jekọb ọbọhr Laban kw'ofon Aram ọbọhra, kẹ kọgbaakhi bi, ọn-ọrọbh ofona.
GEN 31:21 Mẹ wọ, wa Jekọb ọtzọkha ẹkhakhaama chẹ biphyir, ojekha ọraanga kwa Yupharetes, okkeri itzitzikha k'okhuba kw'egbegbeho cha Gilead, ọrọbh ofona.
GEN 31:22 Ottong iwu ittaan sa Jekọb ọkk'ọrọbha ofona, mẹ kwa Laban on-orong bi, Jekọb ọkk'ọrọbha.
GEN 31:23 Mẹ wọ, Laban otzima vọkka pẹ p'atzọn-ẹ abẹ, akhubh Jekọb k'eden k'iwu izenamfa, matzẹmaa bẹ akwu abọkh-ẹ ka mgbegbeho sa Gilead.
GEN 31:24 Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi oyin Laban kw'ofon Aram abẹ k'erungi k'idachen, oben-ẹ bi, “Ndọr-ọ itzọhng bi, aningi Jekọb atzim p'agaang-ọgaangi agbaakhi.”
GEN 31:25 Mada Laban okhebh Jekọb, Jekọb okk'ikhira sẹ ọsa ka mgbegbeho sa Gilead, wa Laban ọmaana vọkka pẹ akwu asi ibhingabe sabẹ abaanga mẹ dọk.
GEN 31:26 Mada bẹ akhebh ayok, Laban ọbọbh Jekọb bi, “Osi yan kwa kọ abọhr-m, atzima aminava paam afona mach'anọng p'abẹ abọhk k'ẹmmọri ch'egbong.
GEN 31:27 Okhuri yan kw'abọhr-m, afhu-ofhu arọbh afona o? Osi yan kaam kagbaakhi bi, an-afona ifha kaam nsi ọdadaami kwa ndima ọkkọhna, ọmaana achachaak ttara ogim-ogim mben-ọ bi, yima o?
GEN 31:28 Kọ kaam ọbọhk katte bi, mbaakha va pa va paam ttara aminava paam da bẹ afon. Odidingi-dik wọ kw'asi ma e.
GEN 31:29 Kaam ngaam ẹfa kẹ ch'ira nsọ-ọ itzama e. Yina, erungiwu ch'ikhena Ibinọkpaabyi kw'atte ọtzọr-m itzọhng bi, ‘Kọ bọkh-ọ for, odik manda wani kagbaak anang Jekọb o, ode bi kw'ejibh-ojibh obiro ode bi kwẹ opyibh-opyibh.’
GEN 31:30 Kaam nnong odem kw'oyibh-ọ bi, abhana k'atte k'obhon kẹ e, yina, kọ asi yan afhu agbatza paam atzima arọbh o?”
GEN 31:31 Iwa Jekọb obhina Laban bi, “Kaam mfon mando okhuri ojora f'osi-m, nna nchibhi bi, kọ afha abọkh-m aminava pọ ana k'ẹfa.
GEN 31:32 Yina, idikha kọ are ọnọng manda wani k'ottem kwaman kw'otzim agbatza pọ, tte ọnọng nwuma oningi akpen orukhi. M'itzitzikha s'anọng paman, kọ ọkhaam kkeri, idikha atzini ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ode fọ, tọkha.” Wa Jekọb korong bi, Rachẹl ọkk'agbatza p'otte ọfha.
GEN 31:33 Mẹ wọ e, Laban odim k'ikhira sa Jekọb, ọmaana sa Lea ttara s'atzọhmnọng p'ipanọng afa oror agbatza pẹ. Yina, ọttọhk manda vani kore. Mada oyini k'ikhira sa Lea, on-odim k'ikhira sa Rachẹl.
GEN 31:34 Wa Rachẹl ọkk'agbatza p'otte ọtzọkha okhe k'ẹkpa ch'ebubh ẹwọr-wobha cha kamẹl ka nnam, owobha ẹwọr obubha. Laban ọfọhngi k'ikhira biphyir, agbatza pẹ kore.
GEN 31:35 Mando kwa Rachẹl oben otte bi, “Itta kwaam, tte oning-ọ ọdọkhi da kaam nnimfha mbina mbe k'itzitzikha sọ, okhuri bi, kaam ndim for e.” Laban ọfọhngi k'ibe kpenamkpen biphyir, agbatza pẹ kore.
GEN 31:36 Jekọb ọdọkhi ettem, oyin Laban abẹ, ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kaam nji bọng odikh o? Ottotto kwaam ode yan, kw'areng abẹ akhubh-m ẹkhọm-ẹkhọma manda o?
GEN 31:37 Mada akk'ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ode faam afọhngi biphyir, mbọng f'are f'ode fọ ọ? Ji pyẹ m'itzitzikha s'anọng paman, ifha bẹ are ọnọng kw'otzor-otzor k'ottem kwa man anọng afa.
GEN 31:38 “Kaam nkk'ọtzọhm nsa nnang-ọ ka cho ẹrọbh. Ma cho mbuma biphyir, arukhimaan-kwa ọmaana avu pọ p'ibhọhr iyini kade. Arukhimaan-dim pọ pa ndim nsi ọchattọhk nchi kade.
GEN 31:39 Etzen cha nden s'ẹtzam ifhu, cha ndim nchen-ọ kede. Ọttọhk kpenamkpen fa bẹ afhu ka mbọhk saam, ode k'erungi obiro ode k'ẹya f'arori, fa kaam nnọ-ọ ndukhi kode.
GEN 31:40 Kaam wa akpen paam ade p'ekpikhira ẹmaani k'ẹya, ekhokhokhi esi-m k'erungi, chen abira akhur-m.
GEN 31:41 Kaam nnukh-ọ abẹ ka cho ẹrọbh biphyir. Nsi ọtzọhm nnang-ọ ka cho ọhawani kwa chi, ifha ndọkha aminava pọ afa k'ọbada, mbiri nkkeri nden sọ nnang-ọ ka cho azadani. Nkyera e, abọhr-m echora ch'ọtzọhm faam k'igbe jobh.
GEN 31:42 Idikha ira Ibinọkpaabyi kw'otte kwaam, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Abraham ttara Ojora f'Isaak, on-owobh ttar-m, ira kọ akk'aam mbọhk-mbọhk akhubha. Yina, Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ọmmamma kwaam ọra, obiro ore ihem saam, kẹ wọ osi ọkpọ-ọ eden ihena k'erungi.”
GEN 31:43 Ofona mẹ, Laban on-obhina Jekọb bi, “Panọng mba ade va paam, va mba biphyir ade va pa va paam, nden nna biphyir mbiri nde saam. Ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'are bi akhaam ma ode faam. Akker-okkeri, yina wọ kwa kaam mbiri ndọkha va paam, ttara va pa va paam amaani ka mbọhk sọ o?
GEN 31:44 Mẹ wọ, tte mosi echekhi ọnang ayok, ch'ebe macha nttẹsẹ kwa kaam ttara kọ.”
GEN 31:45 Mẹ wọ, Jekọb ọtzọkha ọtza, ọfhẹ-ẹ ebebe mach'ẹkpọmmachi.
GEN 31:46 Jekọb on-oben anọng pẹ bi, “Bọng dobha atza.” Bẹ atzọkha atza atzobha k'okhung, bẹ an-abira awobha abaanga ọtza-khung nwuma achi ọchattọhk.
GEN 31:47 Wa Laban oyeri ọtza-khung Jega-Sahaduta, Jekọb oyer-ẹ Galeed.
GEN 31:48 Laban on-oben bi, “K'ewu cha mayina, ọtza-khung nwa obe macha nttẹsẹ kwa kaam ọmaana kọ.” Kẹ wọ osi, bẹ ayeri ibe nna Galeed.
GEN 31:49 Wa Laban obiro oyeri ibe nna Mizpa, oben bi, “Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okkeri man mada motte ayok ọbọhk, ọnọng-ọnọng ofona kwẹ.
GEN 31:50 Idikha kọ atzim va paam k'ihem, ode bi kọ an-abira atza atzọkha panọng adọdọk p'ayongi va paam, kaambi ode bi ọnọng man kore, jima bi, Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ode nttẹsẹ kwa kaam ọmaana kọ.”
GEN 31:51 Mẹ wọ, Laban oben Jekọb bi, “Manya wọ ode ọtza-khung, manya wọ obiro ode ẹkpọmmachi cha kaam nkk'nttima k'ottem kwa kaam ttara kọ.
GEN 31:52 Ọtza-khung nwa ode nttẹsẹ, ẹkpọmmachi nda ebire ede macha nttẹsẹ bi, ogbe dọk kode kwa kaam mbiri njekha ibe nna nkwu nsọ-ọ itzama, ọmaana bi, ogbe dọk kode kwa kọ abira ajekha k'okhubha kwaam akwu asi-m itzama.
GEN 31:53 Tte Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Abraham, ọmaana Nahọr, Ibinọpkaabyi kw'otte kwabẹ okpobh, osi ochibhi kwẹ m'echekhi nda cha kaam ọmaana kọ.” Mẹ wọ, Jekọb on-ọtzọkha ọnwọhngi ka che ch'ojora f'otte kwẹ, Isaak.
GEN 31:54 Jekọb ọtzọkha orukhimaan ofhu otzima osi ẹjafọhni ọnang Ibinọkpaabyi k'okhubha kwa mgbegbeho, obiro oyeri anọng pẹ bẹ akwu achi ọchattọhk mẹ. Mada bẹ akk'ọchattọhk acha akyera, bẹ an-ayima mẹ maa, ewu ehobha.
GEN 31:55 Mada ewu ekk'ehobha, Laban obina odo for s'ofona, ọtzọkha va pa va pẹ, ọmaana aminava pẹ ọbaakha, obiro osi bẹ ittabọhng. Laban obina ọbhana ka kẹ k'obhon.
GEN 32:1 Iwa Jekọb obina orenga, arenga-eden p'Ibinọkpaabyi ayin-ẹ abẹ.
GEN 32:2 Mada Jekọb ore arenga-eden mba p'Ibinọkpaabyi, oben bi, “Ibe nna ide ibhingabe s'Ibinọkpaabyi.” Mẹ wọ, oyeri sẹ Mahanayim.
GEN 32:3 Jekọb ọtzọhm akkaabh-nkkaabha pẹ bi, bẹ acheden atza akhebha ọgbaanọkka Ẹsau k'ẹkhọma cha Seir, k'okhuba kw'Edom.
GEN 32:4 Ọnang bẹ ẹkkaabha, oben bẹ bi, “Bọng gbaak itta kwaam Ẹsau bi, ‘Kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, Jekọb, mbeni bi, nkk'nwobha ttara Laban ttẹwọr mada mfofon maa apyiri ma.
GEN 32:5 Kaam nkk'abhaam, ọmaana nnyanyaang, ọmaana arukhimaan, ọmaana avu, ọmaana atzọhmnọng p'ijinọng ttara p'ipanọng ngaama. Kaam nna ndọhmi ẹkkaabha nda nchena itta kwaam, ifha ndọkha ọphyaam k'itzitzikha sọ.’ ”
GEN 32:6 Mada akkaabh-nkkaabha pa Jekọb akhun atzor-ẹ, bẹ agbaakh-ẹ bi, “Mokk'agbaanakka Ẹsau ọtza ọra, kẹ oreng k'eden okwuma bi, okwu ọrọ-ọ e. Kẹ ọkhaam anọng ẹnọhna p'atzọn-ẹ abẹ.”
GEN 32:7 Wa Jekọb ojor-ẹ, ettem ẹyakh-ẹ atzim. Mẹ wọ, ọbhaangi anọng p'otzim ka ngaan mfa, obiro ọbhaangi arukhimaan, ọmaana abhaam, ttara akamẹl.
GEN 32:8 Jekọb on-oben for sẹ bi, “Idikha Ẹsau orim ẹkhaan dani abẹ, ẹkhaan ndonggo ch'erikhi ẹrọbh-ọrọbh ẹnaanga.”
GEN 32:9 Iwa Jekọb ozi njọhm, oben bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'itta kwaam Abraham, ọmaana kw'otte kwaam Isaak, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'oben-m bi, rọhng abhana k'ẹkhọma chọ, atzor anọng pọ, obiro ochekhi bi, kaam nsi idik ijibh inang-ọ.
GEN 32:10 Kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ k'ọphyaam fọ, ọmaana k'idadaakha sọ biphyir, kimbaan. Wa kaam ndim ochikhura kwaam kẹ-khẹ njekha ọraanga kwa Jọrdan, manya, kaam nkk'ẹkhakhaama nsa, matzẹmaa nna mmaangi chẹ ka ngaan mfa.
GEN 32:11 Tzotzokhaan, kkaan-m, arọbh-m ka mbọhk s'ọgbaanọkka kwaam Ẹsau, okhuri bi, ojora faam ode bi, kẹ ófha okwu ofhu man biphyir, ttara va ọmaana abọkka.
GEN 32:12 Yina, kọ akk'achekhi anang kaam bi, asi-m ńgaama ẹkhakhaama, abira ási va pa va paam ahaabh mach'oyeyeng kw'ọraanga ọkhaan-ọkhaan, kw'ọnọng on-ofha obhik.”
GEN 32:13 Iwa Jekọb oyima m'ibe nna m'erungiwu nduma. Otzekha ẹnanga k'ottem kw'ekpo py'ọkhaam ọnang ọgbaanọkka Ẹsau.
GEN 32:14 Obhik kw'ekpo py'otzek bi ọnang-ẹ ode: avu-gbokha arọbh jobh, ọmaana abhumkpẹ ẹrọbh, ọmaana arukhimaan-kwa arọbh jobh, ttara arukhimaan-dim ẹrọbh,
GEN 32:15 ọmaana akamẹl-papẹ ẹrọbh obhiri jobh ttara va pabẹ p'atzima ajaabh ẹba, ọmaana abhaam-papẹ arọbh afa, ọmaana abhaam-dim jobh, ọmaana anyanyaang-papẹ ẹrobh, ttara anyanyaang-dim jobh.
GEN 32:16 Jekọb ọtzọkha sẹ ohok ka ngaan, ka ngaan. Ọtzọkha ẹkhaan kpenamkpen ọnang ọtzọhmnọng wani bi okkeri, oben bẹ bi, “Bọng chi kaam eden arọhng, bọng abira anang ayok ọphaangi k'orenga kwabọng.”
GEN 32:17 Ọn-ọtzọr oyok kw'ochi eden itzọhng, oben bi, “Idikha ọgbaanọkka kwaam Ẹsau ottem-ọ abẹ, ọbọbh-ọ bi, ‘Kọ ade kw'anyi? Kọ am-atza maan ma? Nden s'anyi rọ sa kọ am-akkeri?’
GEN 32:18 Kọ abhin-ẹ bi, ‘Itta kwaam, ekpo mbya biphyir ede py'ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, Jekọb. Pyẹ ede ẹnanga ch'ọtzọhmi ochena itta kwaam Ẹsau, kẹ ọkhaam oreng k'eden okwuma e.’ ”
GEN 32:19 Wa Jekọb obiro oben ẹkhaan ch'ettong mfa, ọmaana ch'ettong nttaan, ttara ayok mbonggo biphyir p'atzori etzirakpo nnam bi, “Mada bọng akhebha Ẹsau, bọng gbaakh-ẹ odik nwuma wani kwa mgbaakhi ochedennọng.
GEN 32:20 Bọng jima bi agbaakh-ẹ bi, ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, Jekọb, otzori man nnam okwuma k'eden e.” Da kẹ, Jekọb ochibhi bi, “Kaam ncheden ndọhm ẹnanga nda bi, ndima ndir-ẹ nttem, ifha sa on-ore-m, asi mẹ, okhera bi ọtzọkh-m.”
GEN 32:21 Mẹ wọ, atzọhmnọng pa Jekọb acheden atzima ẹnanga akwọbha, yina, kẹ ọkhaam oyima m'ibhingabe sẹ m'erungiwu nduma.
GEN 32:22 M'erungiwu nduma dani, Jekọb obina ọtzọkha panọng pẹ afa, ọmaana atzọhmnọng pẹ p'ipanọng afa, ttara va pẹ p'ijinọng jobh obhiri wani, ọtzọhm bẹ arenga k'okhubha kw'ogbin-ogbini ajekha ọraanga kwa Jabọk.
GEN 32:23 Mada ọkk'anọng mba biphyir ọtzọhma ajekha ekhekha, obiro okwu ọtzọhm anọng ttara ẹkhakhaama chẹ biphyir.
GEN 32:24 Mẹ wọ e, Jekọb on-owobha mancheni. Ojinọng wani oyin-ẹ abẹ, osi erima ttar-ẹ, matzẹmaa ewu ehobha.
GEN 32:25 Mada ojinọng nwa ore bi, Jekọb mkpaan kofha ọyọhnga, on-obun-ẹ ọttọhk k'ogbok osi ọkhọbhi kw'ogbok ọkpara eho, da bẹ atzima asi erima osi.
GEN 32:26 Mẹ wọ, ọnọng nwa oben Jekọb bi, “Tte kaam ọbọhk mfona, kkeri ewu em-ehobh.” Yina, Jekọb obhin-ẹ bi, “Kaam kọ ọbọhk kintte, kw'oyongi bi ado-m.”
GEN 32:27 Mẹ wọ, ọnọng nwa ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ akpen yan?” Obhin-ẹ bi, “Kaam mkpen Jekọb.”
GEN 32:28 Ọnọng nwuma on-oben-ẹ bi, “Ttẹwọr mayina, kọ Jekọb dọk kàkpena, an-akpena Israẹl, okhuri bi, kọ akk'erima asa ttara Ibinọkpaabyi, ọmaana anọngẹya, yina, kọ akk'akhema.”
GEN 32:29 Iwa Jekọb on-oben bi, “Tzotzokhaan, kọ gbaak-m che chọ.” Ọnọng nwa ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Osi yan kw'abọbh-m che chaam?” Mando kw'ọnọng nwa odo Jekọb m'ibe nnuma.
GEN 32:30 Wa Jekọb on-oyeri ibe nna Pẹniẹl, oben bi, “Kaam nkk'Ibinọkpaabyi nna itzitzikha ttara itzitzikha, yina, kaam kimpe, ndimi nnukhi akpen.”
GEN 32:31 K'ogbe kw'ewuchen eyini wọ kwa Jekọb om-ogbekhi ọkwọbha Pẹniyẹl, okhuri ọkhọbhi kwẹ kw'ogbok kw'ọkpar eho.
GEN 32:32 Kẹ wọ osi, mapyiri k'ewu cha mayina, anọng p'Israẹl bẹ ayara p'abọk eje ch'ogbok kachi, okhuri eje ch'ogbok kwa Jekọb ch'iwa ọnọng obuni ọttọhk.
GEN 33:1 Mada Jekọb otzini chen, ore ọgbaanọkka Ẹsau da om-otzima anọng pẹ ẹnọhna okwu. Mando kw'ọtzọk va pẹ okkema ọnang abọkka. Ọtzọkha ọnang Lea, ọmaana Rachẹl, obiro ọtzọkha ọnang atzọhmnọng pabẹ p'ipanọng afa.
GEN 33:2 Wa ọtzọkha atzọhmnọng mba p'ipanọng ttara va pabẹ otzima ochi eden, Lea ttara va pẹ atzor bẹ nnam, yina Rachẹl ttara Josẹph an-akponga nnam.
GEN 33:3 Wa Jekọb ma for sẹ ochi eden orenga otzor ọgbaanọkka ka for. Mada ọbaang-ẹ ka for, ọrakha ottima itzitzikha k'irerek igbe izenamfa.
GEN 33:4 Yina, Ẹsau ọrọbh ọtza ọgọhma Jekọb, ọkhaar-ẹ mbọhk k'ekhokhora, obira ọbaakh-ẹ. Bẹ anọng afa abhom.
GEN 33:5 Mada Ẹsau otzini chen ore panọng ttara va, ọn-ọbọbh bi, “Bọng anọng bọ bọng atzọni kẹ-ẹ?” Jekọb obhin-ẹ bi, “Va p'Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ọnanga k'ọphyaam, bọ mẹ e.”
GEN 33:6 Mẹ wọ, atzọhmnọng p'ipanọng ọmaana va pabẹ arenga atzor-ẹ ka for, bẹ arakha attima otzitzikha k'irerek anang-ẹ ikpokpobha.
GEN 33:7 Lea ttara va pẹ ajema, bẹ abira attima otzitzikha k'irerek, yina Rachẹl ttara Josẹph an-akpong nnam akwu attima itzitzikha k'irerek anang-ẹ ikpokpobha.
GEN 33:8 Ẹsau ọn-ọbọbh bi, “Anọng mba p'ira ngebh, ttara ngaan s'etzirakpo pya bẹ atzima akwu, atzọhmi bẹ bi, bẹ akwu asi yan o?” Jekọb oben bi, “Itta kwaam, ndim pyẹ bi ndọkha ọphyaam k'itzitzikha sọ e.”
GEN 33:9 Yina, Ẹsau on-oben bi, “Mma e, ọgbaanọkka kwaam, kọ khaama ekpo pyọ, kaam nkk'ekpo ngaama k'ọhaabh py'ebeng-m e.”
GEN 33:10 Jekọb, obhin-ẹ bi, “Mma o, ngwukh-ọ okhukhi. Kọ tzọkha ẹnanga cha nnang-ọ, idikha ọphyaam f'asi anang-m, ofon-ọ k'ettem. Ẹra cha kaam nnọ-ọ ma, okheri macha nne itzitzikha s'Ibinọkpaabyi e, da kọ atzọkh-m k'ọphyaam.
GEN 33:11 Tzotzokhaan, khera bi atzọkha ẹnanga nda cha nnang-ọ, da Ibinọkpaabyi okk'aam ọda ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen fa kaam nnori.” Mada Jekọb ochin ororo ọgbana bi, ọgbaanọkka ọtzọkha ẹnanga cha ọnang-ẹ, Ẹsau okhera ọtzọkha.
GEN 33:12 Mando kw'Ẹsau on-obeni bi, “Tte mofona, kaam ńchọ-ọ eden.”
GEN 33:13 Yina, Jekọb oben-ẹ bi, “Itta kwaam, kọ arong kẹ bi, va paam atzima akhar-ọkhara, bẹ ẹfa kakhaam, ttara bi, etzirakpo pyaam etzim ẹrọkhi ayok p'ikhakhari ọrọk. Idikha motzim pyẹ orenga m'ẹbhar-ẹbhar, k'ewu dani chẹ-chẹ, pyẹ épe-ope biphyir.
GEN 33:14 Mẹ wọ, tte itta kwaam ochi ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ eden, ifha kaam ndima etzirakpo mbya ọmaana va mba, mfumetzen nnenga, matzẹmaa mokhebha ayok ka Seir.”
GEN 33:15 Mẹ wọ, Ẹsau on-oben bi, “Tte ntte anọng paam bani ọbọhk, bẹ atzọn-ọ abẹ.” Jekọb on-obhin-ẹ bi, “Sam e, itta kwaam, okhuri yan kw'abira ayak for sọ atzim o? Tte kaam ndọkha ọphyaam fọ fẹ-fẹ.”
GEN 33:16 M'ewu nduma dani, Ẹsau obina orenga okhuna ka Seir.
GEN 33:17 Yina, Jekọb ochina ka Sukọt. Kẹ wọ kw'iwa osi ọhọhm kw'owobh, obiro osi okhira f'etzirakpo pyẹ. Kẹ wọ osi bẹ ayeri ibe nnuma Sukọt.
GEN 33:18 Wa k'ekponga-nnam, Jekọb ofon ka Padan-Aram orenga maa okwu opyiri k'odedenmon kwa Shẹkẹm, k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan, osi ibhingabe mẹ ọbaanga odedenmon nwa.
GEN 33:19 Wa Jekọb okwu odebh okhubha kw'irerek kw'ottim ikhira, ka mbọhk sa va pa Hamọr, kw'ode otte kwa Shẹkẹm, k'asilva arọbh azen.
GEN 33:20 M'ibe nna rọ sa Jekọb osi ijafọhnibe, obiro oyeri ibe nna Ibinọkpaabyi ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl.
GEN 34:1 Wa k'ogbe wani, Daina, kw'ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kwa Lea ọkk'ọmaana ọnang Jekọb, oyini k'iyaan ọtza odibh panọng p'obhon nwuma.
GEN 34:2 Mada Shẹkẹm kw'ode nnwa kwa Hamọr, kw'ode ọvaarnọng kw'anọng pa Hiv ore Daina, ọbọkh-ẹ k'ẹfa oyima abẹ.
GEN 34:3 Mando kwa Shẹkẹm ọtzọkha ettem chẹ biphyir ọgbana ka Daina, kw'ode ominanwa kwa Jekọb. Wa Daina ọdaakh-ẹ oyong-oyongi, on-okhonga bi, ọsẹ-ẹ okhera eyonga chẹ.
GEN 34:4 Mẹ wọ, Shẹkẹm oben otte kwẹ Hamọr bi, “Itta, kọ tzọkha ominanwa nwa anang-m, mọba ayok.”
GEN 34:5 Iwa va pa Jekọb p'ijinọng atzim awobh k'owoni, da bẹ atza anang etzirakpo pyẹ ọchattọhk, k'ogbe kwa Jekọb ọbhaang bi, bẹ akk'ominanwa kwẹ, Daina, ọgbasadik asa. Mando kw'omyi odik nwa maa va pẹ akhuna.
GEN 34:6 Iwa Hamọr kw'ode otte kwa Shẹkẹm ofona bi ọtza ọttọhna odik nwa ttara Jekọb.
GEN 34:7 Mada va pa Jekọb an-afon kẹ da bẹ akkeri etzirakpo akhuna, bẹ abhaanga odik kw'otto da bẹ anade. For ipe bẹ, nttem mbiri mpyibh bẹ okhuri ọgbasa-dik kwa Shẹkẹm ọkk'ọsa k'Israẹl bi, ọbọkha ominanwa kwa Jekọb oyima abẹ k'ẹfa, odik kw'oni ọbabaana ọbaan.
GEN 34:8 Yina, Hamọr oben bẹ bi, “Tzotzokhaan, bọng tte nnwa kwaam Shẹkẹm ọbọhk ọtzọkha ominanwa kwabọng, ettem chẹ biphyir ẹn-ẹgban ma kẹ e.
GEN 34:9 Bọng mọtzọkha ayok k'ọbada, tte ajinọng paman atzọkha aminava pabọng, ifha bọbọng abira atzọkha aminava paman.
GEN 34:10 Bọng afha aruk ma ttara man, irerek iyim mẹ maa arọhng bi, bọng aruk abira arenga mphya kpenamkpen, ttara bi bọng abira afha akhaama orerek fabọng ọkhaam.”
GEN 34:11 Mẹ wọ, Shẹkẹm oben otte ttara agbaanatte pa Daina bi, “Bọng tte kaam ndọkha ọphyaam kabọng k'itzitzikha, kaam ndo for bi, nnang bọng ọttọhk kpenamkpen fa bọng aben bi, ńnang k'eho ch'ominanwa kwabong.
GEN 34:12 Bọng gbaakh-m ẹphya ch'imina sẹ, ọmaana ekpo kpenamkpen biphyir py'ẹbari macha kọ, pya kaam mbaan bi idima nkwu, k'odem kw'ọdaakhi bọng. Kaam ńnang bọng ọnang, bọng kinggẹ nang-m ominanwa nwa ndọkh-ẹ k'ọbada.”
GEN 34:13 Wa va pa Jekọb arenga ọgbasa-dik kw'ọkk'ọtta okhebha ọgbaanotte kwabẹ Daina abẹ, abọhra Shẹkẹm ttara otte kwẹ Hamọr.
GEN 34:14 Bẹ aben bi, “Man odik-dema nwa kofha osi. Ode ọgbasa-dik ọnang man bi, mọtzọkha ọgbaanotte kwaman ọnang ọnọng kw'oni ọkpakkọrikkọ osi, k'ọbada.
GEN 34:15 Eden obungichẹ cha mókhera ttara bọng ede bi, bọng an-ade macha man, ojinọng kpenamkpen k'ottem kwabọng ọkhaambi osi ọkpakkọrikkọ.
GEN 34:16 Mẹ wọ kwa maman ótzima okhera ttara bọng bi, ajinọng pabọng átzọkha panọng paman, maman obiro okhera bi mọ́tzọkha panọng pabọng. Mẹ kwa móbiro oruk ttara bọng, man biphyir món-ode wani, macha bọng aphyemi.
GEN 34:17 Yina, idikha bọng ánakhera bi, asi ọkpakkọrikkọ, man kokhera bi, bọng atzọkha ominanwa kwaman k'ọbada, mótzim-ẹ otzima ofona e.”
GEN 34:18 Wa Hamọr, ttara nnwa kwẹ Shẹkẹm are bi, ochibhi kwa va pa Jekọb asi ojibh-ojibh.
GEN 34:19 Wa Shẹkẹm ode ojinọng kw'efona chẹ biphyir ẹm-ẹnang ikpokpobha, okhuri da ominanwa kwa Jekọb ọkk'ẹ ọdaakha, ogbe dọk kokhibhi, okhera bi, osi ọkpakkọrikkọ.
GEN 34:20 Mẹ wọ, Hamọr ọmaana nnwa kwẹ Shẹkẹm afona achina k'ipha s'obhon bi, bẹ atza agbaak anọng pabẹ ochibhi nwa.
GEN 34:21 Bẹ agbaak ajinọng p'obhon nwa bi, “Ajinọng mba ajibhi ẹmmaana atzima atzor man. Tte bẹ aruk m'irerek saman, bẹ abira arenga mphya, mgba irerek ibar-ọbar s'ibenga be. Mọfha ọtzọkha aminava pabẹ, bẹ abira afha atzọkha aminava paman.
GEN 34:22 Ajinọng mba akhera bi, aruk ttara man mach'anọng bani ka nttak bi, mọkhaambi osi ajinọng paman ọkpakkọrikkọ, macha bẹ-bẹ asi.
GEN 34:23 Mokker-okkeri, ẹkhakhaama chabẹ biphyir, ọmaana etzirakpo pya bẹ biphyir éde pyaman. Mẹ wọ, tte mokhera ttara bẹ, mosi mando, ifha bẹ an-aruk ttara man.”
GEN 34:24 Wa anọng mba biphyir p'awobh m'ipha akhera ttara Hamọr ọmaana nnwa kwẹ Shẹkẹm. Ofona mẹ, ojinọng kpenamkpen kw'obhon nwa, ofona ochina k'ipha s'obhon bi, bẹ asẹ-ẹ ọkpakkọrikkọ.
GEN 34:25 Mada iwu ittaan ikk'ikwọbha sa bẹ asi bẹ ọkpakkọrikkọ, da bẹ atzima awobh k'ọmmamma, va pa Jekọb afa kw'ode Simeọn ttara Lẹvi, vọkka pa Daina, atzini akkangkkaang pabẹ, k'ogbe kw'anọng p'obhon ani chen ahokhi, bẹ afhu ajinọng biphyir.
GEN 34:26 Bẹ atzima akkangkkaang pabẹ afhu Hamọr ọmaana nnwa kwẹ, Shẹkẹm. Bẹ abira adim k'ọhọhm kwa Shẹkẹm, atzọkha Daina atzima afona.
GEN 34:27 Mada va mbonggo pa Jekọb akwu are bi, ajinọng p'obhon an-ayim abukhi-abukhi biphyir, bẹ an-adim k'obhon kw'anọng p'asi ọgbaanotte kwabẹ ọgbasadik, achi ọgbọm.
GEN 34:28 Bẹ atzọkha etzirakpo, ọmaana abhaam, ọmaana nnyanyaang, ttara ekpo kpenamkpen m'obhon nwa, atzima afona.
GEN 34:29 Bẹ achi ọgbọm k'ọttọhk kpenamkpen fa bẹ are m'obhon nwa, ẹkhakhaama kpenamkpen, ọmaana panọng biphyir, ttara va pabẹ k'ihọhm, atzima afona.
GEN 34:30 Mẹ wọ, mada Jekọb okwu oronga odik nwa, oben Simeọn ttara Lẹvi bi, “Bọng akk'aam akha ka dama-dama, bọng abira asi-m mkpukhi anọng pa Kenaan idik, ọmaana anọng pa Pẹriz p'ade anọng p'arukhi m'irek nna. Bọng akk'ara bi, ọnọng-mik ajinọng paman kọhaabi. Anọng mba agbak mbọhk bi, arim-m abẹ, bẹ adim-m ttara ẹhọhmmọr chaam biphyir.”
GEN 34:31 Yina, bẹ abhin-ẹ bi, “Shẹkẹm wọ ira ọn-ọtzọk ọgbaanotte kwaman mach'ọzaza o?”
GEN 35:1 Iwa Ibinọkpaabyi oben Jekọb bi, “Vura achina ka Bẹtẹl, asi oruk kwọ mẹ, abira asi ijafọhnibe mẹ anang Ibinọkpaabyi kw'oyin-ọ abẹ k'ogbe kw'iwa arọbhi ka mbọhk s'agbaanakka, Ẹsau.”
GEN 35:2 Mando kwa Jekọb obeni ẹhọhmmọr chẹ, ọmaana anọng biphyir p'awobh ttar-ẹ bi, “Bọng nọbha agbatza p'ikhekhenmon p'awobh k'ottem kwabọng, bọng ahok for sabọng iwur-owur, bọng abira abhona ẹmmaana chabọng.
GEN 35:3 Mẹ wọ, bọng kwu movura ochina ka Bẹtẹl, kẹ da kaam ńsi ijafọhnibe nnang Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ọbhaang-m k'ogbe kw'ọmmamma, kw'okk'obiro owobha ttar-m k'ibe kpenamkpen sa nkk'nda.”
GEN 35:4 Mando kwa bẹ ọtzọk agbatza p'ikhekhenmon biphyir pa bẹ akhaam, ọmaana ekpo py'itzọhng pya bẹ akhe, atte ọbọhk anang Jekọb. Jekọb ọtzọkha pyẹ ọnọhnga k'echirin ch'oak ka Shẹkẹm.
GEN 35:5 Mẹ wọ, bẹ abina orenga, ojora f'ideden f'Ibinọkpaabyi ọnwa ibhon biphyir s'ibaang bẹ, maa ọnọng kw'ọfha okhubh va pa Jekọb kode.
GEN 35:6 Jekọb ọmaana anọng pẹ biphyir apyiri ka Luz, kw'obiro okpena Bẹtẹl, k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan.
GEN 35:7 Mẹ wọ kwa Jekọb osi ijafọhnibe, okpe ibe nna, Ẹl-Bẹtẹl, okhuri bi, mẹ wọ kw'iwa Ibinọkpaabyi osi ẹjaakhi cha for sẹ ọnang-ẹ, k'ogbe kw'iwa ọrọbhi oji ọgbaanọkka Ẹsau.
GEN 35:8 Wa Dẹbọra kw'ode ọrọrọkha kwa Rẹbẹka ope. Bẹ anọhng-ẹ k'echirin ch'oak ch'ewobh k'ebhonho cha Bẹtẹl. Mẹ wọ, bẹ ayeri ibe nnuma “Oak kw'Obhoma.”
GEN 35:9 Mada Jekọb ofon ka Padan-Aram okhuna, Ibinọkpaabyi obiro oyin-ẹ abẹ, ọdẹ-ẹ.
GEN 35:10 Ibinọkpaabyi oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ akpen Jekọb, yina, Jekọb dọk kakpena, án-akpena Israẹl.” Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi ọkpẹ-ẹ Israẹl.
GEN 35:11 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben-ẹ bi, “Kaam wọ nde Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir; kọ bhon va k'ọhaabh. Ẹkhọma, ọmaana obhon kwa ngọma mfona ma ndaak sọ, avaar abira áfona ka va pa va pọ.
GEN 35:12 Irek s'iwa nnangi Abraham ọmaana Isaak, rọ sa kaam ńnang-ọ, sẹ rọ sa kaam mbiri ńnang va pa va pọ.”
GEN 35:13 Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi obina oji Jekọb m'ibe nnuma s'okk'atzim ọgbaakha ttar-ẹ, ofona.
GEN 35:14 Jekọb ọtzọkha ọtza ofhu m'ibe nnuma s'Ibinọkpaabyi okk'atzim ọgbaakha ọnang-ẹ, osi ẹnanga-ebyengichẹ mẹ, obiro osi ẹnanga ch'etzuk-byengi m'ọtza nwa.
GEN 35:15 Wa Jekọb oyeri ibe nnuma s'ibinọkpaabyi okk'atzim ọgbaakha ttar-ẹ, Bẹtẹl.
GEN 35:16 Wa bẹ abin orenga ka Bẹtẹl, am-achina k'ẹkhọma ch'Ẹphrat. Mada bẹ abhiri eden k'Ẹphrat, ọmaan f'ọgaang-ọgaangi ọttẹwọr osi Rachẹl.
GEN 35:17 Mada ọm-ọtzọkha ọmmamma bara-mbar kw'ọmaan, kwanọng kw'om-okkeri ọmaan oben-ẹ bi, “Oning-ọ ojor, kkeri kọ akk'nnwa kw'ijinọng abira amaana.”
GEN 35:18 Mada oji ikponga-nnam-wọhng s'on-ope, okpe nnwa kwẹ Bẹn-Oni. Yina, otte Jekọb ọkpẹ-ẹ, Bẹnjamin.
GEN 35:19 Mẹ wọ, Rachẹl ope, bẹ anọhng-ẹ k'eden ch'echin k'Ẹphrat, kw'ode Bẹtẹlẹhẹm.
GEN 35:20 Jekọb ọtzọkha ọtza ofhu ebebe k'epekhubh cha Rachẹl. Maa pyiri ma, ọtza nwuma wọ ode ẹkhọhkha ch'epekhubh cha Rachẹl.
GEN 35:21 Jekọb kw'on-okpen Israẹl ochina ororo k'orenga kwẹ, obiro osi ikhira oyongi k'okhubha kwa Migdal-Eder.
GEN 35:22 Mada Israẹl orukhi m'ẹkhọma nduma, wa Reubẹn odim kẹ oyima Bilha kw'ode ọkkọra-kwanọng kw'otte abẹ, iwa Israẹl okwu ọbhaanga odik nwa. Iwa Jekọb obhoni va p'ijinọng jobh obhiri afa:
GEN 35:23 Va p'ijinọng pa Lea ade: Reubẹn kw'ode ocheden nnwa kwa Jekọb, ọmaana Simeọn, ọmaana Lẹvi, ọmaana Juda, ọmaana Isaaka, ttara Zẹbulun.
GEN 35:24 Va pa Rachẹl ade: Josẹph, ọmaana Bẹnjamin.
GEN 35:25 Va p'ijinọng pa Bilha kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kwa Rachẹl bẹ ade: Dan, ọmaana Naphtali.
GEN 35:26 Va p'ijinọng pa Zilpa kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kwa Lea bẹ ade: Gad, ọmaana Ashẹr. Ma wọ ode va p'ijinọng p'iwa Jekọb obhoni ka Padan-Aram.
GEN 35:27 Wa Jekọb ọkpa nnam otzor otte Isaak ka Mamrẹ, kw'ọbaang Kiriyat-Arba (kwa bẹ abira ayeri Hẹbrọn), kẹ da Abraham ọmaana Isaak akk'arurukha.
GEN 35:28 Biphyir-phyir wa Isaak orukhi cho arọbh ọhawani.
GEN 35:29 Mẹ wọ, wa Isaak ope k'atzam otzor anọng pẹ p'akk'apa. Wa va pẹ Ẹsau ọmaana Jekọb, anọhng-ẹ.
GEN 36:1 Ma wọ ode efonamma ch'Ẹsau, kw'obiro okpena Edom.
GEN 36:2 Wa Ẹsau ọtzọk panọng p'afon Kenaan. Oyok wani okpen Ada, kw'ode nnwa kw'Ẹlọn kw'ofon Het. Ottong panọng afa okpena Oholibama, kw'ode nnwa kw'Ana. Ana wa ode nnwa kwa Zibeọn kw'ofon Hiv.
GEN 36:3 Ottong panọng attaan okpena Basemat kw'ode nnwa kw'Ishimayẹl, obiro ode ọgbaanọkka kwa Nẹbayọt.
GEN 36:4 Wa Ada ọmaani Ẹliphaz ọnang Ẹsau, Basemat ọmaan Reuẹl,
GEN 36:5 Oholibama ọmaan Jeush, ọmaana Jalam, ttara Kora. Ma wọ ode va p'iwa bẹ amaani anang Ẹsau k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan.
GEN 36:6 Ẹsau ọtzọkha panọng pẹ, ọmaana va pẹ, ọmaana anọng p'ọhọhm kwẹ biphyir, ọmaana etzirakpo pyẹ ttara nden sẹ, ttara ẹkhakhaama ch'ọkk'ọsa ka Kenaan biphyir, obina oji ọgbaanọkka Jekọb, ọtza oruk k'ibe s'ibhir-obhiri.
GEN 36:7 Wa irerek sa bẹ anọng afa arukhi bẹ dọk kibeng, okhuri etzirakpo pyabẹ, da ẹkhakhaama chabẹ ẹkk'ẹn-ẹhaahba maa, eyongi k'odem kwa bẹ anọng afa abira aruk ibe rani.
GEN 36:8 Mẹ wọ, Ẹsau kw'obiro okpena Edom ọtza osi oruk kwẹ k'okhubha kwa mgbegbeho sa Seir.
GEN 36:9 Ma wọ ode efonamma ch'Ẹsau kw'ode otte kw'ideden kw'anọng p'Edom k'okhubha kwa mgbegbeho sa Seir.
GEN 36:10 Ma wọ ode che pa va p'ijinọng p'Ẹsau: Ẹliphaz, nnwa kw'Ada ọmaani Reuẹl, nnwa kwa Basemat ọmaani.
GEN 36:11 Va p'ijinọng p'Ẹliphaz obhoni ade: Teman, ọmaana Ọma, ọmaana Zepho, ọmaana Gatam, ttara Kenaz.
GEN 36:12 Ẹliphaz kw'ode nnwa kw'Ẹsau wa obiro ọkhaama ọkkọra-kwanọng kw'okpen Timna, kw'ọmaan-ẹ nnwa kw'okpen Amalẹk. Ada kw'iwa ode kwanọng kw'Ẹsau wọ iwa ode ọkka kw'ideden kwa va mba biphyir.
GEN 36:13 Va pa Reuẹl bẹ ade: Nahat, ọmaana Zẹra, ọmaana Shama, ttara Miza. Basemat kw'ode kwanọng kw'Ẹsau wọ iwa ode ọkka kw'ideden kwa va mba biphyir.
GEN 36:14 Va p'Oholibama kw'ode nnwa kw'Ana, kwa Zibeọn obhoni, p'iwa ọmaani ọnang Ẹsau bẹ ade: Jeush, ọmaana Jalam, ọmaana Kora.
GEN 36:15 Ma wọ ode avaar-efona p'efonamma ch'Ẹsau p'afon k'ẹnọmma ch'Ẹliphaz, kw'ode ocheden nnwa kw'Ẹsau obhoni. Va mba wa bẹ ade: Teman, ọmaana Ọma, ọmaana Zepho, ọmaana Kenaz,
GEN 36:16 ọmaana Kora, ọmaana Gatam, ttara Amalẹk. Anọng mba bọ iwa atzim mvaar k'ẹnọmma ch'Ẹliphaz k'Edom. Ada wọ wa ode ọkka kw'ideden kw'avaar-efona mba biphyir.
GEN 36:17 Avaar-efona p'afon k'ẹnọmma cha Reuẹl kw'ode nnwa kw'Ẹsau obhoni k'ẹkhọma ch'Edom ade: Nahat, ọmaana Zẹra, ọmaana Shama, ttara Miza. Basemat wọ wa ode ọkka kw'ideden kw'avaar-efona mba biphyir.
GEN 36:18 Avaar-efona p'afon ka ndaak s'Oholibama kw'ode kwanọng kw'Ẹsau, obiro ode nnwa kw'Ana, bẹ ade: Jeush, ọmaana Jalam, ttara Kora.
GEN 36:19 Ma wọ ode va p'Ẹsau kw'obiro okpena Edom, ttara avaar-efona pa nnọmma sabẹ biphyir.
GEN 36:20 Ma wọ ode va p'ijinọng pa Seir kw'ofon Họr, p'iwa arukhi m'ẹkhọma nda: Lotan, ọmaana Shobal, ọmaana Zibeọn ttara Ana,
GEN 36:21 ọmaana Dishọn, ọmaana Ẹzẹr, ttara Dishan. Ma wọ ode avaar-efona p'abaHọr, p'afon k'ẹnọmma cha Seir k'Edom.
GEN 36:22 Wa va pa Lotan ade: Hori, ọmaana Homam. Timna kẹ wọ iwa ode ọgbaanọkka kw'ikwanọng kwa Lotan.
GEN 36:23 Wa va pa Shobal bẹ ade: Alvan, ọmaana Manahat, ọmaana Ebal, ọmaana Shepho, ttara Ọnam.
GEN 36:24 Wa Zibeọn obhoni Aiya, ttara Ana. Wa Ana nwa wọ ocheden ọtza ore ngekha s'asi akhọm-ọkhọm, k'ebherede, mada otzim nnyanyaang s'otte Zibeọn, ọtza ọnang ọchattọhk.
GEN 36:25 Wa Ana obhoni Dishọn kw'ode ojinọng, ttara Oholibama kw'ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng.
GEN 36:26 Va pa Dishọn wa bẹ ade: Hẹmdan, ọmaana Ẹshban, ọmaana Itiran, ttara Keran.
GEN 36:27 Va p'Ẹzẹr ade: Bilhan, ọmaana Zaavan, ttara Akan.
GEN 36:28 Va pa Dishan ade: Uz, ttara Aran.
GEN 36:29 Ma wọ ode avaar-efona p'abaHọr: Lotan, ọmaana Shobal, ọmaana Zibeọn, ọmaana Ana,
GEN 36:30 ọmaana Dishọn, ọmaana Ẹzẹr, ttara Dishan. Ma wọ ode avaar-efona p'abaHọr atzor ka ngọma sabẹ k'irek sa Seir.
GEN 36:31 Ma wọ ode avaar-efona p'iwa adabhi Edom yina iwa ọvaarnọng kpenamkpen ọn-ọdabhi anọng p'Israẹl:
GEN 36:32 Bẹla kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Beọr, wa okwu ode ọvaarnọng kw'Edom. Wa odedenmon kwẹ okpen Dinhaba.
GEN 36:33 Mada Bẹla ope, Jobab kw'ode nnwa kwa Zẹra kw'ofon Bozra, on-okwu ode ọvaarnọng.
GEN 36:34 Mada Jobab ope, Husham kw'ofon k'okhubha kwa Teman, on-okwu ode ọvaarnọng.
GEN 36:35 Mada Husham ope, Hadad kw'ode nnwa kwa Bedad on-okwu ode ọvaarnọng. Hadad nwa wọ iwa orim anọng pa Midiyan abẹ k'ẹkhọma cha Moab, okhema bẹ. Wa odedenmon kwẹ okpen Avit.
GEN 36:36 Mada Hadad ope, Samla kw'ofon Masareka, on-okwu ode ọvaarnọng.
GEN 36:37 Mada Samla ope, Shaul kw'ofon Rehobot kw'owobh ọbaanga ọraanga, on-okwu ode ọvaarnọng.
GEN 36:38 Mada Shaul ope, Baal-Hanan kw'ode nnwa kw'Akbọ, on-okwu ode ọvaarnọng.
GEN 36:39 Mada Baal-Hanan kw'ode nnwa kw'Akbọ ope, Hadad on-okwu ọdabh. Wa odedenmon kwẹ okpen Pau. Wa kwanọng okpen Mehetabẹl kw'ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kwa Matarẹd. Matarẹd wa ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kwa Me-Zahab.
