GEN 36:40 Ma wọ ode avaar-efona p'ẹnọmma ch'Ẹsau atzor ka che pabẹ, ọmaana ka nnọmma sabẹ, ttara ka ngọma sabẹ: Timna, ọmaana Alva, ttara Jetẹt,
GEN 36:41 ọmaana avaar Oholibama, ọmaana Ẹla ttara Pinọn,
GEN 36:42 ọmaana avaar Kenaz, ọmaana Teman, ttara Mibzar,
GEN 36:43 ọmaana Magdiyẹl, ttara Iram. Ma wọ ode avaar-efona p'Edom, atzor k'odem kw'iwa bẹ arukhi k'irerek sa bẹ asi oruk kwabẹ. Wa Ẹsau wọ ode itta kw'ideden kw'anọng p'Edom.
GEN 37:1 Wa Jekọb orukhi k'obhon kw'otte okk'orurukha, kw'ode irek sa Kenaan.
GEN 37:2 Ma wọ ode odem kw'ẹhọhmmọr cha Jekọb. K'ogbe kw'iwa Josẹph ode odikkobh kw'ode cho chi obhiri afa, iwa ọm-ọtzọn votte pẹ abẹ, va pa Bilha ọmaana pa Zilpa am-akkeri etzirakpo py'otte. Wa Josẹph okwu ọpọhra osisi kw'ayok ọnang otte.
GEN 37:3 K'ottem kwa va pa Jekọb biphyir, Josẹph wọ iwa ọdaakhi otte ọtzam ọyọhnga va mbonggo, okhuri da iwa obhon-ẹ k'atzam. Mẹ wọ, okhum ọnọhma-baba kw'ọkkẹri adem ọnang-ẹ.
GEN 37:4 Mada votte are bi, Josẹph ọdaakhi otte kwabẹ idik ọyọhnga bẹ, bẹ an-attaang-ẹ maa, bẹ atzim p'amọm-ọmọm dọk kakhaam pa bẹ agbaakhi anang-ẹ.
GEN 37:5 Wa Josẹph okwu ọttaara idachen, mada ọgbaakhi votte pẹ idachen nna, bẹ an-adẹ-ẹ attaanga-ọttaanga.
GEN 37:6 Oben bẹ bi, “Tzotzokhaan, bọng yonga itzọhng abhaanga idachen sa kaam nttaar e.
GEN 37:7 K'idachen, kaam nttaar da mowobh k'owoni ọm-ọdabh abarli-khe, nna ngen-okheni nne da ekhe chaam en-ebe idumsẹ, egori ẹyọhnga akhe pabọng. Akhe pabọng an-akhọri chaam akhe k'ottem, bẹ abira arakha nho anang ekhe chaam k'ikpokpobha.”
GEN 37:8 Votte pẹ abhin-ẹ bi, “Ode bi kọ am-achibhi bi, maman owobha k'irekh-irek kwọ o? Kọ achibhi k'odik ọkkakka bi, kọ wọ áde man ọvaarnọng o?” Mẹ wọ, bẹ an-adẹ-ẹ attaanga-ọttaanga, okhuri idachen sẹ ọmaana idik s'okk'bẹ ọgbaakha.
GEN 37:9 Wa Josẹph obiro okwu ọttaara idachen idọdọk, ọtzọkha sẹ ọgbaak votte pẹ, oben bi, “Bọng yong-m itzọhng, kaam nkk'idachen idọdọk mbiri nttaara e. Nttaar da ewuchen, ọmaana ophe, ttara ndodori jobh obhiri wani nchung nnang-m ikpokpobha.”
GEN 37:10 Mada Josẹph obiro ọgbaak otte idachen s'ọttaar, otte ọkpẹ-ẹ eden bi, tte oningi odik-dema nwa dọk ọgbaakhi, oben bi, “Bọng idachen-dema s'attaar mẹ? Ode bi kọ ahokhi k'odik ọkkakka bi, kaam ọmaana akka, ttara votte pọ mochunga nho k'irerek ọnang-ọ ikpokpobha o?”
GEN 37:11 Mẹ wọ, wa votte pa Josẹph an-akhaama ottemmama ttar-ẹ. Yina, Jekọb kw'ode otte kwẹ on-okhe idik nna k'ettem.
GEN 37:12 Wa ewu dani votte pa Josẹph an-atzima etzirakpo py'otte kwabẹ, atza anang ọchattọhk kẹ ọbaanga Shẹkẹm.
GEN 37:13 Iwa Jekọb oben Josẹph bi, “Kọ arong kẹ bi votte pọ awobh kẹ da bẹ anangi etzirakpo ọchattọhk kẹ ọbaanga Shẹkẹm. Kaam nna ndọhm-ọ kẹ da bẹ awobh.” Josẹph obhina bi, “Iya itta, tzọhm-m e.”
GEN 37:14 Iwa Israẹl ttara Josẹph awobh k'Ẹttẹri cha Hẹbrọn, mẹ wọ, Israẹl ọtzọhm Josẹph bi, ọtza oror votte pẹ ọmaana etzirakpo, kẹ da bẹ awobh abaanga Shẹkẹm. Mada Josẹph opyiri ka Shẹkẹm,
GEN 37:15 ojinọng wani ọrẹ-ẹ kẹ da om-ottena k'iwoni, ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Mbọng f'am-aror o?”
GEN 37:16 Josẹph obhin-ẹ bi, “Kaam mminnor votte paam e, tzotzokhaan na afha agbaakh-m ibe sa bẹ am-anang etzirakpo ọchattọhk o?”
GEN 37:17 Ojinọng nwa obhina bi, “Bẹ akk'abina manya e. Kaam mmaang da bẹ abeni ayok bi, ‘Tte mochina ka Dọtan.’ ” Mando kwa Josẹph ofon ọtza okhebha votte pẹ ka Dọtan.
GEN 37:18 Yina, bẹ arẹ-ẹ da om-orenga okwu k'odenmir. Yina ọbaanga kẹ da bẹ awobh, bẹ akk'nttọhna akyera sa bẹ afhẹ-ẹ.
GEN 37:19 Wa bẹ aben ayok bi, “Bọng kker e, ọttaar-ọdachen nwuma wọ om-okwu kana e.
GEN 37:20 Bọng kwu, tte mọfhẹ-ẹ ọbhari k'ipekhuma rani mẹ, ifha mọkk'ọbhana, mọtza ọgbaak otte kwaman bi, etzen ch'ẹtzam dani dọ ẹfhẹ-ẹ, ifha mowobha ma ore, odem kw'ọdachen mvuma fẹ obiro okwu ode mach'ochibhi.”
GEN 37:21 Yina, mada Reubẹn ọbhaang odik nwa, okhonga bi, ọkkaan-ẹ ka mbọhk sa bẹ, oben bẹ bi, “Tte moning-ẹ ofhufhu-ofhu e.
GEN 37:22 Tte mokhinggẹ ọbhar-ẹ m'ipekhuma nna s'ebherede. Bọng ọnọng kàfhu.” Iwa Reubẹn ọgbaakhi odik nwa ifha ọkkaana akpen pa Josẹph, ifha obiro otzim-ẹ ochena otte kwabẹ.
GEN 37:23 Mada Josẹph opyiri kẹ da votte awobh, bẹ abọkh-ẹ awọra ọnọhma-baba jibh-anjibh kw'ọfọr ka for.
GEN 37:24 Bẹ atzọkh-ẹ abhari k'ipekhuma s'asi anade.
GEN 37:25 Mada bẹ an-awobh ẹwọr bi bẹ achi ọchattọhk, bẹ atzini chen akkeri k'ororo, are da ẹkhaan ch'aphyaphyaa p'Ishimayẹl p'am-atza orenga, am-afona k'obhon kwa Gilead ahakha, ttara akamẹl pabẹ p'atzọhk ekpo py'ẹdaami eruk, ọmaana ana p'adaami eruk k'adem-k'adem, pa bẹ atzim am-ahakha achina k'Ijip.
GEN 37:26 Mẹ wọ, Juda ọbọbh votte pẹ bi, “Mbọng vọ óde iru saman idikha mofhu ọgbaanotte kwaman modubha obo kwẹ o?
GEN 37:27 Tte mọkpẹ-ẹ ọnang anọng mba p'Ishimayẹl. Tte mọning-ẹ ofhu, mgba kẹ ode ọgbaanotte kwaman kwa mofon k'izi rani.” Mẹ wọ, bẹ biphyir akhera odik kwa Juda ọgbaakhi.
GEN 37:28 Mada aphyaphyaa mba p'Ishimayẹl p'abira ade anọng pa Midiyan abembi akwọbha, votte pa Josẹph arọbh-ẹ k'ipekhuma sa bẹ akk'ẹ abhari. Bẹ akpẹ-ẹ anang aphyaphyaa mba k'ashẹkẹl p'asilva ẹrọbh, bẹ atzima Josẹph afona k'Ijip.
GEN 37:29 Mada Reubẹn ọkpa nnam k'ipekhuma nnuma s'ira abẹ abhari Josẹph, ore bi kẹ dọk kode, ọjaakhi ọbara f'ọfọr.
GEN 37:30 Ofona otza okhebha votte kẹ da bẹ awobh, ọgbaak bẹ bi, “Nnwa nwuma kẹ dọk kode! Ma kaam nna nsi yan ma o?”
GEN 37:31 Mẹ wọ, bẹ atzọkha evu dani afhu, bẹ atzọkha ọnọhma kwa Josẹph arana k'izi s'evu cha bẹ afhu.
GEN 37:32 Bẹ atzima ọnọhma-baba nwuma abhana atza akhọhkha otte kwabẹ, agbaakh-ẹ bi, “Itta, kkeri ọnọhma-baba kw'am-ore. Kwa nnwa kwọ wọ o?”
GEN 37:33 Otte otzin ọnọhma nwa, oben bi, “Ọnọhma kwa nnwa kwaam wọ ma e! Etzen ch'etzam dani ẹkk'ẹfha, k'odik ọkkakka bẹ akk'Josẹph achikhi k'abir-ibiri.”
GEN 37:34 Mẹ wọ, Jekọb ọjaakhi ọbara f'ọfọr ka for, ọtzọkha abara-bina ọfọra, on-owobha ka nkwu-osisi sa nnwa kwẹ k'iwu haabhada.
GEN 37:35 Va pẹ p'ijinọng ọmaana p'ipanọng biphyir akwu adema ttar-ẹ, ifha bẹ adin-ẹ nttem. Yina, Jekọb kokher bi va ndin-ẹ nttem, on-oben bi, “Mma e, kaam nwobha ka nkwu-osisi sa nnwa kwaam maa, mpe ndor-ẹ.” Mẹ wọ, otte obhom!
GEN 37:36 Ayongi mẹ, anọng mba pa Midiyan akk'Josẹph akpa k'Ijip anang Pọtipha, kw'ode ọkhaan-nọng wani kwa Phero, obiro ode oho kw'anọng p'am-abaabh-ẹ.
GEN 38:1 K'ogbe nwuma, Juda obina oji votte pẹ, ọtza oruk ọbaanga ojinọng wani kw'okpen Hira, kw'ofon Adulam.
GEN 38:2 Kẹnya Adulam wọ kw'iwa Juda okhebh ominanwa wani kw'okpen Shua kw'otte ofon Kenaan. Ọtzọk ominanwa nwa k'ọbada, obiro oyim-ẹ abẹ.
GEN 38:3 Ominanwa nwa okwu otzima ibhọr, ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng, kwa bẹ akpe Ẹr.
GEN 38:4 Ominanwa nwa obiro okwu otzima ibhọr, ọmaan ojinọng, ọkka ọkpẹ-ẹ Ọnan.
GEN 38:5 K'ogbe kw'iwa Juda owobh ka Kezib, wa ominanwa nwa obiro okwu otzima ibhọr, ọmaan nnwa kw'ijinọng ọdọdọk, ọkpẹ-ẹ Shẹla.
GEN 38:6 Mada va mba abari, otte kwabẹ Juda ọtzọkha kwanọng kw'okpen Tamar ọnang ocheden-nwa kwẹ Ẹr, k'ọbada.
GEN 38:7 Yina, Ẹr kw'ode ocheden-nwa kwa Juda osi ẹmmaana-tzama k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Mando kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọkha akpen pẹ, ope.
GEN 38:8 Mada Ẹr ọkk'ọpa, Juda oben Ọnan bi, “Kọ akhaambi asi mach'ẹmmaana chaman ede. Rọhng atza ayima ttara kwanọng kw'agbaanakka opfunọng, ifha orenga ma kọ, agbaanakka ọkhaama va.”
GEN 38:9 Yina, mada Ọnan orong bi, nnwa kpenamkpen kw'obhon ma ndaak sa kwanọng kw'ọgbaanọkka, kwẹ kode. Ogbe kpenamkpen kw'oyim kwanọng ọgbaanọkka abẹ, ọm-ọja adima ọbhari k'iyaan ifha kwanọng nwa oningi ibhọr otzim, ọmaan va ọnang ọgbaanọkka kw'ọkk'ọpa.
GEN 38:10 Wa odik nwa ode odik-ttama k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọkha akpen p'Ọnan.
GEN 38:11 Mẹ wọ, Juda oben ọnyẹ kwẹ Tamar bi, “Kọ rọhng atza awobha epopa k'atte k'ọhọhm, matzẹmaa nnwa kwaam Shẹla opyiri k'odem kw'ọtzọkh-ọ k'ọbada e.” Wa obeni mando okhuri da ojor-ẹ bi, “Bẹ afha afhu Shẹla ofhu macha bẹ afhu ayok.” Wa Tamar obina ọkpa nnam k'otte k'ọhọhm.
GEN 38:12 Okwu otzuma k'ogbe mẹ, kwanọng kwa Juda, kw'ode nnwa kwa Shua okwu ope. K'ogbe kwa Juda okk'ottem-dini k'obo kwa kwanọng ọn-ọkhaama, obina ochina ka Timna, kẹ da bẹ am-aphyiri arukhimaan pẹ ophyubha, oyokh-odikkobh kwẹ Hira kw'ofon Adulam ọtzọn-e abẹ.
GEN 38:13 Mada bẹ agbaakhi Tamar bi, “Otte kw'odim kwọ oreng k'eden okwuma k'obhon kwa Timna bi, ọtza ophyiri arukhimaan pẹ ophyubha.”
GEN 38:14 Tamar ọtza ọwọra epopa-nya, ọtzọkha ibara s'ide ọphyọhng-ọphyọhng obubha itzitzikha sẹ, ọtza owobha ẹwọr k'ẹbaakhamma ch'obhon kw'Ẹnayim, kw'owobh k'eden ch'achin k'obhon kwa Timna. Wa Tamar ore bi, Shẹla ọkk'ọn-ọbara k'odem kw'ira ọn-ọtzọkh-ẹ k'ọbada, wa mando kosi.
GEN 38:15 Mada Juda ọrẹ-ẹ, ochibhi bi ọzaza-kwanọng wọ, da ọkk'ọphyọhng otzima obubha itzitzikha sẹ.
GEN 38:16 Wa Juda korong bi, kwanọng kwa nnwa kwẹ wọ, on-ojekha okhebh-ẹ k'eden okhubha, oben bi, “Kọ kwu, tte nyim-ọ abẹ.” Kwanọng kwa nnwa ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ ánang-m mbọng idikha kaam nkher bi, nyim-ọ abẹ o?”
GEN 38:17 Juda oben bi, “Kaam ńnọbha ovu-nwa k'avu paam ńdọhm ńchen-ọ.” Ọn-ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ na abhikha ọttọhk kpenamkpen fọ, fa kaam nhok maa, atzima ovu-nwa nwuma akwu o?”
GEN 38:18 Mẹ wọ, Juda ọben bi, “Mbọng fa kaam mfha mmikha ma o?” Kwanọng nwa obhin-ẹ bi, “Kọ bhikha ogimma kwọ kw'ẹdọhngi kw'otzim che chọ, ọmaana ochikhura kw'atzim k'ọbọhk.” Mẹ wọ, ọtzọkha ekpo mbya otte ọbọhk ọnang-ẹ. Mada ọkk'ọsa mando, kwanọng nwa okhera oyim-ẹ abẹ, mẹ wọ, Tamar otzima ibhọr sa Juda ọkhẹ-ẹ.
GEN 38:19 Mẹ wọ, Tamar ofona ọtza obhona ọbara, obiro ọtzọkha ẹnya chẹ ch'epopa, ọfọra.
GEN 38:20 Mada Juda ọn-ọtzọhmi oyokh-odikkobh kwẹ Hira kw'ofon Adulam, ttara ovu-nwa kw'otzima obhek ekpo pyẹ py'obhik ka kwanọng nwa ka mbọhk, ọtza opyiri, kwanọng nwa kokhebh.
GEN 38:21 Iwa Hira ọn-ọbọbh ajinọng bani p'obhon nwa bi, “Ọzaza-kwanọng nwa kw'ira owobh m'ọkkadeden ọkhaan-ọkhaan kw'Ẹnayim, ko o?” Bẹ abhin-ẹ bi, “Ọzaza-kwanọng manda wani ma otzim-om-owobha.”
GEN 38:22 Mẹ wọ, Hira ofona ọkpa nnam kẹ da Juda owobh, ọgbaakh-ẹ bi, “Kaam kẹ kinne e. Ayongi mẹ, ajinọng p'arukhi abaanga mẹ agbaakh-m bi, ọzaza-kwanọng manda wani m'ibe nnuma otzim-om-owobha.”
GEN 38:23 Mẹ wọ, Juda oben bi, “Tte kẹ otzima ekpo mbyuma ọrọhng, oni mando ode, mon-óde ọhamma-dik k'anọng k'itzitzikha e. Kaam arang nna mbiri nsi, mgba nkk'ọ ovu-nwa nnanga bi achen-ẹ, kẹ kare.”
GEN 38:24 Okwu opyiri ọttọhk k'aphe attaan, Juda okwu ọbhaanga bi, “Tamar kw'ode kwanọng kwa nnwa kwọ osi azaza-kpen maa, okk'ibhọhr otzima.” Iwa Juda ọn-ọnang ẹfa bi, “Bẹ atzim-ẹ ayin k'iyaan, ifha bẹ akwọm-ẹ ekhekhebhi.”
GEN 38:25 Mada bẹ atzim-ẹ ayin k'iyaan bi bẹ akwọmi, Tamar ọtzọhm ẹkkaabha ọnang otte kw'odim, oben bi, “Kaam ndim ibhọr nnang ojinọng kw'ọkhaam ekpo mbya e. Kọ kkeri ogimma nwa kw'ẹdọhngi, ọmaana ochikhura nwa s'ode na afha atzin pyẹ ka more.”
GEN 38:26 Mada Juda ore ekpo mbyuma, otzin pyẹ, oben bi, “Kẹ wọ otzor-otzor e, kaam nkk'ntta k'osisi kwaam da nnẹ-ẹ ndọk, nnang nnwa kwaam Shẹla.” Wa Juda Tamar abẹ dọk koyim.
GEN 38:27 Mada ogbe on-opyiri kw'ọmaan, wa va afa p'ijinọng bọ awobh-ẹ k'ẹbhọr.
GEN 38:28 Mada om-okhonga bi ọmaan, nnwa wani oyin ọbọhk k'iyaan, kwanọng kw'okker-ẹ ọmaan ọtzọkha ididikha ọkpẹ-ẹ k'ọbọhk oben bi, “Oyok nwa wọ ochi eden oyin.”
GEN 38:29 Mada nnwa nwa on-obiro ọkpa nnam okhe ọbọhk k'ẹtzaanga, ọgbaanọkka on-ochi eden oyin, kwanọng kw'okker-ẹ ọmaan on-oben bi, “Manda wọ kwa kọ an-areng ayin o!” Mẹ wọ, bẹ kpẹ-ẹ Pẹrẹz.
GEN 38:30 Ayongi mẹ, ọgbaanọkka obiro oyin ttara edik ch'ekhori-ihiho k'ọbọhk, bẹ akpẹ-ẹ Zẹra.
GEN 39:1 Mada iwa anọng p'Ishimayẹl akk'Josẹph atzima achina k'Ijip, wa Pọtipha kw'ode ọkhaan-nọng wani kwa Phero, obiro ode oho kw'anọng p'abaabh-ẹ, odebh Josẹph ka mbọhk anọng mba.
GEN 39:2 Mada Josẹph orukhi k'ọhọhm kw'itta kwẹ kw'ofon Ijip, wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ttar-ẹ, obiro osi idik ijibh inang-ẹ.
GEN 39:3 Mada itta kwẹ on-ore bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ttara Josẹph, obiro ore bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang-ẹ owujibha k'idik kpenamkpen s'osi,
GEN 39:4 wa Josẹph ọtzọkha ọphyaam k'itzitzikha sẹ, ọn-ọtzọkh-ẹ mach'ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ. Mẹ wọ, Pọtipha ọn-ọtzọkha ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ọkhaam ọnang-ẹ bi, okkeri.
GEN 39:5 Ttẹwọr k'ogbe kw'iwa otte ẹhọhmmọr chẹ ọmaana ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ọkhaam ọbọhk ọnang Josẹph bi okkeri, wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oreng Josẹph abẹ odo ẹhọhmmọr ch'Ojipnọng nwa. Wa ẹdaa ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi en-ewobh k'ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ọkhaam k'ọhọhm ttara k'iwoni sẹ.
GEN 39:6 Mẹ wọ, odik kw'iwa obiro ọkpakha Pọtipha oyongi ọchattọhk f'ochi kode, da okk'idik biphyir s'ọkhaam ọbọhk ọtta ọnang Josẹph bi, okkeri. Wa Josẹph ojibhi odikkobh obiro ode ọnọng kw'ofhu ka for bi gbuk.
GEN 39:7 Okwu opyiri k'ogbe mẹ, kwanọng kw'itta kwẹ om-otzini chen okkeri Josẹph adadaakha-chen, oben-ẹ bi, “Kwu yim-m abẹ.”
GEN 39:8 Yina, Josẹph obhum, oben kwanọng nwa bi, “Itta kwaam okk'idik sẹ s'ọkhaam biphyir ọbọhk ọtta ọnang-m bi, nkkeri. Odik manda wani kw'obiro ọkpakh-ẹ dọk kode.
GEN 39:9 M'ọhọhm nwa, ọnọng ọdọdọk kw'ọkhaam ẹfa ọyọhnga kaam kode. Odik manda wani kw'itta kwaam obiro ọram-m, kw'oyongi kọ kw'ade kwanọng kwẹ, kode. Kaam nna nnenga yan nsi itzama, ttara ọkhọngkwuri-dik-dema nwa, mpyibh k'itzitzikha s'Ibinọkpaabyi o?”
GEN 39:10 Chibhi da kwanọng nwa ọyakhi Josẹph atzim k'ewu kpenamkpen bi, oyim-ẹ abẹ, Josẹph kokher.
GEN 39:11 Wa ewu dani, Josẹph ọtza odim k'ọhọhm bi, otza osi itzọhmbọhk sẹ, k'ogbe kw'ọtzọhmnọng ọdọdọk manda wani oni k'ọhọhm ode.
GEN 39:12 Kwanọng nwa ọbọkha Josẹph k'ittọhk-kwuma s'ọpaabh k'erin, ọben bi, “Kwu yim-m abẹ!” Yina, Josẹph otte ittọhk-kwuma sẹ ọbọhk ọnang-ẹ, ọrọbh oyin k'iyaan.
GEN 39:13 Mada kwanọng nwa ore bi, ọkk'ọrọbha ọjẹ-ẹ ittọhk-kwuma sẹ ka mbọhk sẹ oyin k'iyaan,
GEN 39:14 on-oyeri atzọhmnọng pẹ p'ọhọhm, oben bẹ bi, “Bọng akk'ara, odim kwaam otzim oHiburu-nọng nwa okwu ma bi, okwu ọnang man che-tzama! Odimi okhebh-m k'ọhọhm bi, okwu oyim-m abẹ, yina, kaam nna mkpẹbhi ẹmọng k'ẹrọng e.
GEN 39:15 Mada ọbhaang ẹmọng cha mkpẹbhi nnor ẹkkaana, mẹ kw'ọn-ọrọbhi oji ittọhk-kwuma sẹ ma oyin k'iyaan e.”
GEN 39:16 Ọn-ọtzọkha ittọhk-kwuma nna ohok maa, itta kwa Josẹph okhuna.
GEN 39:17 Mẹ wọ, ọtzọkha odik nwa ọgbaakh-ẹ bi, “Obira nwa kw'ode oHiburu-nọng, kw'atzim achena man ma, odimi okhebh-m k'ọhọhm bi, okwu oyim-m abẹ ọnang-m che-tzama.
GEN 39:18 Mada ọn-ọbhaang ẹmọng cha kaam mkpẹbhi nnor ẹkkaana, ọn-ọrọbh oyin k'iyaan oji ittọhk-kwuma sẹ ma ttar-m.”
GEN 39:19 Mada itta kwa Josẹph ọbhaang odik kwa kwanọng kwẹ ọgbaakh-ẹ, oben bi, “Manda wọ kw'obira kwọ osi-m e”, ettem ẹdọkh-ẹ k'idendama.
GEN 39:20 Mẹ wọ, itta kwa Josẹph, ọbọkha Josẹph ọtzọhm mgbakkọhbh, k'ibe sa bẹ agbakhi agbakkọkkọhbha p'ọvaarnọng. Wa bẹ ahokh-ẹ kẹ. Yina, mada Josẹph owobh ka mgbakkọhbh,
GEN 39:21 wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ttara Josẹph, osi ejibha ọnang-ẹ, obiro ọsẹ-ẹ ọtzọkha ọphyaam k'itzitzikha s'oho kw'akker-agbakkọkkọhbha.
GEN 39:22 Mẹ wọ, oho nwa kw'akker-agbakkọkkọhbha ọtzọkha Josẹph osi oho kw'agbakkọkkọhbha biphyir, obiro ọnang-ẹ ẹfa ch'odik kpenamkpen k'ọgbakkọbh-họhm.
GEN 39:23 Wa oho kw'akker-agbakkọkkọhbha ọn-ọrọbha mbọhk sẹ k'odik kpenamkpen kw'oyim ọnang Josẹph bi okkeri, okhuri da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ttara Josẹph, obiro ọnang-ẹ owujibha k'odik kpenamkpen kw'osi.
GEN 40:1 K'ogbe wani, wa ọnọng kw'ọm-ọnang ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip atzuk, ọmaana ọnọng kw'om-osi ọchattọhk fẹ, akhaam ottotto ttara itta kwabẹ, kw'ode Phero, ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip.
GEN 40:2 Wa Phero ọdọkh-ẹ ttara atzọhmnọng mba pẹ afa, p'ade oho kw'anọng p'am-anang ọvaarnọng atzuk, ọmaana oho kw'anọng p'am-asi ọchattọhk anang ọvaarnọng.
GEN 40:3 Wa ọtzọkha bẹ ọgbak k'ọhọhm kw'oho kw'akker-agbakkọkkọhbha, k'ọgbakkọhbh-họhm nwuma wani kwa bẹ agbakhi Josẹph.
GEN 40:4 Mando kw'oho kw'akker-agbakkọkkọhbha ọtzọk bẹ otte ọbọhk anang Josẹph, Josẹph okkeri bẹ. Mada anọng mba afa akk'mgbakkọhbh ayima k'ogbe mẹ,
GEN 40:5 k'erungiwu dani, ajinọng mba afa, oyok kw'om-okhe atzuk ọnang ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip, ọmaana oyok kw'om-osi ọchattọhk, pa bẹ agbakhi k'ọgbakkọhbh-họhm, ọnọng-ọnọng ọttaara idachen sẹ s'ikhaam ẹjaakhi ch'ede ngọmi ka s'oyok ọttaar.
GEN 40:6 Mada Josẹph okwu k'ekpebha, on-ore bi, bẹ awobh nkwu-osisi.
GEN 40:7 Mẹ wọ, ọn-ọbọbh akhaan-nọng pa Phero pa bẹ atzọni ayima mgbakkọhbh, k'ọhọhm kw'itta kwẹ bi, “Ode yan kwa nttem ibhemi bọng mando mayina o?”
GEN 40:8 Bẹ abhin-ẹ bi, “Man anọng afa ọttaar ọdachen. Yina, ọnọng kw'osi ẹjaakhi ch'ọdachen mva ọnang man kode.” Josẹph on-oben bẹ bi, “Tzotzokhaan bọng gbaakh-m ọdachen fabọng, Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ọm-ọnang ẹjaakhi ch'ọdachen biphyir e.”
GEN 40:9 Mẹ wọ, oho kw'anọng p'am-anang ọvaarnọng atzuk, ọgbaak Josẹph idachen sẹ, oben-ẹ bi, “Kaam nttaar idachen da echi cha grep ebe-m k'itzitzikha.
GEN 40:10 Echi nda cha grep ẹkhaam abọhnga attaan. Mada abọhnga mba ayini agbok bi kpaar, bẹ attẹwọr asi adodo, an-awọm aduk p'agrep bẹ abira akhor.
GEN 40:11 K'ọbọhk kwaam, ndima nkkọbh kw'ọvaar Phero, kwa myaan aduk mba p'agrep ngẹ.”
GEN 40:12 Mẹ wọ, Josẹph ọgbaakh-ẹ bi, “Ẹjaakhi ch'idachen sọ ede bi, abọhnga mba attaan, abe anang iwu ittaan.
GEN 40:13 K'iwu ittaan k'itzitzikha, Phero ọ́rọbh-ọrọbha ka mgbakkọhbh, obiro ọkpa nnam ọ́nang-ọ ewobha chọ. Kọ ábira ákhẹ-ẹ nkkọbh ka mbọhk, mach'iwa am-akkekkeni asi.
GEN 40:14 Yina, mada idik ijibh inang-ọ, k'ọphyaam fọ, tzotzokhaan kaam karaama o. Gbaak Phero bi, kaam nwobh ka o, ifha akkaan-m nyin ma mgbakkọhbh nna.
GEN 40:15 Kaam iwa bẹ abọkh-m k'ẹfa k'irek s'aHiburu atzima akwu ma. Kaambi ma wọ, kaam odik manda wani kinji kw'ira on-orenga mẹ nyima mgbakkọhbh nna.”
GEN 40:16 Mẹ wọ, mada oho kw'anọng p'am-asi ọchattọhk f'ọvaarnọng ore bi, ẹjaakhi ch'idachen s'oyok ekk'ejibha ẹnang-ẹ, on-oben Josẹph bi, “Kaam mbiri nttaara idachen e. K'idachen, ndọhk okhiriba ọttaan fa brẹd k'eho.
GEN 40:17 K'ikhiriba s'inan k'ebir-ebir kw'ayok, ẹchakpo k'adem-k'adem pya Phero om-ochi pya bẹ akk'asa ewobha kẹ. Yina, ọnọhn f'ẹrọng om-okwu ochi ẹchakpo mbya pya ndọhk k'eho.”
GEN 40:18 Josẹph oben bi, “Ẹjaakhi ede bi, okhiriba mva ọttaan, obe ọnang iwu ittaan.
GEN 40:19 K'iwu ittaan k'itzitzikha, Phero ọ́rọbh-ọrọbha ka mgbakkọhbh, obiro ọ́nang ẹfa bi, bẹ akpaar-ọ eho, bẹ abira ádabh obukhi kwọ k'echi, ọnọhn mach'attẹrẹ áchi ayaara pọ biphyir.”
GEN 40:20 M'ewu nduma ch'ettong ittaan, Phero obher atzọhmnọng pẹ biphyir, osi ọdadaami kw'otzim ojima ewu ch'ọmaan. Ọnang ẹfa bẹ atza arọbha oho kw'anọng p'am-anang ọvaarnọng atzuk, ọmaana oho kw'anọng p'am-asi ọchattọhk anang ọvaarnọng, obe bẹ k'ottem kw'ayok:
GEN 40:21 ọkpa nnam ọnang oho kw'anọng p'am-anang-ẹ atzuk ewobha chẹ maa, om-obiro okhe Phero atzuk ka mbọhk, mach'iwa om-okkekkeni osi.
GEN 40:22 Yina, ọn-ọnang ẹfa bi, bẹ akpaara eho ch'oho kw'anọng p'am-asi ọchattọhk anang ọvaarnọng, bẹ abira adabh obukhi kwẹ k'echi atzor macha Josẹph ọkk'ẹjaakhi ọtzam ọsa.
GEN 40:23 Yina, oho kw'anọng p'am-anang ọvaarnọng atzuk, ọn-ọraama bi ọgbaak ọvaarnọng odik okhuri Josẹph kw'iwa otzim owobh ka mgbakkọhbh.
GEN 41:1 Mada cho afa akk'akwọbha, Phero ọttaara idachen: k'idachen ọttaar da obe k'ọraanga kwa Nile ọkhaan-ọkhaan,
GEN 41:2 ore da abhaam azenamfa p'ajibhi for, abira ade bi dọrọdọrọ ayini k'ọraanga kwa Nile akwu achi araraari p'ameni m'ọraanga ọkhaan-ọkhaan.
GEN 41:3 Ayongi mẹ, abhaam azenamfa adọdọk p'akkokh-okkokhi abira apyibh ka for, ayin abaanga mbonggo p'ajibhi for p'awobh m'ọraanga kwa Nile ọkhaan-ọkhaan.
GEN 41:4 Abhaam mba p'akkokh-okkokhi abira apyibh ka for achi p'ajibhi ka for. Wa Phero ọphyọbha k'ọda.
GEN 41:5 Iwa Phero obiro ọtza oyima, ọn-ọttaara idachen idọdọk. Ore ẹbọkparin dani ch'etzim abhọra azenamfa p'abari ẹfa, abira ajibh-ojibh.
GEN 41:6 Ayongi mba, abọkpa-bhọra azenamfa adọdọk p'akkokh-okkokhi, p'ọphapha kw'ofon k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin ogwum, abira ayin.
GEN 41:7 Mẹ wọ, abọkpa-bhọra mba azenamfa p'akkokh-okkokhi amyi azenamfa p'ajibhi for biphyir. Mada Phero ọkk'ọda ọphyọbha, mẹ kw'on-orong bi, idachen s'ọttaar.
GEN 41:8 Mada ewu en-ehobh, achibhi ayak Phero atzim, ofona mẹ, ọtzọhm anọng bi, bẹ ayeri anọng p'am-asi mbọhng biphyir, ọmaana atzim-nọnga-nọng kpenamkpen makhọra Ijip. Mada bẹ akwu apyiri, ọgbaak bẹ ọdachen f'ọttaar. Yina, ọnọng manda wani kw'ofha osi ẹjaakhi ch'ọdachen fa Phero kode.
GEN 41:9 Mẹ wọ, oho kw'anọng p'am-anang Phero atzuk, oben bi, “Mayina kaam nkk'ottotto kwaam njima.
GEN 41:10 Wa ọkhaam ogbe kwa Phero ọdọkhi ettem ttara atzọhmnọng pẹ, wa ọtzọhm kaam, ọmaana oho kw'anọng p'am-asi ọchattọhk mgbakkọhbh, k'ọhọhm kw'oho kw'akker-agbakkọkkọhbha.
GEN 41:11 Wa k'erungiwu dani, man anọng afa mọttaar ọdachen ngọmi-ngọmi, idachen kpenamkpen ikhaama ẹjaakhi chẹ.
GEN 41:12 Wa mọtzọkha ọdachen mva ọgbaak oHiburu-dikkobh wani kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kw'oho kw'akker-agbakkọkkọhbha. Wa mọgbaakh-ẹ ọdachen faman, kẹ obiro osi ẹjaakhi ch'ọdachen mva ọnang man.
GEN 41:13 Wa idik nnuma iyini itzor mach'osi ẹjaakhi. Kaam wa bẹ ọkpa nnam ọnang-m ewobha chaam, yina, wa bẹ arena oyok k'edik.”
GEN 41:14 Iwa Phero ọtzọhm anọng bi, bẹ atzima Josẹph akwu. Mẹ ẹba mẹ, bẹ atza arọbh-ẹ k'ọgbakkọhbh-họhm atzima akwu. Mada Josẹph okk'agbaphyubha pẹ ophyiri, obiro obhona ọbara f'ọfọr ka for, ofona ọtza okhebha Phero.
GEN 41:15 Phero oben Josẹph bi, “Kaam nttaar idachen, s'ọnọng manda wani oni ẹjaakhi ọfha ọnang. Yina, kaam nkk'mmaanga bi, kọ am-asi ẹjaakhi ch'ọdachen anang anọng.”
GEN 41:16 Josẹph obhina Phero bi, “Kaam ẹfa kingaam bi, mminsi ẹjaakhi ch'ọdachen nnang anọng e. Yina, Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ọ́nang ebhina ẹkkakka e.”
GEN 41:17 Phero ọgbaak Josẹph bi, “Kaam nttaar idachen da mbe k'ọraanga kwa Nile ọkhaan-ọkhaan.
GEN 41:18 Nne da abhaam azenamfa p'ajibhi for ayini k'ọraanga kwa Nile, akwu achi araraari m'ọraanga ọkhaan-ọkhaan.
GEN 41:19 Ogbe k'obhiri, abhaam azenamfa adọdọk p'akkokh-okkokhi abira aphyibh ka for, ayin m'ọraanga. Kaam mada ogbe odede e, abhaam p'akkokhi ka for mando ndimi mminna m'irek nna s'Ijip.
GEN 41:20 Abhaam mba p'akkokh-okkokhi, abira aphyibh ka for an-achi p'ajibhi ka for p'ira achi eden ayin.
GEN 41:21 Chibhi da bẹ akk'ayok acha biphyir, bẹ atzima akkeri ka for macha bẹ adede. Mando kwa mgbe mphyọbha k'ọda.
GEN 41:22 “K'idachen ọdọdọk, kaam nne da abọkpa-bhọra azenamfa p'ajibhi for ameni k'erin dani.
GEN 41:23 Ayongi mbuma, abọkpa-bhọra azenamfa adọdọk p'akkokh-okkokhi abira amen k'ebọkparin dani, ọphapha kw'iyoma kw'ofon kẹ da ewuchen em-eyin ogwuma bẹ.
GEN 41:24 Mẹ wọ, abọkpa-bhọra mba azenamfa p'akkokh-okkokhi amyi azenamfa p'ajibhi for biphyir. Kaam ndọkha idik nna biphyir mgbaak anọng p'am-asi mbọhng biphyir, yina, ọnọng kw'ọfha osi ẹjaakhi ọnang-m kode.”
GEN 41:25 Mẹ wọ, Josẹph ọgbaak Phero bi, “Ọdachen mva ode odem wani, fẹ obiro ọkhaama ẹjaakhi dani. Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹjaakhi ọsa ọnang Phero k'odik kw'ọkhami bi osi.
GEN 41:26 Ọdachen mva ọkhaam ẹjaakhi dani, ch'ede bi: Abhaam mbuma azenamfa p'ajibhi for, abe anang cho azenamfa. Abọkpa-bhọra mbuma azenamfa p'ajibhi for, abira abe anang cho azenamfa.
GEN 41:27 Abhaam mbuma azenamfa p'akkokh-okkokhi p'akpong-nnam ayin, ọmaana abọkpa-bhọra mbuma azenamfa p'ani for ajibhi, p'ọphapha kw'ofon k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin, abe anang cho azenamfa p'okwo f'ideden.
GEN 41:28 “Itta, ode macha mgbaakh-ọ bi, Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹjaakhi ọsa ọnang Phero k'odik kw'ọkhami bi, osi.
GEN 41:29 Ka cho azenamfa k'itzitzikha, irek s'Ijip ikhaama ọchattọhk k'ọhaabh.
GEN 41:30 Yina, cho azenamfa p'okwo f'ideden án-atzor cho p'ọhaabh nnam. Mẹ wọ, anọng áraama ọhaabh f'Ijip ọraama, okwo f'ideden obiro ọ́nyaami ochi irek nna.
GEN 41:31 “Anọng ogbe kw'ọhaabh f'irek nna dọk ájima, okhuri da okwo mva f'ideden ọ́n-ọgaangi oyong-oyongi.
GEN 41:32 Wa Phero ọttaar idachen nna rani k'adem afa, okhuri da iwa Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ochibhi ọtzam ọsa. Ogbe kobhir, Ibinọkpaabyi osi kwẹ osi.
GEN 41:33 “Mẹ wọ, tte Phero oror ojinọng wani kw'ọkhaam etzina, ọmaana ekkoji, ifha ọnang ojinọng nwa ẹfa ch'otzima okkeri irek s'Ijip.
GEN 41:34 Tte Phero otzekha atzọhmnọng p'akkeri irek nna bi, bẹ atzọkha ọchattọhk k'Ijip, okhung wani k'akhung azen ahok, ka cho azenamfa mba p'ọhaabh.
GEN 41:35 Tte ofona k'ẹfa cha Phero bi, ka cho azenamfa mba p'ọhaabh p'akwu, anọng mba atzọkha ọchattọhk ahok k'idedenmon.
GEN 41:36 Bẹ aye ọchattọhk mva anang anọng p'ẹkhọma nda, ifha bẹ atzima fẹ ka cho azenamfa mba p'okwo f'ideden okwu k'Ijip, ifha okwo mva f'ideden oningi ẹkhọma nda odimi.”
GEN 41:37 Iwa Phero ọmaana akhaan-nọng pẹ biphyir are bi, kwẹ okk'ojibha.
GEN 41:38 Mẹ wọ, Phero ọbọbh atzọhmnọng pẹ bi, “Na mofha ore ọnọng kw'ode mach'ojinọng nwa, kw'ọkhaam ekkoji ch'efon k'Ibinọkpaabyi o?”
GEN 41:39 Mẹ wọ, Phero oben Josẹph bi, “Mada Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọ ẹjaakhi ch'idik nna biphyir ọnanga, ọnọng ọdọdọk kw'ọkhaam etzina ọmaana ekkoji cha kọ akhaam kode.
GEN 41:40 Kọ án-ade oho k'ọvaar-dimpa kwaam, anọng paam biphyir an-ahakha eho anang ndọhna sọ. Orenga k'ikpokpobha s'ẹvaar sẹ-sẹ s'akhaam ńna ndima mbar nyọhng-ọ.”
GEN 41:41 Iwa Phero oben Josẹph bi, “Kaam nkk'ọ ọbọhk k'eho nnana bi, adabh irek s'Ijip makhọra.”
GEN 41:42 Mando kwa Phero ọwọr ẹbaanga chẹ ch'ẹnọhna, okhe Josẹph. Ọtzọkha ẹnya cha bẹ atzim ndik-nyokhasẹ ọkkakka asi, ọfọr-ẹ, yina ọn-ọtzọk ogimma kwa gol ọkhẹ-ẹ k'ẹdọhngi.
GEN 41:43 Ọtzọkh-ẹ ọnana k'ọkpaar kwa nnyanyaang mmindọr, bẹ ayaar-ẹ mach'ojukwa kwẹ, anọng arenga k'itzitzikha am-awuri amọng aben bi, “Bọng kebh-ẹ eden!” Mẹ wọ, Phero ọnang Josẹph ẹfa ch'ọdabh irek s'Ijip biphyir.
GEN 41:44 Phero obiro oben Josẹph bi, “Kaam Phero wọ nde ọvaarnọng, yina, ẹfa eni ka kọ efon, ọnọng kw'ọ́khaama ẹfa ch'oyebh ọbọhk kwẹ obiro ode obho kwẹ o, makhọra irek s'Ijip kode.”
GEN 41:45 Phero on-okpe Josẹph, Zaphenat-Panea. Obiro ọtzọkha ominanwa kw'okpen Asenat kw'ode nnwa kwa Potiphera, ọnang-ẹ k'ọbada. Wa Potiphera ode ọfọhnẹja kwa On. Wa Josẹph orenga ọkhọri irek s'Ijip bi waam.
GEN 41:46 Mando kwa Josẹph obin k'itzitzikha sa Phero, orenga ọkpaanga irek s'Ijip biphyir. Wa Josẹph ode ojinọng kw'ode cho ẹrọbh obhiri jobh, k'ogbe kw'ọttẹwọr osi ọtzọhm ọmaana Phero, kw'ode ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip.
GEN 41:47 Ma cho mba azenamfa p'ọhaabh, wa irerek ihak for ijibh ekpo.
GEN 41:48 Josẹph ọtzọkha ọchattọhk k'Ijip biphyir, ma cho mba azenamfa p'ọhaabh, ohok k'ideden-mon. K'odedenmon kpenamkpen, wa ohokhi ọchattọhk-dem fa bẹ ayaabh m'obhon nwuma.
GEN 41:49 Mando kwa Josẹph oye ẹchakpo mach'abọkpa k'ọhaabh mach'oyeyeng kw'ọraanga kw'ideden. Wa ọchattọhk mva ọhaabhi maa, ọkwọbha obhik ohohok, da bẹ ani dọk afha abhik.
GEN 41:50 Yina ogbe kw'okwo mva f'ideden opyiri, wa Asenat kw'ode ominanwa kwa Potiphera kw'ode ọfọhnẹja kwa On, okk'va afa p'ijinọng ọmaana ọnang Josẹph.
GEN 41:51 Josẹph okpe ocheden-nwa kwẹ, Manasẹ, oben bi, “Ofon da Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọsa bi, kaam nnaama ihem saam biphyir, ọmaana efonamma ch'otte kwaam biphyir.”
GEN 41:52 Okpe nnwa kw'ottong afa Ephraim, oben bi, “Ofon da Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'aam ọsa bi, ngaama va m'irek nna s'ihem saam.”
GEN 41:53 Mada cho azenamfa mba p'ọhaabh k'irek s'Ijip akk'akwa akwọbha,
GEN 41:54 cho mbonggo azenamfa p'okwo f'ideden attẹwọr, mach'iwa Josẹph ọkk'ẹjaakhi ọtzam ọsa. Wa okwo f'ideden owobh makhọra idibhon biphyir. Yina, wa ọchattọhk owobh k'ọhaabh makhọra Ijip.
GEN 41:55 K'ogbe kw'okwo ọn-ọttẹwọr ọkhaama anọng p'Ijip, bẹ atza abhom amọng p'ọchattọhk akpẹkhi Phero. Ofona mẹ, Phero oben anọng p'Ijip biphyir bi, “Bọng nọhng ka Josẹph, bọng asi odik kpenamkpen kw'oben bi, bọng asi.”
GEN 41:56 K'ogbe kw'okwo mva f'ideden ọkk'ọn-ọnyaami k'ẹkhọma nda biphyir, Josẹph okwunga ihọhm s'iwa bẹ aye ọchattọhk, okpe ọchattọhk anang anọng p'Ijip, okhuri bi, wa okwo f'ideden owobh k'Ijip makhọra.
GEN 41:57 Wa anọng abina k'idibhon biphyir atza adebh ọchattọhk ka mbọhk sa Josẹph k'Ijip, okhuri bi, wa okwo f'ideden ọgaang-ọgaangi makhọra.
GEN 42:1 Mada Jekọb ọbhaang bi, ọchattọhk owobh k'Ijip, ọbọbh va pẹ p'ijinọng bi, “Ode yan kwa bọng atzima am-abe akkeri ayok k'ikkokkon o?”
GEN 42:2 On-ochina ororo oben bẹ bi, “Kaam nkk'mmaanga bi, ọchattọhk owobh k'ẹkhọma ch'Ijip. Bọng hakha atza adebh ọchattọhk atzima akwu mochi, ifha moning ope k'okwo.”
GEN 42:3 Mẹ wọ, votte pa Josẹph anọng-ho jobh abina achina k'Ijip bi, bẹ atza adebh ọchattọhk.
GEN 42:4 Yina, wa Jekọb Bẹnjamin kw'ode ọgbaanọkka kwa Josẹph ọbọhk kotte bi, ọtzọn abọgbaanotte abẹ, okhuri da ojor-ẹ bi, itzama ifha itto ikhebh-ẹ.
GEN 42:5 Mẹ wọ, wa va pa Jekọb attar k'ẹkhaan ch'anọng p'achin k'Ijip bi, bẹ atza adebh ọchattọhk, okhuri da iwa okwo f'ideden obiro owobha k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan.
GEN 42:6 M'ogbe nwuma, wa Josẹph on-otzim ededen k'Ijip, obiro ode ọnọng kw'om-okpe ọchattọhk ọnang anọng biphyir. Mẹ wọ, mada votte pa Josẹph apyiri k'Ijip, bẹ arakha attima otzitzikha fabẹ k'irerek k'ikpokpobha.
GEN 42:7 Mada Josẹph ore votte pẹ bi kpaar otzin bẹ. Yina, wa osi nkkari bi bẹ kotzini, on-otzima ọwọhng kw'ọgaang-ọgaangi ọgbaak bẹ atzim, ọbọbh bẹ bi, “Bọng afon man akwu ma?” Bẹ abhina bi, “Mofon k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan okwu bi, mokwu odebh ọchattọhk e.”
GEN 42:8 Kaambi ode bi wa Josẹph okk'votte pẹ otzina, wa bẹ kẹ katzini.
GEN 42:9 Mẹ wọ, Josẹph ojima ọdachen f'iwa ọkk'ọttaara okhuri bẹ, on-oben bẹ bi, “Bọng ade nttọ, bọng akk'akwa bi, akwu arom obhon kwaman, ifha bọng aronga irinikhum s'irerek saman.”
GEN 42:10 Bẹ abhina bi, “Mma e, itta kwaman, kwẹ mando kode. Atzọhmnọng pọ akwu bi, akwu adebh ọchattọhk.
GEN 42:11 Man biphyir mode ajinọng p'afon k'otte wani. Atzọhmnọng pọ agbaakhi odik-ọkka e, man nttọ kode e.”
GEN 42:12 Josẹph oben bẹ bi, “Ibhora! Bọng akwu bi, akwu aronga irinikhum s'irerek saman.”
GEN 42:13 Bẹ an-abhina bi, “Itta, iwa maman atzọhmnọng pọ mode anọng jobh obhiri afa, p'otte wani kw'orukhi ka Kenaan obhoni e. Okpong-nnam kwaman owobh kẹ ttara otte kwaman e, yina, oyok wani k'ottem kwa man anọng jobh obhiri afa, k'akpen dọk kode.”
GEN 42:14 Josẹph ochina ororo oben bẹ bi, “Odik nwa ode macha mgbaakhi bọng bi, bọng ade nttọ!
GEN 42:15 Ifha ode mẹ moronga odik-ọkka, eyoma chabọng éde bi, bọng atza atzima okpong-nnam kwabọng atzima akwu. Kaam nwọhngi ttara akpen pa Phero bi, kw'oyongi bi bọng asi mando, bọng kábhana e.
GEN 42:16 Bọng dọhm ọnọng wani k'ottem kwabọng ọkpa nnam, ọtza otzima okpong-nnam nwuma kwabọng okwu, ayok mbangga awobha ka mgbakkọhbh maa bẹ akhuna akhebha bọng ma, ifha moyoma bọng ore sa bọng am-agbaak odik-ọkkakka. Idikha oni mando ode, nwọhngi ttara akpen pa Phero bi, bọng ade nttọ!”
GEN 42:17 Mando kw'ọtzọk bẹ biphyir ọgbak k'iwu ittaan.
GEN 42:18 Ottong iwu ittaan nnuma, Josẹph oben bẹ bi, “Kaam ngaam ojora f'Ibinọkpaabyi e. Bọng si macha mgbaakhi, ifha bọng aruk akpen.
GEN 42:19 Idikha bọng ade anọng p'am-agbaak odik-ọkka, bọng tte ọnọng wani k'ottem kwabọng owobha mgbakkọhbh ma, ifha ayok atzọkha ọchattọhk fa bọng akk'adebha, achena anọng pabọng ka nhọhmmọr, p'ayim okwo kẹ.
GEN 42:20 Yina nkhera bi, bọng ibhora kasi, ifha bọng aning abira ape, bọng akhaambi atza atzima okpong-nnam kwabọng achen-m.” Wa bẹ akhera asi mach'obeni bẹ.
GEN 42:21 Bẹ an-abhakhi aben ayok bi, “K'odik ọkkọkka, oponga-pyibha nwa kw'am-ọtzọk ma, ofon k'itzama s'iwa mosi ọnang ọgbaanọtte kwaman e. Mojim odem kw'iwa odik nwuma ọmmẹ-ẹ kẹ, ọmaana odem kw'iwa om-okhukhi man bi, mọkkaan-ẹ. Yina, wa ọnọng kw'oyong-ẹ itzọhng kode, kẹ wọ osi mokk'ọmmamma ọtzọkha.”
GEN 42:22 Reubẹn obhina bẹ bi, “Wa bọng itzọhng kindọri bi, bọng aningi nnwa nwa itzama asi? Yina, ọnọng kw'iwa oyong-m itzọhng kode. Bọng na tzọkha mẹ ttaakhi khi, mọkhaambi da more ọmmamma k'eho cha nnwa nwa.”
GEN 42:23 Mada bẹ am-agbaak idik nna mẹ biphyir, bẹ karong bi Josẹph ọm-ọbhaang bẹ, okhuri da iwa om-otzima ọbhakh-ebhon ọgbaak bẹ atzim.
GEN 42:24 Wa Josẹph on-obina oji bẹ mẹ da bẹ awobh, ọtza obhom ẹmọng, yina ọn-ọkpa nnam okhebha bẹ k'ibe sa bẹ awobh, obiro ọgbaak bẹ atzim. Ọbọkha Simeọn m'ottem kw'ayok ọdabh ndik m'itzitzikha sabẹ.
GEN 42:25 Mẹ wọ, Josẹph ọnang anọng pẹ ẹfa bi, bẹ atza akhe anọng mba abọkpa ka mkpa sabẹ atzim akwu, bẹ abira akpa nnam arik agbukha p'ọnọng-ọnọng otzim odebh abọkpa k'ẹkpa chẹ, bẹ abira attara ọchattọhk f'anọng mba achi k'eden. Mada bẹ akk'mando asa,
GEN 42:26 anọng mba atzọkha ọchattọhk fa bẹ akk'bẹ ananga adabh ka nnyanyaang sabẹ abhana.
GEN 42:27 Mada abẹ apyiri k'ibe sa bẹ abhingi da erungi epyi, oyok wani ọchaari ẹkpa chẹ ifha ọnang ẹnyanyaang chẹ ọchattọhk, on-ore asilva pẹ k'ẹkpa chẹ ẹtzaanga.
GEN 42:28 Ọgbaak ayok bi, “Bẹ akk'asilva paam arikha e, kkeri bẹ k'ẹkpa chaam e.” Mada bẹ abhaang odik kw'oyok ọgbaakhi bẹ, nttem iyọhn bẹ, ojora osi bẹ, bẹ afọhni abọbh ayok bi, “Ma bọng odik wọ kw'Ibinọkpaabyi osi man ma o?”
GEN 42:29 Mada abẹ akwu apyiri k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan, bẹ agbaak otte kwabẹ Jekọb, odik kpenamkpen kw'ọkk'ọtta okhebha bẹ k'orenga kwa bẹ atza, aben bi,
GEN 42:30 “Ojinọng kw'ọdabhi obhon nwuma ọkkaam-ọkkaam, obiro ọtzọkha man macha nttọ, sa nkwu bi, nkwu nnom irek nnuma.
GEN 42:31 Yina, mọgbaakh-ẹ bi, ‘Mode anọng ọkkọkka, man nttọ kode.
GEN 42:32 Wa mode votte jobh obhiri afa e, va p'otte wani obhoni. Yina, oyok wani k'ottem kwa man anọng-ho jobh obhiri afa, k'akpen dọk kode. Okpong-nnam kwaman wọ on-owobh k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan ttara otte kwaman.’
GEN 42:33 “Mẹ wọ, ojinọng kw'otzim ededen ch'irek nnuma, oben man bi, ‘Odem kwa kẹ otzima oronga sa mode anọng ọkkọkka ode bi, bọng tte ọnọng wani ọbọhk k'ottem kwabọng, owobha ma ttar-m, ifha ayok mbangga atzọkha ọchattọhk achena anọng pa nhọhmmọr sabẹ, s'iwobh k'okwo f'ideden.
GEN 42:34 Kw'oyongi bi motzim okpong-nnam kwaman ochen-ẹ, kẹ kókhera bi, man nttọ kode, kóbiro okhera bi, mode anọng ọkkọkka. Amokk'mando ọsa, kẹ ótte ọgbaanọtte kwaman ọbọhk otte ọnang man, ifha mobiro ofha órenga mphya m'irek nnuma.’ ”
GEN 42:35 Mada abẹ an-awọhn ekpo py'ewobh ka mkpa sa bẹ atzim akhuna, ọnọng-ọnọng on-ore ikwa sẹ sa silva s'ira otzim odebh abọkpa k'ẹkpa chẹ ẹtzaanga. Mada bẹ biphyir ọmaana otte kwabẹ an-abira are ọkwa fa silva fa bẹ arọbh ka mkpa sabẹ, ojora osi bẹ biphyir.
GEN 42:36 Mẹ wọ, otte kwabẹ Jekọb oben bẹ bi, “Bọng akk'aam va paam arama. Josẹph ọmaana Simeọn k'akpen dọk kade, ma, bọng an-abira akwu bi akwu atzọkha Bẹnjamin atzima afona. Idik nna biphyir itto ikhebha kaam mancheni!”
GEN 42:37 Mẹ wọ e, Reubẹn oben otte bi, “Tte Bẹnjamin ọbọhk anang-m, kaam ndima va paam afa, ndera eho chẹ, idikha kaam nnẹ-ẹ ndim ngwuna nchen-ọ. Ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ọdaakh-ọ bi asi va paam, si bẹ.”
GEN 42:38 Yina, Jekọb obhina bi, “Kaam nnwa kwaam, ọbọhk kintte nnang bọng, okhuri bi, ọgbaanọkka kwẹ ọkk'ọpa, on-orik kẹ-khẹ. Idikha itzama kpenamkpen itto ikhebh-ẹ k'orenga kwa bọng átza, mẹ wọ ode bi, bọng ánọhng-m m'atzam mba ka nkwu-osisi.”
GEN 43:1 Wa okwo f'ideden otzim owobh k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan.
GEN 43:2 Mada Jekọb ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chẹ akk'abọkpa p'iwa bẹ adebhi k'Ijip acha biphyir akyera, otte oben bẹ bi, “Bọng kpa nnam k'Ijip atza adebh ichattọhk-ttọhkha atzima akwu.”
GEN 43:3 Yina, wa Juda oben otte bi, “Ojinọng nwuma kw'ọdabhi Ijip, ọtzọri man itzọhng k'eden ọkkakka bi, ‘Bọng kaam k'itzitzikha kàbe, kw'oyongi bi, bọng atzim ọgbaanọtte nwuma kwabọng akwu.’
GEN 43:4 Idikha akher bi, ọgbaanọtte kwaman ọtzọn man abẹ, mọhakha-ọhakha otza odebh ọchattọhk ochen-ọ.
GEN 43:5 Yina, idikha annẹ-ẹ ọbọhk atte bi ọtzọn man abẹ, man kọtza, okhuri bi, ojinọng nwuma obeni man bi, ‘Bọng kaam k'itzitzikha kàbe, kw'oyongi bi, bọng atzim ọgbaanọtte nwuma kwabọng akwu.’ ”
GEN 43:6 Iwa Jekọb kw'obiro okpena Israẹl, ọbọbh bi, “Ka yan kwa bọng anang-m ọmmamma-dem nwa k'ettem, bi, bọng agbaak ojinọng nwuma bi, bọng akhaam ọgbaanotte ọdọdọk ka o?”
GEN 43:7 Bẹ abhina bi, “Ojinọng nwuma ọbọbhi man idik haabhada s'ikhuri for saman ttara ẹhọhmmọr chaman bi, otte kwabọng otzim orukhi akpen kẹ o? Bọng akhaam ọgbaanotte ọdọdọk kẹ? Odik obungikwẹ kw'am-osi ode bi, mọgbaakh-ẹ idik s'ọbọbhi man biphyir. Yan wọ kw'ira motzima oronga bi, kẹ oben man motzima ọgbaanotte kwaman okwu o?”
GEN 43:8 Mẹ wọ, Juda on-oben Israẹl bi, “Tte nnwa nwa ọbọhk anang kaam, ifha ode mẹ, mofona eden dani, ọtza odebh abọkpa otzima okwu, ifha kọ, ọmaana maman, ttara va paman moning ope k'okwo.
GEN 43:9 Kaam ọkhaam wọ nkker-ẹ, ọttọhk manda vani ọsẹ-ẹ, ror-ẹ bọbh-m. Tte kaam ndima akpen paam ndera eho chẹ, idikha nnẹ-ẹ ndim ngwuna nchen-ọ.
GEN 43:10 Idikha ira oni egbekhibhi nda ode, nnamanda ira mokk'igbe ifa ọtza okhuna.”
GEN 43:11 Mẹ wọ, otte Jekọb on-oben bẹ bi, “Ah ho, ode mando, bọng dekha ẹnanga k'ekpo ẹkkakka mbyuma pya m'ọkhaam m'irek nna, mach'ana p'adaami eruk ibebaa, ọmaana akhọkhọhnana, ọmaana amọma pa kashu, ttara amọma p'almọn achena ojinọng nwuma.
GEN 43:12 Bọng biri tzọkha asilva p'ade igbe ifa ka mbuma p'ewunda bọng are ka mkpa sabọng. Bọng apyiri kẹ, bọng nik asilva mbuma pa bọng are ka mma sa mkpa sabọng. Kkeri, asi mẹ, bẹ asi epina akhe bẹ mẹ.
GEN 43:13 Bọng biri tzima ọgbaanotte kwabọng anemi eden arọhng k'ojinọng nwuma.
GEN 43:14 Tte njọhm saman ide bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir, ọsi ojinọng nwuma ọkhọkha bọng inọngkwo, ifha ótte ọgbaanotte nwonggo kwabọng ọbọhk, ttara Bẹnjamin bẹ atzọn bọng abẹ akhuna. On-ode kaam, idikha va paam adim-m odimi, tte bẹ adim-m ko o.”
GEN 43:15 Mẹ wọ, ajinọng mba atzọkha nnanga nnuma, attara asilva p'ade igbe ifa ka p'iwa bẹ atzim, akwu attara ka Bẹnjamin, atzima afona. Bẹ arenga m'ẹbhar k'ẹbhar apyiri k'Ijip, anemi eden achina ka Josẹph.
GEN 43:16 Mada, Josẹph ore Bẹnjamin ọmaana bẹ, oben ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ kw'ọhọhm bi, “Kọ tzima ajinọng mba achina k'ọhọhm kwaam, bọng fhu etzen atzima asi ọchattọhk, kkeri sa bẹ áchi ọchattọhk ttar-m k'ẹya.”
GEN 43:17 Wa ọtzọhmnọng nwa osi macha Josẹph ọgbaakh-ẹ, otzima ajinọng mba ochina k'ọhọhm kwa Josẹph.
GEN 43:18 Mada bẹ apyiri k'ọhọhm kwa Josẹph, ajinọng mba ojora bẹ, bẹ achibhi bi, “Asi mẹ asilva mba p'ewunda bẹ akpa nnam akhe ka mkpa saman bọ, pa bẹ areng abẹ atzima man akwu m'ibe na e. Kẹ oben bi, órima man abẹ, óbiro ọna man ẹfa, óbiro ọbọkha man nnyanyaang saman ọna, óbiro otzima man osi abira pẹ.”
GEN 43:19 Mẹ wọ, bẹ afona atza akhebha ọtzọhmnọng kwa Josẹph k'ẹbaakhamma ch'ọhọhm nwuma, agbaakh-ẹ atzim.
GEN 43:20 Bẹ aben bi, “Tzotzokhaan itta kwaman, wa mokwu odebh ọchattọhk ma k'ochedengbe.
GEN 43:21 Mada mopyiri k'ibe sa mobhingi, ọnọng-ọnọng on-ore obhik nwuma wani kw'asilva pa otzim odebh ọchattọhk k'ẹmma ch'ẹkpa chẹ ẹtzaanga. Mẹ wọ, motzim bẹ ma bi, morikh e.
GEN 43:22 Mada mọni ọnọng orong kw'iwa okhe asilva mbonggo ka mkpa saman, motzim asilva adọdọk okwu p'amotzima odebh ọchattọhk ma e.”
GEN 43:23 Ọtzọhmnọng nwa oben bi, “Tte oningi bọng ojor, odik m'ẹtzaanga kode. Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'otte kwabọng, okk'bọng agbukha ọnanga ka mkpa sabọng. Kaam wa nkk'asilva pabọng atzim adebh ọchattọhk ndọkha.” Mẹ wọ, ọtzọkha ọgbaanotte kwabẹ Simeọn otzima oyin kanya iyaan, ọnang bẹ.
GEN 43:24 Ọtzọhmnọng nwa otzima ajinọng mba odim k'ọhọhm kwa Josẹph, ọnang bẹ asi pa bẹ atzim agbobhi mmo mach'ẹmaana chabẹ ede, obiro ọnang nnyanyaang sabẹ ọchattọhk.
GEN 43:25 Bẹ ado for ttara nnanga sabẹ atzima atzik ogbe kwa Josẹph opyiri, da bẹ akk'abhaanga bi, sa bẹ awobha mẹ achi ọchattọhk.
GEN 43:26 Mada Josẹph opyiri k'ọhọhm, bẹ atzọkha nnanga nnuma sa bẹ akk'atzima akwu m'ọhọhm, anang-ẹ. Bẹ abira arakha attima otzitzikha fabẹ k'irerek, akhọkha Josẹph ikpokpobha.
GEN 43:27 Ọbọbh bẹ bi, “Osi bọng yan o? Itta kw'ewunda bọng agbaakh-m odik okhuri, otzim orukhi akpen kẹ o? Ọsẹ-ẹ yan?”
GEN 43:28 Bẹ abhina bi, “Ọtzọhmnọng kwọ kw'ode otte kwaman otzim orukhi akpen kẹ e, for ibiri igaang-ẹ kẹ e.” Mẹ wọ, bẹ achunga ahokpadim, abira aruri for sabẹ k'irerek, anang Josẹph ikpokpobha.
GEN 43:29 Mada Josẹph otzini chen ore ọgbaanọkka Bẹnjamin, kw'ọkka wani ọmaani bẹ, ọn-obọbh bi, “Agbaanatte nwuma kwabọng kw'ikhakhari kw'ewunda bọng agbaakh-m odik okhuri wọ ma o?” On-oben bi, “Nnwa kwaam, tte Ibinọkpaabyi, ọkhọkh-ọ ọphyaam.”
GEN 43:30 Mada Josẹph ore ọgbaanọkka kwẹ bi kpaar, ẹmọng ebir-ẹ ttara inọngkwo s'ifẹ-ẹ k'ettem. Obina m'ẹbhar-ẹbhar oji bẹ mẹ, oyin k'iyaan oror ibe s'obhom ẹmọng. On-ochina k'ẹmaanggọ chẹ ẹtzaanga, ọtza obhom ẹmọng.
GEN 43:31 Mada okk'itzitzikha oruma, ofona k'ẹmaanggọ oyin k'iyaan, ọbọkha for sẹ, oben bi, “Bọng bera bẹ ọchattọhk.”
GEN 43:32 Wa bẹ abera Josẹph ọchattọhk fẹ ngọmi, bẹ abera abọgbaanotte ngọmi, bẹ abira abera anọng p'Ijip p'awobh ttara Josẹph ọchattọhk fabẹ ngọmi. Wa kwẹ ode mando okhuri da, anọng p'Ijip atzọk bi, ode ọbhaangi bi, bẹ achi ọchattọhk ibe rani ttara anọng pa Hiburu.
GEN 43:33 Wa bẹ ahokhi votte mba ẹwọr atzor k'ọgbọ kwa bẹ ade, ttẹwọr k'ocheden maa apyiri k'okpong-nnam kwabẹ. Wa bẹ an-abhakhi akkeri ayok, odik okkoni bẹ k'odem kwa bẹ areng ahok bẹ ẹwọr, atzor k'ọgbọ.
GEN 43:34 K'ogbe kwa bẹ akkem ọchattọhk f'ofon k'okpokkoro kwa Josẹph, ekkema cha Bẹnjamin ẹhaabh igbe izen ẹyọhnga ch'ayok biphyir. Wa bẹ biphyir achi ọchattọhk, abira agwo atzuk ttara Josẹph, maa ettem ẹdaam ọnọng kpenamkpen.
GEN 44:1 Wa Josẹph otzọhn ọtzọhmnọng kw'ọhọhm kwẹ bi, “Yikha ọchattọhk k'ajinọng mba ka mkpa k'odem kwa bẹ afha atzọhkha, biri khe asilva p'ọnọng-ọnọng ọkk'ọnanga k'ẹmma ch'ẹkpa chẹ.
GEN 44:2 Atzọkha nkkọbh kwaam kwa silva akhe k'ẹmma ch'ẹkpa ch'oyok kw'ikhakhari, abira atzọkha asilva p'otzim odebh ọchattọhk akhẹ-ẹ k'ẹkpa.” Wa ọtzọhmnọng nwa osi macha Josẹph ọtzọhn-ẹ.
GEN 44:3 Okwu otzuma m'owuhobha, bẹ atzọhm ajinọng mba abhana ttara nnyanyaang sabẹ.
GEN 44:4 Mada bẹ an-atzima afona aji obhon k'ibe s'ibhir-obhir, ogbe k'obhiri Josẹph oben ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ bi, “Rọhng akhubh ajinọng mbuma k'eden. Akhebh bẹ, bọbh bẹ bi, ode yan kwa bọng an-atzim itzama, achora ejibha cha bẹ asi anang bọng o?
GEN 44:5 Okhuri yan kwa bọng afhu nkkọbh kw'itta kwaam kw'om-otzima ogwo asi, om-obiro otzima ọbhari ose o? Odik-ttama wọ kwa bọng asi ma e.”
GEN 44:6 Mada okhebh bẹ k'eden, ọmọnga atzim mba bani agbaak bẹ.
GEN 44:7 Yina, bẹ aben-ẹ bi, “Tzọmi-tzọmi okponga k'idachen! Yan kw'itta kwaman ochibhi bi, maman atzọhmnọng pẹ ofha osi odik-dema nwa o?
GEN 44:8 Motzer otzima asilva p'ewunda more ka mma sa mkpa saman ẹtzaanga, ttẹwọr k'irek sa Kenaan okwu orik ma. Mbọng vọ ira on-otzima man mofhu silva obiro ode gol, k'ọhọhm kw'itta kwabọng o?
GEN 44:9 Idikha are ọnọng m'ottem kw'atzọhmnọng pọ kw'otzim nkkọbh nwuma, ọnọng-dema nwuma ópe-ope, maman ka biphyir mon-obiro ode abira p'itta kwọ.”
GEN 44:10 Ọtzọhmnọng nwa on-oben bi, “Odik-jibhada kwa bọng agbaakhi. Tte ode macha bọng abeni. Ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'am-ore nkkọbh nwuma k'ẹkpa chẹ, kẹ ón-ode obira kwaam. Yina, ayok kẹ biphyir ánaanga oponga-pyibha kw'odik nwa ọnaanga.”
GEN 44:11 Mando kw'ọnọng-ọnọng ọhak ẹkpa chẹ k'irerek m'ẹbhar-ẹbhar, obiro ọchari ẹkpamma chẹ.
GEN 44:12 Mando kw'ọtzọhmnọng nwa ọttẹwọr ka mkpa s'adeden-nọng ọm-ọfọhngi, maa okwu opyiri ch'oyok kw'ikhakhari. Wa okwu ore nkkọbh nwuma k'ẹkpa cha Bẹnjamin.
GEN 44:13 Ofona mẹ, votte an-abọkha ọbara fabẹ afọr ajaakhi, bẹ atzini ndọhkha sabẹ anana ka nnyanyaang sabẹ, abhakhi eho akpa nnam k'obhon kw'ira bẹ afon.
GEN 44:14 Iwa Josẹph otzim owobh k'ọhọhm mada Juda ọmaana votte apyiri. Bẹ atto abaangi m'irerek, abhom amọng m'itzitzikha sẹ.
GEN 44:15 Mẹ wọ, Josẹph oben bẹ bi, “Bọng odik-dema kwa bọng asi ma? Bọng karong bi, ọnọng macha kaam mmindima ose nnonga idik s'ítto k'ororo o?”
GEN 44:16 Juda on-obhina bi, “Bọng odik kwa mobiro ọfha ọgbaak itta kwaman o? Bọng odik kwa mọgbaakh-ẹ o? Yan kwa mọkhọkha bi, mbọhk saman iwur-owur m'odik nwa o? Ibinọkpaabyi okk'oponga-pyibha kw'atzọhmnọng pọ ọjaakhi k'ọyaankpa. Mon-ode abira p'itta kwaman ma e, maman ma for saman magbakha oyok kwa bẹ are nkkọbh k'ẹkpa chẹ.”
GEN 44:17 Yina, Josẹph oben bi, “Tzọmi-tzọmi okponga k'idachen bi, kaam nsi odik-dema nwa. Ọnọng kw'ira bẹ are nkkọbh k'ẹkpa chẹ, wọ óde obira kwaam. Bọbọng kẹ biphyir, bọng nọhng abhana atza akhebha atte kwabọng k'odidiri.”
GEN 44:18 Mẹ wọ, Juda ofona ọtza okhebha Josẹph, oben-ẹ bi, “Itta kwaam, ngaam atzim pa mben bi mgbaak nnang-ọ abhaanga. Tzotzokhaan, oning-ọ ọdọkhi ọmaana kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ. Kaam nnong kẹ bi, ẹfa chọ ede ebengambọhk ttara Phero ọkhaam ma for sẹ.
GEN 44:19 “Wa itta kwaam ọbọbhi atzọhmnọng pẹ bi, ‘Bọng akhaam atte ttara ọgbaanọkka ọdọdọk kẹ o?’
GEN 44:20 Wa mobhin bi, ‘Mọkhaam otte kẹ kw'ọkk'ọtzama, mobiro ọkhaama ọgbaanọtte kw'otte kwaman obhoni k'atzam. Ọgbaanọkka kwa bẹ ade ọkka wani, wa ọkk'ọpa, kẹ-khẹ wọ on-orikhi k'ọkka kwabẹ e, kẹ ọdaakhi otte idik kpọnkpọng e.’
GEN 44:21 “Mẹ wọ, wa aben atzọhmnọng pọ bi, ‘Bọng nọhng atza atzim-ẹ akwu, ifha nnẹ ttara chen paam.’
GEN 44:22 Wa mọgbaakh-ọ bi, otte kwaman kókhera bi otte nnwa nwa ọbọhk ofona ọjẹ-ẹ e, okhuri bi, ofon ọjẹ-ẹ, otte ópe-ope.
GEN 44:23 Yina, wa aben atzọhmnọng pọ bi, ‘Bọng itzitzikha saam dọk kínnang, bọng ani agbaanatte kw'ode bọng okpong-nnam atzim akwu bi, nnẹ-ẹ.’
GEN 44:24 Mada mọkpa nnam ọtza okhebha ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, kw'ode otte kwaman, mọgbaakh-ẹ eden cha kọ, itta kwaam, akk'man agbaakha.
GEN 44:25 “Mẹ wọ, mada otte kwaman obeni bi, ‘Bọng nọhng abira atza adebh ọchattọhk ibebaa.’
GEN 44:26 Yina, wa moben bi, ‘Man kọfha ọtza idikha an-akher bi, motzima ọgbaanotte kwaman ọtza. Man itzitzikha s'ojinọng nwuma kw'om-okpe ọchattọhk kofha ore, idikha ọgbaanotte kwaman kw'ikhakhari oni man abẹ ọtzọni otza odebh ọchattọhk.’
GEN 44:27 “Otte kwaman kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kwọ obeni man bi, ‘Bọng akk'aronga bi, wa kwanọng kwaam ọmaan-m va afa p'ijinọng.
GEN 44:28 Oyok wani k'akpen dọk kode. K'odik-ọkka nden nkk'ẹ nchikhi k'abir-ibiri. Ttẹwọr kẹ maa apyiri ma, kaam kẹ ka chen kinne.
GEN 44:29 Idikha bọng abira atzima oyok nwa afona, itzama kpenamkpen ikhebh-ẹ k'eden, nnam kọkpa, kw'oyini bi, bọng ánọhng-m k'atzam ttara nkwu-osisi.’
GEN 44:30 “Mẹ wọ ode bi, idikha nnwa nwa oni man abẹ ọtzọni, mada mkpa nnam k'otte kwaam kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, kw'ettem chẹ biphyir ẹgban ma nnwa nwa,
GEN 44:31 on-ore bi nnwa nwa man abẹ kọtzọni, kẹ ópe-ope e. Atzọhmnọng pọ án-awọhkhi otte kwaman ope k'atzam, mọnọhng-ẹ ttara izen ka chen e.
GEN 44:32 Kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ wọ nnwọhngi k'itzitzikha s'otte kwaam, mben-ẹ bi, ‘Tte kaam ndima akpen paam ndera eho chẹ, idikha nnẹ-ẹ ndim ngwuna nchen-ọ!’
GEN 44:33 “Mẹ wọ, itta kwaam, kaam ngwukhọ-okhukhi, tzima kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ mach'obira atzer eho cha nnwa nwa, ifha attẹ-ẹ ọbọhk ọtzọn votte pẹ abẹ ọbhana.
GEN 44:34 Kaam eden kinnong cha kaam mmana ndor otte kwaman, idikha nnwa nwa oni kaam abẹ ọtzọni ọbhana. Mma e! Kaam ọbọhk katte bi, nda nne ọmmamma kw'odik nwa ọnang otte kwaam e.”
GEN 45:1 Mada Josẹph oni for sẹ dọk ọfha ọbọkha k'itzitzikha s'atzọhmnọng pẹ, ọhọbhi ẹmọng obhom, “Ọnọng kpenamkpen obina k'itzitzikha saam!” Mẹ wọ, wa okkekkeminọng ọdọdọk kw'owobh mẹ kode, k'ogbe Josẹph osi ẹjaakhi cha for sẹ ọnang votte pẹ.
GEN 45:2 Wa Josẹph on-obhom ẹmọng k'ẹrọng maa anọng p'Ijip abhaanga, maa ẹhọhmmọr cha Phero ebire ẹbhaanga ẹmọng ch'obhomi.
GEN 45:3 Josẹph oben votte pẹ bi, “Kaam wọ nde Josẹph e! Otte kwaam otzim orukhi akpen kẹ o?” Yina, wa votte kẹ ebhina kafha anang, okhuri opoma-dem f'ọbọk bẹ k'itzitzikha sẹ.
GEN 45:4 Josẹph oben votte bi, “Bọng nọkhi baang-m ka for.” Mada bẹ akk'mando asa, on-oben bi, “Kaam wọ nde Josẹph, ọgbaanọtte kwabọng, kw'iwa bọng akpe anang aphyaphya p'Ijip.
GEN 45:5 Nttem nningi bọng atzim iyakhi. Bọng ayok kabira apyima bi, bọng akpe-m anang ma, okhuri bi, Ibinọkpaabyi ochi eden ọtzọhm kaam ma bi, ifha orenga ka nnam saam ọkkaana akpen p'anọng.
GEN 45:6 Onode cho afa ma p'okwo f'ideden owobh m'irek nna e, ka cho azen p'am-akwu k'itzitzikha anọng bẹ ekpo káyaabha, bẹ kabira apha.
GEN 45:7 Yina, wa Ibinọkpaabyi ochi eden ọtzọhm kaam ma bi, nkkaana nhok bọng ayok bani akpen m'ọyagbin, ifha mbiri nnang bọng ẹnaanga ch'ideden.
GEN 45:8 “Mẹ wọ, bọbọng arang asi, Ibinọkpaabyi wọ iwa ọtzọhm-m ma e. Osi-m bi, nde ọvaar kw'ajukwa pa Phero biphyir, ọmaana itta kw'ọhọhm kwẹ, ttara ọdabhi kw'anọng p'Ijip makhọra.
GEN 45:9 M'ẹbhar-ẹbhar, bọng kpa nnam k'otte kwaam atza agbaakh-ẹ bi, ‘Nnwa kwọ Josẹph ọtzọhmi ẹkkaabha ochen-ọ bi, Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'aam ẹvaar ch'Ijip biphyir ọnanga. Kọ ogbe kàkhibhi, jekha akwu akhebh-m ka da nwobh.
GEN 45:10 Kọ otte kwaam, ọmaana va pọ, ọmaana va pa va pọ, ọmaana etzirakpo pyọ, ọmaana abhaam pọ, ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen fọ biphyir, an-aruk k'okhubha kwa Goshẹn, ifha moruk ọbaanga ayok.
GEN 45:11 Ka Goshẹn wọ kwa kaam nkker-ọ, okhuri bi, cho azen p'okwo f'ideden awobh k'itzitzikha. Oni mando ode, kọ ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chọ, ọmaana etzirakpo pyọ biphyir, bọng awobha k'ogbor.’
GEN 45:12 “Bọng biphyir akk'ara, ọgbaanọkka kwaam Bẹnjamin obiro ore bi, k'odik-ọkka kaam wọ mimgbaak bọng atzim ma e.
GEN 45:13 Bọng gbaak otte kwaam abarada pa kaam ngaam k'Ijip, bọng biri gbaakh-ẹ odik kpenamkpen kwa bọng akk'ara. M'ẹbhar-ẹbhar, bọng nọhng atza atzima otte kwaam akwu.”
GEN 45:14 Mẹ wọ, Josẹph ọkhaara ọgbaanọkka Bẹnjamin mbọhk, bẹ abaakha ayok, abira abhom.
GEN 45:15 Wa Josẹph obhom ẹmọng nduma otzima ọbaakha votte pẹ biphyir. Mada okk'mando ọsa, mẹ wọ kwa votte pẹ an-akhaam ottembara bi, bẹ agbaak atzim ttar-ẹ.
GEN 45:16 Mada ẹgọmi nda epyiri k'ọvaar-dimpa kwa Phero bi, votte pa Josẹph akk'akwa m'Ijip, wa ettem ẹdaam Phero ọmaana akhaan-nọng pẹ biphyir.
GEN 45:17 Phero oben Josẹph bi, “Ben votte pọ bi, ‘Odik kwa bọng asi ode bi, bọng dọkha ekpo pyabọng anana etzirakpo pyabọng, ifha bọng abhana k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan,
GEN 45:18 bọng biri tzima atte kwabọng, ọmaana nhọhmmọr sabọng akwu k'Ijip. Kaam ńnang bọng okhubha kw'irerek s'ijibhi ọtzam, ifha bọng akhaama ekpo k'ọhaabh py'efona mẹ.’
GEN 45:19 “Kọ biri gbaak bẹ bi, ‘Odik kwa bọng asi ode bi: Bọng dọkha akpaar p'ideden pa nnyanyaang mmindọr m'Ijip, atzima atza atzọkha va pabọng, ọmaana panọng pabọng, ttara atte kwabọng atzima akwu.
GEN 45:20 Bọng ẹkhakhaama chabọng kare mach'odik kw'ọyak bọng atzim, okhuri bi, okhubha kw'irerek s'ijibhi ọtzam k'Ijip, ọkhaam bọbọng.’ ”
GEN 45:21 Mẹ wọ, wa va pa Jekọb asi odik kpenamkpen kwa bẹ atzọni bẹ. Josẹph ọnang votte pẹ akpaar p'ẹbhar p'ideden otzor k'ẹfa ch'ọvaar Phero ọkk'ọnanga, obiro ọnang bẹ ọchattọhk fa bẹ achi k'eden.
GEN 45:22 Ọnang ọnọng-ọnọng ọbara ọbhapfẹ, oyongi Bẹnjamin kw'ọnangi ashẹkẹl arọbh chi pa silva ọmaana ọbara adem azen ọdọdọk.
GEN 45:23 Wa Josẹph ọtzọkha anyanyaang-dim jobh p'atzọhk ekpo ẹkkakka py'Ijip, ọmaana anyanyaang-papẹ jobh p'atzọhk abọkpa ttara brẹd, ttara ọchattọhk ọdọdọk f'otte otzima orenga k'eden.
GEN 45:24 Mẹ wọ, mada okk'bẹ ekpo mbya okkema biphyir, oben bẹ arọhng. Mada bẹ an-abina orenga, oben bẹ bi, “Bọng ẹkhọhr k'eden kasi o!”
GEN 45:25 Mẹ wọ, bẹ abina k'Ijip akwu akhebha otte kwabẹ Jekọb k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan.
GEN 45:26 Mada bẹ akwu apyiri, bẹ agbaak otte bi, “Josẹph otzim orukhi akpen kẹ e! Kẹ wọ ode ọvaarnọng kw'irek s'Ijip biphyir.” Jekọb okkon-ẹ, odik nwa k'odik-ọkka kọtzọk.
GEN 45:27 Yina, mada bẹ an-agbaakh-ẹ odik kpenamkpen kwa Josẹph okk'bẹ ọgbaakha, obiro ore akpaar p'ideden pa nnyanyaang mmindọr pa Josẹph ọkk'ọtzọhma bi, bẹ atzima akwu atzin-ẹ atzima achina k'Ijip, ẹfa ebire ewobha Jekọb.
GEN 45:28 Mẹ wọ, Jekọb oben bi, “Kwẹ ode odik ọkkakka e, nnwa kwaam Josẹph otzim orukhi akpen kẹ e. Kaam ngaam bi, ńda k'Ijip nda nnẹ-ẹ yina kaam ḿpe e.”
GEN 46:1 Mando kwa Jekọb obin orenga ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ode fẹ. Mada okwu opyiri ka Bẹrshẹba, osi njafọhni mẹ ọnang Ibinọkpaabyi kw'otte kwẹ Isaak okpobh.
GEN 46:2 Okwu opyiri k'erungi, Ibinọkpaabyi oyin Jekọb abẹ k'idachen, oyer-ẹ bi, “Jekọb! Jekọb!” Jekọb okhera bi, “Kkeri kaam ma e.”
GEN 46:3 Mẹ wọ, oben bi, “Kaam wọ nde Ibinọkpaabyi, Ibinọkpaabyi kw'atte kwọ okpobh, oning-ọ ojor bi achina k'Ijip, okhuri bi, kẹ wọ kwa kaam ńsọ-ọ bi, ade ẹkhọma ch'ideden.
GEN 46:4 Kaam ńdọn-ọ abẹ nchina k'Ijip, mbiri ńdim-ọ mkpa nnam. Josẹph wọ óde ọnọng kw'obubh-ọ chen k'obo.”
GEN 46:5 Iwa Jekọb obina ka Bẹrshẹba, va pẹ atzima kẹ kw'ode otte kwabẹ, ọmaana va pabẹ, ttara panọng pabẹ, ayikha k'akpaar p'ideden pa nnyanyaang mindọr, pa Phero ọkk'ọtzọhma bi, bẹ atzima atzini otte.
GEN 46:6 Wa Jekọb, ọmaana va pa va pẹ biphyir atzima etzirakpo pyabẹ, ọmaana ẹkhakhaama cha bẹ akk'asa k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan, achina k'Ijip.
GEN 46:7 Jekọb otzima va pẹ p'ijinọng ọmaana va pabẹ, ttara va pẹ p'ipanọng ọmaana va pabẹ, ẹhọhmmọr chẹ biphyir, ochina k'Ijip.
GEN 46:8 Ma wọ ode che pa va p'ijinọng pa Jekọb, p'achin k'Ijip. Reubẹn kw'ode ocheden-nwa kwa Jekọb.
GEN 46:9 Va p'ijinọng pa Reubẹn ade, Hanọk, ọmaana Palu, Hẹzrọn, ttara Karmi.
GEN 46:10 Va p'ijinọng pa Simeọn ade: Jemuyẹl, ọmaana Jamin, ọmaana Ọhad, ọmaana Jakin, ọmaana Zoha, ọmaana Shaul kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa kwanọng kwẹ kw'ofon Kenaan ọmaani.
GEN 46:11 Va p'ijinọng pa Lẹvi ade: Gẹrshọn, ọmaana Kohat ọmaana Mẹrari.
GEN 46:12 Va p'ijinọng pa Juda ade: Ẹr, ọmaana Ọnan, ọmaana Shẹla, ọmaana Pẹrẹz ttara Zẹra (yina, wa Ẹr ọmaana Ọnan akk'apa k'irek sa Kenaan). Va p'ijinọng pa Pẹrẹz ade: Hẹzrọn ọmaana Hamul.
GEN 46:13 Va p'ijinọng pa Isaaka ade: Tola, ọmaana Pua, ọmaana Jashub ọmaana Shimrọn.
GEN 46:14 Va p'ijinọng pa Zẹbulun ade: Sẹrẹd, ọmaana Ẹlọn, ọmaana Jalẹl.
GEN 46:15 Ma wọ ode va p'ijinọng p'iwa Lea ọmaani ọnang Jekọb k'obhon kwa Padan-Aram, akhiri ominanwa kwẹ Daina ájì. Wa va mba pẹ biphyir, adikkobh ọmaana aminava ade ẹrọbh obhiri jobh obhiri attaan.
GEN 46:16 Va p'ijinọng pa Gad ade: Ziphon, ọmaana Hagi, ọmaana Shuni, ọmaana Ẹzbọn, ọmaana Ẹri, ọmaana Arodi, ttara Areli.
GEN 46:17 Va p'ijinọng p'Ashẹr ade: Imna, ọmaana Ishva, ọmaana Ishvi, ttara Beriya. Ọgbaanọkka kwabẹ kw'ikwanọng wa ode Sẹra. Va pa Beriya p'ijinọng ade: Hebẹr, ọmaana Malkiyẹl.
GEN 46:18 Wa va chi obhiri wani bọ pa Zilpa ọmaani ọnang Jekọb. Zilpa wa ode obira kwa Laban ọkk'ọtzọkha ọnang ominanwa kwẹ Lea bi, oruk Lea abẹ.
GEN 46:19 Ajinọng pa Jekọb obhoni ka kwanọng kwẹ Rachẹl ade, Josẹph ọmaana Bẹnjamin.
GEN 46:20 Asenat kw'ode ominanwa kwa Potiphera, kw'ode ọfọhnẹja k'obhon kw'On, ọmaani Manasẹ ttara Ephraim ọnang Josẹph k'Ijip.
GEN 46:21 Va p'ijinọng pa Bẹnjamin ade: Bẹla, ọmaana Bẹkẹr, ọmaana Ashbẹl, ọmaana Gẹra, ọmaana Naaman, ọmaana Ehi, ọmaana Rosh, ọmaana Mupim, ọmaana Hupim, ttara Ard.
GEN 46:22 Va p'ijinọng biphyir pa Rachẹl ọmaani ọnang Jekọb ade ọhawani kwa chi.
GEN 46:23 Dan obhoni ojinọng kw'okpen Hushim.
GEN 46:24 Va p'ijinọng pa Naphtali ade: Jazẹl, ọmaana Guni, ọmaana Jẹzẹr ttara Shilẹm.
GEN 46:25 Biphyir-phyir Bilha kw'ode obira kw'iwa Laban ọtzọk ọnang ominanwa kwẹ Rachẹl, ọmaani va azenamfa ọnang Jekọb.
GEN 46:26 Wa ọnọng-mik kw'ọtzọni Jekọb abẹ ochina k'Ijip, ode arọbh attaan obhiri azadani akhiri panọng pa va aji, anọng mba biphyir wa bẹ afon k'ẹnọmma cha Jekọb.
GEN 46:27 An-atzọk va afa p'ijinọng pa Josẹph obhoni k'Ijip attara, biphyir-phyir ọnọng-mik kw'ẹhọhmmọr cha Jekọb kw'ochin k'Ijip ode: anọng arọbh attaan obhiri jobh.
GEN 46:28 Mẹ wọ, Jekọb ọtzọhm Juda bi, ochi eden ọkwọbha ọtza okhebha Josẹph, ọbọbh ibe sa Goshẹn owobh. Mada bẹ apyiri k'okhubha kwa Goshẹn,
GEN 46:29 Josẹph ọnang ẹfa bi, bẹ atzọkha akpaar p'ideden pa nnyanyaang mmindọr atzima akwu, ifha otza ore otte Israẹl kw'opyiri ka Goshẹn. Mada Josẹph ore otte bi kpaar ọkhaara otte mbọhk k'ekhokhora, obiro obhom ẹmọng k'ogbe-bhirada.
GEN 46:30 Jekọb oben Josẹph bi, “Mada kaam nkk'nna k'odik-ọkka bi, kọ atzima arukhi akpen ka, kaam nna mpe yina e.”
GEN 46:31 Mẹ wọ, Josẹph oben votte pẹ ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr ch'otte kwẹ bi, “Kaam ńchina ka Phero nda ḿgbaakh-ẹ bi, ‘Votte paam ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr ch'otte kwaam, p'iwa arukhi k'irek sa Kenaan, akk'aam atzora ka e.
GEN 46:32 Ajinọng mba ade akkeri-arukhimaan, bẹ akk'akwa ttara nden sabẹ, ọmaana ọttọhk kpenamkpen fabẹ biphyir.’
GEN 46:33 Ọn-ọbhakhi oben votte pẹ bi, Phero oyeri bọng, ọbọbh bọng bi, ‘Mbọng vọ ode ọtzọhmbọhk fabọng?’
GEN 46:34 Bọng abhina bi, ‘Itta, maman atzọhmnọng pọ mọttẹwọr k'ẹvava chaman om-otzir nden, mach'abatte paman e.’ Mẹ kẹ-khẹ wọ kwa bẹ atzima átte bọng ọbọhk, bọng aruk ka Goshẹn, okhuri bi, anọng p'akkeri-arukhimaan akpukhi anọng p'Ijip idik k'eden dama.”
GEN 47:1 Wa Josẹph obina ọtza ọgbaak Phero bi, “Otte kwaam ọmaana votte paam akk'etzirakpo pyabẹ, ọmaana abhaam, ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen fabẹ akhaam, atzima abina k'irek sa Kenaan apyiri ma Goshẹn.”
GEN 47:2 Josẹph otzekha votte pẹ anọng azen, otzima bẹ ọtza ọkhọhkha Phero.
GEN 47:3 Phero ọbọbh votte pa Josẹph bi, “Mbọng vọ ode ọtzọhmbọhk fabọng?” Bẹ abhin-ẹ bi, “Itta, maman atzọhmnọng pọ mode akkeri-arukhimaan e, mach'iwa abatte paman ade e.”
GEN 47:4 Bẹ abira aben Phero bi, “Maman ọkk'ọkwa bi, mokwu oruk m'irek nna k'igbegbaa bi kọbh, okhuri bi, okwo f'ideden owobh ka Kenaan, ttara bi, araraari kẹ dọk kade p'etzirakpo py'atzọhmnọng pọ echi. Mẹ wọ, tzotzokhaan, tte maman atzọhmnọng pọ oruk k'irek sa Goshẹn.”
GEN 47:5 Iwa Phero oben Josẹph bi, “Mada atte ọmaana votte pọ akk'ọ akwa akhebha ka,
GEN 47:6 irek s'Ijip biphyir iwobh ka mbọhk sọ, kọ tzekha ibe s'arong bi, ijibh-ojibh anang bẹ, bẹ wobha. Tte bẹ aruk k'okhubha kwa Goshẹn. Idikha arong anọng k'ottem kwabẹ p'akhaam emengkka ch'ọtzọhm, kọ tzọkha etzirakpo pyaam anang bẹ, akkeri.”
GEN 47:7 Mẹ wọ, Josẹph obiro otzima otte Jekọb ọtza ọkhọhkha Phero. Wa Jekọb osi Phero ittabọhng, ọdẹ-ẹ.
GEN 47:8 Phero ọn-ọbọbh Jekọb bi, “Kọ an-ade cho aphaang o?”
GEN 47:9 Jekọb obhina Phero bi, “Kaam nkk'cho arọbh azadani obhiri jobh nnukha. Cho pa kaam nkk'nnukha kahaabhi, bẹ abira ayakh-ọyak. Bẹ macha cho p'iwa abatte paam arukhi kapyiri.”
GEN 47:10 Mẹ wọ, Jekọb obiro osi Phero ittabọhng, ọdẹ-ẹ, yina on-obin ofona.
GEN 47:11 Iwa Josẹph ọtzọkha irerek ọkkọkka nnuma s'okk'otzekha k'Ijip, k'ẹkhọma cha Rameses, ọnang otte ttara votte pẹ bi bẹ aruk, macha Phero ọtzọhn-ẹ bi, ọsi.
GEN 47:12 Josẹph obiro ọtzọkha ọchattọhk f'obenga otte, ọmaana votte pẹ, ttara ẹhọhmmọr ch'otte biphyir ekkema, ọnang bẹ otzor k'obhik kwa va pabẹ.
GEN 47:13 Iwa ọchattọhk mebubuni kode, okhuri da okwo f'ideden ochin ororo owobha m'ẹkhọma nda biphyir. Wa anọng p'Ijip, ọmaana anọng pa Kenaan an-are ihem okhuri okwo f'ideden.
GEN 47:14 Wa Josẹph otzobha agbukha p'awobh k'Ijip biphyir ọmaana agbukha p'anọng pa Kenaan am-adebh ọchattọhk, otzima ochina k'ọvaar-họhm kwa Phero.
GEN 47:15 K'ogbe kw'agbukha akk'anọng p'Ijip ọmaana anọng pa Kenaan aha ka mbọhk, anọng p'Ijip biphyir abina atza akhebha Josẹph aben bi, “Agbukha akk'man aha ka mbọhkh e. Ka yan kw'akkeri man ma mope k'okwo o? Nang man ọchattọhk.”
GEN 47:16 Mẹ wọ, Josẹph obhina bẹ bi, “Mada agbukha akk'bọng ka mbọhk aha, bọng dima etzirakpo pyabọng akwu, ifha mosi obhona ttara ọchattọhk.”
GEN 47:17 Mando kw'anọng mba afon atza atzọkha etzirakpo pyabẹ py'ede nnyanyaang, ọmaana arukhimaan, ọmaana avu, ọmaana abhaam, ttara nnyanyaang dọk, atza anang Josẹph. Wa ọnang bẹ ọchattọhk ma cho nwuma biphyir, k'obhona kw'etzirakpo pyabẹ.
GEN 47:18 Mada cho nwuma ọkwọbh, anọng mba afona atza aben Josẹph bi, “Odik kode kwa modubha itta kwaman, odik ode bi, mada agbukha paman ahaha, etzirakpo pyaman en-ede pyọ. Ayongi for saman, ttara irerek saman, ọttọhk fa mobiro ọnang-ọ, itta kwaman dọk kode.
GEN 47:19 Man ọbọhk katte, ttara irerek saman mope k'okwo k'itzitzikha sọ. Debh man ttara irerek saman, anang man ọchattọhk. Maman ttara irerek saman okk'for ọda bi, mowobha k'ebira cha Phero. Kọ nang man akpo-mọma pa mọyaabha otzima oruk akpen, ifha irerek saman iningi idukhi ibiri iwobha.”
GEN 47:20 Mando kwa Josẹph odebhi irerek s'Ijip biphyir ọnang Phero. Anọng p'Ijip biphyir atzọkha iwoni sabẹ akpe, okhuri da okwo f'ideden ọn-ọgaangi kpọng ọnang bẹ. Wa irerek s'Ijip biphyir in-ide sa Phero.
GEN 47:21 Wa Josẹph on-osi anọng mba ade abira, ttẹwọr k'ebhonho dani ch'Ijip maa, apyiri k'okpong.
GEN 47:22 Kaambi mẹ wọ, wa irerek s'afọhnẹja kodebhi, okhuri ekkema cha bẹ am-atzọkha ka mbọhk sa Phero, f'osi bẹ abira akhaama ọchattọhk k'ọhaabh f'ofon k'ekkema cha Phero ọnangi bẹ. Kẹ wọ osi wa bẹ irerek sabẹ kakpe e.
GEN 47:23 Wa Josẹph on-oben anọng mba bi, “Bọng akk'ara bi, kaam nkk'bọng ndebha ọmaana irerek sabọng biphyir mayina, nnang ọvaar Phero. Bọng na tzọkha achimọma mba atza ayaabha.
GEN 47:24 Yina, mada bọng asi ipha, bọng kkema ọchattọhk mva k'obe ozen, bọng atzọkha okhung wani ahok Phero. Bọng dọkha ahung mbonggo anna ahok k'ọyayaabha, ọmaana k'ọchattọhk fa bọng, ọmaana nhọhmmọr sabọng, ttara va pabọng.”
GEN 47:25 Mẹ wọ, bẹ an-aben bi, “Iyaa, kọ akk'akpen paman akkaana e. Tte mọtzọkha ọphyaam k'itzitzikha s'itta kwaman, mokk'okhera bi, móde abira pa Phero.”
GEN 47:26 Iwa Josẹph on-otzini odik nwa ohok mach'ọphaangi kw'okhuri irerek s'Ijip bi, tzọni m'ewu nduma maa apyiri mayina, bẹ am-anang Phero okhung wani k'akhung azen, k'ekpo pya bẹ apha. Oyongi irerek s'afọhnẹja sẹ-sẹ rọ, s'iwa ini sa Phero ide.
GEN 47:27 Wa anọng p'Israẹl aruk k'okhubha kwa Goshẹn k'Ijip. Akpen ajibh bẹ, bẹ akhaama ẹkhakhaama k'ọhaabh, abira amaan ayok k'ọhaabh, obhik kwabẹ obiro ọhaabh.
GEN 47:28 Wa Jekọb orukhi k'irek s'Ijip cho chi obhiri afa. Biphyir-phyir wa Jekọb orukhi cho arọbh azenamfa obhiri azenamfa.
GEN 47:29 Mada ebowu ch'Israẹl ẹm-ẹbaang, oyeri nnwa kwẹ Josẹph, oben-ẹ bi, “Idikha nkk'ọphyaam ndọkha ka kọ k'itzitzikha, kẹ ọbọhk kwọ ka ndaak saam achekhi bi, kọ akhọhkh-m ejibha k'odik-ọkka bi, kaam m'Ijip kánọhnga.
GEN 47:30 Yina, mada ḿpe ndor abitta paam, kọ tzini obukhi kwaam m'Ijip atza anọhnga kẹ da bẹ anọhng bẹ.” Mẹ wọ, Josẹph oben bi, “Kaam ńsi-osi mach'abeni.”
GEN 47:31 Jekọb on-oben bi, “Kọ chekhi anang-m.” Mẹ wọ e, Josẹph ochekhi ọnang-ẹ. Wa Jekọb, kw'obiro okpena Israẹl ọrakha eho ọnana k'ochikhura kwẹ, ọnang Ibinọkpaabyi ikpokpobha.
GEN 48:1 Mada ogbe nwuma ọkk'ọkwọbha, bẹ agbaak Josẹph bi, “Atte ọmmẹ-ẹ ọmma.” Mẹ wọ, Josẹph obina ttara va pẹ p'ijinọng afa p'ade; Manasẹ ttara Ephraim, otza ore otte.
GEN 48:2 Mada bẹ agbaakhi Jekọb bi, “Nnwa kwọ Josẹph ọkk'ọkwa bi, okwu ọrọ-ọ e,” Jekọb okhonga obina k'ebin ch'oyim, owobha ẹwọr.
GEN 48:3 Jekọb on-oben Josẹph bi, “Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir oyin-m abẹ obiro odo-m ka Luz, k'irerek sa Kenaan,
GEN 48:4 obiro oben-m bi, ‘Kaam ńdọ-ọ ttara ọhaabh, mbiri nttar-ọ ọnọng-mik. Kaam ńsọ-ọ ade obhon k'obungi, mbiri ńdọkha irerek nnang va pa va pọ mach'ekkema chabẹ maa, ogbe ode.’
GEN 48:5 “Mẹ wọ, va mba afa p'ade Manasẹ ọmaana Ephraim p'abhoni k'irek s'Ijip yina kaam nna nkwu, bẹ áde va paam, macha Reubẹn, ọmaana Simeọn ade.
GEN 48:6 Va adọdọk p'an-abhon bọ án-ade va pọ. Ekkema cha va mba p'án-ade pọ, éfona ka ngọma s'Ephraim, ọmaana Manasẹ.
GEN 48:7 Wa ode odik kwa nkwu-osisi s'ideden bi, mada mfon ka Padan-Aram ngwuna, wa Rachẹl okwu ope k'eden kẹ da motzim om-orenga k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan, kw'ọbaang Ẹphrat. Mẹ wọ, wa kaam nnọhng-ẹ k'eden ch'echin Ẹphrat (kw'ode Bẹtẹlẹhẹm).”
GEN 48:8 Mẹ wọ, mada Jekọb ore va pa Josẹph, ọbọbh bi, “Bọng anọng bọ kẹ o?”
GEN 48:9 Josẹph obhina otte bi, “Va p'Ibinọkpaabyi akk'aam ọnanga bọ ma e.” Mẹ wọ, Jekọb on-oben bi, “Tzima bẹ akwu, ifha nsi bẹ ittabọhng.”
GEN 48:10 M'ogbe nwa, wa Jekọb owonikpa bi kpaar dọk komo-ore okhuri atzam. Mẹ wọ, wa Josẹph otzima va mba pẹ afa ọrọkhi otzor otte ka for, otte ọbaakha bẹ.
GEN 48:11 Mada okk'bẹ ọbaakha, Israẹl on-oben Josẹph bi, “Kaam chen kinkhokhi bi, na mbiri nne itzitzikha sọ. Yina, itzitzikha sọ sẹ-sẹ arang sa kaam nna mbiri nne, Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọsa bi, mbiri nne va pọ.”
GEN 48:12 Mẹ wọ, Josẹph ọn-ọrọbha va mba ka ndaak s'otte, ọrakha ottima itzitzikha k'irerek ọnang Jekọb ikpokpobha.
GEN 48:13 Mẹ wọ, Josẹph ọbọkha Ephraim k'odimbọhk kwẹ kw'ode kwabọhk kwa Jekọb, obiro ọbọkha Manasẹ ka kwabọhk kwẹ, kw'ode k'odimbọhk kwa Jekọb, ọrọkhi bẹ ọbaanga otte ka for.
GEN 48:14 Yina, wa Jekọb otzini mbọhk sẹ ọnana va mba ka nho. Ọnana Ephraim kw'ode nnwa-nnwa, odimbọhk, ọnana Manasẹ kw'ode ocheden-nwa, kwabọhk.
GEN 48:15 Mẹ wọ, osi Josẹph ittabọhng oben bi, “Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'abatte paam Abraham, ọmaana Isaak akpobh, Ibinọkpaabyi kw'ọkk'aam okkeri k'akpen paam biphyir maa, apyiri ma,
GEN 48:16 tte Orenga-eden, kw'ọkk'aam ọkkaana, k'itzama kpenamkpen, odo va mba. Tte va mba akpena che pabẹ abhina kaam, tte bẹ abira akpena che pabẹ abhina, abatte paam Abraham ọmaana Isaak. Tte bẹ ahaabh ayong-oyongi m'ọyagbin.”
GEN 48:17 Mada Josẹph ore bi, odimbọhk kw'otte ọnan Ephraim k'eho, ettem ebhem-ẹ. Mẹ wọ e, ọtza bi otza otzini ọbọhk kw'otte ọnan Ephraim k'eho bi, ọnana Manasẹ.
GEN 48:18 Josẹph oben otte bi, “Mma e itta kwaam, nana oyok nwa kw'ode ocheden odimbọhk kwọ k'eho e.”
GEN 48:19 Yina, otte obhum, oben bi, “Nnwa kwaam, nnong ọttọhk fa minsi kẹ e, kaam nnong kẹ bi va pa va pa Manasẹ áde ẹkhọma ch'ideden, ch'ebire ẹtza che. Ayongi mẹ, Ephraim ọ́khaama ẹfa ọyọhnga Manasẹ, va pa va pẹ áde idibhon s'ihaabh-ọhaabh.”
GEN 48:20 Mando kwa Jekọb osi va mba ittabọhng m'ewu nduma, oben bi, “Anọng p'Israẹl átzima che chọ asi ayok ittabọhng. Tte Ibinọkpaabyi ọsọ-ọ ade mach'Ephraim ọmaana Manasẹ.” Mẹ wọ, osi Ephraim ode odedennọng ọnang Manasẹ.
GEN 48:21 Mẹ wọ e, Jekọb on-oben Josẹph bi, “Ebowu chaam em-efor, yina, Ibinọkpaabyi ówobha ttara bọng, obiro ótzim bọng ọkpa nnam k'irerek s'abatte.
GEN 48:22 Onode kọ, kaam nnang-ọ irerek nnuma s'egbegbeho, s'iwa kaam ndim ọkkangkkaang kwaam, ọmaana oyuk kwaam mbọkha anọng p'Amọr nna.”
GEN 49:1 Iwa Jekọb oyeri va pẹ, oben bi, “Bọng dobha ibe rani, ifha mfha mgbaak bọng eden ch'akpen pabọng áde, k'ogbe ororo.
GEN 49:2 “Bọng va pa Jekọb, bọng dobha ma, ayonga itzọhng, bọng yonga itzọhng anang kaam atte kwabọng Jekọb, kw'obiro okpena Israẹl.
GEN 49:3 “Reubẹn, kọ wọ ade ocheden-nwa kwaam, abira ade ẹfa chaam, kọ wọ ade ẹkhọhkha ch'ejinọng chaam, abira ade ọnọng kwa kaam ndim nkkaara ẹmma.
GEN 49:4 Kọ áde mach'asi p'abobh-obobh, kọ ojibhada dọk kàre, da kọ atzam ọtta, arẹkhi eyima ch'atte, ayima ọkkọra-kwanọng kwẹ abẹ.
GEN 49:5 “Simeọn ọmaana Lẹvi asi ẹmmaana dani, akkangkkaang pabẹ ade egbongkpo py'ọgbaan.
GEN 49:6 Tte kaam nningi ẹkhaan chabẹ ndọni, tte kaam nningi wani k'ottem kw'ewobha chabẹ nde, okhuri bi, bẹ akk'ittemdọkhiji sabẹ atzima afhu anọng haabhada. Bẹ abira am-asi abhaam ọgbaan, abọkha pyẹ aphyakhi mmo mach'ọdaakhi bẹ.
GEN 49:7 Opyibh-opyibh ọnang ittemdọkhiji sabẹ, ottem-gọma otzim bẹ ofhu anọng ẹgagaangi. Opyibh-opyibh ọnang ottem-gọma kwabẹ, kw'otzim bẹ osi ọgbaan. Kaam ńsi va pa va aningi k'ibẹ rani arukhi k'ẹkhọma cha Jekọb. Mbiri ńsi bẹ an-akhọmikha aruk, makhọra Israẹl.
GEN 49:8 “Onode kọ Juda, votte pọ ánang-ọ ikpokpobha. Attattaanga-nọng pọ ábira awobha irekh-irek kwọ, votte pọ biphyir áhakha nho anang-ọ.
GEN 49:9 Kọ Juda, nnwa kwaam, ade okye-nwa; kw'ofhu etzen ochi, ofona ọbhana k'ibe s'ofon okwu, mach'okye-dim, kw'oyim ọkpẹ-ọkpẹ, mach'okye-kwa, ọnọng kw'ofha ogbikh-ọ kode.
GEN 49:10 Ọnọng kw'ọfha ọtzọkha ẹfa ka mbọhk s'ẹkhọma cha Juda kode e, ẹfa échina ororo ewobha ka mbọhk sa va pa va pa Juda, matzẹmaa opyiri k'ogbe kw'idibhon ichen-ẹ ndumma, ngọma biphyir awobha irekh-irek kwẹ.
GEN 49:11 Kẹ ọgbana ẹnyanyaang chẹ k'echi cha grep, ọgbana nnwa kw'ọnyanyaang-kwakwẹ k'echibọhnga ch'ẹdaakh-ẹ. Kẹ ọ́khaama atzuk matzẹmaa on-otzima bẹ ogbobhi anọhma-baba pẹ, otzima asi-khora pa grep ogbobhi ọbara fẹ.
GEN 49:12 Kẹ ókhor chen okhuri atzuk haabha p'ọgwo, aha pẹ áwur ayong-oyongi okhuri abasi haabha p'ogwo.
GEN 49:13 “Zẹbulun ósi obhon kwẹ k'ẹraangakha, ẹkha ch'éde ibe s'anzurikkaang am-attima akwokha ọnwọhng. Enem chẹ étzima maa, etzuma k'okhubha kwa Sidọn.
GEN 49:14 “Isaaka ode ẹnyanyaang ch'ẹkhaam ẹfa, ch'eyim k'ottem kw'avukwuri.
GEN 49:15 Mada ore odem kw'iwọhngkwokhabe sẹ ijibhi, omaana odem kw'irerek sẹ ibiri ijibh ewobha, ọ́hakha ẹbabaang chẹ ọtzọkha ẹtzọhkha, obiro ókhera bi, osi ọtzọhm f'ihem mach'obira.
GEN 49:16 “Dan ọ́nang anọng pẹ eponga-ttọhna ẹkkakka, mach'efonamma dani ch'Israẹl.
GEN 49:17 Dan ójora macha jọhk ch'ewobh k'eden ọkhaan-ọkhaan, mach'ọfhọfhọbhi kw'oyim k'eden, mach'ọfhọfhọbhi kw'okhimi ẹnyanyaang k'abhokhọkhọri, ch'esi ọyaar-ẹnyanyaang ogina otto nnama-nnam.
GEN 49:18 “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kaam nwobh ndik ẹnaanga chọ.
GEN 49:19 “Ẹkhaan ch'ariribha erima Gad abẹ, yina, kẹ ómuma bẹ ekpo k'abhokhọkhọri da bẹ arọbh mkpaana-kpaana.
GEN 49:20 “Ashẹr ọ́khaam ọchattọhk ọkkakka f'ọdaam-ọdaam, kẹ ósi ọchattọhk ọkkakka f'ọbaana bi, bẹ anang ọvaarnọng ochi.
GEN 49:21 “Naphtali ode mach'ojibh-kwa, kw'oreng ka for sẹ, ojibh-kwa, kw'ọmaani va p'ajibh-ojibh.
GEN 49:22 “Josẹph ode mach'echi cha grep ch'ebe ẹbaanga ekhekha, va pẹ ade mach'abọhnga p'anyaami avura k'egbegbeho.
GEN 49:23 Atta-ayuk átzima idọdọkhi arim-ẹ abẹ, bẹ am-arim-ẹ abẹ ttara ittattaanga s'ideden.
GEN 49:24 Yina, kọ akhema bẹ achina ororo, okhuri da kọ abọk oyuk kwọ, m'ejinọng-ejinọng. Ofona k'ẹfa ch'Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir, kwa Jekọb okpobh, osi mbọhk sọ ngaang-ọgaangi. Okkeri-arukhimaan kw'ode Ẹtzakpa ch'Israẹl,
GEN 49:25 kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'atte okpobh kw'ọkkaan-ọ, ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir kw'ọdọ-ọ ttara ẹdaa ch'ẹrọng ẹnangi, ttara ẹdaa ch'asi p'awobha k'irerek ẹtzaanga, ttara ẹdaa ch'ọmaan ọmaana abasi k'ọhaabh.
GEN 49:26 Ojibhada kw'atzọk k'atte kwọ, ode ojibhada kw'ofon ka mgbegbeho s'iwa kẹ-khẹ, Ọyọhnga idik ọkkakka s'ifon ka mgbegbeho ndamsẹ. Tte Josẹph ọtzọkha ojibhada nwa biphyir ọkhaama, tte kẹ ode oho kwa bẹ akk'atzekha k'ottem kwa votte pẹ.
GEN 49:27 “Bẹnjamin ode mach'etzen ch'ẹkkaam-ọkkaam, ch'echin ororo echi ayok k'ekpebha, ebire ekkema ọgbọm f'echi k'ẹchọhkha.”
GEN 49:28 Anọng mba biphyir bọ iwa asi mfonamma jobh obhiri mfa s'Israẹl. Ma wọ ode idik s'iwa otte ọgbaakhi k'ogbe kw'osi bẹ ittabọhng. Wa osi ọnọng-ọnọng ittabọhng sẹ s'ibaan-ẹ.
GEN 49:29 Mẹ wọ, ọn-ọtzọhn bẹ bi, “Ebowu chaam em-efor cha mpe ndor abitta e. Bọng nọhng-m kẹ da abitta paam anọhng, k'ọmma kw'itzakpa kw'owobh k'owoni kw'Ẹphrọn kw'ofon Het.
GEN 49:30 K'ọmma kw'itzakpa kw'owobh ka Makpẹla, ọbaanga Mamrẹ k'irek sa Kenaan, kw'iwa Abraham odebhi ttara k'owoni ka mbọhk s'Ẹphrọn kw'ofon Het, otzima osi inọhng-anọng.
GEN 49:31 Mẹ wọ kw'iwa bẹ anọhng Abraham, ttara kwanọng kwẹ, Sara. M'ibe nna rani rọ s'iwa bẹ abira anọhng Isaak, ttara kwanọng kwẹ, Rẹbẹka. Mẹ wọ kw'iwa kaam mbiri nnọhnga Lea.
GEN 49:32 Wa Abraham odebhi owoni nwa, ọmaana ọmma kw'itzakpa kw'owobh mẹ, ka mbọhk s'anọng pa Het.”
GEN 49:33 Mada Jekọb okk'va pẹ ndọhna ọnanga biphyir, oyebh mmo sẹ ọnana k'ebin, ope otzor anọng pẹ.
GEN 50:1 Josẹph otto ọkpẹkhi obukhi kw'otte, obhom obiro ọbaakh-ẹ.
GEN 50:2 Mẹ wọ, Josẹph ọtzọhn akkeri-akhọkhọma p'atzọhmnọng pẹ bi, bẹ atzini obukhi kw'otte Jekọb atza aye, bẹ abira akker-ẹ ifha oningi ochu.
GEN 50:3 Wa bẹ ayẹ-ẹ k'iwu arọbh afa biphyir mach'ẹmmaana ch'apfura oyeye ede k'Ijip. Wa anọng p'Ijip awobh ka nkwu-osisi k'iwu arọbh attaan obhiri jobh.
GEN 50:4 Mada iwu nna sa nkwu-osisi ikk'ittonga, Josẹph oben akhaan-nọng pa Phero bi, “Idikha kaam nkk'ọphyaam ndọkha ka bọng k'itzitzikha, bọng kkaan-m agbaak Phero atzim anang-m bi,
GEN 50:5 wa otte kwaam osi-m ndọkha ọnwọhngi da oben-m bi, ‘Ebowu chaam em-efor, mpe, rọhng atza anọhng-m k'epekhubh cha ndumi k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan nnang for saam.’ Mẹ wọ, tte nda nnọhnga otte kwaam, nkk'ẹ nnọhnga, kaam ńkhun-okhuna e.”
GEN 50:6 Mẹ wọ, Phero oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ rọhng atza anọhnga atte, atzor k'ọnwọhngi kw'iwa atte ọkk'ọsa atzọkha.”
GEN 50:7 Mando kwa Josẹph ofon bi, ọtza ọnọhnga otte. Wa akhaan-nọng pa Phero biphyir, ọmaana adedennọng p'ọvaar-dimpa kwa Phero, ọmaana adedennọng p'irek s'Ijip biphyir,
GEN 50:8 akwu attara k'ẹhọhmmọr cha Josẹph biphyir, ọmaana votte pẹ, ttara anọng p'ẹhọhmmọr ch'otte Jekọb, atzọni Josẹph abẹ. Wa va bẹ-bẹ, ọmaana etzirakpo bọ an-arikhi ka Goshẹn.
GEN 50:9 Wa akpaar p'ideden pa nnyanyaang mindọr, ọmaana ayaari-nnyanyaang abira atzọn-ẹ abẹ. Wa ode ẹkhaan ch'ẹhaabh-ọhaabh.
GEN 50:10 Mada bẹ apyiri k'ibe sa bẹ am-awobha akhaani abarli-mọma k'Atad, ka Jọrdan okhubha, bẹ abhom abomọng p'adọkhi bẹ ọdọkhi k'ẹrọng. M'ibe nna rani rọ s'iwa Josẹph owobh ka nkwu-osisi s'obo kw'otte k'iwu izenamfa.
GEN 50:11 Wa anọng pa Kenaan p'arukhi m'ibe nna sa bẹ am-akhaani abarli-mọma k'Atad, p'are obo kwa Josẹph osi kw'otte, an-ayeri ibe nnuma s'iwobh k'okhubha kwa Jọrdan, Abẹl-Mizrayim, aben bi, “Anọng p'Ijip awobh ka nkwu-osisi s'obo!”
GEN 50:12 Mẹ wọ, wa va pa Jekọb asi mach'otte okk'bẹ ọtzọhna.
GEN 50:13 Iwa va pẹ atzini obukhi kw'otte achina k'irek sa Kenaan, atza anọhnga k'ọmma kw'itzakpa kw'owobh ka Makpẹla, ọbaanga Mamrẹ. Wa Abraham ọkk'ọmma nwa kw'itzakpa odebha ttara owoni kw'owobh mẹ, ka mbọhk s'Ẹphrọn kw'ofon Het, otzima osi inọhng-anọng.
GEN 50:14 Mada Josẹph okk'otte ọnọhnga, kẹ ọmaana votte pẹ, ttara anọng p'akhubhi bẹ obo biphyir, akpa nnam abhana k'Ijip.
GEN 50:15 Mada bẹ akk'obo akhuna, votte pa Josẹph atzin bi, otte kwabẹ k'akpen dọk kode. Bẹ an-abọbh for sabẹ bi, “Idikha Josẹph on-obe mayina ochibhi bi otzukha itzama kpenamkpen sa mọkk'ẹ ọsa khi?”
GEN 50:16 Mẹ wọ, bẹ atzọhm ẹkkaabha anang Josẹph bi, “Wa atte ọnangi man ndọhna yina on-ope e:
GEN 50:17 Wa oben bi, ‘Bọng gbaak Josẹph bi, kaam mbeni bi, tte obina ọnang bọng k'itzama kpenamkpen sa bọng akk'ẹ asa.’ Mẹ wọ, mokhukh-ọ okhukhi bi, tte obina ọnang ottotto kw'atzọhmnọng p'Ibinọkpaabyi kw'iwa atte kwọ okpobh.” Mada ẹkkaabha nda epyiri Josẹph k'itzọhng, obhom.
GEN 50:18 Mẹ wọ, votte afona atza akhebh-ẹ, atto abangi m'irerek abhom amọng m'itzitzikha sẹ, aben bi, “Maman ode abira pọ e.”
GEN 50:19 Yina, Josẹph oben bẹ bi, “Ojora oningi bọng osi. Kaam wọ nde Ibinọkpaabyi o?
GEN 50:20 Wa bọng achibhi bi, bọng asi kaam itzama. Yina, wa Ibinọkpaabyi otzim ochibhi ọkkọkka otte odik nwa ọbọhk bi, kwẹ ode, ifha ọkkaana akpen p'anọng haabhada, macha kwẹ ode ma.
GEN 50:21 Mẹ wọ, ojora oningi bọng osi. Kaam ńkkeri bọng okkeri ttara va pa bọng.” Josẹph ochina ororo ọnang votte pẹ ottembara, obiro ọgbaak bẹ attem-dinitzim.
GEN 50:22 Wa Josẹph ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr ch'otte biphyir achina ororo aruk k'Ijip. Wa Josẹph orukhi cho arọbh azen obhiri jobh,
GEN 50:23 matzẹmaa ore va pa va p'Ephraim. Wa Josẹph obiro otzin bi, va p'afon ka ndaak sa Makir kw'ode nnwa kwa Manasẹ, abira ade va pẹ.
GEN 50:24 Iwa Josẹph ọgbaak votte pẹ bi, “Kaam ebowu chaam em-efor e, yina, mpe, Ibinọkpaabyi óhok echekhi chẹ ohok bi, otzima bọng obina m'irerek nna, ọtza ọnang bọng irerek s'iwa ọnwọhngi bi, ọnang Abraham, ọmaana Isaak, ttara Jekọb.”
GEN 50:25 Mẹ wọ, Josẹph osi votte pẹ p'ade va p'Israẹl atzọkha ọnwọhngi k'itzitzikha sẹ, aben bi, “K'odik ọkkọkka, Ibinọkpaabyi ọ́nang bọng ẹkkaana ọnang, bọng akhaambi atzini akhọbhi paam m'irek nna atzima afona.”
GEN 50:26 Mẹ wọ e, wa Josẹph ope da ode cho arọbh azen obhiri jobh. Mada anọng akk'obukhi kwẹ aya, bẹ atzin-ẹ akhe k'Ẹkkọhbhi k'Ijip.
EXO 1:1 Ma wọ ode che pa va p'ijinọng p'Israẹl, kw'obiro okpena Jekọb, p'iwa achin k'Ijip, ọnọng-ọnọng ttara ẹhọhmmọr chẹ biphyir.
EXO 1:2 Wa bẹ ade: Reubẹn, ọmaana Simeọn, ọmaana Lẹvi, ọmaana Juda,
EXO 1:3 ọmaana Isaaka, ọmaana Zẹbulun, ọmaana Bẹnjamin,
EXO 1:4 ọmaana Dan, ọmaana Naphtali, ọmaana Gad, ttara Ashẹr.
EXO 1:5 Josẹph kẹ wa okkekkeni oruk k'Ijip. Biphyir-phyir wa efonamma cha Jekọb ede, anọng arọbh attaan obhiri jobh p'iwa otzim ochina k'Ijip.
EXO 1:6 Wa Josẹph ọmaana efonamma chẹ biphyir, ọmaana ọgbọ nwa biphyir ape.
EXO 1:7 Yina, efonamma cha Jekọb ẹn-ẹbhakhi ebhon ayok maa, ch'ẹhaabh, ebire ekwu ẹbar, ẹnyaami maa, efu irek nnuma.
EXO 1:8 Wa ọvaarnọng ọbhakwẹ kw'oni Josẹph orong on-okwu ọdabh Ijip.
EXO 1:9 Wa obeni anọng pẹ bi, “Bọng kker o! Anọng mba p'Israẹl akk'ahaabha kpọng, abira akhaama ẹfa ayọhnga man.
EXO 1:10 Bọng kwu motzima ekkoji ọkwọbha bẹ ọhaabh mva, oni mando ode, egbong etto ma, bẹ attara attattaanga-nọng paman arima man abẹ, ifha bẹ arọbh aji irek nna.”
EXO 1:11 Mẹ wọ e, anọng p'Ijip arọbha akker-atzọhmnọng p'afon Ijip, bẹ anang ebhonmọr ch'Israẹl ọtzọhm f'ihem bi, bẹ asi. Anọng p'Israẹl asi ideden-mon sa Pitọm, ọmaana Rameses mach'ọkhaanga-họhm anang Phero.
EXO 1:12 Yina, odem nwa kw'anọng p'Ijip ado anọng p'Israẹl ihem anang, mando kw'anọng p'Israẹl areng ahaabh, abira ado anyaami maa, ojora ọnwa anọng p'Ijip.
EXO 1:13 Anọng p'Ijip an-anang anọng p'Israẹl ọtzọhm k'ihem s'ideden.
EXO 1:14 Bẹ an-asi akpen abenga anọng p'Israẹl, okhuri ọtzọhm gaang-angaang f'idọdọhbh ọbhabhakhi ọmaana f'atza ọbabanga, ttara owoni-tzọhm kpenamkpen. Chibhi da anọng p'Israẹl asi itzọhm gaang-agaang anang bẹ, anọng p'Ijip nkwu-osisi kakhaam ttara bẹ.
EXO 1:15 Mẹ wọ, ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip oben panọng p'am-akkeri aHiburu-panọng ọmaan p'akpen Shiphra, ọmaana Pua bi,
EXO 1:16 “Mada bọng am-akkeri aHiburu-panọng ọmaan, bọng dọkha ogbe akkeri k'ọmaanpa, idikha nnwa ode ojinọng, bọng fhẹ-ẹ. Yina, idikha ode kwanọng, tte kẹ oruk akpen.”
EXO 1:17 Yina, da panọng p'am-akker-anọng ọmaan akhaam ojora f'Ibinọkpaabyi, bẹ ndọhna s'ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip ọnangi bẹ kahokhi. Bẹ atte va p'ijinọng ọbọhk, aruk akpen.
EXO 1:18 Mẹ wọ, ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip oyeri akkeri-panọng-ọmaan mba, ọbọbh bẹ bi, “Okhuri yan kwa bọng asi odik dema nwa? Mbọng vọ osi bọng atte va p'ijinọng ọbọhk bẹ aruk akpen?”
EXO 1:19 Akkeri-panọng-ọmaan mba abhina Phero bi, “AHiburu-panọng macha panọng p'Ijip kade. Bẹ akhaam ettem ch'ọmaan. Bẹ am-amaan k'ọmọmmọm, yina akkeri-panọng-ọmaan an-apyiri.”
EXO 1:20 Mẹ wọ, Ibinọpkaabyi on-osi ọphyaam ọnang akkeri-panọng-ọmaan mba, anọng p'Israẹl achina ororo ahaabh, bẹ abira akhaama ẹfa.
EXO 1:21 Ibinọkpaabyi ọn-ọnang akkeri-panọng-ọmaan mba nhọhmmọr sabẹ ọkhaam, okhuri da bẹ akhaam ojora f'Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 1:22 Mẹ wọ e, Phero ọnang anọng pẹ biphyir ẹfa bi, “Bọng dọkha nnwa kw'ijinọng kpenamkpen kw'oHiburu-kwanọng ọ́maan, abhari k'ọraanga kwa Nile, yina, bọng tte nnwa kw'ikwanọng ọbọhk oruk akpen.”
EXO 2:1 Wa ojinọng wani kw'efona cha Lẹvi, ọtza ọtzọkha kwanọng kw'efona cha Lẹvi k'ọbada.
EXO 2:2 Wa kwanọng nwa otzima ibhọr, ọmaan ojinọng. Mada ore bi, nnwa nwa ojibh-ojibh, odubh-ẹ k'aphe attaan.
EXO 2:3 Mada ọnẹ-ẹ dọk ofha odubha, ọtzọkha nnwa nwa okhe k'ikhiriba s'otzim ettimma osi. Otzima ẹbaanttim ọkpa aphaangi p'ikhiriba nna. Ọtzọkha ikhiriba nna, ttara nnwa k'ẹtzaanga, ọnana k'araraari p'ameni k'asi, p'awobh k'ẹraangakha ch'ọraanga kwa Nile.
EXO 2:4 Ọgbaanọkka kw'ikwanọng kwa nnwa nwa ọtza ọpaangi obe, ifha ore ọttọhk f'osi nnwa nwa.
EXO 2:5 Wa nnwa kwa Phero kw'ikwanọng otzima aminava p'ade atzọhmnọng pẹ ọtza bi, otza ogbobha asi k'ọraanga kwa Nile. Mada aminava mba am-arenga m'ẹraangakha, nnwa kwa Phero on-ore ikhiriba k'ottem kw'araraari p'ameni k'ẹraangakha, ọtzọhm ọtzọhmnọng wani kwẹ bi, ọtza ọtzọkha sẹ otzima okwu.
EXO 2:6 Mada ogwong sẹ, ore nnwa k'ẹtzaanga kw'om-obhom ẹmọng. Ọkhaama nkwu-osisi ọmaan-ẹ. Oben bi, “Nnwa nwa ofha ode oHiburu-nwa wani.”
EXO 2:7 Mẹ wọ, ọgbaanọkka kwa nnwa nwa ọbọbh nnwa kwa Phero kw'ikwanọng bi, “Na mfha nda nyeri oHiburu-kwanọng wani, kw'ọfha ọrọk nnwa nwa ọnang-ọ o?”
EXO 2:8 Nnwa kwa Phero oben ọgbaanọkka kwa nnwa nwa bi, “Ojibhi kẹ, rọhng!” Mẹ wọ, otza otzima ọkka kwa nnwa nwa okwu.
EXO 2:9 Nnwa kwa Phero oben ọkka kwa nnwa nwa bi, “Kọ tzọkha nnwa nwa arọk anang-m. Kaam ńnang-ọ agbukha k'ọtzọhm fọ.” Mẹ wọ, ọkka kwa nnwa nwa ọtzọkh-ẹ ọrọk.
EXO 2:10 K'ogbe kwa nnwa nwa ọkk'ọn-ọbara, ọtzọkh-ẹ ochena nnwa kwa Phero kw'on-ode ọkka kwa nnwa nwa. Ọkpẹ-ẹ Mosẹs, oben bi, “Nwong nnwa nwa k'asi.”
EXO 2:11 Iwa ewu dani, k'ogbe kw'iwa Mosẹs ọkk'ọn-ọbara, wa ofon otza odibh anọng pẹ p'Israẹl. Ore ọtzọhm gaang-agaang f'ihem f'anọng pẹ am-asi, obiro ore da ojinọng wani kw'ofon Ijip om-ottum oHiburu-jinọng, kw'ode obhon-nọng kwa kẹ Mosẹs.
EXO 2:12 Mada Mosẹs ọbhakhi okkeri, ọnọng kore, ofhu ojinọng nwa kw'ofon Ijip, ọtzọkha obukhi kwẹ ọnọhnga k'oyeyeng.
EXO 2:13 K'ewu ch'ejem mẹ, Mosẹs on-oyin k'iyaan, otza ore aHiburu-jinọng afa p'am-arima erima, ọbọbh oyok kw'aponga apyibhi bi, “Areng mbọng afẹ am-attum oyokh-oyok o?”
EXO 2:14 Ojinọng nwa obhin-ẹ bi, “Anyi wọ ọsọ-ọ oho ọmaana ọttọhn-aponga kwaman o? Am-asi achibhi bi abira afhu-m mach'afhu oJipnọng o?” Mẹ wọ, ojora ọnwa Mosẹs, on-ochibhi bi, “K'odik-ọkka odik nwa ọkk'ọjaakh e.”
EXO 2:15 Mada Phero ọbhaang odik nwa, oror nden s'otzima ofhu Mosẹs. Ofona mẹ, Mosẹs ọrọbh ka Phero k'itzitzikha otza oruk ka Midiyan, otza owobha ẹwọr ọbaanga esipe dani.
EXO 2:16 Wa ọkhaam ọfọhnẹja wani kwa Midiyan, kw'iwa ọkhaam va p'ipanọng azenamfa. Ewu dani, aminava mba azenamfa akwu akhaabha asi k'esipe akhe k'ọgbaakha, ifha bẹ anang etzirakpo py'otte kwabẹ.
EXO 2:17 Yina, akker-arukhimaan bani akwu akhubh aminava mba, mẹ wọ, Mosẹs obina bi bik ọtza ọkkaana bẹ, ọnang etzirakpo pyabẹ asi.
EXO 2:18 Mada aminava mba abhan, otte kwabẹ kw'okpen Reuẹl ọbọbh bẹ bi, “Kaambi bọng akk'ẹbhar-ẹbhar akhuna. Ode yan mayina?”
EXO 2:19 Bẹ abhin-ẹ bi, “Ọnọng wani kw'ofon Ijip wọ ọkkaan man ka mbọhk s'akker-arukhimaan, obiro ọkkaana ọnang etzirakpo pyaman asi.”
EXO 2:20 Reuẹl ọbọbh aminava pẹ bi, “Bọng asi yan afona ajẹ ẹ? Bọng nọhng atza ayer-ẹ okwu ochi ọttọhk.”
EXO 2:21 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs okhera bi, okwu oruk k'ọhọhm kwa Reuẹl. Wa Reuẹl okwu ọtzọkha ominanwa wani kwẹ kw'okpen Zipọra, ọnang Mosẹs k'ọbada.
EXO 2:22 Zipọra ọmaan Mosẹs nnwa kw'ijinọng, Mosẹs ọkpẹ-ẹ Gẹrshọm, oben bi, “Kaam nkk'okhekhen-nọng nna nda m'okhekhen-mon nwa.”
EXO 2:23 M'ogbe-bhirada nwuma, ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip okwu ope. Anọng p'Israẹl abhom ẹmọng ch'ẹkkaana anang Ibinọkpaabyi, okhuri ebira cha bẹ awobh k'Ijip. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaanga ẹmọng chabẹ, cha bẹ abhomi k'ihem.
EXO 2:24 Wa Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaanga ẹmọng chabẹ, obiro ojima echekhi ch'ọkhaam ttara Abraham mọgbakha Isaak, ọmaana Jekọb.
EXO 2:25 Wa Ibinọkpaabyi ore bi, anọng p'Israẹl awobh k'ihem, on-obiro ọkpakh-ẹ bi, ọkkaana bẹ.
