EXO 3:1 Wa ewu dani, Mosẹs om-okkeri arukhimaan p'otte kwa kwanọng kwẹ kw'okpen Jẹtro. Jẹtro wa ode ọfọhnẹja k'ẹkhọma cha Midiyan. Mosẹs otzima arukhimaan mba eden orenga m'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi maa, okwu opyiri k'egbegbeho cha Horẹb ch'ede egbegbeho ch'Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 3:2 Mẹ wọ kw'orenga-eden kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oreng k'akpondaak p'awọm k'echi, oyin Mosẹs abẹ. Wa Mosẹs odo okkeri ore bi chibhi da ekpon ẹm-ẹwọm, echi nda kẹkwọmi.
EXO 3:3 Mosẹs oben k'ettem chẹ bi, “Kaam ngaambi nnenga mbaanga kẹ, ifha nne ọttọhk f'osi yina ekpon ẹm-ẹwọma m'echi nda, yina, chẹ kẹkwọmi.”
EXO 3:4 Mada Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi on-ore bi Mosẹs okk'orenga ọbaanga kẹ, on-oyer-ẹ k'ottem kw'echi nda bi, “Mosẹs! Mosẹs!” Mosẹs oben bi, “Itta, kkeri kaam ma e.”
EXO 3:5 Ibinọkpaabyi oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ dọk kàrenga abaanga ka, wọra ekpo pya mmo pyọ, kkeri ibe nna s'abe mẹ ide irerek s'awurada.”
EXO 3:6 Obiro oben-ẹ bi, “Kaam wọ nde Ibinọkpaabyi kw'abatte Abraham, ọmaana kw'Isaak, ttara kwa Jekọb.” Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs on-ochubha itzitzikha sẹ, okhuri ojora f'on-orori bi, ore Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 3:7 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “K'odik ọkkakka, kaam nkk'ọmmamma kw'anọng paam awobh k'Ijip nna e. Kaam nkk'ẹmọng ch'ẹkkaana mmaanga, cha bẹ abhomi, okhuri ihem s'akker-atzọhmnọng am-anang bẹ. Kaam nnong ihem sabẹ am-are kẹ.
EXO 3:8 Mẹ wọ, nkk'nkwa bi, nkwu nkkaana, nnọbha bẹ ka mbọhk s'anọng p'Ijip, mbiri nnọbha bẹ m'irek nnuma, ndima bẹ nchina k'irerek s'ijibh-ojibh ibiri iwoni-owoni. Irerek ọkkakka s'abasi ọmaana akhọkhọnana ahaabh-ọhaabh, obhon kw'abaKenaan, ọmaana abaHet, ọmaana ab'Amọr, ọmaana abaPẹriz, ọmaana abaHiv, ttara abaJẹbus.
EXO 3:9 K'odik ọkkakka, kaam nkk'ẹmọng ch'anọng p'Israẹl abhomi mmaanga e, kaam nkk'ihem-dem s'anọng p'Ijip am-anang bẹ mbiri nna e.
EXO 3:10 Mẹ wọ, kọ rọhng, kaam nna ndọhm-ọ ka Phero bi, atza atzima anọng paam p'Israẹl abina k'Ijip.”
EXO 3:11 Yina, Mosẹs oben Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “Kaam nde macha bọng ọnọng bi, nyin Phero k'itzitzikha, mbiri ndima anọng p'Israẹl bẹ abina k'Ijip o?”
EXO 3:12 Ibinọkpaabyi on-oben bi, “Kaam ńwobha ttar-ọ. Ma wọ óde ẹkhọhkha ọnang-ọ bi, kaam wọ ndọhm-ọ. Akk'anọng p'Israẹl atzima abina k'Ijip, bọng án-akpobha Ibinọkpaabyi m'egbegbekho nda.”
EXO 3:13 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs oben Ibinọkpaabyi bi “Idikha kaam nna nda k'anọng p'Israẹl, mgbaak bẹ bi, ‘Ibinọkpaabyi kw'abatte wọ ọtzọhm-m ka bọng e,’ bẹ an-abọbh-m bi, ‘Ibinọkpaabyi nwa okpen yan?’ Kaam mgbaak bẹ yan o?”
EXO 3:14 Ibinọkpaabyi on-oben Mosẹs bi, “KAAM WỌ NDE NWUMA KWA NDE. Kọ gbaak anọng p'Israẹl bi: ‘KAAM WỌ NDE wọ ọtzọhm-m ka bọng.’ ”
EXO 3:15 Ibinọkpaabyi obiro oben Mosẹs bi, “Kọ gbaak anọng p'Israẹl bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'abatte Abraham, ọmaana Isaak, ọmaana Jekọb akpobh, wọ ọtzọhm-m ka bọng. Ma wọ ode che chaam, che ch'igbọ biphyir k'ororo iyer-m maa ogbe ode.
EXO 3:16 “Kọ rọhng atza atzobha adeho p'Israẹl, aben bẹ bi, ‘Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'abatte Abraham, ọmaana kw'Isaak, ttara Jekọb akpobh, oyin-m abẹ oben bi, kaam nkk'ogbe ndọkha nkkeri, nne odem kwa bẹ asi bọng k'Ijip.
EXO 3:17 Kaam nkk'nchekhi bi, ńnọbha bọng k'ihem s'Ijip, ndima bọng nchina k'irerek ọkkakka s'abasi ọmaana akhọkhọnana ahaabh-ọhaabh s'abaKenaan, ọmaana abaHet, ọmaana abAmọr, ọmaana abaPẹriz, ọmaana abaHiv, ttara abaJẹbus.’
EXO 3:18 “Adeho mba p'Israẹl ayong-ọ itzọhng oyonga. Mẹ wọ, kọ ọmaana adeho p'Israẹl akhaambi achina k'ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip atza aben-ẹ bi, Ọvaar Ibinọpkaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọpkaabyi kw'abaHiburu okk'man abẹ ottema. Mẹ wọ, tte man ọbọhk mosi orenga kw'iwu ittaan mochina k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi, ifha mosi njafọhni ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwaman.
EXO 3:19 Yina, kaam nnong kẹ bi, ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip bọng ọbọhk kótte bọng afona, kw'oyongi bi ẹfa ch'ideden ẹkwẹ-ẹ.
EXO 3:20 Mẹ wọ, kaam ńdima ẹfa chaam nnang anọng p'Ijip ettuma, kaam ńsi idik kpenamkpen s'ipe anọng for k'ottem kwabẹ. K'ekponga-nnam, kẹ otte bọng ọbọhk otte, bọng afona.
EXO 3:21 “Kaam mbiri ńsi anọng p'Ijip asi ọphyaam anang bọng, ifha mada bọng ábina orenga, bọng aningi mbọhk-mbọhk afon.
EXO 3:22 Kwanọng kpenamkpen ochina k'ojip-kwanọng kw'orukhi ọbaang-ẹ, ọmaana k'ojip-kwanọng kw'orukhi k'ọhọhm kwẹ, ọ́bọbh-ẹ agimma pa gol, ọmaana p'asilva, ttara ọbara fa for fa bọng áfhọra va pa bọng p'ijinọng ọmaana p'ipanọng. M'eden nda dọ cha bọng arenga achi anọng p'Ijip ọgbọm.”
EXO 4:1 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs obhina bi, “Kaam ńsi yan, idikha bẹ ani kaam k'odik-ọkka atzọk, bẹ itzọhng kabira ayonga anang-m, bẹ an-aben bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kọ abẹ koyini khi?”
EXO 4:2 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Mbọng vọ fa kọ atzim k'ọbọhk kwọ o?” Mosẹs obhina bi, “Ochikhura e.”
EXO 4:3 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ bhari ochikhura nwuma k'irerek.” Mosẹs ọbhari chẹ k'irek, ochikhura nwa oreng jọhk, Mosẹs ọrọbh oji chẹ.
EXO 4:4 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben-ẹ bi, “Nemi ọbọhk kwọ abọkha jọhk nda k'ẹsara.” Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs onemi ọbọhk ọbọkha jọhk nda k'ẹsara, jọhk en-ebiri ẹbhakhi ochikhura k'ọbọhk kwẹ.
EXO 4:5 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Si mando, ifha bẹ akhera bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'abatte Abraham, ọmaana Isaak, ttara Jekọb akpobh, ọkk'ọ abẹ oyina.”
EXO 4:6 Mẹ wọ e, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obiro oben bi, “Kọ khe ọbọhk kwọ k'ọphaangi kw'ittemmọma kw'ọnọhma-baba kwọ ẹtzaanga.” Mosẹs osi mando. Mada ọn-ọrọbh ọbọhk, ọbọhk on-ode okkim-okkima kw'owuri bi gwaang.
EXO 4:7 “Kọ biri kpa nnam akhe ọbọhk kwọ k'ọphaangi kw'ittemmọma kw'ọnọhma-baba kwọ ẹtzaanga.” Mosẹs osi mando. Mada ọn-ọrọbh ọbọhk, ọbọhk on-obiro ọkpa nnam ode mach'ira okkekkeni ode.
EXO 4:8 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Idikha anọng ani kọ itzọhng ayong, bẹ k'echeden-kọhkha kabira akhera, bẹ afha akhera k'ẹkhọhkha ch'ettong mfa.
EXO 4:9 Yina, idikha bẹ ani kọ itzọhng akher ayonga, bẹ ka ngọhkha nna mfa kabira akhera, kọ rọhng atza akhaabha asi k'ọraanga kwa Nile, akwu abyengi k'ogbin. Asi mba p'akhaabha k'ọraanga án-areng izi m'irerek.”
EXO 4:10 Mosẹs oben Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, akk'aronga bi, ttẹwọr k'ittẹwọr maa, apyiri mada am-agbaak ọtzọhmnọng kwọ atzim mba ma, kaam mgbagbaakha kimkpo. Kaam mgbagbaakha igaang-m ọgaangi, mbiri nyek atzim.”
EXO 4:11 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi on-oben-ẹ bi, “Anyi wọ ọnangi ọnọngẹya ẹmma ch'otzim ọgbaak atzim o? Anyi wọ osi ọnọngẹya ọkpa itzọhng ttara ẹmma? Anyi wọ osi ọnọngẹya ore iyaan, obiro ọsẹ-ẹ ọkpa chen o? Kaam Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi arang na a?
EXO 4:12 Mẹ wọ, kọ rọhng, kaam ńdaakh-ọ atzim ọtzaakhi, mbiri ḿkpebh-ọ atzim okpebhi p'agbaak.”
EXO 4:13 Yina, Mosẹs oben bi, “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, tte mphyem-ọ bi, ira atzọhm ọnọng ọdọdọk.”
EXO 4:14 Mẹ wọ, ettem ebhem Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, on-oben Mosẹs bi, “Agbaanakka Aarọn kw'ofon k'ẹnọmma cha Lẹvi owobh mẹ. Kaam nnong-ẹ bi ode ọnọng kw'okpo mgbagbaakha k'eden ọkkakka. Kẹ oreng k'eden okwuma bi okwu okhebh-ọ e, sa kẹ obiro owobha k'ottemdaamiji mada ọrọ-ọ.
EXO 4:15 Kọ gbaakh-ẹ atzim p'ọgbaak. Kaam ńdaakhi bọng anọng afa atzim ọtzaakhi, mbiri mbgaak bọng odem kwa bọng akhaambi asi.
EXO 4:16 Aarọn wọ ọ́gbaak anọng mba atzim k'eho chọ. Kẹ wọ óde mach'igbaakhi sọ, kọ abira ade mach'Ibinọkpaabyi anaang-ẹ.
EXO 4:17 Yina, kọ tzọkha ochikhura kwọ atzima k'ọbọhk, ifha kọ afha atzima chẹ asi ngọhkha s'ipe anọng for.”
EXO 4:18 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs ọkpa nnam ka Jẹtro kw'ode otte kwa kwanọng kwẹ, oben-ẹ bi, “Tte mkpa nnam k'anọng paam k'Ijip, ifha nda nne s'ọnọng manda wani otzima orukhi kẹ.” Jẹtro oben bi, “Phyaa, do renga o.”
EXO 4:19 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'Mosẹs obena ka Midiyan bi, “Kọ kpa nnam k'Ijip, kkeri anọng mba p'iwa abeni bi, afhọ-ọ, akk'apa e.”
EXO 4:20 Mando kwa Mosẹs ọtzọk kwanọng kwẹ, ọmaana va pẹ p'ijinọng ọnana bẹ k'ẹnyanyaang, obiro ọtzọkha ochikhura kw'Ibinọkpaabyi oben-ẹ bi, otzima k'ọbọhk, obina orenga ọkpa nnam k'Ijip.
EXO 4:21 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Mada akpa nnam k'Ijip, kọ akhaambi ado for bi, asi ikkokkoni-dik nna biphyir sa nkk'ọ ẹfa nnanga bi, asi k'itzitzikha sa Phero. Yina, kaam ńsi Phero ọbar ettem, oningi anọng mba ọbọhk otte bẹ afona.
EXO 4:22 Mẹ wọ, ben Phero bi, ‘Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obeni bi, Israẹl wọ ode ocheden-nwa kwaam kw'ijinọng.
EXO 4:23 Kaam mben-ọ bi, “Tte nnwa kwaam ọbọhk ofona otza okpobh-m.” Yina, kọ abhum bi attẹ-ẹ ọbọhk ofona. Mẹ wọ, kaam ḿfhu ocheden-nwa kwọ kw'ijinọng.’ ”
EXO 4:24 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oyin Mosẹs abẹ k'ibe s'otzim anọng pẹ obhing, ọkham bi, ọfhẹ-ẹ.
EXO 4:25 Yina, Zipọra kw'ode kwanọng kwa Mosẹs ọtzọkha ọtza kw'ọjaabhi mach'imaana, osi nnwa kwẹ ọkpakkọrikkọ, ọtzọkha ẹkpakpa ch'ọkk'ọkpaara ọttọhmi Mosẹs ka mmokpatzọkhi, oben bi, “K'odik ọkkakka, oreng m'izi nna kọ an-ade odim kwaam.”
EXO 4:26 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otte Mosẹs ọbọhk oruk akpen. M'ogbe nwa wọ kwa Zipora obeni bi, “Odim kwaam kw'oreng k'izi, okhuri ọkpakkọrikkọ.”
EXO 4:27 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Aarọn bi, “Rọhng atza akhebha Mosẹs k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi.” Mando kw'Aarọn ofon otza okhebha Mosẹs k'egbegbeho ch'Ibinọkpaabyi owobh, ọbaakh-ẹ.
EXO 4:28 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs ọgbaak Aarọn odik kpenamkpen kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹ ọgbaakha bi, ọgbaakh-ẹ. Wa obiro ọgbaakh-ẹ odik kpenamkpen kw'okhuri ngọhkha sa mpe ọnọng for s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhn-ẹ bi osi.
EXO 4:29 Wa Mosẹs ttara Aarọn atza ayeri adeden-nọng p'anọng p'Israẹl biphyir atzobha.
EXO 4:30 Wa Aarọn ọgbaak bẹ odik kpenamkpen kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'Mosẹs ọgbaakha, obiro osi ngọhkha nna k'itzitzikha s'anọng mba.
EXO 4:31 Wa anọng mba akhera. Mada anọng mba abhaang bi Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ihem-dema s'anọng p'Israẹl awobh ọra, ọmaana bi, om-ochibhi odik okhuri bẹ, bẹ achunga nho anang-ẹ ikpokpobha.
EXO 5:1 Ayongi mẹ, Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn atza akhebha Phero, aben bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl, obeni bi, ‘Tte anọng paam ọbọhk afona, ifha bẹ atza asi ọdadaami kw'ikpokpobha k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi, anang-m.’ ”
EXO 5:2 Mẹ wọ, Phero oben bi, “Anyi wọ ode Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kwa kaam nnọbh ka chen maa, ntte anọng p'Israẹl ọbọhk bẹ afona? Kaam Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kinnong! Anọng p'Israẹl ọbọhk kíntte bẹ afona.”
EXO 5:3 Iwa Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn, aben bi, “Ibinọkpaabyi kw'abaHiburu okk'man abẹ ottema. Mẹ wọ, tte mobina orenga kw'iwu ittaan mochina k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi, ifha mọtza osi njafọhni ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwaman. Oni mando ode, kẹ ọfha ọnang man ihem k'adem-k'adem, ayongi mẹ, ofha ofhu man ttara ọkkangkkaang.”
EXO 5:4 Yina, ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip ọn-ọbọbh Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn bi, “Ode yan kwa bọng akwọbh anọng mba ọtzọhm fa bẹ am-asi o? Bọng kpa nnam k'itzọhm sabọng!”
EXO 5:5 Mẹ wọ, Phero oben bi, “Bọng kker e, anọng p'irek nna akk'an-ahaabha, yina, bọng am-akwọbha bẹ ọtzọhm osisi.”
EXO 5:6 M'ewu nduma dani, Phero ọnang akker-atzọhmnọng ọmaana akkeri-itzọhm ẹfa bi:
EXO 5:7 “Bọng anọng mba araraari-bukhi pa bẹ am-atzima abanga atza dọk kànang. Tte bẹ areng-mmo atza aror araraari-bukhi pa bẹ am-aztima abanga atza.
EXO 5:8 Yina, bọng si bẹ abanga ọtzabhik kwa bẹ am-akkekkeni abanga, bọng kàjekhi. Bẹ akpọhr-ọkpọhra e, kwẹ gwọ osi bẹ am-abhom bi, ‘Tte mofona, mọtza osi ẹjafọhni ọnang Ibinọkpaabyi kwaman.’
EXO 5:9 Bọng si ọtzọhm mva fẹ ọgaang-ọgaangi ọnang ajinọng mba, ifha bẹ am-asi ọtzọhm, bẹ aningi ogbe akhaam kwa bẹ ayonga itzọhng k'ibhora manda rani.”
EXO 5:10 Mẹ wọ, akker-atzọhmnọng ọmaana akkeri-itzọhm p'Israẹl, afona atza agbaak anọng mba bi, “Ma wọ ode odik kwa Phero ọgbaakhi: ‘Kaam bọng araraaribukhi pa bẹ am-atzima abanga atza dọk kinnang.
EXO 5:11 Bọng nọhng atza aror araraari-bukhi, pa bẹ am-atzima abanga atza k'ibe sa bọng aroror, yina, ọtzọhm fabọng kòjekhi mebubuni.’ ”
EXO 5:12 Mẹ wọ, anọng mba an-akpaanga makhọra Ijip, aror araraari-bukhi pa bẹ atzima abanga atza.
EXO 5:13 Akker-atzọhmnọng mba achina ororo anyuni bẹ k'ẹfa, aben bi, “Bọng kyera ọtzọhm fabọng f'ewu, macha bọng am-akkekkeni asi, k'ogbe kwa bẹ am-anang bọng araraari-bukhi.”
EXO 5:14 Akker-atzọhmnọng pa Phero otzek, abọkha akkeri-itzọhm p'Israẹl attum ngwur, abira abọbh bẹ bi, “Okhuri yan kw'ọtzabhik kwa bọng abang ikhena ttara mayina, oni obhik kwa bọng am-akkekkeni abanga opyir o?”
EXO 5:15 Mẹ wọ, akkem-itzọhm p'Israẹl afona atza abhom akpẹkhi Phero, aben-ẹ bi, “Itta, okhuri yan kwa kọ am-asi atzọhmnọng pọ manda o?
EXO 5:16 Bẹ atzọhmnọng pọ araraari-bukhi pa bẹ am-atzima abanga atza dọk kanangi. Yina, bẹ am-aben man bi, ‘Bọng banga atza!’ Bẹ am-attum atzọhmnọng pọ, kaambi ode bi ottotto ode kw'anọng pọ.”
EXO 5:17 Phero obhina bẹ bi, “Ọkpọra e, bọng akpọr-ọkpọra e! Kwẹ wọ osi bọng am-aben bi, ‘Tte mofona, motza osi ẹjafọhni ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.’
EXO 5:18 Bọng kpa nnam k'ọtzọhm. Bẹ bọng araraari-bukhi pa bẹ am-atzima abanga atza kánang, yina, bọng akhaambi abanga ọtzabhik kwa bọng am-akkekkeni abanga.”
EXO 5:19 Akkeri-itzọhm p'Israẹl akwu atzin bi, odik wọ om-otto mẹ, da bẹ abeni bi, “Bọng ọtzabhik kwa bọng am-abanga kw'ewu kàkhaambi ajekhi.”
EXO 5:20 Mada bẹ abin ka Phero, bẹ are Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn p'am-atzik bẹ,
EXO 5:21 bẹ aben bi, “Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'ore bọng, ọkpaara aponga pabọng! Bọng akk'asa mopyibh k'itzitzikha sa Phero, ọmaana akhaan-nọng pẹ, bọng abira khe bẹ ọkkangkkaang k'ọbọhk bi, bẹ afhu man.”
EXO 5:22 Mẹ wọ e, Mosẹs ọkpa nnam k'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, oben bi, “O Itta, okhuri yan kwa akhe anọng mba ka dama-dama o? Kwẹ wọ osi atzọhm-m o?
EXO 5:23 Tzọni k'ogbe kwa ndim che chọ nda mgbaak Phero atzim, ọkk'anọng mba ọkha ka dama-dama, kọ bẹ kabira akkaana mebubuni.”
EXO 6:1 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Kọ án-are ọttọhk fa ńsi Phero, okhuri bi, ófona k'ẹfa chaam, kẹ ótte anọng paam ọbọhk, bẹ afona. Ófona k'ẹfa chaam, kẹ ọkhaam ma for sẹ ókhubh bẹ, k'ẹkhọma chẹ.”
EXO 6:2 Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Kaam wọ nde Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 6:3 Wa kaam nyini Abraham, ọmaana Isaak, ttara Jekọb abẹ, mach'Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir. Yina, kaam che chaam ch'ede Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kinjaakhi nnang bẹ.
EXO 6:4 Wa kaam mbiri nchekhi bi, nnang bẹ irerek sa Kenaan, nnuma s'iwa bẹ arukhi mach'akhekhennọng.
EXO 6:5 Kaam nkk'ẹmọng ch'anọng p'Israẹl abhomi k'ebira cha bẹ awobh k'Ijip mmaanga, kaam nkk'echekhi chaam mbiri njima.
EXO 6:6 “Mẹ wọ, gbaak anọng p'Israẹl bi, ‘Kaam wọ nde Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Kaam wọ ńnọbha bọng k'ọyak kw'ihem s'anọng p'Ijip. Kaam ḿbiri nnọbha bọng k'ebira cha bẹ akhe bọng. Kaam ndima ẹfa chaam mmek bọng, ḿbiri ndima chẹ ńsi aponga adaam bọng.
EXO 6:7 Kaam ńdọkha bọng mach'anọng paam, ḿbiri nde Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng. Órenga mẹ, bọng áronga bi, kaam wọ nde Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng, kw'ọrọbh bọng k'ọyak kw'ihem s'anọng p'Ijip.
EXO 6:8 Kaam ḿbiri ndima bọng ma mpyiri k'irerek nnuma, s'iwa nchekhi ttara ọmmakkakkari bi, nnang Abraham, ọmaana Isaak, ttara Jekọb. Kaam ńnang bọng irerek nnuma bi, in-ide sabọng. Kaam wọ nde Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.’ ”
EXO 6:9 Wa Mosẹs ọtzọkha idik nna ọgbaak anọng p'Israẹl, yina, bẹ kẹ itzọhng kayong, okhuri akpen p'akk'bẹ abenga ọmaana ihem barambar sa bẹ awobh.
EXO 6:10 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi,
EXO 6:11 “Rọhng atza agbaak Phero kw'ode ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip bi, tte otte anọng p'Israẹl ọbọhk bẹ abina aji ẹkhọma chẹ.”
EXO 6:12 Yina, Mosẹs ọbọbh Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “Idikha anọng p'Israẹl an-itzọhng ayong anang-m, Phero on-osi yan oyong-m itzọhng o, da kaam nyekhi atzim o?”
EXO 6:13 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọgbaak Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn odik kw'okhuri anọng p'Israẹl ọmaana ọvaar Phero kw'Ijip, ọnang ẹfa bi, bẹ atzima anọng p'Israẹl abina aji Ijip.
EXO 6:14 Ma wọ ode aho pa mfona sabẹ: Va p'ijinọng pa Reubẹn, kw'ode ocheden-nwa kw'ijinọng kwa Israẹl ade: Hanọk, ọmaana Palu, ọmaana Hẹzrọn, ttara Karmi. Ma wọ iwa ode efona cha Reubẹn.
EXO 6:15 Wa Simeọn obhoni va p'ijinọng pa ade: Jemuyẹl, ọmaana Jamin, ọmaana Ọhad, ọmaana Jakin, ọmaana Zoha, ttara Shaul, kw'ode nnwa kw'oKenaan-kwanọng ọmaani ọnang-ẹ, Ma wọ iwa ode efona cha Simeọn.
EXO 6:16 Ma wọ ode che pa va p'ijinọng pa Lẹvi obhoni atzor ka ndori sabẹ; Gẹrshọn, ọmaana Kohat ttara Mẹrari. Biphyir-phyir wa Lẹvi orukhi cho arọbh azadani obhiri chi obhiri afa.
EXO 6:17 Wa va p'ijinọng pa Gẹrshọn obhoni ka nnọmma sabẹ ade: Libni ttara Shimeyi.
EXO 6:18 Wa va p'ijinọng pa Kohat obhoni ade: Amram, ọmaana Izha, ọmaana Hẹbrọn, ttara Uziyẹl. Biphyir-phyir wa Kohat orukhi cho arọbh azadani obhiri jobh obhiri attaan.
EXO 6:19 Wa Mẹrari obhon va p'ijinọng p'ade: Mali ọmaana Mushi. Ma wọ ode nnọmma sa Lẹvi atzor ka ndori sabẹ.
EXO 6:20 Wa Amram ọtzọk Jokẹbẹd kw'ode ọgbaanọkka kw'otte kwẹ, k'ọbada, kw'ọmaan-ẹ Aarọn ọmaana Mosẹs. Biphyir-phyir wa Amram orukhi cho arọbh azadani obhiri chi obhiri afa.
EXO 6:21 Wa Izha obhon va p'ijinọng p'ade: Kọra ọmaana Nẹphẹg, ttara Zikiri.
EXO 6:22 Wa Uziyẹl obhon va p'ijinọng p'ade: Mishayẹl, ọmaana Ẹlzaphan, ttara Sitri.
EXO 6:23 Wa Aarọn ọtzọk Ẹlisheba kw'ode ominanwa kw'Aminadab k'ọbada, kw'obiro ode ọgbaanọkka kwa Nashọn, ọmaan-ẹ Nadab ọmaana Abihu, ọmaana Ẹleyaza, ttara Itamar.
EXO 6:24 Va p'ijinọng pa Kọra ade Asir, ọmaana Ẹlkana, ttara Abiyasaph. Ma wọ iwa ode nnọmma sa Kọra.
EXO 6:25 Wa Ẹleyaza kw'Aarọn obhoni ọtzọk ominanwa kwa Putiyẹl k'ọbada, ọmaan-ẹ Phinẹhas. Ma wọ iwa ode aho pa nhọhmmọr sa Lẹvi, k'ẹnọmma-k'ẹnọmma.
EXO 6:26 Aarọn nwa ttara Mosẹs bọ p'iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obeni bi, “Bọng dima anọng p'Israẹl abina aji Ijip, ka ngaan sabẹ.”
EXO 6:27 Bẹ anọng mba afa kw'ode Aarọn ọmaana Mosẹs bọ iwa agbaakhi ọvaar Phero kw'Ijip atzim, okhuri ebina ch'anọng p'Israẹl k'Ijip.
EXO 6:28 Mada Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọgbaakhi Mosẹs atzim k'Ijip,
EXO 6:29 oben Mosẹs bi, “Kaam wọ nde Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Gbaak ọvaar Phero kw'Ijip idik nna biphyir sa mgbaakh-ọ.”
EXO 6:30 Yina, Mosẹs oben Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “Mada kaam nde ọnọng kw'oyekhi atzim, Phero on-osi yan oyong-m itzọhng o?”
EXO 7:1 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Kker e, kaam nkk'ọ nsa bi, ade mach'Ibinọkpaabyi k'itzitzikha sa Phero e, agbaanakka Aarọn wọ óde ọsẹjaakhi kwọ.
EXO 7:2 Kọ gbaak agbaanakka Aarọn odik kpenamkpen kwa kaam mgbaakh-ọ, ifha kẹ ọgbaak Phero otte anọng p'Israẹl ọbọhk, bẹ bina k'ẹkhọma chẹ.
EXO 7:3 Yina, kaam ńsi Phero ọbar ettem, chibhi da nsi ngọhkha haabhada, ọmaana idik s'ipe anọng for k'Ijip,
EXO 7:4 Phero kọ itzọhng kóyonga. Mẹ wọ, kaam nsi ijoradik k'Ijip, mbiri ndima ẹfa chaam nnang anọng p'Ijip ettuma ch'ideden, ńdima ngaan s'anọng paam p'Israẹl mbina k'Ijip.
EXO 7:5 Anọng p'Ijip áronga bi, kaam wọ nde Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, k'ogbe kwa nsi ijoradik k'Ijip, mbiri ndima anọng p'Israẹl mbina.”
EXO 7:6 Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn asi mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhni bẹ.
EXO 7:7 Wa Mosẹs ode cho arọbh anna, Aarọn ode cho arọbh anna obhir attaan, mada bẹ agbaakhi Phero idik nna.
EXO 7:8 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn bi,
EXO 7:9 “Idikha Phero obeni bọng bi, bọng si odik kw'ope ọnọng fọr, ben Aarọn bi, ‘Tzọkha ochikhura kwọ bhari m'irerek, m'itzitzikha sa Phero,’ ochikhura nwuma on-oreng jọhk.”
EXO 7:10 Mando kwa Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn afona atza akhebha Phero, bẹ asi mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhni bẹ. Aarọn ọtzọkha ochikhura kwẹ ọbhari k'irerek m'itzitzikha sa Phero ọmaana akhaan-nọng pẹ, ochikhura nwuma on-oreng jọhk.
EXO 7:11 Mẹ wọ, Phero oyeri ajinọng p'akhaam eronga ọmaana abọhnga-nọng, anọng p'am-asi mbọhng k'Ijip, bẹ akwu asi odem nwuma wani ttara mfhọna sabẹ.
EXO 7:12 Ọnọng-ọnọng ọbhari ochikhura kwẹ, achikhura mba an-areng jọhk. Yina, ochikhura kw'Aarọn on-omyi pabẹ biphyir.
EXO 7:13 Kaambi mẹ wọ, Phero odo ettem ọbar, itzọhng koyong ọnang bẹ, mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọgbaakha.
EXO 7:14 Iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Ettem cha Phero k'ebhon e, kẹ otzim obhum-obhum bi, otte anọng paam ọbọhk bẹ afona.
EXO 7:15 Rọhng atza akhebha Phero mada ọtza asi k'ekpebha. Kọ wobha m'ẹraangakha cha Nile atzikh-ẹ, atzima ochikhura nwuma kw'ira orengi jọhk atzima k'ọbọhk.
EXO 7:16 Mẹ wọ, gbaakh-ẹ bi, ‘Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'aHiburu, wọ ọtzọhm-m bi mgbaakh-ọ bi, atte anọng pẹ ọbọhk bẹ afona, ifha bẹ atza akpobh-ẹ k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi. Yina, ma apyiri ma kakher bi, ayonga itzọhng.
EXO 7:17 Ma wọ ode odik kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obeni bi, on-ofona ma kọ aronga bi, kẹ wọ ode Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi: Kaam ndima ochikhura nwa kwa ndim m'ọbọhk mbun m'ọraanga kwa Nile, ọ́n-ọbhakhi ode izizi.
EXO 7:18 Nden sa nwobh ka Nile ḿpe, ọraanga kwa Nile ón-obiro ohom eruk maa, anọng p'Ijip asi pẹ dọk kafha agwo.’ ”
EXO 7:19 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Ben Aarọn bi, tzima ochikhura nwuma kw'atzim k'ọbọhk kwọ atzena k'ọraanga kw'Ijip, ọmaana ka ngekha, ọmaana mmen, ọmaana ka nsipe, ttara k'asi pa bẹ aye-oye, ifha bẹ an-abhakhi ade izizi. Izi in-iwobha k'ibe kpenamkpen k'Ijip, kaambi k'agbere pa bẹ atzim nchi, ttara atza asi bọ.”
EXO 7:20 Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn asi mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'bẹ ọtzọhna. M'itzitzikha sa Phero, ọmaana akhaan-nọng pẹ, Aarọn otzini ochikhura kwẹ obun m'ọraanga kwa Nile, asi biphyir an-ade izi-izi.
EXO 7:21 Nden s'ọraanga kwa Nile mpe, asi an-ahom eruk maa anọng p'Ijip asi pẹ dọk kafha agwo. Ijip biphyir on-ode izi-izi.
EXO 7:22 Yina, anọng p'am-asi mbọng k'Ijip asi idik nnuma rani ttara mfhọhna sabẹ. Mẹ wọ, Phero ochina ororo ọbar ettem, itzọhng kokher oyonga ọnang Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn, mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọgbaakha.
EXO 7:23 Phero ọkpa nnam ochina k'ọvaar-dimpa kwẹ, idik nna k'ettem kokhe.
EXO 7:24 Mẹ wọ, anọng p'Ijip biphyir atza atzum ọkhaan-ọkhaan kw'ọraanga kwa Nile, ifha bẹ are asi pa bẹ afha agwo, okhuri da bẹ ani asi p'ọraanga nwa dọk afha agwo.
EXO 7:25 Wa iwu izenamfa ikwu ikwọbha, mada Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhakhi ọraanga kwa Nile ode izi-izi.
EXO 8:1 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Rọhng atza gbaak Phero bi, ‘Kaam Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi mbeni bi, tte otte anọng paam ọbọhk bẹ afona ifha bẹ akwu akpobh-m.
EXO 8:2 Idikha obhumi bi, otte bẹ ọbọhk bẹ afona, kaam ndọhm awọribọhk k'ọhaabh makhọra ẹkhọma chẹ biphyir.
EXO 8:3 Ọraanga kwa Nile on-ofu ttara awọribọhk. Awọribọhk mba an-abira anyaami k'ọvaar-dimpa kwẹ maa, apyiri k'ẹmaanggọ chẹ ọmaana k'iyimabe sẹ, ttara k'ihọhm s'akhaan-nọng pẹ, ọmaana k'ihọhm s'anọng pẹ maa, apyiri k'ibe sa bẹ am-asi ọchattọhk fẹ.
EXO 8:4 Awọribọhk mba ágbe anan-ẹ, ọmaana anọng pẹ, ttara akhaan-nọng pẹ ka for.’ ”
EXO 8:5 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Gbaak Aarọn bi, onemi ọbọhk kwẹ ttara ochikhura kwẹ k'ọraanga, ọmaana ka mmen ttara ka nsipe, ifha awọribọhk ayin makhọra irek s'Ijip.”
EXO 8:6 Mando kw'Aarọn onemi ọbọhk kwẹ otzena k'asi p'Ijip biphyir, awọribọhk ayin makhọra Ijip.
EXO 8:7 Yina, anọng p'am-asi mbọhng k'Ijip abira akwu asi mfhọna sabẹ, awọribọhk ayin makhọra irek s'Ijip.
EXO 8:8 Mẹ wọ, Phero oyeri Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn, oben bi, “Bọng nzi njọhm akhukhi Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ifha ọrọbha awọribọhk mba k'ọhọhm kwaam, ọmaana k'ihọhm s'anọng paam, kaam ńtte anọng mba ọbọhk otte bẹ afona atza asi ẹjafọhni anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kwabẹ.”
EXO 8:9 Mosẹs oben Phero bi, “Kaam ntte odik kpenamkpen ọbọhk nnang-ọ bi, akhe ogbe kwa kaam nzi njọhm k'eho chọ, ọmaana ch'akhaan-nọng pọ, ttara anọng pọ bi, ayongi awọribọhk p'an-arik k'ọraanga kwa Nile, awọribọhk atte ẹhọhmmọr chọ, ọmaana nhọhmmọr s'anọng pọ ọbọhk, otte.”
EXO 8:10 Mẹ wọ, Phero oben bi, “Ophyin e.” Mosẹs obhina bi, “Kwẹ óde-ode mach'abeni, ifha aronga bi, ọnọng kode kwa ode mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwaman.
EXO 8:11 Awọribọhk átte kọ, ọmaana ebhonmọr chọ ọbọhk otte, ọmaana akhaan-nọng pọ, ttara anọng pọ, k'ọraanga kwa Nile wọ kwa bẹ an-arik.”
EXO 8:12 Mada Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn abin aji Phero, Mosẹs ozi njọhm, ọgbaak Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi odik kwa okhuri awọribọhk p'ọkk'ọtzọhma ọnang Phero.
EXO 8:13 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaanga njọhm sa Mosẹs ophyemi, awọribọhk mba ape k'ihọhm, ọmaana ka ntọhmma-ttem, ttara k'iwoni.
EXO 8:14 Wa bẹ atzobha awọribọhk mba k'akhung-k'akhung maa, ephyok ch'awọribọhk mba ẹtzọkha irek nna biphyir.
EXO 8:15 Yina, mada Phero ore bi awọribọhk dọk kade, odo ettem ọbar, itzọhng dọk koyong ọnang Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn, mach'iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'obena.
EXO 8:16 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Ben Aarọn bi, onemi ochikhura kwo otzim k'ọbọhk kwẹ obun k'ọkpọm k'irek, ifha irerek s'Ijip biphyir, ín-ide abubuni-abubuni.”
EXO 8:17 Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn asi mach'Ọvaar ọtzọhni bẹ. Mada Aarọn onemi ọbọhk ttara ochikhura kwẹ obun k'ọkpọm k'irek, abubuni ayin abẹ anọng ka for ọmaana nden. Mẹ wọ, ọkpọhm kw'irerek s'Ijip biphyir on-ode abubuni-abubuni.
EXO 8:18 Chibhi da anọng p'am-asi mbọhng k'Ijip, akhong bi asi mfhọna sabẹ, ifha abubuni abira ayin, bẹ kafha asi. Mẹ wọ, abubuni mba achina ororo abubha anọngẹya ọmaana nden.
EXO 8:19 Anọng mba p'am-asi mbọhng an-aben Phero bi, “Ọbọhk kw'Ibinọkpaabyi owobh m'odik nwa e.” Yina, Phero ochina ororo ọgaangi eho, itzọhng kokher oyonga m'idik nna, mach'iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'obena.
EXO 8:20 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Bina k'ekpekpebha, atza akwunga Phero ọmma da ọtza asi k'ọraanga, agbaakh-ẹ bi, ‘Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obeni bi: Tte anọng paam ọbọhk bẹ afona, ifha bẹ atza akpobh-m.
EXO 8:21 Idikha ani anọng paam ọbọhk atte bẹ afona, kaam ńdọhm araraang k'ọhaabh nchen kọ, ọmaana akhaan-nọng pọ, ọmaana anọng pọ, ttara k'ihọhm sabọng. Araraang áfhu ihọhm s'anọng p'Ijip, bẹ abira abubha k'irerek biphyir.
EXO 8:22 “ ‘Yina, m'ewu nduma, kaam ńgọm ẹkhọma cha Goshẹn, ch'anọng paam arukhi nhok, araraang kẹ káde, ifha áronga bi kaam Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi nwobh m'irerek nna.
EXO 8:23 Kaam nsi odengọmi owobha k'anọng paam ọmaana pọ. Ẹkhọhkha nda ch'épe ọnọng for, étto ophyini.’ ”
EXO 8:24 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi mach'ọgbaakhi, ọtzọhm araraang k'ọhaabh adim k'ọvaar-dimpa kwa Phero, ọmaana k'ihọhm s'akhaan-nọng pẹ. Araraang afhu k'irerek s'Ijip biphyir.
EXO 8:25 Mẹ wọ, Phero oyeri Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn, oben bi, “Bọng nọhng atza asi njafọhni anang Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng m'irerek nna.”
EXO 8:26 Yina, Mosẹs oben bi, “Mma, kwẹ mando kotzor e. Njafọhni s'am-amosi anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwaman, mkpukhi anọng p'Ijip okpukhi. Idikha mon-osi njafọhni sa mkpukhi bẹ, bẹ man atza kátzọbh o?
EXO 8:27 Mẹ wọ, maman ọkhaambi obina orenga kw'iwu ittaan mochina k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi, ifha mosi njafọhni ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwaman, mach'ọtzọhni man.”
EXO 8:28 Mẹ wọ, Phero oben bi, “Kaam ntte bọng ọbọhk otte bọng atza asi njafọhni anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi. Yina, bọng kakhaambi afona k'ibe s'ibhir-obhir. Bọng ńzi njọhm anang-m.”
EXO 8:29 Mosẹs obhina bi, “Kaam mbin ma, ńzi njọhm ozi nnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Ophyini araraang mba atte kọ, ọmaana akhaan-nọng pọ, ttara anọng pọ ọbọhk otte. Kọ re bi, Phero bọng dọk kọbọra bi, ọkpa anọng mba eden bi, bẹ aningi njafọhn atza asi anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.”
EXO 8:30 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs obina oji Phero, otza ozi njọhm ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 8:31 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaanga njọhm nna sa Mosẹs ophyemi bi, araraang mba atte Phero ọmaana akhaan-nọng pẹ, ttara anọng pẹ ọbọhk. Ẹraraang mada dani ch'ebire erik kede.
EXO 8:32 Yina, Phero obiro okhebha mẹ ọgaangi eho, anọng mba ọbọhk kokher otte, bẹ afona.
EXO 9:1 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Rọhng ka Phero, atza agbaakh-ẹ bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'abaHiburu obeni bi, ‘Tte anọng paam ọbọhk bẹ afona, ifha bẹ atza akpobh-m.
EXO 9:2 Idikha abhumi bi atte bẹ ọbọhk, achin ororo abọkha bẹ ahok,
EXO 9:3 kaam Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ńgọhkha bọng nkwuri s'ideden k'etzirakpo py'ewobh k'owoni, py'ede: nnyanyaang, ọmaana abhaam, ọmaana akamẹl, ọmaana andaamogbodo, ọmaana arukhimaan ttara avu.
EXO 9:4 Yina, kaam Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ńgọmi etzirakpo py'anọng p'Israẹl ewobha, k'etzirakpo py'anọng p'Ijip. Otzirattọhk manda vani f'anọng p'Israẹl kópe.’ ”
EXO 9:5 Mando kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okhe ogbe, oben bi, “Ophyini wọ kwa kaam Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ńsi odik nwa m'irek nna.”
EXO 9:6 Ewu ehobh mẹ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi mach'obeni. Etzirakpo py'anọng p'Ijip epe biphyir, yina, otzirattọhk manda vani f'anọng p'Israẹl f'ope kode.
EXO 9:7 Mẹ wọ ofon, Phero ọtzọhm ajinọng bani bẹ atza adọhn odik nwa, bẹ are bi, ode odik-ọkka bi, otzirattọhk manda vani f'anọng p'Israẹl f'ọkk'ọpa, kode. Kaambi mẹ wọ, Phero ochina ororo ọgaangi eho, obhum bi, otte anọng p'Israẹl ọbọhk bẹ afona.
EXO 9:8 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn bi, “Bọng kpokhi ọtzọtzọhng-khọhma ka nkwukha ka mbọhkpattem sabọng, tte Mosẹs okwuri ọtzọtzọhng-khọhma nwa k'iwokhi, Phero obe mẹ ore.
EXO 9:9 Itzọtzọhng nna íyaami mach'ọkpọm makhọra irerek s'Ijip, sẹ ín-itzima aphyi p'anwa ibhan ikwu, p'asi anọngeya, ọmaana nden makhọra irek nna.”
EXO 9:10 Mẹ wọ, bẹ akpokhi ọtzọtzọhng-khọhma ka nkwukha, akwu abe Phero k'itzitzikha. Mosẹs ọtzọkha sẹ okwuri k'iwokhi, aphyi p'anwa ibhan abhona anọngẹya ọmaana etzirakpo bi wooii.
EXO 9:11 Wa anọng p'am-asi mbọhng, bẹ Mosẹs k'itzitzikha kafha abe, okhuri aphyi p'asi bẹ, ọmaana anọng p'Ijip biphyir.
EXO 9:12 Yina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi Phero odo eho ọgaangi, itzọhng koyong ọnang Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn, mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'Mosẹs ọgbaakha.
EXO 9:13 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Bina atza akwunga Phero okpebhamma, aben-ẹ bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'abaHiburu obeni bi, ‘Tte anọng paam ọbọhk bẹ afona, ifha bẹ atza akpobh-m.
EXO 9:14 Oni mando ode, m'ogbe nwa, kaam nna ngọhkha kọ ọmaana akhaan-nọng pọ nkwuri s'ideden, ifha kọ aronga bi, ọnọng kw'ode macha kaam, makhọra ọyagbin, kode.
EXO 9:15 Ọban bi, nnamanda ira nkk'ettuma ndọhma nnang kọ ọmaana anọng pọ, ttara nkwuri s'ira nkk'bọng ifha, mbiri ndimi bọng m'ọyagbin.
EXO 9:16 Yina, odik kw'osi nttọ-ọ ọbọhk, awobha akpen ode bi, ifha are ẹfa chaam, ọmaana bi, bẹ afha asi ẹjaakhi cha che chaam makhọra ọyagbin.
EXO 9:17 Kọ atzima am-age-oge anang anọng paam bi, atte bẹ ọbọhk, bẹ afona.
EXO 9:18 Mẹ wọ, ophyini k'ogbe-dema nwa, kaam ndebh arọngda p'apyibhi ọtzam ayọhnga arọngda p'akk'atta ttẹwọr kẹ da Ijip ọmaan maa, apyiri ma.
EXO 9:19 Tzọhm ẹkkaabha bẹ atzima etzirakpo pyọ, ọmaana ọttọhk kpenamkpen fọ f'owobh k'owoni atzima adim k'ikhira, okhuri bi, arọngda mba atzebhi, anọngeya ọmaana etzirakpo py'eni k'ikhira ewobh, épe-ope.’ ”
EXO 9:20 Mẹ wọ, akhaan-nọng pa Phero p'akhaam ojora f'atzim p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, afona m'ẹbhar-ẹbhar atza atzọkha atzọhmnọng pabẹ, ọmaana etzirakpo pyabẹ, atzima adim k'ẹtzaanga.
EXO 9:21 Yina, ayok mbuma p'asi itzimabhaang k'atzim p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, atte atzọhmnọng pabẹ, ọmaana etzirakpo pyabẹ ọbọhk k'owoni.
EXO 9:22 Mẹ wọ e, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi on-oben Mosẹs bi, “Nemi ọbọhk kwọ atzena k'ẹrọng, ifha arọngda atzebh anọngeya ọmaana etzirakpo, ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'omeni k'iwoni s'anọng p'Ijip.”
EXO 9:23 Mada Mosẹs onemi ochikhura kwẹ otzena k'ẹrọng, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhm ẹbhaangkpon ọmaana arọngda, ẹbhaangkpon ẹmani k'irek. Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzebh arọngda k'obhon kw'Ijip.
EXO 9:24 Arọngda atzebh, ẹbhaangkpon ẹmani edimi, ẹmani edimi, arọngda mba bọ iwa apyibhi ọtzam ayọhnga p'akk'atta ttẹwọr kẹ da Ijip ọmaan maa, okwu ode obhon.
EXO 9:25 Arọngda mba afhu anọngẹya ọmaana etzirakpo k'Ijip, ọmaana nchi ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'omeni k'iwoni.
EXO 9:26 Ibẹ ibungisẹ s'iwa arọngda mba an-atzebhi ide ka Goshẹn, kẹ da iwa anọng p'Israẹl arukhi.
EXO 9:27 Mando kwa Phero oyeri Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn ọgbaak bẹ bi, “Kaam nkk'ẹkhọhngkwuri nsa m'ogbe nwa, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ otzor-otzor, kaam ọmaana anọng paam bọ mọkhaam ottotto.
EXO 9:28 Bọng zi njọhm anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, ọkwọbha ẹbhaangkpon ttara arọngda, kkeri py'ẹkk'ẹhaabha kpọng. Kaam ńtte bọng ọbọhk otte bọng afona, bọng kakhaambi, abira achina ororo awobha ma.”
EXO 9:29 Mosẹs obhin-ẹ bi, “Idikha nkk'obhon ọbọhk ntta mfona, kaam ḿmẹma mbọhk saam ńzi njọhm nang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, mmaangkpon ńkwọbha ọtta-ọtta, arọngda abira ákwọbha otzetzebh. Mẹ kw'atzima aronga bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ọkhaam ọyagbin.
EXO 9:30 Yina, kaam nnong kẹ bi, kọ ọmaana akhaan-nọng pọ, ojora f'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi atzima am-akhaama.”
EXO 9:31 (Wa ngwugwuma ọmaana abarli akhibhi, da iwa abarli akk'akhora, ngwugwuma mbiri nwọm.
EXO 9:32 Yina, awit kàkhibhi okhuri da iwa bẹ ani akhori m'ogbe nwa).
EXO 9:33 Mando kwa Mosẹs obin oji Phero, otte obhon ọbọhk, ọtza ọmẹma mbọhk otzena Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ozi njọhm, mmaangkpon nkwọbha ọtta-ọtta, arọngda akwọbha ottotto, ẹrọng ebire ẹkwọbha otzetzebh.
EXO 9:34 Mada Phero ore bi ẹrọng, ọmaana arọngda, ttara mmaangkpon ikk'ikwọbha, obiro osi ẹkhọngkwuri. Kẹ ttara akhaan-nọng pẹ abira achina ororo agaangi eho.
EXO 9:35 Mẹ wọ e, Phero ochina ororo ọbar ettem, anọng p'Israẹl ọbọhk kokher otte bẹ afona, mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'Mosẹs otzima ọgbaak.
EXO 10:1 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Kọ rọhng atza akhebha Phero, kkeri kaam nkk'kẹ, ọmaana akhaan-nọng pẹ nsa bi, bẹ agaangi eho, ifha nsi idik s'ipe anọng for kabẹ k'ottem.
EXO 10:2 Órenga mẹ, ikhina kọ ágbaak va pọ, ọmaana va pa va pọ, eden cha kaam ńneng nnang anọng p'Ijip ihem, ọmaana idik s'ipe anọng for sa kaam nsi kabẹ k'ottem. Bọng biphyir aronga bi, kaam wọ nde Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.”
EXO 10:3 Mando kwa Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn afona atza akhebha Phero, agbaakh-ẹ bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'abaHiburu, obeni bi, ‘Ogbe obhir otzuma yan, yina ahakha for sọ k'itzitzikha saam o? Tte anọng paam ọbọhk bẹ afona, ifha bẹ atza akpobh-m.
EXO 10:4 Idikha abhumi bi, atte bẹ ọbọhk bẹ afona, ophyini, kaam ńdọhm agwuribhebhe ọtzọhm k'ẹkhọma chọ.
EXO 10:5 Agwuribhebhe mba abubha irerek biphyir maa ọnọng sẹ dọk ore. Bẹ ábira akhibhi ekpo py'iwa arọngda akk'akhibhi arik, ọmaana echi kpenamkpen ch'emeni k'iwoni sabọng.
EXO 10:6 Bẹ abira afhu k'ihọhm sọ, ọmaana k'ihọhm s'akhaan-nọng pọ, ttara k'ihọhm s'anọng p'Ijip biphyir. Kwẹ óde odik kw'abatte, ttara abatte p'atte an-atzima amara, ttẹwọr kẹ da obhon kw'Ijip ọmaan maa, apyiri ma.’ ” Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs ọbhakhi nnam, obina oji Phero.
EXO 10:7 Iwa akhaan-nọng mba abọbh Phero bi, “Ogbe obhir otzuma yan, yina ojinọng nwa ọkwọbha man k'eyoma okhe-khe o? Tte bẹ ọbọhk bẹ afona, ifha bẹ afha atza akpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwabẹ. Ode bi, kọ atzima ara bi, Ijip owobh k'ihem o?”
EXO 10:8 Mẹ wọ, Phero ọtzọhm bẹ atza ayeri Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn akpa nnam, oben bẹ bi, “Bọng nọhng atza akpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng. Yina, bọng anọng bọ ade anọng p'áfon-ofona o?”
EXO 10:9 Mosẹs obhina bi, “Maman ófona ttara igbọ, ọmaana adeden-nọng, ọmaana va paman p'ijinọnọng, ọmaana p'ipanọnọng, ttara etzirakpo pyaman, okhuri bi, maman ọkhaam bi, mosi ọdadaami kw'ikpokpobha ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kwaman.”
EXO 10:10 Yina, Phero on-oben bẹ bi, “Bọng achibhi bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobha kẹ ttara bọng o? K'odik-ọkka, kaam panọng pabọng ọmaana va pabọng ọbọhk kintte bẹ afona. K'odik-ọkka, bọng achibhi itzama.
EXO 10:11 Mma e! Tte ajinọng bẹ-bẹ afona atza akpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, mada ode odik kw'am-aphyem-m wọ mẹ.” Mẹ wọ, bẹ akhubh Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn, k'itzitzikha sa Phero.
EXO 10:12 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Nemi ọbọhk kwọ atzena k'Ijip ifha agwuribhebhe k'ọhaabh atzọkha ibe kpenamkpen, bẹ abira akhibhi ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'omeni k'iwoni, ọmaana ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'arọngda akk'akhibhi arik.”
EXO 10:13 Mando kwa Mosẹs onemi ochikhura kwẹ otzena k'Ijip. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi ọbhabha ọttẹwọr kẹ da ewuchen em-eyin ogwuma makhọra obhon, m'ẹyawu ttara erungiwu nduma biphyir. Yina ewu ehobha, ọphapha nwa okk'agwuribhebhe otzima okwu.
EXO 10:14 Agwuribhebhe mba anyaami k'ọhaabh makhọra Ijip. Mada ogbe odede itzama-dema nna s'agwuribhebhe itzimi-mitta k'Ijip, sẹ dọk kíbiri itto, kaambi k'ogbe ororo wọ.
EXO 10:15 Agwuribhebhe mba abubha irerek biphyir maa, sẹ ipyi erungi bi kaang Bẹ achi ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'arọngda akhibhi arik, ọmaana ekpo py'emeni k'iwoni, ttara achiduk pa nchi. Wa echi, obiro ode ọraraari manda wani kw'obiro otzen-otzeni k'irerek s'Ijip, dọk kode.
EXO 10:16 M'ẹbhar-ẹbhar, Phero oyeri Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn, oben bi, “Kaam nkk'ẹkhọngkwuri nsa k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ, ọmaana k'itzitzikha sọ.
EXO 10:17 Kọ bina anang ẹkhọngkwuri chaam m'ogbe nwa dọk, azi njọhm anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ, ifha ọrọbh-m k'itzama-barada nna.”
EXO 10:18 Mosẹs obina oji Phero, ọtza ozi njọhm ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 10:19 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhakhi ọphapha nwa ọgaangi maa, on-ode mach'ọphapha kw'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-edimi. Wa ọphapha nwa ogwuma agwuribhebhe mba biphyir ọbhari k'Ẹraanga-khora. Ogwuribhebhe manda wani kw'obiro arik k'Ijip kode.
EXO 10:20 Yina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi Phero ochina ororo ọgaangi eho bi, otte anọng p'Israẹl ọbọhk bẹ afona.
EXO 10:21 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Yaangi ọbọhk kwọ atzena k'ẹrọng, ifha orungibanga kw'ọttọmi ọnọng, óyin obubha Ijip biphyir.”
EXO 10:22 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs ọyangi ọbọhk kwẹ otzena k'ẹrọng, orungibanga kw'opyi bi kaang oyin obubha Ijip biphyir, k'iwu manda ittaan.
EXO 10:23 Ọnọng manda wani kw'ore oyok, yina on-obiro obina oji ibe sẹ k'iwu ittaan kode. Yina, wa anọng p'Israẹl k'ipyerungi k'awobh k'obe fa bẹ arukhi.
EXO 10:24 Mẹ wọ, Phero oyeri Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn oben bẹ bi, “Bọng nọhng atza akpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Bọng afha tzima panọng pabọng kaambi va pabọng bọ, arọng afona. Bọng kingẹ tte etzirakpo pyabọng ọbọhk ewobha ka.”
EXO 10:25 Yina, Mosẹs oben bi, “Kọ akhaambi atte man ọbọhk, mọtza osi njafọhni, mobiro osi nnanga nkwọmisẹ ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwaman.
EXO 10:26 Etzirakpo pyaman ẹkhaambi ẹtzọn man abẹ efona, man manda vani kofona oji. Mọkhaambi otzima byani mẹ okpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi. Koyongi bi, mokk'opyiri kẹ, yina moronga ọttọhk fa motzima okpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi e.”
EXO 10:27 Yina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ochina ororo osi Phero ọgaangi eho, for kobiro odo bi, otte anọng p'Israẹl ọbọhk bẹ afona.
EXO 10:28 Mando kwa Phero obeni Mosẹs bi, “Bin-m k'itzitzikha! Aningi dọk ayom bi, abe-m k'itzitzikha o! Kkeri ewu ch'abira are itzitzikha saam ápe-ope.”
EXO 10:29 Mosẹs obhina bi, “A o, tte kwẹ ode mach'abeni, kaam kọ k'itzitzikha dọk kímbe.”
EXO 11:1 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Kaam ḿbiri ntte Phero ọmaana anọng p'Ijip ọbọhk bẹ are nkwuri rani. Nsisi mando, kẹ ótte bọng ọbọhk otte bọng afona. Mada otte bọng ọbọhk, okhubh bọng okhubh biphyir-phyir.
EXO 11:2 Gbaak anọng p'Israẹl, ajinọng ọmaana panọng bi, bẹ atza aben anọng p'Ijip anang bẹ ekpo pya gol ọmaana silva.”
EXO 11:3 (Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi bi, anọng p'Ijip asi ọphyaam anang anọng p'Israẹl. Ayongi mẹ, akhaan-nọng pa Phero, ọmaana anọng p'Ijip biphyir anang Mosẹs ikpokpobha s'ideden).
EXO 11:4 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs oben bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obeni bi, ‘M'orungittem, kaam ńnenga k'obhon kw'Ijip makhọra.
EXO 11:5 Ocheden-nwa kpenamkpen kw'ijinọng k'Ijip ópe-ope, ttẹwọr k'ocheden-nwa kw'ijinọng kwa Phero maa, apyiri k'ocheden-nwa kw'ijinọng kw'obira-kwanọng kw'om-ohok ekpo, ọmaana acheden-va p'abhaam biphyir.
EXO 11:6 Obhoma kw'ówobha k'Ijip opyibh ọyọhnga kw'iwa okk'owobha, ttara kw'óbiro owobha.
EXO 11:7 Yina, ọttọhk manda vani f'ósi anọng p'Israẹl kóde, kaambi ẹpfa dọ, anọngẹya ọmaana nden kẹ́gbọ.’ Mẹ wọ kwa bọng árọnga bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkhọmi anọng p'Israẹl ewobha k'anọng p'Ijip.
EXO 11:8 Akhaan-nọng mba pọ biphyir ákpa nnam ọkpa, akwu ahakha nho anang-m, aben bi, ‘Tzotzokhaan, kọ ọmaana anọng p'atzọn-ọ abẹ biphyir, bọng nọhng!’ Ogbe nwuma ọkk'ọkwọbha, kaam ńttọ-ọ ọbọhk otte.” Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs obina ttara idọdọkhi oji Phero.
EXO 11:9 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'Mosẹs obena bi, “Phero kọ itzọhng koyonga, ifha idik saam s'ipe anọng for ihaabh k'Ijip.”
EXO 11:10 Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn asi idik nna s'ipe anọng for biphyir m'itzitzikha sa Phero. Yina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi Phero ọgaangi eho, anọng p'Israẹl ọbọhk kokher otte bi, bẹ abina aji ẹkhọma chẹ.
EXO 12:1 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs, ọmaana Aarọn k'Ijip bi,
EXO 12:2 “Ophe nwa on-ode ochedenphe, ochedenphe kwabọng kwa cho.
EXO 12:3 Gbaak anọng p'Israẹl biphyir bi, k'iwu jobh s'ophe nwa, ojinọng kpenamkpen, otzima orukhimaan-nwa wani okwu k'eho ch'ẹhọhmmọr chẹ, ẹhọhmmọr kpenamkpen, orukhimaan-nwa wani.
EXO 12:4 Idikha ẹhọhmmọr ẹn-ẹbari ebenga k'odem kwa bẹ afha achi, orukhimaan-nwa wani akyera, tte ẹhọhmmọr nduma ebhuna ttara ayokh-ẹbaanga, atzor k'ọnọngmik kwa bẹ ade. Bọng dekha orukhimaan-nwa kw'obenga ọnọng-mik, atzor k'ekkema ch'ọnọng-ọnọng óchi.
EXO 12:5 Nden sa bọng átzima, sẹ ngaambi nde adimpẹ p'ade cho wani, sa nni ekhem mbiri ndima. Bọng afha atzekha k'arukhimaan, ayongi mẹ, bọng dekha k'avu.
EXO 12:6 Bọng kkeri sẹ maa, opyiri k'ẹchọhkha ch'ewu ch'ettonga ọhawani kwa chi ch'ophe nwa, kw'anọng p'Israẹl biphyir akhaambi ayẹk sẹ ndọngi.
EXO 12:7 Mẹ wọ, bẹ átzọkha izi rani áphyokha k'akhaan-akhaan, ọmaana k'ebir-ebir kwa mkpọmmachi s'amma p'ihohm sa bẹ áwobha áchi, nden nna.
EXO 12:8 M'erungiwu nduma dani, bẹ atzima akwọngitzọhng p'ajobh-ojobhi, achi nden nnuma sa bẹ abhaabhi k'ekpon. Tte bẹ achi ttara brẹd kwa bẹ ani yist akhe.
EXO 12:9 Bọng chẹ ekhekhebhi kàchi, bọng chẹ kàbira awọhn ttara asi. Yina, bọng mabh eho, ọmaana mmo, ttara ettongakpo k'ekpon.
EXO 12:10 Bọng chi chẹ akyera yina ewu ehobha. Idikha kpenamkpen emung, ewu ewobh, bọng akhaambi akwọmi chẹ ọkwọmi.
EXO 12:11 Ma wọ ode odem kwa bọng áchi chẹ; bọng kpaama odikpa ka nwura sabọng, bọng akhe ekpo pya mmo, bọng atzima achikhura pa bọng ka mbọhk. Bọng chi chẹ k'ẹbhar-k'ẹbhar. Ma wọ ode ọdadaami kwa Pasova kw'ọnang kaam Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ikpokpobha.
EXO 12:12 “M'erungiwu nduma dani, kaam ńnenga k'Ijip mfhu acheden-va p'anọngẹya biphyir, ọmaana acheden pa nden kpenampken. Kaam ḿkpaara aponga p'apyibh akha p'Ijip biphyir. Kaam wọ nde Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 12:13 Izi nna íde ẹkhọhkha ẹnang bọng k'ihọhm sa bọng awobh. Mada nne izi nnuma, kaam ńjekha bọng ojekha. Nkwuri sa ńgebha bọng kíde, mada ńsi anọng p'Ijip itzama.
EXO 12:14 “Ma wọ óde ewu ch'ojima, ch'igbọ s'íkwu k'ororo itzima isi ọdadaami inang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ikpokpobha. Ẹdadaami-wu nda ewohba ka cho kpenamkpen maa ogbe ode.
EXO 12:15 K'iwu izenamfa, bọng áchi brẹd kwa bẹ ani yist akhe. Bọng nọbha yist kabọng k'ihọhm m'echedenwu, okhuri bi, idikha ọnọng kpenamkpen ochi ọchattọhk fa bẹ akhe yist, ttẹwọr m'ewu dani maa apyiri iwu izenamfa nna, bẹ akhaambi akhubh-ẹ k'ebhonmọr ch'Israẹl.
EXO 12:16 M'echedenwu, ttara ewu ch'ettong nzenamfa, bọng hok ewobha ch'ikpokpobha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Bọng ọtzọhm m'iwu nna biphyir kasi, oyongi ọchattọhk fẹ-fẹ, fa bọng afha asi anang ọnọng kpenamkpen bi, ochi.
EXO 12:17 “Bọng si ọdadaami nwa kwa brẹd kwa bẹ ani yist akhe, okhuri bi, m'ewu nda dọ cha kaam ndim bọng ka ngaan sabọng mbina k'Ijip. Bọng si ọdadaami nwa mach'ọdadaami kw'owobha ọnang igbọ s'íkwu k'ororo.
EXO 12:18 Ttẹwọr k'ẹchọhkha ch'iwu ọhawani kwa chi s'ocheden-phe, bọng am-achi brẹd kwa bẹ ani yist akhe maa, apyiri k'ẹchọhkha ch'ewu ch'ettong iwu ẹrọbh obhiri dani.
EXO 12:19 K'iwu manda izanamfa, bọng yist k'ihọhm sabọng kahok. Ọnọng kw'ochi ọchattọhk fa bẹ akhe yist, ode ọmaana, obiro ode okhekhennọng, bẹ akhaambi, akhubh-ẹ k'ebhonmọr ch'Israẹl.
EXO 12:20 Bọng ọttọhk fa bẹ akhe yist kàchi. K'ibe kpenamkpen sabọng arukhi, bọng akhaambi achi brẹd kwa bẹ ani yist akhe.”
EXO 12:21 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs oyeri adeden-nọng p'Israẹl biphyir oben bẹ bi, “Bọng nọhng madẹdẹnwa, atza atzekha orukhimaan-nwa wani-wani, anang nhọhmmọr sabọng, bọng fhu arukhimaan-va atzima asi ọdadaami kwa Pasova.
EXO 12:22 Bọng dọkha ẹraraari-pyi cha hisobh, arana k'izi sa bọng akhe k'ọkwakkama, bọng atzọkha izi rani abọra k'ebir-ebir ọmaana k'akhaan-akhaan pa mkpọmmachi s'amma. Ọnọng manda wani oningi k'iyaan oyini matzẹmaa, ewu ehobha.
EXO 12:23 Mada isa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi órenga m'irek nna bi, ofhu anọng p'Ijip, óre izi nna k'ebir-ebir ọmaana k'akhaan-akhaan pa mkpọmmachi s'amma. Orenga-eden kw'obo ọbọhk kótte bi, odim k'ihọhm sabọng bi, ofhu bọng.
EXO 12:24 “Bọbọng ọmaana va pa va pabọng, akhaambi ahok ndọhna nna mach'ọphaangi kw'owobha maa, ogbe ode.
EXO 12:25 Bọng apyiri k'irerek nnuma s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ochekhi bi, ọ́nang bọng, bọng si ọdadaami nwa.
EXO 12:26 Ikhina va pabọng abọbhi bọng bi, ‘Ọdadaami nwa oyini yan o?’
EXO 12:27 Bọng gbaak bẹ bi, ‘Ode ọdadaami kw'ẹjafọhni cha Pasova anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'iwa ojek ihọhm s'anọng p'Israẹl k'Ijip, ọkkaana nhọhmmọr saman k'ogbe kw'iwa ofhu anọng p'Ijip.’ ” Mẹ wọ e, anọng mba arakha attima otzitzikha k'irerek, akpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 12:28 Wa anọng p'Israẹl asi mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn ọtzọhna.
EXO 12:29 M'orungittem, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ofhu achedenva biphyir k'Ijip, ttẹwọr k'ocheden-nwa kwa Phero, kw'ọdabhi ẹvaar, maa atza apyiri k'achedenva p'agbakkọbh-kkọhbha p'awobh k'ẹgbakkọhbh-ttọmma, ttara achedenva p'etzirakpo biphyir.
EXO 12:30 Mada Phero ọmaana akhaan-nọng pẹ, ttara anọng p'Ijip biphyir aphyọbh m'erungi, wa obhoma kw'ideden owobh k'Ijip, da iwa ẹhọhmmọr en-ebekhi ch'ọnọng oni ope.
EXO 12:31 M'erungi, Phero oyeri Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn, oben bi, “Bọng bina! Bọng dima anọng p'Israẹl abina aji anọng paam. Bọng nọhng atza akpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi macha bọng akk'aphyema.
EXO 12:32 Bọng dima etzirakpo pyabọng atzima arọhng, macha bọng akk'abena. Bọng biri si-m ittabọhng.”
EXO 12:33 Mẹ wọ, anọng p'Ijip aben anọng mba bi, bẹ asi ẹbhar-ẹbhar abina aji ẹkhọma nda, “Oni mando ode, bẹ ápope biphyir.”
EXO 12:34 Mẹ wọ, anọng mba atzini abubuma pabẹ, yina bẹ an-atzini yist atzọhkha ka mbabaang sabẹ, k'agbanggbang pa bẹ am-atzima asi brẹd, pa bẹ abhọri k'ọbara.
EXO 12:35 Wa anọng p'Israẹl asi macha Mosẹs okk'bẹ ọtzọhna, bẹ atza abọbh anọng p'Ijip asilva, ọmaana gol, ttara ọbara.
EXO 12:36 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọsa bi, anọng p'Ijip asi ọphyaam anang anọng p'Israẹl. Wa bẹ anang anọng p'Israẹl ọttọhk kpenamkpen fa bẹ abọbhi bẹ. Mẹ wọ e, bẹ achi anọng p'Ijip ọgbọm.
EXO 12:37 Wa anọng p'Israẹl abina orenga ka Rameses apyiri ka Sukọt. Akhiri panọng ọmaana vava aji, ajinọng p'iwa asi orenga nwa apyiri anọng nnọhna ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh jobh.
EXO 12:38 Wa anọng adọdọk k'ọhaabh, ọmaana etzirakpo k'ọhaabh, arukhimaan ọmaana avu abira atzọn bẹ abẹ m'orenga nwa.
EXO 12:39 Wa bẹ atzọkha abubuma pa bẹ akk'atzima bina k'Ijip asi brẹd kwa bẹ ani yist akhe. Wa abubuma mba yist kakhaam, okhuri da iwa bẹ an-akhubhi bẹ okhubh k'Ijip, bẹ ogbe dọk kakhaam kwa bẹ atzim awọhn ọchattọhk fabẹ.
EXO 12:40 Biphyir-phyir wa anọng p'Israẹl arukhi cho ẹnọhna obhiri ẹrọbh obhiri jobh k'Ijip.
EXO 12:41 Mẹ ewu nduma ch'ettong cho ẹnọhna obhiri ẹrọbh obhiri jobh, wa anọng p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ka ngaan sabẹ, abina aji Ijip.
EXO 12:42 Da iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okkeri erungiwu nduma, ifha otzima bẹ obina k'Ijip, erungiwu nda dọ ch'anọng p'Israẹl biphyir ám-akkeri, atzima anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ikpokpobha, k'igbọ kpenamkpen s'íkwu k'ororo.
EXO 12:43 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn bi, “Ma wọ ode ndọhna s'ikhuri ọchattọhk f'ọdadaami kwa Pasova. “Tte okhekhennọng manda wani oningi fẹ ochi.
EXO 12:44 Obira kpenamkpen kwa bọng akk'adebha ofha ochi fẹ ochi, bọng akk'ẹ ọkpakkọrikkọ asa.
EXO 12:45 Yina, okhekhennọng kw'orukhi mẹ, ọmaana ọtzọhmnọng kwa bẹ abheri ọtzọhm, bẹ kakhaambi ochi fẹ.
EXO 12:46 “Bọng akhaambi achi fẹ k'ọhọhm ẹtzaanga, bọng etzen manda dani katzima ayin k'iyaan. Bọng ọkhọbhi manda wani kavọhkhi.
EXO 12:47 Ebhonmọr ch'Israẹl biphyir ẹkhaambi esi ọdadaami nwa.
EXO 12:48 “Okhekhennọng kw'orukhi ttara bọng, kw'ọdaakh-ẹ bi, ira osi Ọdadaami nwa ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọkhaambi osi ajinọng p'ọhọhm kwẹ biphyir ọkpakkọrikkọ. Mẹ wọ, kẹ ofha osi ọdadaami nwa mach'ọnọng wani kw'ode ọmaana kw'irek nna. Tte ọnọng kwa bẹ ani ọkpakkọrikkọ asi oningi ochi.
EXO 12:49 Aphaangi mba awobh anang ammaana, ttara akhekhennọng p'arukhi ttara bọng.”
EXO 12:50 Wa anọng p'Israẹl biphyir asi mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn ọtzọhna.
EXO 12:51 Mẹ ewu nduma dani, wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzima anọng p'Israẹl ka ngaan sabẹ obina k'Ijip.
EXO 13:1 Iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi,
EXO 13:2 “Tte ocheden-nwa kpenamkpen kw'ijinọng ọbọhk anang-m. Ocheden-nwa kw'ẹbhọr kpenamkpen k'ottem kw'anọng p'Israẹl, ode ọnọngẹya o, obiro ode etzen o, ode kwaam.”
EXO 13:3 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs oben anọng mba bi, “Bọng jima ewu nda, ewu ch'iwa bọng abin k'Ijip, k'obhon kw'ebira, okhuri bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọrọbh bọng kẹ ttara ẹfa. Bọng ọttọhk kpenamkpen fa bẹ akhe yist kàchi.
EXO 13:4 Mayina, k'ophe kw'Abib wọ kwa bọng abin.
EXO 13:5 Mada Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ótzima bọng opyiri k'irek s'abaKenaan, ọmaana s'abaHet, ọmaana s'ab'Amọr, ọmaana abaHiv, ttara s'ab'aJẹbus, irerek s'iwa ochekhi ọnang abatte pabọng bi, ọnang bọng irerek ọkkakka s'abasi, ọmaana akhọkhọnana ahaabh-ọhaabh, bọng ám-asi ọdadaami nwa m'ophe nwa.
EXO 13:6 K'iwu izenamfa, bọng chi brẹd kwa bẹ ani yist akhe. K'ewu ch'ettonga izenamfa, bọng si ọdadaami anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 13:7 Bọng chi brẹd kwa bẹ ani yist akhe, k'iwu nnuma izenamfa. Tte ọttọhk kpenamkpen fa bẹ akhe yist, oningi k'ottem kwabọng ode. Tte bẹ iningi yist orere are, ka nnem sabọng.
EXO 13:8 M'ewu nduma, bọng gbaak va pabọng bi, ‘Nsi mando okhuri odik kw'iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi ọnang man, mada mobin k'Ijip.’
EXO 13:9 Ọdadaami nwa óde mach'ẹkhọhkha cha bọng akhe ka mbọhk sabọng, abira akpa k'otzitzikha-ttem fa bọng mach'ojima bi, ọphaangi kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobha ka mma sabọng, okhuri bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzim bọng obina k'Ijip, k'ẹfa chẹ ch'ideden.
EXO 13:10 Cho kpenamkpen, bọng akhaambi ahok ndọhna nna, k'ogbe kwẹ.
EXO 13:11 “Mada Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ótzima bọng opyiri k'irek s'abaKenaan, ọtzọkha sẹ ọnang bọng, mach'iwa ochekhi ọnang bọng, ọmaana abatte pabọng.
EXO 13:12 Bọng dọkha achedenva p'ẹbhọhr kpenamkpen adibha anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Achedenva p'ijinọng p'etzirakpo pyabọng ade p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 13:13 Bọng dima arukhimaan-dim abhek ocheden-nwa kw'ẹnyanyaang, yina, idikha bọng ani chẹ abhekhi, phyakh-ẹ ekhokhora. Kẹ wọ osi, bọng akhaambi abhek achedenva pabọng p'ijinọng kpenamkpen.
EXO 13:14 “Ikhina va pabọng p'ijinọng abọbhi bọng bi, ‘Ọdadaami nwa oyini yan o?’ Gbaak bẹ bi, ‘Iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzim man obina k'Ijip, k'irerek s'ebira, k'ẹfa chẹ ch'ideden.
EXO 13:15 Mada Phero otzim oho-gaangi obhum bi, otte man ọbọhk mofona, wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ofhu achedenva p'anọngẹya, ọmaana pa etzirakpo p'Ijip. Odik nwa wọ motzima yina ndima ocheden-nwa kw'ijinọng kw'otzirattọhk kpenamkpen, nsi ẹjafọhni nnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ifha motzima obhek achedenva paman kpenamkpen p'ijinọng.’
EXO 13:16 Ma wọ óde mach'ẹkhọhkha ọnang bọng bi, wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzim ẹfa chẹ ch'ideden, ọrọbha man k'ebira ch'Ijip.”
EXO 13:17 Mada Phero on-otte anọng mba ọbọhk bẹ afona, wa Ibinọkpaabyi bẹ kotzim orenga k'ẹkhọma cha Philistiya, kw'eden ekhum-okhuma, da iwa Ibinọkpaabyi ochibhi bi, “Idikha bẹ attem egbong abẹ k'eden, bẹ afha abhona achibhi pabẹ, akpa nnam k'Ijip.”
EXO 13:18 Mẹ wọ, wa Ibinọkpaabyi otzima bẹ ọkhọri k'eden ch'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi, s'ikkeri itzitzikha k'Ẹraanga-khora. Wa anọng p'Israẹl ado for s'egbong atzima abina k'Ijip.
EXO 13:19 Iwa Mosẹs okpokhi akhọbhi pa Josẹph, okhuri da iwa Josẹph okk'va p'Israẹl ọsa bẹ atzọkha anwọhngi. Kẹ Josẹph okk'obena bi, “K'odik ọkkọkka Ibinọkpaabyi ọ́kkaana bọng ọkkaana e. Bọng akhaambi akpokhi akhọbhi paam m'ibe nna, atzima afona.”
EXO 13:20 Mada bẹ abin ka Sukọt, bẹ abhingi k'Ẹtam k'ọkhaan-ọkhaan kw'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi.
EXO 13:21 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzim eboni ch'ebe iduduma ochi bẹ eden k'ẹya, obiro otzima ekpon ch'ebe iduduma ọnang bẹ iyaan k'erungi, ifha bẹ afha asi orenga nwa k'ẹya, ọmaana k'erungi.
EXO 13:22 Wa eboni nda ch'ebe iduduma k'ẹya, ọmaana ekpon ch'ebe iduduma k'erungi, bẹ k'itzitzikha s'anọng p'Israẹl, kabin.
EXO 14:1 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi,
EXO 14:2 “Gbaak anọng p'Israẹl bi, bẹ akpa nnam atza abhing abaanga Pi-Hahirọt kw'owobh k'ottem kwa Migdol, ọmaana ọraanga kw'ideden. Tte bẹ abhing k'ọraanga kw'ideden ọkhaan-ọkhaan, akkeri Baal-Zẹphọn itzitzikha.
EXO 14:3 Phero ón-ochibhi bi, anọng p'Israẹl am-awen akhọri irerek nna k'ikkokkoni, s'ikpori bẹ imaana k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi.
EXO 14:4 Kaam ńsi Phero ọgaangi eho, okhubh bẹ ka nnam. Yina, kaam ńnenga ka Phero ọmaana k'agbongnọng pẹ, ńdọkha abarada ka for saam. Anọng mba p'Ijip áronga bi, kaam wọ nde Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.” Mẹ wọ, anọng p'Israẹl asi mando.
EXO 14:5 Mada Phero kw'ode ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip ọbhaang bi, anọng p'Israẹl akk'arọbha afona, Phero ọmaana akhaan-nọng pẹ abhona achibhi pabẹ, aben bi, “Bọng odik kw'amosi ma? Mokk'anọng mba ọbọhk ọtta bẹ afona, ọtzọhm fabẹ okk'man obiro odimi.”
EXO 14:6 Mẹ wọ, odo akpaar pẹ pa nnyanyaang mindọr ewobha, obiro otzima agbongnọng pẹ bi, bẹ atzọn-ẹ abẹ.
EXO 14:7 Otzima akpaar akkakka pẹ pa nnyanyaang mindọr, ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh jobh, ttara k'akpaar pa nnyanyaang mindọr p'Ijip biphyir, ttara adeho p'atzim bẹ biphyir eden.
EXO 14:8 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi Phero kw'ode ọvaarnọng kw'Ijip ọgaangi ettem, okhubh anọng p'Israẹl ka nnam p'am-arenga ekkengitza, afona.
EXO 14:9 Anọng p'Ijip, ọmaana nnyanyaang sa Phero, ọmaana akpaar pẹ pa nnyanyaang mindọr, ọmaana ayaari-nnyanyaang, ttara agbongnọng pẹ biphyir, akhubh anọng p'Israẹl ka nnam, agwora bẹ kẹ da bẹ abhingi k'ọraanga kw'ideden, ọbaanga Pi-Hahirọt kw'okkeri Baal-Zẹphọn itzitzikha.
EXO 14:10 Mada anọng p'Israẹl atzini chen are bi, Phero ttara anọng p'Ijip areng akwuma ka nnam, ojora osi bẹ. Bẹ abhom amọng ayeri Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 14:11 Bẹ an-aben Mosẹs bi, “Ma da mpekhubh nni k'Ijip nde, kẹ wọ osi atzima man akwu m'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi bi, mope o? Bọng odik wọ kw'asi man ma bi, atzima man abina k'Ijip o?
EXO 14:12 Wa man kọ kobeni bi, ‘Atte man ọbọhk mowobha, mosi itzọhm ọnang anọng p'Ijip?’ Ira ojibh ọtzam bi mosi itzọhm ọnang anọng p'Ijip, ọyọhnga bi, mokwu ope m'ibe nna s'anọng an-arukhi!”
EXO 14:13 Mosẹs obhina bẹ bi, “Tte oningi bọng ojor. Bọng do abe, kkeri mayina, bọng áre ẹnaanga ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọ́nang bọng. Anọng mba p'Ijip pa bọng are mayina ma, bọng bẹ dọk káre e.
EXO 14:14 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ósi erima chabọng, bọbọng kingẹ wobha bi sẹẹbh.”
EXO 14:15 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Ode yan kwa kọ am-abhom ayer-m o? Ben anọng p'Israẹl achina ororo k'orenga.
EXO 14:16 Tzini ochikhura kwọ, anemi ọbọhk atzena k'ọraanga kw'ideden ifha asi abhaangi, anọng p'Israẹl arenga k'irerek ajekha.
EXO 14:17 Kaam ńsi anọng p'Ijip agaangi nho, ifha bẹ ákhubh bẹ ka nnam. Kaam mbiri ńnenga ka Phero, ọmaana agbongnọng pẹ biphyir, ọmaana akpaar pẹ pa nnyanyaang mindọr, ttara ayaari-nnyanyaang pẹ, ńdọkha abarada.
EXO 14:18 Anọng p'Ijip árọnga bi, kaam wọ nde Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, mada nnenga ka Phero, ọmaana akpaar pẹ pa nnyanyaang mindọr, ttara k'ayaari nnyanyaang pẹ ndọkha abarada.”
EXO 14:19 Mẹ wọ, itzọhmi s'Ibinọkpaabyi s'ikk'arim-egbong p'Israẹl eden im-icha, in-ikpa nnam itza iwobha bẹ ka nnam. Eboni ch'ebe iduduma ebere ebina bẹ k'itzitzikha, ọtza ebe bẹ ka nnam,
EXO 14:20 kw'ode ottem kw'agbongnọng p'Ijip ọmaana p'Israẹl. M'erungi biphyir eboni nda etzima ipyerungi ekwu k'okhubha wani, ọmaana iyaan k'okhubha nwonggo. Mẹ wọ, ọnọng kw'ofha orenga ọbaanga oyok m'erungiwu nduma biphyir kode.
EXO 14:21 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs onemi ọbọhk kwẹ otzena k'ọraanga kw'ideden, m'erungiwu nduma biphyir Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzima ọphapha kw'ọgaang-ọgaangi kw'ofon kẹ da ewuchen em-eyin, okpena asi maa ogbin oyin. Asi mba abhaangi.
EXO 14:22 Wa anọng p'Israẹl arenga k'ogbin m'ẹraangattem, ttara asi p'abe mach'echumi k'odimbọhk, ttara ka kwabọhk kwabẹ.
EXO 14:23 Anọng p'Ijip, ọmaana nnyanyaang sa Phero, ọmaana akpaar pa pẹ nnyanyaang mindọr, ttara ayaari-nnyanyaang pẹ biphyir, akhubh bẹ ka nnam adim k'ẹraangattem ch'ọraanga kw'ideden.
EXO 14:24 Mẹ ekpekpebha, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orenga k'ekpon ch'ebe iduduma, ọmaana k'eboni ore agbongnọng p'Ijip, mẹ wọ, okhe bẹ ka dama-dama.
EXO 14:25 Osi ndọkhi s'akpaar pa nnyanyaang mindọr irọbha, maa orenga ọyak bẹ. Mẹ wọ e, anọng p'Ijip an-aben bi, “Tte motte anọng p'Israẹl ọbọhk! Kkeri Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ om-orima Ijip abẹ ma, ka eho chabẹ.”
EXO 14:26 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Nemi ọbọhk kwọ atzena k'ọraanga kw'ideden, ifha asi akpa nnam anwa akpori anọng p'Ijip, ọmaana akpaar pabẹ pa nnyanyaang mindọr, ttara ayaari nnyanyaang pabẹ.”
EXO 14:27 Mosẹs e onemi ọbọhk kwẹ otzena k'ọraanga kw'ideden. M'owukhobha ọraanga nwa akpa nnam owobha mach'ira owobh. Anọng p'Ijip am-akhonga ọrọrọbh, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okpena bẹ biphyir okhe k'ọraanga kw'ideden.
EXO 14:28 Asi mba abhobh abhori akpaar pa nnyanyaang mindọr, ọmaana ayaari nnyanyaang, ttara agbongnọng pa Phero biphyir p'akk'anọng p'Israẹl akhubha ka nnam, anwa k'ọraanga kw'ideden. Ọnọng manda wani kw'ọnang kode.
EXO 14:29 Yina, wa anọng p'Israẹl areng k'ogbin m'ẹraangattem, ch'asi abe mach'echumi k'odimbọhk ttara ka kwabọhk kwabẹ.
EXO 14:30 M'ewu nduma, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkkaana anọng p'Israẹl ka mbọhk s'anọng p'Ijip. Wa anọng p'Israẹl an-are da anọng p'Ijip an-ayim abukh-abukhi k'ọraanga ọkhaan-ọkhaan.
EXO 14:31 Mẹ wọ e, mada anọng p'Israẹl are ẹfa ch'ideden ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzim okhema anọng p'Ijip, bẹ akhaama ojora f'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, bẹ abira akhaama nnam-ophephe ka kẹ, ọmaana ka ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ Mosẹs.
EXO 15:1 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs ọmaana anọng p'Israẹl akkọhn ẹmọng nda anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi aben bi, “Kaam ńkkọhn nnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okhuri k'ekhema-barada chẹ. Kẹ okk'ẹnyanyaang, ọmaana ọyaar-ẹnyanyaang, otzini otzem k'ọraanga kw'ideden.
EXO 15:2 “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ode ẹfa chaam, ọmaana ẹmọng cha kaam nkkọhni, Kẹ wọ ode ẹnaanga chaam. Kẹ wọ ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwaam. Kaam ńnang-ẹ ẹtzọhnga, kaam ńdini Ibinọkpaabyi kw'otte kwaam okpobh k'ẹrọng.
EXO 15:3 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ode okkenggitza, kẹ okpen Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 15:4 Kẹ okk'akpaar pa Phero pa nnyanyaang mindọr, ọmaana agbongnọng pẹ, ọtzọkha otzem k'ọraanga kw'ideden. Ọtzọkha akhaan-nọng pa Phero p'abari odik ọtzam, odimi k'Ẹraanga-khora.
EXO 15:5 Asi donga-dong mba akk'bẹ abhọri, bẹ atzem k'esiwọr mach'ọtza.
EXO 15:6 “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, odimbọhk kwọ, ode ẹfa ch'ideden. O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, atzim ẹfa ch'odimbọhk kwọ asi, ọttattaanga-nọng araami.
EXO 15:7 “K'ededen ch'ẹvaar chọ, akhem anọng p'attaang anang-ọ. Kọ atte ittemdọkhiji sọ ọbọhk, ikwọmi attattaanga-nọng pọ mach'araraari-bukhi.
EXO 15:8 Agwum ọwọhng kwọ, asi atzobha, abe bi pyir, asi p'abhobh-obhobh an-arimi agaangi, mach'echumi, k'esittem asi an-abhakhi arim-orimi.
EXO 15:9 “Ọttattaanga-nọng ọsi ẹmma, oben bi, ‘Kaam ńgubh bẹ ka nnam, mbiri ńgọbha bẹ. Kaam ńchi ọgbọm k'ekpo pyabẹ; Kaam ńchi pyẹ ttara agwọriji paam. Ọkkangkkaang kwaam wọ kwa ńdima mfhu bọng, ńdima ọbọhk kwaam ńdimi bẹ.’
EXO 15:10 Agwum ọwọhng kwọ, asi anwa akpori bẹ, bẹ atzem k'esiwọr, mach'opo otzemi k'esiwọr.
EXO 15:11 “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, k'ottem kw'idik s'anọng akpobh biphyir, mbọng vọ obeng-ọ abẹ? Anyi wọ obeng-ọ abẹ? K'ẹvaar, awurada pọ ayọhng bẹ biphyir, bẹ akhaam ojora fọ, k'ikpokpobha sa bẹ anang-ọ, kọ asi idik s'ipe anọng for.
EXO 15:12 Kọ anemi odimbọhk kwọ kw'ẹfa, irerek imyi attattaanga-nọng pọ.
EXO 15:13 “K'idadaakha sọ s'ini ottotto ikhaam, átzima anọng pa kọ akk'abhekha eden, átzima bẹ eden k'ẹfa chọ, achina k'irukhabe sọ s'awurada.
EXO 15:14 Idibhon íbhaanga idik nna, opoma osi bẹ, ojora ọ́bọkha anọng pa Philistiya.
EXO 15:15 Ojora ọ́bọkha avaarnọng p'obhon kw'Edom, opoma ọ́nwa adabhi pa Moab. Ẹfa ẹha avaarnọng pa Kenaan;
EXO 15:16 opoma ttara ojora ọ́nwa bẹ. K'ẹfa chọ, bẹ amun k'ibe rani, mach'ẹtzakpa matzẹmaa anọng p'akk'akkaana, akwọbha afona, O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, matzẹmaa anọng p'akk'abhekha akwọbha afona.
EXO 15:17 Kọ átzima anọng mba adim kẹ, abira attima bẹ aranga k'egbegbeho ch'ede chọ. O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ibe sa kọ asi mach'irukhabe sọ, ide owurada-họhm kw'asi ttara mbọhk sọ, o Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 15:18 Ẹvaar ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi éwobha, matzẹmaa ogbe ode.”
EXO 15:19 Mada nnyanyaang sa Phero, ọmaana akpaar pẹ pa nnyanyaang mindọr, ọmaana ayari-nnyanyaang pẹ adimi k'asi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi asi p'ọraanga kw'ideden anwa akpori bẹ. Yina, osi anọng p'Israẹl arenga k'irerek k'ottem kw'ọraanga.
EXO 15:20 Mẹ wọ, Miriyam, kw'iwa ode ọsẹ-jaakhi kw'Ibinọkpaabyi, obiro ode ọgbaanọkka kw'Aarọn, ọtzọkha ebin ekhirachẹ, otzima panọng p'Israẹl eden bẹ akhir mbin, abira atzubh.
EXO 15:21 Miriyam ọkkọhn ọnang bẹ, oben bi; “Bọng kkọhn anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, okhuri ekhema-barada chẹ, Kẹ okk'ẹnyanyaang, ọmaana ọyaar-ẹnyanyaang, otzini otzem k'ọraanga kw'ideden.”
EXO 15:22 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs otzima anọng p'Israẹl eden bẹ abina aji Ẹraanga-khora, achina k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi sa Shur. Bẹ arenga k'iwu ittaan k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi, bẹ asi kare.
EXO 15:23 Mada bẹ apyiri ka Mara, bẹ asi pa Mara kafha agwo, okhuri da asi mba ajobh-ojobhi. Kẹ wọ iwa osi bẹ ayeri ibe nna Mara.
EXO 15:24 Mẹ wọ, anọng p'Israẹl anwọhni anang Mosẹs, aben bi, “Mbọng fa mogwo o?”
EXO 15:25 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs obhom ọkpẹkhi Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkhọhkh-ẹ ommenkpakpa, kwa Mosẹs odungi ọbhari k'asi, asi p'ajobh-ojobhi an-abhakhi adam-ọdam. Ma Mara, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang anọng p'Israẹl aphaangi, ọmaana ndọhna k'odem kwa bẹ aruk, obiro oyoma bẹ, ifha ore s'ode na bẹ afha ahok aphaangi pẹ.
EXO 15:26 Oben bi, “Idikha bọng afha átzọhkha ogbe áyong-m itzọhng, asi idik s'itzor-otzor ka chen paam, bọng abira ahok aphaangi paam, kaam bọng ikhọmmana sa nnangi anọng p'Ijip kínang. Kaam wọ nde Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng, kw'obin bọng k'ikhọmmana.”
EXO 15:27 Mẹ wọ, anọng p'Israẹl atte Mara ọbọhk achina k'Elim. M'Elim, akhekhaho jobh obhiri afa, ọmaana aji arọbh attaan obhiri jobh awobh mẹ. Wa anọng p'Israẹl akwu abhing abaanga ngekha nnuma.
EXO 16:1 Wa k'iwu chi s'ophe kw'ottong afa, mada anọng p'Israẹl akk'abina k'Ijip, bẹ biphyir abina orenga k'Elim apyiri k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi sa Sin, s'iwobh k'ottem kw'Ẹlim, ọmaana Sinai.
EXO 16:2 M'ibe nna s'anọng an-arukhi rọ s'ebhonmọr ch'Israẹl biphyir ẹnwọhni, ẹttaanga anang Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn.
EXO 16:3 Anọng p'Israẹl aben bẹ bi, “Ira ojibh ọtzam bi, mope ka mbọhk s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi k'Ijip, kẹ da mowobh ẹwọr ochi nden, ọmaana ẹchakpo ọdọdọk biphyir mach'ọdaakhi man. Yina, bọng akk'man atzima akwu m'ibe nna s'anọng an-arukhi bi, okwo ofhu anọngeya mba biphyir.”
EXO 16:4 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Kaam ńdọhm brẹd kw'ótzebh mach'ẹrọng ch'efon k'ọrọngkpakpa nnang bọng. K'ewu kpenamkpen anọng mba ám-ayin k'iyaan atza akpokhi f'obenga bẹ. Kaam ńnenga m'eden nda ńyoma bẹ, ifha nne ode na bẹ átzor ka ndọhna saam.”
EXO 16:5 Ottong iwu izadani, bẹ asi ọchattọhk fa bẹ akpokhi, f'ode igbe ifa ka fa bẹ am-akkekkeni akpokhi, k'iwu ọdọdọk.
EXO 16:6 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn aben anọng p'Israẹl biphyir bi, “Sa k'ẹchọhkha, bọng árong-oronga bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ otzim bọng obina k'Ijip.
EXO 16:7 Bọng abira áre abarada p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ore k'ekpebha, okhuri bi, kẹ ọkk'ẹnwọhni cha bọng attaanga anang-ẹ ọbhaanga. Maman ode macha bọng anọng, pa bọng anwọhni, attaanga anang o?”
EXO 16:8 Mosẹs obiro oben bi, “Bọng árong-oronga bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ, mada ọnang bọng nden sa bọng achi k'ẹchọhkha, ọmaana brẹd kwa bọng aror bi, achi k'ekpebha, okhuri bi, kẹ ọkk'ẹnwọhni cha bọng attaang anang-ẹ ọbhaanga. Maman ode macha bọng anọng, pa bọng anwọhni, attaanga anang o? K'odik ọkkakka, bọng am-anwọhni, attaanga anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi e, maman arang e.”
EXO 16:9 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs oben Aarọn bi, “Kọ gbaak anọng p'ebhonmọr ch'Israẹl biphyir bi, bẹ arenga ayin Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi k'itzitzikha, okhuri bi, kẹ okk'ẹnwọhni chabọng ọbhaanga.”
EXO 16:10 Mada Aarọn ọm-ọgbaak anọng p'ebhonmọr ch'Israẹl biphyir atzim, bẹ akkeri k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi, are abarada p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi p'ayini k'eboni.
EXO 16:11 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi,
EXO 16:12 “Kaam nkk'ẹnwọhni ch'anọng p'Israẹl mmaanga e. Kọ gbaak bẹ bi, ‘K'ẹchọhkha bọng áchi etzen, k'ekpebha, bọng áchi brẹd maa bọng adọbh. Mẹ wọ kwa bọng átzima áronga bi, kaam wọ nde Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng.’ ”
EXO 16:13 Mẹ wọ, m'ẹchọhkha nduma, ọnọhn oyin k'ọhaabh maa obubha ibhingabe bi waam. K'ekpebha, odiri-bẹrẹbẹrẹ otzebh ọkhọri ibhingabe biphyir.
EXO 16:14 Mada odiri-bẹrẹbẹrẹ okk'odimi, ekpo mach'abubuma eyin ebubha m'irerek bi gbii. k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi.
EXO 16:15 Mada anọng p'Israẹl are fẹ, bẹ fẹ karong, mẹ wọ, bẹ an-abọbh ayok bi, “Bọng ọttọhk-dema vọ ma?” Mosẹs oben bẹ bi, “Brẹd kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnangi bọng bi, bọng achi wọ e.
EXO 16:16 Ma wọ ode ndọhna s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọnanga bi, ‘Ọnọng-ọnọng okpokhi fẹ mach'ọdaakh-ẹ e. Ọnọng-ọnọng okpokhi ogbobhimbọhk, atzor k'ọnọngmik kw'ikhira sọ.’ ”
EXO 16:17 Wa anọng p'Israẹl asi macha bẹ agbaakhi bẹ. Anọng bani akpokhi k'ọhaabh, bani akpokhi ibebaa.
EXO 16:18 Mada bẹ an-ayom k'agbobhimbọhk, bẹ an-are bi, ayok p'akpokhi k'ọhaabh bẹ kpọng kakpokhi. Ayok p'abira akpokhi ibebaa, bẹ f'ọkhar kpọng kabira akpokhi. Ọnọng-ọnọng okpokhi macha fẹ obeng-ẹ.
EXO 16:19 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs oben bẹ bi, “Ọnọng manda wani oningi ọchattọhk mva ohokhi maa ewu ehobha o.”
EXO 16:20 Yina, bẹ ayok bani Mosẹs itzọhng kayong. Bẹ ahok ọchattọhk mva maa ewu ehobha. K'ekpebha fẹ ochu ọnwa nniri, obiro ọttẹwọr ohom. Mẹ wọ e, ettem ẹkhọm Mosẹs etzima etzor bẹ.
EXO 16:21 Ekpebhawu kpenamkpen, ọnọng-ọnọng okpokhi macha fẹ obeng-ẹ. Yina, ekpikhira ẹkhọmi, fa bẹ akpokhi arik oyona biphyir.
EXO 16:22 Kẹ ewu ch'ettong izadani, bẹ akpokhi f'ode igbe ifa, ọnọng-ọnọng agbobhi-mbọhk afa. Wa adeho p'obhon atzọkha odik nwa atza agbaak Mosẹs.
EXO 16:23 Mosẹs oben bẹ bi, “Ma wọ ode ndọhna s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnangi bi, ‘Ophyini ode ẹwọhngkwokhawu, ẹwọhngkwokhawu ch'awurada ẹnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Mẹ wọ, bọng bọm ọchattọhk kpenamkpen fa bọng abọm, bọng awọhn kpenamkpen fa bọng awọhn. Bọng hok kpenamkpen f'orik maa opyiri ekpebha.’ ”
EXO 16:24 Mẹ wọ, bẹ asi macha Mosẹs ọtzọhni bẹ, bẹ ahok f'orikhi maa ewu ehobha. Wa fẹ kohomi, nniri kobiro ọnwa.
EXO 16:25 Mosẹs oben bi, “Bọng chi fẹ mayina, okhuri bi, mayina ode ẹwọhngkwokhawu ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Bọng manda vani k'irerek mayina, káre e.
EXO 16:26 Bọng am-akpokhi fẹ k'iwu izadani, yina, ottong iwu izenamfa, kw'ode ẹwọhngkwokhawu, manda vani kóde.”
EXO 16:27 Kaambi mẹ wọ, ottong iwu izenamfa, anọng bani ayin k'iyaan bi bẹ atza akpokhi ọchattọhk, bẹ manda vani kare.
EXO 16:28 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Ogbe obhir otzuma yan, kwa bọng ábhum asana paam, ọmaana aphaangi paam ohohok o?
EXO 16:29 Bọng jima bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'bọng ẹwọhngkwokhawu ọnanga, kẹ wọ osi ottong iwu izadani, ọm-ọnang bọng brẹd kw'iwu ifa. Ottong iwu izenamfa, ọnọng-ọnọng owobha k'ibe s'owobh. Ọnọng oningi k'iyaan oyini.”
EXO 16:30 Mẹ wọ, anọng mba akwokha ọwọhng k'ewu ch'ettong izenamfa.
EXO 16:31 Wa anọng p'Israẹl ayeri brẹd nwa Mana. Wa fẹ owuri mach'echimọma cha koriyanda, fẹ ọdaam mach'obubhkpa kwa bẹ atzim akhọkhọnana asi.
EXO 16:32 Mosẹs oben bi, “Ma wọ ode ndọhna s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ‘Bọng kpokhi ogbobhimbọhk kwa Mana ahok igbọ s'íkwu k'ororo, ifha bẹ are brẹd kw'iwa nnangi bọng achi k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi, mada ndim bọng mbina k'Ijip.’ ”
EXO 16:33 Mosẹs oben Aarọn bi, “Tọkha ogbobhimbọhk kwa mana awọna k'ogbere. Atzọkha ogbere nwa abera k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, owobha otzik igbọ s'íkwu k'ororo.”
EXO 16:34 Aarọn osi macha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'Mosẹs ọtzọhna, ọtzọkha ogbere nwa obera k'itzitzikha s'Ẹkkọhbhi cha Echekhi, ifha owobha mẹ.
EXO 16:35 Wa anọng p'Israẹl achi Mana ka cho arọbh afa, maa bẹ apyiri k'irerek s'anọng arukhi. Bẹ achi Mana maa bẹ apyiri k'enem cha Kenaan.
EXO 16:36 Omer ode ogbobhimbọk wani k'agbobhimbọhk jobh p'asi ẹpha kw'ode ọkwakkama.
EXO 17:1 Wa anọng p'ebhonmọr ch'Israẹl biphyir abina k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi sa Sin, arenga k'obe k'obe mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhni bẹ. Bẹ asi ibhingabe ka Rẹphidim, yina, wa asi p'anọng mba agwo, kade.
EXO 17:2 Mẹ wọ, wa bẹ achi Mosẹs akkaam aben bi, “Nang man asi mogwo.” Mosẹs obhina bi, “Bọng am-achi-m akkaam pa mbọng o? Okhuri yan kwa bọng am-akhe Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi k'eyoma o?”
EXO 17:3 Yina, wa asi adaak anọng mba maa, bẹ anwọhni attaanga anang Mosẹs, aben bi, “Okhuri yan kw'atzim man, ọmaana va paman, ttara etzirakpo pyaman abina k'Ijip bi, mokwu ope ma k'isi-dadaakha o?”
EXO 17:4 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs obhom ọkpẹkhi Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, oben bi, “Kaam ńsi yan ọmaana anọng mba o? Ma, bẹ an-ado for sa bẹ atzọbh-m atza.”
EXO 17:5 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhina Mosẹs bi, “Chi anọng mba eden. Kọ tzima adeho bani p'Israẹl, atzọkha ochikhura kw'atzim abun k'ọraanga kwa Nile, arọhng.
EXO 17:6 Kaam ḿbọ-ọ k'itzitzikha k'itzakpa sa Horẹb. Bun ochikhura kwọ m'itzakpa nna, asi áyin-oyin mẹ p'anọng mba agwo.” Mẹ wọ, wa Mosẹs osi mando, m'itzitzikha s'adeho mba p'Israẹl.
EXO 17:7 Wa Mosẹs oyeri ibe nna Masa, ọmaana Mẹriba, okhuri bi, mẹ wọ kw'anọng p'Israẹl achẹ-ẹ akkaam, bẹ abira ayoma Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi aben bi, “Ma Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ma ttara man ma o?”
EXO 17:8 Wa ab'Amalẹk akwu arima anọng p'Israẹl abẹ ka Rẹphidim.
EXO 17:9 Mẹ wọ e, Mosẹs oben Joshua bi, “Tzekha ajinọng bani paman, atza arima ab'Amalẹk abẹ. Ophyini kaam ḿbe k'egbegbeho ebir-ebir, ttara ochikhura kw'Ibinọkpaabyi k'ọbọhk kwaam.”
EXO 17:10 Mẹ wọ, Joshua orima ab'Amalẹk abẹ macha Mosẹs ọkk'ẹfa ọnanga. Mosẹs, ọmaana Aarọn, ttara Hur afona achina k'egbegbeho ebir-ebir.
EXO 17:11 Ogbe kpenamkpen kwa Mosẹs ọyaangi mbọhk sẹ k'ẹrọng, anọng p'Israẹl akhema. Yina ogbe kpenamkpen kw'ọhak mbọhk sẹ, ab'Amalẹk akhema.
EXO 17:12 K'ogbe kwa mbọhk nkwok Mosẹs, bẹ atzini ọtza ahokh-ẹ owobha ẹwọr. Aarọn, ọmaana Hur, abọkha mbọhk sẹ atzima k'ẹrọng, ọnọng-ọnọng k'ọbọhk kwẹ. Wa mbọhk sẹ nwobh mando maa ẹchọhkha-kpikhira edimi.
EXO 17:13 Mẹ wọ, wa Joshua otzima ọkkangkkaang okhema agbong-nọng p'Amalẹk.
EXO 17:14 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Kọ kkẹr idik nna ka nnwẹr, mach'odik kw'ejima. Akhaambi asi Joshua ọbhaanga kwẹ, okhuri bi, kaam ńdimi che ch'Amalẹk k'ọyagbin biphyir-phyir.”
EXO 17:15 Mẹ wọ e, Mosẹs osi ijafọhnibe, oyeri sẹ, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ode Okhem kwaam.”
EXO 17:16 Oben bi, “Okhuri da bẹ atzini mbọhk k'ẹrọng atzena k'ẹvaarchi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ órima ab'Amalẹk abẹ k'igbọ k'igbọ.”
EXO 18:1 Wa Jẹtro kw'ode ọfọhnẹja kwa Midiyan, obiro ode otte kwa kwanọng kwa Mosẹs, ọbhaanga odik kpenamkpen kw'Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọsa ọnang Mosẹs, ttara anọng p'Israẹl, ọmaana eden ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'orenga ọrọbha anọng p'Israẹl k'Ijip.
EXO 18:2 Mada Mosẹs okk'kwanọng kwẹ Zipọra ọtzọhma bi, otza ebhinga k'otte Jẹtro, wa otte ọtzọkh-ẹ,
EXO 18:3 ọmaana va pẹ afa. Wa Mosẹs okpe oyok wani Gẹrshọm, oben bi, “Kaam nkk'okhekhenọng nna nda k'irerek s'anọng.”
EXO 18:4 Okpe oyok nwonggo Eliyeza, oben bi, “Ibinọkpaabyi kw'otte kwaam okpobh, wọ iwa ode ọkkaan kwaam. Kẹ wọ ọkkaan-m, ọrọbh-m ka mbọhk sa Phero.”
EXO 18:5 Wa Jẹtro, otte kwa kwanọng kwa Mosẹs otzima va mba afa, ttara kwanọng kwa Mosẹs otza okhebh-ẹ k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi, kẹ da iwa obhingi, ọbaanga egbegbeho ch'Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 18:6 Wa okk'ẹkkaabha ọtzọhma ọnang Mosẹs bi, “Kaam Jẹtro, otte kwa kwanọng kwọ, ndim kwanọng kwọ, ttara va pẹ p'ijinọng afa, nkwuma nkwu ngebh-ọ e.”
EXO 18:7 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs okhubh bẹ k'eden, ọrakha ọkhọhkha ikpokpobha, ọbaakha otte kwa kwanọng kwẹ. Bẹ arima ayok, bẹ abira adim k'ikhira.
EXO 18:8 Mosẹs ọgbaak otte kwa kwanọng kwẹ odik kpenamkpen kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'Phero, ọmaana anọng p'Ijip ọsa ọnang anọng p'Israẹl. Wa obiro ọgbaakh-ẹ ihem sa bẹ akk'are k'eden biphyir, ttara eden ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'bẹ ọkkaana.
EXO 18:9 Wa ettem ẹdaam Jẹtro k'idik-jibhada biphyir s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọsa, otzima ọrọbha anọng p'Israẹl ka mbọhk s'anọng p'Ijip.
EXO 18:10 Oben bi, “Ẹtzọhnga ewobha ẹnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'ọrọbh bọng ka mbọhk s'anọng p'Ijip ọmaana sa Phero, kw'obiro ọrọbha anọng mba ka mbọhk s'anọng p'Ijip.
EXO 18:11 Kaam nkk'nna nnonga bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbaari ọyọhnga idik biphyir s'anọng akpobh, osi odik nwa otzima otzor anọng p'age for asi anọng p'Israẹl ọgbaan.”
EXO 18:12 Mẹ wọ, Jẹtro, kw'ode otte kwa kwanọng kwa Mosẹs, otzima ẹnanga ẹkwọmichẹ, ọmaana njafọhni ndọdọk ọnang Ibinọkpaabbyi. Wa Aarọn obiro otzima adeden-nọng p'Israẹl biphyir, ọtza ochi ọchattọhk ttara otte kwa kwanọng kwa Mosẹs k'itzitzikha s'Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 18:13 Mada ewu en-ehobh, Mosẹs otza owobha ẹwọr bi, ọttọhna aponga p'anọng mba. Anọng mba abe akhọri Mosẹs akhe k'ottem, ttẹwọr k'ekpebha maa ẹchọhkha etto.
EXO 18:14 Mada otte kwa kwanọng ore idik biphyir sa Mosẹs om-osi ọnang anọng mba, ọn-ọbọbh bi, “Mbọng f'am-asi anang anọng mba ma o? Mbọng vọ osi am-attọhna aponga mancheni, anọng mba biphyir am-abir abe akhọr-ọ ttẹwọr k'ekpebha maa ẹchọhkha etto o?”
EXO 18:15 Mosẹs obhin-ẹ bi, “Okhuri da anọng am-akwu akhebh-m bi, mphyem ochibhi kw'Ibinọkpaabyi nnang bẹ e.
EXO 18:16 Ogbe kpenamkpen kwa bẹ akhaam ngọhr, bẹ am-atzima akwu bi, nttọhna nnang bẹ, mbiri mgbaak bẹ akpebhi, ọmaana aphaangi p'Ibinọkpaabyi.”
EXO 18:17 Otte kwa kwanọng kwa Mosẹs obhina bi, “Kọbaan bi asi mando.
EXO 18:18 Ọ́khọn kọ, ọmaana anọng mba p'am-akwu akhebh-ọ ọkhọn e. Ọtzọhm mva ọbari ọyọhng-ọ e, fẹ mancheni kafha asi e.
EXO 18:19 Kọ yong-m itzọhng, ka ndọhna sa kaam ńnang-ọ, tte Ibinọkpaabyi owobha ttara bọng. Kọ akhaambi atzera eho ch'anọng mba, abira atzima ngọhr sabẹ ayin Ibinọkpaabyi k'itzitzikha.
EXO 18:20 Kpebhi bẹ akpebhi ọmaana aphaangi mba, abira akhọkha bẹ eden ch'ẹbaan bi bẹ aruk, ọmaana itzọhmbọhk-dema sa bẹ abaan bi asi.
EXO 18:21 Yina, kọ tzekha ajinọng p'abaan-ọbaana k'ottem kw'anọng mba biphyir, ajinọng p'akhaam ojora f'Ibinọkpaabyi, p'ayok ahokhi k'odik-ọkka, p'attaanga anang ibhora, asi bẹ adeho p'ayok, ka nnọhna nnọhna, ọmaana arọbh azen azen, ọmaana arọbh afa obhiri jobh, ttara ka jobh jobh.
EXO 18:22 Tte bẹ ade attọhn-aponga p'anọng mba k'ogbe kpenamkpen. Tte bẹ atzima aponga kpenamkpen p'agaangi-ọgaangi achen-ọ, yina, tte bẹ akpara aponga p'ikhakhari ka for sabẹ. Mẹ wọ osi ọtzọhm obhekh-ọ, da bẹ an-atzor-ọ ọtzọhm.
EXO 18:23 Idikha asi mando, mach'Ibinọkpaabyi obiro ọtzọhn-ọ, kọ ábe ọtzọhm mva abẹ obe, anọng mba biphyir abira abhana ttara ottemdamiji.”
EXO 18:24 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs oyonga itzọhng ọnang otte kwa kwanọng, osi odik kpenamkpen kw'ọtzọhn-ẹ.
EXO 18:25 Mosẹs ọrọbha ajinọng p'abaan-ọbaana k'ottem kw'anọng p'Israẹl biphyir, osi bẹ aho p'anọng mba ka ngaan sa nnọhna nnọhna, ọmaana s'arọbh azen azen, ọmaana s'arọbh afa obhiri jobh, ttara sa jobh jobh.
EXO 18:26 Anọng mba an-ade attọhn-aponga p'ayok k'ogbe kpenamkpen. Anọng atzima aponga p'agaang-ọgaangi achena Mosẹs, yina, bẹ am-akpaara p'ikhakhari ka for sabẹ.
EXO 18:27 Mẹ wọ e, Mosẹs otza orik otte kwa kwanọng kwẹ k'eden. Jẹtro ọbhana ka kẹ k'ekhọma.
EXO 19:1 K'ophe kw'ottong attaan, mada anọng p'Israẹl akk'abina k'Ijip, m'ewu nduma dani, bẹ apyiri k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi sa Sinai.
EXO 19:2 Mada bẹ abin ka Rẹphidim, bẹ arenga apyiri k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi sa Sinai. Wa anọng p'Israẹl abhing mẹ, k'itzitzikha s'egbegbeho nda.
EXO 19:3 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs ovura otza okhebha Ibinọkpaabyi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oyer-ẹ k'egbegbeho, oben bi, “Ma wọ ode odik kw'ágbaak va pa va pa Jekọb, ọmaana anọng p'Israẹl.
EXO 19:4 ‘Bọbọng ọkhaam akk'idik ara sa nnsi Ijip, ọmaana eden cha ndini bọng k'ẹrọng mach'ikyenọhn itzini va pẹ ka mbabaang, ndima nkwu ma da kaam nwobh.
EXO 19:5 Mẹ wọ, idikha bọng akhakha eho k'ettem obungichẹ, bọng abira ahok echekhi chaam, k'ottem kw'idibhon biphyir, bọng áde anọng pa kaam nhokhi ettem, kaambi ode bi oyagbin biphyir ọkhaam kaam.
EXO 19:6 Bọng áde obhon kwaam kw'afọhni-nja, ọmaana obhon kw'awurada.’ Ma wọ ode atzim p'agbaak anang anọng p'Israẹl.”
EXO 19:7 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs ọkpa nnam okwu otzobha adeden-nọng p'anọng mba, ọtzọkha atzim biphyir p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹ ọtzọhna bi ọgbaak, ọgbaak bẹ.
EXO 19:8 Anọng mba biphyir an-abhina k'ogbe wani bi, “Ḿosi odik kpenamkpen ósi mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'obena.” Mẹ wọ e, Mosẹs ọkpa nnam ọtza ọgbaak Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ebhina chabẹ.
EXO 19:9 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Kaam nhakha ndor-ọ k'eboni ch'epyi bi kaang, ifha anọng mba ábhaanga da mgbaak atzim ttar-ọ, bẹ áphennam ka kọ.” Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs ọn-ọgbaak Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ebhina ch'anọng mba akk'ananga.
EXO 19:10 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Kpa nnam atza akhebha anọng mba, hok bẹ awur-owur mayina ttara ophyini. Tte bẹ agbobhi ọbara fabẹ fa for,
EXO 19:11 bọng ado for k'ewu ch'ettong ittaan, okhuri bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọ́hakha k'egbegbeho cha Sinai m'ewu nduma k'ibe s'anọng biphyir arẹ-ẹ.
EXO 19:12 Kọ khe enem akhọri egbegbeho nda, abira agbaak bẹ bi, ‘Bọng tọkha ogbe kwabọng o, ọnọng oningi egbegbeho nda ovur o, yina ira ọn-ọttọhmi chẹ ọttọhmi. K'odik-ọkka, onong kpenamkpen kw'ọttọhmi egbegbeho nda, bẹ áfhẹ-ẹ ofhu.
EXO 19:13 Kẹ bẹ átzọbh-ẹ atza, asi mẹ bẹ akhum-ẹ akhọhn, bẹ kẹ ọbọhk kabun. Ode ọnọngẹya, obiro ode etzen o, kọbaan bi, bẹ attẹ-ẹ ọbọhk oruk akpen.’ Oyongi bi, bẹ agyi ẹha ch'erukhimaan-dim k'ogbe-bhirada, mẹ kwa bẹ afha arenga abaanga egbegbeho nda.”
EXO 19:14 Mẹ wọ, mada Mosẹs okk'm'egbegbekho nda ọhakha, okwu osi anọng mba awur, bẹ abira agbobhi ọbara fabẹ fa for.
EXO 19:15 On-oben bẹ bi, “Bọng do for atzik ottong iwu nttaan. Bọng ayok abẹ kayima.”
EXO 19:16 K'ekpebha ch'ewu ch'ettong ittaan, ẹbhaangkpon ẹtta, ebira ẹmani, eboni ch'epyi bi kaang ebubha egbegbeho ebir-ebir, obukpọhng obiro ogyi k'ẹrọng bi pooom, opoma osi ọnọng kpenamkpen k'ibhingabe.
EXO 19:17 Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs otzima anọng mba obina k'ibhingabe, bẹ atza akhebha Ibinọkpaabyi, bẹ abe k'egbegbeho-rin.
EXO 19:18 Irorong ibubha egbegbeho cha Sinai, okhuri bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọhak m'egbegbeho nda k'ekpon. Irorong nna ivura k'ẹrọng mach'irorong s'ekpon ch'ẹwọm-ọwọma, egbegbeho nda biphyir enyingi itzama-itzama.
EXO 19:19 Ẹmọng ch'obukpọhng en-edo ẹtza-ọtza. Mẹ wọ e, Mosẹs ọgbaak atzim, Ibinọkpaabyi otzima ẹbhaangkpon obhin-ẹ.
EXO 19:20 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọhakha k'egbegbekho cha Sinai ebir-ebir, oyeri Mosẹs bi, ovura okhebh-ẹ kẹ. Mẹ wọ, Mosẹs ovura,
EXO 19:21 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Mosẹs bi, “Kọ hakha atza atzọr anọng mba itzọhng, ifha bẹ aningi eden arori cha bẹ akwu are Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ofona mẹ, haabhada ape.
EXO 19:22 Kaambi afọhnẹja p'areng afora Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bọ, bẹ akhaambi ahok for sabẹ, iwur-owur, oni mando ode, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọ́nang bẹ ettuma.”
EXO 19:23 Mosẹs oben Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “Anọng mba k'egbegbeho cha Sinai kafha arenga abaanga, okhuri bi, kọ ọkhaam wọ atzọri man itzọhng bi, ‘Kẹ enem akhori egbegbeho nda, ahok chẹ ewur-owur.’ ”
EXO 19:24 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhina bi, “Kọ hakha atza atzima Aarọn akwu. Yina, afọhnẹja, ọmaana anọng mba kakhaambi atzima ẹkhaari avura akwu k'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, oni mando ode, kẹ ọnang bẹ ettuma.”
EXO 19:25 Mẹ wọ e, Mosẹs ọhakha okwu okhebha anọng mba, ọgbaak bẹ idik s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'obena.
EXO 20:1 Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi ọgbaak atzim mba biphyir, oben bi:
EXO 20:2 “Kaam wọ nde Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng, kw'otzim bọng obina k'Ijip, k'irerek s'ebira.
EXO 20:3 “Bọng idik ọdọdọk kàkpobha, kw'oyongi kaam.
EXO 20:4 “Bọng ọgbatza kàgwa kw'ókher ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'owobh k'ẹrọng, ode bi fẹ owobh k'irerek, fẹ obiro owobha k'asi ẹtzaanga.
EXO 20:5 Bọng nho kàhakha anang agbatza mba, bọng bẹ kàbira akpobha, okhuri bi, kaam Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kwa nde Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng, nde Ibinọkpaabyi kw'ọkhaam ottem-mamma, kw'ọm-ọnang va ọmmọmma k'itzama s'ab'otte, maa apyiri mgbọmma nttaan, ọmaana mgbọmma nna s'anọng p'attaang-m.
EXO 20:6 Yina, kaam mingọhkha idadaakha nnang mgbọmma nnọhna-nnabhik sa ngaam idadaakha ttar-m, mbiri nhok asana paam.
EXO 20:7 “Bọng che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng k'elulukhiden kàtzima, okhuri bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kóbina ọnang, ọnọng kw'olukhi che chẹ.
EXO 20:8 “Bọng jima Ẹwọhngkwokhawu bi, bọng ahok chẹ mach'ewuradawu anang Ibinọkpaabyi.
EXO 20:9 Bọng dima iwu izadani asi itzọhm sabọng biphyir,
EXO 20:10 yina, ottong iwu izenamfa, ode Ẹwọhngkwokhawu ch'ikpokpobha anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng. M'ewu nda, ọnọng manda wani, kaambi kọ wọ, ode nnwa kwọ kw'ijinọng, ode kw'ikwanọng, ode ọtzọhmnọng kwọ kw'ijinọng, ode ọtzọhmnọng kw'ikwanọng, ode etzirakpo pyabọng, obiro ode okhekhennọng kw'orukhi k'ottem kwa bọng, oningi ọtzọhm osi.
EXO 20:11 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzim iwu izadani osi ẹrọng ọmaana irerek, ọmaana ọraanga kw'ideden, ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'owobh k'ẹtzaanga kwabẹ, yina, ottong iwu izenamfa okwokha ọwọhng. Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi odo Ẹwọhngkwokhawu nda, ohok chẹ mach'ewuradawu.
EXO 20:12 “Bọng kpobha abatte, ọmaana abakka, ifha bọng aruk akpen p'adum-odum k'irerek s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng ọ́nang bọng.
EXO 20:13 “Bọng ọnọng kàfhu.
EXO 20:14 “Bọng ọtta kàtzam.
EXO 20:15 “Bọng oribh kàfhu.
EXO 20:16 “Bọng nttẹsẹ kw'ibhora kàbe.
