JDG 18:26 Mando kw'anọng pa Dan afon bi bẹẹm. Mada Mika ore bi, ajinọng mba agaangi ọtzam ayọhng-ẹ, ọbhakhi nnam ọbhana.
JDG 18:27 Mando kwa bẹ atzọk ekpo pya Mika ọkk'ọsa, ọmaana ọfọhnẹja kwẹ atzima afona achina ka Laish, atza arima egbong ttara anọng p'arukhi k'odidiri bẹ ojora kabira akhaama. Bẹ atzima ọkkangkkaang arima anọng mba abẹ, bẹ abira akwọmi odedenmon kwabẹ.
JDG 18:28 Wa ọnọng manda wani kw'ọkkaan bẹ kode, da obhon kwabẹ obhiri eden k'obhon kwa Sidọn, ttara bi, wa bẹ oforgbakha ttara obhon manda wani kakhaam. Wa odedenmon nwa owobh k'ittolim s'ibaang Bet-Rehob. Wa anọng pa Dan an-abira asi odedenmon nwa, aruk mẹ.
JDG 18:29 Kaambi ode bi, wa obhon nwa okpen Laish, bẹ an-akpẹ-ẹ che abhina Dan, kw'ode otte kwabẹ kw'ideden, kw'iwa ode nnwa kwa Jekọb.
JDG 18:30 Wa anọng pa Dan atzọkha ọgbatza nwa attima, Jonatan kw'ode nnwa kwa Gershọm, kw'ode nnwa kwa Mosẹs, ọmaana va pẹ p'ijinọng bọ iwa ade afọhnẹja p'ẹkhọma cha Dan maa, akwu apyiri k'ogbe kwa bẹ abọk ẹkhọma nda k'ẹmmọri.
JDG 18:31 Bẹ achina ororo akpobha ọgbatza nwa kwa Mika ọkk'ọsa, k'ogbe biphyir kw'ọhọhm kw'Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ka Shilo.
JDG 19:1 K'ogbe nwuma wa anọng p'Israẹl ọvaarnọng kakhaam. Iwa ọkhaam ojinọng wani kw'efonamma cha Lẹvi, kw'orukhi k'ẹtzaanga-ẹtzaanga kw'okhubha kwa mgbegbeho s'Ephraim, kw'ọtzọk ọkkọra-kwanọng kw'ofon Bẹtẹlẹhẹm ka Juda.
JDG 19:2 Yina, wa ọkkọra-kwanọng nwa osi ẹmmaana-tzama otzima otzor odim. Wa obin oji odim, ọkpa nnam k'otte k'ọhọhm ka Bẹtẹlẹhẹm kwa Juda. Mada okk'aphe anna owobha kẹ,
JDG 19:3 odim obina ttara atzọhmnọng pẹ ọmaana nnyanyaang sẹ mfa, bi ọtza okhukh-ẹ ọkpa nnam. Mando kwa kwanọng nwa otzim odim, ọnwa k'ọhọhm kw'otte. Mada otte kwa kwanọng ọrẹ-ẹ, ọgọm-ẹ ttara ottem-daamiji.
JDG 19:4 Ọnyẹ kwẹ kw'ode otte kwa kwanọng, ophyem-ẹ bi obhing, mando kw'obhingi ttara bẹ k'iwu ittaan. Om-ochi obiro ogwo, obiro ọttaabha mẹ.
JDG 19:5 Ottong iwu inna, bẹ abina k'ekpekpebha ado for bi, bẹ afona. Yina, otte kwa kwanọng oben odim kwa nnwa bi, “Kọ bọkha ẹbhọhr yina afona.”
JDG 19:6 Mando kwa bẹ anọng afa awobh ibe rani achi ọchattọhk abira agwo atzuk. Mada bẹ akk'akyera, otte kwa kwanọng oben bi, “Tzotzokhaan, tte ettem ẹdaam-ọ bi, awobha ma m'erungiwu nda.”
JDG 19:7 Yina, k'ogbe kw'ojinọng nwa obin bi ofona, otte kwa kwanọng oden-ẹ maa, okhera oyima m'erungiwu nduma.
JDG 19:8 K'ekpebha ch'ewu ehobh, ch'ettong iwu izen, mada obin bi ofona, otte kwa kwanọng oben bi, “Kọ bọkha ẹbhọhr, awobha maa, apyiri k'ẹya!” Mando kwa bẹ atzọni achi ọttọhk.
JDG 19:9 K'ogbe kw'ojinọng nwa, ọmaana ọkkọra-kwanọng kwẹ ttara ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ abin bi afona, ọnyẹ kwẹ kw'ode otte kwa kwanọng, oben bi, “Kker e, erungi en-ekkekkeni epyi e, chi ọttọhk yima ma e; kkeri ewu ẹkk'ẹha e. Iphyini ekpekpebha, abina abhana k'ọhọhm kwọ e.”
JDG 19:10 Yina, wa itta nwa kẹ kọdaakhi bi obiro oyima mẹ k'erungiwu ẹdọdọk. Wa odo nnyanyaang sẹ ewobha, otzima ọkkọra-kwanọng kwẹ obina orenga ochina k'okhubha kwa Jẹbus (kw'ode Jẹrusalẹm).
JDG 19:11 K'ogbe kwa bẹ akk'Jebus abaanga, da ewu en-ebubha, ọtzọhmnọng kw'ojinọng nwa oben itta kwẹ bi, “Tte mobhing m'odedenmon kw'anọng pa Jẹbus m'erungiwu nda e.”
JDG 19:12 Itta kwẹ obhina ọtzọhmnọng nwa bi, “Mma e, man k'odedenmon manda wani kw'oni kw'anọng p'Israẹl ode kọ́tza. Ottu kw'am-osi mando, mọkwọbha óchina ka Gibea.
JDG 19:13 Tte mokhonga opyiri ka Gibea, obiro ode Rama, ifha moyima m'obhon wani kw'ibhon nna ifa e.”
JDG 19:14 Mando kwa be achin ororo maa, bẹ atza abaanga Gibea k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin, ka nchọhkha-bọhk.
JDG 19:15 Bẹ atza akwọbha ka Gibea bi bẹ abhing m'erungiwu nduma. Bẹ afona atza awobha ẹwọr ka nttaanga-chi s'odedenmon. Yina, ọnọng mando wani kw'oyeri bẹ bi, bẹ atza k'ọhọhm kwẹ kode.
JDG 19:16 M'ẹchọhkha nduma, ọtzaminọng-jinọng wani kw'ofon k'okhubha kwa mgbegbeho s'Ephraim, oruk ka Gibea ofona k'owoni kw'osi ọtzọhm okhuna. Wa anọng pa Gibea p'iwa arukhi m'ibe nna ade anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin.
JDG 19:17 Mada ọtzaminọng nwa otzini chen okkeri ka nttaanga-chi s'odedenmon, ọn-ọbọbh bi, “Bọng afon man o? Bọng am-achina man o?”
JDG 19:18 Ofona-nwa nwa kwa Lẹvi, obhina bi, “Mofon ka Bẹtẹlẹhẹm k'ẹkhọma cha Juda, om-ochina k'ẹtzaanga-ẹtzaanga kw'okhubha kwa mgbegbeho s'Ephraim, kẹ da kaam nnukhi. Wa kaam nda Bẹtẹlẹhẹm k'ẹkhọma cha Juda, ma, kaam nna nchin k'ọhọhm kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Ọnọng manda wani kw'ọkk'aam otzima bi, nda nyima k'ibe sẹ kode.
JDG 19:19 Maman ọttọhk manda vani korori. Mọkhaam araraari-bukhi ọmaana ọchattọhk fa nnyanyaang saman ka e. Mọkhaama brẹd ọmaana atzuk p'abenga kaam ọmaana kwanọng kwaam ttara odikkobh nwa.”
JDG 19:20 Mẹ wọ ofon, ọtzaminọng nwa oben bi, “Bọng kwu wobha k'ọhọhm kwaam. Bọng ma nttaanga-chi nna kàwobha. Tte nnang bọng ọttọhk kpenamkpen fa bọng aror.”
JDG 19:21 Mando kw'ọtzaminọng nwa otzim ojinọng nwa ochina k'ọhọhm kwẹ, obiro ọnang nnyanyaang sẹ ọchattọhk. Mada okk'mando asa, bẹ agbobhi mmokpatzọkhi sabẹ, bẹ achi ọttọhk, abira agwo atzuk.
JDG 19:22 K'ogbe kwa bẹ awobh k'ottemdamiji nwa, abibyanọng bani p'odedenmon nwa akhọri ọhọhm akhe k'ottem. Bẹ adani ọmma, am-akpẹbh ọtzaminọng kw'ọkhaam ọhọhm, aben bi, “Tzima ajinọng mba p'ahak m'ọhọhm kwọ kwu, ifha moyima bẹ abẹ.”
JDG 19:23 Mando kw'ọkhaam-ọhọhm oyini k'iyaan, oben ajinọng mba bi, “Mma e, ab'ayi, bọng obibyadik-dema nwa kasi e. Mada ojinọng nwa ode okhekhennọng kwaam, bọng ogbarsa-dik-dema nwa, kàsi.
JDG 19:24 Bọng kkeri, ominanwa kwaam ọmaana ọkkọra-kwanọng kw'ojinọng nwuma awobh ma e. Ńdima bẹ otzima nyin ka, ifha bọng ọtzọkha bẹ asi mach'achibhi pabọng ade. On-ode ojinọng nwa, bọng ogbarsa-dik-dema nwa kàsi.”
JDG 19:25 Kaambi mẹ wọ, ajinọng mba itzọhng kayong anang ọtzaminọng nwa. Mẹ wọ ofon, ofona-jinọng nwa kwa Lẹvi, ọtzọkha ọkkọra-kwanọng kwẹ ọnang ajinọng mba k'iyaan. Bẹ abọkh-ẹ k'ẹfa ayima abẹ m'erungiwu nduma biphyir. Mada ewu ehobh, bẹ atte kwanọng ọbọhk ofona.
JDG 19:26 M'owuhobha, kwanọng ọkpa nnam ochina k'ọhọhm kw'itta kwẹ om-owobha, otto owobha m'ibhokhi, oyima mẹ maa, ewu akyera ẹttaani.
JDG 19:27 K'ogbe kw'itta kwa kwanọng nwa ọn-ọphyọbh k'ekpebha, okwunga ọmma bi ochina ororo k'orenga kwẹ, on-ore ọkkọra-kwanọng kwẹ kw'ọkk'ọtta m'ọmma kw'ọhọhm, ọtzọkha mbọhk ọbọkha m'ọmma.
JDG 19:28 Itta kwẹ oben-ẹ bi, “Bina, mofona.” Yina, ẹmọng kosi. Mando kw'ojinọng nwa otzin-ẹ ọnana k'ẹnyanyaang otzim-ẹ ọbhana.
JDG 19:29 Mada bẹ apyiri k'ọhọhm, ọtzọkha okkoro ọkpọhk kwanọng ka ngọma-ka ngọma k'obe jobh obhiri afa, ọtzọkha ọtzọhm ka ngọma jobh obhiri mfa s'Israẹl.
JDG 19:30 Ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'ore kwẹ ọn-ọbhakhi oben oyok bi, “Bẹ odik-dema nwa atzim am-asa, anọng odik-dema nwa atzim am-ara, ttẹwọr k'ewu ch'iwa anọng p'Israẹl abin k'Ijip. Bọng chibhi odik nwa, mọkhaambi more odik okhuri kwẹ e!”
JDG 20:1 Iwa anọng p'Israẹl, ttẹwọr k'ẹkhọma cha Dan maa, apyiri ka Beershẹba, akwu attara ẹkhọma cha Gilead, afon atza atzobha mach'anọng bani ka Mizpa, k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
JDG 20:2 Wa adenho biphyir pa ngọma s'anọng p'Israẹl atzọkha nwobha sabẹ, k'ewobha ch'anọng p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi p'ade, anọng nnọhna-nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh p'adabhi igbong-for atzim akkangkkaang.
JDG 20:3 (Wa anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin abhaanga bi, anọng p'Israẹl akk'avura atza atzobha ka Mizpa.) Mẹ wọ ọsi, anọng p'Israẹl aben bi, “Bọng gbaak man odem kw'obibya-dik-dema nwa oreng otto.”
JDG 20:4 Mẹ wọ ofon, ojinọng nwa kw'efonamma cha Lẹvi, kw'ode odim kwa kwanọng kwa bẹ afhu, oben bi, “Kaam ọmaana ọkkọra-kwanọng kwaam wa mokwu ka Gibea k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin bi, mobhing m'erungiwu nda.
JDG 20:5 M'erungi nduma ajinọng p'afon ma Gibea akhubh-m, akwu akhọri ọhọhm akhe k'ottem, am-akham bi afhu-m. Bẹ ayima ọkkọra-kwanọng kwaam abẹ k'ẹfa maa, ope.
JDG 20:6 Mẹ wọ osi, kaam ndọkha ọkkọra-kwanọng kwaam, njọhkhi k'akhuma-k'akhuma, ndọkha ikhuma rani-rani ndọhm k'ẹkhọma kpenamkpen ch'Israẹl akhaam ekkema, okhuri bi k'Israẹl wọ kwa bẹ awobh asi ebyibya nda ọmaana odik-ttama nwa.
JDG 20:7 Mẹ wọ, bọbọng anọng p'Israẹl biphyir, bọng gbaakh-m odem kwa bọng akk'attọhna bi, asi e.”
JDG 20:8 Mando kw'ajinọng biphyir atzim ochibhi wani abina k'ẹrọng, aben bi, “Ọnọng manda wani ka man k'ottem kw'ọbhana k'ọhọhm, kóde. K'odik-ọkka, ọnọng manda wani kw'ọbhana k'ọhọhm kwẹ, kóde.
JDG 20:9 Ma wọ ode odik kwa mósi anọng pa Gibea: mọtza orima bẹ abẹ otzor k'odem kw'ẹjaakhi ch'ose, ede.
JDG 20:10 Mọrọbha ajinọng jobh k'ottem kw'ajinọng arọbh azen k'ẹkhọma kpenamkpen ch'Israẹl. Mọrọbha ajinọng arọbh azen k'ottem kw'ajinọng nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh kpenamkpen. Mọrọbha ajinọng nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh, k'ottem kw'ajinọng nnọhna ẹrọbh obhiri nzen, ifha anọng mba am-aror ọchattọhk f'arim-egbong. K'ogbe kw'arim-egbong ápyiri ka Gibea k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin, bẹ anang anọng pa Gibea ihem s'ibaan bẹ, k'odik-ttama nwa kwa bẹ asi k'Israẹl.”
JDG 20:11 Mando kw'anọng p'Israẹl biphyir akhaam akhera dani mach'anọng bani, atza arima anọng p'odedenmon nwa abe.
JDG 20:12 Iwa anọng pa ngọma s'anọng p'Israẹl atzọhm akkaabh-nkkaabha makhọra ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin, aben bi, “Bọng obibyadik-dem wọ kwa bọng asi k'ottem kwa bọng ma?
JDG 20:13 Bọng nang man ajinọng-dama mba p'afon ka Gibea ifha mofhu bẹ, k'odem kwa mogbobhi ebibya nda k'Israẹl ọbhari.” Yina, anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin bẹ ayokh-obhon p'Israẹl itzọhng kayong.
JDG 20:14 Iwa anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin abina k'ibhon sabẹ atza atzobha ka Gibea bi, bẹ arima anọng p'Israẹl abẹ.
JDG 20:15 Mẹ ẹbaa mẹ, anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin atzekha ajinọng k'ibhon sabẹ p'am-atzima akkangkkaang arima egbong, anọng nnọhna arọbh attaan obhiri azen akwu attara k'adikkobh p'akhaam ẹfa abira aruk ka Gibea, anọng nnọhna-nnọhna nna obhiri arọbh azenamfa obhiri jobh.
JDG 20:16 K'ottem kw'arim-egbong mba biphyir, wa bẹ atzek anọng ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh chi p'asi ibhiribọhk bẹ abira atzor ọbọhk k'ẹtzabhari. Ọnọng kw'ọm-obhari ọtza bi ọtzọbh ẹsisaa-naanga, kw'opyini kode.
JDG 20:17 Akhiri anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin aji, wa anọng p'Israẹl atzobh anọng p'am-atzima ọkkangkkaang arima egbong, anọng nnọhna-nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh, bẹ biphyir akhaam ekkoji ch'egbong.
JDG 20:18 Mẹ wọ ofon, wa anọng p'Israẹl afona achina ka Bẹtẹl atza adọhn Ibinọkpaabyi. Bẹ aben bi, “Bọng ẹkhọma k'ottem kwaman dọ echi eden ẹtza erima anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin abẹ o?” Iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhina bi, “Ẹkhọma cha Juda dọ échi eden.”
JDG 20:19 K'ekpebha ch'ewu ehobh mẹ, anọng p'Israẹl atza attima ibhingabe ọbaanga Gibea.
JDG 20:20 Wa anọng p'Israẹl atza arima anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin abẹ, bẹ atza abe atzik bẹ ka Gibea.
JDG 20:21 Wa anọng pa Bẹnjamin abina ka Gibea m'ewu nduma, atza afhu anọng p'Israẹl nnọhna arọbh afa obhiri chi, k'egbong-dam.
JDG 20:22 Yina, wa anọng p'Israẹl an-akhe ayok ẹfa, abira atza abe atzik kẹ da iwa bẹ arim egbong k'echedenwu.
JDG 20:23 Wa anọng p'Israẹl avura k'ikpokpobhabe atza abhom ayeri Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi maa, ẹchọhkha etto, Bẹ aben bi, “Mobiro ọ́tza orima anọng pa Bẹnjamin p'ade ayokh-obhon paman, abẹ o?” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhina bi, “Bọng nọhng atza arima bẹ abẹ.”
JDG 20:24 Mando kw'anọng p'Israẹl arọkhi abaanga ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin, ottong iwu ifa.
JDG 20:25 M'ogbe nwa, iwa ajinọng pa Bẹnjamin ayin ka Gibea akwu arima anọng p'Israẹl abẹ, bẹ afhu anọng p'Israẹl anọng nho nnọhna arọbh afa obhiri azen. Anọng pa bẹ afhu biphyir ade anọng p'am-atzima akkangkkaang arim egbong.
JDG 20:26 Mẹ wọ ofon, anọng p'Israẹl biphyir ọmaana arim-egbong biphyir avura achina ka Bẹtẹl, atza awobha ẹwọr kẹ abhom anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Bẹ atzim ọchattọhk m'ewu nduma maa, apyiri k'ẹchọhkha. Bẹ asi nnanga nkwọmisẹ ọmaana nnanga s'odidiri anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
JDG 20:27 Wa anọng p'Israẹl adọn Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi. (K'ogbe nwuma, wa Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ewobh mẹ,
JDG 20:28 Phinẹhas kw'ode nnwa kw'Eleaza, ọmaana nnwa kw'Aarọn kw'ijinọng bọ iwa ade atzọhmnọng mẹ). Wa bẹ abọbh bi, “Mobiro ọ́tza orima anọng pa Bẹnjamin p'ade ayokh-obhon paman, abẹ ra a?” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhina bi, “Bọng nọhng, kkeri ophyini ndọkha bẹ ọtzọkha nge bọng ka mbọhk.”
JDG 20:29 Mẹ wọ ofon, anọng p'Israẹl atza abe akhọri Gibea.
JDG 20:30 Wa anọng p'Israẹl avura atza arima ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin abẹ, ottong iwu ittaan. Bẹ atza abe atzik ka Gibea, mach'iwa bẹ akk'asa.
JDG 20:31 Wa anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin abina akwu arima anọng p'Israẹl abẹ, anọng p'Israẹl atzọr bẹ atzima abina k'odedenmon. Bẹ attẹwọr ammuma anọng p'Israẹl ekpo mach'iwa bẹ akk'am-asa maa, bẹ afhu ajinọng ẹrọbh obhiri jobh k'iwoni ọmaana k'akkadeden. Wa eden dani echin ka Bẹtẹl ndonggo echina ka Gibea.
JDG 20:32 Mada anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin am-aben bi, “Mokhema bẹ okhema mach'ira k'echeden e.” Anọng p'Israẹl am-aben bi, “Bọng motzor bẹ otzima obina k'odedenmon oyin k'ọkkadeden.”
JDG 20:33 Iwa ajinọng p'Israẹl biphyir abina k'obe f'ira bẹ abe, atza abe ka Baal-Tamar. Mando kw'anọng p'Israẹl abin k'obe fa bẹ achubh, arenga k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-edimi ka Gibea ayin ka.
JDG 20:34 Mando kw'adikkobh p'Israẹl p'akhaam ẹfa, anọng nnọhna ẹrọbh obhiri azen, akwu arima Gibea abẹ itzitzikha ttara itzitzikha. Wa erima nda ẹgaangi maa, anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin katzini bi, edimi chabẹ dọ em-ekwu mẹ.
JDG 20:35 Mando kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okhem anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin k'itzitzikha s'anọng p'Israẹl. Mẹ ewu nduma, anọng p'Israẹl afhu anọng pa Bẹnjamin nnọhna arọbh attaan obhiri nttaan obhiri jobh. Wa anọng pa bẹ afhu biphyir ade anọng p'am-atzima akkangkkaang arim egbong.
JDG 20:36 Wa anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin an-are bi, bẹ akk'bẹ akhema. Iwa ajinọng p'Israẹl akk'abina aji anọng pa Bẹnjamin, okhuri da iwa bẹ aphe nnam k'anọng p'achubh atzik kẹ ọbaanga Gibea.
JDG 20:37 Wa ajinọng p'achubh atzik abin m'ẹbhar-ẹbhar adim ka Gibea, bẹ anyaami atzima akkangkkaang afhu anọng k'ọdedenmọn makhọra.
JDG 20:38 Ode ch'iwa anọng p'Israẹl akk'mphaari asa ttara anọng p'achubh atzik bi, bẹ asi irorong k'odedenmon s'ivura ichina k'ẹrọng,
JDG 20:39 ifha anọng p'Israẹl abhakhi bẹ abẹ. Wa anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin akk'ẹwọr atta ammuma anọng p'Israẹl ekpo maa (bẹ afhu anọng ẹrọbh obhiri jobh), bẹ aben bi, “Mokhema bẹ mach'ira k'echeden e.”
JDG 20:40 K'ogbe kw'iwa irorong in-ittẹwọr ivura k'ẹrọng k'odedenmon, anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin an-abhakhi are irorong k'odedenmon makhọra s'im-ivura k'ẹrọng.
JDG 20:41 Mando kw'anọng p'Israẹl abhakhi anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin abẹ. Wa ojora anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin, okhuri da iwa bẹ atzini bi, itzama ikk'itta ikhebha bẹ.
JDG 20:42 Mẹ wọ ofon, anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin arọbh k'itzitzikha s'anọng p'Israẹl achina k'okhubha kw'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi, yina, bẹ kafha arọbh anaanga egbong. Mando kw'anọng p'Israẹl p'ayini k'ibhon, akhebh bẹ mẹ afhu.
JDG 20:43 Wa anọng p'Israẹl akhori anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin akhe k'ottem, bẹ akhubh bẹ, abira afha akhọhbha bẹ k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin ka Gibea.
JDG 20:44 Wa anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin nnọhna arọbh afa obhiri azen, ape. Wa anọng p'ape biphyir ade akkakkaama.
JDG 20:45 Mada ajinọng pa Bẹnjamin p'arikhi abhakhi nnam arọbh achina k'okhubha kw'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi k'itzakpa sa Rimọn, anọng p'Israẹl afhu ajinọng nnọhna jobh obhiri mfa obhiri arọbh jobh k'ọkadeden. Bẹ achina ororo akhubh anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin maa, bẹ apyiri ka Gidom, bẹ abira afhu anọng nnọhna nzen.
JDG 20:46 M'ewu nduma, ajinọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin, p'am-atzima akkangkkaang arima egbong, anọng nnọhna arọbh attaan obhiri mfa obhiri arọbh jobh, ape. Wa anọng biphyir p'ape ade akkakkaama.
JDG 20:47 Wa anọng ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh jobh abhakhi arọbh, achina k'ibe s'anọng an-arukhi k'itzakpa sa Rimọn, bẹ awobha mẹ k'aphe anna.
JDG 20:48 Mando kw'ajinọng p'Israẹl akpa nnam k'ẹkhọma ch'anọng pa Bẹnjamin, atza atzima ọkkaangkkaang afhu anọng k'ibhon biphyir ọmaana etzirakpo ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen fa bẹ are. Be akhe ibhon kpenamkpen sa bẹ are ekpon.
JDG 21:1 Iwa ajinọng p'Israẹl akk'echekhi asa ka Mizpa bi: “Man aminava paman kọtzọkha ọnang ojinọng manda wani kw'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin ọba.”
JDG 21:2 Wa anọng mba achina ka Bẹtẹl, bẹ atza awobha ẹwọr k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, am-abhom akpẹbh k'idọdọkhi maa, ewu ẹha.
JDG 21:3 Bẹ abhom aben bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl, odik-dema nwa osi yan otto k'Israẹl o? Ma, ẹkhọma dani chaman k'Israẹl ekk'edimi ka man k'ottem e!”
JDG 21:4 K'ekpebha ch'ewu ehobh mẹ, anọng mba asi ijafọhnibe rani sa bẹ awobh asi nnanga nkwọmisẹ ọmaana nnaanga s'odidiri.
JDG 21:5 Mẹ wọ ofon, bẹ aben bi, “Bọng ẹkhọma dọ k'ottem kwa ngọma s'Israẹl dọ eni man abẹ ẹtzọni, k'ogbe kw'ira motzobh k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ka Mizpa?” Ode cha bẹ akk'anwọhngi k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, achekhi bi, ọnọng manda wani kw'obhumi okwukwu, bẹ akhaambi afhẹ-ẹ.
JDG 21:6 Iwa anọng p'Israẹl akhaama nkkwosisi ttara Bẹnjamin kw'ode ọgbaanotte kwabẹ, aben bi, “Ẹkhọma dani k'ottem kwa ngọma s'Israẹl ekk'edimi mayina e.
JDG 21:7 Morenga yan oror panọng pa mọnang anọnọnga p'arikhi o, da mokk'ochekhi ka che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, man bẹ aminava paman kọnang bi, bẹ aba o?”
JDG 21:8 Mẹ wọ ofon, bẹ abọbh bi, “Bọng ẹkhọma dọ k'ottem kwa ngọma s'Israẹl dọ eni man abẹ ẹtzọni, k'ogbe kw'ira motzobh k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ka Mizpa?” Wa bẹ akwu aronga bi, ọnọng manda wani kw'ofon Jabẹsh-Gilead kw'ọtza ewobha nda kode.
JDG 21:9 Mada bẹ akk'anọng abhikha biphyir, bẹ akwu are bi ọnọng manda wani kw'ofon Jabẹsh-Gilead kode.
JDG 21:10 Mando kwa bẹ atzọhmi akkakkaama akkakka pabẹ, anọng nnọhna ẹrọbh obhiri jobh ka Jabẹsh-Gilead ttara ndọhna bi, bẹ afhu ọnọng kpenamkpen panọng ọmaana va.
JDG 21:11 Bẹ aben bi, “Ma wo ode odik kwa bọng asi, bọng fhu ajinọng biphyir ọmaana kwanọng kpenamkpen kw'okk'ojinọng oronga.”
JDG 21:12 Mada bẹ apyiri ka Jabẹsh-Gilead, bẹ are aminava ẹnọhna p'ani ajinọng atzim aronga, bẹ atzima bẹ achina k'ibhingabe ka Shilo k'ẹkhọma cha Kenaan.
JDG 21:13 Iwa anọng p'Israẹl atzọhm ẹkkaabha ch'ẹmẹm achena anọng p'arikhi k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin, p'iwa arukhi k'itzakpa sa Rimọn.
JDG 21:14 Mẹ wọ ofon, anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin akpa nnam abhana k'ihọhm sabẹ, bẹ atzọkha aminava mba ẹnọhna pa Jabẹsh-Gilead p'iwa bẹ an-afhu, anang ajinọng mba bẹ aba. Yina, wa aminava mba ajinọng mba biphyir kabeng.
JDG 21:15 Iwa anọng mba akhaama nkkwosisi ttara Bẹnjamin, okhuri da iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọphaangi nwa ohokha ka ngọma s'Israẹl.
JDG 21:16 Mẹ wọ ofon, adedennọng p'etzobha nda an-abọbh bi, “Mada bẹ akk'panọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin biphyir afha, morenga yan oror panọng pa mọnang ajinọng p'an-arikhi o?
JDG 21:17 Anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin akhaambi akhaama va pa atzera eho ch'anọng p'arikhi, ifha bẹ aningi ẹkhọma dani ch'Israẹl adimi.
JDG 21:18 Man bẹ aminava paman kọnang bẹ aba, okhuri ọnwọhngi kwa maman anọng p'Israẹl ọkk'ọtzọkha bi: ‘Ẹmma ẹbọkha ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'ọnangi ojinọng kw'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin kwanọng.’
JDG 21:19 Bọng kker e, ọdadaami kwa cho kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ka Shilo, kw'owobh k'ebira-ebira kwa Bẹtẹl, k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin k'eden ch'echin ka Bẹtẹl ọmaana Shẹkẹm, ttara k'ẹrakha-ẹrakha kwa Lẹbona.”
JDG 21:20 Iwa bẹ anang anọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin ndọhna, aben bi, “Bọng nọng atza achubha k'iwọni sa grep
JDG 21:21 atzik. Mada aminava pa Shilo ayin ka bi, bẹ akwu attara k'ọkhaana kw'otzubha, ọnọng-ọnọng oyin k'iwoni sa grep, okwu ọbọkha ominanwa wani kw'otzima osi kwanọng kwẹ. Bọng akpa nnam abhana k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin.
JDG 21:22 Idikha ab'otte ọmaana ab'ọgbaanotte pabẹ apọhr anang man, mọ́gbaak bẹ bi, ‘Bọng si man ọphyaam akkaana bẹ, okhuri da iwa mọni bẹ panọng ọnangi k'ogbe kw'egbong. Bọng oponga-pyibha kw'ọnwọhngi ọvọvọhkhi kàtzọkha, okhuri da iwa bọng ani bẹ aminava pabọng anangi.’ ”
JDG 21:23 Mando kw'iwa ajinọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin asi. Mada aminava mba am-atzubh ebin, ojinọng kpenamkpen ọbọkha ominanwa wani, otzima osi kwanọng kwẹ. Mando kwa bẹ akpa nnam abhana k'irerek s'ide ekkema chabẹ, bẹ akpa nnam ado ibhon sabẹ, bẹ aruk mẹ.
JDG 21:24 K'ogbe nwuma anọng p'Israẹl atte ibe nna ọbọhk abhana ka ngọma ọmaana ka nnọmma sabẹ, ọnong-ọnọng k'ekkema chẹ.
JDG 21:25 K'ogbe nwa, wa anọng p'Israẹl ọvaarnọng kakhaam, wa ọnọng kpenamkpen orukhi akpen k'odem kw'adaakh-ẹ.
RUT 1:1 K'ogbe kw'iwa asi-aponga adabhi Israẹl, wa okwo f'ideden owobh m'irerek nna. Ojinọng wani kw'ofon Bẹtẹlẹhẹm k'ẹkhọma cha Juda, obina ttara kwanọng kwẹ, ọmaana va pẹ p'ijinọng afa, bẹ atza aruk k'irerek sa Moab.
RUT 1:2 Ojinọng nwuma okpen Ẹlimẹlẹk, kwanọng kwẹ okpena Naomi, va pẹ p'ijinọng afa, akpena Malọn ọmaana Kiliyọn. Wa bẹ biphyir ade ammaana p'Ẹphrat p'arukhi k'obhon kwa Bẹtẹlẹhẹm k'ẹkhọma cha Juda. Wa bẹ achin k'irek sa Moab, atza aruk mẹ.
RUT 1:3 Ẹlimẹlẹk, kw'ode odim kwa Naomi okwu ope ọjẹ-ẹ va p'ijinọng afa.
RUT 1:4 Malọn ọmaana Kiliyọn akwu atzọkha aMoab-panọng p'akpen Ọpa ọmaana Rut, abẹ aruk mẹ, ọttọhk ka cho jobh,
RUT 1:5 matzẹmaa Malọn ọmaana Kiliyọn abira ape, Naomi odim ọmaana va, dọk kọkhaam.
RUT 1:6 K'ogbe kwa Naomi ọbhaang ka Moab bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'anọng pẹ ọda ttara ọchattọhk. Naomi ttara panọng pa va pẹ, ado for bi abhana.
RUT 1:7 Mando kwa Naomi obin orenga ttara panọng pa va pẹ afa, abẹ achina k'ẹkhọma cha Juda.
RUT 1:8 Mẹ wọ, Naomi on-oben panọng pa va pẹ bi, “Ọnọng-ọnọng ọrọhng k'ọkka k'ọhọhm. Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi ọphyaam ọnang bọng, macha bọng akk'asa ttara apfuranọng pabọng, ọmaana kaam.
RUT 1:9 Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang ọnọng-ọnọng ẹwọhng-kwokha k'ọhọhm kw'odim kwẹ ọbhakwẹ.” Mando wọ kwa Naomi ọbaakha bẹ, abẹ abhom ẹmọng k'ẹrọng,
RUT 1:10 aben-ẹ bi, “Mma e, maman ọ́tzọn-ọ abẹ otzor anọng pọ e.”
RUT 1:11 Mẹ wọ, Naomi oben panọng pa va pẹ bi, “Va paam, bọng kpa nnam e. Okhuri yan kwa bọng achibhi bi bọng atzọn-m abẹ o? Bọng achibhi bi na kaam mbiri ifha ndima ibhọr, sa mbiri mmaan ajinọng p'abira akwu ade adim pabọng o?
RUT 1:12 Va paam, bọng kpa nnam arọhng, okhuri bi, kaam nkk'ndama kpọng nyọhnga edimba. Kaambi ira nna mbiri mba odim k'erungiwu cha mayina, mmaan va p'ijinọng,
RUT 1:13 na bọng atzik maa bẹ abar o? Na bọng akpa for sabọng edimba o? Mma e, va paam, kwẹ ọmma kaam ọyọhnga bọng e, okhuri bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'nnam ọkpa ọbọr-m.”
RUT 1:14 Mẹ wọ, bẹ abira abhom amọng k'ẹrọng. Ọpa ọbaakha ọkka-maan-odim kwẹ, ọkpa nnam otzor anọng pẹ. Yina, Rut ochina ororo ọgbana bi, kẹ ọtzọn Naomi abẹ.
RUT 1:15 Mẹ wọ, Naomi oben Rut bi, “Kker e, oyokh-ọbhọbha okk'anọng pẹ, ọmaana akha pẹ otzora, kọ tzọn-ẹ abẹ arọhng e.”
RUT 1:16 Rut on-obhina Naomi bi, “Kaam dọk kàben bi ntte kọ ọbọhk, mkpa nnam. Ibe kpenamkpen s'achin, mẹ kwa kaam ńchina. Ibe kpenamkpen s'ayim, sẹ rọ sa kaam ńyima. Anọng pọ án-ade anọng paam, Ibinọkpaabyi kw'akpobh, kẹ wọ kwa kaam ḿkpobha.
RUT 1:17 Ibe s'ape, mẹ kwa kaam ḿpe, mẹ kwa bẹ ábira ánọhng-m. Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang-m ihem k'odem kpenamkpen kw'ọdaakh-ẹ, idikha oni obo kẹ-khẹ ode, ọ́bhaangi kaam ọmaana kọ.”
RUT 1:18 Mada Naomi ore bi, Rut ọkk'for ọda bi ọtzọn-ẹ abẹ, Naomi ọn-ọttẹ-ẹ ọbọhk.
RUT 1:19 Bẹ anọng afa arenga maa apyiri ka Bẹtẹlẹhẹm. Mada bẹ an-apyiri Bẹtẹlẹhẹm, obhon biphyir owuri ẹmọng. Panọng an-abọbh bi, “Manya Naomi wọ ma raa?”
RUT 1:20 Naomi obhina bi, “Bọng kaam Naomi dọk kàyeri, bọng na yer-m Mara, okhuri bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir ọkk'aam ọmmamma ọnanga k'akpen paam.
RUT 1:21 Wa mbin ma ttara ọhaabh, manya, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'aam otzima okhuna mbọhk-mbọhk. Ka yan kwa bọng abira ayer-m Naomi o? Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'aam ọmmamma ọnanga e; Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir okk'nnam ọkpa ọbọr-m e.”
RUT 1:22 Mẹ wọ, Naomi otzima Rut kw'ofon Moab, obiro ode kwanọng kwa nnwa kwẹ, ofona ka Moab akhuna ka Bẹtẹlẹhẹm, k'ittẹwọr s'ọphagbe kw'erezi-dem ch'ekpen, barli.
RUT 2:1 Iwa Naomi ọkhaam ochimmanọng wani, kw'ode ofonanọng kw'Ẹlimẹlẹk. Ojinọng nwa okpen Boaz, kẹ wa ode ọkkọkkaa kw'ọtza che.
RUT 2:2 Iwa Rut kw'ofon Moab, oben Naomi bi, “Tte nchina k'iwoni, ifha ndor anọng nnam ndungi abarli-mọma p'am-atto, ode na ńne ọnọng kw'osi ọphyaam ọnang-m o.” Naomi obhin-ẹ bi, “Nnwa kwaam, china ororo, si mach'abeni.”
RUT 2:3 Mẹ wọ, Rut ofona ochina k'owoni, ọttẹwọr om-odungi abarli-mọma otzor anọng p'asi ipha nnam. K'odem kw'idik im-ide, kẹ wa om-osi ọtzọhm k'owoni kwa Boaz, kw'ofon k'efonamma ch'Ẹlimẹlẹk.
RUT 2:4 Ogbe kobhiri, Boaz ofona ka Bẹtẹlẹhẹm opyiri, orima atzọhmnọng p'asi ipha bi, “Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obiro odo bọng!” Bẹ amọnga erima aben bi, “Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obiro odo kọ.”
RUT 2:5 Boaz ọbọbh okker-atzọhmnọng pẹ bi, “Ominanwa kw'anyi wọ kana?”
RUT 2:6 Okker-atzọhmnọng obhin-ẹ bi, “Kẹ ode ominanwa kw'ofon Moab kw'ọtzọni Naomi abẹ, ofona ka Moab okhuna.
RUT 2:7 Kẹ ophyem-m bi, nttẹ-ẹ ọbọhk otzor atzọhmnọng mba nnam odungi abarli-mọma. Mada ira ottẹttẹwọr ọtzọhm k'ekpebha mapyiri ma, okwok ọwọhng ibebaa.”
RUT 2:8 Mẹ wọ, Boaz oben Rut bi, “Nnwa kwaam, yong-m itzọhng. Kọ k'owoni ọdọdọk kàchina bi, atza asi ọtzọhm, owoni nwa ọbọhk kàbira atte. Kọ wobha ma ttara atzọhmnọng paam p'ipanọng.
RUT 2:9 Kkeri owoni kw'atzọhmnọng am-asi ipha, atzor atzọhmnọng p'ipanọng nnam. Nkk'ajinọng mba itzọhng ndọra bi, bẹ aning-ọ agbọri. Idikha asi adaakh-ọ, rọhng atza agwo ka nsijọ s'ajinọng mba akk'asi akhaabha akhe.”
RUT 2:10 Mẹ wọ, Rut ọrakha ottima itzitzikha k'irerek oben-ẹ bi, “Kaam nde okhekhennọng, oreng yan kw'asi ọphyaam-dema mva anang-m o?”
RUT 2:11 Boaz obhin-ẹ bi, “Bẹ akk'aam ejibha kpenamkpen agbaakha, ch'akk'asa anang ọkka-maan-odim kwọ e. Ttẹwọr mada iwa odim kwọ ope-ope, abina aji atte ttara akka, ọmaana anọng pọ, ọmaana obhon kwọ, akwu aruk ttara anọng p'iwa anarong.
RUT 2:12 Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ochor-ọ k'ọtzọhm f'akk'asa. Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'anọng p'Israẹl, kw'akk'arọbha akwu ajena, ọdọ-ọ ejibh-ejibha.”
RUT 2:13 Rut obhin-ẹ bi, “Itta kwaam, tte ọphyaam fọ ochina ororo obeng-m ekkema. Kọ akk'aam ottem-bara ananga, abira agbaakh-m attemdini-tzim, kaambi ode bi ebenga-mbọhk kinde ttara atzọhmnọng pọ p'ipanọng.”
RUT 2:14 K'ogbe kw'ọchattọhk, Boaz oben Rut bi, “Kwu tzọkha brẹd abọhnga k'atzuk mba achi.” Mada Rut okk'ẹwọr k'ottem kw'atzọhmnọng owobha, Boaz ọnang-ẹ abarli-bhaabha, ochi maa ọdọhbh, bẹ arik.
RUT 2:15 Mada obin bi otza osi ọtzọhm, Boaz oben atzọhmnọng pẹ bi, “Kaambi odungi k'ottem kw'akhe, bọng kẹ kàkkaam.
RUT 2:16 Bọng tza arọbha agwọk bani k'akhe anang-ẹ, bọng abira attẹ-ẹ ọbọhk odungi, bọng kẹ kàkkaam o.”
RUT 2:17 Rut osi ọtzọhm m'owoni nwa maa ẹchọhkha etto. Ọkhaani abarli-mọma p'okk'odungi maa bẹ an-arikh-orik afu ẹgbangbang-dim.
RUT 2:18 Otzini abarli-mọma mba otzima okhuna k'ẹttọhma. Rut ọkhọkha ọkka-maan-odim abarli-mọma haabha p'okk'odungi, obiro ọnang-ẹ ọchattọhk f'ira ochi orik.
RUT 2:19 Ọkka-maan-odim ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ maan wọ kw'ira ayini mayina? Maan kw'ira asi ọtzọhm o? Tte ẹdaa ewobha ẹnang ọnọng nwuma kw'ọkhọ-ọ otzum.” Mẹ wọ, Rut ọgbaak ọkka-maan-odim odik okhuri ọnọng kw'ira osi ọtzọhm k'ibe sẹ, oben bi “Ojinọng kwa nsi ọtzọhm ttara mayina, okpen Boaz.”
RUT 2:20 Mẹ wọ e, Naomi oben kwanọng kwa nnwa kwẹ bi, “Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi odo Boaz, kẹ kw'ochin ororo ọkhọkha ekpen-jibha chẹ ọnang anọng p'arukhi akpen, ọmaana p'akk'apa. Ojinọng nwa ode ochimmanọng kwaman, obiro ode ọkkaan-echimma kwaman.”
RUT 2:21 Mẹ wọ, Rut kw'ofon Moab oben bi, “Ayongi mẹ, ojinọng nwuma oben-m bi, kaam ndungi ndor atzọhmnọng pẹ nnam maa ipha iha.”
RUT 2:22 Naomi oben Rut kw'ode kwanọng kwa nnwa kwẹ bi, “Nnwa kwaam, ójibh-ojibh bi asi ọtzọhm ttara atzọhmnọng pẹ p'ipanọng, idikha achin k'owoni kw'ọnọng ọdọdọk bẹ ákkaam-ọ ọkkaam e.”
RUT 2:23 Iwa Rut osi ọtzọhm ọbaanga atzọhmnọng pa Boaz p'ipanọng, maa ipha s'abarli ọmaana erezi-dem ch'ekpen wit, iha. Ogbe nwa biphyir, wa Rut orukhi ttara ọkka-maan-odim kwẹ.
RUT 3:1 Iwa ewu dani Naomi, kw'ode ọkka-maan-odim kwa Rut, oben Rut bi, “Nnwa kwaam, ọbaan bi nnor odim nnang-ọ kw'ọfha okker-ọ e.
RUT 3:2 Boaz nwa kw'am-asi ọtzọhm ttara atzọhmnọng pẹ p'ipanọng, ode ochimmanọng kwaman. Ronga bi, erungiwu cha mayina ọ́khaani abarli-mọma k'ibe sa bẹ am-awobha agwuma abarli-mọma.
RUT 3:3 Rọhng atza agbobha asi, akpaan ana p'adaami eruk, affọra ẹnya chọ ọkkakka, yina achina k'ibe sa bẹ am-awobha agwuma abarli-mọma. Kàkhera bi ọrọ-ọ, matzẹmaa okyera ọchattọhk ochichi obiro ogwo atzuk.
RUT 3:4 Kẹ otzum k'eden ọkkakka, are ibe sa kẹ oyima. Okk'oyima, rọhng atza agwong-ẹ ibara ayim-ẹ ma mmokpatzọkhi. Kẹ ọ́gbaakh-ọ ọgbaak odem kw'asi.”
RUT 3:5 Rut obhin-ẹ bi, “Odik kpenamkpen kw'aben-m bi nsi, ńsi-osi mando.”
RUT 3:6 Mando kw'ofon ochina k'ibe sa bẹ am-awobha agwuma abarli-mọma, osi odik kpenamkpen otzor k'odem kw'ọkka-maan-odim kwẹ oben-ẹ.
RUT 3:7 K'ogbe kwa Boaz ọkk'ọttọhk ọcha biphyir, obiro ogwo atzuk, ettem ẹdaam-ẹ, otza oyima k'okhung kw'abarli-mọma mbuma ọttaabha. Rut ọbẹkhi bi bẹm okwu ogwonga ibara s'ibubh mmokpatzọkhi sa Boaz, oyima.
RUT 3:8 M'orungittem, Boaz ogbe k'ọda, on-okkon-ẹ da ore kwanọng kw'oyim-ẹ ka mmokpatzọkhi.
RUT 3:9 Ọbọbh bi, “Kọ anyi wọ?” Rut obhina bi, “Kaam Rut ọtzọhmnọng kwọ e. Mẹma ẹbaramma ch'ibara sọ, abubh-m, mada ode bi kọ wọ ade ọkkaan-echimma kwaman.”
RUT 3:10 Boaz oben bi, “Nnwa kwaam, tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọdọ-ọ. Ejibha nda ẹyọhng ch'ira achi eden asi. Kọ adikkobh, p'ojibh-ojibh obiro ode p'ogbor-ogbor, kakhubhi.
RUT 3:11 Mẹ wọ, nnwa kwaam, oning-ọ ojor. Kaam ńsi ọttọhk kpenamkpen osi f'abọbh-m nnang-ọ, okhuri bi, ayokh-obhon paam biphyir arong bi, kọ ade kwanọng kw'ojibhi ẹmmáanà.
RUT 3:12 K'odik ọkkakka, kaam nde ọkkaan-echimma e, yina, ọnọng ọdọdọk owobh kẹ kw'ode ọkkaan-echimma ọyọhnga kaam e.
RUT 3:13 Yima ma m'erungiwu nda, ewu ekk'ehobha, idikha okher bi obhek eho chọ, obiro ojibh. Oni for odo s'obhekh-ọ, odem nwa kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, kaam ḿmekh-ọ obhek. Yima ma maa ewu ehobha.”
RUT 3:14 Mẹ wọ, Rut oyima kẹ da ohokhi mmokpatzọkhi maa ewu ehobha, yina, obina yina ewu ẹn-ẹttaani ch'ọnọng otzini oyok. Boaz oben-ẹ bi, “Tte ọnọng manda wani oningi orong bi, kwanọng okwu oyima m'ibe sa bẹ am-agwuma abarli-mọma o.”
RUT 3:15 Obiro oben-ẹ bi, “Tzima ibara nnuma s'abubh mẹ kwu, mẹma sẹ.” Mada okk'mando ọsa, Boaz okpokhi abarli-mọma p'afu okhiriba ọzadani owon-ẹ m'ibara, otzini ọyẹ-ẹ. Ọkpa nnam ọbhana k'obhon.
RUT 3:16 Mada Rut opyiri k'ọhọhm, ọkka-maan-odim ọbọbh bi, “Nnwa kwaam, ira kwẹ ode yan kẹ?” Mẹ wọ, Rut ọgbaakh-ẹ odik kpenamkpen kwa Boaz ọkk'ọsa ọnang-ẹ,
RUT 3:17 obiro ọgbaakh-ẹ bi, “Ọnang-m okhiriba mva ọzadani f'abarli-mọma, oben-m bi, nningi nnam mkpa ndor ọkka-maan-odim kwaam ttara abọhk-kpakpa.”
RUT 3:18 Mẹ wọ e, Naomi oben bi, “Nnwa kwaam, wobha atzik maa are odem kwa kwẹ ode, okhuri bi, ojinọng nwa ọwọhng kókwokha, maa odik nwa ọkhaama okkoni mayina.”
RUT 4:1 Mẹ wọ, Boaz obina ochina k'ipha otza owobha ẹwọr kẹ. Mada ọkkaan-echimma kw'obeni ọkk'ọkwa, Boaz oben bi, “Ayi kwaam, kwuna kanya, akwu awobha ẹwọr.” Mẹ wọ, ọkkaan-echimma otza owobha ẹwọr.
RUT 4:2 Boaz oyeri adeden-nọng p'obhon anọng jobh, oben bi, “Bọng wobha ẹwọr manya.” Bẹ awobha ẹwọr.
RUT 4:3 Mẹ wọ, Boaz oben ọkkaan-echimma bi, “Naomi kw'ofon ka Moab okhuna obeni bi, on-okpe irerek s'ọgbaanotte kwaman, Ẹlimẹlẹk.
RUT 4:4 Kẹ kwa nchibhi bi nsi aronga, ifha adebh sẹ k'itzitzikha s'anọng p'awobh ma, ọmaana k'itzitzikha s'adeden-nọng p'anọng paam. Idikha ọdaakh-ọ bi abhek sẹ, kọ bhek, ọn-ọdaakhi, gbaakh-m, ifha nnonga. Ọnọng ọdọdọk kw'ọkhaam ẹfa bi, obhek sẹ kw'oyongi kọ kode, kaam wọ ndor-ọ nnam.” Ọkkaan-echimma obhina bi, “Kaam ḿmek sẹ obhek.”
RUT 4:5 Mẹ wọ e, Boaz oben bi, “Ewu ch'adebh irerek nnuma ka mbọhk sa Naomi, kọ abira abhek Rut kw'ode oMoab kwanọng kw'ode opopa kw'opfunọng, ifha ode mẹ, motzera che ch'ọnọng kwaman kw'ọkk'ọpa, ifha ẹkhakhaama chẹ eningi edimi.”
RUT 4:6 Mẹ wọ, ọkkaan-echimma oben bi, “Ode mando, kaam sẹ kimfha ḿmek na nkwu nge ẹkhakhaama chaam ka dama-dama. Kaam sẹ kiḿmek e.”
RUT 4:7 K'ogbe nwuma, wa ode ẹmmáanà ch'anọng p'Israẹl bi, yina aninga abhek ọttọhk, ọnọng wani ọkhaambi ọwọra ọkpaikkobho kwẹ ọnang oyok. Mando kw'iwa anọng p'Israẹl am-arenga abhek ekpo k'ayok.
RUT 4:8 Mẹ wọ, ọkkaan-echimma oben Boaz bi, “Kọ bhek sẹ ka for sọ.” Ọwọra ọkpaikkobho ọnang Boaz.
RUT 4:9 Mẹ wọ, Boaz ọgbaak adeden-nọng p'obhon bi, “Mayina, bọbọng ade awobha-re paam bi, kaam nkk'ẹkhakhaama ch'Ẹlimẹlẹk biphyir, ọmaana cha Kiliyọn ttara cha Malọn, mmekha ka mbọhk sa Naomi e.
RUT 4:10 Kaam nkk'Rut mmekha, kw'ofon Moab obiro ode opopa kwa Malọn, mbiri ndọkh-ẹ macha kwanọng kwaam, ifha ode mẹ motzera che ch'ọnọng kwaman kw'ọkk'ọpa, ttara ẹkhakhaama chẹ, ifha che chẹ eningi edimi k'ottem kw'echimma chẹ, ọmaana k'obhon kwẹ.” Mayina bọbọng ade awobha-re.
RUT 4:11 Mẹ wọ, adeden-nọng mbuma, ttara anọng mbongo p'awobh m'ipha, aben-ẹ bi, “Iya, maman mode awobha-re. Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi kwanọng nwa kw'ódim m'ọhọhm kwọ, ode macha Rachẹl ọmaana Lea p'abhun mbọhk asi efonamma ch'Israẹl ẹbar. Tte kọ akhaama ẹkhakhaama k'Ẹphrat, abira atza che ka Bẹtẹlẹhẹm.
RUT 4:12 Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orenga ma va pa kwanọng nwa ọ́mmaan, osi efonamma chọ ẹbar ekher cha Pẹrẹz kw'iwa Tamar ọmaani ọnang Juda.”
RUT 4:13 Mẹ wọ, Boaz ọtzọkha Rut ode kwanọng kwẹ. Wa bẹ atzọn ayima, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọsẹ-ẹ otzima ibhọr, ọmaan ojinọng.
RUT 4:14 Mẹ wọ, panọng aben Naomi bi, “Tte mọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ẹtzọhnga mayina, kw'ọkk'ọ ọkkaan-echimma ọnanga. Tte nnwa nwa ọtza che k'obhon kw'Israẹl makhọra.
RUT 4:15 Kẹ wọ óbhona akpen pọ, óbiro ókker-ọ k'atzam. Ọnyẹ kwa kọ adaakhi idik, kw'ojibhi ọyọhnga va p'ijinọng azenamfa, kẹ wọ ọmmaan-ẹ.”
RUT 4:16 Mẹ wọ, Naomi ọtzọkha nnwa nwa oji ka ndaak ọrọk.
RUT 4:17 Panọng p'arukhi mẹ aben bi, “Naomi okk'ojinọng ọkhaama e.” Abẹ akpẹ-ẹ Ọbẹd. Wa Ọbẹd okwu ode otte kwa Jẹsẹ. Jẹsẹ ode otte kwa Devid.
RUT 4:18 Mẹ wọ, ẹnọmma cha Pẹrẹz ede bi: iwa Pẹrẹz obhoni Hẹzrọn
RUT 4:19 Hẹzrọn obhon Ram, Ram obhon Aminadab,
RUT 4:20 Aminadab obhon Nashọn, Nashọn obhon Salmọn,
RUT 4:21 Salmọn obhon Boaz, Boaz obhon Ọbẹd,
RUT 4:22 Ọbẹd obhon Jẹsẹ, yina Jẹsẹ on-ode otte kwa Devid.
1SA 1:1 Iwa ọkhaam ojinọng kw'okpen Ẹlkana. Ofon Rama k'okhubha kwa Zuph, ka mgbegbeho s'Ephraim. Kẹ wa ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Jeroham. Jeroham wa ode nnwa kw'Elihu, Elihu ode nnwa kwa Tohu, kwa Zuph kw'ofon Ephraim obhoni.
1SA 1:2 Iwa Ẹlkana ọtzọk panọng afa p'akpen Hana ọmaana Pẹnina. Wa Pẹnina ọmaani va, yina, Hana nnwa kọmaani.
1SA 1:3 Wa cho kpenamkpen, Ẹlkana om-obina k'obhon kwẹ, ọtza okpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir ka Shilo, obiro osi ẹjafọhni ọnang-ẹ. Wa va p'ijinọng p'Ẹli p'ade Hophni, ọmaana Phinẹhas, bọ iwa ade afọhnẹja p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ka Shilo.
1SA 1:4 Ogbe obebeng kw'Ẹlkana otza osi ẹjafọhni, om-okkema nden ọtzọkha ọnang Pẹnina, ttara va pẹ biphyir, p'ijinọng ọmaana p'ipanọng.
1SA 1:5 Yina, wa ọm-ọnang Hana ekkema ch'ede igbe ifa ka ch'ọnangi oyok, okhuri idadaakha s'ọkhaam ọmaana Hana, ttara bi da iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oni Hana ọmmaan ọ̀nangi.
1SA 1:6 Iwa oyokh-ọbhọbha kwa Hana om-olukh-ẹ, okhuri da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oni Hana ọmmaan ọnangi, ifha ettem ẹyakh-ẹ atzim.
1SA 1:7 Iwa ilulukhi nna ichin ororo ka cho kpenamkpen. K'ogbe kpenamkpen kwa Hana ochin k'ọhọhm kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, oyokh-ọbhọbha om-olukh-ẹ maa, Hana om-obhom, obiro obhum ọchattọhk ochichi.
1SA 1:8 Ẹlkana kw'ode odim kwẹ, ọm-ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Hana, mbọng f'am-abhom o? Asi yan am-abhum ọchattọhk ochichi o? Nkwu-osisi sọ s'ettem nde yan o? Kaam mbar odik mach'ira va p'ijinọng jobh abar e.”
1SA 1:9 Iwa ewu dani ka Shilo, mada bẹ akk'ọchattọhk akyera ochichi, bẹ abira akyera atzuk ogwo-ogwo, Hana obina obobe. M'ogbe nwa, Ẹli kw'ode ọfọhnẹja owobh ẹwọr k'ogbera kw'om-owobha k'ẹkpọmmachi ch'ọhọhm kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 1:10 K'ọmmamma kw'owobh-ẹ k'ettem, Hana obhom, ozi njọhm ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 1:11 Ọn-ọtzọkha ọnwọhngi, oben bi, “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir, idikha kọ afha are ọmmamma kwa kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, abira ajim-m, ọtzọhmnọng kwọ karaam, anang-m nnwa kw'ijinọng, kaam ńdọkh-ẹ nnang-ọ k'akpen pẹ biphyir, ẹkpẹr manda dani ch'ephyuri isisa sẹ kéde.”
1SA 1:12 Wa mada Hana ochin ororo om-ozi njọhm ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, Ẹli om-okhẹ-ẹ otzum k'ẹmma.
1SA 1:13 Wa Hana om-ozi njọhm k'ettem ẹtzaanga, mmakpa sẹ mminyebh, yina, ọwọhng k'iyaan koyini. Mẹ wọ, Ẹli on-ochibhi bi, Hana ọkk'atzuk obuma.
1SA 1:14 On-oben-ẹ bi, “Ogbe obhir otzuma yan, kwa kọ awobha k'etzuk-buma o? Kwọbha ibubuma sọ.”
1SA 1:15 Mẹ wọ, Hana on-obhina bi, “Itta kwaam, kwẹ mando kode. Kaam nde kwanọng kw'owobh k'ọmmamma kw'ideden e. Kaam atzuk manda bani ndimi mmingwa, kaam mmimgbaak Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọmmamma kw'ettem chaam e.
1SA 1:16 Kọ, kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ mach'inọng-dama kàtzọkha. Kaam mminzi njọhm s'ifon k'iyayakhi-dik saam s'ideden, ttara ittem-dọkhiji-dik saam e.”
1SA 1:17 Mẹ wọ e, Ẹli obhin-ẹ bi, “Kọ rọhng k'odidiri. Tte Ibinọkpaabyi kw'anọng p'Israẹl akpobh, ọnang-ọ idik s'akk'ẹ aphyema.”
1SA 1:18 Hana obhin-ẹ bi, “Tte kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ndọkha ọphyaam ka kọ k'itzitzikha.” Mẹ wọ, on-okpira itzitzikha, obiro ofona ọtza ochi ọchattọhk.
1SA 1:19 K'ekpekpebha ch'ewu ehobh, bẹ abina atza akpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Mada bẹ akk'akyera, bẹ akpa nnam abhana ka Rama, kw'ode obhon kwabẹ. Iwa Ẹlkana oyima Hana abẹ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaanga njọhm sa Hana.
1SA 1:20 Okwu opyiri k'ogbe mẹ, Hana otzima ibhọr, ọmaan ojinọng, ọkpẹ-ẹ Samwẹl, oben bi, “Kaam mphyem-ẹ k'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.”
1SA 1:21 Mada Ẹlkana otzim ẹhọhmmọr chẹ biphyir ochina k'ọhọhm kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ifha otza osi ẹjafọhni cha cho, obiro otzuk ọnwọhngi kwẹ,
1SA 1:22 wa Hana bẹ abẹ kọ̀tzọni. On-oben odim bi, “Idikha nkk'nnwa ẹba ndima, kaam ńdọkh-ẹ nchena Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi k'ọhọhm kwẹ, kẹ óruk akpen pẹ mẹ biphyir, k'ogbe kpenamkpen.”
1SA 1:23 Mẹ wọ, Ẹlkana obhin-ẹ bi, “Si mach'abeni, kọ wobha ma matzẹmaa atzim-ẹ ẹba. Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okhinggẹ ohok echekhi ch'atzim pọ.” Mẹ wọ, kwanọng nwa owobha ọrọk nnwa kwẹ, maa otzim-ẹ ẹba.
1SA 1:24 Mada okk'nnwa ẹba otzima, ọtzọkh-ẹ da otzim ọkhar-ọkhara, ọmaana ọbhaamnwa kwa cho attaan, ọmaana ẹgbangbang-dim ch'abubuma, ttara otzuk-gbere otzima ochina k'ọhọhm kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ka Shilo.
1SA 1:25 Mada bẹ akk'ọbhaam-nwa nwa afha atzima asi ẹjafọhni, bẹ atzọkha nnwa nwa achena Ẹli.
1SA 1:26 Hana on-oben Ẹli bi, “O itta kwaam tzotzokhaan, da kọ achin ororo aruk akpen, kaam nchekhi k'akpen pọ bi, kaam wọ nde kwanọng kw'iwa mbe ma, mminzi njọhm nnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi e.
1SA 1:27 Wa kaam nzi njọhm mphyem Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi nnwa nwa, ma, okk'ephyema nduma chaam ọbhaanga e.
1SA 1:28 Mẹ wọ, kaam nna-ndọk nnwa nwa nnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi e. Kẹ ón-ode kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi k'akpen pẹ biphyir.” Mẹ wọ e, bẹ achunga mẹ anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ikpokpobha.
1SA 2:1 Mẹ wọ, Hana ozi njọhm oben bi, “Kaam ngaam ọdadaami kw'ideden k'ettem chaam k'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi; Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'aam ẹfa ch'ekhema ọnanga. Kaam nsi ẹmma nnang attattaanga-nọng paam, kaam ndaami ettem, okhuri ẹnaanga cha kọ akk'aam ananga.
1SA 2:2 “Ọnọng kode kw'owuri macha kọ Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi; ọnọng ọdọdọk kode kw'oyongi kọ Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi; Ẹtzakpa kede ch'ẹgaangi mach'Ibinọkpaabyi kwaman.
1SA 2:3 “Bọng ka mgbagbaakha kàge, Bọng ẹmma kàben, okhuri bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'eronga, kẹ wọ ọm-ọttọhna aponga p'osisi kw'anọng.
1SA 2:4 “Ayuk p'akkakkaama akk'aphyakhi, yina, anọng p'asar atto, akk'ẹfa abira akhaama.
1SA 2:5 Anọng mbuma p'iwa am-achi adọhbh, an-ayini ayok abẹ yina bẹ an-are ọchattọhk, yina, ayok mbuma p'iwa am-ayima okwo, an-achi ọchattọhk adọhbh. Kwanọng kw'iwa ọkpaan-ọkpaana, okk'va azenamfa ọn-ọmmaana, yina, oyok kw'iwa okk'va ọmmaana k'ọhaabh, manda wani dọk kọ̀khaam.
1SA 2:6 “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ otzim obo, obiro otzima akpen; kẹ wọ otzim apfura ochina k'opfura-bhon, obiro otzima bani ọkpa nnam.
1SA 2:7 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ọtzọhmi opyibhada, obiro ọtzọhm ojibhaada; kẹ wọ ọm-ọhakha anọng bani ewobha, obiro otzini ayok bani k'ẹrọng.
1SA 2:8 Kẹ wọ om-otzini agbogbora k'ọkpọm, obiro otzini anọng p'arukhi k'owora k'ẹraamma. Otzini bẹ ohok ẹwọr k'ibe s'avaar-vaara, obiro osi bẹ atzọkha mvaar-chi s'ikpokpobha. “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ọkhaam ittẹwọr s'ọyagbin; okk'ọyagbin otzini ọnana m'atza mba.
1SA 2:9 Kẹ wọ ọ́baabha orenga kw'anọng pẹ p'akhaam nnam-ophephe, yina, kẹ wọ ódimi anọng-dama k'ipyerungi. “Ẹfa arang ch'ọnọng om-otzima okhema erima,
1SA 2:10 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ódimi anọng p'arim-ẹ abẹ odimi. Kẹ owobha k'ẹrọng otto bẹ etzum, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ọ́kpaara aponga p'ọyagbin biphyir. “Kẹ ọ́nang ọvaarnọng kwẹ agbọhkhiji, ọnang kẹ nwuma kw'okk'ana obyengi k'eho ẹfa ch'ekhema.”
1SA 2:11 Mẹ wọ e, Ẹlkana obina ọbhana ka Rama. Yina, wa odikkobh nwa owobha k'irekh-irek kw'Ẹli kw'ode ọfọhnẹja, osi ọtzọhm k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 2:12 Iwa va p'Ẹli ade ajinọng-dukhi. Bẹ Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi mach'ọttọhk katzọk.
1SA 2:13 Wa ode ẹmmaana ch'afọhnẹja k'ottem kw'anọng p'Israẹl bi, k'ogbe kpenamkpen kw'ọnọng ọfọhni ẹja, mẹ da etzen cha bẹ atzim afọhni ẹja etzim ẹnọhn k'ekpon, ọtzọhmnọng kw'ọfọhnẹja okwu ttara ejum ch'ẹkhaam aha attaan,
1SA 2:14 okhum k'irọkha kpenamkpen sa bẹ awọhni etzen nda. Nden kpenamkpen s'ọfọhnẹja ohobhi k'irọkha, kẹ ọfọhnẹja ọtzọkha bi, sẹ nde sẹ. M'eden nda dọ ch'iwa bẹ am-asi anang anọng p'Israẹl biphyir, p'atza ka Shilo.
1SA 2:15 Yina bẹ awọhn iyaak s'etzen ch'ẹjafọhni, ọtzọhmnọng kw'ọfọhnẹja ọm-ọtza okheba ọnọng kw'osi ẹjafọhni oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ nang ọfọhnẹja nden nani ọbhaabh, kẹ kokhera bi ọtzọkha etzen ẹwọnachẹ, oyongi ekhekhebhi.”
1SA 2:16 Idikha ọnọng nwa kw'osi ẹjafọhni on-okher, on-oben-ẹ bi, “Tte bẹ abhabhaabh iyaak nnuma ọbhabh, ifha atzọkha ekkema ch'ẹdaakh-ọ.” Ọtzọhmnọng kw'ọfọhnẹja obhin-ẹ bi, “Mma, kọ nang-m chẹ madeden nwa, oni mando ode, kaam ńdọkha chẹ k'ẹfa.”
1SA 2:17 Wa osisi kw'adikkobh mba p'Ẹli ode ẹkhọngkwuri ch'ideden k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, okhuri da iwa bẹ am-atzọkha nnanga s'anọng anangi Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, atzima atta igbọrọ.
1SA 2:18 Wa Samwẹl kw'ode odikkobh ọfọr ẹphọd cha bẹ atzim ndik nyokhasẹ nkkakka asi, om-osi ọtzọhm k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 2:19 Cho kpenamkpen, Hana kw'ode ọkka om-okhum ọnọhma-baba ochena Samwẹl, k'ogbe kwa kẹ ọmaana odim am-atza asi ẹjafọhni cha cho.
1SA 2:20 Cho kpenamkpen, Ẹli om-odo Ẹlkana ttara kwanọng kwẹ, oben bi, “Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọdọ-ọ, ttara va adọdọk p'afona ma kwanọng nwa, p'atzọkha ewobha ch'oyok kw'ophyemi, obiro otzin-ẹ ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.” Mada bẹ akk'akyera, bẹ afona abhana.
1SA 2:21 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi ọphyaam ọnang Hana. Hana obiro ọmaan ajinọng attaan, ọmaana panọng afa. Yina, wa Samwẹl odikkobh nwa ọkk'ọbara ka cho k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 2:22 Wa Ẹli kw'ọkk'ọtzama kpọng, ọm-ọbhaang idik kpenamkpen sa va pẹ am-asi, anọng p'Israẹl biphyir, ọmaana odem kwa bẹ am-ayima panọng p'am-asi ọtzọhm k'ẹbaakhamma ch'ikhira s'etzobha abẹ.
1SA 2:23 Mẹ wọ, oben bẹ bi, “Kaam nkk'ẹmmaana-tzama chabọng mmaanga k'anọng mba biphyir. Bọng asi yan asi idik-dema nna?
1SA 2:24 Mma e, va paam, idik sa kaam mmaang okhuri bọng s'im-inyaami k'ottem kw'anọng p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kijibh e.
1SA 2:25 Idikha ọnọng ọkhaam ottotto k'itzitzikha s'oyokh-ọnọngẹya, Ibinọkpaabyi ofha okhukhi k'eho ch'ọnọng nwuma kw'ọkhaam ottotto. Yina, ọnọng on-osi ẹkhọngkwuri k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, anyi wọ on-okhukhi k'eho ch'ọnọng nwuma o?” Kaambi mẹ wọ, wa va mba ẹtzọhng-dọra ch'otte katzọk, okhuri da ode ochibhi kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, ọtzọkha akpen pa va mba.
1SA 2:26 Iwa Samwẹl ochin ororo ọbar ka cho, ọmaana k'ọphyaam f'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ttara anọngẹya.
1SA 2:27 Iwa ewu dani, ọsi-ẹjaakhi kw'Ibinọkpaabyi okhebh Ẹli, oben-ẹ bi, “Ma wọ ode odik kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obeni, ‘Kaam wọ iwa nsi ẹjaakhi cha for saam nnang ẹhọhmmọr ch'atte e, k'ogbe kw'iwa bẹ awobh k'Ijip, k'irekh-irek kwa Phero.
1SA 2:28 Kaam wa ndek atte ka nnọmma s'Israẹl bi, ode ọfọhnẹja kwaam, ifha om-obiro ochina k'ijafọhnibe saam, obir ọkwọmi insẹns, obiro ọfọra ẹphọd k'itzitzikha saam. Kaam wa ndọk ẹnanga ẹkwọmichẹ kpenamkpen ch'anọng p'Israẹl anangi, nnang ẹhọhmmọr ch'atte.
1SA 2:29 Bọng an-asi yan atzọkha njafọhni saam, ttara nnanga saam, sa ndek k'ọhọhm kwaam, abari mmo o? Kọ Ẹli, va pọ an-asi yan abar kọ odik ọtzam ọyọhnga kaam o, bi am-atte bẹ ọbọhk, bọng atzekha nden ọkkakka k'ẹjafọhni ch'anọng paam p'Israẹl o?’
1SA 2:30 “Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl, osi ẹjaakhi bi, ‘Kaam nchekhi bi, anọng p'ẹhọhmmọr chọ, ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr ch'atte kwọ am-asi ọtzọhm k'itzitzikha saam, maa ogbe ode.’ Yina, kaam Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi nna nsi ẹjaakhi bi, ‘Tzọmi-tzọmi okponga k'idachen, anọng mbuma p'anang-m ikpokpobha bọ pa kaam ńnang abarada, mbuma p'alukh-m, ńnang bẹ ẹmma.
1SA 2:31 Ogbe okwuma, kwa kaam ḿkpaara akpen p'anọng p'enọmma chọ, ttara ẹhọhmmọr cha kọ Ẹli. Ọnọng kw'obiro óruk ọtzam-ọtzam k'ẹnọmma chọ kóde.
1SA 2:32 Kọ are ọmmamma k'irukhabe saam. Kaambi bẹ atte ojibhada ọbọhk anang Israẹl, ọnọng kw'obiro oruk ọtzam-ọtzam k'efonamma chọ kóde.
1SA 2:33 Ọnọng kpenamkpen kwa kaam nni akpen pẹ mkpaar k'ijafọhnibe saam, óruk akpen pẹ k'obhoma, ttara nkwu-osisi k'ettem chẹ. Va pọ, ttara va pa va pọ biphyir, ápe k'edikkobh.
1SA 2:34 “ ‘Odik kw'otto okhebha va pọ p'ijinọng afa, Hophni ọmaana Phinẹhas, óde ẹkhọhkha ọnang-ọ. Bẹ anọng afa ápe k'ewu dani.
1SA 2:35 Kaam ńdekha ọfọhnẹja nnang for saam, kw'ọ́hakha eho ọnang-m, kw'obiro osi odik kpenamkpen otzor k'ochibhi kw'ettem chaam. Kaam ńttima ẹhọhmmọr chẹ bi gbuk, kẹ óbiro ósi ọtzọhm k'itzitzikha s'ọnọng kwa kaam nkk'ana mbengyi k'eho k'ogbe kpenamkpen.
1SA 2:36 Mẹ wọ, ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'ẹnọmma chọ, ọ́hakha eho ọnang-ẹ ka silva, ọmaana k'obiribiri kwa brẹd, ttara ekhukhi bi, “Tzotzokhaan, rọbha kaam nsi ọtzọhm f'ọfọhnẹja wani, ifha ngaama ọchattọhk fa nchi.” ’ ”
1SA 3:1 Iwa odikkobh Samwẹl om-osi ọtzọhm k'irekh-irek kw'Ẹli k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. K'ogbe nwuma, wa ọkhaar-ọkhaara bi ọnọng ọbhaanga atzim p'ẹjaakhi p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, idik s'anọng are ttara chen anna kibiri ihaabh.
1SA 3:2 Wa k'erungiwu dani, Ẹli kw'iwa oni iyaan bi kpaar dọk om-ore, oyim k'ibe s'om-okkekkeni oyima.
1SA 3:3 K'ogbe kw'otwikhikkaang kw'Ibinọkpaabyi on-otzima odimi, wa Samwẹl oyim k'iwuradabe s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kẹ da Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi ewobh.
1SA 3:4 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oyeri Samwẹl. Samwẹl okhera bi, “Itta, kkeri kaam ma e.”
1SA 3:5 Ọrọbh otzor Ẹli oben bi, “Kkeri kaam ma e; kọ wọ ayer-m.” Yina, Ẹli obhin-ẹ bi, “Kaam kọ kinyeri. Kpa nnam atza ayima.” Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl otza oyima.
1SA 3:6 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obiro oyer-ẹ, “Samwẹl.” Samwẹl obiro obina otzor Ẹli, oben bi, “Kkeri kaam ma e, kọ wọ ayer-m.” Ẹli obhin-ẹ bi, “Nnwa kwaam, kaam kọ kinyeri, kpa nnam atza ayima.”
1SA 3:7 Wa Samwẹl Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzim-om-oronga, bẹ ẹjaakhi ch'atzim p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi atzima-amasa anang kẹ Samwẹl.
1SA 3:8 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oyeri Samwẹl ottong igbe ittaan, obina otzor Ẹli oben bi, “Kkeri kaam ma e, kọ wọ ayer-m.” Mẹ wọ, Ẹli otzin bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ om-oyeri odikkobh nwa.
1SA 3:9 Mẹ wọ, Ẹli oben Samwẹl bi, “Kọ rọhng atza ayima. Idikha obiro oyer-ọ, ben bi, ‘Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, gbaak kkeri ọtzọhmnọng kwọ om-oyong itzọhng.’ ” Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl ofona otza oyima k'ibe sẹ.
1SA 3:10 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okwu obe mẹ, oyeri mach'ira om-oyeri, “Samwẹl! Samwẹl!” Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl obhina bi, “Gbaak, kkeri ọtzọhmnọng kwọ om-oyong itzọhng.”
1SA 3:11 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi on-oben Samwẹl bi, “Kker e, kaam nna nsi odik m'Israẹl, kw'ókkoni itzọhng kpenamkpen s'ibhaanga kwẹ.
1SA 3:12 M'ogbe nwuma, kaam ńttaanga nnang Ẹli, ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chẹ, k'odik kpenamkpen kwa nkk'mgbaakha, ttẹwọr k'ittẹwọr maa apyiri k'okpong.
1SA 3:13 Kaam ńsi macha nkk'ẹ mgbaakha bi, mkpaara aponga p'ẹhọhmmọr chẹ m'ogbe ode, k'ẹkhọngkwuri cha kẹ orong odik okhuri kẹ bi, va pẹ p'ijinọng am-asi epyibha anang-m, yina, kẹ bẹ eden kọ̀kpa a.
1SA 3:14 Mẹ wọ, kaam nchekhi nnang ẹhọhmmọr ch'Ẹli bi, ‘Ẹjafọhni kede, ẹnanga kebir ede ch'éfha egbobhi oponga-pyibha kw'ẹhọhmmọr ch'Ẹli.’ ”
1SA 3:15 Wa Samwẹl oyima maa ewu ehobha, obina okwunga amma p'ọhọhm kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Yina, wa ojora ọsẹ-ẹ bi, ọgbaak Ẹli odik kw'ore ka chen anna.
1SA 3:16 Yina, wa Ẹli oyer-ẹ, oben bi, “Nnwa kwaam, Samwẹl.” Samwẹl obhin-ẹ bi, “Kkeri kaam ma e.”
1SA 3:17 Ẹli ọbọbh bi, “Kẹ ọgbaakh-ọ yan o? Kọ kaam odik kadubha. Tte Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang-ọ ettuma ch'ẹbaan-ọ k'iden-dama, idikha adubh-m odik manda wani kwa kẹ ọgbaakh-ọ.”
1SA 3:18 Mẹ wọ e, Samwẹl ọgbaakh-ẹ odik kpenamkpen, kẹ manda wani kodubh. Mẹ wọ, Ẹli oben bi, “Kẹ wọ ode Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi e, tte osi odik kw'ojibh-ẹ abẹ.”
1SA 3:19 Mada Samwẹl ọm-ọbar, wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ttar-ẹ, obiro osi odik kpenamkpen kwa Samwẹl ọgbaakhi, ọkhaama ẹjaakhi.
1SA 3:20 Wa anọng p'Israẹl biphyir, ttẹwọr ka Dan maa atza apyiri Beershẹba, atzin k'odik ọkkakka bi, Samwẹl ode ọsi-ẹjaakhi kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 3:21 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ochina ororo om-osi ẹjaakhi cha for sẹ ka Shilo, ma Shilo wọ kw'osi ẹjaakhi cha for sẹ ọnang Samwẹl.
1SA 4:1 Iwa mgbagbaakha sa Samwẹl mpyiri Israẹl makhọra. M'ogbe nwa, anọng p'Israẹl abina bi, atza arima aPhilistiya abẹ. Wa anọng p'Israẹl abhingi k'Ẹbẹneza, aPhilistiya abhing k'Aphẹk.
1SA 4:2 APhilistiya atzọhm ẹkhaan ch'agbongnọng pabẹ bi, bẹ atza attema anọng p'Israẹl abẹ. Mada egbong ẹnyaami, wa aPhilistiya akhema anọng p'Israẹl, bẹ afhu anọng nnọhna jobh k'egbong-dam.
1SA 4:3 Mada agbong-nọng p'anaang egbong an-akhun k'ibhingabe, adenho p'Israẹl abọbh ayok bi, “Oreng yan kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otte aPhilistiya ọbọhk bẹ akhema man mayina o? Tte mọtza ọtzọkha Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ka Shilo, ifha ẹtzọn man abẹ, ebire ẹkkaana man ka mbọhk s'attattaanga-nọng paman.”
1SA 4:4 Mẹ wọ e, bẹ atzọhm anọng ka Shilo, atza atzọkha Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir, kw'owobh k'ottem kw'achẹrubim, atzima akwu. Wa va p'Ẹli afa p'ijinọng Hophni ọmaana Phinẹhas awobh mẹ, ttara Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 4:5 Mada Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi edimi k'ibhingabe, anọng p'Israẹl biphyir awuri ẹmọng, ch'enyengi irerek.
1SA 4:6 Mada aPhilistiya abhaang iyọkhi nna, bẹ abọbh bi, “Bọng ẹmọng cha bẹ am-awuri k'ibhingabe s'aHiburu mando o?” Mada bẹ arong bi Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ekk'epyiri k'ibhingabe s'abaHiburu,
1SA 4:7 wa ojora osi aPhilistiya. Bẹ aben bi, “Ọkha vani okk'opyiri k'ibhingabe e. Mọkk'ọdama e. Odik dema nwa otzim-ọm-ọtta o.
1SA 4:8 Kwaman ọkk'ọha ma! Anyi wọ ọ́rọbha man ka mbọhk s'akha mba p'akhaam ẹfa manda o? Akha mba bọ iwa asi yina itzama k'adem-k'adem, itto ikhebha anọng p'Ijip k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi e.
1SA 4:9 Bọng bar ettem, aPhilistiya! Bọng de ajinọng bi gbuk, oni mando ode, bọng án-abhakhi ade abira p'aHiburu, mach'iwa bẹ akk'ada anang bọng. Bọng de ajinọng bi gbuk, arima erima!”
1SA 4:10 Mẹ wọ e, aPhilistiya arima erima, bẹ akhema anọng p'Israẹl, p'arọbhi, ọnọng-ọnọng otza ochubha k'ikhira sẹ. Wa ẹnọng-fha ẹbari maa, agbong-nọng p'areng k'irerek anọng nnọhna arọbh attaan obhiri chi, adimi anọng p'Israẹl.
1SA 4:11 Wa aPhilistiya abọkha anọng p'Israẹl Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi ana. Va p'Ẹli afa p'ijinọng, Hophni ọmaana Phinẹhas abira ape.
1SA 4:12 M'ewu nduma dani, ọnọng wani kw'efona cha Bẹnjamin ofona k'egbong-dam ochina ka Shilo, ttara ọbara fa for ọkk'ọjaakhi, k'eho, ọkpọhm obiro obubh-ẹ.
1SA 4:13 Mada okwu opyiri, ore Ẹli kw'owobh ẹwọr k'ogbera kwẹ, om-okkeri k'eden da ojora ọsẹ-ẹ okhuri ẹkkọbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi. Mada ojinọng nwa odimi k'obhon, obiro ọgbaak anọng odik kw'ọkk'ọtta, anọng biphyir k'obhon abhom ẹmọng k'ẹrọng.
1SA 4:14 Ẹli ọbhaang ẹmọng nduma, ọn-ọbọbh bi, “Iyọkhi nnuma iyini yan o?” Ojinọng nwa otzini mmo otzor Ẹli,
1SA 4:15 kw'on-ode cho arọbh anna obhiri chi obhiri attaan, kw'on-obiro ọkpa chen mebubuni.
1SA 4:16 Ojinọng nwa ọgbaak Ẹli bi, “Yina kwa kaam mfon k'egbong-dam ma e. Kaam nnọbhi kẹ mayina nwa e.” Ẹli ọn-ọbọbh bi, “Nnwa kwaam, bọng odik wọ otto o?”
1SA 4:17 Ojinọng nwa kw'otzim ẹkkaabha nda okwu, obhina bi, “Anọng p'Israẹl arọbhi k'itzitzikha s'aPhilistiya, anọng akk'man abira apa k'ọhaabh. Va pọ afa p'ijinọng, Hophni ttara Phinẹhas akk'abira apa. APhilistiya akk'Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi abir abọkha atzima afona.”
1SA 4:18 Mada ojinọng nwa ọgbaakhi odik opyi ẹmma k'Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi, Ẹli obikhi k'ogbera kw'owobh ẹwọr k'ẹbhabhaanga ch'ẹbaakhamma, otto nnam-annam, ọphyakhi ekhokhora, ope, da ọkk'ọtzama, obiro ọdọhbh-ọdọhbh ọttara. Wa kẹ okk'Israẹl ọdabha, ka cho arọbh afa.
1SA 4:19 Wa kwanọng kwa nnwa kwẹ, Phinẹhas otzim ibhọr s'on-okkekkeni ọmaan. Mada kwanọng nwa ọbhaang bi, bẹ akk'Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi abọkha atzima afona, ọmaana bi otte kw'odim, ttara odim kwẹ akk'apa, ọmaan ọsẹ-ẹ k'ẹfa, ọmaan. Yina, wa ọmaan ọnẹ-ẹ ẹfa.
1SA 4:20 Mada ọm-ọtzọr ebodik, panọng p'akker-ẹ ọmaan aben-ẹ bi, “Tte ojora oning-ọ osi, kkeri akk'ojinọng amaana.” Yina, bẹ ẹmọng kosi, bẹ itzọhng kobiro oyonga.
1SA 4:21 Wa okpe nnwa nwa Ikabọd, oben bi, “Abarada p'Israẹl akk'adimi” okhuri Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi cha bẹ abọk atzima afona, ọmaana obo kw'otte kw'odim, ttara odim kwẹ.
1SA 4:22 Oben bi, “Abarada p'Israẹl akk'adimi, okhuri bi bẹ akk'Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi abọkha atzima afona.”
1SA 5:1 Mada aPhilistiya akk'Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi abọkha atzima afona, bẹ atzọkha chẹ k'Ẹbẹneza, atzima achina k'Ashdọd.
1SA 5:2 Wa bẹ atzini chẹ atza ahok k'ọkhapa kwa bẹ ahokhi ọkha f'okpen Dagọn, bẹ ahok Ẹkkọhbhi nda, ẹbaanga ọgbatza kwa Dagọn.
1SA 5:3 Mada anọng p'Ashdọd an-aphyọbh k'ekpekpebha, bẹ an-are bi, Dagọn ọkk'ọtta okhubha itzitzikha k'irerek, m'itzitzikha s'Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, bẹ atzini Dagọn ahok k'ibe sẹ.
1SA 5:4 Yina, mada ewu ehobh, bẹ aphyọbha atza are bi, Dagọn okk'obiro ọtta okhubha itzitzikha k'irerek m'ibhokhi, k'itzitzikha s'Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, eho ẹkk'ẹkpaara, mbọhk nkk'mbiri mphyakhi, nyima m'ereremachi ch'ẹhọhmma, ọkkafor kẹ-khẹ on-omunga.
1SA 5:5 Kẹ wọ osi maa apyiri k'ewu cha mayina, k'obhon kw'Ashdọd, ode afọhnẹja pa Dagọn o, obiro ode anọng adọdọkh o, ọnọng kw'odimi k'ọkhapa kwa Dagọn kw'ọbari ereremachi ch'ẹhọhmma kode.
1SA 5:6 Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang anọng p'Ashdọd, ọmmamma kw'ideden, obiro ọnang bẹ ettuma, osi ikhọmanna s'abirakpo imma anọng p'Ashdọd.
1SA 5:7 Mada anọng p'Ashdọd are idik s'itto ikhebha bẹ, bẹ aben bi, “Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'ọkha f'Israẹl, kẹkhaambi ewobha ma ttara man, okhuri bi, chẹ ekk'maman, ọmaana Dagọn kw'ode ọkha faman ọmmamma ẹnanga.”
1SA 5:8 Mẹ wọ, bẹ ayeri adabhi p'ẹkhọma cha Philistiya biphyir atzobha, abọbh bẹ bi, “Mosi yan ọmaana Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'ọkha f'anọng p'Israẹl o?” Wa bẹ abhina bi, “Bọng dini Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'ọkha f'Israẹl atzima achina k'obhon kwa Gat.” Mẹ wọ e, bẹ atzini chẹ atzima achina ka Gat.
1SA 5:9 Yina, mada bẹ akk'chẹ atzini, ettem ebhem Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, okhe anọng p'obhon nwuma k'opoma f'ideden. Osi ọkhọhmmana f'abirakpo ọmma vava, ọmaana adeden-nọng.
1SA 5:10 Mẹ wọ, bẹ atzima Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi achina k'Ẹkrọn. Mada bẹ akk'Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi atzima achina k'Ẹkrọn, anọng p'Ẹkrọn abhom k'ẹrọng aben bi, “Bẹ akk'Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'ọkha f'Israẹl atzima akwu ka bi, chẹ ekwu efhu man, ọmaana anọng paman e.”
1SA 5:11 Wa bẹ ayeri adabhi pa Philistiya biphyir aben bẹ bi, “Tte Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'ọkha f'anọng p'Israẹl ebina ka man k'obhon, ẹkpa nnam k'obhon kw'anọng p'akhaam chẹ e, ifha eningi man, ọmaana anọng paman efhu e.” Da ojora f'obo ọkk'ọnyaami k'ebhonmọr biphyir. Wa Ibinọkpaabyi ọnangi anọng mba ọmmamma kw'ideden.
1SA 5:12 Anọng p'iwa ani ope-ope ape, an-abira awobha k'ọkhọkhọhmi kw'abirakpo, ebhonmọr biphyir en-ewobha k'obhoma kw'ogori maa opyiri k'ẹrọng.
1SA 6:1 Mada Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ẹkk'aphe azenamfa ewobha k'okhubha kw'abaPhilistiya,
1SA 6:2 aPhilistiya ayeri afọhnẹja, ọmaana abọhnga-nọng pabẹ, abọbh bi, “Mbọng vọ fa mosi ọmaana Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi o? Bọng gbaak man eden cha morenga ọtzọhm chẹ ẹkpa nnam kẹ da efon.”
1SA 6:3 Bẹ abhina bi, “Bọng Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'ọkha f'Israẹl mbọhk-mbọhk kàtzọhm ẹkpa nnam o, k'eden kpenamkpen, bọng dọhm chẹ, ttara ẹnanga ch'oponga-phyibha kwa bọng arim anọng p'Israẹl abẹ. Mẹ wọ, bọng án-abina k'ikhọmmana, bọng abira áronga odik kw'osi yina om-ochina ororo ọnang bọng ettuma.”
1SA 6:4 Anọng pa Philistiya an-abọbh bi, “Bọng ẹnanga-dem ch'oponga-pyibha cha mọfha otzima ochen-ẹ o?” Bẹ abhina bi, “Abirakpo azen pa gol, akhetze azen pa gol, atzor k'obhik kw'adabhi pa Philistiya, okhuri bi, itzama nna rani rọ itto ikhebha bọng, ttara adabhi pabọng.
1SA 6:5 Bọng si akheri p'abirakpo, ọmaana akheri p'akhetze p'am-akhibhi irerek nna, bọng abira anang ọkha f'Israẹl ikpokpobha. Asimẹ, fẹ ótte bọng ọbọhk otte, ọmaana akha pabọng, ttara irerek sabọng.
1SA 6:6 Okhuri yan kwa bọng abari nttem mach'iwa Phero ọmaana anọng p'Ijip, abar o? Mada iwa Ibinọkpaabyi ọnangi bẹ ihem s'ideden, wa bẹ anọng p'Israẹl kàbeni bẹ abina orenga kwabẹ o?
1SA 6:7 “Mẹ wọ, bọng ogbe kàkhibhi, bọng do ọkpaar ọbhakwẹ kwa nden mmindọr, ttara abhaam afa p'atzima arọkhi va ọrọk, pa bẹ ani ọyak atzim am-akha. Bọng kẹ abhaam mba afa k'ọkpaar kwa nden mmindọr, yina kọ tzima va p'abhaam mba akpa nnam k'ikwuri sabẹ.
1SA 6:8 Mẹ wọ, tzini Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi anana k'ọkpaar nwa, abira atzokha ekpo pya gol py'atzọhm mach'ẹnanga ch'oponga-pyibha achen-ẹ, akhe k'Ẹkkọhbhi ahok chẹ abaanga Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Bọng atzọhm chẹ efona,
1SA 6:9 yina, bọng kẹ chẹ otzum. Idikha evur echina kẹ da efon, k'okhubha kwa Bẹt-Shẹmẹsh, mẹ wọ oyini bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'anọng p'Israẹl, wọ ọtzọhmi itzama-deden nna ochena man. Yina, idikha eni k'okhubha nwa echin, móronga bi, ọbọhk kwẹ mẹ kode, kw'oyini bi, kwẹ okwu bi ode mando.
1SA 6:10 Mẹ wọ e, ajinọng mba asi mando. Wa bẹ atzọkha abhaam afa agbana k'ọkpaar nwa, abira atzọkha va p'abhaam mba agbak k'ikwuri.
1SA 6:11 Bẹ ayikha Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi k'ọkpaar nwa, ọmaana ẹkkọhbhi cha bẹ akhe akhetze pa gol, ttara adem p'abirakpo.
1SA 6:12 Mẹ wọ, abhaam mba arenga bi gbeng atzor k'eden ch'echin ka Bẹt-Shẹmẹsh, bẹ am-amẹmma k'eden, bẹ kàtten achina k'odimbọhk, bẹ kabira attena achina ka kwabọhk. Wa adabhi pa Philistiya atzọn bẹ abẹ maa apyiri k'enem cha Bẹt-Shẹmẹsh.
1SA 6:13 M'ogbe nwa wa anọng pa Bẹt-Shẹmẹsh am-asi ipha s'awit k'ẹttẹri. Mada bẹ atzini chen akkeri k'ororo, bẹ are Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ettem ẹdaam bẹ k'ọttọhk fa bẹ are.
1SA 6:14 Mada ọkpaar nwa okwu opyiri k'owoni kwa Joshua kw'ofon Bẹt-Shẹmẹsh, ophikha mẹ ọbaanga itzakpa s'ideden. Anọng mba akpọk ọkpaar nwa atzima akhọma ekpon, bẹ abira atzọkha abhaam mba atzima asi ẹjafọhni ẹkwọmichẹ anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 6:15 AbaLẹvi atzini Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọmaana ẹkkọhbhi ch'ekpo pya gol eyik, atzọkha anana m'itzakpa nna s'ideden. M'ewu nduma, anọng pa Bẹt-Shẹmẹsh asi nnanga nkwọmisẹ, abira asi njafọhni, anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 6:16 Mẹ ewu nduma dani, adabhi mba azen p'ibhon sa Philistiya are idik nna biphyir, yina bẹ an-afon abhana k'Ẹkrọn.
1SA 6:17 Ma wọ ode abirakpo pa gol p'iwa aPhilistiya atzọhmi anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi mach'ẹnanga ch'oponga-pyibha. Wa obhon kpenamkpen kw'ode Ashdọd, ọmaana Gaza, ọmaana Ashkẹlọn, ọmaana Gat, ttara Ẹkrọn otzim ẹnanga chẹ.
1SA 6:18 Wa obhik kw'akhetze mba pa gol otzori k'obhik kw'adabhi mba azen, p'idibhon s'aPhilistiya s'igaang-ọgaangi, ttara abhobhona pabẹ p'an-agaangi. Itzakpa nna s'ideden s'iwa bẹ anan Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, itzimi iwobh k'owoni kwa Joshua kw'ofon Bẹt-Shẹmẹsh, mach'owobhore kw'odik kw'iwa otto mẹ, maa apyiri ma.
1SA 6:19 Yina, Ibinọkpaabyi osi ajinọng pa Bẹt-Shẹmẹsh anọng arọbh attaan obhiri jobh ape, okhuri da iwa bẹ akkeri k'ẹtzaanga kw'Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Wa anọng mba awobha ka nkwu-osisi, okhuri ettuma ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'bẹ ọnanga.
1SA 6:20 Mẹ wọ e, anọng pa Bẹt-Shẹmẹsh an-abọbh bi, “Anyi wọ ofha obe Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi k'itzitzikha, Ibinọkpaabyi nwa kw'awurada o? Anyi wọ kw'am-ofha ochena Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekh o?”
1SA 6:21 Mẹ wọ, wa bẹ atzọhm anọng ka Kiriyat-Jẹrim, aben bi, “Anọng pa Philistiya akk'Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi arikha e. Bọng hakha akwu atzima chẹ avura ka bọng k'ibe e.”
1SA 7:1 Mẹ wọ, ajinọng pa Kiriyat-Jẹrim atza atzọkha Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, atzima avura achina k'egbegbeho kẹ da ọhọhm kw'Abinadab owobh. Wa bẹ atzekha Ẹleyaza kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kw'Abinadab, bẹ anan-ẹ ọbọhk k'eho bi, okkeri Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 7:2 Wa Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ewobh ka Kiriyat-Jẹrim k'ogbe, kw'obhir-obhir. Biphyir-phyir wa ewobh cho ẹrọbh. Wa anọng p'Israẹl biphyir an-awobha ka nkwu-osisi, bẹ aror Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 7:3 Wa Samwẹl oben anọng p'Israẹl biphyir bi, “Idikha bọng abeni bi akpa nnam atzor Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ttara nttem sabọng biphyir, bọng nọbha for sabọng k'akha p'idibhon idọdọk, ọmaana k'agbatza p'Ashtọrẹt, bọng abira atte for sabọng ọbọhk anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, abira akpobha kẹ-khẹ. Kẹ ọ́kkaana bọng ọ́kkaana k'ihem s'anọng pa Philistiya am-anang bọng.”
1SA 7:4 Mẹ wọ e, anọng p'Israẹl atte akha pa Baal ọmaana agbatza p'Ashtọrẹt ọbọhk, an-akpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kẹ-khẹ.
1SA 7:5 Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl oben bi, “Bọng dobha anọng p'Israẹl biphyir ka Mizpa, kaam ńzi njọhm nnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ka nho sabọng.”
1SA 7:6 Mada bẹ akk'atzobha ka Mizpa, bẹ atzọr asi abyengi m'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Mẹ ewu nduma bẹ atzim ọchattọhk, bẹ abira ajaakhi itzama sabẹ aben bi, “Maman okk'ẹkhọngkwuri ọsa ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.” Wa Samwẹl ode ọttọhn-aponga kw'anọng p'Israẹl ka Mizpa.
1SA 7:7 Mada aPhilistiya abhaang bi, anọng p'Israẹl akk'atzobha ka Mizpa, adabhi pa Philistiya adabh egbong bi, bẹ atza arima bẹ abẹ. Mada anọng p'Israẹl abhaang odik nwa, ojora bẹ, okhuri aPhilistiya.
1SA 7:8 Wa anọng p'Israẹl an-aben Samwẹl bi, “Kọ njọhm kàkwọhbha ozizi anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwaman ka nho saman, ifha kẹ ọkkaana ọrọbha man ka mbọhk s'aPhilistiya.”
1SA 7:9 Mẹ wọ e, wa Samwẹl ọtzọkha orukhimaan-nwa kw'ọtzima ọjaabh ẹba, ọtzọkh-ẹ biphyir ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi mach'ẹnanga ẹkwọmichẹ. Wa ozi njọhm ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ka nho s'anọng p'Israẹl, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaang-ẹ.
1SA 7:10 Mada Samwẹl om-ọfọhni ẹja nda ch'ẹnanga ẹkwọmichẹ, aPhilistiya arenga amyi anọng p'Israẹl ifha bẹ arima egbong ttara bẹ. Yina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhm ẹbhaangkpon etto-etzum m'ewu nduma, ọttaanga ọnang aPhilistiya, on-okhe bẹ k'opoma maa, bẹ arọbh k'itzitzikha s'anọng p'Israẹl afona.
1SA 7:11 Mẹ wọ e, anọng p'Israẹl arọbh ayin ka Mizpa, bẹ akhubh aPhilistiya, abira afhu bẹ k'ọkkadeden, maa bẹ apyiri k'irekh-irek kwa Bẹt-Kar.
1SA 7:12 Wa Samwẹl ọtzini ọtza ofhu ebebe, k'ottem kwa Mizpa ọmaana Shen. Oyeri ọtza nwa Ẹbẹneza, oben bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'man ọkkaana, ma apyiri ma.”
1SA 7:13 Mẹ wọ e, wa anọng p'Israẹl akhema aPhilistiya. Wa abaPhilistiya k'ẹkhọma ch'Israẹl dọk kamanwa. K'akpen pa Samwẹl biphyir, wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọttaang ọnang aPhilistiya.
1SA 7:14 Ibhon s'iwa aPhilistiya akk'atzọkha ttẹwọr k'Ẹkrọn maa apyiri Gat, anọng p'Israẹl abira akpa nnam atzọkha sẹ biphyir. Anọng p'Israẹl abira akkaana ayokh-ẹbaanga pabẹ, ka mbọhk s'aPhilistiya. Wa anọng p'Israẹl, ttara anọng p'Amọr an-aruk k'odidiri.
1SA 7:15 Wa Samwẹl ọdabhi Israẹl k'akpen pẹ biphyir.
1SA 7:16 Cho kpenamkpen, om-orenga k'ibhon k'ibhon, ttẹwọr ka Bẹtẹl, akwu apyiri ka Gilgal, maa atza apyiri Mizpa, ọm-ọttọhna aponga p'anọng p'Israẹl m'obe mvuma biphyir.
1SA 7:17 Yina, wa om-okhuna ka Rama, kẹ da osi oruk kwẹ, om-obiro ọttọhna aponga p'anọng p'Israẹl mẹ. Mẹ kw'iwa obiro osi ijafọhnibe ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 8:1 Mada Samwẹl ọkk'ọtzama, ọrọbha va pẹ p'ijinọng bi bẹ ade akpaar-aponga p'Israẹl.
1SA 8:2 Ocheden-nwa kwẹ wa okpen Joẹl, ottong afa okpena Abija, wa bẹ ade akpaar-aponga ka Beershẹba.
1SA 8:3 Yina, wa va mba pẹ, kẹ ka ndọkhi katzori. Wa bẹ asi afhọra, bẹ am-abira achi ngwu, atzima abhakhi aponga ewobha.
1SA 8:4 Mẹ wọ, adeden-nọng p'Israẹl biphyir ayeri ayok bẹ atzobha, bẹ afona atza akhebha Samwẹl ka Rama.
1SA 8:5 Bẹ aben-ẹ bi, “Kọ akk'atzama, yina, va pọ p'ijinọng, kọ ka ndọkhi katzori. Mẹ wọ, nang man ọvaarnọng kw'ọ́dabh man, mach'idibhon idọdọk biphyir ikhaam.”
1SA 8:6 Yina, mada bẹ abeni bi, “Kọ nang man ọvaarnọng kw'ọttọhna aponga paman.” Wa odik nwa obhem Samwẹl ettem. Mẹ wọ, ozi njọhm ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 8:7 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Samwẹl bi, “Yonga itzọhng anang anọng mba k'odik kpenamkpen kwa bẹ am-agbaak anang-ọ. Kọ rang kwa bẹ abhumi e, bẹ abhumi kaam mach'ọvaarnọng kwabẹ e.
1SA 8:8 Ttẹwọr kẹ da ndim bẹ mbina k'Ijip, ma apyiri ma, bẹ am-akpa nnam abọr-m, bẹ am-abira akpobha akha, mando kwa bẹ am-asọ-ọ mẹ e.
1SA 8:9 Kọ yonga itzọhng anang bẹ, yina, tzọr bẹ itzọhng. Tte bẹ aronga odik dema kw'ọvaarnọng kw'ọ́daabh bẹ ósi bẹ o.”
1SA 8:10 Wa Samwẹl ọtzọkha idik nna biphyir s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọgbaakhi, ọgbaak anọng mba p'am-aror ọvaarnọng abọbh-ẹ.
1SA 8:11 Oben bẹ bi, “Ma wọ ode odik kw'ọvaarnọng kw'ọ́dabh bọng ósi, kẹ ọ́tzọkha va pabọng p'ijinọng, bẹ an-ade anọng p'abaabh-ẹ p'áyaar akpaar pẹ pa nnyanyaang mmindọr, ọmaana ayari-nnyanyaang. Bẹ án-arọbh k'itzitzikha s'akpaar mba.
1SA 8:12 Ósi ayok bani adenho p'agbong-nọng nnọhna nnọhna, bani adenho p'agbong-nọng arọbh afa obhiri jobh. Ótzekha ayok bani bẹ ade anọng p'áyaabha ekpo pyẹ, bẹ abira asi ipha sẹ. Ayongi mẹ, kẹ ótzekha ayok bani bẹ ade atzetzekha p'am-aduk egbongkpo, ọmaana ẹtzọhmkpo py'akpaar pẹ.
1SA 8:13 Kẹ ọ́tzọkha va pabọng p'ipanọng, ifha bẹ am-asi ana p'adaami eruk anang-ẹ, abira awọhn ọchattọhk, abira asi brẹd pẹ.
1SA 8:14 Kẹ ọ́bọkha bọng iwoni ọkkakka sabọng ọna, ọmaana iwoni sa grep ttara s'oliv, ọ́tzọkha ọnang akhaan-nọng pẹ akkeri.
1SA 8:15 Kẹ ọ́tzọkha okhung wani k'akhung jobh p'abọkpa pabọng, ọmaana ka grep pabọng, ọ́tzọkha ọnang akhaan-nọng pẹ, ttara atzọhmnọng pẹ.
1SA 8:16 Kẹ ọ́tzọkha atzọhmnọng pabọng p'ijinọng, ọmaana p'ipanọng, ọmaana abhaam pabọng akkakka, ttara nnyanyaang sabọng biphyir ótzima osi itzọhm sẹ.
1SA 8:17 Kẹ ọ́tzọhka ibe rani k'obe jobh k'arukhimaan pabọng, bọbọng ọkhaam ma for sabọng ábira ade abira pẹ.
1SA 8:18 Mada ewu nduma ebenga, bọng ábhom áror ẹkkaana ka mbọhk s'ọvaarnọng kwa bọng akk'atzekha, yina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bọng ẹmọng kósi.”
1SA 8:19 Kaambi mẹ wọ, anọng mba bẹ Samwẹl itzọhng kayong, be an-aben bi, “Man kokher! Morori ọvaarnọng kw'ọ́daabh man e.
1SA 8:20 Mẹ wọ kwa móde mach'idibhon idọdọk biphyir, da mọ́khaama ọvaarnọng kw'ọ́dabh man, kw'óm-obiro ochi man eden, óbiro órima mgbong saman.”
1SA 8:21 Mada Samwẹl ọbhaang idik nna biphyir s'anọng mba agbaakhi, obiro ọtzọkha sẹ ọgbaak Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 8:22 Mẹ wọ e, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhina bi, “Kọ khera macha bẹ abeni, anang bẹ ọvaarnọng.” Mẹ wọ, wa Samwẹl oben ajinọng p'Israẹl bi, “Tte ọnọng-ọnọng ọrọhng ọbhana ka kẹ k'obhon.”
1SA 9:1 Wa ọkhaam ojinọng wani kw'ọtza che k'ẹfa ch'ọkhaam, kw'ofon k'efonamma cha Bẹnjamin, kw'okpen Kish. Kẹ wa ode nnwa kw'Abiyẹl, kw'ode nnwa kwa Zẹrọ, kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Bekorat, kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kw'Aphiya kw'ofon Bẹnjamin.
1SA 9:2 Kẹ wa obhoni nnwa kw'okpen Saul, kw'ojibhi odikkobh, ọnọng kw'obeng-ẹ abẹ k'ebhonmọr ch'Israẹl kode, obiro ofu ka for bi gbuk ogori ebe ọyọhnga anọng biphyir.
1SA 9:3 Wa nnyanyaang sa Kish kw'ode otte kwa Saul nkwu ndimi. Mẹ wọ, Kish oben nnwa kwẹ Saul bi, “Tzọkha ọtzọhmnọng wani, atzima atza aror nnyanyaang nna.”
1SA 9:4 Mẹ wọ, orenga ka mgbegbeho s'Ephraim, ọmaana k'okhubha kwa Shalisha, yina, bẹ nnyanyaang nna kàre. Bẹ an-achina k'okhubha kwa Shaalim, yina, bẹ nnyanyaang nna kàre. Mẹ wọ, on-orenga k'okhubha kwa Bẹnjamin, yina, bẹ nnyanyaang nna kabira are.
1SA 9:5 Mada bẹ apyiri k'ẹkhọma cha Zuph, Saul oben ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ kwa bẹ atzọni bi, “Tte mọkpa nnam, oni mando ode, otte kwaam ọn-ọrọbha ochibhi kwẹ ka nnyanyaang, on-ochibhi maman.”
1SA 9:6 Yina, ọtzọhmnọng nwa obhina bi, “Kker e, ọkhaam ọsi-ẹjaakhi wani kw'Ibinọkpaabyi m'obhon nwa e. Kẹ ode ọnọng kw'anọng am-anang ikpokpobha s'ideden, ọmaana bi, odik kpenamkpen kw'ọgbaakhi om-ode odik ọkkọkka. Tte mochina kẹ, asimẹ kẹ ọfha ọgbaak man ọgbaak eden cha morenga.”
1SA 9:7 Mẹ wọ, Saul obhina ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ bi, “Idikha mọtza kẹ, mbọng fa mọ́nang ojinọng nwa o? Ọchattọhk fa motzim ọkk'ọha. Mọttọhk kọ̀khaam fa mọtza ọnang ọsi-ẹjaakhi kw'Ibinọkpaabyi e. Mbọng fa mọkhaam o?”
1SA 9:8 Ọtzọhmnọng obiro obhin-ẹ bi, “Kker e, kaam ngaam ishẹkẹl-bhaakha sa silva ma sa ńnang ọtzọhmnọng kw'Ibinọkpaabyi, ifha ọgbaak man eden cha morenga.
1SA 9:9 Wa k'Israẹl, idikha ọnọng ofon bi, ọtza ọdọn Ibinọkpaabyi, om-oben bi, “Tte mochina kẹnya orekha-chen e,” okhuri bi, ọsi-ẹjaakhi kwa mayina bẹ am-ayer-ẹ orekha-chen.
1SA 9:10 Mẹ wọ, Saul obhina ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ bi, “Kwẹ ojibhi khẹ. Tte mofona.” Mẹ wọ, bẹ abina orenga achina k'obhon nwuma kw'ọsẹjaakhi kw'Ibinọkpaabyi owobh.
1SA 9:11 Mada bẹ am-avura egbegbeho achina k'obhon nwa, bẹ akhebha aminava bani p'akwu bi, akwu atzọr asi k'esipe, bẹ abọbh bẹ bi, “Orekha-chen owobh ma o?”
1SA 9:12 Aminava mba abhina bi, “Oo o, kẹ owobh k'ororo, bọng dini mmo, mayina kwa kẹ opyiri ka man k'obhon e, okhuri bi, anọng mba akhaam ẹja cha bẹ afọhni, k'ijafọhnibe e.
1SA 9:13 Abọng adimi m'obhon bi kpaaar, bọng árẹ-ẹ ore yina ochina k'ijafọhnibe bi, otza ochi ọchattọhk. Anọng ọchattọhk káchi maa kẹ opyiri, okhuri bi, kẹ ọkhaambi, ozi njọhm m'ẹja nda. Okyekyer njọhm, yina anọng pa bẹ abheri án-attẹwọr áchi ọchattọhk. Bọng china kẹ madeden, bọng afha akhebh-ẹ okhebha m'ogbe nwa.”
1SA 9:14 Mẹ wọ, bẹ afona achina k'obhon ebira, mada bẹ arami odidim m'obhon, bẹ are Samwẹl, da om-orenga otzor bẹ ka for bi, ochina k'ijafọhnibe.
1SA 9:15 Ewu ch'ẹkwọbh mẹ, yina Saul okwu, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹjaakhi cha odik nwa ọsa ọnang Samwẹl bi,
1SA 9:16 “Ophyini m'ogbe-dema nwa, kaam ńdọhm ojinọng wani kw'ofon k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin ńchen-ọ. Kọ ábyeng-ẹ ana k'eho bi ode ọdabhi kw'anọng paam p'Israẹl; kẹ wọ ọ́rọbha anọng paam ka mbọhk s'ihem s'aPhilistiya. Kaam nkk'anọng paam nkwo nna e, nkk'ẹmọng chabẹ cha bẹ abhomi, mbiri mmaanga.”
1SA 9:17 Mada Samwẹl otzini chen ore Saul, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben-ẹ bi, “Ojinọng nwa kwa mgbaakh-ọ odik okhuri wọ ma e; kẹ wọ ọ́dabh anọng paam.”
1SA 9:18 Mẹ wọ, Saul orenga okhebha Samwẹl k'ẹnya ẹbaakhamma ọbọbh bi, “Tzotzo o tzim-m, ibe s'ọhọhm kw'orekha-chen owobh.”
1SA 9:19 Samwẹl obhina Saul bi, “Kaam wọ nde orekha-chen nwuma e. Kọ chi-m eden avura achina k'ijafọhnibe, kkeri kọ áchi ọchattọhk ttar-m mayina. k'ekpebha, kaam ḿgbaakh-ọ odik kpenamkpen kw'ọyakh-ọ atzim k'ettem, ḿbiri ńttọ-ọ ọbọhk afona.
1SA 9:20 Onode nnyanyaang sa ndim-ọ k'iwu ittaan s'ikk'ikwọbha, for sọ atzim kayak, kkeri bẹ akk'sẹ ara e. Nduma s'anọng p'Israẹl biphyir anang, ngaam kọ, ọmaana efonamma ch'atte e.”
1SA 9:21 Mẹ wọ, Saul obhina bi, “Kaam mfon k'efonamma cha Bẹnjamin, ch'ẹkhar-ọtzaam k'Israẹl, ẹnọmma chaam arang ẹkhar ọtzam ka nnọmma s'efonamma cha Bẹnjamin o? On-orenga yan kọ agbaakh-m odik dema nwa o?”
1SA 9:22 Mẹ wọ e, Samwẹl otzima Saul, ọmaana ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ bẹ adim k'ọhọhm, ohok bẹ ẹwọr k'ibe s'ibari ọtzam iyọhnga s'anọng pa bẹ abheri. Wa anọng pa awobh mẹ apyiri anọng ẹrọbh obhiri jobh.
1SA 9:23 Samwẹl oben ọnọng kw'ọwọni ọchattọhk f'ewobha nda bi, “Tzima itzengbokha nna s'ira nnang-ọ akwu, nna s'ira mben-ọ bi, tte ahok ngọmi.”
1SA 9:24 Mẹ wọ, ọwọn-ọchattọhk nwa ọtza ọtzọkha ọtzaak kw'etzen nda, ọmaana ettonga-kpo py'ẹttar mẹ, obera Saul m'itzitzikha. Samwẹl oben bi, “Ma wọ ode ọttọhk fa bẹ akk'ọ ahokha. Chi, okhuri bi, bẹ areng kọ abẹ ahok fẹ, ttẹwọr m'ogbe kwa mbeni bi, ‘Kaam nkk'anọng ẹrọm nkkaabha.’ ” Mẹ wọ, m'ewu nduma, Saul ochi ọchattọhk ttara Samwẹl.
1SA 9:25 Mada bẹ afon k'ijafọhnibe am-ahakha k'obhon, Samwẹl ọmaana Saul agbaak atzim ttara ayok k'ebir-ebir kw'ọhọhm, kẹ da Saul oyim.
1SA 9:26 Mada bẹ aphyọbh m'owuhobha, Samwẹl oyeri Saul k'ebir-ebir kw'ọhọhm, oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ do for, ifha ńdọhm-ọ akpa nnam abhana.” Saul odo for biphyir, kẹ ọmaana Samwẹl atzọn ayin k'iyaan.
1SA 9:27 Mada bẹ am-arenga abanga enem ch'obhon, Samwẹl oben Saul bi, “Ben ọtzọhmnọng nwa ochi man eden k'ororo.” Ọtzọhmnọng e ọkwọbha, Samwẹl obiro oben bi, “Yina, kọ wobha ma bi kọọbh, ifha mgbaakh-ọ ẹkkaabha ch'efon k'Ibinọkpaabyi.”
1SA 10:1 Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl ọtzọkha ogbere kw'ana obyengi Saul ana k'eho, ọbaakh-ẹ oben bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọ ana obengyi k'eho bi, ádabh anọng pẹ p'Israẹl p'okhokhi ettem.
1SA 10:2 Mada mayina atte-m ọbọhk abhana, kọ áttema ajinọng afa abẹ kẹ abaanga ẹpẹkhubh cha Rachẹl, ka Zẹlza k'enem cha Bẹnjamin. Bẹ ágbaakh-ọ bi, bẹ akk'nyanyaang sa bọng am-aror ara e. Manya, atte odik kw'okhuri sẹ dọk kochibh e, ọn-am-ochibhi ko e. Kẹ ọn-am-ọbọbh bi, ‘Manya kaam ńsi yan okhuri nnwa kwaam o?’ ”
1SA 10:3 “Mẹ wọ, kọ árenga mẹ áchina kẹ da echi ch'ideden ebe, ka Tabọr. Ajinọng attaan p'atza bi atza akpobha Ibinọkpaabyi ka Bẹtẹl ákhebh-ọ mẹ. Oyok wani ótzima avu-va attaan, oyok wani obiro otzima brẹd-dukha attaan, nwonggo wani otzima ogbere kw'atzuk.
1SA 10:4 Bẹ árim-ọ, bẹ abira ánang-ọ brẹd-dukha afa, kọ átzọkha bẹ.
1SA 10:5 “Ayongi mẹ, kọ áchina Gibea kw'Ibinọkpaabyi, kẹ da ibhingabe s'aPhilistiya iwobh. Mada apyiri m'obhon, kọ áttema ẹkhaan ch'asi-ẹjaakhi p'afon k'ijafọhnibe, p'am-ákhir agaangaang, ọmaana mbin, ọmaana aphoropho, ttara agim-ogim, bẹ am-abira asi ẹjaakhi.
1SA 10:6 Mẹ wọ, Egwugwuma ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ẹ́hakha k'ẹfa ewobha ẹmaan-ọ, kọ abira ási ẹjaakhi ttara bẹ. Kọ án-abhakhi ade ngọmi.
1SA 10:7 Ngọhkha nna ngakhaam ẹjaakhi, kọ si odik kpenamkpen kw'akhaambi asi, kkeri Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ttar-ọ.
1SA 10:8 “Kọ áchi-m eden achina ka Gilgal. K'odik ọkkakka, kaam ńhakha-ọhakha ńkwu ńgebh-ọ, ifha nsi ẹjafọhni cha nnanga-nkwọmisẹ, ọmaana cha nnanga s'odidiri. Yina, kọ akhaambi awobha atzik k'iwu izenamfa, matzẹmaa nkwu, ifha ńjaakhi ḿgbaakh-ọ odik kw'ási.”
1SA 10:9 Mada Saul ọbhakhi nnam bi ofona oji Samwẹl, wa Ibinọkpaabyi ọn-ọbhakhi Saul ode ngọmi, ngọhkha nna biphyir ngaama ẹjaakhi m'ewu nduma.
1SA 10:10 Mada bẹ apyiri ka Gibea, ẹkhaan ch'asi-ẹjaakhi akhẹbh-ẹ; ẹfa ch'Egwugwuma ch'Ibinọkpaabyi ẹnwa Saul, ọn-ọttara bẹ k'ẹjaakhi chabẹ, cha bẹ am-asi.
1SA 10:11 Mada anọng biphyir p'akk'ẹ aronga, an-arẹ-ẹ da ọn-am-osi ẹjaakhi ttara asi-ẹjaakhi, bẹ abhakhi abọbh ayok bi, “Mbo o, bọng odik wọ okhebh nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Kish ma o? Saul kẹ obiro ode ọnọng wani k'ottem kw'asi-ẹjaakh o?”
1SA 10:12 Ojinọng wani kw'orukhi mẹ obiro obhina bi, “Bọng anọng bọ abhoni bẹ ẹ?” Mẹ wọ, kwẹ on-ode ẹtzama bi, “Ode bi Saul kẹ obiro ode ọsi-ẹjaakh o?”
1SA 10:13 Mada Saul okyer ẹjaakhi nduma osisi, ofona ochina k'ijafọhnibẹ.
1SA 10:14 Mẹ wọ, ọgbaanotte kw'otte kwa Saul ọbọbh kẹ Saul, ọmaana ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ bi, “Ira bọng atza man o?” Obhina bi, “Mọtza nnyanyaang ororor e, yina, mada moni sẹ ofha ore, mon-ofona ochina ka Samwẹl.”
1SA 10:15 Ọgbaanotte kw'otte oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ gbaak-m odik kwa Samwẹl ọgbaakh-ọ.”
1SA 10:16 Saul obhina bi, “Kẹ ọgbaakhi man ọjaakh-ọjaakhi bi, bẹ akk'nnyanyaang ara e.” Yina, wa Saul ọgbaanotte kw'otte odik manda wani kw'okhuri ẹvaar, kwa Samwẹl ọkk'ẹ ọgbaakha kọ̀gbaakhi.
1SA 10:17 Mẹ wọ e, Samwẹl oyeri anọng p'Israẹl akwu k'itzitzkha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ka Mizpa,
1SA 10:18 ọgbaak bẹ bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'anọng p'Israẹl, obeni bi, ‘Kaam wọ iwa ndim anọng p'Israẹl mbina k'Ijip, kaam wọ iwa mbiri nnọbha bọng ka mbọhk s'anọng p'Ijip, ọmaana ka mbọhk s'idibhon idọdọk biphyir, s'ihokhi bọng k'ihem.’
1SA 10:19 Yina, mayina bọng akk'Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng abhuma, kw'ọkkaan bọng k'idiktama kpenamkpen s'itto ikhebha bọng, ọmaana ọwọwọhngi kwabọng. Bọng akk'abira abena bi, ‘Man kokhera, nang man ọvaarnọng!’ Mẹ wọ, bọng yin Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi k'itzitzikha, ka mfonamma ttara ka nnọmma sabọng.”
1SA 10:20 Mada Samwẹl otzim mfonamma s'Israẹl biphyir oyin ka, bẹ akwu abhari ose, otto k'efonamma cha Bẹnjamin.
1SA 10:21 Mẹ wọ, oyeri efonamma cha Bẹnjamin eyin ka, k'ẹhọhmmọr k'ẹhọhmmọr, ose okwu otto k'ẹnọmma cha Matri. K'ẹkpongannam wa bẹ atzekha Saul, kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Kish, atzor k'ẹjaakhi ch'ose. Yina, mada bẹ aror-ẹ, bẹ kẹ kàre.
1SA 10:22 Bẹ an-achina ororo abọbh Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “Ojinọng nwuma okk'ma opyir o?” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhina bẹ bi, “Oo o, kẹ okk'ochubha k'ibe sa bọng ahokhi ekpo pyabọng e.”
1SA 10:23 Mẹ wọ, bẹ arọbh achina kẹ da ochubh, atza atzọkh-ẹ atzima ayin ka, mada otza obe k'ottem kw'ayok, wa ogori ebe ọyọhnga ayok biphyir.
1SA 10:24 Samwẹl oben anọng mba biphyir bi, “Bọng akk'ojinọng ara kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'otzekha o? Ọnọng kw'ode mach'ẹ m'ottem kw'anọng mba biphyir kode.” Mẹ wọ e, anọng mba an-akpẹbh bi, “Tte ọvaarnọng oruk akpen p'adum-eden.”
1SA 10:25 Samwẹl e, okwu ọtzọkha ndori s'ẹvaar ọgbaak anọng mba. Ọkkẹr sẹ ka nnwẹr, ọtzọkha sẹ ohok m'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Mẹ wọ, wa Samwẹl ọgbak ewobha nda, oben ọnọng-ọnọng ọbhana k'ọhọhm kwẹ.
1SA 10:26 Wa Saul obiro ọbhana k'obhon kwẹ ka Gibea, ttara afanọng p'atzọn-ẹ abẹ p'Ibinọkpaabyi okk'nttem sabẹ ọda.
1SA 10:27 Yina, akhọkhọra bani an-abọbh bi, “Yan wọ kw'ojinọng nwa ọfha ọkkaana man ka mbọhk s'attattaanga-nọng paman o?” Ofona mẹ, bẹ alukh-ẹ, bẹ kẹ ndumma kabira achena. Yina, wa Saul bẹ emọng kosi.
1SA 11:1 Wa Nahash kw'ọdabhi ẹkhọma ch'Ammọn ofon ọtza ọkhọri obhon kwa Jabẹsh-Gilead okhe k'ottem bi, orima bẹ abẹ. Mẹ wọ, ajinọng pa Jabẹsh biphyir aben-ẹ bi, “Si echekhi ttara man, ifha maman ón-owobha k'irekh-irek kwọ.”
1SA 11:2 Yina, Nahash kw'ofon Ammọn obhina bẹ bi, “Kaam ńsi echekhi ttara bọng, idikha bọng akher bi, nnọbha chen ch'odimbọhk ch'ọnọng kpenamkpen, ifha nge Israẹl biphyir ka mgbar.”
1SA 11:3 Mẹ wọ, adenho pa Jabẹsh aben-ẹ bi, “Kọ nang man iwu izenamfa, ifha mọtzọhm akkaabh-ẹkkaabha agbaak anọng p'Israẹl makhọra, idikha ọnọng manda wani on-okwu bi, ọkkaana man, maman ón-otte for saman ọbọhk ọnang-ọ.”
1SA 11:4 Mada akkaabh-ẹkkaabha mba apyiri Gibea, kw'ode obhon kwa Saul, bẹ atzọkha idik nna agbaak anọng. Anọng biphyir abhom abomọng k'ẹrọng.
1SA 11:5 M'ẹbaa mẹ, Saul om-ofona k'owoni okhuna, otzor abhaam pẹ nnam. Mada opyiri ọbọbh bi, “Mbọng vọ osi anọng mba a? Bẹ am-abhom mbọng o?” Mẹ wọ e, bẹ abira agbaakh-ẹ idik nna s'ira ajinọng pa Jabẹsh akk'agbaakha.
1SA 11:6 Mada Saul ọbhaang ẹkkaabha nda cha bẹ atzima akwu, ẹfa ch'Egwugwuma ch'Ibinọkpaabyi ẹnwẹ-ẹ, ettem en-ebhem-ẹ.
1SA 11:7 Mẹ wọ, ọtzọkha abhaam pẹ afa ọkpọhk k'abir-ibiri, ọtzọkha ọnang akkaabh-ẹkkaabha mba bi, bẹ atza akkema k'Israẹl makhọra, oben bi, “Manda wọ kwa bẹ asi abhaam p'ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'oni Saul, ọmaana Samwẹl, abẹ ọtzọni.” Mẹ wọ e, ojora f'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnwa anọng, bẹ biphyir an-akhaama ochibhi wani.
1SA 11:8 Mada Saul oyeri bẹ ọkwa ka Bẹzẹk, ọnọng-mik kw'ajinọng p'Israẹl ode, nnọhna nnọhna obhiri arọbh chi obhiri afa obhiri jobh, ọnọng-mik kw'ajinọng pa Juda ode, nnọhna arọbh attaan obhiri chi.
1SA 11:9 Bẹ agbaak akkaabh-ẹkkaabha mba bi, “Bọng gbaak ajinọng pa Jabẹsh-Gilead bi, ‘Ophyini m'ogbe kw'ekpikhira ẹkk'ẹkhọma, bọng akhaama ẹnaanga ọkhaama.’ ” Mada akkaabh-ẹkkaabha mba afon atza agbaak ajinọng pa Jabẹsh ẹkkaabha nda, ettem ẹdaam bẹ.
1SA 11:10 Mẹ wọ, bẹ agbaak anọng p'Ammọn p'ade ajinọng pa Jabẹsh bi, “Ophyini maman ótte for saman ọbọhk otte ọnang bọng, bọng abira afha atzima man asi odik kpenamkpen kw'ọdaakhi bọng e.”
1SA 11:11 Ewu ekhobh mẹ, Saul ọbhaangi ajinọng pẹ ka ngaan nttaan. M'owukhobha, bẹ anwa k'ibhingabe s'ab'Ammọn, bẹ afhu bẹ maa apyiri mẹ da ewu ẹkk'ẹkhọma. Anọng p'iwa anaang araami, ọnọng-ọnọng ọrọbh ochina ọgbaho kwẹ.
1SA 11:12 Wa anọng an-abọbh Samwẹl bi, “Anyi wọ ode ọnọng nwuma kw'iwa ọbọbhi bi, ‘Saul wọ ón-ode man ọvaarnọng o?’ Bọng dima ajinọng mba ayin ka chenna man, mófhu bẹ.”
1SA 11:13 Yina, Saul oben bi, “Mma e, ọnọng manda wani kwa bẹ afhu k'ewu cha mayina kode, da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'Israẹl ọkkaana, k'ewu cha mayina e.”
1SA 11:14 Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl oben anọng bi, “Bọng kwu mochina ka Gilgal, mobiro ọtza okhera ttara ẹvaar nda kẹ.”
1SA 11:15 Mẹ wọ e, anọng biphyir achina ka Gilgal, atza akhera k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, Saul wọ ode ọvaarnọng. Bẹ afọhni nja sa nnaanga s'odidiri k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Mẹ wọ, Saul ọmaana anọng p'Israẹl biphyir asi ọdadaami kw'ideden.
1SA 12:1 Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl oben anọng p'Israẹl biphyir bi, “Kaam nkk'itzọhng nyonga k'odik kpenamkpen kwa bọng agbaakh-m, nkk'bọng ọvaarnọng mbiri nnanga kw'ọ́dabh bọng.
1SA 12:2 Mẹ wọ, bọbọng akk'ọvaarnọng akhaama kw'otzima bọng. On-ode kaam, nkk'ndama mbiri mmen ahọbh, va paam p'ijinọng awobh ma ttara bọng. Kaam nkk'bọng ndabha ttẹwọr k'edikkobh chaam maa apyiri k'ewu cha mayina.
1SA 12:3 M'ẹbaa nda cha mbe ma, bọng gbaak-m m'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọmaana m'itzitzikha s'ọtzọhmnọng nwa kwẹ, kwa kẹ okk'ana obyengi k'eho. Anyi wọ kwa kaam nkk'ẹbhaam chẹ ndọkha?
