Anyi wọ kwa kaam nkk'ẹnyanyaang chẹ ndọkha? Anyi wọ kwa kaam nkk'chen nsa? Anyi kwa kaam nkk'ihem nhokha? Anyi wọ oben bi, kaam nkk'ngwu ka mbọhk sẹ ndọkha, kw'orenga mẹ kaam eponga-kpaara ch'etzor-otzor ka nnang o? Idikha kaam nkk'ottotto manda wani ngaama m'idik nna, kaam ńsi-osi kwẹ otzor.”
1SA 12:4 Bẹ abhina bi, “Man chen atzima asa, man k'ihem kabira ahok, mada ogbe odede ọttọhk f'ọnọng katzọk.”
1SA 12:5 Samwẹl oben bẹ bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọmaana ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ kw'okk'ana obyengi k'eho, bọ ade awobhare p'attaanga anang bọng m'odik nwa, k'ewu cha mayina e, bi kaam ottotto manda wani k'itzitzikha sabọng kingaam.” Bẹ abhina bi, “Kẹ wọ ode owobh-ore kwaman.”
1SA 12:6 Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl ọgbaak bẹ bi, “Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ otzek Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn. Kẹ wọ iwa obiro otzima abatte obina k'Ijip.
1SA 12:7 Mẹ wọ e, bọng be mẹ, ifha kaam ndima ẹkhọhkha mpyima bọng k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, k'idik s'itzor-otzor biphyir sa kẹ ọkk'ọsa ọnang bọng ttara abatte.
1SA 12:8 “Mada Jekọb ọnwa k'Ijip, bẹ abhom ẹkkaana anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhm Mosẹs ọmaana Aarọn, p'atzim abatte abina k'Ijip akwu ahok bẹ m'ibe nna.
1SA 12:9 “Yina, bẹ araama Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kwabẹ. Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi otte bẹ ọbọhk ọnang Sisẹra, kw'ode odenho kw'agbong-nọng pa Hazọr, obiro otte bẹ ọbọhk ọnang aPhilistiya, ttara ọvaarnọng kwa Moab, p'arim bẹ abẹ.
1SA 12:10 Wa bẹ abhom anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, aben bi, ‘M'okk'ẹkhọngkwuri ọsa, m'okk'nnam ọkpa ọbọra Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, mon-okpobha akha pa Baal, ọmaana agbatza p'Ashtọrẹt. Yina, rọbha man ka mbọhk s'attattaanga-nọng paman, ifha mókpobh-ọ.’
1SA 12:11 Mẹ wọ, iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhm Jerubaal, ọmaana Barak, ọmaana Jẹphta, ttara Samwẹl, obiro ọrọbha bọng ka mbọhk s'attattaanga-nọng pabọng, k'eden kpenamkpen, ifha bọng aruk k'odidiri.
1SA 12:12 “Yina, mada bọng an-are ọvaar Nahash kw'ọdabhi ab'Ammọn da om-okwu bi okwu orima bọng abẹ, bọng an-aben bi, ‘Mma e, maman orori ọvaarnọng kw'ọdabh man e’ kaambi ode bi Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng wọ ode bọng ọvaarnọng.
1SA 12:13 Mẹ wọ, bọng kkeri ọvaarnọng kwa bọng akk'atzekha mẹ, nwuma kwa bọng arori. Bọng kker e, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'bọng ọvaarnọng kw'ọdabh bọng ọnanga e.
1SA 12:14 Idikha ira bọng akhaam ojora f'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, bọng akpobh-ẹ, abira ahakha eho anang asana pẹ, idikha bọbọng ttara ọvaarnọng kw'ọdabhi bọng, akher k'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwabọng, ira ojibh-ojibh ọnang bọng.
1SA 12:15 Yina, idikha bọng ani eho ahak anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, bọng an-agaangi eho anang asana pẹ, kẹ ọ́nang bọng ettuma mach'iwa ọnangi abatte.
1SA 12:16 “Mẹ wọ, bọng wobha bi sẹẹbh atzima chen pabọng are odik barambar kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi om-oben bi osi o.
1SA 12:17 Ogbe kw'ipha s'awit arang ma? Kaam ńyeri Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi otte ẹbhaangkpon ọbọhk etto etzum, obiro otte ẹrọng ọbọhk etzebh. Mẹ wọ kwa bọng atzima atzin itzama-dema sa bọng asi k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, da bọng arori ọvaarnọng abọbh-ẹ.”
1SA 12:18 Mẹ wọ e, Samwẹl oyeri Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Mẹ ewu nduma dani, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otte ẹbhaangkpon ọbọhk etto etzum, obiro otte ẹrọng ọbọhk etzebh. Ofona mẹ, anọng biphyir an-awobha k'ojora f'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọmaana fa Samwẹl.
1SA 12:19 Anọng biphyir an-aben Samwẹl bi, “Zi njọhm anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ, ka nho sa maman atzọhmnọng pọ e, ifha moningi ópe e, kkeri mokk'itzama ọsa ttara ka ngọngkwuri saman biphyir e, bi moror ọvaarnọng ọbọbh-ẹ e.”
1SA 12:20 Samwẹl obhina bẹ bi, “Oningi bọng ojor e. Bọng akk'itzama nna biphyir asa; yina, bọng nnam kàkpa abọra Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, bọng na kpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ttara ettem obungichẹ.
1SA 12:21 Bọng agbatza kàkpobha kkeri bẹ k'eden kayini. Agbatza ejibha katzim achena bọng, bẹ bọng kabira afha akkaana, okhuri bi, bẹ k'eden kayini.
1SA 12:22 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi órenga abarada pa che chẹ abẹbẹ, bọng kóbhum, okhuri bi, wa ode odik kw'ọdaami Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ettem bi, otzima bọng osi anọng pẹ.
1SA 12:23 On-ode kaam, tzọmi-tzọmi okponga k'idachen bi, kaam nsi ẹkhọngkwuri k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, cha kaam nni njọhm nzi ka bọng ka nho. Kaam ḿbiri ḿkpebhi bọng idik s'ijibh-ojibh, ibiri itzor-otzor.
1SA 12:24 Yina, bọng konga akhaama ojora f'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, bọng abira akpobh-ẹ ka nnam-ophephe ttara ettem obungichẹ. Bọng jima idik-barada s'ọkk'ọsa ọnang bọng.
1SA 12:25 Yina, bọng an-achin ororo k'itzama, bọbọng ọmaana ọvaarnọng kwabọng, bẹ ádimi bọng odimi biphyir-phyir.”
1SA 13:1 Wa Saul ode cho ẹrọbh obhiri jobh k'ogbe kw'ode ọvaarnọng. Wa kẹ ọdabhi Israẹl ka cho arọbh afa obhiri afa.
1SA 13:2 Wa Saul otzek ajinọng p'Israẹl nnọhna nzenamfa obhiri arọbh jobh. Ohok nnọhna nzen nwobha ttara kẹ ka Mikmash, ọmaana ka mgbegbeho sa Bẹtẹl. Ajinọng nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh awobha ttara Jonatan ka Gibea k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin. Ọtzọhm ajinọng mbongo nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh, akpa nnam k'ihọhm sabẹ.
1SA 13:3 Jonatan e, orima odenho kw'agbong-nọng p'aPhilistiya p'abe k'ẹbaakhamma abẹ, ka Gẹba. Wa abaPhilistiya abhaanga odik nwuma. Mẹ wọ, Saul ọnang ẹfa bi bẹ agyi obukpọhng, asi eronga anang anọng m'ẹkhọma nda bi waam, aben bi, “Tte aHiburu abhaanga e!”
1SA 13:4 Mẹ wọ, anọng p'Israẹl biphyir abhaanga ẹkkaabha nda bi, “Saul okk'aPhilistiya abẹ ọtza orima k'ibhingabe sabẹ e, ttara bi, anọng p'Israẹl an-akpukhi aPhilistiya idik okpukhi.” Wa bẹ atzọhm ajinọng achena Saul ka Gilgal.
1SA 13:5 Mẹ wọ, abaPhilistiya atzobha bi bẹ arima anọng p'Israẹl abẹ, bẹ atzima akpaar pa nnyanyaang mindọr, nnọhna ẹrọbh obhiri nttaan obhiri chi, ọmaana agbong-nọng p'ayaar akpaar mbuma pa nnyanyaang mindọr nnọhna chi, ttara agbong-nọng adọdọk nnọhna nnabhik mach'oyeyeng kw'ẹraanga-kha. Bẹ avura atza abhing ka Mikmash, k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin ka Bẹt-Avẹn.
1SA 13:6 Mada anọng p'Israẹl an-are bi, bẹ an-awobh ka dama-dama ttara bi, ayok an-ayọhng bẹ mkpaan, bẹ arọbh atza achubha k'atzakpamma, ọmaana k'araan, k'ottem kw'atzakpa, ọmaana k'apekhuma, ttara ka nsipe.
1SA 13:7 Wa aHiburu bani arọbhi ajekha Jọrdan, achina k'obhon kwa Gad, ọmaana Gilead. Wa Saul otzim owobh ka Gilgal, ttara ẹkhaan ch'agbong-nọng p'atzọn-ẹ p'opoma osi.
1SA 13:8 Saul owobha k'iwu izenamfa otzik ogbe kwa Samwẹl okhe bi, okwu, yina, wa Samwẹl ka Gilgal otzima ọkwa. Mẹ wọ, agbong-nọng pa Saul attẹwọr araami.
1SA 13:9 Mẹ wọ e, Saul oben bi, “Bọng chẹn-m, ẹnanga ẹkwọmichẹ, ọmaana nnanga s'odidiri.” Wa Saul ọfọhni ẹja ẹkwọmichẹ.
1SA 13:10 Mada Saul okyer ẹjafọhni bi kpaar, Samwẹl opyiri, Saul oyin k'iyaan otza orim-ẹ.
1SA 13:11 Samwẹl e, ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Bọng odik kw'asi ma a?” Saul obhina bi, “Mada nna nne bi anọng mba am-araami, ọmaana bi m'ogbe kw'akhe dọk kakwu, ttara bi aPhilistiya am-atzobh ka Mikmash.
1SA 13:12 Kaam nna nchibhi bi, ‘APhilistiya áhakh-óhakha ákwu arim-m abẹ ka Gilgal. Kaam Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kimbiri ndọn bi, ọkkaana man.’ Kẹ wọ osi nna nchibhi bi, mfọhni ẹja nda e.”
1SA 13:13 Samwẹl oben bi “Kọ asi kwẹ k'edidingi-den e, kọ asana p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ, p'ọnang-ọ kahokhi, ira akk'ahokha, ira kẹ ọkk'ẹvaar chọ k'Israẹl aranga ottima, k'ogbe kpenamkpen.
1SA 13:14 Yina, ttẹwọr mayina, ẹvaar chọ ororo dọk kéchina. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ọnọng otzekha kw'ofon-ẹ k'ettem, kw'ọdabh anọng pẹ, okhuri bi, kọ asana p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kàhokhi.”
1SA 13:15 Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl obina ka Gilgal, ochina ka Gibea k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin. Saul e, ọtzọkha obhik kw'ajinọng p'awobh ttara kẹ. Wa ajinọng p'awobh ttar-ẹ, apyiri ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh jobh.
1SA 13:16 Wa Saul ọmaana nnwa kwẹ Jonatan, ọmaana ajinọng p'awobh ttara bẹ, awobh ka Gibea k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin, aPhilistiya abhing ka Mikmash.
1SA 13:17 Asoja p'erima abina ka ngaan nttaan k'ibhingabe s'aPhilistiya. Ẹkhaan dani echina k'okhubha kw'Ọphra k'ẹkhọma cha Shual,
1SA 13:18 dani echina ka Bẹt-Họrọn, ndongo ch'ettong nttaan echina k'okhubha kw'enem ch'ẹrọni ẹttẹri cha Zeboyim, ch'ekkeri itzitzikha k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi.
1SA 13:19 Wa otzetzekha manda wani kw'owobh k'ebhonmọr ch'Israẹl bi waam kode, okhuri da aPhilistiya akk'bẹ eden akpa k'egbongkpo osisi, aben bi, “Oni mando ode, aHiburu mba áduk akkangkkaang ọmaana akhọhn!”
1SA 13:20 Mẹ wọ, anọng p'Israẹl biphyir an-ahakha akhebha aPhilistiya bi bẹ atza abọhnga ngubh, ọmaana akhukhubha, ọmaana mbar sabẹ, ttara ngubh ndọdọk sabẹ.
1SA 13:21 Ẹphya cha ngubh ọmaana akhukhubha ọbọbọhnga ede ishẹkẹl-bhaakha, ọmaana ọttọhk f'opyiri ishẹkẹl-bhaakha cha sọvẹl kw'ọkhaam aha ọmaana mbar, ttara ọbọbọhnga kw'ẹmma ch'echi ch'akkeri-nden ede shẹkẹl k'obe ọttaan.
1SA 13:22 Mẹ wọ, m'ewu nduma ch'egbong, orim-egbong manda wani kw'owobh ttara Saul ọmaana Jonatan, kw'ọkhaam ọkkangkkaang ọmaana ọkhọhn k'ọbọhk kwẹ, kode, ayongi Saul ọmaana nnwa kwẹ Jonatan, bọ akhaam pyẹ.
1SA 13:23 Mẹ wọ, ẹkhaan dani ch'agbong-nọng p'aPhilistiya ekk'efona ẹtza ẹkpa ọkkadeden kwa Mikmash.
1SA 14:1 Wa ewu dani, Jonatan kw'ode nnwa kwa Saul oben odikkobh kw'ode otzim-egbongkpo kwẹ bi, “Kwu mojekha k'okhubha kw'agbong-nọng pa Philistiya p'akkeri ẹbaakhamma awobh.” Yina, wa Jonatan otte kọ̀gbaakhi.
1SA 14:2 Wa Saul owobh k'obhon okhaan-okhaan kwa Gibea k'ochigbagba kw'apomegrenet ka Migrọn. Wa kẹ otzim anọng p'apyiri ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh jobh.
1SA 14:3 K'ottem kw'anọng p'awobh ttar-ẹ, wa ode Ahija kw'ọm-ọfọra ẹphọd. Ahija nwa wa ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kw'ọgbaanọkka kw'Ikabọd, kw'okpen Ahitub. Ahitub ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Phinẹhas, kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kw'Ẹli, kw'ode ọfọhnẹja kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ka Shilo. Ọnọng kw'iwa orong bi Jonatan okk'obina ofona kode.
1SA 14:4 K'okhubha kpenamkpen kwa Jonatan oreng bi, ojekha okhebha agbong-nọng pa Philistiya p'akkeri ẹbaakhamma, ọkhaam egbegbeho ch'ede atzakpa-tzakpa. Dani ekpen Bozẹz, ndongo ekpena Sẹnẹ.
1SA 14:5 Egbegbeho dani ch'ede atzakpa-tzakpa ebe ekkeri k'obhon-ebira kwa Mikmash, ndonggo ebe k'obhon-ẹrakha kwa Gẹba.
1SA 14:6 Jonatan oben odikkobh kw'ode otzim-egbongkpo pyẹ bi, “Kọ kwu mochina k'anọng mba p'akkeri ẹbaakhamma ch'aPhilistiya mba p'ani ọkpakkọrikkọ am-asi. Asi mẹ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ofha orima erima nda orima ọnang man. Kaambi ode bi, mọhaabh-ọhaabh man kobiro ọhaabh o, ọttọhk manda vani f'ọfha ọkpa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi eden bi, oningi man ọkkaan kode.”
1SA 14:7 Otzim-egbongkpo pya Jonatan oben bi, “Kọ si odik kpenamkpen kw'ojibh ọnang-ọ. Kọ china ororo, kkeri kaam ndum-ọ mbọhk ka nnam k'achibhi p'ettem chọ.”
1SA 14:8 Mẹ wọ, Jonatan oben bi, “Kwu mojekha k'okhubha nwonggo motza okhebha ajinọng mba, ifha bẹ are man.
1SA 14:9 Idikha bẹ abeni man bi, ‘Bọng be kẹ mokhebha bọng kẹ,’ mówobha mẹ da mowobh, man kóvura okhebha bẹ kẹ.
1SA 14:10 Yina, idikha bẹ abeni man bi, ‘Bọng vura khebha man ka,’ móvura okhebha bẹ kẹ, okhuri bi, mẹ wọ óde ẹkhọhkha ọnang man bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'bẹ ọbọhk ọtta ọnang man, bi mokhema.”
1SA 14:11 Mẹ wọ e, bẹ anọng afa atza ajana for sabẹ k'ẹbaakhamma cha Philistiya. APhilistiya aben bi “Bọng kker e! AHiburu mba am-abẹkhi ayini k'amma p'ira bẹ am-achubha e.”
1SA 14:12 Ajinọng p'awobh k'ẹbaakhamma, akpẹbh Jonatan ọmaana otzim-egbongkpo kwẹ amọng, aben bi, “Bọng vura akhebha man ka, ifha mọkhọkha bọng nkkwuri.” Mẹ wọ, Jonatan oben otzim-egbongkpo kwẹ bi, “Vura atzor-m nnam. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'bẹ ọtzọkha ọnang anọng p'Israẹl bi, bẹ akhema.”
1SA 14:13 Jonatan otzima mbọhk ọmaana mmo ovura, otzim-egbongkpo kwẹ otzor-ẹ nnam. Wa Jonatan ofhu aPhilistiya, otzim-egbongkpo kwẹ obira otzor-ẹ nnam ofhu bẹ.
1SA 14:14 M'echeden-nima nduma, Jonatan ọmaana otzim-egbongkpo kwẹ, afhu anọng ẹrọbh k'ibe s'ibari ipyiri ndọkhi arọbh jobh.
1SA 14:15 Mẹ wọ e, opoma ọnwa agbong-nọng pa Philistiya biphyir p'awobh k'ibhingabe, ọmaana p'awobh k'egbong-dam, ọmaana agbong-nọng p'awobh k'ẹbaakhamma, ttara ngaan s'arim-erima. Wa irerek inyengi. Ibinọkpaabyi wọ iwa ọtzọhmi opoma mva.
1SA 14:16 Wa akker-ibe pa Saul ka Gibea k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin, are da agbong-nọng p'aPhilistiya an-am-arọbh ajaang-jaang.
1SA 14:17 Mẹ wọ, Saul oben ajinọng p'atzọn-ẹ abẹ bi, “Bọng dọkha obhik kw'agbong-nọng ifha moronga ọnọng kw'oni ma ode.” Mada bẹ akk'mando asa, bẹ are bi Jonatan ọmaana otzim-egbongkpo kwẹ, bọ ani mẹ ade.
1SA 14:18 Saul e, oben Ahija kw'ode ọfọhnẹja bi, “Tzima Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi kwu.” M'ogbe nwa, wa ẹkkọhbhi nda ewobh ọmaana anọng p'Israẹl.
1SA 14:19 Mada Saul otzim-otzim atzim m'ẹmma da ọm-ọgbaak ọnang ọfọhnẹja, dama-dama kw'owobh k'ibhingabe sa Philistiya odo ọttar-ọttara. Mẹ wọ, Saul oben ọfọhnẹja bi, “Rọbha ọbọhk kwọ m'odik nwa.”
1SA 14:20 Mẹ wọ e, Saul ọmaana anọng pẹ biphyir atzobha, bẹ abina atza egbong. Bẹ akhebha aPhilistiya k'opoma, da bẹ an-atzim akkangkkaang abhakhi afhu ayok.
1SA 14:21 AHiburu mbuma p'iwa akkekkeni awobha ttara aPhilistiya, p'abira atzọn bẹ avura k'ibhingabe, ajekha akhebha anọng p'Israẹl p'awobh ọmaana Saul, ttara Jonatan.
1SA 14:22 Mada anọng p'Israẹl biphyir p'iwa akk'achubha ka mgbegbeho s'Ephraim abhaang bi, aPhilistiya am-arọbhi, bẹ an-anwa egbong akhubh aPhilistiya, m'ẹkhọma-ẹkhọma.
1SA 14:23 Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkkaana anọng p'Israẹl m'ewu nduma, egbong ẹnyaami ẹkwọbha Bẹt-Avẹn.
1SA 14:24 M'ewu nduma, wa ajinọng p'Israẹl an-awobh ka dama-dama, okhuri da Saul okk'anọng mba ọtzọkha okhe k'ọnwọhngi, oben bi, “Opyibh-opyibh ọnang ojinọng kpenamkpen kw'ochi ọchattọhk yina ẹchọhkha, koyongi bi kaam nkk'odik kw'attattaanga-nọng paam asi, ndukha.” Mẹ wọ, ọnọng manda wani kw'ochi ọttọhk kode.
1SA 14:25 Mẹ wọ, agbong-nọng mba biphyir adim k'ẹtzam, bẹ atza are akhọkhọnana m'irerek.
1SA 14:26 Mada bẹ adimi k'ẹtzam, bẹ are da akhọkhọnana am-abhobh, yina, ọnọng manda wani kw'okhe ọbọhk mẹ ọttaakhi kode, okhuri ojora f'ọnwọhngi kwa Saul.
1SA 14:27 Yina, wa Jonatan otzim ọbhaanga bi, otte okk'anọng mba ọkha k'ọnwọhngi. Mẹ wọ, on-otzima ikhokhori s'ochikhura kw'otzim ọrana k'akhọkhọnana-kpa, otzini ọbọhk okhe k'ẹmma ọttaakhi, on-odo ẹfa ọkhaama.
1SA 14:28 Mẹ wọ, orim-egbong wani ọgbaakh-ẹ bi, “Atte okhe agbong-nọng mba k'ọnwọhngi kw'ọgaang-ọgaangi, oben bi, ‘Opyibh-opyibh ọnang ojinọng kpenamkpen kw'ochi ọchattọhk mayina.’ Odik nwuma wọ osi ẹfa ẹm-ẹha anọng mba, bẹ am-awọhnga e.”
1SA 14:29 Jonatan obhina bi, “Otte kwaam okk'anọng paman ọkha ka dama-dama e. Kkeri odem kwa kaam nkk'ẹfa mbiri ngaama ka, da nttaakhi akhọkhọnana mba ibebaa.
1SA 14:30 Ira ode odik kw'ojibh-ojibh, idikha ajinọng mba akk'ọttọhk acha k'ọgbọm fa bẹ achi k'attattaanga-nọng pabẹ e. Mẹ kw'ira ekhema ch'anọng mba, akhema aPhilistiya ẹbar ọtzam e.”
1SA 14:31 M'ewu nduma, mada anọng p'Israẹl akk'aPhilistiya afha ttẹwọr ka Mikmash maa apyiri k'Aijalọn, wa ọkhọhn bẹ.
1SA 14:32 Mẹ wọ, bẹ akhur atto k'ọgbọm ochichi, atzọkha arukhimaan, ọmaana andaamogbodo, ttara abhaamva, bẹ akpọk pyẹ m'ẹbaa, achi ttara izi.
1SA 14:33 Mẹ wọ, ọnọng wani oben Saul bi, “Kker e, ajinọng mba am-asi ẹkhọngkwuri k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, bẹ am-achi nden ttara izi.” Oben bẹ bi, “Bọng akk'apina e! Bọng bingi ọtza kw'ideden ẹbhar-ẹbhar atzima akwu ma.”
1SA 14:34 Mẹ wọ e, Saul oben bẹ bi, “Bọng nọng k'ottem kw'ajinọng mba, aben bẹ bi, ‘Ọnọng-ọnọng ótzima ẹbhaam chẹ, ọmaana orukhimaan kwẹ ótzima ókwu ma. Bọng fhu pyẹ ma, achi. Bọng ẹkhọngkwuri k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kàsi bi, bọng achi nden ttara izi o.’ ” Mẹ wọ e, ọnọng-ọnọng otzima ẹbhaam chẹ, okwu m'erungi nduma ofhu chẹ mẹ.
1SA 14:35 Mẹ wọ, Saul osi ijafọhnibe ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi; ma wọ ode ochedengbe kw'osi mando.
1SA 14:36 Mẹ wọ, Saul oben bi, “Tte mọkhakha m'erungi otza orima aPhilistiya abẹ, mobiro ochi bẹ ọgbọm maa ewu ehobha, tte moningi ọnọng manda wani ọbọhk otte oruk akpen.” Bẹ an-abhina bi, “Si odik kpenamkpen kw'ojibh-ọ abẹ.” Yina, ọfọhn-ẹja oben bi, “Tte moror odik nwa ọbọbh Ibinọkpaabyi manya.”
1SA 14:37 Mẹ wọ, Saul ọbọbh Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “Ma ńhakha nda nnima aPhilistiya abẹ o? Na kọ ánang anọng p'Israẹl ekhema o?” Yina, wa Ibinọkpaabyi kẹ ebhina kọ̀nangi m'ewu nduma.
1SA 14:38 Mẹ wọ e, Saul on-oben bi, “Adenho p'agbong-nọng biphyir bọng kwu, ifha mọdọhn eden ch'ẹkhọngkwuri cha mayina ereng ekwu.
1SA 14:39 Odem nwa kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'ọkkaan anọng p'Israẹl orukhi akpen, kaambi ode bi nnwa kwaam Jonatan wọ osi odik nwa, kẹ ọkhaambi da ope.” Yina, ojinọng manda wani kw'osi ẹmọng kode.
1SA 14:40 Mẹ wọ, Saul on-oben anọng p'Israẹl biphyir bi, “Bọng be kana, ifha kaam ọmaana nnwa kwaam Jonatan mobe kanya.” Ajinọng mba abhina bi, “Si odik kpenamkpen kw'ojibh-ọ abẹ.”
1SA 14:41 Mẹ wọ, Saul on-ozi njọhm ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl, oben bi, “Kọ nang-m ebhina ẹkkakka. Idikha ose otto ka kaam, ode bi obiro otto ka nnwa kwaam Jonatan o, kọ bhina ttara Urim. Yina, idikha otto k'ajinọng mba p'Israẹl, kọ bhina ttara Tumim. Mẹ wọ, bẹ abhari ose, otto ka Jonatan ọmaana Saul. Wa ajinọng mbongo anaanga odik nwa.
1SA 14:42 Saul on-oben bi, bọng mari ose k'eho chaam ọmaana cha Jonatan.” Wa ose otto ka Jonatan.
1SA 14:43 Mẹ wọ, Saul oben Jonatan bi, “Kọ gbaak-m odik kw'akk'asa.” Jonatan e ọgbaakh-ẹ bi, “Kaam ngingẹ nttaakhi akhọkhọnana pa ndim ikhokhori s'ochikhura kwa ndim k'ọbọhk kwaam nttọmi. Aa, kkeri kaam ma e, kaam ngaambi mpe.”
1SA 14:44 Saul on-oben bi, “Jonatan, tte Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang-m ettuma k'iden-dama ọttar-ọttara, idikha kọ Jonatan án-apẹ.”
1SA 14:45 Yina, ajinọng mba an-aben Saul bi, “Ode bi Jonatan nwa kw'okk'Israẹl ẹnaanga barada nda ọnanga ope o? Kwẹ mando kode! Odem nwa kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, esisa-naanga manda dani chẹ ch'etto m'irerek kede, okhuri bi, kẹ osi odik nwa mayina ttara ẹkkaana ch'Ibinọkpaabyi.” Mẹ wọ, ajinọng mba akkaana Jonatan, bẹ kẹ dọk kàfhu.
1SA 14:46 Mẹ wọ, Saul ọkwọbha aPhilistiya okhukhubh, aPhilistiya akpa nnam abhana ka bẹ k'ibe.
1SA 14:47 Mada Saul okk'ẹvaar k'Israẹl ọn-ọdabha, wa orim egbong ttara idibhon s'ide attattaanga-nọng pabẹ makhọra. Wa idibhon nna ide; Moab, ọmaana Ammọn, ọmaana Edom, ọmaana avaarnọng pa Zoba, ttara abaPhilistiya. Wa kẹ ọnangi anọng mba ihem k'ibe kpenamkpen s'okkeri itzitzikha.
1SA 14:48 Wa orima egbong mach'ojinọng okhema ab'Amalẹk, obiro ọkkaana ọrọbha anọng p'Israẹl ka mbọhk s'anọng p'akk'bẹ ọgbọm acha.
1SA 14:49 Wa va p'ijinọng pa Saul ade Jonatan, ọmaana Ishvi, ttara Malki-Shua. Ocheden nnwa kwẹ kw'ikwanọng okpena Mẹrab, oyok kw'ikwanọng kw'ojem-ẹ okpena Mikal.
1SA 14:50 Kwanọng kwa Saul wa okpen Ahinoam kw'ode nnwa kw'Ahimaz. Abnẹr wọ iwa ode odenho kw'agbong-nọng pa Saul, obiro ode nnwa kwa Nẹr. Nẹr nwa wa ode ọgbaanotte kw'otte kwa Saul.
1SA 14:51 Abiyẹl wọ iwa obhoni Kish, kw'ode otte kwa Saul, obiro obhon Nẹr, kw'ode otte kw'Abnẹr.
1SA 14:52 Wa ogbe kwa Saul biphyir, ode ogbe kw'egbong ch'ẹgaang-ọgaangi ttara aPhilistiya. Wa ogbe kpenamkpen kwa Saul ore ojinọng kw'ọkhaam ẹfa, obiro ode okkenggitza o, ọm-ọtzọkh-ẹ ttara k'agbong-nọng pẹ.
1SA 15:1 Samwẹl oben Saul bi, “Kaam wọ kw'iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhmi bi mbyeng-ọ ana k'eho e, ifha ade ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl. Mẹ wọ, na yonga itzọhng abhaanga ẹkkaabha ch'efon k'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 15:2 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir obeni bi, ‘Kaam ńnang ab'Amalẹk ettuma, k'odem kw'iwa bẹ attaang anang anọng p'Israẹl k'ọkkadeden, k'ogbe kwa bẹ abin k'Ijip.
1SA 15:3 Mẹ wọ, kọ rọhng atza arima ab'Amalẹk abẹ, abira adimi ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ode fabẹ. Ọttọhk ọbọhk kàtte oruk akpen, fhu ajinọng, ọmaana panọng, ọmaana igbọ, ọmaana vava, ọmaana andaamogbodo, ọmaana arukhimaan, ọmaana akamẹl, ttara nnyanyaang.’ ”
1SA 15:4 Mẹ wọ, Saul oyeri anọng ọkwa, obiro ọtzọkha obhik kwabẹ ka Telayim. Wa agbong-nọng p'areng k'irerek ade anọng nnọhna ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh azen, ọmaana anọng nnọhna ẹrọbh obhiri nzen p'afon Juda.
1SA 15:5 Saul ofona ochina k'obhon kw'Amalẹk, ọtza ochubha k'ẹttẹri otzik bẹ.
1SA 15:6 Mẹ wọ, Saul oben abaKen bi, “Bọng nọng afona, bọng atte ab'Amalẹk ọbọhk, kaam kinnori bi ndimi bọng ttara bẹ, da iwa bọng asi ọphyaam anang anọng p'Israẹl biphyir, mada bẹ abin k'Ijip.” Mẹ wọ, abaKen abina k'obhon kw'abAmalẹk afona.
1SA 15:7 Mẹ wọ e, wa Saul orima ab'Amalẹk abẹ ttẹwọr ka Havila, maa apyiri ka Shur, achina k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-eyin k'Ijip.
1SA 15:8 Wa Saul ọbọkha Agag kw'ode ọvaarnọng kw'Amalẹk ekhekhebhi, kẹ kofhu, yina, otzima ọkkangkkang ofhu anọng pẹ biphyir.
1SA 15:9 Yina, Saul ọmaana agbong-nọng pẹ, atte Agag ọbọhk ọmaana arukhimaan pẹ akkakka, ọmaana andaamogbodo, ọmaana abhaam abhaarapẹ, ọmaana arukhimaanva, ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ojibh-ojibh oruk akpen. Wa ekpo mbya ẹmma bẹ ettem bi bẹ afhu. Yina, ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'iwa okpukhi bẹ okpukhi, ọmaana f'ọmọmmi for bẹ akhibhi pyẹ biphyir-phyir.
1SA 15:10 Mẹ wọ, wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọgbaak Samwẹl atzim, oben bi,
1SA 15:11 “Kwẹ ọmmaam-m k'ettem bi, nkk'Saul ọvaarnọng nsa, kẹ okk'nnam ọkpa ọbọr-m, ndọhna saam kọ̀tzọk.” Wa odik nwa ọyak Samwẹl atzim maa, obhom ozi njọhm m'erungiwu nduma biphyir ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 15:12 K'ekpekpebha, Samwẹl obina bi ọtza ore Saul, yina, bẹ agbaakh-ẹ bi, “Saul okk'ofona ochina ka Kaamẹl. Kẹ wọ kw'iwa ọbaang ọgbatza kwa bẹ am-atzima ajim-ẹ, yina ọn-ọkpa nnam ọhakha ochina ka Gilgal.”
1SA 15:13 K'ogbe kwa Samwẹl on-okhebh-ẹ, Saul oben bi, “Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọdọ-ọ! Kaam nkk'nsa mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhn-m.”
1SA 15:14 Yina, Samwẹl ọbọbh bi, “Mbọng vọ f'arukhimaan am-amẹmma o? Mbọng f'andaamogbodo am-amẹmma a?”
1SA 15:15 Saul obhina bi “Arim-egbong bọ atzim pyẹ k'Amalẹk akwu e, bẹ ahokhi arukhimaan akkakka mba, ọmaana andaamogbodo mba bi bẹ atzima afọhni ẹja anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ e, yina, mokk'ekpo mbyonggo odimi biphyir.”
1SA 15:16 Samwẹl oben Saul bi, “Odik dema nwuma dọk kàgbaak. Tte mgbaakh-ọ odik kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọgbaakh-m k'erungi ch'ikhena e.” Saul obhina bi, “Gbaak-m.”
1SA 15:17 Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl oben bi, “Okhinggẹ ode bi, kọ wọ iwa are for sọ ọkhara e, kọ wa akk'odenho kwa mfonamma s'Israẹl ada. Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obyeng-ọ ana k'eho ifha adabh anọng e.
1SA 15:18 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhm-ọ ọtzọhm, oben bi, ‘Kọ rọhng atza adimi anọng-dama mbuma p'Amalẹk biphyir, arima bẹ abẹ maa are bi akk'bẹ adimi biphyir-phyir.’
1SA 15:19 Okhuri yan kwa kọ arẹkhi Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi? Okhuri yan kw'achi ọgbọm, abira asi epyibha k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi o?”
1SA 15:20 Yina, Saul obhina Samwẹl bi, “Kaam nkk'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ikpokpobha nnanga. Kaam nkk'ọtzọhm nda f'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhm-m. Nkk'anọng p'Amalẹk mfha biphyir, mbiri mbọkha Agag kw'ode ọvaarnọng kwabẹ ndima ngwuna.
1SA 15:21 Arim-egbong atzọk arukhimaan, ọmaana andaamogbodo akkakkapẹ p'afon k'ọgbọm, ifha bẹ atzima asi ẹjafọhni anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ ka Gilgal.”
1SA 15:22 Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl obhina bi, “Kọ achibhi bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọm-ọtzọkha ottemdaamiji ka nnanga nkwọmisẹ, ọmaana njafọhni, ọyọhnga bi ọnọng ọhakha eho ọnang ndọhna s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi o? Eho ọhahakha ejibhi ọtzam ẹyọhnga ẹja ọfọfọhni, ndọhna ọbhabhaanga njibhi ọtzam nyọhnga iyaak s'erukhimaan-dim.
1SA 15:23 Da irẹrẹkhi ide mach'ẹkhọngkwuri ch'abọhkpakpa ọbhabhari, for ogege ode mach'epyibha ch'ọkha ọtzatzaam. Kọ akk'atzim p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi abhuma, kwẹ kwọ osi kẹ obhum kọ mach'ọvaarnọng.”
1SA 15:24 Mẹ wọ, Saul oben Samwẹl bi, “Kaam nkk'ẹkhọhngkwuri nsa. Kaam nkk'asana p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọmaana ndọhna sọ mvọhkhi. Ira agbong-nọng paam bọ ajor-m, yina ira nsi kw'ọpaani bẹ e.
1SA 15:25 Tzotzokhaan, bina mẹ anang-m k'ẹkhọngkwuri chaam, abira atzim-m akpa nnam, ifha mbiri mkpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.”
1SA 15:26 Yina, Samwẹl oben-ẹ bi, “Kaam kọ abẹ kindọn mkpa nnam. Kọ akk'atzim p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi abhuma, mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọ obiro obhuma mach'ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl.”
1SA 15:27 Mada Samwẹl ọbhakhi nnam bi ofona, Saul ọgban-ẹ k'owura-baba kwẹ, ọjaakhi.
1SA 15:28 Samwẹl e, oben-ẹ bi, “K'ewu cha mayina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ẹvaar ch'Israẹl ọtzọkha ka mbọhk sọ, kẹ ọkk'chẹ ọn-ọtzọkha ọnang oyokh-ẹbaanga kwọ wani, kw'ọjibhi ọyọhng-ọ.
1SA 15:29 Kẹ nwuma, kw'ode Abarada p'Israẹl ibhora komosi, ochibhi kwẹ komobiro obhona, kẹ ọnọngẹya kode, kw'ira ọn-ọsẹ-ẹ obhona ochibhi.”
1SA 15:30 Saul obhina bi, “Kaam nkk'ẹkhọhngkwuri nsa. Yina, tzotzokhaan nang-m ikpokpobha k'itzitzikha s'adedennọng p'anọng paam, ọmaana k'itzitzikha s'anọng p'Israẹl. Kọ kwu mọtzọn ọkpa nnam, ifha kaam mkpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ”
1SA 15:31 Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl otzima Saul ọkpa nnam, wa Saul okpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 15:32 Mẹ wọ e, Samwẹl oben bẹ bi, “Bọng chen-m Agag kw'ode ọvaarnọng kw'abAmalẹk.” Agag obina ttara ottembara okwu okhebha Samwẹl, ochibhi bi, “K'odik ọkkọkka, ọmmamma kw'obo dọk kode.”
1SA 15:33 Yina, Samwẹl oben bi, “Odem nwa kw'ọkkangkkaang kwọ ọkk'ọsa panọng va dọk kakhaam, mando wọ, ọkka kwọ va dọk kọ́khaama k'ottem kwa panọng e.” Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl ọtaabh Agag k'abir-ibiri k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ka Gilgal.
1SA 15:34 Mẹ wọ e, Samwẹl ofona ọbhana ka Rama, yina, Saul ovura ochina k'obhon kwẹ ka Gibea.
1SA 15:35 Ttẹwọr mẹ, maa wa Samwẹl ope, Saul be ayok dọk kàre. Kaambi mẹ wọ, Samwẹl okk'owobha ka nkwu-osisi sa Saul. Wa ettem ẹmma Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi da osi Saul ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl.
1SA 16:1 Wa ewu dani Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Samwẹl bi, “Óbhir otzuma yan yina akwọbha nkwu-osisi sa Saul owowobha, da kaam nkk'ẹ mmuma mach'ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl? Tzọkha ana p'ẹbọhk-nana akhe k'erukhimaanha chọ, abikhi orenga, kaam ndọhm-ọ ka Jẹsẹ kw'ofon Bẹtẹlẹhẹm. Kaam nkk'nnwa wani kwẹ kw'ijinọng ndekha bi, ode ọvaarnọng.”
1SA 16:2 Yina, Samwẹl oben bi, “Kaam ńnenga yan nda o? Idikha Saul ọ́bhaang kwẹ, ófhu-m ofhu e.” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Tzima ọbhaamnwa kwakwẹ atzima afona, apyiri ben-ẹ bi, ‘Nkk'nkwa bi nkwu mfọhni ẹja nnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi e.’
1SA 16:3 Kọ bher Jẹsẹ okwu m'ẹjafọhni nduma, kaam ńdibh-ọ otzibh ọttọhk f'asi. Kọ ábyengi nwuma kwa ńgọhkh-ọ ana k'eho anang-m.”
1SA 16:4 Samwẹl osi mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obeni. Mada opyiri ka Bẹtẹlẹhẹm, adenho p'obhon ojora bẹ mada bẹ arẹ-ẹ. Bẹ abọbh-ẹ bi, “Akwu k'odidir o?”
1SA 16:5 Samwẹl obhina bi, “Oo o, k'odidiri wọ kwa kaam nkwu bi nkwu mfọhni ẹja nnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Mẹ wọ, bọng do for sabọng, akwu mọtza ọfọhni ẹja.” Mẹ wọ, osi Jẹsẹ ọmaana va pẹ p'ijinọng awur, obher bẹ ẹjafọhni.
1SA 16:6 Mada bẹ apyiri kẹ, Samwẹl ore Eliyab ochibhi bi, “K'odik ọkkakka, ọnọng kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'otzekha bi, bẹ ábyengi ana k'eho obe m'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi e.”
1SA 16:7 Yina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Samwẹl bi, “Kẹ k'eden ch'ode ọmaana ebe chẹ kàkkeri, okhuri bi kaam nkk'ẹ mmumma. Eden ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi om-ore idik ede ngọmi ttara eden ch'ọnọngẹya ore. Da ọnọngẹya om-ore odik k'iyaan-iyaan, yina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi om-okkeri ettem.”
1SA 16:8 Mẹ wọ, Jẹsẹ oyeri Abinadab, otzim-ẹ ọkwọbha Samwẹl k'itzitzikha. Yina, Samwẹl oben bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oyok nwa kobiro otzekha.”
1SA 16:9 Jẹsẹ on-obiro otzima Shama okwu, yina, Samwẹl obiro oben bi, “Kẹ rang kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obiro otzekha.”
1SA 16:10 Wa Jẹsẹ otzim va pẹ p'ijinọng azenamfa ọkhọkha Samwẹl, yina, Samwẹl oben-ẹ bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnọng ma kotzek e.”
1SA 16:11 Mẹ wọ, ọbọbh Jẹsẹ bi, “Va pọ p'ijinọng p'akhaam biphyir bọ ma o?” Jẹsẹ obhin-ẹ bi, “Oyok kw'ikhakhari owobh kẹ e, yina, kẹ om-okkeri arukhimaan e.” Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl oben Jẹsẹ bi, “Tzọhm ọnọng otza oyer-ẹ, m'ẹwọr kówobha maa opyiri.”
1SA 16:12 Jẹsẹ ọtzọhm anọng atza ayeri Devid okwu. Wa Devid ojibhi ka for, obiro ojibhi odikkobh, obiro ojibh ikkekkeri. Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Samwẹl bi, “Kẹ wọ mẹ e, bina abyeng-ẹ ana k'eho.”
1SA 16:13 Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl ọtzọkha ana p'otzim k'erukhimaanha obyeng-ẹ k'eho m'itzitzikha s'agbaanotte pẹ. Ttẹwọr m'ewu nduma, Egwugwuma ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ẹhakha ttara ẹfa ẹnwa Devid. Mẹ wọ, Samwẹl obina ọbhana ka Rama.
1SA 16:14 Wa Egwugwuma ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ekk'Saul ọbọhk ẹtta. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obiro ọtzọhm egwugwuma-tzama ẹyakh-ẹ atzim.
1SA 16:15 Atzọhmnọng pa kẹ Saul aben-ẹ bi, “Kker e, egwugwuma-tzama ch'Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhmi dọ ẹm-ẹyakh-ọ aztim ma e.
1SA 16:16 Tte itta kwaman ọtzọhm maman atzọhmnọng pẹ ma, mọtza oror ọnọng kw'ofha okhir ọgangaang. Mada egwugwuma-tzama nduma ẹ́nwọ-ọ, kẹ ókhir ọ́nang-ọ, for igaang-ọ.
1SA 16:17 Mẹ wọ, Saul oben atzọhmnọng pẹ bi, “Bọng nor ọnọng kw'okpo ọgangaang okhikhir, achen-m.”
1SA 16:18 Ọtzọhmnọng wani on-obhina bi, “Kaam nkk'nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Jẹsẹ kw'ofon Bẹtẹlẹhẹm kw'okpo ọgangaang okhikhir nna e. Kẹ ode ọkkakkaama, ọmaana okkenggitza, ọkhaama ekkoji ch'etzim-gbaakha, obiro ojibh odikkobh. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obir owobha ttar-ẹ.”
1SA 16:19 Mẹ wọ, Saul ọtzọhm akkaabh-nkkaabha ochena Jẹsẹ, oben bi, “Tzọhm nnwa kwọ Devid, kw'om-okkeri arukhimaan achen-m.”
1SA 16:20 Mẹ wọ, Jẹsẹ ọtzọkha ẹnyanyaang ch'ọnan brẹd, ọmaana otzuk-gbere, ọmaana ovu-nwa ttara ka nnwa kwẹ Devid ọtzọhm ochena Saul.
1SA 16:21 Devid okwu owobha k'irekh-irek kwa Saul. Ọdaak Saul idik m'ejibh-ejibha maa, Devid on-okwu ode otzim-egbongkpo kwẹ.
1SA 16:22 Mẹ wọ, Saul ọtzọhm ẹkkaabha ọnang Jẹsẹ oben bi, “Tte Devid ọbọhk owobha ma osi ọtzọhm faam, okhuri bi, osi ettem ẹdaam-m.”
1SA 16:23 Ogbe kpenamkpen kw'egwugwuma ch'efon k'Ibinọkpaabyi ẹnwa Saul, Devid ọm-ọtzọkha ọgangaang okhir. Yina for in-igaangi Saul, ọgbagbatzama nwa obiro ọttẹ-ẹ ọbọhk.
1SA 17:1 Mẹ wọ, wa aPhilistiya ado for s'egbong. Bẹ ayeri agbong-nọng pabẹ atzobha ka Soko k'ẹkhọma cha Juda. Wa bẹ attima ibhingabe sabẹ k'Ẹphẹs-Damim, kw'owobh k'ottem kwa Soko ọmaana Azeka.
1SA 17:2 Wa Saul ọmaana anọng p'Israẹl attima ibhingabe sabẹ k'ẹttẹri ch'Ela, bẹ atzari ọkpaama kwabẹ bi bẹ arima aPhilistiya abẹ.
1SA 17:3 Wa aPhilistiya abe k'egbegbeho dani, anọng p'Israẹl abe k'egbegbeho ndongo, akhe ẹttẹr m'ottem.
1SA 17:4 Okkengitza wani kw'okpen Golayat, kw'ofon Gat, ofona k'ibhingabe s'aPhilistiya oyin k'iyaan. Kẹ wa odumi ebe ọyọhnga ndọhkhi ọhawani.
1SA 17:5 Wa kẹ ọfọr ikpo sa brons k'eho, obiro ọfọra egbong-nya cha bẹ atzim brons asi, py'epyiri ashẹkẹl nnọhna jobh obhiri mfa obhiri arọbh jobh.
1SA 17:6 Ka mmo, okhe ekpo-pya-mmo pya brons, ka nnam, obiro orena ọkhọhn kw'ode brons.
1SA 17:7 Ẹkhọhnmma ch'oyuk kwẹ eroni mach'irokka, epyiri ashẹkẹl ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh jobh. Otzim-ọkhọhnkpa kwẹ, otzima ọkhọhnkpa ochẹ-ẹ eden.
1SA 17:8 Wa Golayat obe, obiro ọkpẹbh ngaan agbong-nọng p'Israẹl amọng, ọbọbh bi, “Ode yan kwa bọng ayini k'iyaan abe k'odik bi, bọng arima egbong o? Kaam wọ nde okkenggitza kw'aPhilistiya, bọbọng biphyir ade atzọhmnọng pa Saul. Bọng dekha ejinọng-dim chabọng oyin ka, ẹhakha ekwu erim-m abẹ.
1SA 17:9 Idikha kẹ ofha orim-m abẹ, obiro ofhu-m, maman biphyir on-ode abira pabọng, yina, idikha kaam nnyọhng-ẹ mkpaan, mbiri mfhẹ-ẹ, maman óde abitta pabọng, bọbọng án-ade abira paman.”
1SA 17:10 Mẹ wọ e, oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa oben bi, “Mayina, kaam nkkaar agbong-nọng p'Israẹl ẹmma. Bọng nang-m ojinọng kwa morima ayok abẹ.”
1SA 17:11 Mada Saul omaana anọng p'Israẹl biphyir abhaang ọmma-kkakkaari kw'oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa ọm-ọnang bẹ, ojora bẹ, bẹ afọni ẹkpẹkpa biphyir.
1SA 17:12 Devid kẹ wa ode nnwa kwa Jẹsẹ, kw'ofon k'obhon kw'Ẹphrat ka Bẹtẹlẹhẹm k'ẹkhọma cha Juda. Wa Jẹsẹ ọkhaam va p'ijinọng azenanttaan, obiro ode ọnọng kw'ọkk'ọtzama k'ogbe kwa Saul ọdabhi ẹvaar.
1SA 17:13 Wa acheden va p'ijinọng attaan pa Jẹsẹ atzọni Saul abẹ atza egbong. Ocheden okpen Eliyab, ojemẹ okpena Abinadab, ottong attaan okpena Shama.
1SA 17:14 Iwa Devid wọ ode okpong-nnam kw'ayok biphyir. Ayok mbanga anọng attaan p'akk'abara, bọ iwa atzọni Saul abẹ atza egbong,
1SA 17:15 yina, wa Devid ọm-ọtza ka Saul ọkpa nnam otza okkeri arukhimaan p'otte ka Bẹtẹlẹhẹm.
1SA 17:16 K'iwu arọbh afa oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa om-ofona k'ibhingabe sabẹ, okwu okkaar ẹmma ọnang anọng p'Israẹl.
1SA 17:17 Wa Jẹsẹ oben nnwa kwẹ Devid bi, “Yoma ẹgbangbang-dim ch'abọkpa-bhabha attara ka brẹd jobh, atzima achena abagbaanatte ẹbhar-ẹbhar k'ibhingabe sabẹ.
1SA 17:18 Kọ biri tzọhka abukpa k'obe jobh anang odenho kwabẹ. Abira atza are eden cha bẹ awobh kẹ, akpa nnam akwu agbaakh-m.
1SA 17:19 Wa bẹ awobh kẹ da Saul owobh, ttara agbong-nọng p'Israẹl biphyir kẹnya ẹttẹri ch'Ela, am-arima aPhilistiya abẹ.”
1SA 17:20 K'ekpekpebha Devid otte arukhimaan p'om-okkeri ọbọhk ọnang ọnọng kw'om-okkeri etzirakpo, ofona ọtza osi macha Jẹsẹ okk'obena. Wa opyiri k'ibhingabe da agbong-nọng am-ayin k'iyaan abe k'ọkpaama, bẹ am-awuri egbongmọng.
1SA 17:21 Wa anọng p'Israẹl ọmaana aPhilistiya am-atzari akpaama, akkeri ayok itzitzikha.
1SA 17:22 Wa Devid ọtzọkha ekpo py'otzim ọgbaara ọnọng kw'om-okkeri egbongkpo, ọrọbh ochina k'egbong-dam ọtza okhebha agbaanotte pẹ kẹ, orima bẹ.
1SA 17:23 Mada Devid otzim-om-ọgbaak atzim ttara bẹ, Golayat kw'ode okkenggitza kwa Philistiya kw'ofon Gat oyin okwu obe m'akpaama. Ọkpẹbh amọng p'ọm-ọkpẹbh, Devid obe kẹ ọbhaanga.
1SA 17:24 Mada anọng p'Israẹl are ojinọng nwa, ojora f'ideden osi bẹ biphyir, bẹ atzọr akpa nnam.
1SA 17:25 Mẹ wọ, anọng p'Israẹl an-am-aben ayok bi, “Bọng am-are da ojinọng nwa om-oyin k'iyaan ogbe kpenamkpen o? Om-oyin okwu ọkkaara anọng p'Israẹl ẹmma e. Ọnọng kw'ofhu ojinọng nwa, ọvaarnọng ọ́nang-ẹ ikkọr s'ideden, óbiro ọ́nang-ẹ ominanwa kwẹ k'ọbada, óbiro ọ́rọbha otte kw'ọnọng nwuma k'atasi ọnanang k'Israẹl.”
1SA 17:26 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọbọbh ajinọng p'abe abaang-ẹ bi, “Mbọng fa bẹ ási ánang ọnọng kw'ofhu oPhilistiya nwa, kw'óbiro ọ́rọbha anọng p'Israẹl ka mgbar nna o? Anyi wọ ode oPhilistiya nwa kw'oni ọkpakkọrikkọr osi, ọm-ọkkaara agbong-nọng p'Ibinọkpaabyi kw'orukhi akpen ẹmma o?”
1SA 17:27 Bẹ abira agbaakh-ẹ mach'ira bẹ akk'am-agbaakha bi, “Ma wọ ode ọttọhk fa bẹ ási ánang ọnang kw'ófhu ojinọng nwa.”
1SA 17:28 Mada Eliyab kw'ode ọgbaanọtte kwa Devid kw'ideden, ọbhaang da Devid om-ọgbaak atzim ọmaana ajinọng mba, ettem epyibh-ẹ etzima etzor-ẹ, ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Mbọng vọ otzim-ọ okwu ma o? Kọ atte arukhimaan p'an-akkọri ọbọhk k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi anang anyi bi, okker o? Kaam nnong odem kw'age for, abira apyibh achibhi kẹ, akwu bi akwu are egbong nda e.”
1SA 17:29 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọbọbh bi, “Bọng odik wọ kwa nso o, ode bi, kaambi atzim bọ, nningi mgbaak o?”
1SA 17:30 Devid on-obina ọjẹ-ẹ mẹ, ochina k'ọnọng ọdọdọk ọgbaak odik nwuma wani, ajinọng mbuma abira anang-ẹ ebhina nduma dani ch'ira ayok anang-ẹ.
1SA 17:31 Wa bẹ abhaanga odik kwa Devid ọgbaakhi, bẹ afona atza agbaak Saul. Saul e, ọtzọhm bẹ ayeri Devid achen-ẹ.
1SA 17:32 Devid oben Saul bi, “Tte ọnọng manda wani oning-ẹ ojor okhuri oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa, kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ńda ọtza nda nnim-ẹ abẹ.”
1SA 17:33 Saul on-obhina Devid bi, “Atta o, kọ atzima ade nnwa-nnwa e, kọ ẹfa kakhaam ch'atza arima oPhilistiya-jinọng nnwa abẹ e, kẹ ọkk'ọttẹwọr k'edikkobh chẹ om-orima nnima e.”
1SA 17:34 Yina, Devid obhina Saul bi, “Kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, mmi nkkeri arukhimaan p'otte kwaam. Ogbe kw'ekye ekwu, obiro ode okyenyam wọ okwu bi, ọkwu ọbọkha orukhimaan wani k'arukhimaan pa ndim,
1SA 17:35 kaam e, ngwubh chẹ maa mbọkha chẹ k'iphyubha, nnọbha orukhimaan k'ẹmma chẹ, mbiri nttum chẹ mfhu.
1SA 17:36 Kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ nkk'ekye, ọmaana okyenyam ifha, mando wọ kw'óde ttara oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa kw'oni ọkpakkọrikkọ osi, okhuri bi, kẹ okk'agbong-nọng p'Ibinọkpaabyi kw'orukhi akpen olukhi kpọng-kpọng.
1SA 17:37 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'iwa ọrọbh-m ka mbọhk s'ekye, ọmaana ka mbọhk s'okyenyam, kẹ ọ́rọbh-m ọ́rọbha ka mbọhk s'oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa.” Mẹ wọ e, Saul oben Devid bi, “Rọhng, tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobha ọttar-ọ.”
1SA 17:38 Saul ọtzọkha ọnọhma-baba kwẹ ọfọra Devid. Ọtzọkha egbong-nya chẹ, ọmaana ikpo s'ide brons ọfọra k'eho.
1SA 17:39 Devid ọtzọkha ọkkaangkkaang kwa Saul ọdaabh k'erin, mada okhong bi orenga, kofha orenga, okhuri da ekpo mbya ẹn-ẹkpaang. On-oben Saul bi, “Kaam ekpo mbya kimfha ndima nnenga e.” Mẹ wọ, ọwọra pyẹ.
1SA 17:40 Mẹ wọ, ọtzọkha ochikhura kwẹ, ochina k'ehekha otzekha atza azen p'akwọhng-ọkwọhnga k'ẹttẹri, okhe bẹ k'ẹkpa ch'ọbhaak, obiro ọtzọkha ibhar-atza sẹ otzima k'ọbọhk orenga otzor oPhilistiya-jinọng nwuma ka for.
1SA 17:41 Ayongi mẹ, oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa, otzim-ọkhọnkpa kwẹ om-orenga k'itzitzikha otzor Devid ka for.
1SA 17:42 Mada oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa ore bi, Devid ode nnwa-nnwa, kw'ojibhi odikkobh obiro ojibh ka for, ọn-ọrẹ-ẹ ọkhara.
1SA 17:43 Oben Devid bi, “Ngeri ẹpfa k'itzitzikha sọ ọ, kw'atzim nchi bi, akwa arim-m abẹ?” Mẹ wọ, oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa otzima che p'akha pẹ ọsaakhi Devid.
1SA 17:44 OPhilistiya-nọng nwa oben bi, “Renga baang-m ka, mbọkh-ọ, ndọkha ayaara pọ pa for nnang ọnọhn f'ẹrọng, ọmaana nden s'ẹtzam.”
1SA 17:45 Devid e, obhina oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa bi, “Kọ atzim ọkkangkkaang, ọmaana oyuk ttara ọkhọhn bi, akwu arim-m abẹ, yina, kaam nkwu ttara che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'agbong-nọng p'Israẹl, pa kọ am-akkaara ẹmma.
1SA 17:46 Mẹ wọ, mayina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọ́tzọkh-ọ ókhe-m ka mbọhk, ifha kaam ḿfhọ-ọ, ḿbiri ḿkpaara eho chọ. Mayina, kaam ńdọkha abukhi p'agbong-nọng mba p'aPhilistiya ńnang ọnọhn f'ẹrọng, ọmaana nden s'ẹtzam, ifha ọyagbin biphyir óronga bi, Ibinọkpaabyi kw'anọng p'Israẹl owobh kẹ.
1SA 17:47 Anọng mba biphyir p'atzobh ma, aronga bi, ọkkangkkaang ọmaana ọkhọhn araang p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi om-otzima ọkkaana anọng, da erima nda ede ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kẹ wọ ọ́tzọkha bọng ókhe man ka mbọhk.”
1SA 17:48 Mada oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa oreng ọbaanga bi orima Devid abẹ, Devid ọn-ọrọbh otzor-ẹ ka for k'ọkpaama.
1SA 17:49 Devid ọnọhma ọbọhk k'ẹkpa chẹ ọrọbha ọtza okhe k'ibhar-atza sẹ, ọtzọbh oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa m'itzitzikha-ttem. Ọtza nwuma otzor-otzor ọnwẹ-ẹ k'itzitzikha-ttem, otto okhubha itzitzikha m'irerek.
1SA 17:50 Mẹ wọ, wa Devid otzima ibhar-atza sẹ-sẹ ọmaana ọtza okhema oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa, kaambi da iwa oni ọkkangkkaang otzim, wa okhebha mẹ ọfhẹ-ẹ.
1SA 17:51 Devid ottima ẹbhar otza okhebh-ẹ kẹ da otto, ọrọbha ọkkangkkaang kw'oPhilistiya-jinọng nwuma k'ọpa kwẹ. Mẹ wọ, otzima ọkkangkkang nwuma ọkpaar-ẹ eho bi tteng. Mẹ wọ, mada aPhilistiya an-are bi, okkenggitza kwabẹ ọkk'ọpa, bẹ abhakhi nnam arọbh.
1SA 17:52 Mẹ wọ, ajinọng p'Israẹl ọmaana pa Juda am-awuri amọng, achina ororo akhubh aPhilistiya ka nnam maa, bẹ atza apyiri k'ebhonho cha Gat, ọmaana mbaakhamma s'Ẹkrọn. Abukhi pabẹ ayima m'ọkkadeden kw'achin Sharayim maa apyiri Gat ọmaana Ẹkrọn.
1SA 17:53 Mada anọng p'Israẹl akpa nnam kẹ da bẹ akhubhi aPhilistiya, bẹ atzima ẹkhakhaama ch'ẹhaabh-ọhaabh cha bẹ achi ọgbọm atzima afona k'ibhingabe s'aPhilistiya, akhuna.
1SA 17:54 Wa Devid otzima eho ch'oPhilistiya-jinọng nwuma, ọbhana ka Jẹrusalẹm, ọtzọkha egbongkpo py'oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa, ohok k'ikhira sẹ.
1SA 17:55 Mada Saul ore da Devid om-ofona bi, otza orima oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa abẹ, wa ọbọbh Abnẹr kw'ode odenho kw'agbong-nọng bi, “Odikkobh nwa ode nnwa kw'anyi o?” Abnẹr obhina bi, “O ọvaarnọng, k'odem kw'arukhi akpen, kaam otte kwẹ kinnong e.”
1SA 17:56 Mẹ wọ, ọvaarnọng oben bi, “Rọhng atza aronga ọnọng kw'ode otte kw'odikkobh nnwa nwa.”
1SA 17:57 Mada Devid ofon kẹ da ofhu oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa okhuna bi, kpaar, Abnẹr otzim-ẹ k'ọbọhk ochena Saul, da otzim-otzim eho ch'oPhilistiya-jinọng nwa ma mbọhk.
1SA 17:58 Mẹ wọ e, Saul ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Odikkobh, kọ ade nnwa kw'anyi?” Devid obhina bi, “Kaam nde nnwa kw'ọtzọhmnọng kwọ Jẹsẹ, kw'ofon Bẹtẹlẹhẹm.”
1SA 18:1 Mẹ wọ, mada Devid okk'atzim okyera ọgbagbaak ttara Saul, Jonatan e, ọbọkha Devid ittem-yok. Devid ọn-ọdaakh-ẹ macha for sẹ idaakh-ẹ.
1SA 18:2 Ttẹwọr mẹ ewu nduma, Devid on-oruk ọmaana Saul, wa Saul dọk kokher bi, Devid ọbhana k'otte k'ọhọhm.
1SA 18:3 Wa Jonatan ọtzọkha echekhi ọmaana Devid, okhuri idadaakha s'ọkhaam ttara Devid.
1SA 18:4 Mẹ wọ, Jonatan ọwọra ọnọhma-baba kw'ọfọr ka for, ọmaana ẹnya ẹdọdọk, ọmaana ọkkangkkaang, akwu attara k'oyuk, ọmaana mkpansin kwẹ, ọtzọkha ọnang Devid.
1SA 18:5 Wa Devid om-osi kpenamkpen fa Saul ọtzọhm-ẹ k'eden ọkkakka, ofona mẹ, Saul ọsẹ-ẹ odenho kw'agbong-nọng. Wa odik nwa ọdaam anọng biphyir, ttara akhaan-nọng pa Saul ettem.
1SA 18:6 Mada ajinọng mba am-akhuna da Devid okk'okkenggitza kw'aPhilistiya ọfha, panọng k'ibhon s'Israẹl biphyir, an-abina ttara ọkkọhna kw'ọdadaami ọmaana otzubha, ọmaana mbin, ttara agaangaang atza akhebha ọvaar Saul.
1SA 18:7 Mada bẹ atzubhi, bẹ akkọhn aben bi, “Saul okk'nnọhna sẹ ọfha, Devid okk'nnọhna-nabhik sẹ ọfha.”
1SA 18:8 Wa Saul ẹmọng nda kẹ kẹdaakhi, ọdọkh-ẹ kpọng-kpọng da ochibhi bi, “Bẹ akk'Devid atzọhnga ttara che cha nnọhna-nabhik, yina, kaam bẹ atzọhng-m ttara nnọhna sẹ-sẹ. Mbọng vọ on-orik oyongi bi okyera ẹvaar nda ọtzọkha!”
1SA 18:9 Ttẹwọr m'ewu nduma, Saul ọn-ọkhaama ottemmamma otzima otzor Devid.
1SA 18:10 Ewu ch'ejem mẹ, egwugwuma-tzama ch'efon k'Ibinọkpaabyi ẹnwa Saul itzama-itzama. Wa kẹ ọm-ọgbaak aborokko k'ọhọhm kwẹ, Devid om-okhir ọgaang-gaang ọnang-ẹ mach'om-okkekkeni okhir. Wa Saul otzim ọkhọhn k'ọbọhk kwẹ.
1SA 18:11 Saul ọbhari ọkhọhn nwa, ochibhi k'ettem chẹ bi, “Ńgum Devid mmaana k'echumi.” Yina, wa Devid ọrọbh ọnaanga k'igbe manda ifa.
1SA 18:12 Wa Devid on-ojora Saul, okhuri da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi on-owobh ọmaana Devid, yina, okk'Saul ọbọhk ọtta.
1SA 18:13 Mẹ wọ, wa Saul okhubh Devid k'ọhọhm kwẹ, ọn-ọsẹ-ẹ odenho kw'agbong-nọng p'ayongi anọng nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh. Wa Devid om-otzima agbong-nọng mba eden, bẹ atza mgbong akhuna.
1SA 18:14 Ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'iwa Devid osi om-ojibh-ojibh, okhuri da iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ttar-ẹ.
1SA 18:15 Mada Saul ore bi ọttọhk kpenamkpen fa Devid osi om-ojibh-ojibh, wa Devid ojora Saul.
1SA 18:16 Yina, wa Devid ọdaakhi anọng p'Israẹl ọmaana pa Juda biphyir idik, okhuri da iwa om-otzima agbong-nọng ọtza egbong akhuna.
1SA 18:17 Mẹ wọ, Saul oben Devid bi, “Kkeri Mẹrab kw'ode ocheden-nwa kwaam kw'ikwanọng ma. Kaam ńdọkh-ẹ ńnang-ọ k'ọbada, ka ntak bi, kọ si ọtzọhm anang-m mach'okkenggitza, abira arima mgbong s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.” Wa Saul ochibhi, oben k'ettem bi, “Kaam kẹ ọbọhk kwaam kínttọmi. Tte aPhilistiya afhẹ-ẹ!”
1SA 18:18 Mando kwa Devid on-obeni Saul bi, “Akpen paam ape mbọng o, echimma chaam, ọmaana efonamma chaam ade bọng anọng m'Israẹl o, kw'ira kaam nna nde ọnyẹ kw'ọvaarnọng o?”
1SA 18:19 Mẹ wọ e, mada on-opyiri m'ogbe kw'ira ọbaan bi, bẹ an-atzọkha Mẹrab kw'ode ominanwa kwa Saul, anang Devid k'ọbada, bẹ an-atzọkh-ẹ anang Adriyẹl kw'ofon Mẹhola, k'ọbada.
1SA 18:20 Wa Devid okwu ọdaak Mikal kw'ode nnwa kwa Saul kw'ikwanọng. Mada Saul ọbhaang odik nwa, ettem ẹdaam-ẹ.
1SA 18:21 Saul on-ochibhi k'ettem bi, “Kaam ńdọkha Mikal ńnang-ẹ k'ọbada, ifha ndim-ẹ nsi otzena, ttara bi aPhilistiya afha arenga mẹ, afhẹ-ẹ.” Mẹ wọ, Saul on-oben Devid bi, “Kọ akk'ọphaangi ọdọdọk abira akhaama bi, ade ọnyẹ kwaam e.”
1SA 18:22 Wa Saul ọtzọhn akhaan-nọng pẹ bi, “Bọng nọng atza agbaak Devid atzim k'ide-afa, aben bi, ‘Kkeri ka e, kọ adaakhi ọvaarnọng idik kpọng-kpọng e, mando kw'abira adaak akhaan-nọng pẹ biphyir idikh e, mẹ wọ, kọ khera bi, áde ọnyẹ kwẹ ode.’ ”
1SA 18:23 Wa bẹ agbaak Devid odik kwa Saul ọtzọhni bẹ bi, bẹ agbaakh-ẹ. Yina, wa Devid oben bẹ bi, “Kwẹ okheri bọng ididikha k'achibhi pabọng bi, ọnọng ode ọnyẹ kw'ọvaarnọng o? Kaam mach'anyi o? Kaam nde ogbogbora e, anọng kaam kabira aronga.”
1SA 18:24 Mada akhaan-nọng pa Saul agbaakh-ẹ eden cha Devid ọgbaakhi bẹ,
1SA 18:25 Saul on-oben bi, “Bọng ben Devid bi, ‘Ọvaarnọng, imina ọdọdọk korori e, oyongi mkpatzọr arọbh azen s'aPhilistiya, ifha otzima otzukha idik s'attattaanga-nọng pẹ akk'ẹ asa.’ ” Wa Saul ọkhami bi, aPhilistiya afhu Devid.
1SA 18:26 Mada akhaan-nọng pa Saul agbaakhi Devid idik nna, wa ettem ẹdaam-ẹ bi, kẹ ón-ode ọnyẹ kw'ọvaarnọng. Mẹ wọ, yina ogbe kw'ọkhẹ-ẹ opyiri,
1SA 18:27 Devid ọmaana agbong-nọng pẹ abina atza afhu aPhilistiya arọbh jobh, otzima mkpatzọr sabẹ biphyir ochena ọvaarnọng, ifha on-ode ọnyẹ kw'ọvaarnọng. Mẹ wọ, Saul ọtzọkha nnwa kwẹ Mikal ọnang Devid k'ọbada.
1SA 18:28 Mada Saul okwu otzin bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ttara Devid, ọmaana bi, nnwa kwẹ Mikal, Devid ọdaakh-ẹ ọdaak,
1SA 18:29 Saul e, Devid ọn-ọdẹ-ẹ ojor-ojora, on-obiro ohok Devid k'ittattaanga k'akpen pẹ biphyir.
1SA 18:30 Wa adenho p'agbong-nọng p'aPhilistiya achina ororo atza egbong, yina, k'ogbe kpenamkpen kwa bẹ atza, Devid ọm-ọkhaama ọwọbh ọtzam ọyọhnga akhaan-nọng pa Saul biphyir, ofona mẹ, Devid ọn-ọtza che.
1SA 19:1 Iwa Saul ọgbaakhi nnwa kwẹ Jonatan, ọmaana akhaan-nọng pa kẹ Saul biphyir bi, bẹ afhu Devid. Yina, da wa Jonatan osi Devid oyokh-odikkobh-ttem chẹ,
1SA 19:2 Jonatan ọn-ọtzọr Devid itzọhng, oben-ẹ bi, “Otte kwaam Saul ọm-ọkham bi, ọfhọ-ọ e. Kker-ọ for o, ophyini k'ekpebha ror eden arọbh, atza aror ibe achubha.
1SA 19:3 Kaam ńdọn otte kwaam abẹ, mbẹ-ẹ mẹ ẹbhabhaanga m'ibe s'achubh, ḿgbaakh-ẹ odik okhuri kọ, ifha ńkwu ḿgbaakh-ọ ebhina chẹ.”
1SA 19:4 Wa Jonatan ọgbaak ejibha cha Devid ọnang otte Saul, oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ ọvaarnọng, ọtzọhmnọng kwọ Devid itzama kàsi, okhuri bi, kẹ kọ itzama kosi, ayongi mẹ, kọ akk'iru s'ideden atzọkha k'idik s'ọkk'ọsa.
1SA 19:5 Kẹ wa okher obo k'ogbe kw'ofhu oPhilistiya nwa. Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang anọng p'Israẹl biphyir ekhema, ch'atzim chen pọ are, ettem ebire ẹdaam-ọ. Ira on-orenga yan kọ asi ọnọng macha Devid kw'oni ottotto ọkhaam itzama, am-abira achibhi bi afhẹ-ẹ o?”
1SA 19:6 Wa Saul okhera odik kwa Jonatan ọgbaakhi, ọtzọkha ọnwọhngi oben bi, “K'odik ọkka kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'orukhi akpen, bẹ Devid káfhu.”
1SA 19:7 Mẹ wọ, Jonatan oyeri Devid ọgbaakh-ẹ idik nna biphyir, otzim-ẹ ọkpa nnam ka Saul, wa Devid obiro oruk ttara Saul mach'iwa orukhi.
1SA 19:8 Wa egbong ebire etto, Devid ọtza orima aPhilistiya abẹ, ofhu bẹ k'ọhaabh maa, bẹ arọbh ajẹ-ẹ.
1SA 19:9 Yina, mada Saul owobh ẹwọr k'ọhọhm kwẹ ọmaana ọkhọhn kw'otzim k'ọbọhk, wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otte egwugwuma-tzama ọbọhk ẹnwẹ-ẹ. K'ogbe kwa Devid om-okhir ọgaang-gang,
1SA 19:10 Saul okhonga bi, okhum-ẹ ọkhọhn ọmana k'echumi, yina, wa Devid ọrọbh ọnaanga. M'erungiwu nduma Devid ọrọbh ọnaanga, ọkkaana akpen pẹ.
1SA 19:11 Wa Saul ọtzọhm ajinọng bẹ atza abaabha ọhọhm kwa Devid m'erungiwu nduma, ifha bẹ afhẹ-ẹ k'ekpebha. Yina, wa Mikal, kw'ode kwanọng kwa Devid, ọtzọr odim Devid itzọhng bi, “Idikha an-arori bi ape m'erungiwu cha mayina, arọbh akkaana akpen pọ, ophyini bẹ afhọ-ọ ofhu e.”
1SA 19:12 Mẹ wọ, Mikal orenga ka ọmma kw'ikhakhari kw'echumi ọkkaana Devid. Devid ọrọbh ọnaanga.
1SA 19:13 Mikal e, ọn-ọtzọkha ọgbatza oruri k'eyima, ọtzọkha ẹnọhmakpa obubh-ẹ, obiro ọtzọkh-ẹ ọnana eho k'ichikhuma s'ivu-phyubha.
1SA 19:14 Mada Saul ọtzọhmi ajinọng mba bi, bẹ atza abọkha Devid, Mikal ọgbaak bẹ bi, “Devid ọmmẹ-ẹ ọmma e.”
1SA 19:15 Mẹ wọ, Saul ọtzọhm ajinọng mbuma bẹ akpa nnam ka Devid, oben bẹ bi, “Bọng din-ẹ k'eyima chẹ ch'oyim achen-m, ifha mfhẹ-ẹ.”
1SA 19:16 Yina, mada ajinọng mba an-adimi k'ọhọhm kwa Devid, bẹ atza are bi, ọgbatza kw'ọnan eho k'ichikhuma s'ivu-phyubha wọ oyim kẹ.
1SA 19:17 Wa Saul ọn-ọbọbh Mikal bi, “Ode yan kw'abọr-m manda maa, asi ọttattaanga-nọng kwaam ọrọbh o?” Mikal obhin-ẹ bi, “Kẹ oben-m bi, ‘Idikha nnẹ-ẹ ọbọhk ntte ọrọbh, kẹ ófhu-m ófhu.’ ”
1SA 19:18 Mada Devid ọkk'ọrọbha otza okhebha Samwẹl ka Rama, ọtzọkha odik kpenamkpen kwa Saul ọkk'ẹ ọsa ọgbaakh-ẹ. Mẹ wọ, kẹ ttara Samwẹl bẹ afona achina ka Naiyọt atza aruk kẹ.
1SA 19:19 Wa ẹkkaabha epyiri Saul, bẹ agbaakh-ẹ bi, “Devid orukhi ka Naiyọt k'okhubha kwa Rama e.”
1SA 19:20 Mẹ wọ, wa Saul ọtzọhm akkaabh-nkkaabha bi, bẹ atza abọkha Devid achen-ẹ. Yina, mada bẹ apyiri kẹ, bẹ are da ẹkhaan ch'asi-ẹjaakhi am-agbaak ettem ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọmaana Samwẹl kw'obe mẹ mach'otzim eden kwabẹ, Egwugwuma ch'Ibinọkpaabyi ẹhakha ẹnwa ajinọng mba pa Saul, bẹ abira agbaak ettem ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 19:21 Wa Saul ọbhaanga odik nwa, obiro ọtzọhm akkaabh-nkkaabha adọdọk p'ahaabhi ayọhnga p'ira ochenden ọtzọhm, ayok mba abira agbaak ettem ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Mẹ wọ e, Saul obir ọtzọhm ẹkhaan ch'ettong nttaan, bẹbẹ abira agbaak ettem ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi mach'ayok.
1SA 19:22 K'ekponga-nnam kẹ ọkhaam ma for sẹ on-obina ochina ka Rama k'esipe ch'ideden ch'ewobh ka Seku. Mada opyiri kẹ, ọbọbh bi, “Man kwa Samwẹl ọmaana Devid bẹ awobh o?” Bẹ abhina bi, “Bẹ awobh ka Naiyọt ka Rama e.”
1SA 19:23 Mẹ wọ, Saul ofona ochina ka Naiyọt k'ẹkhọma cha Rama. Yina, Egwugwuma ch'Ibinọkpaabyi ẹhakha ẹnwa Saul dọk, ọttẹwọr mẹ da oreng osi ẹjaakhi maa opyiri ka Naiyọt.
1SA 19:24 Wa ọwọra ọnọhma-baba kwẹ, osi ẹjaakhi m'itzitzikha sa Samwẹl. On-oyima ikpakpadukhi k'erungiwu nduma, ọmaana ẹya nduma biphyir. Kẹ wọ osi anọng an-am-abọbh bi, “Ode bi Saul kẹ obiro ode wani k'ottem kw'asi-ẹjaakh o?”
1SA 20:1 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọrọbh ka Naiyọt k'ẹkhọma cha Rama, otza okhebha Jonatan, ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Bọng odik kwa kaam nsi o? Kaam nji bọng odikh o? Bọng itzama rọ sa kaam nsi atte, kw'ọm-ọkham bi ofhu-m o?”
1SA 20:2 Jonatan obhin-ẹ bi, “Kwẹ mando kode! Kọ ópe-ope kape! Tte mgbaakh-ọ e, odik kode kw'otte kwaam ọkhami bi osi, kw'ọn'aam ọm-ọgbaak. On-orenga yan odubh-m nwa o? Kwẹ mando kode!”
1SA 20:3 Yina, Devid ọnwọhngi oben bi, “K'odik ọkkakka, atte orong eden cha kaam ndaakh-ọ idik mpyiri kẹ e, kẹ okk'obena k'ettem bi, ‘Jonatan kọkhaambi oronga odik nwa, oni mando ode, ettem kẹ kẹ́daam.’ Yina, odem nwa kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, ọmaana odem nwa kwa kọ abira aruk akpen, kaam nna nwobh k'ottem kw'obo ọmaana akpen e.”
1SA 20:4 Jonatan oben Devid bi, “Odik kpenamkpen kw'abeni bi nsi, kaam ńsi-osi ńnang-ọ.”
1SA 20:5 Mẹ wọ, Devid oben Jonatan bi, “Jima bi, ophyini wọ ode ẹdadaamiwu ch'ophe ọbhakwẹ, kw'ira ọbaana bi, kaam nchi ọchattọhk ttara ọvaarnọng. Yina, tte nda nchubha k'owoni maa opyiri ophyini k'ẹchọhkha.
1SA 20:6 Idikha atte ọbọbh-ọ kaam, gbaakh-ẹ bi, ‘Ira Devid ọtzọk ẹfa bi, nttẹ-ẹ ọbọhk ọtza ka Bẹtẹlẹhẹm kw'ode obhon kwẹ, okhuri da bẹ am-afọhni ẹja cha cho k'ẹhọhmmọr chẹ.’
1SA 20:7 Idikha obeni bi, ‘Ojibhi kẹ,’ oyini bi, odik kode. Yina, idikha ettem epyibh-ẹ, ronga bi, ọkhami itzima k'ettem otzima otzor-m.
1SA 20:8 Kọ si ejibha atzima atzor kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, atzor k'echekhi ch'akk'asa ttar-m, k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Idikha aponga apyibh-m, kọ fhu-m ka for sọ! On-orenga yan kw'an-atte-m ọbọhk anang atte ofhu o?”
1SA 20:9 Jonatan oben bi, “Kwẹ mando kode! Ode bi kaam mmaang yabhi-yabhi bi, otte kwaam ọkhami bi, ọfhọ-ọ, kọ kímgbaakh o?”
1SA 20:10 Devid ọn-ọbọbh Jonatan bi, “Kaam ńnenga yan ńnonga, idikha ira atte obhin-ọ k'idọdọhkhi?”
1SA 20:11 Jonatan oben Devid bi, “Kọ kwu mochina k'owoni.” Iwa bẹ atzọn achina k'owoni.
1SA 20:12 Mẹ wọ, Jonatan oben Devid bi, “Kaam nwọhngi k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl bi, k'iwu ifa k'itzitzikha kaam ḿgbaak otte kwaam odik nwa ọgbaak. Idikha kẹ ọkhaam ochibhi ọkkakka okhur-ọ, kaam ńnsọ-ọ ósi aronga.
1SA 20:13 Yina, idikha otte kwaam ọkhami bi ọsọ-ọ itzama, kaam ńnsọ-ọ osi aronga, kaam mbiri nkkaan-ọ ọkkaana bi arọbh afona. Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang kaam Jonatan ettuma ch'ẹbaan-m, nni mando nsi. Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobha ttar-ọ, mach'okk'owobha ttara otte kwaam.
1SA 20:14 Yina, kọ khọkh-m idadaakha s'idum eden macha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, atzor k'odem kwa ńnuk akpen nduma, ifha bẹ aningi kaam afhu.
1SA 20:15 Kọ idadaakha sọ kàkpaara k'ẹhọhmmọr chaam, kaambi k'ogbe kw'ikhina Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'attattaanga-nọng pa kọ Devid biphyir odimi m'ọyagbin wọ.”
1SA 20:16 Mẹ wọ, wa Jonatan osi echekhi ttara ẹhọhmmọr cha Devid, oben bi, “Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang attattaanga-nọng pa kọ Devid ettuma ch'ẹbaan bẹ.”
1SA 20:17 Wa Jonatan oben Devid bi obiro ọtzọkha ọnwọhngi k'idadaakha sa kẹ Devid ọkhaam ttar-ẹ, okhuri da iwa Jonatan, Devid ọdaakh-ẹ macha fọr sa kẹ ọkhaam.
1SA 20:18 Wa Jonatan oben Devid bi, “Ophyini wọ ode ọdadaami kw'ophe ọbhakwẹ. Anọng árong-óronga bi kọ kade, da ọnọng oni ẹwọr k'ogbera kwọ ówobha.
1SA 20:19 K'ẹchọhkha ch'iwu ifa k'itzitzikha, rọhng k'ibe nnuma s'iwa achubh mada odik nnwa ọttẹwọr, achubha mẹ ọtza kw'Ẹzẹl atzik.
1SA 20:20 Kaam ńtta ayuk attaan k'okhubha wani kw'ọtza nwuma, macha ngami bi ntta ọttọhk.
1SA 20:21 Mẹ wọ, ńdọhm odikkobh, mben-ẹ bi, ‘Rọhng atza aror ayuk mba.’ Idikha abhaang da mben-ẹ bi, ‘Kkeri bẹ k'ọbọhk nwana, rọhng atza atzima bẹ akwu,’ kw'oyini bi, mbeni bi tte kọ akwu, okhuri bi, k'odik ọkkakka kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'orukhi akpen, kọ akk'anaanga, itzama kibiri ìde.
1SA 20:22 Yina, idikha mbeni odikkobh nwa bi, ‘Kker e, ayuk mba awobh ayongi mẹ da abe,’ kw'oyini bi, kọ akhaambi afona, okhuri bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọsa bi, kọ arọbh anaanga.
1SA 20:23 Yina, odik okhuri echekhi cha mọtzọk kàrama o, bi Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ode owobh-ore kwa kaam ọmaana kọ, maa ogbe ode.”
1SA 20:24 Mẹ wọ, wa Devid ochubha k'owoni. Mada ọdadaami kw'ophe ọbhakwẹ opyiri, ọvaar Saul otza owobha ẹwọr bi, ochi ọchattọhk.
1SA 20:25 Wa ọvaarnọng owobha ẹwọr mach'ẹmmaana ede, okkeri Jonatan itzitzikha, Abnẹr owobha ọbaanga Saul, yina, wa ọnọng kw'owobh k'ogbera kwa Devid kode.
1SA 20:26 Saul odik m'ewu nduma kọ̀gbaakhi, da ochibhi bi, “Asimẹ odik ọkk'ọtta okhebha Devid kw'ọsẹ-ẹ ochibhi bi, kẹ kowuri k'odem kw'ira kw'osi ọdadaami nwa, k'odik ọkkakka, kẹ kowuri k'itzitzikha s'Ibinọkpaabyi.”
1SA 20:27 Yina, ewu ehobh mẹ ch'ettong iwu ifa s'ọdadaami nwuma, Devid kobiro okwu bi, okwu owobha ẹwọr k'ogbera kwẹ. Wa Saul ọbọbh nnwa kwẹ Jonatan bi, “Ode yan kwa nnwa kwa Jẹsẹ on-ode iwu ifa ma ẹwọr ma kowobh bi, ochi ọchattọhk ttara man, ikhena ma kode, mayina ma kobiro ode dọk?”
1SA 20:28 Jonatan obhina Saul bi, “K'odik ọkka Devid ọtzọk ẹfa ophyem-m bi, nttẹ-ẹ ọbọhk ọtza ka Bẹtẹlẹhẹm.
1SA 20:29 Kẹ oben-m bi, ‘Tzotzokhaan tte-m ọbọhk mfona, okhuri bi, ẹhọhmmọr chaman esi ẹjafọhni k'obhon e, ọgbaanotte kwaam ọtzọhmi bi, kaam nda e. Idikha nkk'ọphyaam ndọkha k'itzitzikha sọ, tte nda nne agbaanotte paam.’ Kẹ wọ osi kẹ Devid ma kode bi, ochi ọchattọhk k'okpokkoro kwa kọ ọvaarnọng.”
1SA 20:30 Saul ọn-ọdọkh-ẹ ọmaana Jonatan maa oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ ade nnwa kw'ọrẹrẹkhi kwanọng, kaam nnọng kẹ bi, kọ abe ka nnam sa nnwa kwa Jẹsẹ e, mgbar nde sọ, mgbar mbiri nde s'akka kw'ọmmaan-ọ.
1SA 20:31 Eden nda cha nnwa nwuma kwa Jẹsẹ oruk akpen m'ọyagbin, kọ ọmaana ẹvaar chọ aranga káttima e. Idikha arong atzim, kọ tzim-ẹ achen-m, kkeri kẹ ọkhaambi ope.”
1SA 20:32 Jonatan ọbhakhi obhina otte Saul bi, “Da kẹ oji bọng odik, kw'ọn-ọbaan k'obo o?”
1SA 20:33 Wa Saul ọtzọkha ọkhọhn kwẹ ọbhari bi ofhu Jonatan. Mẹ wọ e, Jonatan otzin bi, otte ọkhami bi, ofhu Devid.
1SA 20:34 Jonatan obina bi bik, ọmaana idọdọkhi s'ideden. Ottong iwu ifa s'ophe, Jonatan ọchattọhk kochi, okhuri da ọdọkh-ẹ k'ọgbarsa-dik kw'otte osi ọnang Devid.
1SA 20:35 K'ekpebha ch'ewu ehobh mẹ, wa Jonatan otzima odikkobh wani otzima ochina kẹ da Devid ochubh,
1SA 20:36 oben odikkobh nwuma bi, “Rọbh ẹbhar atza aror ayuk mba pa ńtta.” Mada odikkobh nwa ọttẹwọr ọrọbh ofona, Jonatan ọtta oyuk k'odem kwa bẹ atto ayongi k'ibe s'ọn-am-ọrọbh.
1SA 20:37 Mada odikkobh nwa opyiri mẹ da oyuk kwa Jonatan otto, Jonatan ọkpẹbh-ẹ oben bi, otto k'itzitzikha sọ e.”
1SA 20:38 Jonatan on-ọkpebh, oyer-ẹ, oben bi, “Jabhi mmo ẹbhar-ẹbhar, k'eden kàbe.” Mẹ wọ, odikkobh nwuma odungi oyuk nwuma ọkpa nnam okwu okhebha itta kwẹ.
1SA 20:39 Odikkobh nwa odik manda wani kw'ọttaan-ẹ ọttaani kode, oyongi Jonatan ọmaana Devid bọ iwa arong odik kwa bẹ am-asi.
1SA 20:40 Wa Jonatan otzini egbongkpo pyẹ ọnang odikkobh nwa, oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ tzima ekpo mbya kpa nnam k'obhon.”
1SA 20:41 Mada odikkobh nwa okk'ofona, Devid obina k'ichubhabe k'okhubha kw'ẹrakha-ẹrakha, orenga ka kwabọhk kw'ọtza nwa kw'ochubh oyin ka, otza okhebha Jonatan, Devid ọrakha ottima itzitzikha k'irerek igbe ittaan orima Jonatan. Bẹ abaakha ayok, bẹ abira abhom, yina, Devid on-obhom ọyọhnga Jonatan.
1SA 20:42 Wa Jonatan on-oben Devid bi, “Na rọhng e, tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobha ttara kọ k'odidiri. Mada mokk'eyok-chekhi nda ọsa, ‘Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ode owobh-ore kwaman, ttara va pa va pọ, ọmaana va pa va paam maa ogbe ode.’ ” Wa Devid obina ofona, Jonatan obiro ọkpa nnam k'obhon.
1SA 21:1 Wa Devid ọrọbh ochina k'obhon kwa Nọb, otza okhebha Ahimẹlẹk kw'ode ọfọhn-ẹja. Mada Ahimẹlẹk ottem-ẹ abẹ, opoma ọsẹ-ẹ, ọbọbh bi, “Ode yan kw'areng mancheni o? Mbọng vọ osi ọnọng kọ abẹ kọ̀tzọni?”
1SA 21:2 Devid obhina Ahimẹlẹk bi, “Ọvaar Saul ọtzọr-m itzọhng oben-m bi, ‘Ọnọng manda wani oningi ọtzọhm fa ndọhm-ọ ọmaana ndọhna sa kaam nnang-ọ orong o.’ Kaam nkk'agbong-nọng paam mbena bi, bẹ atzikh-m k'ibe rani kẹ e.
1SA 21:3 Kọ akhaam mbọng ka mbọhkh o? Kọ nang-m brẹd-duk azen, ode ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'akhaam nang-m.”
1SA 21:4 Yina, ọfọhn-ẹja nwuma obhina Devid bi, “Kaam brẹd kw'oni ọttọhk ope bi kpaar ka mbọhk kingaam e. Yina, idikha ira ajinọng mba ani panọng abẹ ayim, kaam ndim brẹd kw'awurada ma e.”
1SA 21:5 Devid obhina bi, “K'odik ọkkakka, man panọng abẹ koyim e mach'om-okkekkeni ode k'ogbe kpenamkpen kwa moyini k'iyaan e. Ijinọng-for saman iwuri ka e, kaambi ira k'itzọhm s'awurada arang, ọn-ọyọhng ewu cha mayina o.”
1SA 21:6 Mẹ wọ, ọfọhn-ẹja nwa ọnang-ẹ brẹd nwa kw'awurada, okhuri da ọdọdọk on-ode, oyongi brẹd kw'okpokkoro kw'awurada kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, bẹ atzọkha atzera brẹd kwa bẹ arami akkima m'ewu nduma dani.
1SA 21:7 Wa ọkhaam ọtzọhmnọng wani kwa Saul kw'owobh mẹ m'ewu nduma, kwa bẹ abọk ahok okhuri ọtzọhm f'ọkhaam bi osi m'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi k'itzitzikha. Kẹ wa okpen Doẹg ofona Edom, obiro ode oho kw'akkeri-arukhimaan pa Saul.
1SA 21:8 Devid oben Ahimẹlẹk bi, “Ode bi kọ ọkhọhn, obiro ode ọkkaangkkaang kakhaam kw'anang-m o? Kaam ọkkaangkkaang kwaam, obir ode ogbongttọhk manda vani kindim nkwu ma e, okhuri da ọvaar Saul ọtzọhm-m ọtzọhm f'idudukha.”
1SA 21:9 Ọfọhn-ẹja nwa obhin-ẹ bi, “Ọkkaangkkaang kw'owobh ma, ode nwuma kwa Golayat kw'ofon Philistiya, kw'iwa afhu k'igbegbewọna s'Ẹla. Bẹ abhọr-ẹ k'ọbara ahok k'ẹphọd nnam-annam. Idikha abeni bi, atzọkh-ẹ, kọ tzọkha, ọkkaangkkaang ọdọdọk ma kode, oyongi nwuma.” Devid oben bi, “Ọdọdọk kw'ode macha nwuma kode. Kọ tzọkh-ẹ anang-m.”
1SA 21:10 M'ewu nduma, Devid ọrọbh ka Saul, ochina k'Akish, kw'ode ọvaarnọng kwa Gat.
1SA 21:11 Yina, atzọhmnọng p'Akish abọbh-ẹ bi, “Devid kw'ode ọvaarnọng kw'irek s'Israẹl arang ma o? Kẹ rang ode ọnọng kwa bẹ am-akkọhn ka mbin sabẹ aben bi: ‘Saul okk'nnọhna sẹ ọfha, Devid okk'nnọhna-nabhik sẹ ọfha o’?”
1SA 21:12 Wa Devid ọtzọkha atzim mba okhe k'ettem, Akish kw'ode ọvaarnọng kwa Gat on-ojora Devid maa ọkwọbha eden.
1SA 21:13 Mẹ wọ, Devid on-osi nkkari otzubh-etzen ma bẹ k'itzitzikha. M'itzitzikha sabẹ, on-osi idik mach'otzubh-etzen-nọng, ọkkẹr ekpo ka mgbaakhamma, om-obiro otte attabọhng ọbọhk asaarẹ-ẹ k'agbaphyubha.
1SA 21:14 Akish on-oben akhaan-nọng pẹ bi, “Bọng kkeri ojinọng nwuma kwa bọng am-atzima achen-m e, osi etzubh-etzen. Bọng atzim-ẹ akwu mbọng o?
1SA 21:15 Ode bi, atzubh-etzen-tzena ma dọk kingaam, kwa bọng abira atza atzima oyok nwa achen-m bi, om-otzubh-etzen m'itzitzikha saam o? Ma ọnọng dema nwa obir ode okhekhennọng kwaam o?”
1SA 22:1 Wa Devid obina oji Gat, ọrọbh otza ochubha k'ọtzakpamma kw'Adulam. Mada abagbaanatte pẹ ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr ch'otte biphyir abhaang kwẹ, bẹ afona atza akhebh-ẹ kẹ.
1SA 22:2 Anọng mbuma biphyir p'iwa awobh ka dama-dama, ọmaana p'atzim ayok ibhori, ttara mbuma p'akhaam ọmmamma k'ettem, akwu awobha akhọr-ẹ, on-ode bẹ oho. Wa anọng p'apyiri ẹnọhna bọ awobh ttar-ẹ.
1SA 22:3 Mẹ wọ, wa Devid ofona ochina ka Mizpa k'ẹkhọma cha Moab, otza oben ọvaarnọng kwa Moab bi, “Tzotzokhaan, tte otte kwaam ọmaana ọkka kwaam ọbọhk, bẹ akwu awobha ma ttar-ọ, matzẹmaa kaam nnonga odik kw'Ibinọkpaabyi ósi ọnang-m.”
1SA 22:4 Mẹ wọ, Devid ohok otte ọmaana ọkka m'ọvaarnọng kwa Moab. Wa bẹ awobha mẹ ttar-ẹ, k'ogbe nwuma biphyir kwa Devid owobh k'ichubhabe.
1SA 22:5 Yina, Gad kw'ode ọsi-ẹjaakhi kw'Ibinọkpaabyi oben Devid bi, “Kọ m'ichubhabe nna dọk kàchubha. Rọhng k'ẹkhọma cha Juda.” Mẹ wọ, Devid ofona ochina k'ẹtzam cha Hẹrẹt.
1SA 22:6 Saul okwu ọbhaanga bi, bẹ akk'Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ ara. Wa Saul otzim ọkhọhn k'ọbọhk, om-owobha ẹwọr k'irekh-irek kwa echi cha tamarisk k'egbegbeho cha Gibea, ọmaana akhaan-nọng pẹ biphyir p'abe akhọr-ẹ.
1SA 22:7 Saul oben bẹ bi, “Ajinọng pa Bẹnjamin, bọng yong-m itzọhng e! Na nnwa nwa kwa Jẹsẹ ónang bọng biphyir iwoni s'agrep ọmaana iwoni ọdọdọkh o? Na kẹ osi bọng adenho p'agbong-nọng ka nnọhna-nabhik, ọmaana k'arọbh azen-azen o?
1SA 22:8 Ma, kwẹ wọ osi bọng biphyir attaanga anang-m o? Ọnọng kw'ọgbaakh-m ogbe kwa nnwa kwaam osi echekhi ọmaana nnwa kwa Jẹsẹ kode. Ọnọng kwa mkpak odik kabọng k'ottem kode, ọnọng kode kw'obiro ọgbaakh-m bi, ọtzọhmnọng kwaam okk'Devid ottem-bara ọnanga bi ofhu-m, mach'om-osi mayina.”
1SA 22:9 Mẹ wọ e, Doẹg kw'ofon Edom, kw'iwa obe mẹ ttara akhaan-nọng pa Saul, oben bi, “Ira kaam nne da nnwa kwa Jẹsẹ okwu k'Ahimẹlẹk kw'ode nnwa kw'Ahitub ka Nọb.
1SA 22:10 Ahimẹlẹk ọdọhn Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi odik okhuri Devid, obiro ọnang-ẹ ọchattọhk, ọmaana ọkkangkkaang kwa Golayat kw'ofon Philistiya.”
1SA 22:11 Mẹ wọ, ọvaar Saul ọtzọhm bi bẹ ayeri Ahimẹlẹk kw'ode ọfọhnẹja, ode nnwa kw'Ahitub, ọmaana afọhni-ẹja p'ẹhọhmmọr ch'otte biphyir, ka Nọb. Wa bẹ biphyir akhera eyeri nda ch'ọvaarnọng.
1SA 22:12 Saul oben bi, “Nnwa kw'Ahitub, yong-m itzọhng.” Obhina bi, “Itta kwaam, kkeri kaam ma e!”
1SA 22:13 Saul oben-ẹ bi, “Okhuri yan kwa bọng am-akham-m? Kọ ọmaana nnwa kwa Jẹsẹ, kọ akk'ẹ ọchattọhk ananga, anang-ẹ ọkkangkkaang, abira adọhn Ibinọkpaabyi k'eho chẹ. Ma, Devid ọkk'ọttaanga ọnang-m, obiro ochubha otzikh-m, mach'om-osi mayina.”
1SA 22:14 Ahimẹlẹk obhina ọvaar Saul oben bi, “K'akhaan-nọng pọ biphyir, anyi wọ ọhak eho macha Devid, kw'ode ọnyẹ kwa kọ ọvaarnọng o? Kẹ mach'oho kw'anọng p'am-abaabh-ọ, kwa bẹ abir anang ikpokpobha s'ideden k'ẹhọhmmọr cha kọ ọvaarnọng.
1SA 22:15 Echedenwu arang mẹ cha kaam ndọhni Ibinọkpaabyi okhuri kẹ! Tte ọvaarnọng oningi kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ odik obubh, kaambi ọnọng kpenamkpen kẹ ẹhọhmmọr chẹ dọ, okhuri bi, ọtzọhmnọng kwọ odik manda wani kw'okhuri idik nna biphyir korong.”
1SA 22:16 Yina, ọvaarnọng oben bi, “Kọ Ahimẹlẹk k'odik ọkka akhaambi da ápe, kọ ọmaana ẹnọmma ch'atte k'obungi biphyir.”
1SA 22:17 Mẹ wọ, ọvaarnọng on-oben abaabhi pẹ p'abe abaang-ẹ mẹ bi, “Bọng makhi nnam afhu afọhni-ẹja p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, okhuri bi, bẹbẹ dọk akk'Devid an-abir aba ka nnam. Bẹ akk'aronga bi, kẹ ọm-ọrọbh-ọrọbh, yina, bẹ kaam kagbaakhi.” Yina, wa akhaan-nọng p'ọvaarnọng bẹ for kado sa bẹ ayebhi ọbọhk afhu afọhni-ẹja p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 22:18 Mẹ wọ, wa ọvaar Saul on-oben Doẹg bi, “Kọ bhakhi afhu afọhni-ẹja.” Doẹg kw'ofon Edom ọbhakhi ofhu bẹ. M'ewu nduma, ofhu afọhni-ẹja arọbh anna obhiri azen p'afọr ẹphọd.
1SA 22:19 Wa obiro ochina ka Nọb, kw'ode obhon kw'afọhni-nja, ofhu ajinọng ọmaana panọng, va p'akk'abara ọmaana vava, obir ofhu andaamogbodo, ọmaana abhaam ttara arukhimaan.
1SA 22:20 Yina, wa Abiyata, nnwa wani kw'Ahimẹlẹk kw'ode nnwa kw'Ahitub, ọrọbh ọnaanga, otza okhebha Devid.
1SA 22:21 Abiyata ọgbaak Devid eden cha Saul okk'afọhnẹja p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọfha.
1SA 22:22 Mẹ wọ, Devid oben Abiyata bi, “Kaam nnong k'odik ọkka kẹ bi, mada iwa Doẹg kw'ofon Edom owobh mẹ, eden kede ch'oni Saul ọgbaak. Obo kw'ẹnọmma ch'abatte biphyir ofon ka kaam ka mbọhkh e.
1SA 22:23 Wobha ma ttar-m, oning-ọ ojor. Kẹ nwuma kw'om-oror-ọ bi ofhu, om-obiro oror-m bi, ofhu e. Kọ ákhaama ẹnaanga ọkhaama, awobh ma ttar-m.”
1SA 23:1 Wa ewu dani anọng agbaakhi Devid bi, “Kker e, aPhilistiya am-arima obhon kwa Keyila abẹ e, bẹ am-abira achi bẹ ọgbọm k'obe fa bẹ am-awobha akhaani achimọma.”
1SA 23:2 Wa Devid ọdọhn Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọbọbh bi, “Ńda ńnima aPhilistiya mba abẹ o?” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhin-ẹ bi, “Rọhng atza arima aPhilistiya abẹ ifha akkaana Keyila.”
1SA 23:3 Yina, ajinọng pa Devid aben-ẹ bi, “Ojemi manya Juda, moruk k'ojora, idikha mon-ochin ka Keyila bi, motza orima agbongnọng pa Philistiya abẹ, kwẹ on-opyibh ọyọhnga mẹ e.”
1SA 23:4 Devid obir ọdọhn Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhin-ẹ bi, “Kọ rọhng ka Keyila, okhuri bi, kaam ńtte aPhilistiya ọbọhk ńnang-ọ ákhema.”
1SA 23:5 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ achina ka Keyila, atza arima anọng pa Philistiya abẹ, achi bẹ ọgbọm k'etzirakpo pyabẹ. Wa Devid ofhu anọng pa Philistiya k'ọhaabh, ọkkaana anọng pa Keyila.
1SA 23:6 M'ogbe nwuma, wa Abiyata kw'ode nnwa kw'Ahimẹlẹk, otzim ẹphọd k'ọbọhk ọrọbh otza okhebha Devid ka Keyila.
1SA 23:7 Wa anọng agbaakhi Saul bi, Devid okk'ochina ka Keyila, Saul on-oben bi, “Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹ ka mbọhk saam ọkha. Devid okk'for sẹ mgbakkọhbh ọkha bi, odim k'obhon kw'ọkhaam mbaakhamma, ọmaana abaakha.”
1SA 23:8 Mẹ wọ, Saul oben agbongnọng pẹ biphyir bi, bẹ ado for s'egbong achina ka Keyila, atza akhọri Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ akhe k'ottem.
1SA 23:9 Mada Devid orong bi, Saul ọm-ọkhami bi ọsẹ-ẹ itzama, oben Abiyata kw'ode ọfọhnẹja bi, “Tzima ẹphọd nduma akwu.”
1SA 23:10 Devid ozi njọhm oben bi, “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl, k'odik ọkka kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ nkk'mmaanga bi, Saul ọkhami bi, okwu ka Keyila, okwu odimi obhon nwa okhuri kaam.
1SA 23:11 Ma na anọng pa Keyila átzọkh-m anang-ẹ o? Na Saul ókwu ma Keyila o? O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl, tzotzokhaan si ẹjaakhi nang kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ.” Mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “K'odik-ọkka, kẹ ókwuma.”
1SA 23:12 Devid obiro ọbọbh bi, “Ma na anọng pa Keyila átzọkh-m ọmaana ajinọng paam ánang Saul o?” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhina bi, “Bẹ ási-osi mando.”
1SA 23:13 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ, p'apyiri anọng ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh jobh, abina aji Keyila. Bẹ achina ororo arenga apyiri k'obe k'obe. Mada bẹ agbaakhi Saul bi, Devid ọkk'ọrọbha oji Keyila, wa Saul ka Keyila dọk kọ̀tza.
1SA 23:14 Wa Devid ochubha k'ichubhabe s'ibe s'anọng anarukhi, ka mgbegbeho s'ibe s'anọng anarukhi ka Ziph. K'ewu kpenamkpen, Saul ochina ororo ochimi Devid, yina, wa Ibinọkpaabyi Devid ọbọhk kotte ọnang Saul.
1SA 23:15 Mada Devid owobh ka Horẹsh k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi ka Ziph, ọn-ọbhaanga bi, Saul ọkk'ọkwa bi okwu ọfhẹ-ẹ.
1SA 23:16 Wa Jonatan kw'ode nnwa kwa Saul, ofona otza okhebha Devid ka Horẹsh, ọkhẹ-ẹ ẹfa bi, odo ettem ọbar ophe nnam k'Ibinọkpaabyi.
1SA 23:17 Oben-ẹ bi, “Tte oning-ọ ojor. Otte kwaam Saul, kọ ọbọhk kọ́tọhmi. Kọ wọ áde ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl, kaam ńjem-ọ mbọhk ka nnam. Kaambi otte kwaam Saul wọ, orong odik nwa kẹ e.”
1SA 23:18 Bẹ anọng afa asi echekhi k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Wa Jonatan ọbhana, Devid ochina ororo owobha ka Horẹsh.
1SA 23:19 Wa anọng pa Ziph afona atza akhebha Saul ka Gibea, aben bi, “Kker e, Devid ochubh m'ichubhabe saman ka Horẹsh e, k'egbegbeho cha Hakila, k'okhubha kw'ẹrakh-ẹrakha ka Jẹshimọn.
1SA 23:20 Mẹ wọ, o ọvaarnọng, kọ hakha akwu, k'ogbe kpenamkpen kw'ọdaakh-ọ, maman ọ́tzọkha kwẹ mach'ọtzọhm faman bi, mọtzọkh-ẹ otte ọbọhk ọnang-ọ.”
1SA 23:21 Saul obhina bi, “Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi odo bọng k'ejibha cha bọng akk'aam akhọhkha.
1SA 23:22 Bọng nọhng atza ado kwẹ adọhn. Bọng dọhn obe fa Devid ọm-ọtza, ọmaana ọnọng kw'ọkk'ẹ ọra mẹ. Bẹ agbaakh-m bi, kẹ odongi kpọng-kpọng e.
1SA 23:23 Bọng dọhn aronga obe f'om-ochubha biphyir, ifha bọng akpa nnam akwu agbaakh-m mach'ode. Mẹ wọ, kaam ńdọn bọng abẹ mochina kẹ. Idikha ochubh k'ibe nnuma, kaam ḿbọkh-ẹ k'ibe kpenamkpen s'ochubh k'ottem kwa nnọmma sa Juda biphyir.”
1SA 23:24 Mẹ wọ, anọng mba achi Saul eden achina ka Ziph. Wa Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ awobh k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi ka Maọn, k'Araba k'ẹrakha-ẹrakha kwa Jẹshimọn.
1SA 23:25 Saul ọmaana ajinọng pẹ attẹwọr anwa ẹtzam aror-ẹ. Mada Devid ọbhaang kwẹ, on-ochina k'itzakpa s'iwobh k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi ka Maọn. Mada Saul ọbhaang bi Devid ochubh ka Maọn, okhubh-ẹ ochina kẹ.
1SA 23:26 Wa Saul om-orenga k'ọbọhk wani kw'egbegbeho nduma dani, Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ arenga k'ọbọhk nwonggo, bẹ am-adukha bi, bẹ arọbh anaanga Saul. Mada Saul ọmaana agbongnọng pẹ akk'Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ afora k'odem kwa bẹ abọkha bẹ,
1SA 23:27 wa ọkkaabh-ẹkkaabha okwu okhebha Saul oben bi, “Kwu ẹbhar-ẹbhar, ogbe kàkhibhi, kkeri aPhilistiya am-achi ẹkhọma nda k'egbong e.”
1SA 23:28 Mẹ wọ e, wa Saul ọkwọbha Devid okhukhubh, on-ofona bi, otza orima anọng pa Philistiya abẹ. Kẹ wọ osi bẹ ayeri ibe nna Ẹtzakpa ch'Ẹrọbh-ẹnaanga.
1SA 23:29 Devid on-obina mẹ, ovura otza ochubha k'Ẹn-Gẹdi.
1SA 24:1 Mada Saul ọkpa nnam kẹ da ọtza okhubh aPhilistiya, bẹ agbaakh-ẹ bi, “Devid ochubh k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi s'Ẹn-Gẹdi.”
1SA 24:2 Wa Saul otzekha ajinọng nnọhna nzenamfa obhiri arọbh jobh, makhọra Israẹl, otzima bẹ otza oror Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ, kẹ ọbaanga Atzakpa p'Avu p'Ẹtzam.
1SA 24:3 Mada Saul opyiri k'avukwuri bani k'ọkkadeden, ore ọtzakpamma, wa ọyaakha mẹ bi, ọtza k'ẹpa-nnam. Yina, wa Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ achubh ka nnam okhubha kw'ọtzakpamma nwa.
1SA 24:4 Ajinọng pa Devid aben-ẹ bi, “Ewu nduma dọ ma ch'iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọgbaakh-ọ bi, ‘Kaam ńtte ọttattaanga-nọng kwọ ọbọhk nnang-ọ, ifha ásẹ-ẹ mach'ọdaakh-ọ.’ ” Devid obina ọbẹkhi, ọnọng kẹ kore, maa ọkpaara ẹbaramma ch'ọnọhma-baba kwa Saul.
1SA 24:5 Ayongi mẹ, wa achibhi ayak Devid atzim okhuri ẹbaramma ch'ọnọhma-baba kwa Saul ch'ọkk'ọkpaara.
1SA 24:6 On-oben ajinọng pẹ bi, “Tzọhmi-tzọhmi okponga k'idachen bi, kaam nsi odik dema nwa nnang itta kwaam, ọnọng kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ana obyengi k'eho, bi ira kaam nna mbiri nttọhm-ẹ ọbọhk, kẹ ode ọnọng kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ana obyengi k'eho.”
1SA 24:7 Wa Devid otzima atzim mba ọkpa ajinọng pẹ eden, bẹ Saul abẹ karim. Saul e, obina k'ọtzakpamma ofona.
1SA 24:8 Mẹ wọ, Devid oyin k'ọtzakpamma, oyeri Saul bi, “Itta ọvaarnọng kwaam!” Mada Saul ọbhakhi nnam, Devid ọrakha ottima itzitzikha k'irerek k'ikpokpobha.
1SA 24:9 Oben Saul bi, “Okhuri yan kw'am-ayonga itzọhng k'ogbe kw'anọng am-aben bi, ‘Devid ọm-ọkham bi, ọsọ-ọ itzama o?’
1SA 24:10 Mayina, kọ akk'chen pọ atzima are odem kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọttọ-ọ ọbọhk ọnang-m bi pọọbh, k'ọtzakpamma. Anọng achọm-m bi, mfhọ-ọ, yina, kaam nttọ-ọ ọbọhk, mben bi, ‘Kaam itta kwaam ọbọhk kínttọmi, okhuri bi kẹ ode ọnọng kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ana obyengi k'eho.’
1SA 24:11 Kker e, itta kwaam, kọ kkeri ẹbarakpa ch'ọnọhma-baba kwọ k'ọbọhk kwaam e. Kaam mkpaar chẹ k'ẹnọmma ch'ọnọhma-baba kwọ, yina, kọ kimfhu. Tte kwẹ ọttaan-ọ ma bi, kaam ottotto kw'oponga-pyibha, obiro ode oho-gaangi kingaam. Kaam kọ kimbiri ntto, yina, kọ akham-m mẹ bi, atzọkha akpen paam.
1SA 24:12 Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọttọhna aponga pa kaam ọmaana kọ. Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzukha itzama s'akk'aam asa. Yina, kaam kọ ọbọhk kwaam kínttọmi.
1SA 24:13 K'odem kw'ẹtzama ebeni, ‘Ọbhọkhi adimichi kẹ kwa mbọhk njobhi,’ mẹ wọ, kaam kọ ọbọhk kwaam kínttọmi.
1SA 24:14 “Ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl oreng anyi abẹ oyin k'iyaan o? Anyi wọ kw'am-akhubh o? Ọpfa-bukhi wọ ra a? Ẹtzatzaana dọ ọ?
1SA 24:15 Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ode ọttọhna-ponga kwaman, obiro ọnang ẹjaakhi k'ottem kwa man anọng afa. Tte kẹ obe aponga paam, tte kẹ obiro ọkkaana ọrọbh-m ka mbọhk sọ.”
1SA 24:16 Mada Devid okyer odik nwa ọgbagbaak, Saul ọbọbh bi, “Nnwa kwaam Devid, kọ wọ am-agbaak ma o?” Mẹ wọ, on-obhom ẹmọng k'ẹrọng.
1SA 24:17 Obiro oben Devid bi, “Kọ wọ atzori ọtzam ayọhnga kaam e. Kọ akk'aam ejibha asa, yina, kaam nkk'kọ itzama nsa.
1SA 24:18 Mayina akk'aam ejibha ch'asi anang-m agbaakha. Da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọkh-m ọkhọ-ọ ka mbọhk, yina, kaam kafhu.
1SA 24:19 Bọng ọnọng wọ ore ọttataanga-nọng kwẹ, otte ọbọhk ofona kẹ itzama kosi o? Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ochor-ọ, k'ejibha ch'asi anang-m mayina.
1SA 24:20 Kaam nnong kẹ k'odik ọkka bi, kọ ikhina áde ọvaarnọng ode, ọmaana bi, ikhina ẹkhọma ch'Israẹl éttima aranga ottima k'ogbe kw'ẹvaar chọ.
1SA 24:21 Kọ chekhi ka che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi anang-m bi, kọ va pa va paam kadimi, che chaam k'ẹhọhmmọr ch'otte kwaam kabira áfuri.”
1SA 24:22 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọnwọhngi ọnang Saul. Saul e ọbhana, yina, Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ akpa nnam k'ichubhabe sabẹ.
1SA 25:1 Samwẹl e ope, anọng p'Israẹl biphyir atzọbha, abẹ abhom-ẹ. Bẹ atza anọhng-ẹ ka Rama kw'ode obhon kwẹ. Mẹ wọ, Devid obina ochina k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi sa Paran.
1SA 25:2 Wa ọkhaam ojinọng wani ka Maọn kw'ọkhaam ẹkhakhaama ka Kaamẹl, kẹ wa ode ọkkọkka kw'ideden. Kẹ wa ọkhaam avugbokha nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh, obiro ọkhaama arukhimaan nnọhna nzenamfa obhiri arọbh jobh p'iwa om-ophyiri ophyubha ka Kaamẹl.
1SA 25:3 Ojinọng nwa wa okpen Nabal, kwanọng kwẹ okpena Abigẹl. Wa Kwanọng nwa ọkhaam eronga, obiro ojibh kwanọng, yina, odim kwẹ ode oKalẹb-nọng kw'ọkhaam ẹmmaana ch'ikkamgbagbara, obiro osi ẹrama.
1SA 25:4 Mada Devid owobh k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi ọbhaanga bi, Nabal om-ophyiri arukhimaan pẹ ophyubha,
1SA 25:5 Wa Devid okwu ọtzọhm adikkobh jobh oben bẹ bi, “Bọng nọhng ka Kaamẹl atza arima Nabal anang-m.
1SA 25:6 Bọng ben-ẹ bi, ‘Kọ ruk akpen p'adumi eden! Ofor-gaangi owobha ttar-ọ ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chọ, ttara ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ode fọ.
1SA 25:7 “ ‘Mmaang bi, ogbe wọ ma kw'arukhimaan ophyubha ophyi-phyiri. Mada iwa akkeri-arukhimaan pọ awobh ttara man, wa man bẹ itzama kosi. Ogbe kw'iwa bẹ awobh ka Kaamẹl biphyir, ọttọhk manda vani fabẹ f'odimi kode.
1SA 25:8 Kọ bọbh atzọhmnọng pọ, bẹ ágbaakh-ọ ọgbaak. Mẹ wọ, kọ si ọphyaam anang adikkobh paam, da mokwu k'ẹdadaami-wu. Tzotzokhaan kọ nang atzọhmnọng pọ, ọmaana kaam nnwa kwọ Devid kpenamkpen f'akhaam bi anang bẹ.’ ”
1SA 25:9 Mada ajinọng pa Devid apyiri, bẹ atzọkha ẹkkaabha cha Devid agbaak Nabal. Bẹ an-awobha atzik.
1SA 25:10 Nabal obhina atzọhmnọng pa Devid bi, “Anyi wọ ode Devid ode? Anyi wọ ode nnwa nwa kwa Jẹsẹ ode? Iwu nna atzọhmnọng haabhada an-am-abhaangi ka mbọhk sa abitta pabẹ.
1SA 25:11 Okhuri yan kw'ira kaam nna ndọkha brẹd kwaam, ọmaana asi, ttara etzen cha kaam mfhu bi, nnang anọng paam p'am-aphyiri arukhimaan-phyubha, ndọkha nnang anọng p'ọnọng oni orong ibe sa bẹ afona akwu o?”
1SA 25:12 Ajinọng pa Devid abhakhi nnam abhana. Mada bẹ apyiri, bẹ agbaak Devid odem kwa kwẹ ode biphyir.
1SA 25:13 Devid oben ajinọng pẹ bi, “Bọng dabh akkangkkaang pabọng!” Mẹ wọ, bẹ adabh akkangkkaang pabẹ, Devid obiro ọdabh kwẹ. Wa anọng ẹnọhna bọ atzọni Devid abẹ, yina, ọtzọkha anọng arọbh jobh ohok bi, bẹ akkeri egbongkpo.
1SA 25:14 Ọtzọhmnọng wani kwa Nabal ọgbaak Abigẹl kw'ode kwanọng kwa Nabal bi, “Devid ọtzọhmi akkaabh-nkkaabha p'afon k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi bi, bẹ akwu arima itta kwaman e, yina, kẹ on-otzer ọnang bẹ mgbarsa-dik.
1SA 25:15 K'odik ọkka, wa anọng mba ajibhi idik atzima atzor man. Wa bẹ man itzama kàsi, ogbe nwa biphyir kwa mowobh k'iwoni ọbaanga bẹ, ọttọhk manda vani faman kobiro odimi.
1SA 25:16 Bẹ akkeri man k'ẹya, akkeri man k'erungi k'ogbe nwa kw'am-om-okkeri arukhimaan paman biphyir, ọbaanga bẹ.
1SA 25:17 Kọ si ochibhi atzena mẹ, are odem kw'asi, okhuri bi, itzama in-ibe ma s'itto ikhebha itta kwaman ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chẹ biphyir. Kẹ ọkhaam ikkaam-gbagbara ọyọhnga ọbọhk, itzọhng k'om-oyonga ọnang ọnọng manda wani.”
1SA 25:18 Abigẹl ogbe kokhibhi, ọtzọkha brẹd arọbh jobh, ọmaana atzuk-gbere afa, ọmaana arukhimaan azen p'ọkk-ọbhaabha, ọmaana agbangbang-dim azen p'abọkpa-bhaabha, ọmaana agwọk arọbh azen p'agrep p'agwu-ogwu, ttara agwọk arọbh jobh p'afig p'agwu-ogwu ọnana nnyanyaang.
1SA 25:19 Mẹ wọ, on-oben atzọhmnọng pẹ bi, “Bọng chi-m eden arọhng; kaam ńdor bọng nnam nkwuma e.” Yina, wa odim kwẹ Nabal kọgbaakhi.
1SA 25:20 Mada ọm-ọyaar ẹnyanyaang chẹ ọwọna egbegbeho, ore da Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ am-abira ahakha atzor-ẹ ka for, bẹ atza attema ayok abẹ.
1SA 25:21 Devid okk'ọtzam obena bi, “K'odik ọkka, kwẹ ode ndidimi ọnang bi, nkkeri ẹkhakhaama ch'ayi nwa k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi, ifha ọttọhk manda vani fẹ oningi odimi. Ma, kẹ okk'itzama on-otzima ochora ejibha chaam e.
1SA 25:22 Tte Ibinọkpaabyi osi attattaanga-nọng pa Devid mach'ọdaakh-ẹ, idikha ntte ojinọng manda wani kwẹ ọbọhk oruk akpen ophyini k'ekpebha.”
1SA 25:23 Mada Abigẹl ore Devid, ọhakha k'ẹnyanyaang chẹ m'ẹbhar k'ẹbhar, ọrakha ottima itzitzikha k'irerek m'itzitzikha sa Devid.
1SA 25:24 Ọttẹ-ẹ ma mmo oben bi, “Itta kwaam, tte oponga-pyibha ode kwaam manchen e. Tzotzokhaan, tte kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ mgbaak atzim nnang-ọ, yong-m itzọhng abhaanga odik kwa kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ngaam bi, mgbaakh-ọ.
1SA 25:25 Tte itta kwaam oningi ẹmmaana-tzama ch'ojinọng nwuma kwa bẹ ayeri Nabal ọsaan e. Kẹ osi edidingi otzor ka che chẹ, che chẹ eyini odidingi-nọng, mando kw'orukhi akpen ochina. Yina, kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, ajinọng p'itta kwaam ọtzọhmi kinne e.
1SA 25:26 “Mada Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọsa bi, kọ itta kwaam aningi oponga-phyibha kw'ẹnọngmon atzọk, ọmaana bi, kọ aningi odik ka for sọ abira atzukha. Da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, kọ abira aruk akpen, tte attattaanga-nọng pọ ọmaana anọng biphyir p'achibhi itzama ọmaana itta kwaam, atzọkha ettuma macha Nabal.
1SA 25:27 Mẹ wọ, tte itta kwaam okhera bi, ọtzọkha ẹnanga nda cha kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ nkk'ndimi nkwu, ọnang ajinọng p'am-atzọn-ẹ abẹ.
1SA 25:28 Tzotzokhaan, bina nang ottotto kwa kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi óttima ẹhọhmmọr ch'itta kwaam aranga bi gbuk, okhuri da kẹ om-orima mgbong s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Itzama s'íkhọbh-ọ itzor k'odem kw'arukhi akpen kide.
1SA 25:29 Kaambi ode bi, ọnọng okhubh-ọ bi ọfhọ-ọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ, wọ ókkeri akpen p'itta kwaam, mach'ọnọng okkeri ọttọhk f'ohokhi ettem. Yina, kẹ odimi akpen p'attattanga-nọng pọ mach'ọtza kwa bẹ abhari k'ibhar-atza.
1SA 25:30 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ósi odik-jibhada kpenamkpen kw'ochekhi ọ́nang itta kwaam, obiro ótzekh-ẹ mach'ọdabhi kw'Israẹl.
1SA 25:31 For sọ kápyima k'ẹnọngmon, for sọ kabira ápyima bi arengmmo atzukha odik. K'ogbe kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ, okk'itta kwaam ọda, jima kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ o.”
1SA 25:32 Devid oben Abigẹl bi, “Ẹtzọhnga ẹkhaam Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl, kw'ọkk'ọ ọtzọhma k'ewu cha mayina ochen-m.
1SA 25:33 Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọdọ-ọ k'eronga chọ, da obiro otzim-ọ akkaan-m nnaanga ẹnọngmon k'ewu cha mayina, mbọhk saam kimbiri ndima ndukha odik.
1SA 25:34 Oni mando ode, k'odik ọkka, mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl orukhi akpen, kw'obiro ọkpa-m bi nning-ọ itzama nsi, idikha ira ani ẹbhar-ẹbhar akwu bi more ayok, ojinọng manda wani kw'ode kwa Nabal kw'oruk akpen yina ewu ehobha kode.”
1SA 25:35 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọn-ọtzọkha ekpo py'Abigẹl otzim ochen-ẹ, oben-ẹ bi, “Rọhng abhana k'odidiri. Kaam nkk'atzim pọ mmaanga, ńsi-osi mach'abeni.”
1SA 25:36 Mada Abigẹl ọbhan, otza okhebha Nabal k'ọhọhm da om-osi ọdadaami mach'ọvaarnọng, Nabal okk'ọgwa obuma da ettem ẹdaam-ẹ. Mẹ wọ, kwanọng kẹ odik kọgbaakhi maa ewu ehobha.
1SA 25:37 Mada ewu en-ehobh, da atzuk akk'Nabal attoni, kwanọng kwẹ ọtzọkha idik nna biphyir ọgbaakh-ẹ, okhubhachi ọbọkh-ẹ, on-oyima mach'ọtza.
1SA 25:38 Ọttọhk k'iwu jobh k'itzitzikha, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obun Nabal ofhu, Nabal e, ope.
1SA 25:39 Mada Devid ọbhaang bi, Nabal ọkk'ọpa, oben bi, “Ẹtzọhnga ewobha ẹnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'okk'Nabal abẹ orima ọnang-m okhuri da om-osi idik s'olukh-m. Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ eden ọkpa bi, oningi itzama osi, on-obiro osi itzama sa Nabal ikpa nnam itzor kẹ ọkhaam.” Mẹ wọ, Devid ọn-ọtzọhm ẹkkaabha bi, bẹ atza abọbh Abigẹl eyonga bi ode kwanọng kwẹ.
1SA 25:40 Atzọhmnọng pẹ achina ka Kaamẹl atza aben Abigẹl bi, “Devid okk'man ọtzọhma bi, mokwu ọtzọkh-ọ, atza ade kwanọng kwẹ e.”
1SA 25:41 Abigẹl ochunga ottima itzitzikha k'irerek, oben bi, “Kkeri kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ma e, kaam nkk'for nda bi nsi ọtzọhm nnang-ọ e, bi mbiri mgbobhi mmo s'atzọhmnọng p'itta kwaam e.”
1SA 25:42 Abigẹl ogbe kokhibhi obina ovura ẹnyanyaang, otzima aminava azen p'ade atzọhmnọng pẹ, ọtzọn atzọhmnọng pa Devid abẹ, ọtza ọba Devid.
1SA 25:43 Wa Devid okk'Ahinoam kw'ofon Jẹzrẹl ọtzam ọtzọkha, bẹ anọng afa an-ade panọng pẹ.
1SA 25:44 Yina, wa Saul okk'nnwa kwẹ Mikal kw'ode kwanọng kwa Devid, ọtzọkha ọnang Palti kw'ode nnwa kwa Laish kw'iwa ofon Galim, k'ọbada.
1SA 26:1 Anọng pa Ziph afona atza akhebha Saul ka Gibea, aben bi, “Devid ochubh k'egbegbeho cha Hakila ch'ẹrọni Jẹshimọn itzitzikha e.”
1SA 26:2 Mẹ wọ, Saul ọmaana anọng nnọhna arọbh azenamfa obhiri arọbh jobh p'Israẹl, afona ahakha k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi ka Ziph, bi bẹ atza aror Devid.
1SA 26:3 Saul osi ibhingabe k'eden ọkhaan-ọkhaan kw'egbegbeho cha Hakila ch'ẹrọni Jẹshimọn itzitzikha, yina, wa Devid owobha k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi. Mada ore bi Saul ọkk'ẹ nnam otzora opyiri mẹ,
1SA 26:4 Devid ọn-ọtzọhm nttọ bi, bẹ atza aronga k'odik ọkka, sa Saul okk'opyiri m'ibe nnuma.
1SA 26:5 Wa Devid obina ochina k'ibhingabe sa Saul, ore da Saul ọmaana Abnẹr kw'ode nnwa kwa Nẹr obiro ode oho kw'agbong-nọng am-attaabha, k'ottem kw'akkengitza pẹ p'akk'abira attaabha.
1SA 26:6 Devid ọn-ọbọbh Ahimẹlẹk kw'ofon Het, ọmaana Abishayi kw'ode nnwa kwa Zeruya, kw'obiro ode ọgbaanọkka kwa Joab bi, “Anyi ọ́tzọn-m abẹ mọtza k'ibhingabe sa Saul?” Abishayi oben bi, “Kaam wọ ńdọn-ọ abẹ.”
1SA 26:7 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọmaana Abishayi abina m'erungi achina kẹ da agbong-nọng pa Saul awobh, ore da Saul ọm-ọttaabha k'ibhingabe ttara ọkhọhn kwa bẹ afhu abaang-ẹ m'eho. Abnẹr ọmaana agbong-nọng ayima akhọr-ẹ akhe k'ottem.
1SA 26:8 Abishayi oben Devid bi, “Mayina Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọttataanga-nọng kwọ ọtzọkha okhe ka mbọhk sọ. Mẹ wọ, tte-m ọbọhk ngwum-ẹ ọkhọhn ogbe wani mmana m'irerek, kaam kẹ igbe ifa kingwum.”
