1SA 26:9 Yina, Devid oben Abishayi bi, “Kẹ kàdimi! Ọnọng kw'ọttọhmi ọnọng kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ana obyengi k'eho ọbọhk, yina aponga aning-ẹ apyibhi kode.
1SA 26:10 Devid ọttara bi, k'odik-ọkka, mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkhaam wọ óbun-ẹ, oni mando obiro ode, kẹ Saul ópe k'ogbe kwẹ, oni mando obiro ode, kẹ ódimi k'egbong.
1SA 26:11 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oningi okher bi, kaam nttọhmi ọnọng kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ana obyengi k'eho ọbọhk. Kọ họbhi ọkhọhn, abira atzini esi-gora ch'eber ẹbaang-ẹ m'eho, akwu mofona.”
1SA 26:12 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọhọbhi ọkhọhn obiro otzini esi-gora ch'eber ẹbaanga Saul m'eho, bẹ afona. Ọnọng manda wani kw'ore bẹ, kw'obiro oronga odik nwa, obiro ọphyọbha ọda kode. Wa bẹ biphyir am-attaabha ọda, okhuri da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'bẹ ọsa attaabha amọm.
1SA 26:13 Mẹ wọ, Devid ojekha k'okhubha, on-obe k'egbegbeho ẹrọng k'oden-mir; wa bẹ abhir ayok eden.
1SA 26:14 Wa Devid ogwon agbong-nọng pa Saul ọmaana Abnẹr kw'ode nnwa kwa Nẹr, “Abnẹr, ode bi kaam ẹmọng kakhera?” Abnẹr obhin-ẹ bi, “Kọ anyi wọ am-agwon ọvaarnọng o?”
1SA 26:15 Devid oben bi, “Kaambi sa ade ojinọng o? Anyi wọ ode macha kọ k'Israẹl o? Okhuri yan kw'ani itta kwọ, kw'ode ọvaarnọng abaabh o? Ọnọng ọkk'ọkwa bi, okwu odimi itta kwọ, kw'ode ọvaarnọng e.
1SA 26:16 Odik kw'asi ma kojibhi. Mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, kọ ọmaana ajinọng pọ abaan k'obo, okhuri bi, bọng itta kwabọng kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ana obyengi k'eho, kabaabh. Bọng kkeri akhọri, ọkhọhn ọmaana esi-gora py'ira ewobh ẹbaanga eho ch'ọvaarnọng ko o?”
1SA 26:17 Wa Saul otzin ẹmọng cha Devid oben bi, “Nnwa kwaam Devid, ẹmọng chọ dọ ma o?” Devid obhina bi, “O o, itta kwaam kw'ode ọvaarnọng, ẹmọng chaam dọ e.
1SA 26:18 Okhuri yan kw'itta kwaam om-okhubh kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ o? Kaam nsi yan ọ, oponga-pyibha kwaam ode yan o?
1SA 26:19 Mẹ wọ, tte itta kwaam kw'ode ọvaarnọng, oyonga itzọhng k'atzim pa kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ e. Idikha ofon k'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, attaang-m, tte kẹ okhera ọtzọkha ẹnanga chaam. Yina, on-obiro ofona k'anọngẹya, tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang bẹ ẹmma. Bẹ akk'aam an-akhubha bi, nningi ekkema chaam ka Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ndọk, aben bi, ‘Kọ rọhng atza akpobha akha.’
1SA 26:20 Mẹ wọ, bọng kaam k'oden-mir k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kafhu. Ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl ọkk'ọkwa bi, okwu oror ẹtzatzaana mach'ọnọng ọtza ẹgbaaji ch'inọhn s'ẹtzam k'egbegbeho.”
1SA 26:21 Mẹ wọ, Saul oben bi, “Kaam nkk'ẹkhọhngkwuri nsa. Nnwa kwaam Devid o, kọ kpa nnam e. Da kọ akpen paam abar-ọ odik mayina, kaam kọ dọk kingaam e. K'odik ọkka, kaam nkk'edidingi ttara epina ch'ideden nsa e.”
1SA 26:22 Devid obhina bi, “Kkeri ọkhọhn kw'Ọvaarnọng ma e. Tte ogbong-nọng wani kwọ ojekha okwu ọtzọkha.
1SA 26:23 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi om-ochora ọnọng kpenamkpen k'etzora chẹ, ọmaana ka nnam-ophephe kwẹ e. Mayina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọ ọtzọkha okhe-m ka mbọhk, yina, kaam ọnọng kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ana obyengi k'eho ọbọhk kinttọmi.
1SA 26:24 K'odik ọkkakka mach'akpen pọ abar-m odik mayina, tte akpen paam abar Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi odik, obiro ọrọbh-m ka dama-dama kpenamkpen.”
1SA 26:25 Mẹ wọ e, Saul oben Devid bi, “Nnwa kwaam Devid, tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọdọ-ọ; kọ ási idik s'ibari odik, k'odik ọkka abira ákhaama ekhemma.” Mẹ wọ, Devid ofona, Saul obiro ọkpa nnam ọbhana k'obhon kwẹ.
1SA 27:1 Mẹ wọ, wa Devid ochibhi k'ettem chẹ, oben bi, “Ewu dani Saul ófhu-m ofhu. Odik obongikwẹ kwa kaam ifha nkkaana for saam, ode bi, nnọbh nchina k'ẹkhọma cha Philistiya e. Mẹ wọ kwa Saul ọ́kwọbh-m ororor k'ibe kpenamkpen m'Israẹl, kaam mbir ńnaang ẹ.”
1SA 27:2 Mẹ wọ, Devid obina ttara anọng pẹ ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh jobh ochina k'ọvaar Akish kwa Gat, kw'ode nnwa kwa Maok.
1SA 27:3 Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ arukhi ttara Akish ka Gat. Ojinọng kpenamkpen ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chẹ. Wa Devid ọkhaam panọng afa p'ade Ahinoam kwa Jẹzrẹl ọmaana Abigẹl kwa Kaamẹl kw'ode opopa kwa Nabal.
1SA 27:4 Mada Saul ọbhaang bi, Devid ọkk'ọrọbha ochina ka Gat, ọkwọbh-ẹ ororor.
1SA 27:5 Mẹ wọ, Devid oben Akish bi, “Idikha nkk'ọphyaam ndọkha ka kọ k'itzitzikha, tte bẹ anang-m ibe m'obhon nwa ifha nnuk. Okhuri yan kwa kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ nna-nnuk k'ivaar-be ttar-ọ o?”
1SA 27:6 Mẹ wọ, m'ewu nduma, Akish ọn-ọnang-ẹ obhon kwa Ziklag, in-ide irerek s'avaarnọng pa Juda, ttẹwọr kẹ ma apyiri ma.
1SA 27:7 Wa Devid orukhi cho wani ọmaana aphe anna k'ẹkhọma cha Philistiya.
1SA 27:8 Wa Devid ọmaana anọng pẹ, atza arima abaGeshur, ọmaana abaGirz ttara ab'Amalẹk abẹ. Anọng mba akk'arukha m'irerek nna s'ittẹwọr ka Shur inyaami ipyiri k'Ijip, ttẹwọr k'ọtzama-gbe.
1SA 27:9 Ogbe kpenamkpen kwa Devid orim anọng abẹ, ọnọng manda wani ọbọhk k'om-otte oruk akpen, ode ojinọng obiro ode kwanọng. Yina, ọm-ọtzọkha arukhimaan, ọmaana ndamogbodo, ọmaana nnyanyaang, ọmaana akamẹl ttara ọbara otzima ọkpa nnam otza okhebha Akish.
1SA 27:10 Ogbe kw'Akish ọbọbhi bi, “Bọng anọng p'arim abẹ mayina?” Devid om-oben bi, “Morim Nẹgẹv kwa Juda ọmaana Nẹgẹv kwa Jẹramẹl ttara Nẹgẹv kwa abaKen abẹ e.”
1SA 27:11 Devid ọnọng manda wani ọbọhk kotte, ode ojinọng obiro ode kwanọng oruk akpen ọkpa nnam ka Gat, okhuri da kẹ ochibhi bi “Bẹ afha ajaakhi agbaak man aben bi, ‘Kkeri odik-dema kwa Devid osi e.’ ” Osisi kwa Devid wọ mẹ mada orukhi k'ẹkhọma cha Philistiya.
1SA 27:12 Wa Akish ọkhaam ekhera ka Devid ochibhi k'ettem chẹ bi, “Devid ọkk'anọng pẹ p'Israẹl idik okpukhi, mẹ wọ, kẹ ón-ode ọtzọhmnọng kwaam maa ogbe ode.”
1SA 28:1 K'ogbe nwuma, aPhilistiya atzobh agbong-nọng pabẹ bi, bẹ arima anọng p'Israẹl abẹ. Akish oben Devid bi, “Kọ ronga bi, kọ ọmaana anọng pọ, bọng átzor-m egbong o.”
1SA 28:2 Devid oben bi, “Tte kwẹ ode mando, yina kw'an-are ọttọhk fa kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ mfha nsi ẹ.” Akish obhina bi, “Ojibhi kẹ, kaam nna nsọ-ọ ade ọbaabh-akpen paam maa ogbe ode.”
1SA 28:3 M'ogbe nwa, wa Samwẹl ọkk'ọpa, bẹ anọhng-ẹ ka Rama kw'ode obhon kwẹ, anọng p'Israẹl biphyir akk'abira awobha ka nkwu-osisi sẹ. Wa Saul ọkk'abhar-abọhkpakpa ọmaana abọhnga-nọng okhubha k'Israẹl.
1SA 28:4 APhilistiya akwu atzobha asi ibhingabe ka Shunẹm. Yina Saul otzobha anọng p'Israẹl biphyir, asi ibhingabe ka Gilboa.
1SA 28:5 Mada Saul ore agbong-nọng pa Philistiya, opoma ọsẹ-ẹ, ojora obiro ọfhẹ-ẹ k'ettem bi pyẹẹr
1SA 28:6 Mẹ wọ, Saul ọdọhn Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, yina, kaambi k'ọdachen vọ, obiro ode k'ose ọbhabhari, ọmaana k'asi-ẹjaakhi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kẹ ebhina kọnangi.
1SA 28:7 Mẹ wọ, Saul ọgbaak akhaan-nọng pẹ bi, “Bọng nnor kwanọng kw'ọbhari abọhkpakpa anang-m ifha nda ndọhn-ẹ.” Bẹ aben bi, “ọbhari abọhkpakpa wani owobh k'Ẹndọr.”
1SA 28:8 Mẹ wọ, Saul obhona ẹnya chẹ, ọn-ọfọra ẹnya ẹdọdọk ifha bẹ aning-ẹ atzini. M'erungi, kẹ ọmaana ajinọng afa atzọn achina ka kwanọng nwuma. Oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ bhari abọhkpakpa pọ anang-m, ifha opfuranọng kwa nyeri che, oyin.”
1SA 28:9 Mẹ wọ, kwanọng nwuma obhin-ẹ bi, “Kọ akk'aronga k'odik-ọkka bi, Saul ọkk'ibọhk ọsana, okhubh abhar-abọhkpakpa ọmaana abọhnga-nọng p'obhon nwa. Okhuri yan kwa bọng amun-m ọmma kw'obo-dema nwa o?”
1SA 28:10 Mẹ wọ, Saul ọnwọhngi ọnang-ẹ, ka che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “K'odik ọkkọkka mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, ọnọng kw'ọsọ-ọ ọttọhk kode.”
1SA 28:11 Mẹ wọ, kwanọng nwuma ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Anyi wọ kw'arori bi nsi oyin k'epe o?” Obhin-ẹ bi, “Si Samwẹl oyin k'epe.”
1SA 28:12 Mada kwanọng nwuma ore Samwẹl, ọkpẹbh ẹmọng k'ẹrọng, oben Saul bi, “Okhuri yan kw'abọr-m o? Kọ ade Saul.”
1SA 28:13 Ọvaarnọng oben-ẹ bi, “Ojora oning-ọ osi. Mbọng f'are o?” Kwanọng nwuma obhina Saul bi, “Nne opfuranọng kw'oyini k'epe e.”
1SA 28:14 Saul ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Okheri mbọng o?” Kwanọng nwuma obhin-ẹ bi, “Okheri ojinọng kw'ọkk'ọtzama, kw'ọfhọr owura-baba.” Mẹ wọ, wa Saul oronga bi, Samwẹl wọ, ofona mẹ, ọrakha ottima itzitzikha k'irerek.
1SA 28:15 Samwẹl oben Saul bi, “Okhuri yan, kw'ayakh-m atzim bi, asi-m mphyọbha k'epekhung o?” Saul obhin-ẹ bi, “Okhuri bi kaam nwobh ka dama-dama kw'ideden. Anọng pa Philistiya am-arimm-m abẹ e, kaam bi mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi okk'nnam ọkpa ọbọr-m. Kaam ebhina k'ọdachen ọmaana k'agbaakhi-nkkaabha dọk kọmọnang. Mẹ wọ, nkwu bi agbaakh-m odem kwa nsi.”
1SA 28:16 Samwẹl oben bi, “Okhuri yan kwa akwu dọhn-m o, mada Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'nnam ọkpa ọbọrọ-ọ, on-ode ọttattaanga-nọng kwọ o?
1SA 28:17 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọsa mach'iwa otzim-m osi ẹjaakhi bi osi. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ẹvaar otzini ka mbọhk sọ, ọnang oyok ẹkhaan kwọ, kw'ode Devid.
1SA 28:18 Da kọ ani mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhn-ọ bi, adimi anọng p'Amalẹk ọmaana etzirakpo pyabẹ biphyir asi, kẹ wọ si Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọsọ-ọ manda mayina.
1SA 28:19 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi on-ọtzọkha kọ ọmaana anọng p'Israẹl okhe ka mbọhk s'anọng pa Philistiya, mẹ wọ, k'ewu ch'ophyini, kọ ọmaana va pọ ápe ópe. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obiro ósi agbongnọng p'Israẹl awobha k'irekh-irek kw'anọng pa Philistiya.”
1SA 28:20 Ogbe kobhiri, Saul otto onemi idumsẹ m'irerek, k'opoma okhuri atzim pa Samwẹl ọgbaakhi. Ẹfa dọk kọkhaam, okhuri ofor-mọma kwa oyim okwo k'ewu nduma ọmaana erungi biphyir.
1SA 28:21 Mada kwanọng nwuma ore bi, ojora okk'Saul ọsa, oben-ẹ bi, “Tzotzokhaan itta, ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ọkk'ọ okpobha. Mbar ettem, nsi mach'aben-m bi nsi.
1SA 28:22 Tzotzokhaan kọ biri yonga ọtzọhmnọng kwọ itzọhng, tte nnang-ọ ọchattọhk achi ifha akhaama ẹfa ch'atzima arenga k'eden abhana.”
1SA 28:23 Wa Saul obhum, oben bi, “Ọttọhk kinchi.” Mẹ wọ, atzọhmnọng pẹ, ọmaana kwanọng nwuma achina ororo agban-ẹ bi ochi ọttọhk, wa ọbhaanga bẹ. Ọbina k'irerek owobha ẹwọr k'eyima.
1SA 28:24 Kwanọng nwuma ọtzọkha ọbhaamnwa kw'ojibhi for kw'ọgban k'ọhọhm ofhu. Obiro ogberi abubuma p'awit otzima osi brẹd kwa bẹ ani yist akhe.
1SA 28:25 Mẹ wọ, otzini brẹd nnwa obera Saul ọmaana atzọhmnọng pẹ, bẹ achi. M'erungiwu nduma dani bẹ abina abhana.
1SA 29:1 Wa aPhilistiya atzobh agbong-nọng pabẹ k'Aphẹk, anọng p'Israẹl abira abhing k'ikhekhekha kwa Jẹzrẹl.
1SA 29:2 Mada adaabhi p'aPhilistiya am-arenga ka ngaan sabẹ s'arọbh azen-azen, ọmaana ka nnọhna-nnọhna, Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ am-arenga Akish ka nnam-annam.
1SA 29:3 Odenho kw'aPhilistiya ọbọbh bi, “AHiburu mba am-asi mbọng ma o?” Akish obhina bi, “Devid kw'ode odenho wani kwa Saul, ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl wọ ma e. Kẹ okk'owobha ttara kaam ọttọhk ka cho ọmaana-ọmaana, ttẹwọr k'ewu ch'owobh ttara kaam maa opyiri ma, epina otzim ọkhaama.”
1SA 29:4 Yina, adenho p'agbong-nọng pa Philistiya ọdọhkhi bẹ ttara Akish, bẹ aben bi, “Kọ ben ojinọng nwa ọkpa nnam k'obhon kw'akk'ẹ ananga. Kẹ kọkhaambi ọtzọn man abẹ ọtza egbong, ifha oningi man abẹ ọbhakhi k'égbong-dam. Yan wọ kwa kẹ otzima osi ettem ẹdaam itta kwẹ o, idikha oni nho s'ajinọng paman otzim o?
1SA 29:5 Devid nwa arang ma kwa bẹ akkọhni k'ẹmọng aben bi, “ ‘Saul okk'nnọhna sẹ ọfha, Devid okk'nnọhna-nabhik sẹ ọfha.’ ”
1SA 29:6 Mẹ wọ, Akish oyeri Devid oben-ẹ bi, “Mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, kọ akk'oyokh-ẹkhaan ọkkakka ada, kaam ira ọdaakh-m bi, mọtzọn osi ọtzọhm f'arim-egbong e. Ttẹwọr k'ewu ch'iwa arọbhi atzor-m, maa apyiri ma, epina ka kọ ndimi nna, yina, adabhi kakher bi, atza egbong e.
1SA 29:7 Kọ kpa nnam abhana k'odidiri, odik kasi kw'ọdọkhi adabhi pa Philistiya.”
1SA 29:8 Devid ọn-ọbọbh bi, “Kaam nsi yan o? Bọng epina cha kọ akk'ara ka kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, tzọni k'ewu ch'iwa nnọbhi ndor-ọ, maa apyiri ma o? Mbọng vọ ira osi kaam nningi attattaanga-nọng p'itta kwaam kw'ode ọvaarnọng abẹ nda nnima?”
1SA 29:9 Akish obhina Devid bi, “Kaam nnong kẹ bi, kọ epina k'itzitzikha saam kakhaam mach'oreng-eden kw'Ibinọkpaabyi kw'oni epina ọkhaam, odik ode bi, adenho p'agbong-nọng pa Philistiya abeni bi, ‘Kẹ kọkhaambi ọtzọn man abẹ ọtza egbong.’
1SA 29:10 Mẹ wọ, ophyini k'ekpekpebha, kọ bina atzima atzọhmnọng p'itta kwọ p'atzọn-ọ abẹ, abhana mada ewu ẹttaani.”
1SA 29:11 Mẹ wọ e, Devid otzima anọng pẹ obina k'ekpekpebha ọkpa nnam ọbhana k'ẹkhọma cha Philistiya, aPhilistiya abira achina ka Jẹzrẹl.
1SA 30:1 Wa Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ, atzim iwu ittaan apyiri Ziklag. M'ogbe nwuma, ab'Amalẹk akk'Nẹgẹv ọmaana Ziklag acha k'egbong. Bẹ akk'Ziklag abẹ arima maa bẹ atzima ekpon akwọm-ẹ.
1SA 30:2 Bẹ abira abọkha panọng ọmaana anọng p'awobh mẹ biphyir, vava ttara adenden-nọng k'ẹmmọri. Wa bẹ ọnọng manda wani kafhu, yina, bẹ atzim bẹ ekhekhebhi afona.
1SA 30:3 Mada Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ apyiri Ziklag, bẹ an-are bi, bẹ akk'Ziklag akwọmi biphyir, bẹ abira abọkha panọng pabẹ ọmaana va pabẹ p'ijinọng ọmaana p'ipanọng k'ẹmmọri.
1SA 30:4 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọmaana anọng pẹ abhom amọng k'ẹrọng maa, ẹfa ch'obhoma ẹha bẹ.
1SA 30:5 Wa bẹ akk'panọng pa Devid afa p'ade; Ahinoam kw'ofon Jẹzrẹl, ọmaana Abigẹl kw'ode opopa kwa Nabal kw'ofon Kaamẹl, abọkha atzima afona.
1SA 30:6 Wa odik nwa ọyak Devid atzim k'iden-dama, okhuri da iwa anọng pẹ an-am-aben bi atzọbh-ẹ atza. Wa ọnọng kpenamkpen ettem ekk'ẹpyibha itzama-itzama, okhuri panọng ọmaana va pabẹ p'ijinọng ọmaana p'ipanọng. Yina, Devid ọtzọk ottem-bara k'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwẹ.
1SA 30:7 Mẹ wọ, Devid oben Abiyata kw'ode ọfọhnẹja, obiro ode nnwa kw'Ahimẹlẹk bi, “Kọ tzọkha ẹphọd chen-m.” Abiyata ọtzọkha ẹphọd ochen-ẹ.
1SA 30:8 Devid e, ọdọhn Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “Itta, ma ńgubh ẹkhaan nda ch'echi obhon o? Na mfha ngọbha bẹ o?” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhina bi, “Kọ khubh bẹ, kkeri ábọkha bẹ ọbọkha, abira árọbha anọng pọ ọrọbha ka mbọhk sabẹ.”
1SA 30:9 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh jobh p'atzọn-ẹ abẹ apyiri k'ẹttẹri cha Bẹsọr, mẹ da bẹ ahokhi ayok bani.
1SA 30:10 Wa anọng arọbh jobh ọkhọhn bẹ maa, bẹ ẹttẹri nduma kafha ajekha. Yina, Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ ẹnọhna achina ororo okhubh anọng mba.
1SA 30:11 Wa bẹ are oJipnọng wani kw'owobh k'owoni, bẹ abọkh-ẹ achena Devid. Bẹ anang-ẹ asi ogwo, abira anang-ẹ ọchattọhk ochi.
1SA 30:12 Bẹ abira atzọkha afig p'agwu-ogwu ọmaana agrep p'agwu-ogwu anang-ẹ, ochi obiro ọkhaama ẹfa. Kẹ wa ọchattọhk manda vani k'iwu ittaan ọmaana nnungiwu nttaan otzim ọm-ọmọcha. Asi manda bani k'iwu ittaan ọmaana nnungiwu nttaan otzim ọm-ọgwa.
1SA 30:13 Wa Devid ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Anyi wọ ode atte? Kọ afon man?” Oben bi, “Kaam mfon Ijip, nde obira kw'ọnọng kw'ofon Amalẹk. Itta kwaam obhum-m da ọmmaam-m k'iwu ittaan s'ikk'ikwọbha e.
1SA 30:14 Mokk'Nẹgẹv kw'aKẹrẹt, ọmaana okhubha kwa Juda, ttara Nẹgẹv kwa Kalẹb ọcha k'egbong e. Mokk'ekpon obiro otzima ọkwọmi Ziklag.”
1SA 30:15 Devid ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Na kọ atzim-m nda ngebha ẹkhaan ch'akhọkhọhra mbuma o?” Obhina bi, “Kọ chekhi m'itzitzikha s'Ibinọkpaabyi bi, kọ kaam kafhu, kaam ọbọhk kabira atte anang itta kwaam. Kaam ndim-otzima nda kẹ da bẹ awobh.”
1SA 30:16 Mẹ wọ, oJip-nọng nwuma otzima Devid eden ofona, bẹ atza akhebha ab'Amalẹk p'akk'anyaami makhọri ibe kpenamkpen. Bẹ am-achi, abira am-agwo, am-asi ọdadaami okhuri ọgbọm-barada fa bẹ akk'acha k'ẹkhọma ch'aPhilistiya, ọmaana ka Juda.
1SA 30:17 Devid orima bẹ abẹ ttẹwọr m'ẹchọhkha nduma maa, otza opyiri ẹchọhkha ch'ẹwu ẹdọdọk. Wa ọnọng manda wani kw'ọnaang kode, oyongi adikkobh ẹnọhna p'avur akamẹl arọbh afona.
1SA 30:18 Wa Devid ọkpa nnam ọtzọkha ọttọhk kpenamkpen, ttara panọng pẹ afa p'ab'Amalẹk akk'atzọkha.
1SA 30:19 Ọttọhk manda vani f'iwa odimi kode. Wa Devid otzim ọttọhk kpenamkpen ọkpa nnam, ttẹwọr k'igbọ ọmaana adeden-nọng, adikkobh ttara aminava, ọgbọm ọmaana ọttọhk kpenamkpen fa bẹ akk'atzọkha.
1SA 30:20 Wa Devid ọkpa nnam ọtzọkha arukhimaan ọmaana abhaam biphyir, agbongnọng pẹ akpena pyẹ k'itzitzikha s'etzirakpo ọdọdọk, am-aben bi, “Ma wọ ode ọgbọm fa Devid e.”
1SA 30:21 Wa Devid ọkpa nnam okwu okhebha ajinọng arọbh jobh mba p'ira ẹfa ẹkk'ẹha, bẹ kẹ abẹ kafha atzọn, bẹ an-atte bẹ ọbọhk k'ẹttẹri cha Bẹsọr. Anọng mba ayin ka akwu akhebha Devid ọmaana ajinọng p'atzọn-ẹ abẹ. Mada Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ areng ọbaanga bẹ, Devid orima bẹ.
1SA 30:22 Yina, abyibyanọng ọmaana akhọkhọra biphyir p'awobh k'ottem kw'anọng p'atzọni Devid abẹ, aben bi, “Bẹ ekkema manda dani m'ọgbọm mva kátzọkha, okhuri bi, ira bẹ man abẹ katzọni. Tte ojinọng kpenamkpen okhinggẹ ọtzọkha kwanọng kwẹ ọmaana va pẹ, ọrọhng ọbhana.”
1SA 30:23 Devid obhina bi, “Mma e, votte paam, bọng mando kakhaambi asi ttara ekpo py'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'man ọnanga e. Kẹ okk'man ọkkaana, obiro otte agbong-nọng p'arim man abẹ ọbọhk ọnang man.
1SA 30:24 Anyi wọ óyonga bọng itzọhng k'odik kwa bọng agbaakh o? Ekkema ch'anang ọnọng kw'ira okkeri egbongkpo, ede mbenga-mbọhk ttara ọnọng kw'ira ọtza egbong. Anọng biphyir átzọkha ekkema odem wani.”
1SA 30:25 Wa Devid ọtzọkha odik nwa ohok mach'ọsana, ttara ọphaangi ọnang anọng p'Israẹl, ttẹwọr kẹ maa apyiri mayina.
1SA 30:26 Mada Devid opyiri ka Ziklag, ọtzọhm ekkema ch'ọgbọm ochena adenho pa Juda, p'ade ayokh-odikkobh pẹ, oben bi, “Ma wọ ode ẹnanga cha bọng ch'efon k'ọgbọm fa mochi k'attattaanga-nọng p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.”
1SA 30:27 Wa okkema ẹnanga nda ọtzọhm ochena anọng ka Bẹtẹl, ọmaana ka Ramọt Nẹgẹv, ttara ka Jatir,
1SA 30:28 ọmaana k'Aroe, ọmaana ka Siphmọt, ttara Ẹstẹmoa,
1SA 30:29 ọmaana ka Rakal, ọmaana k'ibhon s'abaJẹramẹl ttara abaKen,
1SA 30:30 ọmaana ka Họma, ọmaana ka Bor-Ashan, ttara k'Atak,
1SA 30:31 ọmaana ka Hẹbrọn, ttara anọng k'obe kpenamkpen mva fa Devid ọmaana anọng pẹ, akk'awena apyiri.
1SA 31:1 M'ogbe nwa, wa aPhilistiya atza arima anọng p'Israẹl abẹ. Ajinọng p'Israẹl arọbh k'itzitzikha s'aPhilistiya. Wa anọng p'Israẹl haabhada ape k'egbegbeho cha Gilboa.
1SA 31:2 Wa aPhilistiya akhubh Saul ọmaana va pẹ p'ijinọng m'ẹkhoma-ẹkhọma, bẹ afhu va pa Saul p'ijinọng p'ade; Jonatan, ọmaana Abinadab, ttara Malki-Shua.
1SA 31:3 Egbong nduma echina ororo ẹgaangi maa ekhe Saul k'ottem. Mada abhar-ayuk akhọbh Saul, bẹ ammum-ẹ ekpo itzama-itzama.
1SA 31:4 Mẹ wọ e, Saul oben otzim-egbongkpo pyẹ bi, “Tzọr ọkkangkkaang kwọ akhum-m, oni mando ode, akpatzọr-nọng mba ákwu akhebh-m okhebha ma akhum afhu, bẹ abira aben-m ẹmma.” Yina, otzim-egbongkpo pyẹ odik nwuma ojor-ẹ, kẹ kokher ofhu, ofona mẹ, Saul ọtzọkha ọkkangkkaang kwa kẹ khaam, otto ọkpẹkhi ofhu for sẹ.
1SA 31:5 Mada otzim-egbongkpo ore bi Saul ọkk'ọpa, kẹ obiro otto ọkpẹkhi ọkkangkkaang kwa kẹ kaam, ofhu for sẹ.
1SA 31:6 Mẹ wọ, Saul ọmaana va pẹ attaan, ọmaana otzim-egbongkpo kwẹ, ttara ajinọng pẹ biphyir, ape ewu nduma dani.
1SA 31:7 Mada anọng p'Israẹl p'arukhi k'okhubha nwonggo kw'ẹttẹr, ọmaana ayok p'arukhi ka Jọrdan okhubha, an-are bi agbong-nọng p'Israẹl akk'arọbha, ọmaana bi Saul ttara va pẹ akk'apa, bẹ abina aji ibhon sabẹ, arọbh afona. Wa aPhilistiya an-akwu atzọkha ibhon nnuma aruk.
1SA 31:8 Ewu ekhobh mẹ, mada aPhilistiya akwu bi akwu afhọhngi abukhi mbuma, bẹ are abukhi pa Saul, ọmaana va pẹ attaan p'atto ayima k'egbegbeho cha Gilboa.
1SA 31:9 Bẹ akpaara eho cha Saul, abira atzọkha egbongkpo pyẹ. Bẹ atzọhm akkaabh-nkkaabha bi, bẹ asi ẹjaakhi k'ẹkhọma cha Philistiya bi waam, k'ọkhapa kw'akha pabẹ, ọmaana k'anọng pabẹ.
1SA 31:10 Bẹ atzọkha egbongkpo pya Saul ahok k'ọkhapa kw'agbatza p'Ashtọrẹt. Bẹ atzọkha obukhi kwẹ adabh k'echumi ch'obhon kwa Bẹt-Shan.
1SA 31:11 Mada anọng pa Jabẹsh-Gilead abhaang odik kw'aPhilistiya asi Saul,
1SA 31:12 akkakkaama pabẹ biphyir abina orenga m'erungi nduma achina ka Bẹt-Shan. Bẹ akhanga obukhi kwa Saul ọmaana pa va pẹ p'ijinọng k'echumi cha Bẹt-Shan, atzima bẹ atza akwọmi ka Jabẹsh.
1SA 31:13 Mẹ wọ e, bẹ atzọkha akhọbhi pabẹ anọhnga k'irekh-irek kw'echi cha tamarisk ka Jabẹsh. Bẹ atzim ọchattọhk k'iwu izenamfa.
2SA 1:1 K'ogbe kwa Saul ọkk'ọpa, Devid obina kẹ da okk'anọng p'Amalẹk okhema okhuna, okwu owobha iwu ifa ka Ziklag.
2SA 1:2 Ottong iwu ittaan, ojinọng wani kw'ofon k'ibhingabe sa Saul okwu, ttara ọbara f'ọkk'ẹ ọjaakhi ka for, ọmaana ọkpọhm k'eho. Mada opyiri k'ibe sa Devid owobh, otto okhubha m'irerek k'ikpokpobha.
2SA 1:3 Devid e, ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ afon man akwu ma o?” Ojinọng nwa obhina bi, “Kaam nnọbhi k'ibhingabe s'agbong-nọng p'Israẹl e.”
2SA 1:4 Devid ọbọbh bi, “Bọng odik wọ otto? Gbaakh-m.” Ojinọng nwa obhina bi, “Asoja haabhada p'Israẹl arọbhi k'egbong-dam, haabhada abira ape. Saul ọmaana nnwa kwẹ Jonatan akk'abira apa e.”
2SA 1:5 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọbọbh odikkobh nwa kw'otzim ẹkkaabha nda okwu bi, “Kọ areng yan aronga bi, Saul ọmaana nnwa kwẹ Jonatan akk'apa?”
2SA 1:6 Odikkobh nwa oben bi, “Odik ode bi, kaam nda k'egbegbeho cha Gilboa, nna nda nttema da Saul on-otto ọkpẹkhi ọkhọhn fẹ, ttara bi, akpaar pa nnyanyaang mmindọr, ọmaana ayaari-nnyanyaang am-akhubh-ẹ ẹkhọma-ẹkhọma.
2SA 1:7 Mada ọbhakhi ore-m, oyer-m, nkhera mben bi, ‘Kkeri kaam ma e.’
2SA 1:8 “Ọbọbh-m bi, ‘Kọ ade bọng ọnọng o?’ “Kaam e, mmina bi, ‘Kaam mfon Amalẹk e.’
2SA 1:9 “Mẹ wọ, oben-m bi, ‘Rọkhi abaang-m, afhu-m! Kaam nna nwobh ka mbọhk s'obo, yina, ndimi nji iwọhng ka e.’
2SA 1:10 “Mẹ wọ, mbẹ-ẹ m'ẹbhabhaanga, mfhẹ-ẹ, okhuri da nne bi, mada ọkk'ọtta mẹ, akpen dọk kofha oruk. Nnwọr-ẹ ivaarkpo s'ọfọr k'eho, ọmaana ogimma kw'okhe k'ọbọhk. Nkk'pyẹ ndima nkwu ma bi, nnang kọ itta kwaam e.”
2SA 1:11 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ biphyir abọkha ọbara fa bẹ afọr ka for ajaakhi.
2SA 1:12 Bẹ awobha ka nkwu-osisi, abira abhom amọng, atzim ọchattọhk maa, ẹchọhkha etto. Wa bẹ asi mando, okhuri obo kwa Saul ope ọmaana nnwa kwẹ Jonatan, ọmaana agbong-nọng p'anọng p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ttara anọng p'Israẹl, okhuri bi, bẹ atzim ọkkangkkaang afhu bẹ.
2SA 1:13 Devid e, ọbọbh odikkobh nwuma kw'otzim ẹkkaabha nda okwu bi, “Kọ afon man o?” Ojinọng nwuma obhina bi, “Kaam nde nnwa kw'okhekhen-nọng kw'ofon Amalẹk.”
2SA 1:14 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Osi yan kw'ira on-ojor bi, ayaangi ọbọhk kwọ, afhu ọnọng kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ana obyengi k'eho?”
2SA 1:15 Mẹ wọ, Devid oyeri ojinọng kwẹ wani, oben bi, “Rọhng, atza afhẹ-ẹ!” Ofona mẹ, obun-ẹ ofhu, ojinọng nwuma ope.
2SA 1:16 Ode cha Devid ọkk'ẹ obena bi, “Izi sọ ibhaakhi ikpan kọ ọkhaam. Da akk'ẹmma chọ atzima asi ẹjaakhi bi, ‘Kaam nkk'ọnọng kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ana obyengi k'eho mfha e.’ ”
2SA 1:17 Devid ọkkọhni ebomọng nda otzima ojima Saul ọmaana nnwa kwẹ Jonatan.
2SA 1:18 Obiro ọnang ẹfa bi, bẹ akpebhi ajinọng pa Juda ebomọng nda ch'oyuk. (Bẹ akkẹri ẹmọng nda ka nnwẹr kwa Jasha).
2SA 1:19 “Israẹl o, ajibhada pọ ape ayima ka mgbegbeho sọ. Kpebh e, kkeri odem kw'afanọng atto e!
2SA 1:20 “Bọng odik nwa ka Gat kàgbaak, Bọng kwẹ ka mkpaanga-den s'Ashkẹlọn kàgbaak, oni mando ode, aminava p'anọng pa Philistiya, awobha k'ọdadaami, oni mando ode, aminava p'anọng p'ani ọkpakkọrikkọ asi, awobha k'ọdadaami.
2SA 1:21 “Mgbegbeho sa Gilboa o, bọng abonisi obiro ode ẹrọng, káre e. Kaambi k'iwoni rọ, achimọma pa nnanga káwọm, okhuri bi, mẹ wọ kwa bẹ alukhi ọkhọhnkpa kw'afanọng, bẹ ọkhọhnkpa kwa Saul ana dọk kabọhr.
2SA 1:22 Ofon k'izi s'anọng pa ape, ofona k'ayaara p'afanọng, oyuk kwa Jonatan nnama-nnam kọkpa. Ọkkangkkaang kwa Saul nnam k'idukhi kobiro ọkpa.
2SA 1:23 “Mada iwa Saul ọmaana Jonatan arukhi akpen, bẹ akhaam idadaakha, abira asi ọphyaam anang ayok; k'obo, bẹ ayok kabira abhaangi. Wa bẹ aphyebhi ayọhnga okye-nọhn, bẹ akhaama ẹfa ayọhnga nkye.
2SA 1:24 “Aminava p'Israẹl o, bọng mom Saul e, kw'ọnangi bọng ọbara fa for f'ode iho-iho, ọmaana agimma, kw'odok nnya sabọng ttara ẹfanginẹ-kpo pya gol.
2SA 1:25 “Kpebh e! Kkeri odem kw'afanọng akk'atta k'egbong e! Jonatan ope oyima ka mgbegbeho sọ.
2SA 1:26 Jonatan ọgbaanọkka kwaam o, kaam mmomi kọ e, kọ wa abar-m odik kpọng-kpọng. Idadaakha s'iwa akhaam ttar-m ikkoni-okkoni, ikkoni ọtzam iyọhnga idadaakha sa kwanọng.
2SA 1:27 “Kkeri odem kw'afanọng akk'atta! Egbongkpo ekk'ekhibhi biphyir-phyir!”
2SA 2:1 Okwu opyiri k'ogbe mẹ, Devid ọdọhn Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọbọbh bi, “Na kaam mfha mvura k'obhon wani kw'ẹkhọma cha Juda o?” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhin-ẹ bi, “Rọhng atza avura.” Devid ọbọbh bi, “Nchina ka bọng okhubha o?” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhin-ẹ bi, “China ka Hẹbrọn.”
2SA 2:2 Mẹ wọ, Devid ochina ka Hẹbrọn ttara panọng pẹ afa p'ade, Ahinoam kw'ofon Jẹzrẹl ọmaana Abigẹl, kw'ode opopa kwanọng kwa Nabal kw'ofon Kaamẹl.
2SA 2:3 Iwa Devid obiro otzima ajinọng p'awobh ttar-ẹ, ọnọng-ọnọng ttara ẹhọhmmọr chẹ, bẹ atza aruk k'ibhon sa Hẹbrọn.
2SA 2:4 Wa ajinọng pa Juda abina akwu ka Hẹbrọn, mẹ wọ kwa bẹ abyengi Devid ana k'eho, on-ode ọvaarnọng kwa Juda. Mada bẹ agbaakhi Devid bi, ajinọng pa Jabẹsh-Gilead bọ anọhng Saul,
2SA 2:5 mando kwa Devid ọtzọhmi akkaabh-nkkaabha, atza agbaak ajinọng pa Jabẹsh-Gilead bi, “Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi odo bọng k'ọphyaam fa bọng asi anang itta kwabọng Saul, da bọng anọhng-ẹ.
2SA 2:6 Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi ọphyaam ọnang bọng, obiro ọkhọhkha bọng idadaakha, kaam mbiri nsi ọphyaam nnang bọng, okhuri odik nwa kwa bọng akk'asa.
2SA 2:7 Mẹ wọ, bọng gaangi for, ade ajinọng bi gbuk da Saul kw'ode itta kwabọng ọkk'ọpa e. Kẹ wọ osi, ajinọng pa Juda akk'aam ana abyengi k'eho bi, nde ọvaarnọng kwabẹ.”
2SA 2:8 Ayongi mẹ, nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Nẹr, kw'okpen Abnẹr kw'ode oho kw'agbong-nọng pa Saul, okk'Ish-Boshẹt kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Saul, otzima ojekha ka Mahanayim.
2SA 2:9 Ọsẹ-ẹ ọvaarnọng kw'anọng pa Gilead, ọmaana Ashur, ọmaana Jẹzrẹl, ọmaana Ephraim, ọmaana Bẹnjamin ttara Israẹl biphyir.
2SA 2:10 Wa Ish-Boshẹt kw'ode nnwa kwa Saul, ode cho arọbh afa, mada ode ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl, ọdabh bẹ ka cho afa. Yina, wa ẹkhọma cha Juda ẹtzọn Devid abẹ.
2SA 2:11 Wa Devid orukhi ka Hẹbrọn, ode ọvaarnọng kw'anọng pa Juda, ka cho azenamfa ọmaana aphe azadani.
2SA 2:12 Abnẹr kw'ode nnwa kwa Nẹr, ọmaana ajinọng p'Ish-Boshẹt kw'ode nnwa kwa Saul, abina ka Mahanayim achina ka Gibeọn.
2SA 2:13 Wa Joab nnwa kwa Zeruya, ọmaana ajinọng pa Devid atza attema ayok abẹ k'esipe cha Gibeọn. Ẹkhaan dani ewobh ẹwọr k'okhubha wani kw'esipe, ẹkhaan ndonggo ewobha ẹwọr k'okhubha nwonggo.
2SA 2:14 Mẹ wọ e, Abnẹr oben Joab bi, “Tte m'otzekha adikkobh paman bani, bẹ atzima mbọhk-mbọhk arima ayok abẹ ma man k'itzitzikha.” Joab e, oben bi, “Ojibhi kẹ! Tte bẹ arima.”
2SA 2:15 Mando kwa bẹ atzek ajinọng jobh obhiri afa pa Bẹnjamin ọmaana Ish-Boshẹt nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Saul. Bẹ abira atzekha ajinọng jobh obhiri afa pa Devid.
2SA 2:16 Mẹ wọ, ojinọng kpenamkpen ọdabh oyok m'eho, okhum-ẹ ọkkangkkaang m'abhọribom, bẹ atto m'irerek ape. Ofona mẹ, bẹ ayeri ibe nnuma ka Gibeọn, Helkat-Hazurim.
2SA 2:17 Iwa egbong ẹgaangi m'ewu nduma maa, ajinọng pa Devid akhema ajinọng p'Abnẹr ọmaana ajinọng p'Israẹl.
2SA 2:18 Iwa va attaan pa Zeruya awobh mẹ p'ade: Joab, ọmaana Abishayi, ọmaana Asahẹl. Wa Asahẹl ode ọnọng kw'okpo ẹbhar mach'otzen-wuri k'ẹtzam.
2SA 2:19 Asahẹl okhubh Abnẹr, nnam kọbhakhi bi okkeri k'odimbọhk, ọmaana kwabọhk.
2SA 2:20 Abnẹr ọbhakhi nnam ọbọbh bi, “Asahẹl kọ wọ mẹ o?” Asahẹl obhina bi, “O o kaam wọ e.”
2SA 2:21 Abnẹr oben-ẹ bi, “Kkeri k'odimbọhk abira akkeri ka kwabọhk kwọ, abọkha odikkobh wani egbongkpo pyẹ ana.” Kaambi mẹ wọ, Asahẹl kokher bi ọkwọbh-ẹ okhukhubh.
2SA 2:22 Abnẹr obiro oben Asahẹl bi, “Kwọbh-m okhukhubh! Okhuri yan kwa kaam mfhọ-ọ o mmari m'irerek? Yan kwa kaam nkkeri agbaanakka Joab k'itzitzikha o?”
2SA 2:23 Yina, Asahẹl kokher bi ọkwọbha Abnẹr okhukhubh. Ofona mẹ, Abnẹr otzima ẹkhọhnma chẹ okhum Asahẹl k'ẹbhọr maa, ọkhọhn oyin ka nnam. Asahẹl otto m'ẹbaa ope. Ojinọng kpenamkpen kw'opyiri m'ibe s'Asahẹl oyim ope, obe mẹ k'ikpokpobha.
2SA 2:24 Yina, Joab ọmaana Abishayi akhubh Abnẹr, mada ewuchen ẹm-ẹkhakha, bẹ apyiri k'egbegbeho ch'Ama, ọbaanga Giya, k'ọkkadeden kw'ochin k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi sa Gibeọn.
2SA 2:25 Mẹ wọ, ajinọng p'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin abe Abnẹr ka nnam. Bẹ atzobha k'ẹkhaan dani, atza abe k'egbegbeho-ebira, ado for s'egbong.
2SA 2:26 Mando kw'Abnẹr, oyeri Joab, oben bi, “Ode bi ọkkangkkaang ochina ororo ofhu anọng maa, ogbe ode o? Kọ katzini bi, okpong kw'odik nwa, otzima ọmmamma okwu o? Ogbe obhir otzuma yan, yina aben ajinọng pọ akwọbha vọkka pabẹ okhukhubh o?”
2SA 2:27 Joab obhina bi, “Odem nwa kw'Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, idikha ira ani ẹmọng asi, ira bi, ajinọng mba achina ororo akhubh vọkka pabẹ maa, ewu ehobha.”
2SA 2:28 Ofona mẹ e, Joab ogyi obukpọhng, otzima oyeri ajinọng pẹ biphyir, bẹ akwọbha anọng p'Israẹl okhukhubh, bẹ abira akwọbha erima.
2SA 2:29 M'erungiwu nduma biphyir, Abnẹr ọmaana ajinọng pẹ asi orenga akwọbha Araba, bẹ ajekha Ẹttẹri cha Jọrdan, achina ororo m'ekpebhawu nduma biphyir, akwọbha obhon kwa Bitrọn akwu apyiri ka Mahanayim.
2SA 2:30 Mẹ wọ, Joab ọkpa nnam okhuna kẹ da okhubhi Abnẹr, obiro otzobha ajinọng pẹ biphyir. Oyongi Asahẹl, ajinọng ọhawani kw'ẹrọbh pa Devid bọ ani nnam akpa.
2SA 2:31 Yina, wa ajinọng pa Devid, akk'ajinọng pa Bẹnjamin, anọng arọbh chi obhiri arọbh attaan, p'atzọni Abnẹr abẹ afha.
2SA 2:32 Iwa bẹ atzọkha Asahẹl anọhnga k'epekhubh ch'otte kwẹ, ka Bẹtẹlẹhẹm. Mẹ wọ e, Joab ọmaana ajinọng pẹ atzima erungi nduma biphyir asi orenga maa, bẹ apyiri ka Hẹbrọn k'owuhobha.
2SA 3:1 Iwa egbong cha va pa va pa Saul ttara anọng pa Devid, ewobh k'ogbe-bhirada. Wa anọng pa Devid an-ado ẹfa akhaama, yina, ẹfa echina ororo ẹha va pa va pa Saul.
2SA 3:2 Iwa bẹ amaan va p'ijinọng anang Devid mada orukhi ka Hẹbrọn. Wa ocheden-nwa okpen Amnọn kw'Ahinoam kw'ofon Jẹzrẹl ọmaani;
2SA 3:3 ottong afa okpena Kilẹab kw'Abigẹl, kw'ode opopa kwa Nabal kw'ofon Kaamẹl ọmaani. Ottong attaan okpena Absalọm kw'ode nnwa kwa Maaka ọmaani. Wa Maaka ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kwa Talmayi kw'ode ọvaarnọng kwa Geshur.
2SA 3:4 Ottong anna okpena Adonija kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Hagit; ottong azen okpena Shẹphatiya kw'ode nnwa kw'Abital.
2SA 3:5 Ottong azadani okpena Itreyam kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kw'Ẹgla ọmaani ọnang Devid. Va mba bọ p'iwa bẹ amaani anang Devid k'obhon kwa Hẹbrọn.
2SA 3:6 K'ogbe kwa va pa va pa Saul ọmaana anọng pa Devid atzima arim egbong, Abnẹr om-otzima ogbe nwuma odo for sẹ ẹfa okhe, k'ottem kwa va pa va pa Saul.
2SA 3:7 M'ogbe nwa, Saul ọkk'ọkkọra-kwanọng ọkhaama kw'okpen Rizpa, kw'ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kw'Aiya. Wa Ish-Boshẹt oben Abnẹr bi, “Okhuri yan kw'ayim ọkkọra-kwanọng kw'otte kwaam abẹ o?”
2SA 3:8 Iwa ettem epyibh Abnẹr, okhuri odik kw'Ish-Boshẹt ọgbaakhi. Mẹ wọ, obhina bi, “Kaam nde oho kw'ẹpfa ch'esi ọtzọhm ẹnang anọng pa Juda ra a? Mayina, kaam nhak eho nnang atte Saul, ọmaana efona chẹ, ttara ayokh-ẹkhaan pẹ. Kaam kọ ọbọhk ndim mintta nnang Devid. Yina, kọ abar ettem abubh-m odik mayina, kw'okhuri kwanọng nwa.
2SA 3:9 Tte Ibinọkpaabyi osi-m k'eden kpenamkpen ch'ẹdaakh-ẹ, idikha kaam nni ọttọhk f'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ochekhi ttara ọnwọhngi ọnang Devid, nsi.
2SA 3:10 Ibinọkpaabyi obeni bi, ọtzọkha ẹvaar ch'ọhọhm kwa Saul ọnang Devid, on-ottima ẹvaarchi cha Devid aranga k'Israẹl ọmaana Juda, ttẹwọr ka Dan maa apyiri ka Beershẹba.”
2SA 3:11 Wa Ish-Boshẹt dọk koyom bi, ọgbaak atzim adọdọk ọnang Abnẹr, da Abnẹr ojor-ẹ.
2SA 3:12 Mẹ wọ, wa Abnẹr ọtzọhm akkaabh-nkkaabha bẹ atza abọbh Devid bi, “Irerek s'anyi rọ ma o? Kọ si echekhi ttara kaam, ifha kaam ndima ebhonmọr ch'Israẹl biphyir njekha ndor-ọ.”
2SA 3:13 Devid obhina bi, “Ojibhi kẹ, kaam ńsi echekhi osi ttar-ọ. Yina, tte mphyem-ọ odik wani, kọ kaam k'itzitzikha kabe kw'oyongi bi, atzim Mikal kw'ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kwa Saul, mada akwu bi akwu are-m.”
2SA 3:14 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọtzọhm akkaabh-nkkaabha k'Ish-Boshẹt kw'ode nnwa kwa Saul, oben bi, “Bọng nang-m kwanọng kwaam kwa kaam ndim mkpatzọr arọbh azen s'aPhilistiya ndọkha.”
2SA 3:15 Mando kw'Ish-Boshẹt ọnang ẹfa, bẹ arọbha Mikal k'ọbada kwa Paltiyẹl kw'ode nnwa kwa Laish, atzima afona.
2SA 3:16 Odim om-obhom ẹmọng ọtzọn-ẹ abẹ maa opyiri k'obhon kwa Bahurim. Mẹ wọ, Abnẹr oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ kpa nnam abhana!” Iwa ọkpa nnam ọbhana.
2SA 3:17 Iwa Abnẹr agbaak atzim ttara adenho p'Israẹl, oben bi, “K'ogbe kw'ọkk'ọkwọbha, bọng akk'am-akhonga bi, asi Devid ọvaarnọng.
2SA 3:18 Ogbe okk'on-obenga e, bọng na si mando! Da iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ochekhi ọnang Devid bi, ‘Kaam ńnenga k'ọtzọhmnọng kwaam Devid nkkaana anọng paam p'Israẹl ka mbọhk s'anọng pa Philistiya, ọmaana ka mbọhk s'attattaanga-nọng pabẹ biphyir.’ ”
2SA 3:19 Abnẹr obiro ọgbaak atzim ọnang anọng pa Bẹnjamin. Mẹ wọ, obina ochina ka Hẹbrọn bi, ọtza ọgbaak Devid odik kpenamkpen kw'ojibh-ojibh k'itzitzikha s'anọng p'Israẹl, ọmaana ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin echibhi bi, esi.
2SA 3:20 Mada Abnẹr otzim ajinọng ẹrọbh okwu okhebha Devid ka Hẹbrọn, Devid osi ọdadaami otzima ọtzaam Abnẹr ọmaana ajinọng pẹ.
2SA 3:21 Mẹ wọ, Abnẹr oben Devid bi, “Tte kaam mfona madẹdẹn ifha nda ndobha anọng p'Israẹl biphyir nhok itta kwaam, kw'ode ọvaarnọng, ifha bẹ asi echekhi ttar-ọ. Kọ ábira ade ọvaarnọng kw'ọdabh kpenamkpen mach'ochibhi kwọ ode.” Mẹ wọ, wa Devid oben Abnẹr ọbhana k'odidiri.
2SA 3:22 Mẹ ẹba mẹ, ajinọng pa Devid ọmaana Joab afona k'egbong ttara ọgbọm-barada fa bẹ achi. Yina, wa Abnẹr ka Hẹbrọn ttara Devid dọk kowobh, da Devid okk'ẹ ọtzọhma ọbhana k'odidiri.
2SA 3:23 Mada Joab ọmaana agbong-nọng pẹ biphyir apyiri, bẹ agbaakh-ẹ bi, Abnẹr kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Nẹr ọkk'ọkwa m'ọvaarnọng, ttara bi, ọvaarnọng okk'ẹ ọtzọhma ọbhana k'odidiri e.
2SA 3:24 Mẹ wọ e, Joab ofona ọtza okhebha ọvaarnọng ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Bọng odik kw'asi ma? Mmaang bi, ira Abnẹr okwu ma, okhuri yan kw'attẹ-ẹ ọbọhk ofona? Ma okk'ofona!
2SA 3:25 Kọ arong ọnọng-dema kw'Abnẹr kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Nẹr ode kẹ. Kẹ okwu bi, okwu ọbọhr-ọ, ifha oronga orenga kwọ, obiro oronga odik kpenamkpen kw'am-asi.”
2SA 3:26 Joab e, obina oji Devid, ọtzọhm akkaabh-nkkaabha akhubh Abnẹr ka nnam, bẹ abọkh-ẹ k'esipe cha Sira atzim-ẹ akpa nnam. Yina, iwa Devid odik nwa korong.
2SA 3:27 Mẹ wọ e, mada Abnẹr ọkpa nnam ka Hẹbrọn, Joab otzim-ẹ ọpaangi k'ottem kw'ẹbaakhamma, osi mach'oben bi ọgbaakh-ẹ atzim k'idafa. Mando kwa Joab okhum-ẹ imaana k'ẹbhọr ope, otzima otzukha obo kw'ọgbaanọkka kwẹ, Asahẹl.
2SA 3:28 Mada Devid ọbhaang odik nwa, oben bi, “K'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, mbọhk saam ttara s'anọng p'ọvaarbhon kwaam, m'odik kw'okhuri obo kw'Abnẹr, kw'ode nnwa kwa Nẹr, kinde o.
2SA 3:29 Tte izi s'Abnẹr inana Joab ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr ch'otte kwẹ biphyir k'eho! Tte ẹhọhmmọr cha Joab eningi ọnọng kw'osi edem, ọmaana okkikkima, ode ọnọng kw'ọrẹkh-ọrekhi, obiro ode ọnọng kw'ope obo kw'ọkkangkkaang, obiro ode ọnọng kw'ọchattọhk owori, ewori.”
2SA 3:30 (Wa Joab ọmaana ọgbaanọkka Abishayi afhu Abnẹr, okhuri da ọkk'ọgbaanọkka kwabẹ Asahẹl ọfha k'egbong ka Gibeọn).
2SA 3:31 Mẹ wọ, Devid oben Joab ọmaana anọng biphyir p'atzọn-ẹ abẹ bi, “Bọng jaakhi ọbara fabọng afọr ka for, bọng an-afọra abara-bina awobha ka nkwu-osisi s'Abnẹr.” Ọvaar Devid ọkhaam otzor igbaang s'itzọhk epfura-kkọhbhi nnam.
2SA 3:32 Wa bẹ anọhnga Abnẹr ma Hẹbrọn, ọvaar Devid obhom ẹmọng k'ẹrọng m'epekhubh ch'Abnẹr. Anọng biphyir abira abhom.
2SA 3:33 Ọvaar Devid ọkkọhn ebomọng ọnang Abnẹr: “Ma, ọbaan kẹ bi Abnẹr ope mach'odidingi-nọng o?
2SA 3:34 Bẹ ndik katzim adabh-ọ mbọhk, Bẹ kọ mgbakkọhbh ka mmo kakpa. Kọ ape mach'ọnọng kw'ope ka mbọhk s'anọng-dama.” Anọng abira abhom ẹmọng k'ẹrọng.
2SA 3:35 Mẹ wọ, bẹ biphyir akwu akhukhi Devid bi ochi ọchattọhk, da ewu etzim-ewobh, yina, wa Devid ọtzọkha ọnwọhngi oben bi, “Tte Ibinọkpaabyi osi-m k'eden kpenamkpen ch'ẹdaakh-ẹ, idikha kaam nchi brẹd obiro ode ọttọhk kpenamkpen, yina s'ẹchọhkha etto!”
2SA 3:36 Iwa anọng mba biphyir atzin odik nwa, kwẹ obiro ọdaam bẹ ettem. K'odik-ọkka, odik kpenamkpen kw'ọvaarnọng osi, ọdaam bẹ ettem.
2SA 3:37 Mẹ wọ, m'ewu nduma, anọng pa Juda biphyir ọmaana anọng p'Israẹl biphyir aronga bi, ọvaar Devid ọbọhk k'obo kw'Abnẹr, kw'ode nnwa kwa Nẹr, kọkhaam.
2SA 3:38 Mẹ wọ, ọvaarnọng oben ajinọng pẹ bi, “Ode bi, bọng karong bi nnwa kw'ọvaarnọng ọmaana ọfanọng kw'ideden wọ ope mayina m'Israẹl o?
2SA 3:39 Mayina, kaambi ode bi kaam wọ nde ọvaarnọng kwa bẹ abyengi ana k'eho, ẹfa ẹkk'aam ẹha. Va mba pa Zeruya akhaam ẹfa ayọhng-m e. Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ochora obibyanọng otzor k'ibibyadik sẹ!”
2SA 4:1 Mada Ish-Boshẹt kw'ode nnwa kwa Saul, ọbhaang bi Abnẹr okk'ọpa ka Hẹbrọn, ẹfa ẹhẹ-ẹ. Ebhonmọr ch'Israẹl biphyir ebire ewobha k'ojora.
2SA 4:2 Wa nnwa nwa kwa Saul ọkhaam va p'ijinọng afa p'iwa ade adenho p'agbong-nọng. Wa oyok wani okpen Baana, nwonggo okpena Rekab. Wa bẹ ade va pa Rimọn kw'ofon Berot k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin. Wa bẹ am-atzọkha Berot attara k'ibhon s'isi ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin,
2SA 4:3 okhuri da iwa anọng pa Berot arọbhi achina ka Gitayim, aruk mẹ mach'akhekhen-nọng maa apyiri k'ewu cha mayina.
2SA 4:4 (Iwa Jonatan kw'ode nnwa kwa Saul ọkhaam nnwa kw'ijinọng kw'ọrẹkh-ọrẹkhi. Wa nnwa nwa ode cho azen mada bẹ atzim ẹkkaabha ch'obo kwa Saul ọmaana Jonatan ka Jẹzrẹl akwu. Wa kwanọng kw'om-okker-ẹ, otzin-ẹ otzima ọrọbh. Yina, mada oduk bi otzim-ẹ ofona, nnwa nwa ọnaang-ẹ otto ọphyakhi mmo. Wa nnwa nwa okpen Mẹphiboshẹt).
2SA 4:5 Mẹ wọ, Rekab ọmaana Baana p'ade va pa Rimọn kw'ofon ka Berot, abina achina k'ọhọhm kw'Ish-Boshẹt. Wa bẹ apyiri kẹ k'ọyakpattem, k'ogbe kw'Ish-Boshẹt oyim k'ibe s'okwokha ọwọhng.
2SA 4:6 Bẹ adim k'ọhọhm ẹtzaanga macha bẹ atza wit ọtzọtzọkha, bẹ akhum-ẹ imaana k'ẹbhọr afhẹ-ẹ. Rekab ọmaana ọgbaanọkka Baana arọbh afona.
2SA 4:7 Mada bẹ akk'k'ọhọhm adima, bẹ achina k'ẹmaanggọ ch'Ish-Boshẹt akhebh-ẹ k'ebin ch'oyim afhẹ-ẹ. Bẹ akpaar-ẹ eho, atzima chẹ arenga k'eden ch'Araba k'erungiwu nduma biphyir.
2SA 4:8 Bẹ atzima eho nda ch'Ish-Boshẹt achena Devid ka Hẹbrọn, aben ọvaarnọng bi, “Kkeri eho ch'Ish-Boshẹt ma, kw'ode nnwa kw'ọttattaanga-nọng kwọ Saul, kw'ọkhami bi, ọfhọ-ọ. Mayina, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'odik nwa otzukha ma Saul ọmaana va pa va pẹ, k'eho ch'itta kwaam, kw'ode ọvaarnọng.”
2SA 4:9 Yina, Devid obhina Rekab ọmaana ọgbaanọkka Baana p'ade va pa Rimọn, kw'ofon Berot bi, “Mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, kw'ọkk'aam ọkkaana ka mbọhk sa dama-dama kpenamkpen.
2SA 4:10 K'ogbe kw'ọnọng wani okwu ọgbaakh-m bi, kker e, Saul okk'ọpa, ttara ochibhi bi ochen-m ẹkkaabha ọkkakka. Iwa kaam mbọkh-ẹ mfhu k'obhon kwa Ziklag. Echora ch'iwa kaam nnang-ẹ k'ẹkkaabha nduma dọ mẹ!
2SA 4:11 Ọn-ọyọhng ma da anọng-dama akk'ọnọng kw'oni oponga-pyibha ọkhaam, akhebha k'ọhọhm kwẹ afhu k'ebin. Ọbaan-ọbaana bi nnor izi sẹ, mbọbh bọng, mbiri ndimi bọng m'ọyagbin nwa!”
2SA 4:12 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọnang ajinọng pẹ ẹfa bi, bẹ afhu bẹ. Wa bẹ akpaara mbọhk ọmaana mmo sabẹ, bẹ agbana sẹ abaanga esipe ka Hẹbrọn. Yina, wa bẹ atzọkha eho ch'Ish-Boshẹt atza anọhnga k'epekhubh ch'Abnẹr ka Hẹbrọn.
2SA 5:1 Iwa ngọma s'Israẹl biphyir nkwu ngebha Devid ka Hẹbrọn mben bi, “K'odik-ọkka, kọ ade ofona-nọng kwaman, mode izi rani.
2SA 5:2 K'ogbe kw'ọkk'ọkwọbha, iwa Saul ode ọvaarnọng kwaman, kọ wọ iwa ade ọnọng kw'om-otzima agbong-nọng p'Israẹl eden ka mgbong. Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben-ọ bi, ‘Kọ wọ áde ọnọng kw'okkeri anọng paam p'Israẹl, kọ ábira ade ọvaarnọng kwabẹ.’ ”
2SA 5:3 Mada adeden-nọng biphyir p'Israẹl akk'ọvaar Devid akhebha ka Hẹbrọn, ọvaarnọng osi echekhi ọmaana bẹ m'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Wa bẹ abyengi Devid ana k'eho, asẹ-ẹ ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl.
2SA 5:4 Iwa Devid ode cho ẹrọbh obhiri jobh, mada ọdabhi ẹvaar. Wa ọdabhi ẹvaar ka cho arọbh afa.
2SA 5:5 Ka Hẹbrọn, Devid ọdabhi Juda ka cho azenamfa ọmaana aphe azadani, obiro ọdabh anọng biphyir p'Israẹl ọmaana pa Juda ka Jẹrusalẹm, ka cho ẹrọbh obhiri jobh obhiri attaan.
2SA 5:6 Ọvaarnọng ọmaana ajinọng pẹ arenga achina ka Jẹrusalẹm bi, bẹ atza arima abaJẹbus p'iwa arukhi mẹ, abẹ. AbaJẹbus aben Devid bi, “Ma kádim, kaambi akpa-chechena ọmaana anọng p'arẹkh-ọrẹkhi bọ, bẹ afha okhubh-ọ okhubh.” Iwa bẹ achibhi bi, “Na bẹ afha akpa Devid eden.”
2SA 5:7 Kaambi mẹ wọ, Devid ọbọkha ichubhabe sa Ziyọn, kw'ode odedenmon kwa Devid.
2SA 5:8 M'ewu nduma, Devid okk'obena bi, “Ọnọng manda wani kw'ókhema abaJẹbus, ọkhaambi da órenga k'akhekhaho, yina okhebha ‘akpa-chechena, ọmaana anọng p'arẹkh-ọrẹkhi’ p'ade attattaanga-nọng pa Devid.” Kẹ wọ osi bẹ aben bi, “Akpa-chechena ọmaana anọng p'arẹkh-ọrẹkhi k'ẹvaar-ttọhmma kádim.”
2SA 5:9 Devid ọbọkha ichubhabe nna obiro oruk mẹ, oyeri ibẹ nna Odedenmon kwa Devid. Iwa osi odedenmon nwa ọkhọri, ttẹwọr k'igbo maa apyiri k'ẹtzaanga.
2SA 5:10 Devid on-odo ẹfa ọkhaama okhuri da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir owobh ttar-ẹ.
2SA 5:11 Mẹ wọ, Hiram kw'ode ọvaarnọng kwa Tyrẹ ọtzọhm akkaabh-nkkaabha ka Devid, p'ọnangi achi-khuma p'ọbhọhmi mancheni, ọmaana akarpẹnta ttara amuni-nchumi s'ihọhm bi, bẹ atza asi ẹvaar-ttọhmma anang Devid.
2SA 5:12 Ofona mẹ, Devid otzin bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ẹ araanga ottima mach'ọvaarnọng k'Israẹl, ọttara bi, okk'ọvaarbhon kwẹ abarada ọnanga okhuri anọng pẹ p'Israẹl.
2SA 5:13 Mada Devid obin ka Hẹbrọn, ọkhaam akkọra-panọng k'ọhaabh, ọmaana panọng p'ọtzọkh-ọtzọkha ka Jẹrusalẹm. Wa bẹ amaan-ẹ va p'ijinọng ọmaana p'ipanọng k'ọhaabh.
2SA 5:14 Ma wọ ode che pa va p'iwa obhoni ka Jẹrusalẹm: Shamua ọmaana Shobab, ọmaana Natan, ọmaana Sọlọmọn,
2SA 5:15 ọmaana Ibha, ọmaana Elishua, ọmaana Nẹphẹg, ọmaana Japhiya,
2SA 5:16 ọmaana Elishama, ọmaana Eliyada ttara Ẹliphẹlẹt.
2SA 5:17 Mada aPhilistiya abhaang bi, bẹ akk'Devid ana abyengi k'eho asẹ-ẹ ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl, bẹ abina k'ẹfa atza aror Devid bi, bẹ abọkha. Iwa Devid ọbhaanga kwẹ, obina ọhakha k'ichubhabe.
2SA 5:18 Mando kw'aPhilistiya akk'akwa akpẹ k'ẹttẹri cha Rephayim.
2SA 5:19 Mẹ wọ, wa Devid ọtza ọdọhn Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Nda ńnima aPhilistiya abẹ o? Na átte bẹ ọbọhk anang-m o?” Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhin-ẹ bi, “Kọ rọhng, k'odik-ọkka, kaam ńtte aPhilistiya ọbọhk otte nnang-ọ.”
2SA 5:20 Mẹ wọ, Devid ofona ochina ka Baal-Pẹrazim, kẹ kw'obiro okhema bẹ. Wa oben bi, “Odem nwa kw'asi am-amaam, mando kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọmaam k'ibe s'attattaanga-nọng paam k'itzitzikha saam.” Ofona mẹ, oyeri ibe nnuma Baal-Pẹrazim.
2SA 5:21 Iwa Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ atzini agbatza p'aPhilistiya arọbhi aji, atzima afona.
2SA 5:22 APhilistiya abira ayin ka, atza akpẹ k'Ẹttẹri cha Rephayim.
2SA 5:23 Mẹ wọ e Devid obiro ọdọhn Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhina bi, “Bọng bi gbẹng karenga avura, yina, bọng khọri bẹ ka nnam-annam akhe k'ottem. Bọng arima bẹ abẹ k'itzitzikha-itzitzikha kwa nchi sa balsam.
2SA 5:24 Bọng abhaang iyọkhi s'agbong-nọng am-arenga k'ebira kwa nchi sa balsam bi kpaar, bọng jaabhi mmo, mẹ wọ oyini bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'bọng eden ọcha, ọtza orima agbong-nọng p'aPhilistiya abẹ k'ibhingabe.”
2SA 5:25 Mẹ wọ, iwa Devid osi mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ẹ ọtzọhna. Ofhu aPhilistiya tzọni ka Gibeọn maa apyiri ka Gẹzẹr.
2SA 6:1 Iwa Devid obiro otzobha adikkobh p'Israẹl p'agaangi for, anọng nnọhna arọbh attaan obhiri chi.
2SA 6:2 Kẹ ọmaana ajinọng pẹ biphyir afona achina ka Baala k'ẹkhọma cha Juda bi, bẹ atza atzọkha Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi atzima akwu. Ẹkkọhbhi nda cha bẹ ayeri ka Che, kw'ode che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir, kwa bẹ ahokhi ẹwọr k'ottem kw'achẹrubim, k'Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi.
2SA 6:3 Bẹ atzọkha Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi anana k'ọkpaar ọbhakwẹ kwa nnyanyaang mmindọr, atzima chẹ abina k'ọhọhm kw'Abinadab, kw'owobh k'egbegbeho. Uza ọmaana Ahiyo p'ade va p'Abinadab, bọ iwa am-atzima ọkpaar nwa ọbhakwẹ eden,
2SA 6:4 ọmaana Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi ch'ẹnan k'egbegbeho, cha bẹ anan mẹ. Wa Ahiyo om-orenga k'itzitzikha s'ọkpaar nwa.
2SA 6:5 Iwa Devid ọmaana anọng p'Israẹl biphyir atzim ọkkọhna, ọmaana abukpọhng, ọmaana agim-agim, ọmaana agang-gaang, ọmaana achachaak, ọmaana ngorokpa p'echi ẹkkakka ttara achang-changkpa, am-asi ọdadaami ttara ẹfa chabẹ biphyir, k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
2SA 6:6 Mada bẹ apyiri k'ibe sa bẹ am-awobha agwuma abarli-mọma sa Nakọn, Uza onemi ọbọhk ọbọkha Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi, da abhaam asar bi atto.
2SA 6:7 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọdọkhi ettem otzima otzor Uza okhuri irẹrẹkhi sẹ. Mẹ wọ, Ibinọkpaabyi obun-ẹ ofhu, otto ọbaanga Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi, ope.
2SA 6:8 Mẹ wọ, iwa Devid ọdọkh-ẹ okhuri idọdọkhi s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzim otzor Uza. Tzọni kẹ maa apyiri k'ewu cha mayina, be ayeri ibe nnuma Pẹrẹz-Uza.
2SA 6:9 M'ewu nduma, Devid ọkhaama ojora f'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, oben bi, “Yan wọ kw'Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi en-erenga etzor kaam o?”
2SA 6:10 Iwa for kodo bi, ọtzọkha Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, ewobha ttar-ẹ k'odedenmon kwa Devid. Wa otzer ọpaangi chẹ ochina k'ọhọhm kw'Ọbẹd-Edom kw'ofon Git.
2SA 6:11 Wa Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ewobh k'ọhọhm kw'Ọbẹd-Edom kw'ofon Git k'aphe attaan. Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi odo Ọbẹd-Edom ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chẹ biphyir.
2SA 6:12 Mẹ wọ, bẹ agbaak ọvaar Devid bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ẹhọhmmọr ch'Ọbẹd-Edom ọda, ọmaana ọttọhk kpenamkpen fẹ, okhuri Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi e.” Wa Devid ofona ttara ọdadaami, ọtza ọtzọkha Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi k'ọhọhm kw'Ọbẹd-Edom, otzima okwu k'Odedenmon kwa Devid.
2SA 6:13 Mada anọng p'atzọhk Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi akk'ndọkhi nzadani arenga, Devid ọtzọkha ọbhaam-dim ọmaana ọbhaamnwa kw'ojibhi for otzima osi ẹjafọhni.
2SA 6:14 Wa Devid ọfọr ẹphọd om-otzima otzubh ebin ttara ẹfa chẹ biphyir k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi,
2SA 6:15 k'ogbe kwa Devid ọmaana anọng p'Israẹl biphyir atzim ọkkọhna, ọmaana abukpọhng am-atzima Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi akwu.
2SA 6:16 Mada bẹ am-atzima Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi anwa k'Odedenmon kwa Devid, Mikal kw'ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kwa Saul, obe k'ọphapha-mma om-okkeri k'iyaan. Mada ore da Devid om-ogbe akhura, obiro otzubh ebin k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, Devid e, okpukhi Mikal idik.
2SA 6:17 Bẹ atzima Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi akwu attima k'ibe sa chẹ ẹbaan bi ewobha, k'ikhira sa Devid ọkk'ọsa ohok chẹ. Wa Devid osi njafọhni nkwọmisẹ ọmaana nnanga s'odidiri ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
2SA 6:18 Mada Devid okk'njafọhni nkwọmisẹ ọmaana nnanga s'odidiri okyera osisi, on-odo anọng mba ka che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir.
2SA 6:19 Ọtzọkha brẹd, ọmaana itzen-gbugbukhi, okwu ọttara k'ittukha s'agrep p'agwu-ogwu ọnang ọnọng-ọnọng, ajinọng ọmaana panọng m'ẹkhaan ch'anọng p'Israẹl biphyir. Wa anọng mba biphyir abhana k'ihọhm sabẹ.
2SA 6:20 Mada Devid okhun k'ọhọhm bi, okwu odo ẹhọhmmọr chẹ, Mikal kw'ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kwa Saul oyin okhebh-ẹ k'iyaan, oben bi, “Mayina ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl okk'for sẹ otzekha ohok ngọmi e. Okk'ikpakpa-dukhi otzima mach'odidingi-nọng k'itzitzikha s'abira-minava p'ade atzọhmnọng p'akhaan-nọng pẹ!”
2SA 6:21 Devid oben Mikal bi, “Kaam nsi ọdadaami k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'okhiri atte ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chẹ oji, k'ogbe kw'otzekh-m bi, nde ọvaarnọng kw'anọng p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi p'Israẹl. Kaam ńsi ọdadaami k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
2SA 6:22 O o! Kaam nkk'for nda bi ńdo odidingi-nọng ńger e, mbiri ńlukhi for saam nyọhnga ma. Yina, k'itzitzikha s'abira-minava mbuma p'ade atzọhmnọng p'agbaakhi odik okhuri, bẹ ánang-m ikpokpobha ọnang e.”
2SA 6:23 Iwa Mikal, kw'ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kwa Saul, nnwa kọmaani maa opyiri k'ewu ch'iwa ope.
2SA 7:1 K'ogbe mẹ, wa ọvaar Devid ọkk'ẹwọr ọbọkha k'ẹvaar-ttọhmma chẹ. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹ odidiri obiro ọnanga k'attattaanga-nọng pẹ biphyir, p'arukhi akhọr-ẹ.
2SA 7:2 Wa Devid oben Natan kw'ode ọsẹjaakhi kw'Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “Kker e, kaam nnukhi k'ẹvaar-ttọhmma ẹkkakka cha bẹ atzim nchi s'ọbhọhmi mancheni asi, k'ogbe kw'Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi ekpong k'ikhira.”
2SA 7:3 Natan obhina ọvaarnọng bi, “China ororo asi odik kpenamkpen kw'ọpaan-ọ, kkeri Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobh mẹ ttar-ọ.”
2SA 7:4 M'erungiwu nduma, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben Natan bi,
2SA 7:5 “Rọhng atza agbaak ọtzọhmnọng kwaam Devid bi, ‘Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obeni bi, kọ rang ási ọhọhm kwa kaam ńnukh e.
2SA 7:6 Kaam k'ọhọhm, ndimi nnukha ttẹwọr k'ewu cha kaam ndim anọng p'Israẹl mbina k'Ijip, maa apyiri k'ewu cha mayina. Kaam nkk'mminnukha k'obe-k'obe k'ikhira, mach'ọhọhm kwaam.
2SA 7:7 Wa kaam nnangi adabhi pa ngọma s'anọng p'Israẹl ẹfa bi, bẹ atzima anọng pabẹ eden mach'akkeri-arukhimaan atzim arukhimaan pabẹ eden. Kaam nkk'nnenga k'obe-k'obe ttara bẹ, mbiri mming k'obe-k'obe k'ikhira. Ogbe kode kwa kaam nkk'adabhi mba mbena bi, “Bẹ atzima ọbhọhmi mancheni asi ọhọhm anang-m.” ’
2SA 7:8 “Mẹ wọ, gbaak ọtzọhmnọng kwaam Devid bi, ‘Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir obeni bi, kaam ndọkh-ọ k'owoni kẹ da am-akkeri arukhimaan, nkwu nsọ-ọ ọdabhi kw'anọng paam, p'Israẹl.
2SA 7:9 Kaam nkk'nwobha ttara kọ k'ibe kpenamkpen s'akk'atza, mbiri mfhu attattaanga-nọng p'am-arim-ọ abẹ biphyir. Mẹ wọ, kaam nna ńsọ-ọ atza che, macha che p'anọng p'atza che ọtzam k'ọyagbin.
2SA 7:10 Mẹ wọ, kaam ńnang anọng paam p'Israẹl ibe, mbiri nttima bẹ aranga, bẹ ákhaama oruk kw'ode kwabẹ, ifha bẹ aningi bẹ atzim dọk ayakhi. Anọng-dama bẹ, bẹ ihem dọk kánang, mach'iwa ode k'ittẹwọr,
2SA 7:11 ọmaana k'ogbe kwa ndek asi-aponga p'anọng paam Israẹl. Kaam ḿbiri nsọ-ọ awobha k'odidiri ọmaana attattaanga-nọng pọ biphyir. “ ‘Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi ẹjaakhi bi, kẹ Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ma for sẹ wọ óttima ẹhọhmmọr chọ aranga, ọnang kọ ọmaana va pa va pọ.
2SA 7:12 Mada iwu sọ íttonga m'ọyagbin bi, atza akwokha ọwọhng ttara abitta pọ, kaam ńnọbha nnwa wani k'ottem kwa va pọ, kw'óde izi sọ ọkhaam, ḿbiri nttima ọvaarbhon kwẹ aranga.
2SA 7:13 Kẹ wọ ósi ọhọhm ọnang-m ka che chaam. Kaam ḿbiri nttima ẹvaar ch'ọvaarbhon kwẹ aranga maa ogbe ode.
2SA 7:14 Kaam wọ ńde otte kwẹ, kẹ obiro óde nnwa kwaam. K'ogbe kw'osi epina, ńdima ẹyaangi-chi ch'anọngẹya nttum-ẹ, ḿbiri ndima mbọhk s'anọngẹya ḿmum-ẹ ekpo.
2SA 7:15 Yina, ọnọng kode kw'ọ́tzọkha idadaakha saam ka kẹ, mach'iwa ndọk sẹ ka Saul, kw'iwa nnọbh k'ẹvaar chẹ m'itzitzikha sọ.
2SA 7:16 Ọhọhm kwọ ọmaana ọvaarbhon kwọ óttima aranga m'ikhina ogbe ode.’ ”
2SA 7:17 Mẹ wọ, wa Natan ọgbaak Devid atzim p'ẹjaakhi nda biphyir.
2SA 7:18 Iwa ọvaar Devid odim k'ẹtzaanga otza owobha ẹwọr k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ozi njọhm oben bi, “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ọyọhng, kaam nde macha bọng ọnọng o, ẹhọhmmọr chaam epe mbọng o, kw'atzin-m anana k'ebe-dema nda o?
2SA 7:19 Yina, ka chen pọ, kwẹ mẹ kokpong. Ọvaar kw'Ọyọhng, kọ akk'ẹjaakhi asa ch'ekhuri ẹvaar ch'ọtzọhmnọng kwọ k'ogbe ororo. O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ọyọhng, ndọhna nna nde s'anọngẹya o?
2SA 7:20 “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ọyọhng, kọ arong kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ kẹ, bọng odik wọ kwa kaam Devid mbiri mgbaak nnang-ọ o?
2SA 7:21 Kọ akk'odik-barada asa, abira asi ẹjaakhi anang kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, okhuri atzim pọ ọmaana ochibhi kwọ.
2SA 7:22 “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ọyọhng, ma kw'abar e! Ọnọng kw'ode mach-ọ kode, ọkha f'obeng kọ Ibinọkpaabyi abẹ kode, macha mokk'ọbhaanga.
2SA 7:23 Bọng anọng bọ ade mach'anọng pọ p'Israẹl o? Obhon manda wani kw'ode mach'obhon kw'Israẹl m'ọyagbin kode, kw'Ibinọkpaabyi ọtza obhek mach'anọng ọnang for sẹ bi, osi che ọnang for sẹ, obiro osi idik-barada s'ipe anọng for ọmaana ikkokkoni-dik bi, okhubh idibhon ọmaana akha pabẹ k'itzitzikha s'anọng pọ, pa abhekhi k'Ijip.
2SA 7:24 Kọ akk'anọng pọ p'Israẹl aranga attima mach'anọng pa kọ ọkhaam. Kọ Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, akk'Ibinọkpaabyi kwabẹ abira akwa ada, maa ogbe ode.
2SA 7:25 “Mẹ wọ, O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kọ hok echekhi cha akk'asa okhuri ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chẹ, maa ogbe ode. Kọ si mach'akk'achekhi,
2SA 7:26 ifha kọ atza che maa ogbe ode. Mẹ wọ, anọng án-aben bi, ‘Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir wọ ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl!’ Ẹhọhmmọr ch'ọtzọhmnọng kwọ Devid éttima aranga k'itzitzikha sọ.
2SA 7:27 “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ẹfa biphyir, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl, kọ akk'ẹjaakhi nda asa anang ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, aben bi, ‘Kaam Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ńsi ọhọhm nnang-ọ.’ Mẹ wọ, ọtzọhmnọng kwọ okk'ottem-bara ọkhaama bi, ozi njọhm nna ọnang-ọ.
2SA 7:28 O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ọyọhng, kọ wọ ade Ibinọkpaabyi! Echekhi chọ ede odik-ọkkakka. Kọ akk'idik nna abira achekhi anang ọtzọhmnọng kwọ.
2SA 7:29 Tte ettem ẹdaam-ọ bi, ẹdaa ch'ado va pa va paam échina ororo k'itzitzikha sọ, maa ogbe ode; da kọ Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ọyọhng akk'agbaakha. Ofona k'ẹdaa chọ, va pa va p'ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ákhaama ẹdaa maa ogbe.”
2SA 8:1 Okwu opyiri k'ogbe mẹ, Devid okhema anọng pa Philistiya, obiro ohok bẹ awobha k'irekh-irek kwẹ. Ọtzọkha obhon kwa Mẹtẹg-Ama ka mbọhk s'anọng pa Philistiya.
2SA 8:2 Wa Devid obiro okhema anọng pa Moab. Osi bẹ ayima k'irerek k'adik attaan, ọtzọkha adik afa ofhu, otte odik wani biphyir ọbọhk oruk akpen. Wa anọng pa Moab an-aruk k'irekh-irek kwa Devid, bẹ am-abira achen-ẹ nnduma.
2SA 8:3 Ayongi mẹ, wa Devid obiro okhema Hadadẹzẹr kw'ode ọvaarnọng kwa Zoba, obiro ode nnwa kwa Rehob. Wa okhem-ẹ k'ogbe kw'ọtza bi, obiro ọtza ottima ẹvaar chẹ aranga k'okhubha kw'Ọraanga kwa Yupharetes.
2SA 8:4 Wa Devid ọbọkha akpaar pa nnyanyaang mmindọr nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh, ọmaana ayaari-nnyanyaang nnọhna chi obhiri mfa obhiri arọbh jobh, ttara agbong-nọng nnọhna arọbh afa obhiri jobh. Wa Devid ọrẹkhi nnyanyaang sa mmindọr akpaar biphyir, kw'oyongi nnyanyaang s'akpaar arọbh azen s'irikhi.
2SA 8:5 Mada anọng p'Aram p'afon Damaskọs akwu bi akwu akkaana Hadadẹzẹr kw'ode ọvaarnọng kwa Zoba, wa Devid ofhu bẹ anọng nnọhna arọbh afa obhiri chi.
2SA 8:6 Wa obiro ohok agbong-nọng p'abaabh ẹbaakhamma ch'ẹkhọma ch'anọng p'Aram p'afon Damaskọs. Anọng p'Aram an-awobha k'irekh-irek kwẹ, bẹ abira achen-ẹ nnduma. Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnangi Devid ekhema k'ibe kpenamkpen s'ochin.
2SA 8:7 Wa Devid ọtzọkha akhọhnkpa pa gol p'akhaan-nọng pa Hadadẹzẹr, otzima okhuna ka Jẹrusalẹm.
2SA 8:8 Ttẹwọr ka Teba ọmaana Bẹrotayi p'ade ibhon sa Hadadẹzẹr. Wa ọvaar Devid ọtzọkha brons k'ọhaabh.
2SA 8:9 Mada Toi kw'ode ọvaarnọng kwa Hamat ọbhaang bi, Devid okk'agbong-nọng pa Hadadẹzẹr biphyir okhema,
2SA 8:10 ọtzọhm nnwa kwẹ Joram bi, ọtza orima ọvaar Devid da okhem Hadadẹzẹr k'egbong, kw'okk'Toi abẹ om-orima. Wa Joram otzim nnanga sa silva ọmaana gol, ttara brons, otzima ọtza.
2SA 8:11 Wa ọvaar Devid otte nnanga nna ọbọhk ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, mach'ọkk'ọsa ttara silva ọmaana gol p'iwa ọtzọk k'idibhon biphyir s'okk'okhema,
2SA 8:12 sa nde ẹkhọma ch'Edom ọmaana Moab, ọmaana Ammọn, ọmaana Philistiya, ttara Amalẹk. Wa obiro otte ọgbọm f'ochi ka Hadadẹzẹr, kw'ode ọvaarnọng kwa Zoba kw'Aram, obiro ode nnwa kwa Rehob, otte ọbọhk ọnang Ibinọkpaabyi.
2SA 8:13 Wa Devid obiro ọtza che da okhun egbong ch'orim ttara anọng p'Aram, ch'ofhu anọng p'Edom nnọhna arọbh afa obhiri nzen k'Ẹttẹri ch'Onung.
2SA 8:14 Wa ohok agbong-nọng p'abaabh mbaakhamma s'Edom makhọra, anọng p'Edom biphyir an-awobha irekh-irek kwa Devid. Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnangi Devid ekhema k'ibe kpenamkpen s'ochin.
2SA 8:15 Wa Devid ọdabhi Israẹl makhọra, om-obiro ọttọhna aponga p'atzor-otzor abira ajibh-ojibh ọnang anọng pẹ biphyir.
2SA 8:16 Wa Joab kw'ode nnwa kwa Zeruya wọ ode odenho kw'agbong-nọng; Jehoshaphat kw'ode nnwa kwa Ahilud ode ọkkẹri kw'idik sa ikk'itta.
2SA 8:17 Zadọk kw'ode nnwa kw'Ahitub ọmaana Ahimẹlẹk kw'ode nnwa kw'Abiyata, bọ wa ade afọhnẹja; Sẹraya ode ọkkẹri;
2SA 8:18 Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹhoyada wọ ode odenho kw'anọng pa Kẹrẹt ọmaana anọng pa Pẹlẹt. Va pa Devid p'ijinọng ade afọhnẹja.
2SA 9:1 Iwa Devid ọbọbh bi, “Ọnọng manda wani otzim orikhi k'ẹhọhmmọr cha Saul, kwa kaam mfha nsi ọphyaam nnang k'eho cha Jonatan o?”
2SA 9:2 Wa ọkhaam ọtzọhmnọng kw'om-okkeri ẹhọhmmọr cha Saul kw'okpen Ziba, kw'iwa bẹ ayeri anang Devid. Ọvaar Devid ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ wọ akpen Ziba o?” Obhina bi, “O o, kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ wọ e.”
2SA 9:3 Iwa ọvaarnọng ọbọbh bi, “Ọnọng manda wani otzim orikhi k'ẹhọhmmọr cha Saul, kwa kaam mfha nsi ọphyaam f'Ibinọkpaabyi nnang o?” Ziba obhina ọvaarnọng bi, “Nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Jonatan otzim orikhi kẹ e, kẹ ọrẹkh-ọrẹkhi e.”
2SA 9:4 Ọvaarnọng ọbọbh bi, “Owobh man?” Ziba obhina bi, “Kẹ owobh ka Lo-Debar ttara Makir, nnwa kw'ijinọng kw'Amiyẹl.”
2SA 9:5 Mẹ wọ e, ọvaar Devid ọtzọhm bẹ ka Lo-Debar k'ọhọhm kwa Makir, k'ode nnwa kw'Amiyẹl bi, bẹ atza atzim-ẹ akwu.
2SA 9:6 Mada Mẹphiboshẹt kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Jonatan kwa Saul obhoni opyiri, ọrakha ọnang ọvaar Devid ikpokpobha. Devid oyer-ẹ bi, “Mẹphiboshẹt!” Obhina bi, “Itta kwaam, kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ wọ e.”
2SA 9:7 Devid oben-ẹ bi, “Oning-ọ ojor, kaam ńsi ọphyaam nnang-ọ k'eho ch'atte Jonatan. Kaam ḿbiri mkpa nnam ndọkha irerek s'atte kw'ideden saul, biphyir ńnang-ọ, kọ am-abira achi ọchattọhk k'ọgbaakha kwaam ttara kaam, k'ogbe kpenamkpen.”
2SA 9:8 Mẹ wọ, Mẹphiboshẹt ọrakha k'ikpokpobha, oben bi, “Kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ nde mach'anyi o, kw'asi ọphyaam-dema mva anang inọng-dukhi macha kaam o?”
2SA 9:9 Mẹ wọ, ọvaarnọng oyeri Ziba kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kwa Saul, ọgbaakh-ẹ bi, “Kaam nkk'ọttọhk kpenamkpen fa Saul kw'ode itta kwọ ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chẹ biphyir ọbọhk ntta nnang nnwa-mmona kw'itta kwọ.
2SA 9:10 Kọ ọmaana va pọ p'ijinọng, ọmaana atzọhmnọng pọ áyaabha owoni ánang-ẹ, ifha ọchattọhk owobha fa nnwa-mmona kw'itta kwọ óm-ochi. Mẹphiboshẹt kw'ode nnwa-mmona kw'itta kwọ óm-ochi ọchattọhk ttar-m k'okpokkoro kwaam.” (Wa Ziba ọkhaam va p'ijinọng chi, ttara atzọhmnọng ẹrọbh.)
2SA 9:11 Iwa Ziba oben ọvaarnọng bi, “Ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ósi-osi mach'itta kwaam, kw'ode ọvaarnọng obeni.” Mẹ wọ, Mẹphiboshẹt ochi ọchattọhk k'okpokkoro ttara ọvaar Devid mach'ọvaar-nnwa kw'ijinọng.
2SA 9:12 Iwa Mẹphiboshẹt ọkhaam ijinọnọnga kw'okpen Mika. Wa anọng p'arukhi k'ẹhọhmmọr cha Ziba biphyir ade atzọhmnọng pa Mẹphiboshẹt.
2SA 9:13 Iwa Mẹphiboshẹt oruk ka Jẹrusalẹm; da iwa om-ochi ọchattọhk k'okpokkoro kw'ọvaarnọng. Iwa kẹ ọrẹkh-ọrẹkhi.
2SA 10:1 Okwu opyiri k'ogbe mẹ, ọvaarnọng kw'anọng p'Ammọn okwu opẹ, nnwa kwẹ kw'ijinọng kw'okpen Hanun ọn-ọdabh ẹvaar chẹ.
2SA 10:2 Iwa Devid oben bẹ bi, “Kaam ńsi ọphyaam nnang Hanun kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Nahash, mach'iwa otte osi ọphyaam ọnang-m.” Mẹ wọ, Devid ọtzọhm anọng bi bẹ atza adini Hanun nttem k'obo kw'otte. Mada atzọhmnọng pa Devid apyiri k'irerek s'Ammọn,
2SA 10:3 adenho p'Ammọn aben Hanun kw'ode itta kwabẹ bi, “Kọ achibhi bi ikpokpobha rọ sa Devid ọkhọk k'obo kw'atte yina ọtzọhm ajinọng mba bi, bẹ adin-ọ nttem o? Kwẹ mando kode e, ọtzọhmi bẹ bi, bẹ akwu arom obhon nwa, ifha oronga nden s'otzima orima obhon nwa abẹ o?”
2SA 10:4 Mẹ wọ, Hanun ọbọkha anọng mba pa Devid ọtzọhmi ophyiri agba-phyubha okhubha wani, obiro ọbọkha anọhma-baba pabẹ ọjaakhi m'awọriba, okhubh bẹ abhana.
2SA 10:5 Mada Devid ọbhaang odik nwa, ọtzọhm akkaabh-nkkaabha bi bẹ atza akhebha anọng mba, da bẹ akk'bẹ ọgbasadik-barada ananga. Ọvaarnọng on-oben bi, “Bọng wobha ka Jeriko maa agba-phyubha pabọng amen yina bọng akhuna.”
2SA 10:6 Mada anọng p'Ammọn an-are bi, bẹ akk'asa ettem epyibh Devid ttara bẹ, bẹ abher agbong-nọng p'Aram p'areng ka mmo nnọhna arọbh afa obhiri jobh, p'afon Bet-Rehob ọmaana Zoba. Wa ajinọng nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh abira afona k'ọvaarnọng kwa Maaka, nnọhna ẹrọbh obhiri jobh afona Tob.
2SA 10:7 Mada Devid ọbhaang odik nwa, ọtzọhm Joab otzima agbong-nọng pẹ p'erima biphyir ọtza.
2SA 10:8 Wa agbong-nọng p'Ammọn ado igbong-for, atza atzobha kẹ da adimi k'ẹbaakhamma ch'odedenmon. Agbong-nọng p'Aram kwa Zoba ọmaana Rehob, ọmaana ajinọng pa Tob ttara pa Maaka, apaangi atzobha k'ettegweng ch'ẹbaang mẹ.
2SA 10:9 Mada Joab ore bi, bẹ akk'for ada s'egbong atzikh-ẹ k'itzitzikha ttara ka nnama-nnam, otzekha agbong-nọng akkakka p'Israẹl otzobha bẹ atza arima agbong-nọng p'Aram abẹ.
2SA 10:10 Wa ọtzọkha agbong-nọng mbongo p'arikhi otte ọbọhk ọnang ọgbaanọkka Abishayi kw'otzobh bẹ, otzima bẹ ọtza orima agbong-nọng p'Ammọn abẹ.
2SA 10:11 Joab oben bi, “Idikha anọng p'Aram agaangi kpọng ayọhng-m, kọ kwu kkaan-m o. Yina, idikha anọng p'Ammọn bẹ agaangi kpọng ayọhng-ọ, kaam ńkwu okwu ńkwu nkkaan-ọ.
2SA 10:12 Kọ gaangi for morima erima nda mach'akkakkaama ka nho s'anọng paman, ọmaana ka nho s'idedenmon s'Ibinọkpaabyi kwaman. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ósi-osi mach'ojibh-ẹ ka chen.”
2SA 10:13 Mẹ wọ, Joab ọmaana agbong-nọng pẹ afona atza arima anọng p'Aram abẹ, anọng p'Aram arọbh ma bẹ k'itzitzikha.
2SA 10:14 Mada anọng p'Ammọn are bi anọng p'Aram am-arọbhi, bẹ arọbh aji Abishayi adim k'odedenmon. Mẹ wọ, Joab ọkwọhbha anọng p'Ammọn abẹ oririma, ọkpa nnam ọbhana ka Jẹrusalẹm.
2SA 10:15 Mada agbong-nọng p'Aram an-are bi, agbong-nọng p'Israẹl akk'bẹ akhema, bẹ afona abira atza ado atzobha.
2SA 10:16 Wa Hadadẹzẹr ofona ọtza ọtzọkha agbong-nọng p'Aram k'Ọraanga okhubha kwa Yupharetes, bẹ akwu apyiri k'obhon kwa Helam. Wa Shobak kw'ode odenho kw'agbong-nọng pa Hadadẹzẹr, otzima bẹ eden.
2SA 10:17 Mada bẹ agbaakhi Devid odik nwa, otzobha anọng p'Israẹl biphyir, otzima bẹ ojekha Jọrdan ochina ka Helam. Wa anọng p'Aram abe k'adik p'egbong atzik Devid bi, ifha bẹ arim-ẹ abẹ.
2SA 10:18 Yina, aSiriya arọbh m'itzitzikha s'anọng p'Israẹl. Wa Devid ofhu ayaar-akpaar pa nnyanyaang mmindọr anọng ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh chi, ọmaana agbong-nọng p'areng k'irerek anọng nnọhna arọbh azen. Wa obiro obun Shobak kw'ode odenho kw'agbong-nọng pabẹ ofhu.
2SA 10:19 Mada avaar biphyir p'awobh k'irekh-irek kwa Hadadẹzẹr are bi, anọng p'Israẹl akk'bẹ akhema, bẹ afona atza asi ẹmẹm ttara anọng p'Israẹl, bẹ an-abira awobha k'irekh-irek kwabẹ. Mẹ wọ e, wa ojora osi anọng p'Aram bi, bẹ abira atza anang anọng p'Ammọn ẹkkaana.
2SA 11:1 M'ope-yaabhagbe, k'ogbe kw'avaar am-atza egbong, wa Devid ọtzọhm Joab ọmaana akhaan-nọng p'ọvaarnọng ttara anọng p'Israẹl biphyir egbong. Bẹ atza afhu anọng p'Ammọn, abira akhọri obhon kwa Raba akhe k'ottem. Yina, wa Devid owobha ka Jẹrusalẹm.
2SA 11:2 K'ẹchọhkhawu dani, Devid obina k'ebin ọtza orenga ọkhọri ebir-ebir kw'ẹvaar-ttọhmma. Owobha kẹ ore kwanọng wani kw'om-ogbobha asi. Wa kwanọng nwuma ojibh-ojibh.
2SA 11:3 Wa Devid ọtzọhm ọnọng bi, otza oronga ọnọng kwa kwanọng nwa ode. Ojinọng nwuma ọgbaak Devid bi, “Batshẹba kw'ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kw'Eliyam, obiro ode kwanọng kw'Uriya kw'ofon Het wọ e.”
2SA 11:4 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọtzọhm akkaabh-nkkaabha pẹ atza atzim-ẹ akwu. Okwu opyiri, oyim-ẹ abẹ. Yina kw'iwa kwanọng nwa ọrami ọmmaana-dik kw'awurada pa for ottotto okyera mẹ. Iwa ọkpa nnam ọbhana.
2SA 11:5 Iwa kwanọng nwa otzima ibhọr, ọtzọhm ẹkkaabha ọnang Devid, oben bi, “Kaam nkk'ibhọr ndima e.”
2SA 11:6 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọtzọhm ẹkkaabha ọnang Joab oben bi, “Tzọhm Uriya kw'ofon Het chen-m.” Wa Joab ọtzọhm-ẹ ochena Devid.
2SA 11:7 Mada Uriya okhebh-ẹ, Devid ọbọbh-ẹ odem kwa Joab owobh, ọmaana odem kw'agbong-nọng awobh ttara eden ch'egbong ede.
2SA 11:8 Mẹ wọ, Devid oben Uriya bi, “Rọhng atza agbobhi mmo k'ọhọhm kwọ.” Uriya otte ẹvaar-ttọhmma ọbọhk ofona, ọvaarnọng obiro ọtzọhm ẹnanga ochen-ẹ.
2SA 11:9 Yina, iwa Uriya okponga mẹ ẹbaakhamma ch'ẹvaar-ttọhmma oyima ttara atzọhmnọng p'itta kwẹ, k'ọhọhm kwẹ kọtza.
2SA 11:10 Mada bẹ agbaakhi Devid bi, “Uriya k'ọhọhm kwẹ k'ọbhan e,” Devid ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Yina rang kw'afon k'oden-mir akwu ma o? Ode yan kw'ani k'ọhọhm kwọ abhan?”
2SA 11:11 Uriya oben Devid bi, “Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ọmaana anọng p'Israẹl ttara pa Juda ayim k'okhira, Joab kw'ode oho kwaam ọmaana atzọhmnọng p'itta kwaam, abhingi k'ọyaankpa. Okhuri yan kwa kaam nna mmana k'ọhọhm kwaam bi, nda nchi mbiri ngwo mbiri nyima ttara kwanọng kwaam o? Odem nwa kwa kọ arukhi akpen, kaam odik-dema nwa kinsi!”
2SA 11:12 Mẹ wọ e, Devid on-oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ biri wobha ma mayina, ophyini kaam ńdọhm-ọ akpa nnam.” Wa Uriya owobha ma Jẹrusalẹm m'ewu nduma ọmaana ewu ch'ehobh mẹ.
2SA 11:13 Devid oyer-ẹ okwu ochi ọchattọhk obiro agwo atzuk ttar-ẹ. Iwa Devid ọnang-ẹ atzuk maa obuma. Yina, m'ẹchọhkha, Uriya oyin k'iyaan otza oyima k'obhirikpa kwẹ, k'ottem kw'atzọhmnọng p'itta kwẹ; k'ọhọhm kwẹ kọbhan.
2SA 11:14 K'ekpebha, Devid ọkkẹr ẹkkaabha k'ẹnwẹrkpa ọnang Uriya bi, ochena Joab.
2SA 11:15 Ọkkẹri m'ẹnwẹrkpa nduma bi, “Hok Uriya k'itzitzikha s'egbong, kw'erima ẹkhọhm-ọkhọhm. Atzọr akpa nnam ifha bẹ abun-ẹ afhu, ope.”
2SA 11:16 Mẹ wọ, mada Joab okk'odedenmon ọkhọri okhe k'ottem, ọtzọkha Uriya ohok k'ibe s'orong bi akkakkaama p'attattaanga-nọng pabẹ awobh.
2SA 11:17 Mada ajinọng p'odedenmon nwuma ayini k'iyaan bi, bẹ akwu arima Joab abẹ, wa bẹ afhu agbong-nọng bani pa Devid. Ayongi mẹ, wa Uriya kw'ofon Het obiro ope.
2SA 11:18 Iwa Joab ọtzọhm Devid ẹkkaabha ch'odik kpenamkpen kw'otto k'egbong-dam.
2SA 11:19 Oben ọkkaabh-ẹkkaabha bi, “Idikha akk'ọvaarnọng odem kw'egbong ede agbaakha okpo,
2SA 11:20 ọvaarnọng ọfha ọdọkh-ẹ, ọbọbh-ọ bi, ‘Okhuri yan kwa bọng atza arima egbong abaanga k'odedenmon o? Ode bi bọng karong bi, bẹ afha awobha k'echumiho atta ayukh o?
2SA 11:21 Anyi wọ ofhu Abimẹlẹk kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Jerub-Bẹshẹt? Kwanọng arang owobh k'echumiho obingi ẹtzakpa ch'ẹfhẹ-ẹ ka Tẹbẹz o? Okhuri yan kwa bọng areng abaanga k'echum o?’ Idikha ọbọbh-ọ idik nna, kọ gbaakh-ẹ bi, ‘Ayongi mẹ, ọtzọhmnọng kwọ Uriya kw'ofon Het obiro ope e.’ ”
2SA 11:22 Mẹ wọ e, ọkkaabh-ẹkkaabha nwuma obina ofona, mada opyiri, ọtzọkha odik kpenamkpen kwa Joab ọkk'ẹ ọtzọhma, ọgbaak Devid.
2SA 11:23 Ọkkaabh-ẹkkaabha nwuma oben Devid bi, “Ajinọng mbuma ayọhng man mkpaan, bẹ ayini k'iyaan akwu arima man abẹ k'ọyaankpa. Yina, mokhubhi bẹ maa bẹ akpa nnam k'ẹbaakhamma ch'odedenmon.
2SA 11:24 Mẹ wọ kw'atta-ayuk awobh k'echumiho atta atzọhmnọng pọ ayuk, ofona mẹ, atzọhmnọng bani p'ọvaarnọng ape. Ayongi mẹ, ọtzọhmnọng kwọ Uriya kw'ofon Het ọkk'ọpa.”
2SA 11:25 Devid e, oben ọkkaabh-ẹkkaabha nwa bi, “Ben Joab bi, ‘Odik nwa oning-ọ ottem-pyibha ọnangi; ọkkangkkaang kw'ofhu ọnọng, óbiro ofhu ọnọng ọdọdọk. Tte ochina ororo orima odedenmon nwa abẹ obiro odim-ẹ.’ Kọ gbaak odik nwa atzim akhe Joab ẹfa.”
2SA 11:26 Mada kwanọng kw'Uriya ọbhaang bi odim kwẹ ọkk'ọpa, owobha epopa ch'odim.
2SA 11:27 Mada ogbe kw'epopa ottong, Devid e, ọtza ọtzọkh-ẹ otzima ochina k'ọhọhm kwẹ, on-ode kwanọng kwẹ, ọmaan-ẹ nnwa kw'ijinọng. Yina, odik nwuma kwa Devid ọkk'ọsa, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ettem kọdaami.
2SA 12:1 Iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhm Natan ọtza okhebha Devid. Mada okhebh-ẹ, oben bi, “Iwa ọkhaam ajinọng afa p'afon k'obhon wani, oyok wani ode ọkkakkaa, nwonggo ode ogbogbora.
2SA 12:2 Ọkkakkaa nwa ọkhaam arukhimaan ọmaana abhaam k'ọhaabh.
2SA 12:3 Yina, ogbogbora ọttọhk kọkhaam, kw'oyongi orukhimaan-nwa-kwakwẹ kẹ-khẹ kw'okk'odebha. Ọrọkh-ẹ maa, orukhimaan-nwa nwa ọbar ọmaana va p'ojinọng nwa. Orukhimaan nwa om-ochi ọchattọhk ttara ojinọng nwa, om-obiro ogwo asi ka nkọbh kw'ojinọng nwa, obiro ọttaabh-ẹ ka mbọhk. Wa orukhimaan-nwa nwa on-ode macha nnwa kw'ikwanọng ọnang-ẹ.
2SA 12:4 “Iwa okhekhen-nọng wani okwu ọhakha ọkkakkaa nwa, yina, ọkkakkaa nwa obhum bi ọtzọkha arukhimaan pẹ, obiro ode abhaam pẹ bi, otzima osi ọchattọhk ọtzaam okhekhen-nọng kw'ọkk'ẹ ọhakha. Ottu kw'osi mando, ọn-ọtza ọtzọkha orukhimaan-nwa-kwakwẹ kw'ogbogbora otzima osi ọchattọhk ọtzaam okhekhen-nọng kw'ọkk'ẹ ọhakha.”
2SA 12:5 Odik nwuma ọdọkhi Devid maa, oben Natan bi, “Odem nwa kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, ojinọng kw'osi odik-dema nwa ọbaan bi ope!
2SA 12:6 Kẹ ọkhaambi otzuk orukhimaan nwa k'igbe inna, okhuri bi, inọngkwo kọkhaam m'odik nwa.”
2SA 12:7 Mẹ wọ, Natan oben Devid bi, “Kọ wọ ade ojinọng nwuma! Ma wọ ode odik kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl ọgbaakhi: ‘Kaam mbyeng-ọ ana k'eho, nsọ-ọ ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl. Mbiri nkkaan-ọ nnọbh-ọ ka mbọhk sa Saul.
2SA 12:8 Kaam ndọk ẹhọhmmọr ch'itta kwọ nnang-ọ, mbiri ndọkha panọng pẹ nnang-ọ. Nsọ-ọ ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl ọmaana kwa Juda. Idikha ira idik nna in-ihaabhi, kaam ira nnang-ọ nyongi mẹ.
2SA 12:9 Ode yan kwa kọ abhumi atzim p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, kọ asi obibya-dik-dema nwa k'itzitzikha sẹ o? Kọ atzim ọkkangkkaang afhu Uriya kw'ofon Het, abira atzọkha kwanọng kwẹ aba. Kọ atzim ọkkangkkaang kw'anọng p'Ammọn afhẹ-ẹ.
2SA 12:10 Kẹ wọ osi, ọkkangkkaang ẹhọhmmọr chọ ọbọhk kótte, okhuri da kọ abhumi atzim paam, afona atza atzọkha kwanọng kw'Uriya kw'ofon Het aba.’
2SA 12:11 “Ma wọ ode odik kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obeni: ‘Kaam ńdọhm itzama s'ítto ikhebh-ọ k'ẹhọhmmọr chọ. Kọ atzima chen pọ are da ńdọkha panọng pọ nnang oyokh-ẹbaanga kwọ, kẹ óyima panọng pọ abẹ k'ọyaankpa.
2SA 12:12 Kọ asi odik nwa ka ndubhama, yina, kaam ńna nsi kwẹ k'ọyaankpa k'itzitzikha s'anọng p'Israẹl biphyir.’ ”
2SA 12:13 Mẹ wọ, Devid oben Natan bi, “Kaam nkk'ẹkhọhngkwuri nsa k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.” Natan obhina bi, “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọ obina ọnang k'ẹkhọngkwuri chọ. Kọ kápe.
2SA 12:14 Yina, okhuri da akk'asa bi attattaanga-nọng p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi alukh-ẹ, nnwa nwuma kw'ijinọng kwa bẹ amaani anang-ọ, ópe-ope.”
2SA 12:15 Mada Natan okk'nnam ọkpa ọbhana k'ọhọhm kwẹ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi nnwa nwuma kwa kwanọng kw'Uriya ọkk'ọmaana ọnang Devid, otto ọkhọhmana.
2SA 12:16 Wa Devid okhukhi Ibinọkpaabyi okhuri nnwa nwa. Otzim ọchattọhk obiro ọfọra abara-bina oyima k'irerek m'erungiwu nduma.
2SA 12:17 Wa adedennọng pẹ am-akhonga bi abọhkh-ẹ obina k'irerek, yina, obhum bi obina. Obiro obhum bi ochi ọchattọhk kpenamkpen ttara bẹ.
2SA 12:18 Ottong iwu izenamfa nnwa nwuma ope. Wa akhaan-nọng pa Devid ojor bẹ ojora bi, bẹ agbaakh-ẹ bi, nnwa nwa ọkk'ọpa, da bẹ achibhi bi, “K'ogbe kw'iwa nnwa nwa otzim orukhi akpen, idikha mọgbaakhi Devid atzim, man itzọhng kokher bi oyonga. Morenga yan ọgbaakh-ẹ bi, nnwa nwuma ọkk'ọpa o? Kẹ ofha osi odik-ttama, ọnang fọr sẹ.”
2SA 12:19 Mada Devid ore da akhaan-nọng pẹ an-am-akkaabha ayok iyaabhi, otzin bi nnwa nwuma ọkk'ọpa. Mẹ wọ, ọbọbh bi, “Nnwa nwuma ọkk'ọpa?” Bẹ abhina bi, “O o, ọkk'ọpa e.”
2SA 12:20 Mẹ wọ, Devid obina k'irerek. Mada okk'asi ogbobha obiro ọkpan ana, obhona ẹnya, obina ochina k'ọhọhm kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọtza okpobh-ẹ. Yina on-ochin k'ọhọhm kwẹ, oben bẹ anang-ẹ ọchattọhk, ochi.
2SA 12:21 Akhaan-nọng pẹ abọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ am-asi yan ma o? K'ogbe kw'iwa nnwa nwa otzim orukhi akpen, atzimi ọchattọhk abira awobha k'obhoma, mada nnwa nwa ọkk'ọn-ọpa, an-abina achi ọttọhk!”
2SA 12:22 Obhina bi, “K'ogbe kw'iwa nnwa nwa otzim orukhi akpen, kaam ndimi ọchattọhk nwobha k'obhoma. Iwa nchibhi bi, ‘K'odik-ọkka, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọfha ọkhaama inọngkwo ttar-m, otte nnwa nwa ọbọhk oruk akpen.’
2SA 12:23 Yina, mada ọkk'ọn-ọpa, kaam nna nchina ororo ndim ọchattọhk fa mbọng o? Na kaam mfha ndima akpen pẹ mkpa nnam o? Kaam wọ nder ńgebha kẹ kẹ e, kẹ arang obiro ọkpa nnam okhebh-m ka e!”
2SA 12:24 Mẹ wọ, Devid odini kwanọng kwẹ Batshẹba nttem, otza oyim-ẹ abẹ, otzima ibhọr, ọmaan-ẹ nnwa kw'ijinọng, bẹ akpẹ-ẹ Sọlọmọn. Nnwa nwa ọdaak Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi;
2SA 12:25 okhuri idadaakha nnuma, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhm Natan, kw'ode ọsẹjaakhi ọtza sẹ che ọkpẹ-ẹ, Jedidiya.
2SA 12:26 M'ogbe nwuma wa Joab orim egbong ttara obhon kwa Raba kw'ode kw'anọng p'Ammọn, obiro ọbọkha ọvaarbhon kwabẹ otzima.
2SA 12:27 Iwa Joab ọtzọhm akkaabh-nkkaabha atza akhebha Devid aben bi, “Kaam nkk'Raba abẹ nnima, mbiri ndọkha odedenmon kw'asi pẹ.
2SA 12:28 Bọng dobha agbong-nọng p'arikhi, akhọri odedenmon nwa akhe k'ottem, bọng abira abọkh-ẹ atzima. Oni mando ode, kaam mbọkha odedenmon nwa ndima, mkpẹ-ẹ che mmina kaam.”
2SA 12:29 Mando kwa Devid otzobh agbong-nọng biphyir otzima ochina ka Raba, orima bẹ abẹ maa okhema bẹ.
2SA 12:30 Wa ọwọra ọvaarnọng kwabẹ ivaar-kpo k'eho, bẹ atzọkha fọr-ẹ. Ivaar-kpo nna idọhbhi ipyiri talẹn wani kwa gol, bẹ abira dokha sẹ ttara atza ọkkakka. Wa Devid obiro ochi ọgbọm k'ọhaabh m'odedenmon nwuma.
2SA 12:31 Ọtzọkha anọng p'awobh mẹ ọnang itzọhm sa bẹ atzim ọkkaangi ọmaana s'akkonga, ọmaana s'ochitzọhkhi ttara sa mbar asi, obiro osi bẹ asi ọtzọhm f'idọdọhbh ọbabanga. Wa Devid osi odik nwa k'ibhon s'anọng p'Ammọn biphyir. Mẹ wọ e, kẹ Devid ọmaana agbong-nọng pẹ biphyir akpa nnam abhana ka Jẹrusalẹm.
2SA 13:1 Iwa Absalọm kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Devid ọkhaam ọgbaanọkka kw'ikwanọng kw'ojobh-ojibh kw'okpen Tama. Wa k'ogbe wani, Amnọn kw'ode nnwa kwa Devid okwu ọkhaama idadaakha ttara Tamar.
2SA 13:2 Iwa Amnọn otto ọkhọhmana okhuri da okhe ettem chẹ k'ọgbaanotte Tama. Wa Tama ojinọng otzim oronga, kw'osi Amnọn ore kwẹ bi, ode odik kw'ọgaang-ẹ ọgaangi bi, oyim-ẹ abẹ.
2SA 13:3 Yina, wa Amnọn ọkhaam oyokh-odikkobh kw'okpen Jonadab, kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Shimeyi, kw'ode ọgbaanọtte kwa Devid. Jonadab kẹ wa ode ojinọng kw'odongi-odongi.
2SA 13:4 Ọbọbh Amnọn bi, “Ode yan kwa kọ nnwa kw'ọvaarnọng, am-akkeri idọdọkhi-idọdọkhi ekpebha kpenamkpen manda o? Gbaak-m odik.” Amnọn obhin-ẹ bi, “Tama kw'ode ọgbaanọkka kw'Absalọm kwa mode ọgbaanotte ọkk'aam ọdaakha e.”
2SA 13:5 Jonadab oben bi, “Rọhng atza ayima k'ebin asi nkkari bi, ọmmọ-ọ ọmma. Mada isa atte okwu bi ọrọ-ọ ben-ẹ bi, ‘Kaam ira ọdaakh-m bi ọgbaanotte kwaam Tama okwu osi ọchattọhk ọnang-m e. Tte owobha m'itzitzikha saam osi ọchattọhk mva, ifha nnẹ-ẹ mbiri nchi fẹ ma mbọhk sẹ.’ ”
2SA 13:6 Mẹ wọ, Amnọn osi nkkari otza oyima mach'ọmmẹ-ẹ ọmma. Mada ọvaar Devid okwu bi ọrẹ-ẹ, Amnọn oben-ẹ bi, “Kaam ira ọdaakh-m bi, ọgbaanotte kwaam Tama okwu osi ọchattọhk f'ọm-ọdaakh-m m'itzitzikha ọnang-m, ifha oreng-mmo ọyọkh-m fẹ.”
2SA 13:7 Iwa Devid ọtzọhm bẹ ayeri Tama k'ẹvaar-ttọhmma, oben-ẹ bi, “Rọhng k'ọhọhm kw'agbaanatte Amnọn, atza asi ọchattọhk anang-ẹ.”
2SA 13:8 Mando kwa Tama obin ochina k'ọhọhm kw'ọgbaanotte Amnọn, kw'okhebh da oyim k'ebin. Tama ọtzọkha abubuma ọbhakhi otzima osi brẹd m'itzitzikha sẹ.
2SA 13:9 Ọtzọkha brẹd nwa okhe k'ikkoriya otza ober-ẹ, yina, obhum ochichi. Amnọn on-oben bi, “Bọng ben ọnọng kpenamkpen oyin k'iyaan.” Mẹ wọ, ọnọng kpenamkpen obina oyin k'iyaan.
2SA 13:10 Amnọn e oben Tama bi, “Tzini ọchattọhk mvuma achen-m k'ẹmaanggọ chaam, ifha areng-mmo ọyọkh-m fẹ.” Tama otzini brẹd nwa kw'ọkk'ọsa otzima odim k'ẹmaanggọ ch'ọgbaanotte, Amnọn.
2SA 13:11 Yina, mada otzini ochattọhk mvuma ochen-ẹ bi ochi, ọkhaabh-ẹ, oben bi, “Ọgbaanotte kwaam, vura k'ebin, akwu mọtzọn oyima.”
2SA 13:12 Oben-ẹ bi, “Mma e, ọgbaanotte kwaam! Kaam k'ẹfa kàbọkha ayima abẹ! Anọng odik-dema nwa k'Israẹl atzima abhaanga o! Odik-ttama-dema nwa kàsi.
2SA 13:13 Kaam ọmaana kọ móruk yan ttara ọgbasa-dik nwa o? Kọ an-ade mach'odidingi-nọng wani m'Israẹl e. Tzotzokhaan, gbaak ọvaarnọng, kẹ kọ eden kọkpa bi, atzọkh-m k'ọbada.”
2SA 13:14 Kaambi mẹ wọ, itzọhng koyong ọnang-ẹ, ọbọkh-ẹ oyima abẹ k'ẹfa, okhuri da ọkhaam ẹfa ọyọhng-ẹ.
2SA 13:15 Mẹ wọ, Amnọn ọn-ọttaang-ẹ itzam-itzama. K'odik-ọkka, wa ọn-ọttaang-ẹ maa ọyọhnga eden ch'iwa ọdaakh-ẹ. Amnọn on-oben-ẹ bi, “Bina ayin k'iyaan afona!”
2SA 13:16 Tamar oben-ẹ bi, “Mma e! Akhubh-m okhubh, mẹ wọ on-opyibhi ọtzam ọyọhnga odik kw'akk'aam atzama asa e.” Kaambi mẹ wọ, Amnọn itzọhng koyong ọnang-ẹ.
2SA 13:17 On-oyeri ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ oben bi, “Tzima kwanọng nwa ayin k'iyaan, agbakh-ẹ ọmma!”
2SA 13:18 Mando kw'ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ ọbhar-ẹ k'iyaan, ọgbakh-ẹ ọmma. Wa Tamar ọfọr owura-baba kw'ọgaangi ẹphya, kw'ode owura-baba kw'iwa aminava p'ọvaarnọng p'ani ojinọng atzim aronga am-afọra.
2SA 13:19 Tama ọtza okpokhi itzọtzọhng obum-ẹ k'eho, ọbọkha owura-baba kw'ọfọr ka for ọjaakhi. Otzini mbọhk ọtzọhkha k'eho, obhom k'ẹrọng ofona.
2SA 13:20 Ọgbaanọkka Absalọm ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Agbaanatte Amnọn, ọkk'ọ abẹ oyima? Ọgbaanọkka kwaam, dọk kàbhom; kẹ ode ọgbaanotte kwọ e. Odik nwa k'ettem kàkhe.” Tama on-oruk ttara nkwu-osisi k'ọhọhm kw'ọgbaanọkka, Absalọm.
2SA 13:21 Mada ọvaar Devid ọbhaang idik nna, ettem epyibh-ẹ.
2SA 13:22 Absalọm odik manda wani kw'ojibh-ojibh obiro opyibh-opyibh kw'okhuri odik nwa, kọgbaakhi ọnang Amnọn. Yina, ọttaanga Amnọn k'ọgbarsadik kw'ọkk'ọsa ọnang ọgbaanọkka, Tama.
2SA 13:23 Mada cho afa akk'akwọbha, k'ogbe kw'atzọhmnọng p'Absalọm p'am-aphyiri arukhimaan ophyubha awobh ka Baal-Hazọr, kẹ ọbaanga Ephraim, wa Absalọm obher va p'ijinọng biphyir p'ọvaarnọng m'ẹrọm nduma.
2SA 13:24 Mẹ wọ, Absalọm ofona ọtza okhebha ọvaarnọng oben bi, “Atzọhmnọng paam am-aphyiri arukhimaan ophyubha. Tzotzokhaan, tte ọvaarnọng ọmaana akhaan-nọng pẹ akwu awobha ttar-m!”
2SA 13:25 Ọvaarnọng oben bi, “Mma e, nnwa kwaam, tte man biphyir oningi ọtza e. Kwẹ ọdọhbh-ọ kpọng e.” Chibhi da Absalọm ọgban-ẹ, kokher bi ọtza, yina, okhinggẹ ọsẹ-ẹ ittabọhng.
2SA 13:26 Mẹ wọ, Absalọm oben bi, “Idikha an-afha akwu, tzotzokhaan, tte ọgbaanotte kwaam Amnọn ọbọhk ọtzọn man abẹ.” Ọvaarnọng ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Ka yan kwa kẹ ọtzọn-ọ abẹ o?”
2SA 13:27 Yina, Absalọm ochina ororo ọgban-ẹ maa, ọvaarnọng otte Amnọn ọmaana va mbonggo p'ijinọng ọbọhk, bẹ atzọn Absalọm abẹ, afona.
2SA 13:28 Mada bẹ apyiri kẹ, Absalọm oben atzọhmnọng pẹ bi, “Bọng yonga itzọhng! Mada isa atzuk asi ettem ẹdaam Amnọn, mbeni bọng bi, ‘Bọng fhu Amnọn,’ bọng afhẹ-ẹ, oningi bọng ojor. Kaam wọ nnangi bọng ẹfa. Bọng bar ettem asi ejinọng.”
2SA 13:29 Wa atzọhmnọng p'Absalọm asi Amnọn mach'okk'bẹ ẹfa ọnanga. Mẹ wọ e, va p'ijinọng biphyir p'ọvaarnọng abina atza avura nnyanyaang sabẹ arọbh afona.
2SA 13:30 Mada bẹ am-arenga k'eden, ẹkkaabha epyiri Devid bi, “Absalọm okk'va p'ijinọng biphyir p'ọvaarnọng ọfha, ọnọng manda wani korikhi.”
2SA 13:31 Ọvaarnọng obina obe, ọjaakhi ẹnya ch'ọfọr obiro oyima k'irerek; akhaan-nọng pẹ biphyir ajaakhi nnya sa bẹ fọr abira awobha mẹ ttar-ẹ.
2SA 13:32 Yina, Jonadab kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Shimeyi, kw'ode ọgbaanotte kwa Devid oben bi, “Itta kwaam oningi ọtzọk bi, bẹ afhu avaar-va p'ijinọng biphyir; Amnọn kẹ-khẹ wọ ope e. Ode ochibhi kw'Absalọm ọkk'ọtzam ọkhaama, ttẹwọr k'ewu ch'Amnọn oyim ọgbaanọkka Tama abẹ k'ẹfa e.
2SA 13:33 Itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, ettem ening-ọ atzim ẹyakhi k'ẹkkaabha ch'epyir-ọ bi, avaar-va p'ijinọng biphyir akk'apa e. Amnọn kẹ-khẹ wọ ope.”
2SA 13:34 Ayongi mẹ, Absalọm ọkk'ọrọbha. Mada ojinọng kw'om-okkeri ibe otzini chen okkeri k'ororo, ore anọng k'ọhaabh k'eden k'okhubha kw'ewuchen em-edimi, p'am-ahakha k'egbegbeho ọkhaan-ọkhaan. Okker-ibe nwa ofona ọtza ọgbaak ọvaarnọng bi, “Nne ajinọng k'okhubha kwa Horonayim k'egbegbeho ọkhaan-ọkhaan e.”
2SA 13:35 Jonadab oben ọvaarnọng bi, “Kker e, va p'ijinọng p'ọvaarnọng akk'akwa e; kwẹ ọkk'ọda macha kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, mbeni.”
2SA 13:36 Okyer atzim ọgbagbaak mẹ, va p'ijinọng p'ọvaarnọng apyiri ttara obhoma k'ẹrọng. Wa ọvaarnọng ọmaana akhaan-nọng pẹ biphyir abira abhom k'idọdọhkhi.
2SA 13:37 Wa Absalọm ọrọbhi ochina ka Talmayi kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kw'Amihud, kw'ode ọvaarnọng kwa Geshur. Yina, wa ọvaar Devid owobha ka nkwu-osisi s'obo kwa nnwa kwẹ Amnọn, k'ewu kpenamkpen.
2SA 13:38 Mada Absalọm ọrọbhi ochina ka Geshur, wa owobh kẹ ka cho attaan.
2SA 13:39 Wa ọvaar Devid odini for sẹ nttem k'obo kw'Amnọn, obiro ọdaakh-ẹ bi, ira ore Absalọm.
2SA 14:1 Iwa Joab kw'ode nnwa kwa Zeruya, orong bi, ettem ch'ọvaarnọng ẹgban k'Absalọm.
2SA 14:2 Mẹ wọ, iwa Joab ọtzọhm ọnọng k'obhon kwa Tẹkoa, bẹ atza atzọkha kwanọng wani kw'odongi-odongi atzima akwu. Wa Joab oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ si nkkari bi awobh epopa. Afọra abara-bina. Ana manda bani kàkpan. Si mach'ọnọng kw'okk'epopa owobha k'iwu-haabhada.
2SA 14:3 Rọhng k'ọvaarnọng atza agbaakh-ẹ atzim mba.” Wa Joab, ọtzaakh-ẹ atzim p'ọtza ọgbaak.
2SA 14:4 Mada kwanọng nwa kw'ofon Tẹkoa ọgbaakhi ọvaarnọng atzim, ọrakha ottima itzitzikha m'irerek ọnang ọvaarnọng ikpokpobha, oben bi, “Ọvaarnọng, kkaan-m e!”
2SA 14:5 Ọvaarnọng ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Mbọng vọ ode odik kw'ọyakh-ọ atzim?” Kwanọng nwa oben bi, “Kaam nde opopa-kwanọng, da odim kwaam ọkk'ọpa e.
2SA 14:6 Kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, ngaam va afa p'ijinọng. Wa bẹ akwu arima ayok abẹ k'owoni, k'ogbe kw'ọnọng on'ode kw'ọkkaan bẹ erima. Wa oyok wani obun oyok ofhu.
2SA 14:7 Mẹ wọ, efona chaam biphyir ẹkk'ẹttaanga ẹnang ọtzọhmnọng kwọ. Bẹ am-aben-m bi, ‘Nang man oyok kw'ofhu ọgbaanọkka, ifha mọfhẹ-ẹ, k'akpen p'ọgbaanọkka p'odimi, kaambi ode bi, modimi ọnọng kw'ọbaan k'ebocha.’ Ma, bẹ an-adimi akpen pa nnwa wani kẹ-khẹ kw'orikh-m. Bẹ abira adimi odim kwaam che, ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chẹ m'ọyagbin.”
2SA 14:8 Iwa ọvaarnọng oben kwanọng nwa bi, “Rọhng abhana, kaam ńsi ẹmọng osi m'odik nwa.”
2SA 14:9 Kaambi mẹ wọ, kwanọng nwa kw'ofon Tẹkoa oben-ẹ bi, “Tte itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, obina ọnang kaam ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr ch'otte kwaam. Tte ọvaarnọng ọmaana ẹvaar chẹ, bẹ aningi oponga-pyibha atzọk.”
2SA 14:10 Ọvaarnọng obhina bi, “Idikha ọnọng manda wani ọyakh-ọ atzim, kọ tzim-ẹ akwu. Kẹ kọ ọttọhk kósi.”
2SA 14:11 Kwanọng nwa obhina bi, “Tte ọvaarnọng ochekhi ka che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwẹ bi, kẹ ọnọng manda wani ọbọhk kotte bi, otzukha ẹnọngmon-barada nda, ifha bẹ aningi akpen pa nwa kwaam adimi.” Ọvaarnọng obhina bi, “Da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, esisa-naanga cha nnwa kwọ ch'etto k'irerek kede.”
2SA 14:12 Mẹ wọ, kwanọng nwa oben bi, “Tte kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ mgbaak atzim nnang itta ọvaarnọng kwaam.” Ọvaarnọng obhin-ẹ bi, “Kọ gbaak.”
2SA 14:13 Kwanọng nwa on-oben bi, “Okhuri yan kwa kọ aphaari itzama-dema nna atzima atzor anọng p'Ibinọkpaabyi o?” Idikha ọvaarnọng ọgbaakhi odik-dema nwa, for sẹ arang s'ọbhakhi opyima ma o, da ọvaarnọng oni nnwa kwẹ kw'okhubhi, otzim-otzima ọkpa nnam o?
2SA 14:14 Mọkhaambi ope mach'asi abyengi k'irerek, p'ọnọng oni dọk ọfha otzima ọkpa nnam. Ochibhi kw'Ibinọkpaabyi mando kode. Yina, kẹ om-otzer ohok aphaangi bi, ọnọng kwa bẹ akk'akhubha ofona, obiro orenga mẹ ọkpa nnam otzor-ẹ.
2SA 14:15 “Kaam nkk'nkwa bi, nkwu mgbaak itta ọvaarnọng kwaam odik nwa, okhuri bi, anọng mba akk'asa bi ojor-m. Ọtzọhmnọng kwọ okk'ochibhi bi, ‘Kaam ḿgbaak itta ọvaarnọng kwaam atzim, asi mẹ, kẹ ósi-osi otzor k'ephyema ch'ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ.
2SA 14:16 Asi mẹ, ọvaarnọng okher-okhera bi, ọkkaana ọrọbha ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ ka mbọhk s'ojinọng kw'om-okhonga bi, odimi ekkema cha kaam ọmaana nnwa kwaam ch'Ibinọkpaabyi ọnangi man.’
2SA 14:17 “Kẹ wọ osi ọtzọhmnọng kwọ oben bi, ‘Tte atzim p'itta ọvaarnọng kwaam anang-m ẹwọhng-kwokha, da itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, ode mach'orenga-eden kw'Ibinọkpaabyi kw'orong ejibha ọmaana epyibha. Tte ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ, owobha ttar-ọ.’ ”
