2SA 14:18 Mẹ wọ, ọvaarnọng e oben kwaanọng nwa bi, “Kaam ebhina ch'odik kwa ḿbọbh-ọ ma, kàdubha.” Kwanọng nwa oben bi, “Tte itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, ọbọbh.”
2SA 14:19 Ọvaarnọng ọbọbh bi, “Kachibhi bi, ọbọhk kwa Joab owobh m'odik nwa?” Kwanọng nwa obhina bi, “Da kọ itta ọvaarnọng kwaam arukhi akpen, ọnọng manda wani kw'ósi odik ngọmi oyongi kw'itta ọvaarnọng kwaam ọgbaakhi kode. Ode mando bi, ọtzọhmnọng kwọ Joab wọ ọtzọhn-m bi, nsi odik nwa. Kẹ wọ obiro ọtzaakhi kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ atzim mba biphyir.
2SA 14:20 Wa Joab kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kwọ osi odik nwa, ifha otzima ọbhakhi idik ewobha. Itta kwaam ọkhaam ekkoji mach'orenga-eden kw'Ibinọkpaabyi, kẹ orong odik kpenamkpen kw'otto m'irerek nna.”
2SA 14:21 Mẹ wọ, ọvaarnọng oben Joab bi, “Ojibhi kẹ, kaam ńsi-osi mando. Kọ rọhng atza atzima Absalọm, kw'ode odikkobh akpa nnam.”
2SA 14:22 Joab otto okhubha itzitzikha sẹ m'irerek ọnang-ẹ ikpokpobha, obiro odo ọvaarnọng. Joab oben bi, “Kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ nkk'nnonga bi, nkk'ọphyaam ndọkha k'itzitzikha s'itta ọvaarnọng kwaam mayina e, okhuri da, ọvaarnọng ọkk'ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ ephyema chẹ ọnanga.”
2SA 14:23 Mẹ wọ, Joab ofona ochina ka Geshur ọtza ọtzọkha Absalọm otzima ọkpa nnam ka Jẹrusalẹm.
2SA 14:24 Yina, ọvaarnọng oben bi, “Kẹ ọkhaambi ochina k'ọhọhm kwẹ. Kọkhaambi ore itzitzikha saam.” Mando kw'iwa Absalọm ọkpa nnam ochina k'ọhọhm kwẹ, itzitzikha s'ọvaarnọng kore.
2SA 14:25 Iwa k'Israẹl biphyir ojinọng kwa bẹ atzọhng k'ajibhada mach'Absalọm kode. Ttẹwọr k'eho maa ahakha ka mmokpatzọkhi sẹ, enyu kọkhaam.
2SA 14:26 Iwa kẹ om-ophyiri isisa s'eho chẹ, da cho ọn-ọha, okhuri da sẹ im-idọhbh-ẹ ọdọhbh. Ogbe kpenamkpen kw'ophyiri isisa sẹ, edọhbh ch'isisa sẹ im-ipyiri ashẹkẹl arọbh jobh, atzor k'odem kwa bẹ am-ayoma ẹdọhbh ch'ekpo k'ọvaar-họhm.
2SA 14:27 Iwa Absalọm obhoni va p'ijinọng attaan ọmaana nnwa kw'ikwanọng. Wa nnwa kw'ikwanọng okpen Tamar, ojibh kwanọng.
2SA 14:28 Iwa Absalọm orukhi ka Jẹrusalẹm cho afa, yina, itzitzikha s'ọvaarnọng kọfha ore.
2SA 14:29 Absalọm ọtzọhm bi, bẹ ayeri Joab anang-ẹ, ifha ọtzọhm-ẹ k'ọvaarnọng. Yina, Joab obhum eyeri nduma. Absalọm obiro ọtzọhm ottong igbe ifa bi, bẹ ayer-ẹ, obiro obhum eyeri nduma.
2SA 14:30 Mando kw'obeni atzọhmnọng pẹ bi, “Bọng kker e, owoni kwa Joab kw'owobh ọbaanga kwaam, ọkhaam abarli. Bọng nọhng atza akwọm-ẹ.” Mando kw'atzọhmnọng p'Absalọm akwọmi owoni kwa Joab.
2SA 14:31 Joab ofona ọtza okhebha Absalọm oben-ẹ bi, “Okhuri yan kw'atzọhmnọng pọ atza akwọmi owoni kwaam o?”
2SA 14:32 Absalọm oben Joab bi, “Kker e, kaam ndọhmi ẹkkaabha, mben bi, ‘Kwu ifha ndọhm-ọ atza abọbh ọvaarnọng bi, okhuri yan kwa kaam mfon ka Geshur ngwuna ma o? Ira ojibh ọtzam ọnang-m bi, nwobh ka Geshur!’ Ma, kaam nna nnori bi nne itzitzikha s'ọvaarnọng e. Idikha ngaam oponga-pyibha manda wani kẹ, tte kẹ ofhu-m e.”
2SA 14:33 Mẹ wọ, Joab ofona ochina k'ọvaarnọng otza ọgbaakh-ẹ odik nwa. Wa ọvaarnọng oyeri Absalọm, kw'okwu ọrakha ọvaarnọng m'itzitzikha, ottima itzitzikha m'irerek. Iwa ọvaarnọng ọbaakha Absalọm.
2SA 15:1 Okwu otzuma k'ogbe mẹ, Absalọm otzini ọkpaar kwa nnyanyaang mmindọr, ọmaana nnyanyaang, okwu ọttara k'ajinọng arọbh afa obhiri jobh bi, bẹ achẹ-ẹ eden.
2SA 15:2 Iwa kẹ ọm-ọphyọbha k'ekpekpebha ọtza obe k'eden ọkhaan-ọkhaan ch'echin k'ẹbaakhamma ch'odedenmon. Ogbe kpenamkpen kw'ọnọng otzim aponga bi, ọtza okhebha ọvaarnọng, ifha ọttọhna, Absalọm om-oyeri ọnọng nwuma ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ afon bọng obhon?” Ọnọng nwuma obhina bi, “Ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ofon k'ẹkhọma dani ch'Israẹl.”
2SA 15:3 Mẹ wọ, Absalọm on-oben-ẹ bi, “Kker e, aponga mba adaami kọ, bẹ abira otzor-otzor, yina, ọnọng kw'oyong-ọ itzọhng k'eho ch'ọvaarnọng kode e.”
2SA 15:4 Absalọm ọttara bi, “Idikha ira bẹ asi-m osi-aponga m'irerek nna e! Ira ọnọng kpenamkpen ọkhaam odik kw'ọyakh-ẹ atzim, obiro ode iponga o, ofha okwu okhebh-m, kaam ńsi aponga pẹ adaam-ẹ.”
2SA 15:5 Ogbe kpenamkpen kw'ọnọng oreng otzor Absalọm ka for bi, ọrakha ottima itzitzikha k'irerek orim-ẹ, Absalọm om-onemi ọbọhk ọbọkh-ẹ obina, ọbaakh-ẹ.
2SA 15:6 Wa Absalọm om-osi mando ọnang anọng p'Israẹl biphyir, p'akwu aror eponga-ttọhna ch'etzor-otzor k'ọvaarnọng. Wa om-osi mando otzima odebh nttem s'anọng p'Israẹl.
2SA 15:7 Mada cho anna akk'akwọbha, iwa Absalọm oben ọvaarnọng bi, “Tte kaam nda ka Hẹbrọn, ifha nda ńsi ẹjaakhi ch'echekhi ch'iwa nsi nnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
2SA 15:8 Mada iwa ọtzọhmnọng kwọ orukhi ka Geshur k'ẹkhọma ch'Aram, iwa kaam nsi echekhi bi: ‘Idikha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otzim-m ọkpa nnam ka Jẹrusalẹm, kaam ḿkpobha Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ka Hẹbrọn.’ ”
2SA 15:9 Ọvaarnọng oben-ẹ bi, “Rọhng k'odidiri.” Mando kw'Absalọm ofon ochina ka Hẹbrọn.
2SA 15:10 Iwa Absalọm ọtzọhm nttọ ka ngọma s'Israẹl makhọra bi, bẹ atza aben bi, “Isa bọng abhaang da bẹ agyi abukpọhng bi kpaar, bọng kpebh amọng aben bi, Absalọm ọkk'ọvaarnọng ọda ka Hẹbrọn e!”
2SA 15:11 Wa ajinọng arọbh jobh p'afon ka Jẹrusalẹm bọ atzọni Absalọm abẹ. Wa obheri bẹ mach'anọng p'akwu odik kw'abẹ an-arong.
2SA 15:12 Mada Absalọm om-osi njafọhni, wa obiro ọtzọhm bẹ ayeri Ahitophẹl kw'ofon Gilo, kw'ọm-ọnang Devid ndọhna, ofona ka Gilo kw'ode obhon kwẹ okwu. Mẹ wọ, achibhi-tzama p'Absalọm an-ado ẹfa akhaama, anọng p'atzọni Absalọm abẹ, abira ochina ororo ahaabh.
2SA 15:13 Iwa ọkkaabh-ẹkkaabha wani okwu ọgbaak Devid bi, “Nttem s'anọng p'Israẹl nwobh k'Absalọm.”
2SA 15:14 Mando kwa Devid obeni atzọhmnọng pẹ biphyir p'awobh ttar-ẹ ka Jẹrusalẹm bi, “Bọng kwu! Mọrọbh, oni mando ode, ọnọng manda wani kw'ọnaanga ka mbọhk s'Absalọm kóde. Mọkhaambi obina ofona ẹbhar-ẹbhar, oni mando ode, kẹ ọ́tza ọ́khọbha man ọkhọbha ódimi man, óbiro otzima ọkkangkkaang ofhu anọng p'odedenmon.”
2SA 15:15 Akhaan-nọng p'ọvaarnọng abhin-ẹ bi, “Atzọhmnọng pọ akk'for ada atzik bi, bẹ asi kpenamkpen f'itta ọvaarnọng kwaman ochibhi.”
2SA 15:16 Mando kw'ọvaarnọng obin orenga, anọng p'ẹhọhmmọr chẹ biphyir atzọn-ẹ abẹ. Yina, iwa obin oji akkọra-panọng pẹ jobh bi, bẹ awobha akkeri ẹvaar-ttọhmma.
2SA 15:17 Wa ọvaarnọng otzima anọng biphyir p'atzọn-ẹ abẹ obina orenga, bẹ abe k'odedenmon ọkhaan-ọkhaan.
2SA 15:18 Wa atzọhmnọng pẹ biphyir achẹ-ẹ eden akwọbha. Ajinọng pa Kẹrẹt ọmaana pa Pẹlẹt ttara pa Git p'ade ẹnọhna obhiri arọbh jobh biphyir p'atzọn-ẹ abina ka Gat, am-abira arenga ọvaarnọng k'itzitzikha.
2SA 15:19 Ọvaarnọng on-oben Ittayi kw'ofon Git bi, “Okhuri yan kwa kọ atzọn man abẹ o? Kọ ade okhekhennọng kw'arọbhi ebira k'obhon kwọ. Kpa nnam atza awobha ttara ọvaar Absalọm.
2SA 15:20 Ikhena-ikhena wọ kw'akwu. On-orenga yan kaam nttọ-ọ ọbọhk awenna ttara man, k'ogbe kwa nni ibe nnong sa mminda-ọtza o? Kọ tzima anọng pọ biphyir kpa nnam. Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi ọphyaam ọnang bọng, obiro ọkhọhkha bọng idadaakha.”
2SA 15:21 Yina, Ittayi on-obhina ọvaarnọng bi, “Odem kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, ọmaana k'odem kw'itta ọvaarnọng kwaam obiro oruk akpen, ibe kpenamkpen s'itta ọvaarnọng kwaam owobh, kaambi ode obo, obiro ode akpen o, mẹ wọ kwa kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, ńwobha.”
2SA 15:22 Devid oben Ittayi bi, “Kọ rọhng, abina orenga.” Mando kw'Ittayi kw'ofon Git obin orenga ọmaana ajinọng pẹ, ttara nhọhmmọr sa nwobh ttar-ẹ.
2SA 15:23 Iwa anọng biphyir p'ẹkhọma nda abhom amọng k'ẹrọng, k'ogbe kw'anọng mba am-arenga akwọbha. K'ogbe kw'ọvaarnọng om-ojekha Ẹttẹri cha Kidrọn, akhaan-nọng pẹ biphyir atzọn-ẹ abẹ, arenga achina k'okhubha kw'anọng anarukhi.
2SA 15:24 Iwa Zadọk obiro owobha mẹ, ttara abaLẹvi biphyir p'am-atzini Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi. Wa bẹ abera Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi k'irerek. Abiyata osi njafọhni maa anọng mba, atte odedenmon nwa ọbọhk.
2SA 15:25 Ọvaarnọng oben Zadọk bi, “Tzima Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi akpa nnam k'odedenmon. Idikha kaam ngaam ọphyaam k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kẹ ótzim-m otzima mkpa nnam ma. Kẹ óbiro osi-m nne Ẹkkọhbhi nda ore, ọmaana irukhabe sẹ.
2SA 15:26 Yina, idikha obeni bi, ‘Ettem kaam kẹdaami ttar-ọ,’ kkeri, kaam nkk'for nda; tte osi-m mach'ọdaakh-ẹ.”
2SA 15:27 Iwa ọvaarnọng obiro oben Zadọk kw'ode ọfọhnẹja bi, “Kwẹ kọ kọttaan o? Kpa nnam k'odedenmon ttara ẹdaa chaam. Tzima Ahimaz kw'ode nnwa kwọ, ọmaana Jonatan kw'ode nnwa kw'Abiyata akpa nnam. Kọ ọmaana Abiyata, bọng dima va pabọng afa akpa nnam.
2SA 15:28 Kaam ńwobha ndik, k'ibe s'anọng am-arenga ajekha achina k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi, maa atzọhm-m ẹkkaabha.”
2SA 15:29 Mando kw'iwa Zadọk ọmaana Abiyata atzim Ẹkkọhbhi nda ch'Echekhi ch'Ibinọkpaabyi akpa nnam, atza awobha ka Jẹrusalẹm.
2SA 15:30 Yina, wa Devid ochina ororo om-ovura Egbegbeho ch'Oliv. Wa obubha ọttọhk k'eho, otzima mmo-dukhi om-obhom ẹmọng otzima orenga. Anọng biphyir p'awobh ttar-ẹ abira abubha nho sabẹ, am-abhom amọng atzima avura egbegbeho.
2SA 15:31 Mada bẹ akk'Devid agbaakha bi, “Ahitophẹl obiro ode wani k'ottem kw'anọng p'asi mphaari-tzama ttara Absalọm.” Mando kwa Devid ozi njọhm, oben bi, “O Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, si ndọhna s'Ahitophẹl mmakhi nde edidingi.”
2SA 15:32 Mada Devid opyiri k'egbegbeho ebira, kẹ da anọng am-awobha akpobha Ibinọkpaabyi, wa Hushayi kw'ofon Ark ọtza okhebha Devid kẹ, ọmaana owura-baba kwẹ kw'ọkk'ọjaakhi ttara ọkpọhm k'eho chẹ.
2SA 15:33 Devid oben-ẹ bi, “Idikha kọ atzọn-m abẹ, kọ áde ẹtzọhkha anang-m.
2SA 15:34 Yina, idikha akpa nnam k'odedenmon atza aben Absalọm bi, ‘Itta ọvaarnọng, kaam ńde ọtzọhmnọng kwọ. Iwa kaam nde ọtzọhmnọng kw'atte, kaam nna ńde ọtzọhmnọng kwọ.’ Mẹ kw'áfha akkaan-m akhibhi ndọhna s'Ahitophẹl.
2SA 15:35 Zadọk ọmaana Abiyata p'ade afọhnẹja, áwobh-owobha kẹ ttar-ọ. Gbaak bẹ odik kpenamkpen kw'abhaang k'ẹvaar-ttọhmma.
2SA 15:36 Va pabẹ p'ijinọng afa p'ade; Ahimaz kwa Zadọk obhoni ọmaana Jonatan kw'Abiyata obhoni, awobh mẹ ttara bẹ. Tzọhm bẹ akwu agbaakh-m odik kpenamkpen kw'abhaang.”
2SA 15:37 Mando kwa Hushayi kw'ode oyok-odikkobh kwa Devid opyiri ka Jẹrusalẹm, k'ogbe kw'Absalọm om-odim k'odedenmon.
2SA 16:1 Mada Devid okk'orenga ọkwọbha egbegbeho nduma ibebaa, on-ore Ziba kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kwa Mẹphiboshẹt. Wa ọdabh nwọr-wobha ka nnyanyaang, obiro ọtzọkha brẹd-duk arọbh jobh, ọmaana attukha-pyi arọbh azen p'agrep p'agwu-ogwu, ọmaana attukha-pyi arọbh azen pa fig, okwu ọttara k'atzuk pa bẹ akhe k'ẹkpa cha bẹ atzim etzenkpa asi, otzima otzik Devid.
2SA 16:2 Iwa ọvaarnọng ọbọbh Ziba bi, “Atzim ekpo mbya akwu mbọng o?” Ziba obhina bi, “Nnyanyaang nna nde s'ẹhọhmmọr ch'ọvaarnọng ẹyaar e. Brẹd ọmaana achiduk ade p'adikkobh mba áchi. Atzuk mba ábira asi for igaangi ayok p'ẹfa ẹkk'ẹha k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi.”
2SA 16:3 Ọvaarnọng ọn-ọbọbh bi, “Nnwa-mmona kw'itta kwọ kho?” Ziba oben bi, “Kẹ owobh ka Jẹrusalẹm, okhuri da ochibhi bi, ‘Mayina s'anọng p'Israẹl ánang-m ọvaarbhon kw'otte kwaam kw'ideden, ọnang.’ ”
2SA 16:4 Mẹ wọ, ọvaarnọng oben Ziba bi, “Ọttọhk kpenamkpen fa Mẹphiboshẹt ọkhaam on-ode fọ.” Ziba oben bi, “Itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, nnak k'ikpokpobha, tte kaam ngaama ọphyaam k'itzitzikha sọ.”
2SA 16:5 Mada ọvaar Devid opyiri k'obhon kwa Bahurim, ojinọng wani kw'ofon k'ẹnọmma dani ttara ẹhọhmmọr cha Saul oyin ka, ọttẹwọr ọm-ọgbaak olukhi. Ojinọng nwa okpen Shimeyi, kw'ode nnwa kwa Gẹra.
2SA 16:6 Wa ọm-ọbhari Devid ọmaana akhaan-nọng p'ọvaarnọng biphyir atza. Iwa agbong-nọng biphyir ọmaana abaabhi awobh Devid k'odimbọhk ọmaana ka kwabọhk.
2SA 16:7 Wa Shimeyi om-olukhi Devid, oben bi, “Bina ma, rọhng afona! Ọnọng-dama mach-ọ, ọfhu-anọng macha kọ!
2SA 16:8 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọ ọmmamma ọnanga k'anọng p'afhu k'ẹhọhmmọr cha Saul, kw'atzọk ẹvaar ka mbọhk sẹ adabh. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ọvaarbhon nwa ọtzọkha ka mbọhk sọ, ọnang nnwa kwọ Absalọm. Kọ an-awobh k'ihem, okhuri bi, ade ọfhu-anọng!”
2SA 16:9 Mẹ wọ, Abishayi kw'ode nnwa kwa Zeruya, oben ọvaarnọng bi, “Okhuri yan kw'ọpfa-bukhi nwa om-olukhi, itta ọvaarnọng kwaam o? Tte nda mkpaar-ẹ eho.”
2SA 16:10 Iwa ọvaarnọng oben bi, “Odik nwa on-oreng yan ọkpakha bọbọng va pa Zeruya o? Idikha ode Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ oben-ẹ bi, ‘Lukhi Devid,’ anyi wọ ọfha ọbọbh bi, ‘Okhuri yan kw'am-asi odik nwa o?’ ”
2SA 16:11 Mando kwa Devid obeni Abishayi ọmaana atzọhmnọng pẹ biphyir bi, “Ojemi nnwa kwa kaam ọkhaam, om-oror nden s'ofhu-m, ọn-ọyọhng oBẹnjamin-nọng nwa o! Bọng ttẹ-ẹ ọbọhk, olukh-m e; Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ọkk'ẹ obena bi, osi mando.
2SA 16:12 Asi mẹ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọfha ore ọmmamma kwaam, on-otzera ilulukhi sa Shimeyi mayina, ttara ẹdaa ch'echekhi chẹ.”
2SA 16:13 Iwa Devid ọmaana atzọhmnọng pẹ, achina ororo am-arenga k'ọkkadeden k'ogbe kwa Shimeyi, obiro orenga k'okhubha kw'egbegbeho kw'okker-ẹ itzitzikha. Om-olukhi Devid, ọbhar-ẹ atza, obiro obhon-ẹ ọkpọhm.
2SA 16:14 Wa ọvaarnọng ọmaana anọng p'atzọn-ẹ abẹ biphyir, apyiri k'ibe sa bẹ akhami k'ọkhọkhọhni. Mẹ wọ kw'iwa Devid okwok ọwọhng.
2SA 16:15 Iwa Absalọm ọmaana ajinọng p'Israẹl biphyir akk'apyiri ka Jẹrusalẹm. Wa Ahitophẹl obiro ọtzọn-ẹ abẹ okwu.
2SA 16:16 Oyok-odikkobh kwa Devid kw'okpen Hushayi kw'ofon Ark, ọtza okhebha Absalọm, oben-ẹ bi, “Tte ọvaarnọng oruk akpen p'adum-odum! Tte ọvaarnọng oruk akpen p'adum-odum!”
2SA 16:17 Absalọm ọbọbh Hushayi bi, “Ma wọ ode idadaakha s'afha akhọhkha oyokh-odikkobh o? Bọng areng iyok, osi yan kw'anẹ-ẹ abẹ atzọni afona?”
2SA 16:18 Hushayi oben Absalọm bi, “Mma e, kaam nwobha ttara ọnọng kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'otzekha. Kẹ wọ ode ọnọng kw'anọng mba ọmaana ajinọng p'Israẹl biphyir akk'atzekha e.
2SA 16:19 Ọttara bi, anyi kwa kaam nsi ọtzọhm nnang o? Kaam nsi ọtzọhm nnang nnwa kwẹ. Odem nwa kw'iwa nsi nnang atte, mando kwa kaam nsi ọtzọhm nnang-ọ.”
2SA 16:20 Absalọm oben Ahitophẹl bi, “Nang man ndọhna sọ. Mosi yan?”
2SA 16:21 Ahitophẹl obhina Absalọm bi, “Yima akkọra-panọng p'atte abẹ p'okhokhi bi, bẹ akkeri ẹvaar-ttọhmma. Mẹ wọ osi, anọng p'Israẹl biphyir ábhaanga bi, akk'atte idik akpukhi. Anọng p'atzum-ọ mbọhk ka nnam án-abira ado ẹfa akhaama.”
2SA 16:22 Mando kwa bẹ asi ikhira k'ọhohm ebir-ebir, s'Absalọm owobh oyima akkọra-panọng p'otte abẹ, k'itzitzikha s'anọng p'Israẹl biphyir.
2SA 16:23 K'ogbe nwuma, iwa ndọhna s'Ahitophẹl nde mach'ọnọng ọdọhni Ibinọkpaabyi. Mando kw'iwa Devid ọmaana Absalọm am-atzọkha ndọhna kpenamkpen s'Ahitophẹl.
2SA 17:1 Ahitophẹl oben Absalọm bi, “Tte ndekha ajinọng nnọhna ẹrọbh obhiri jobh, ndima bẹ ngwubh Devid k'erungiwu cha mayina.
2SA 17:2 Kaam ńnim-ẹ abẹ, k'ogbe kw'ọkk'ẹ ọkhọhna, ẹfa ebire ẹhẹ-ẹ. Kaam ngẹ-ẹ ojora f'ideden ka for, ifha anọng p'awobh ttar-ẹ, árọbh. Kaam ḿfhu ọvaarnọng kẹ-khẹ,
2SA 17:3 ḿbiri ndima anọng mbuma biphyir mkpa nnam nchen-ọ. Obo kw'ọnọng kw'am-aror, óde ekhuna ch'ayok biphyir; anọng mbuma biphyir, áwobha k'odidiri.”
2SA 17:4 Absalọm ọmaana adeden-nọng p'Israẹl biphyir, are mphaari nna mach'odik-ọkka.
2SA 17:5 Mẹ wọ, Absalọm on-oben bi, “Bọng yeri Hushayi kw'ofon Ark okwu, ifha mobiro ọbhaanga ochibhi kwẹ.”
2SA 17:6 Mada Hushayi opyiri, Absalọm oben-ẹ bi, “Kkeri ndọhna s'Ahitophẹl okk'man ọnanga ma e. Mósi mach'ọgbaakh o? Oni mando ode, gbaak man ochibhi kwọ.”
2SA 17:7 Hushayi e, obhina Absalọm bi, “Ndọhna s'Ahitophẹl ọnangi m'ogbe nwa kinjibhi.
2SA 17:8 Hushayi oben bi, kọ arong atte ọmaana ajinọng pẹ kẹ; bẹ ade agbong-nọng p'ajor mach'ekye, cha bẹ abọk va ana k'ẹtzam. Ayongi mẹ, atte ode ogbong-nọng kw'ekkoji; kẹ ma kóyima ttara agbong-nọng pẹ m'erungiwu nda.
2SA 17:9 Madeden nwa, ochubh k'ọmma kw'itzakpa wani, asi mẹ, ochubh k'ibe ọdọdọk. Idikha kẹ ochi eden orima agbong-nọng pọ abẹ, ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'ọbhaang kwẹ, óben bi, ‘Ẹnọng-fha ẹkk'ẹbara kpọng k'ottem kw'agbong-nọng p'atzọni Absalọm abẹ.’
2SA 17:10 Mẹ wọ, kaambi ogbong-nọng kw'ọbari ettem mach'ekye wọ, ojora ọnẹ-ẹ ẹfa maa, ope ka for biphyir, okhuri bi, anọng p'Israẹl biphyir arong bi, atte ode ogbong-nọng. Anọng p'abira awobha ttar-ẹ ade akkenggitza.
2SA 17:11 “Kẹ wọ osi, ndọhna saam nde bi, kkeri anọng p'Israẹl biphyir, ttẹwọr k'ẹkhọma cha Dan maa, apyiri k'ẹkhọma cha Beershẹba, kkeri odem nwa kwa bẹ ahaabhi mach'oyeyeng kw'ẹraanga-kha, tte bẹ biphyir awobha ttar-ọ. Kọ ọkhaam atzima bẹ eden atza egbong.
2SA 17:12 Ibe kpenamkpen sa mọfha ore atte, mórim-ẹ abẹ. Mokwuri kẹ nkwuri mach'eboni ebubh irerek. Kẹ akpen kóruk, ojinọng manda wani kwẹ kw'órik kode.
2SA 17:13 Idikha ọrọbhi odim k'odedenmon, anọng p'Israẹl biphyir átzima ndik atzọr nchumi s'obhon nwuma abhari k'ẹttẹri, maa itzatzaa manda wani kw'orik kóde.”
2SA 17:14 Mando kw'Absalọm ọmaana ajinọng p'Israẹl biphyir abeni bi, “Ndọhna sa Hushayi kw'ofon Ark njibhi ọtzam nyọhnga s'Ahitophẹl.” Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọkhama bi, opfuri ndọhna ọkkakka s'Ahitophẹl, ifha otte itzama ọbọhk ikhebha Absalọm.
2SA 17:15 Iwa Hushayi oben Zadọk ọmaana Abiyata p'ade afọhnẹja bi, “Ahitophẹl okk'Absalọm ọmaana adeden-nọng p'Israẹl ọtzọhna eden cha bẹ asi. Yina, kaam nkk'bẹ eden ọdọdọk ndọhna cha bẹ asi.
2SA 17:16 Tzọhm ẹkkaabha m'ẹbaa nda achena Devid bi, ‘Kọ k'ibe s'anọng am-arenga ajekha achina k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi m'erungiwu nda, kàtaabha. Yina, echuni kakhaama bi, ajekha k'okhubha. Oni mando ode, ọvaarnọng ọmaana anọng biphyir p'awobh ttar-ẹ, bẹ ábọkha bẹ, afhu-ofhu.’ ”
2SA 17:17 Iwa Jonatan ọmaana Ahimaz awobh k'Ẹn-Rogẹl, da iwa bẹ an-arori bi, anọng are bi bẹ am-adim k'odedenmon. Wa ominanwa wọ ọm-ọtza ọgbaak bẹ idik, yina bẹ-bẹ an-atza agbaak ọvaar Devid.
2SA 17:18 Yina, wa odikkobh wani ore bẹ, ọtza ọgbaak Absalọm. Mando kwa bẹ arọbhi ẹbhar-ẹbhar, achina k'ọhọhm kw'ojinọng wani ka Bahurim, kw'ọkhaam esipe k'ettọhmmattem chẹ. Wa bẹ ahakha achubha k'esipe ẹtzaanga.
2SA 17:19 Mando kwa kwanọng kw'ẹttọhmma nda ọtzọk ọttọhk obubha esipe nda, obiro ọtzọkha abọkpa-mọma ọyaan mẹ. Wa ọnọng kw'orong bi, ajinọng mba achubh mẹ kode.
2SA 17:20 Mada ajinọng p'Absalọm akwu akhebha kwanọng nwa m'ọhọhm, bẹ abọbh-ẹ bi, “Ahimaz ọmaana Jonatan awobh man?” Kwanọng nwa obhina bẹ bi, “Bẹ ajek k'okhubha nwonggo kw'ekhekha e.” Wa ajinọng mba aror bẹ, yina, bẹ ọnọng kare. Mando kwa bẹ akpa nnam ka Jẹrusalẹm.
2SA 17:21 Mada ajinọng mba akk'afona, Ahimaz ọmaana Jonatan ayin k'esipe, atza agbaak ọvaar Devid odik nwa. Bẹ aben bi, “Do for ẹbhar-ẹbhar ajekha k'ọraanga okhubha; kkeri Ahitophẹl okk'bẹ ọtzọhna odem kwa bẹ asi.”
2SA 17:22 Mẹ wọ, Devid ọmaana anọng biphyir p'awobh ttar-ẹ abina orenga, ajekha k'okhubha kwa Jọrdan. Yina ewu ehobha, anọng korikhi kw'oni Jọrdan ajekha.
2SA 17:23 Mada Ahitophẹl ore bi, bẹ ndọhna s'ọnangi bẹ katzọk, ọyaar ẹnyanyaang chẹ ọbhana k'obhon kwẹ. Odo ẹhọhmmọr chẹ biphyir, obina ọtza ọgbana edik. Ofona mẹ, wa ope, bẹ anọhng-ẹ k'epekhubh ch'otte.
2SA 17:24 Mẹ wọ, Devid obina ochina k'obhon kwa Mahanayim. Wa Absalọm obiro otzima ajinọng p'Israẹl biphyir ojekha k'okhubha kwa Jọrdan.
2SA 17:25 Wa Absalọm okk'Amasa ọrọbha mach'oho kw'agbong-nọng, otzima otzer eho cha Joab. Wa Amasa ode nnwa kw'ojinọng kw'okpen Jẹtẹr kw'ofon Ishmayẹl, kw'ọtzọk Abigẹl kw'ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kwa Nahash obiro ode ọgbaanotte kwa Zeruya kw'ode ọkka kwa Joab.
2SA 17:26 Anọng p'Israẹl ọmaana Absalọm abhing k'ẹkhọma ch'anọng pa Gilead.
2SA 17:27 Mada Devid opyiri k'obhon kwa Mahanayim, Shobi kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Nahash, kw'ofon Raba k'ẹkhọma ch'Ammọn, ọmaana Makir kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kw'Amiyẹl kw'ofon Lo-Debar, ttara Barzilayi kw'ofon Rogẹlim k'ẹkhọma cha Gilead
2SA 17:28 atzima ekpo py'eyima, ọmaana agbang-gbang, ttara ibanga-rọhkha. Bẹ abira atzima wit ọmaana abarli, ọmaana abubuma, ọmaana abọkpa-bhaabha, ọmaana ngirigiri ttara achen-meni.
2SA 17:29 Bẹ atzima akhọkhọhnana, ọmaana abasi p'akk'agaangi, ọmaana arukhimaan, ọmaana abukpa p'afon k'abasi p'andamogbodo achena Devid ọmaana anọng pẹ bi, bẹ achi. Bẹ aben bi, “Anọng mba okk'bẹ ọkhọhna, okwo ọkhaama bẹ, asi abira adaak bẹ, k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi.”
2SA 18:1 Wa Devid otzobha ajinọng p'awobh ttar-ẹ, osi ayok bani adenho p'agbong-nọng nnọhna-nnọhna, bani adenho p'agbong-nọng arọbh azen-azen.
2SA 18:2 Devid ọbhaangi agbong-nọng mba ka ngaan nttaan, osi Joab odenho kw'ẹkhaan dani. Osi Abishayi kw'ode nnwa kwa Zeruya, kw'obiro ode ọgbaanotte kwa Joab odenho kw'ẹkhaan dani. Osi Ittayi kw'ofon Git odenho kw'ẹkhaan dani. Wa ọvaarnọng oben ajinọng mba bi, “Kaam ọkhaam ḿbiri ndọn bọng abẹ.”
2SA 18:3 Yina, ajinọng mba aben bi, “Itta, kọ k'iyaan kakhaambi ayin. Idikha mọrọbhi, man attattaanganọng odik kọkpakha. Idikha man ibhaakha rani ope, man bẹ odik kọkpakha. Yina, kọ abari odik ayọhnga man anọng nnọhna ẹrọbh obhiri nzen. Kẹ wọ osi ọbaana bi, kọ awobha m'odedenmon, atzọhm man ẹkkaana e.”
2SA 18:4 Iwa ọvaarnọng on-obhina bi, “Kaam ńsi odik kpenamkpen osi kwa bọng are bi, ojibh-ojibh.” Mẹ wọ, iwa ọvaarnọng obe k'ẹbaakhamma ọkhaan-ọkhaan, mada ajinọng mba abin attọma ka ngaan s'arọbh azen-azen, ọmaana ka ngaan sa nnọhna-nnọhna, afona.
2SA 18:5 Wa ọvaarnọng ọtzọr Joab, ọmaana Abishayi ttara Ittayi itzọhng bi, “Bọng nenga kaam abẹ, ayobh odikkobh nwuma Absalọm oyobh o.” Wa agbong-nọng biphyir abhaanga da ọvaarnọng ọm-ọtzọr adenho itzọhng okhuri Absalọm.
2SA 18:6 Iwa agbong-nọng attọma ẹkhaan ayin k'odedenmon, atza arima anọng p'Israẹl abẹ. Wa egbong nda ewobh k'ẹtzam ch'Ephraim.
2SA 18:7 Mẹ kw'iwa ajinọng pa Devid akhem agbong-nọng p'Israẹl. Anọng p'ape ewu nduma ahaabhi apyiri nnọhna arọbh afa obhiri jobh.
2SA 18:8 Wa erima nda ẹnyaami makhọra ẹkhọma nda biphyir. Ọnọng-mik kw'iwa ope k'ẹtzam, ọyọhng kw'ope k'ọkkangkkaang.
2SA 18:9 Iwa Absalọm ọtza ottema ajinọng pa Devid abẹ. Wa ọm-ọyaar ẹnyanyaang chẹ. Mada ẹnyanyaang nda ereng bi, ẹkwọbha k'irekh-irek kw'echi cha oak ch'ideden, ch'abọhnga pẹ akpa-ọkpa, isisaa s'Absalọm igbaama k'echi nda. Wa ọn-ọyọhn m'ottem kw'ẹrọng ọmaana irerek. Ẹnyanyaang chẹ echina ororo ẹm-ẹrọbh efona.
2SA 18:10 Mando kw'ojinọng wani kw'ore odik kw'ọkk'ọtta, ofon ọtza ọgbaak Joab bi, “Kaam nne Absalọm da ọyọhni k'echi ch'oak.”
2SA 18:11 Joab oben ojinọng kw'ọgbaakh-ẹ odik nwa bi, “Obi! Are Absalọm o? Osi yan kẹ eden dani kafhu abhari m'irerek? Kaam ira nkk'ọ ashẹkẹl jobh pa silva ọmaana odikpa kw'ọkkakkaama nnanga.”
2SA 18:12 Yina, Joab obhina bi, “Kaambi akhe-m ashẹkẹl p'adọhbhi apyiri nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh ma mbọhk, kaam nnwa kw'ọvaarnọng ọbọhk kinttọmi e. Mowobh mẹ ọbhaanga da ọvaarnọng ọtzọri kọ, ọmaana Abishayi ttara Ittayi itzọhng bi, ‘Bọng nnenga kaam abẹ, ayobh odikkobh nwuma Absalọm.’
2SA 18:13 Idikha ira kaam nkk'Absalọm mfha, nge akpen paam ka dama-dama, da odik on-ode kw'ọvaarnọng on-om-oronga, ira akk'arọbha aji-m.”
2SA 18:14 Joab oben bi, “Kaam manda dọk kimbe ndikh-ọ.” Mando kw'ọtzọk akhọhn attaan p'otzim ka mbọhk, okhum Absalọm k'ettem, mẹ da Absalọm otzim om-oji iwọhng m'echi ch'oak.
2SA 18:15 Adikkobh jobh p'ade atzim-egbongkpo pa Joab akhọri Absalọm akhe k'ottem, akyer-ẹ abun afhu.
2SA 18:16 Mando kwa Joab ogyi obukpọhng, otzima oben agbong-nọng bi, bẹ akwọbha ajinọng p'Israẹl okhukhubh.
2SA 18:17 Bẹ atzini obukhi kw'Absalọm atza abhari k'ipekhuma s'idong-odong k'ẹtzam. Bẹ atzọkha ọtzakpa-hung abubh-ẹ. M'ogbe nwuma, anọng p'Israẹl biphyir arọbh achina k'ihọhm sabẹ.
2SA 18:18 K'ogbe kw'Absalọm otzim orukhi akpen, wa ọtzọk ọtza ottima ebebe k'Ẹttẹri ch'Ọvaarnọng mach'ojima ọnang for sẹ, da iwa ochibhi bi, “Kaam nnwa kw'ijinọng kingaam kw'osi che chaam eningi edimi.” Iwa oyeri ọtza nwa obhina che chẹ. Ọtza nwa okpen Ejima ch'Absalọm maa apyiri k'ewu cha mayina.
2SA 18:19 Iwa Ahimaz kw'ode nnwa kwa Zadọk oben bi, “Tte nnọbh nda mgbaak ọvaarnọng ẹkkaabha nda bi, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ẹ ọkkaana ka mbọhk s'attattaanga-nọng pẹ.”
2SA 18:20 Joab oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ arang atza agbaak ẹkkaabha nda mayina. Kọ atza ogbe ọdọdọk, mayina kàtza, okhuri bi, nnwa kw'ọvaarnọng ọkk'ọpa.”
2SA 18:21 Mẹ wọ, Joab oben ọnọng wani kw'ofon Kush bi, “Rọhng atza agbaak ọvaarnọng odik kw'akk'ara.” Ọnọng nwa kw'ofon Kush ọrakha ọnang Joab ikpokpobha, yina ọn-ọrọbhi ofona.
2SA 18:22 Ahimaz kw'ode nnwa kwa Zadọk obiro oben bi, “Kaambi ode yan, tzotzokhaan, tte nnọbh ndor ayi nwa kw'ofon Kush nnam.” Kaambi mẹ wọ, Joab obhina bi, “Nnwa kwaam, osi yan kw'aben bi atza? Ẹkkaabha manda dani ch'ẹnang-ọ echora kakhaam.”
2SA 18:23 Oben bi, “Kaambi ode yan, kaam nnọbh nda-ọtza.” Mẹ wọ, Joab oben bi, “Rọbh rọhng!” Mando kw'Ahimaz ọrọbhi orenga k'okhubha kw'ẹtteri, on-ochi ọnọng nwa kw'ofon Kush eden.
2SA 18:24 Mada Devid owobh ẹwọr k'ottem kw'ẹbaakhamma ch'iyaan ọmaana ch'ẹtzaanga, okker-ibe ovura k'ittakhọhnga s'echumi ch'ẹbaakhamma. Mada okkeri k'iyaan, on-ore ojinọng kw'ọm-ọrọbh kẹ mancheni.
2SA 18:25 Okker-ibe oyeri ọvaarnọng, ọgbaakh-ẹ! Ọvaarnọng oben bi, “Idikha ode mancheni, kw'oyini bi, otzim ẹkkaabha ẹkkakka.” Wa ojinọng nwa kw'ọm-ọrọbh ẹbhar nda, on-odo ọbaang-ọbaanga.
2SA 18:26 Okker-ibe nwa obiro ore ọnọng ọdọdọk kw'ọm-ọrọbh okwu. Oyeri okker-ẹbaakhamma, oben bi, “Kkeri e, ojinọng ọdọdọk ọm-ọrọbhi okwu mancheni!” Ọvaarnọng oben bi, “Asi mẹ, kẹ obiro otzima ẹkkaabha ẹkkakka.”
2SA 18:27 Okker-ibe oben bi, “Okher-m mana ocheden nwuma ọm-ọrọbh ẹbhar-dem ch'Ahimaz kw'ode nnwa kwa Zadọk.” Ọvaarnọng oben bi, “Kẹ ode ojinọng ọkkakka. Kẹ otzim ẹkkaabha ẹkkakka.”
2SA 18:28 Mando kw'Ahimaz oyeri ọvaarnọng, oben bi, “Itta, okk'ojibha ọnang man e!” Ọrakha ottima itzitzikha k'irerek ọnang ọvaarnọng ikpokpobha, oben bi, “Ẹtzọhnga ewobha ẹnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ! Kẹ okk'anọng p'arim itta ọvaarnọng kwaam abẹ okhema.”
2SA 18:29 Ọvaarnọng ọbọbh bi, “Odikkobh nwuma Absalọm orukhi akpen kẹ o?” Ahimaz obhina bi, “Mada Joab om-oben bi, ọtzọhm kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, ọmaana ọtzọhmnọng kw'ọvaarnọng, nne dama-dama kw'ideden, yina, kwẹ kaam kọttaani.”
2SA 18:30 Ọvaarnọng oben bi, “Be ma ọkhaan-ọkhaan, atzik.” Mando kw'ọpaangi obe ọkhaan-ọkhaan.
2SA 18:31 Mando kw'ọnọng nwuma kw'ofon Kush opyiri, oben bi, “Itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, bhaanga ẹkkaabha ẹkkakka! Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'ọ ọkkaana ka mbọhk s'attattaanga-nọng pọ biphyir.”
2SA 18:32 Ọvaarnọng ọbọbh ọnọng nwa kwa Kush bi, “Odikkobh nwuma Absalọm orukhi akpen kẹ o?” Ọnọng nwa kwa Kush obhina bi, “Tte attattaanga-nọng p'itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, ọmaana anọng biphyir p'akhami bi, asọ-ọ itzama, ade mach'odikkobh nwuma.”
2SA 18:33 Mando kwa for ipe ọvaarnọng. Obina ovura k'ẹmaanggọ-ebira ch'ewobh k'ẹbaakhamma, ọtza obhom ẹmọng. Mada om-ofona, oben bi, “Nnwa kwaam Absalọm o! Nnwa kwaam Absalọm o! Ottu kw'ira kọ ape, kaam wọ ira mpe e! Nnwa kwaam Absalọm o, nnwa kwaam o, nnwa kwaam!”
2SA 19:1 Iwa bẹ agbaak Joab bi, “Ọvaarnọng obhomi amọng kẹ, obiro owobha ka nkwu-osisi s'Absalọm ope e.”
2SA 19:2 Ewu nduma, agbong-nọng biphyir an-akhiri ọdadaami kw'ekhema chabẹ aji. Bẹ an-abhakhi awobha ka nkwu-osisi, da bẹ abhaang bi, “Ọvaarnọng owobh ka nkwu-osisi sa nnwa kwẹ kw'ope.”
2SA 19:3 M'ewu nduma, ajinọng mba abẹkhi atza adim k'odedenmon mach'ajinọng pa mgbar nsi, da bẹ arọbhi k'egbong.
2SA 19:4 Ọvaarnọng obubha mbọhk k'itzitzikha, obhom ẹmọng k'ẹrọng, oben bi, “Nnwa kwaam Absalọm o! Absalọm o! Nnwa kwaam o! Nnwa kwaam!”
2SA 19:5 Mando kwa Joab ọtza odim k'ọhọhm kw'ọvaarnọng oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ akk'ajinọng pọ biphyir aha ka mgbar mayina, p'akkaan akpen pọ, ọmaana akpen pa va pọ p'ijinọng ọmaana p'ipanọng, ọmaana akpen pa panọng pọ, ttara p'akkọra-panọng pọ.
2SA 19:6 Kọ ahọk attattaanga-nọng pọ idadaakha, attaanga anọng p'akhọhkh-ọ idadaakha. Kọ akk'ẹjaakhi asa mayina bi, adenho p'agbong-nọng ọmaana agbong-nọng pabẹ, ọttọhk kape k'itzitzikha sọ. Kaam nkk'nna k'ewu cha mayina bi, ira ọdaam-ọ ọdaam, ira man biphyir ope, Absalọm oruk akpen.
2SA 19:7 Bina atza akhe anọng pọ ottem-bara. Kaam nchekhi ka che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, idikha ani k'iyaan ayini afona, yina erungi epyi, ojinọng manda wani kwọ kw'oyima ma ttar-ọ kóde. Itzama nna íyọhnga, idik-ttama kpenamkpen s'ikk'itta ikhebh-ọ k'akpen, ttẹwọr k'edikkobh chọ maa apyiri ma.”
2SA 19:8 Mẹ wọ e, ọvaarnọng obina ọtza owobha ẹwọr k'ẹbaakhamma. Mada bẹ agbaakhi anọng mba bi, Ọvaarnọng owobh ẹwọr k'ẹbaakhamma e, bẹ biphyir afona atza akhebh-ẹ kẹ. M'ogbe nwuma, anọng p'Israẹl akk'arọbha achina k'ihọhm sabẹ.
2SA 19:9 Makhọra ngọma s'Israẹl, anọng biphyir am-akhaanga ayok atzim, aben bi, “Ọvaarnọng wọ iwa ọkkaan man ka mbọhk s'attattaanga-nọng paman. Kẹ wọ iwa obiro ọrọbha man ka mbọhk s'anọng pa Philistiya. Yina, kẹ ọkk'ọrọbha oji obhon okhuri Absalọm.
2SA 19:10 Ma, Absalọm kw'iwa mobyengi ana k'eho bi, ọdabh man, ọkk'ọpa k'egbong-dam. Osi yan kwa bọng amyi manda, bọng ọvaarnọng kabeni ọkpa nnam o?”
2SA 19:11 Ọvaar Devid ọtzọhm ẹkkaabha ochena Zadọk ọmaana Abiyata p'ade afọhnẹja bi, “Bọng bọbh adeden-nọng pa Juda bi, mada idik sa bẹ am-agbaak makhọra Israẹl ikk'ọvaarnọng ipyiri k'ẹttọhmma chẹ, ‘Orenga yan bọng an-ade akponga-nnam-nọng p'atzim ọvaarnọng akpa nnam k'ẹvaar-ttọhmma chẹ o?
2SA 19:12 Bọng ade afona-nọng paam, mode izi rani. Mẹ wọ, okhuri yan kwa bọng án-ade akponga-nnam-nọng p'ákwu bi, átzima ọvaarnọng abhana o?’
2SA 19:13 Bọng ben Amasa bi, ‘Kọ mode izi rani, mobiro ode efona dani. Tte Ibinọkpaabyi osi-m k'eden kpenamkpen ch'ẹdaakh-ẹ, idikha nnọ-ọ odenho kw'agbong-nọng paam nsi k'akpen pọ biphyir, ndima ndera eho cha Joab.’ ”
2SA 19:14 Iwa odebh nttem s'ajinọng pa Juda biphyir, osi bẹ akhaama ochibhi wani. Bẹ atzọhm ẹkkaabha anang ọvaarnọng aben bi, “Kọ ttara ajinọng pọ biphyir, bọng kpa nnam.”
2SA 19:15 Mando kw'ọvaarnọng ọkpa nnam, okwu opyiri k'Ọraanga kwa Jọrdan. Anọng pa Juda akk'akwa k'obhon kwa Gilgal bi, bẹ akwu akhebha ọvaarnọng mẹ, ifha bẹ atzima ọvaarnọng ajekha Jọrdan.
2SA 19:16 Shimeyi kw'ode nnwa kwa Gẹra, kw'ofon k'obhon kwa Bahurim k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin, otzima ajinọng pa Juda obina ẹbhar-ẹbhar, ọtza okhebha ọvaar Devid.
2SA 19:17 Anọng nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh pa afon Bẹnjamin bọ iwa atzọn-ẹ abẹ. Wa Ziba kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kw'ẹhọhmmọr cha Saul, ọmaana va pẹ p'ijinọng chi, ttara atzọhmnọng ẹrọbh abira awobha ttar-ẹ. Wa bẹ adukh-odukha ahakha ka Jọrdan, kẹ da ọvaarnọng owobh.
2SA 19:18 Bẹ atzima ẹhọhmmọr ch'ọvaarnọng arenga k'ibe s'anọng am-arenga ajekha, ajekha k'okhubha. Bẹ abira asi odik kpenamkpen kw'ọvaarnọng ochibhi. Mada ọvaarnọng om-odo for s'ojekha Jọrdan, Shimeyi kw'ode nnwa kwa Gẹra, oruri m'irerek m'itzitzikha s'ọvaarnọng,
2SA 19:19 oben-ẹ bi, “Tte itta kwaam, oning-m oponga-pyibha ọnangi. Kọ ottotto kwa khaam ọtzọhmnọng k'ewu ch'iwa kọ itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, abin ka Jẹrusalẹm, kajima. Tte ọvaarnọng oningi odik nwa k'ettem okhe.
2SA 19:20 Kkeri kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ nnong bi, nkk'ẹkhọhngkwuri nsa. Yina, nkk'nkwa mayina mach'ocheden-nọng kw'ofon ka ngọma sa Josẹph bi, nkwu ngebha itta ọvaarnọng kwaam.”
2SA 19:21 Mẹ wọ, Abishayi kw'ode nnwa kwa Zeruya oben bi, “Shimeyi ọbaan k'obo m'odik nwa e. Kẹ olukhi ọnọng kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'ana obyengi k'eho.”
2SA 19:22 Devid obhina bi, “Bọbọng va pa Zeruya, odik nwa on-oreng yan ọkpakha bọng o? Bọng ẹfa kakhaam bi, bọng akhe ittattaanga m'odik nwa. Ọbaan kẹ bi, bẹ afhu ọnọng m'Israẹl mayina o? Kaam nnong kẹ bi, kaam wọ nde ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl, mayina e.”
2SA 19:23 Mẹ wọ, ọvaarnọng ochekhi ọtzọkha ọnwọhngi, oben Shimeyi bi, “Kọ kápe e.”
2SA 19:24 Iwa Mẹphiboshẹt kw'ode nnwa-mmona kwa Saul obiro ọtza okhebha ọvaarnọng. Wa mmo sẹ kogbobhi, agba-phyubha kobiro ophyiri, ọbara fa for kogbobhi, tzọni k'ewu ch'ọvaarnọng ofon, maa apyiri k'ewu ch'ọkpa nnam k'odidiri.
2SA 19:25 Mada ofon ka Jẹrusalẹm bi, okwu okhebha ọvaarnọng, ọvaarnọng ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Mẹphiboshẹt, okhuri yan kw'iwa ana-m abẹ atzọni afona o?”
2SA 19:26 Oben bi, “Itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, mada kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ndumi-mbọhbhi, nna ben bi, ‘Kaam ńdabh ẹwọr-wobha ka ẹnyanyaang chaam, ḿbiri nyaar chẹ, ifha ndọn ọvaarnọng abẹ mofona.’ Iwa Ziba kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kwaam, wọ ọbọr-m.
2SA 19:27 Okk'kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ idik obubha, ọnang kọ itta ọvaarnọng kwaam. Itta ọvaarnọng kwaam ode mach'orenga-eden kw'Ibinọkpaabyi. Si odik kw'are bi, ojibh-ojibh ọnang-ọ.
2SA 19:28 Iwa va pa va p'otte kwaam biphyir abaan-ọbaana k'obo, ka mbọhk s'itta ọvaarnọng kwaam. Yina, atzer anang ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ewobha k'ottem kw'anọng p'achi ọchattọhk k'okpokkoro kwọ. Mẹ wọ, kaam ngaam bọng ẹfa bi, nchina ororo mphyem ọvaarnọng idikh o?”
2SA 19:29 Ọvaarnọng e, oben-ẹ bi, “Odik nwuma dọk kàgbaak. Kaam nkk'kọ ọmaana Ziba ẹfa nnanga bi, bọng atza akkema irerek sa Saul anang for sabọng.”
2SA 19:30 Mẹphiboshẹt oben ọvaarnọng bi, “Mada itta ọvaarnọng kwaam okk'okhuna k'odidiri. Tte kẹ ọtzọkha ọttọhk kpenamkpen biphyir.”
2SA 19:31 Wa Barzilayi kw'ofon k'ẹkhọma cha Gilead obiro obina k'obhon kwa Rogẹlim okwu bi, ọtzọn ọvaarnọng abẹ ojekha Jọrdan, ifha obiro orikh-ẹ k'eden.
2SA 19:32 Iwa Barzilayi ọkk'ọn-ọtzama kpọng, da iwa on-ode cho arọbh ana. Wa obiro ode ọkkakkaa, kw'okkeri ọvaarnọng k'ogbe kw'owobh k'obhon kwa Mahanayim.
2SA 19:33 Ọvaarnọng oben Barzilayi bi, “Tzọhn-m abẹ mojekha ka Jẹrusalẹm. Kaam ńkker-ọ okkeri.”
2SA 19:34 Yina, Barzilayi obhina ọvaarnọng bi, “Da kaam ḿbiri nnuk akpen ka cho aphaang, kw'ira kaam nna ńdọn ọvaarnọng abẹ nchina ka Jẹrusalẹm o?
2SA 19:35 Kaam nna nde cho arọbh ana. Na kaam mbiri mfha nnonga odik kw'ojibh-ojibh ọmaana kw'on-ojibh o? Kaam ọdadaami ọmaana ọmmamma dọk kinnọng. Ọtzọhmnọng kwọ idadaama s'ẹchakpo ttara itzuk dọk kọphaang. Amọng p'akkọhn-amọng p'ijinọng ọmaana p'ipanọng dọk kimmaang. Ka yan kw'ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, on-obiro okwu ọttara kọ itta ọvaarnọng kwaam ẹtzọhkha o?
2SA 19:36 Kaam k'echora nda ch'ọvaarnọng kimbaan. Ọtzọhmnọng kwọ okhinggẹ ọ́tzọhn ọvaarnọng abẹ ojekha ka Jọrdan ibebaa, orikh-ẹ k'oden-gwuma.
2SA 19:37 Tte ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ọkpa nnam e, ifha mpe k'obhon kwaam mbaanga epekhubh s'otte ttara ọkka kwaam e. Yina, kkeri ọtzọhmnọng kwọ Kimham ma. Tte kẹ ọtzọn itta ọvaarnọng kwaam abẹ ojekha k'okhubha. Si kpenamkpen f'achibhi bi asi, anang-ẹ.”
2SA 19:38 Ọvaarnọng oben bi, “Kimham ójekha ttar-m. Kaam ńsi kpenamkpen fa nchibhi nnang-ẹ. Ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ábira aror, kaam ńsi-osi nnang-ọ.”
2SA 19:39 Mẹ wọ, anọng biphyir ọmaana ọvaarnọng ajekha ka Jọrdan. Ọvaarnọng e, ọbaakha Barzilayi obiro ọsẹ-ẹ ittabọhng. Mando kwa Barzilayi ọkpa nnam ọbhana k'obhon kwẹ.
2SA 19:40 Mada ọvaarnọng ojek k'okhubha kwa Gilgal, Kimham ọtzọhn-ẹ abẹ ojekha. Asoja pa Juda biphyir ọmaana ibhaakha rani s'agbong-nọng p'Israẹl akk'ọvaarnọng atzima ajekha k'okhubha.
2SA 19:41 Ogbe kobhiri, ajinọng p'Israẹl biphyir am-akwu k'ọvaarnọng, akwu aben-ẹ bi, “Osi yan kwa votte paman pa Juda afhu ọvaarnọng atzim-ẹ ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chẹ, ọttara ajinọng pa Devid biphyir ajekha Jọrdan afona o?”
2SA 19:42 Iwa ajinọng pa Juda biphyir abhina ajinọng p'Israẹl bi, “Iwa mosi mando okhuri bi, ọvaarnọng mode anọng bani. Mbọng vọ on-ode ittemdọkhiji sabọng o? Mokk'ọttọhk manda vani f'ọvaarnọng ọtzọkha ochi o? Mokk'ọttọhk manda vani ọtzọkha ọnang for saman o?”
2SA 19:43 Mẹ wọ, ajinọng p'Israẹl an-abhina ajinọng pa Juda bi, “Maman ọkhaam ngọma jobh m'ẹvaar nda ẹ, mẹ wọ, mọkhaam Devid ọtzam ọyọhnga bọng e. Osi yan kwa bọng arẹkhi man manda o? Maman arang iwa ode acheden-nọng oben bi, ọvaarnọng kwaman ọkpa nnam.” Kaambi mẹ wọ, ajinọng pa Juda achina ororo agbana odik nwa.
2SA 20:1 Iwa ọkhọkhọra wani owobh mẹ kw'okpen Shẹba kw'ode nnwa kw'ijinọng kwa Bikiri, kw'ofon k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin. Wa ogyi obukpọhng, ọkpẹbh oben bi, “Maman ekkema ka Devid kọkhaam, man ekkema ka nnwa kwa Jẹsẹ kọkhaam! Anọng p'Israẹl o, ọnọng-ọnọng ochina k'ọhọhm kwẹ e!”
2SA 20:2 Mando kw'ajinọng p'Israẹl biphyir abin aji Devid, atza atzọn Shẹba kw'ode nnwa kwa Bikiri, abẹ. Yina, ajinọng pa Juda ttẹwọr ka Jọrdan maa, apyiri ka Jẹrusalẹm, abe k'okhubha kw'ọvaarnọng.
2SA 20:3 Mada Devid okhun k'ẹvaar-ttọhmma chẹ ka Jẹrusalẹm, ọtzọkha akkọra-panọng pẹ jobh p'okk'ofona oji bi, bẹ akkeri ẹvaar-ttọhmma, ohok k'ọhọhm wani, ọtzọkha bẹ ohok k'irekh-irek kw'abaabhi. Iwa om-okkeri bẹ, yina, bẹ abẹ koyim. Iwa panọng mba awobh m'ibe rani mach'apopa maa, bẹ ape.
2SA 20:4 Iwa ọvaarnọng oben Amasa bi, “Tzima iwu ittaan ayeri ajinọng pa Juda ttara kọ ọkhaam, bọng akwu.”
2SA 20:5 Yina, mada Amasa ofon bi, otza oyeri ajinọng pa Juda, okponga kẹ maa, ogbe kw'ọvaarnọng ọkk'ẹ ọkha, ọkwọbha.
2SA 20:6 Mẹ wọ ẹ, Devid on-oben Abishayi bi, “Kker e, itzama sa Shẹba kw'ode nnwa kwa Bikiri ósi man, íyọhnga s'iwa Absalọm osi e. Kọ tzima ajinọng p'itta kwọ akhubh-ẹ. Oni mando ode, kẹ óre idedenmon s'igaang-ọgaangi ore, ọtza ochubha mẹ, ọnaanga man.”
2SA 20:7 Mando kw'ajinọng pa Joab, ọmaana anọng pa Kẹrẹt ọmaana anọng pa Pẹlẹt, ttara akkenggitza biphyir, atzori ka ndọhna s'Abishayi kw'ode odenho, afona. Wa bẹ abina ka Jẹrusalẹm akhubh Shẹba, kw'ode nnwa kwa Bikiri.
2SA 20:8 Mada bẹ awobh k'ẹtzakpa ch'ideden ka Gibeọn, Amasa okwu okhebha bẹ mẹ. Wa Joab ọfọr egbong-nya chẹ, ọkpa mkpasin k'erin kw'ọdabhi imaana s'ijaabhi nnam mfa s'okhe k'ọpa. Mada oreng bi ochina ororo, sẹ irọbha k'ọpa itto.
2SA 20:9 Joab oben Amasa bi, “Ọgbaanotte kwaam, ọsọ-ọ yan?” Joab otzima odimbọhk kwẹ ọbọkha Amasa k'agba-phyubha mach'oben bi, ọbaakh-ẹ ọbaakha.
2SA 20:10 Amasa otzum kokhe k'imaana sa Joab otzim k'ọbọhk. Joab okhum-ẹ imaana nnuma k'ẹbhọr maa, abhọri ayin atto m'irerek. Okhum-ẹ ogbe nwuma wani kẹ-khẹ, Amasa ope. Mẹ wọ, Joab ọmaana ọgbaanotte Abishayi akhubh Shẹba kw'ode nnwa kwa Bikiri.
2SA 20:11 Iwa ojinọng wani k'ottem kw'anọng pa Joab, obe Amasa k'ẹbhabhaanga, oben bi, “Ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'orong bi, owobh ka Joab ọmaana ka Devid, tte ọtzọn Joab abẹ!”
2SA 20:12 Amasa oyim ọbangi m'izi sẹ m'eden-ttem. Ojinọng nwa on-ore bi, agbong-nọng biphyir am-atza abe mẹ. Mada ore bi ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'opyiri m'ibe s'Amasa oyim, om-ọpaangi obe, ọn-ọtzọr Amasa obina k'eden orur-ẹ k'owoni wani, ọtzọkha ibara obubh-ẹ.
2SA 20:13 Mada bẹ akk'Amasa atzini abina k'eden, ajinọng biphyir afona atza atzọn Joab abẹ bi, bẹ akhubh Shẹba kw'ode nnwa kwa Bikiri.
2SA 20:14 Shẹba ọkpaanga ngọma s'Israẹl biphyir maa, opyiri k'Abẹl Bẹt-Maka, obiro ọkpaanga ẹkhọma ch'anọng pa Bikiri p'iwa atzobh for sabẹ, atzọn Shẹba abẹ.
2SA 20:15 Agbong-nọng biphyir p'atzọni Joab abẹ, akwu akhọri Shẹba akhe k'ottem k'Abẹl Bẹt-Maka. Bẹ ayaabha igbo atzima abọkha iyaan-iyaan kw'echumi ch'odedenmon. Bẹ am-akhonga bi, avọhkhi echumi nda.
2SA 20:16 Yina, kwanọng wani kw'odongi-odongi owobha k'odedenmon ọkpẹbh bi, “Bọng yonga itzọhng e! Bọng yonga itzọhng e! Bọng yeri Joab orenga ọbaang-m, ifha ḿgbaakh-ẹ atzim.”
2SA 20:17 Joab orenga otzor-ẹ ka for, kwanọng nwa ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ wọ ade Joab o?” Obhina bi, “Kaam wọ e.” Kwanọng nwa oben-ẹ bi, “Yong itzọhng abhaanga odik kwa kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ngaam bi, ọgbaak.” Oben-ẹ bi, “Kaam mminyong itzọhng e.”
2SA 20:18 Kwanọng nwa ochina ororo oben bi, “Iwa anọng am-aben bi, ‘Ọkk'ọha kwẹ ode bi, abeni bi akhaama ebhina, china k'Abẹl.
2SA 20:19 Maman bọ ode anọng p'arori ẹmẹm, mobiro ode anọng p'akhaam nnam-ophephe k'Israẹl e. Kọ am-akhonga bi, adimi odedenmon kw'ode ẹranga ch'Israẹl e. Osi yan kwa kọ am-aben bi, adimi ekkema ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi o?”
2SA 20:20 Joab obhina bi, “Tzọmi-tzọmi okponga k'idachen! Tzọmi-tzọmi okponga k'idachen bi, kaam arang ngibhi, ayongi mẹ ndimi obhon!
2SA 20:21 Kwẹ mando kode. Ode bi, ojinọng wani kw'okpen Shẹba, kw'ode nnwa kwa Bikiri kw'ofon ka mgbegbeho s'Ephraim, kẹ wọ ọkk'ọbọhk kwẹ ọyaangi bi, obun ọvaar Devid. Bọng anang-m ojinọng nwa wani, kaam ńtte obhon nwa ọbọhk otte.” Kwanọng nwa on-oben Joab bi, “Mọbhari eho chẹ k'ọbaakha okhubha ọnang-ọ.”
2SA 20:22 Mando kwa kwanọng nwa oreng makhọra, otza okhebha anọng biphyir ttara adongiji pẹ, bẹ akpaara Shẹba kw'ode nwa kwa Bikiri eho, abhari Joab k'ọbaakha okhubha. Mẹ wọ, Joab ogyi obukpọhng otzima oben anọng pẹ biphyir atte odedenmon nwa ọbọhk, ọnọng-ọnọng ọkpa nnam k'ọhọhm kwẹ. Wa Joab obiro ọkpa nnam k'ọvaarnọng ka Jẹrusalẹm.
2SA 20:23 Iwa Joab wọ ode odenho kw'agbong-nọng p'Israẹl bi waam; Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹhoyada ode odenho kw'agbong-nọng pa Kẹrẹt ọmaana agbong-nọng pa Pẹlẹt.
2SA 20:24 Adoniram ode oho kw'asi-itzọhm. Jehoshaphat nnwa kw'Ahilud ode ọkkẹr-idik s'ikk'itta.
2SA 20:25 Sheva ode ọkkẹri; Zadọk ọmaana Abiyata ade afọhnẹja.
2SA 20:26 Iwa Ira kw'ofon Jair ode ọfọhnẹja kwa Devid.
2SA 21:1 K'ogbe kw'iwa Devid ọdabhi ẹvaar, wa okwo f'ideden owobh ka cho manda attaan. Wa Devid oror itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi m'odik nwa. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Okwo mva oreng k'osisi kwa Saul, ọmaana ẹnọmma chẹ, da bẹ afhu anọng pa Gibeọn.”
2SA 21:2 Ọvaarnọng oyeri anọng pa Gibeọn, ọgbaak bẹ atzim. (Wa anọng pa Gibeọn Israẹl kafon, bẹ ade anọng p'Amọr p'arikhi. Wa anọng p'Israẹl akk'achekhi bi, bẹ atte bẹ ọbọhk aruk akpen. Yina, Saul ọkham bi ofhu bẹ okhuri eyibhi ch'oyibh-ẹ bi, ọkkaana anọng p'Israẹl ọmaana pa Juda.)
2SA 21:3 Devid ọbọbh anọng pa Gibeọn bi, “Mbọng fa kaam ńsi nnang bọng? Yan wọ kwa ńnenga nsi ephyokhi, ifha bọng ádo ekkema ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi?”
2SA 21:4 Anọng pa Gibeọn abhin-ẹ bi, “Maman ẹfa kọkhaam bi, moror gol ọmaana silva ka mbọhk sa Saul, obiro ode ẹhọhmmọr chẹ. Maman ẹfa kobiro ọkhaama bi, mofhu ọnọng manda wani k'Israẹl.” Devid on-obiro ọbọbh bi, “Mbọng fa bọng arori bi, nsi nnang bọng o?”
2SA 21:5 Bẹ abhina ọvaarnọng bi, “Ọnọng nwuma kw'odimi man, ọkhami bi odimi man biphyir-phyir, man ibe manda rani k'ẹkhọma ch'Israẹl kọkhaam.
2SA 21:6 Tte bẹ anang man va pa va pẹ p'ijinọng azenamfa mofhu, mọjana abukhi pabẹ k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ka Gibea kw'ode obhon kwa Saul, kẹ nwuma kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'otzekha.” Mẹ wọ, ọvaarnọng oben bi, “Kaam ńtte bẹ ọbọhk otte ńnang bọng e.”
2SA 21:7 Wa ọvaarnọng otte Mẹphiboshẹt kw'ode nnwa kwa Jonatan, kw'ode nnwa kwa Saul ọbọhk oruk akpen, okhuri ọnwọhngi kwa Devid ọmaana Jonatan kw'ode nnwa kwa Saul, akk'atzọkha k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
2SA 21:8 Yina, ọvaarnọng ọtzọkha Armoni ọmaana Mẹphiboshẹt, p'ade va p'Aiya kw'ode nnwa kwa Rizpa ọmaani ọnang Saul. Obiro ọtzọkha va p'ijinọng azen pa Mẹrab kw'ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kwa Saul, p'ọmaani ọnang Adriyẹl kw'ode nnwa kwa Barzilayi kw'ofon Mẹhola.
2SA 21:9 Ọtzọkha bẹ ọnang anọng pa Gibeọn, p'afhu bẹ abira ajana abukhi pabẹ k'egbegbeho, k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Bẹ anọng azenamfa biphyir ape ogbe wani. Wa bẹ afhu bẹ k'echedenwu ch'ipha, da ipha s'abarli im-ittẹwọr.
2SA 21:10 Rizpa kw'ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kw'Aiya ọtzọkha ọbara-bina oruri k'itzakpa ọnang for sẹ. Owobha mẹ ttẹwọr m'ọphagbe maa, ẹrọng efona k'ọrọngkpakpa etzebh abukhi mbuma. Wa osi mando ifha anọnọhna aningi abukhi mba achi k'ẹya, nden s'ẹtzam nningi bẹ mbiri nchi k'erungi.
2SA 21:11 K'ogbe kwa bẹ agbaakhi Devid odik kwa Rizpa kw'ode nnwa kw'ikwanọng kw'Aiya, kw'ode ọkkọra-kwanọng kwa Saul ọkk'ọsa,
2SA 21:12 Devid ọtza ọtzọkha akhọbhi pa Saul ọmaana pa nnwa kwẹ Jonatan, k'anọng pa Jabẹsh-Gilead. (Wa anọng mba afhu abukhi pabẹ k'ipha sa Bẹt-Shan, kẹ da iwa anọng pa Philistiya akk'bẹ agbana, k'ogbe kwa bẹ akk'Saul afha ka Gilboa).
2SA 21:13 Mando kwa Devid ọtza ọtzọkha akhọbhi pa Saul ọmaana pa nnwa kwẹ Jonatan kẹ. Obiro otzobha akhọbhi p'anọng pa bẹ akk'afha abira ajana abukhi pabẹ kẹ.
2SA 21:14 Bẹ anọhnga akhọbhi pa Saul ọmaana pa nnwa kwẹ Jonatan k'epekhubh cha Kish kw'ode otte kwa Saul, ka Zẹla k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin. Bẹ abira asi odik kpenamkpen kw'ọvaarnọng obeni. Mada bẹ akk'mando asa, Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaanga njọhm sabẹ s'irerek nna.
2SA 21:15 Wa anọng p'Israẹl ọmaana pa Philistiya abira arima egbong. Devid otzima anọng pẹ ọhakha, otza orima anọng pa Philistiya abẹ, maa ẹfa ẹhẹ-ẹ.
2SA 21:16 Ishbi-Bẹnọb, nnwa wani k'ottem kwa va pa va pa Rapha, kw'ẹkhọhnma chẹ cha brons, ẹdọhbhi epyiri ẹdọhbh ch'ashẹkẹl arọbh chi, obiro otzima ọkkangkkaang ọbhakwẹ kw'ọkpa k'erin, oben bi, kẹ ofhu Devid.
2SA 21:17 Yina, Abishayi nnwa kwa Zeruya okwu ọkkaana Devid. Obun oPhilistiya-nọng nwa, ọfhẹ-ẹ. Ajinọng pa Devid achekhi anang-ẹ bi, “Kọ man abẹ dọk kàtzọn atza egbong, ifha iyaan s'Israẹl iningi idimi.”
2SA 21:18 Okwu opyiri k'ogbe mẹ, egbong ebire etto ọmaana anọng pa Philistiya ka Gọb. M'ogbe nwuma, Sibẹkayi kw'ofon Hushat ofhu Saph, kw'ode nnwa wani k'ottem kwa va pa va pa Rapha.
2SA 21:19 K'egbong ẹdọdọk ọmaana anọng pa Philistiya ka Gọb, Ẹlhanan kw'ode nnwa kwa Jair kw'ofon Bẹtẹlẹhẹm, ofhu Golayat kw'ofon Git, kw'ọkhaam ọkhọhn kw'ọdọhni mach'echi ch'oyokhi-ekpo.
2SA 21:20 K'egbong ẹdọdọk ch'etto ka Gat, wa ọkhaam ojinọng wani kw'ofu bi gbuk, kw'ọkhaam nnọhna nzadani k'ọbọhk kpenamkpen, ọmaana nnọhna nzadani k'obho kpenamkpen, biphyir-phyir wa ọkhaam nnọhna ẹrọbh obhiri nna. Wa obiro ode nnwa-mmona kwa Rapha.
2SA 21:21 Wa mada olukhi Israẹl, Jonatan kw'ode nnwa kwa Shimeyi kw'ode ọgbaanotte kwa Devid, ọfhẹ-ẹ.
2SA 21:22 Iwa anọng mba anna ade, va pa va pa Rapha kw'ofon Gat. Wa Devid ọmaana ajinọng pẹ bọ afhu bẹ.
2SA 22:1 Mada Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkkaan ọrọbha Devid ka mbọhk s'attattaanga-nọng pẹ biphyir, ọmaana ka mbọhk sa Saul, wa ọkkọhn ẹmọng ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi.
2SA 22:2 Oben bi: “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ode ẹtzakpa chaam, obiro ode ichubhabe saam, ọmaana ọkkaan kwaam;
2SA 22:3 Ibinọkpaabyi kwaam wọ ode ẹtzakpa chaam, cha kaam nchubh, ode ọkhọhnkpa ọmaana ẹfa ch'ẹnaanga chaam. Kẹ wọ ode etzumi-nnam chaam, ichubhabe saam ọmaana ọkkaan kwaam, kẹ wọ ọkkaan-m ka mbọhk s'agbagbaana.
2SA 22:4 “Kaam nyeri Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ọbaan k'ẹtzọhnga, kw'ọkk'aam ọkkaana ka mbọhk s'attattaanga-nọng paam.
2SA 22:5 “Ebukhaya ch'obo ẹkk'aam ẹbhọri, nttẹri s'ekhibhi ẹkk'aam ẹfa ẹna.
2SA 22:6 Ndik s'epekhubh nkk'nyokha ngọr-m, agbagbara p'obo akk'aam abẹ ayina.
2SA 22:7 “Kaam nyeri Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi k'iyayakhi-dik saam, Kaam nyeri Ibinọkpaabyi kwaam bi ọkkaan-m. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọbhaanga ẹmọng chaam k'ọhọhm kwẹ; ẹmọng cha mmomi ẹkk'ẹ ẹtta k'itzọhng.
2SA 22:8 “Ọyagbin ọfhọni obiro ọkhaama opoma, agbaari p'ọrọngkpakpa anyengi, bẹ afhọni okhuri idọdọkhi sẹ.
2SA 22:9 Irorong iyin-ẹ k'ahung-mma, ekpon ch'echi ibe eyin-ẹ k'ẹmma, akpongkkang abira awọma ekpon mẹ.
2SA 22:10 Kẹ ọbhaangi ọrọngkpakpa orenga mẹ ọhakha, eboni ch'epyi bi kaang ewobh ka mmokpatzọkhi sẹ.
2SA 22:11 Kẹ ovur ka chẹrubim okhur, orenga ka mbabaang s'ọphapha okhur.
2SA 22:12 Otzim orungibanga osi ikhira s'ikhọr-ẹ, osi eboni ch'ẹrọng ch'epyi erungi bi kkaang k'ọrọngkpakpa.
2SA 22:13 K'ottem kw'ọyaanttaani, k'itzitzikha sẹ, akpongkkang p'ekpon awọma.
2SA 22:14 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi otto etzum mach'ẹbhaang-kpon k'ọvaarbhon kwẹ. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ọyọhng obiro ọkpẹbh ẹmọng k'ẹrọng.
2SA 22:15 Kẹ ọtta ayuk, okwuri attattaanga-nọng, otzima akpongkkang p'awọm ekpon ch'ideden okhubh bẹ.
2SA 22:16 Ẹmọng ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkpẹbhi, ọwọhng kw'oji k'ahung-mma pẹ, osi nttẹri s'araanga p'ideden njana, osi agbaari p'ọyagbin abira atte eje.
2SA 22:17 “Kẹ owobh k'ẹrọng, onemi ọbọhk ọbọkh-m, ọrọbh-m k'asi p'adong-odong, otzima oyin ka.
2SA 22:18 Kẹ ọrọbh-m ka mbọhk s'ẹfa ch'attattaanga-nọng paam, ka mbọhk s'attattaanga-nọng paam, p'agaangi ayọhng-m.
2SA 22:19 Bẹ arim-m abẹ, k'ewu ch'idik ikhebh-m, kaambi mẹ wọ, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ iwa ode etzumi-nnam chaam.
2SA 22:20 Kẹ ohokh-m k'ibe s'iwoni-owoni, ọkkaan-m, okhuri da ọdaami ettem ttar-m.
2SA 22:21 “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'aam ochora otzor k'etzora chaam, ọkk'aam ochora otzor k'awurada pa mbọhk saam.
2SA 22:22 Da kaam nkk'ndora ka nden s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, aponga kaam kapyibhi, da nni nnam mkpa mbọra Ibinọkpaabyi kwaam.
2SA 22:23 Kaam nkk'aphaangi pẹ biphyir nhokha, kaam nnam kimbiri mkpa mbọra ndọhna sẹ.
2SA 22:24 Kaam oponga-pyibha k'itzitzikha sẹ kingaam, nkk'for saam ndọra k'ẹkhọngkwuri.
2SA 22:25 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọkk'aam ochora k'etzora chaam, ọkk'aam ochora otzor k'awurada paam p'ore.
2SA 22:26 “Ọnọng nwuma kw'ọhak eho ọnang-ọ, kẹ wọ kwa kọ ahọk idadaakha sọ. Kọ asi ejibha atzima atzor, ọnọng kw'oni oponga-pyibha ọkhaam.
2SA 22:27 Ọnọng kw'owur-owur, kẹ kw'akhọhk awurada pọ, yina, ọnọng kw'osi ebibya, kọ asẹ-ẹ ọgbaan.
2SA 22:28 Kọ akkaan ọnọng kw'okhom for sẹ, yina, ahak ọnọng kw'are bi, oge for ewobha.
2SA 22:29 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kọ wọ ade ottwikkaang kwaam, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi osi ipyerungi saam, in-ide iyaan.
2SA 22:30 Kọ akkaan-m bi, nnọbh mmaam k'ottem kw'agbong-nọng p'attaang-m, k'ẹfa ch'Ibinọkpaabyi kwaam, kaam mfha ngwur abaakha pabẹ njekha.
2SA 22:31 “Eden ch'Ibinọkpaabyi etzor-otzor: Atzim p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi epina kakhaam Kẹ ode ọkhọhnkpa kw'ọbaabh anọng p'achubh ka kẹ.
2SA 22:32 Anyi wọ kw'ám-okpobha oyongi Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi o? Anyi wọ ode Ẹtzakpa chaman, oyongi Ibinọkpaabyi o?
2SA 22:33 Kẹ Ibinọkpaabyi wọ otzim ẹfa chẹ ọbaabh-m, obiro osi ọbaabha eden chaam.
2SA 22:34 Kẹ osi mmo saam ngaama ẹfa macha s'ochimi, osi-m mbe k'obe f'ogor-ogori.
2SA 22:35 Kẹ okpebhi mbọhk saam erima, mbọhk saam mfha mmena oyuk kwa brons.
2SA 22:36 Ẹkkaana chọ ch'anang-m ede ọkhọhnkpa kwaam, ẹkkaana chọ ẹkk'aam ẹsa mbar.
2SA 22:37 Kọ asi-m nnenga k'ọkkadeden kw'owoni-owoni, mmo-dọhngi kaam kindebh.
2SA 22:38 “Kaam ngwubhi attattaanga-nọng paam, mbiri ndimi bẹ, nnam kimkpa maa, ndimi bẹ.
2SA 22:39 Ndimi bẹ biphyir-phyir, bẹ dọk kafha abina, bẹ an-atto ayim-m ka mmokpatzọkhi.
2SA 22:40 Kọ anang-m ẹfa ch'egbong oririma, asi attattaanga-nọng paam, ahakha nho anang-m.
2SA 22:41 Kọ asi attattaanga-nọng paam arọbh-m, kaam mbiri ndimi anọng p'attaang-m.
2SA 22:42 Bẹ abhom aror ẹkkaana, ọnọng kw'ọkkaan bẹ kode. Bẹ abhom ayeri Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, bẹ ebhina kobiro ọnang.
2SA 22:43 Kaam ngokhi bẹ ayọhri mach'ọkpọhm kw'irerek, nduk bẹ, mbiri mbari bẹ mmo mach'ẹdọdọhbhi cha mkpaanga-den.
2SA 22:44 “Kọ akk'aam akkaana ka mbọhk s'idibhon s'irim-m abẹ, ahokh-m mach'oho kw'idibhon. Anọng p'iwa nninong an-awobha k'irekh-irek kwaam.
2SA 22:45 Akhekhennọng awobh k'ojora k'itzitzikha saam; ogbe kwa bẹ abhaang odik okhuri kaam bi kpaar, bẹ ahakha eho anang-m.
2SA 22:46 Ẹfa ẹha akhekhennọng mba biphyir, bẹ afona k'ochubhabe fabẹ, akwu k'opoma.
2SA 22:47 “Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen! Ẹtzọhnga ewobha ẹnang Ẹtzakpa chaam! Tte abarada awobha anang Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ẹtzakpa chaam, obiro ode Ọkkaan kwaam!
2SA 22:48 Kẹ wọ ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'om-otzukha idik k'eho chaam, kẹ ohokhi idibhon bi, iwobha k'irekh-irek kwaam,
2SA 22:49 kẹ wọ ọkkaan-m ka mbọhk s'attattaanga-nọng paam. Kọ atzin-m k'ebe ch'ẹyọhng ch'attattaanga-nọng paam, akkaan-m ka mbọhk s'ọgbagbaana.
2SA 22:50 Kẹ wọ osi, kaam ńdọhnga kọ Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, k'ottem kw'idibhon; kaam ńkkọhn amọng ndima ndọhnga che chọ.
2SA 22:51 “Kẹ ọnangi ọvaarnọng kwẹ ngema sa ndeden, osi ejibha-barada ọnang nwuma kw'obyengi ana k'eho, kw'ode Devid ọmaana va pa va pẹ maa, ogbe ode.”
2SA 23:1 Ma wọ ode akponga-nnam-dim pa Devid: “Atzim pa Devid kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹsẹ ọgbaakhi, atzim p'ojinọng kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ọyọhng okk'otzini k'ẹrọng, ojinọng kw'Ibinọkpaabyi kwa Jekọb, okk'ana obyengi k'eho, kw'ode okkenggitza kwa bẹ akkọhni k'amọng daman-daam p'Israẹl:
2SA 23:2 “Egwugwuma ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ereng ka kaam ẹgbaak atzim, atzim pẹ awobh-m k'ẹdaak.
2SA 23:3 Ibinọkpaabyi kw'anọng p'Israẹl ọgbaakhi atzim, Ẹtzakpa ch'anọng p'Israẹl eben-m bi: ‘Ọnọng kw'ọdabhi anọng k'eden ch'etzor-otzor, otzim ojora f'Ibinọkpaabyi ọdabh anọng;
2SA 23:4 kẹ ode mach'iyaan s'ekpebha s'ewuchen ẹmaani, k'ekpebha ch'eboni enede, mach'iyaan s'imaani k'ogbe kw'ẹrọng ekk'ebhiri, ch'esi araraari amen k'irerek.’
2SA 23:5 “Idikha ira ẹhọhmmọr chaam en-etzori ttara Ibinọkpaabyi, k'odik-ọkka ira kẹ echekhi ch'ipemanitzor, kosi ttar-m, ira echekhi ch'ọphaari obiro ọbọkha otzima k'ọphaangi kpenamkpen, kosi ttar-m; k'odik-ọkka kẹ ọkk'ẹnaanga chaam, ọsa eyin k'eden, obiro osi idik ọnang-m, otzor k'ochibhi kpenamkpen kwaam.
2SA 23:6 Yina, abibyanọng ade mach'afhodima, pa bẹ abhari okhubha wani, da ọnọng oni bẹ ka mbọhk ofha otzima.
2SA 23:7 Ọnọng kpenamkpen kw'ọn-ọgbọhkhi, om-otzima ọtzọhm-ttọhk f'ode okkonga, obiro ọdọhni mach'ẹmma ch'ọkhọhn ọbọkha afhodima; bẹ akwọmi bẹ biphyir-phyir, k'ibe sa bẹ awobh.”
2SA 23:8 Ma wọ ode che p'akkenggitza pa Devid: Ocheden-nọng kw'ode oho k'ottem kw'anọng attaan ode Joshẹb-Bashẹbẹt, kw'ofon Takemọn. Wa kẹ otzim ọkhọhn fẹ orima ajinọng nnọhna mfa abẹ, p'ofhu k'ogbe wani.
2SA 23:9 Ottong afa ode Ẹleyaza kw'ode nnwa kwa Dodo kw'ofon Aho. Mach'ọnọng wani k'ottem kw'akkenggitza attaan, wa kẹ owobh ttara Devid, k'ogbe kwa bẹ alukhi aPhilistiya p'iwa atzobh ka Pas-Damim bi, arima egbong. Wa agbong-nọng p'Israẹl atzọr akpa nnam,
2SA 23:10 yina, Ẹleyaza obe bi pyiir ofhu aPhilistiya maa, ọbọhk okwokh-ẹ obiro ọpẹ-ẹ, ọraakhi k'ọkkangkkaang. Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang bẹ ekhema ch'ideden m'ewu nduma. Mando kw'agbong-nọng akpa nnam k'Ẹleyaza. Yina, wa on-okhinggẹ orik bi, bẹ awọra anọng p'akk'apa ekpo.
2SA 23:11 Ottong attaan ode Shama kw'ode nnwa kw'Agi kw'ofon Harar. K'ogbe kw'anọng p'aPhilistiya atzobh k'ibe rani, s'owoni kw'achi-mọma ahaabh-ọhaabh, agbong-nọng p'Israẹl arọbh aji bẹ.
2SA 23:12 Yina, Shama obe bi pyiir k'ottem kw'owoni nwa, ọkpa anọng p'aPhilistiya eden, ofhu bẹ. Wa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang bẹ ekhema ch'ideden.
2SA 23:13 M'ọphagbe, ajinọng attaan k'ottem kw'oho p'akkenggitza ẹrọbh obhiri jobh, atza akhebha Devid k'ọmma kw'itzakpa kw'Adulam, k'ogbe kw'ẹkhaan ch'anọng p'aPhilistiya ebhingi k'Ẹttẹri cha Rephayim.
2SA 23:14 K'ogbe nwuma kwa Devid owobh k'ichubhabe, akkeri-ẹbaakhamma cha Philistiya awobh ka Bẹtẹlẹhẹm.
2SA 23:15 Wa asi adaak Devid, on-oben bi, “Kpe o, ira ọnọng ọfha ọkhaabha asi k'esipe ch'ẹbaang ẹbaakhamma cha Bẹtẹlẹhẹm, ọnang-m ngwo e!”
2SA 23:16 Mando kw'akkenggitza mbuma attaan amaami m'ibhingabe sa Philistiya, atza akhaabha asi k'esipe ch'ẹbaang ẹbaakhamma cha Bẹtẹlẹhẹm, atzima achena Devid bi, ogwo. Yina, obhum asi mbuma ogwo-ogwo, on-otzer obyengi bẹ m'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, mach'ẹnanga.
2SA 23:17 Oben bi, “Tzọmi-tzọmi okponga k'idachen, o Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, bi kaam nsi odik-dema nwa! Asi mba abari odik mach'izi s'ajinọng mba p'akhe akpen pabẹ k'obo.” Devid obhum bẹ ogwo-ogwo. Mando kw'iwa akkenggitza mbuma attaan asi odik-barada nwa.
2SA 23:18 Abishayi kw'ode ọgbaanotte kwa Joab, kw'obiro ode nnwa kwa Zeruya ọmaani, wọ iwa ode oho kwa bẹ anọng attaan. Wa otzim ọkhọhn fẹ orima ajinọng arọbh chi abẹ, ofhu bẹ. Ofona mẹ ọtza che mach'ayok mbonggo attaan.
2SA 23:19 Wa bẹ anang Abishayi ededen ch'ẹbari ọtzam ẹyọhnga ch'ayok mbonggo attaan. Kẹ on-ode odenho kwabẹ, kaambi ode bi iwa ẹkhaan chabẹ kọttar.
2SA 23:20 Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹhoyada, kw'obiro ode ọkkakaama kw'ofon Kabzil, wa osi idik-barada. Wa ofhu akkenggitza p'ideden afa pa Moab. Obiro ọhakha k'ipekhuma ọtza ofhu ekye k'ewu ch'eboni etzebhi.
2SA 23:21 Wa kẹ obiro ofhu ọnọng kw'ofon Ijip, kw'ojibhi ojinọng. Chibhi da iwa ojipnọng nwa otzim ọkhọhn fẹ k'ọbọhk, Bẹnaya ọtza orim-ẹ abẹ ttara ochikhura. Ọbọkha ojipnọng nwa ọkhọhn fẹ ọna, otzima ọfhẹ-ẹ.
2SA 23:22 Idik-barada s'iwa Bẹnaya, kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹhoyada, osi rọ ma. Wa obiro ọtza che mach-akkenggitza mbonggo attaan.
2SA 23:23 Wa bẹ an-anang-ẹ ikpokpobha s'iyọhng s'ajinọng mbonggo ẹrọbh obhiri jobh. Yina, wa kẹ k'ẹkhaan ch'anọng mba attaan kọttar. Mando kwa Devid ọsẹ-ẹ odenho kw'abaabhi pẹ.
2SA 23:24 K'ottem kw'anọng ẹrọbh obhiri jobh ode: Asahẹl kw'ode ọgbaanotte kwa Joab, ọmaana Ẹlhanan kw'ode nnwa kwa Dodo kw'ofon Bẹtẹlẹhẹm,
2SA 23:25 ọmaana Shama kw'ofon Harod, ọmaana Ẹlika kw'obiro ofona Harod,
2SA 23:26 ọmaana Hẹlẹz kw'ofon Palti, ọmaana Ira kw'ode nnwa kw'Ikẹsh kw'ofon Tẹkoa,
2SA 23:27 ọmaana Abiyẹza kw'ofon Anatọt, ọmaana Sibẹkayi kw'ofon Hushat,
2SA 23:28 ọmaana Zalmọn kw'ofon Aho, ọmaana Maharayi kw'ofon Nẹtophat,
2SA 23:29 ọmaana Hẹlẹb nnwa kwa Baana kw'obiro ofona Nẹtophat, Ittayi nnwa kwa Ribayi kw'ofon Gibea k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin,
2SA 23:30 Bẹnaya kw'ofon Piraton, ọmaana Hidayi kw'ofon ka nttẹri sa Gaash,
2SA 23:31 ọmaana Abi-Albọn kw'ofon Arbat, ọmaana Azmavẹt kw'ofon Barhum,
2SA 23:32 ọmaana Eliyaba kw'ofon Shalbọn kw'ode nnwa kwa Jashẹn, ọmaana Jonatan
2SA 23:33 kw'ode nnwa kwa Shama kw'ofon Harar, ọmaana Ahiyam kw'ode nnwa kwa Sharar kw'obiro ofona Harar,
2SA 23:34 ọmaana Ẹliphẹlẹt kw'ode nnwa kw'Ahasbayi kw'ofon Maakat, ọmaana Eliyam kw'ode nnwa kwa Ahitophẹl kw'ofon Gilọn,
2SA 23:35 ọmaana Hẹzro kw'ofon Kaamẹl, ọmaana Paarayi kw'ofon Arbit,
2SA 23:36 Igal kw'ode nnwa kwa Natan kw'ofon Zoba, Bani kw'ofon Gad,
2SA 23:37 ọmaana Zẹlẹk kw'ofon Ammọn, ọmaana Nahariya kw'ofon Berot, kw'ode otzim-egbongkpo kwa Joab kw'ode nnwa kwa Zeruya,
2SA 23:38 ọmaana Ira kw'ofon Itir, ọmaana Garẹb kw'obiro ofona Itir,
2SA 23:39 ttara Uriya kw'ofon Het. Biphyir-phyir, wa bẹ ade anọng ẹrọbh obhiri chi obhiri afa.
2SA 24:1 Iwa ettem ebire epyibh Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi etzima etzor anọng p'Israẹl ọmaan pa Juda. Kw'osi iwa ọchọma Devid otzima ẹkhọr otzor bẹ, oben bi, “Rọhng atza atzọkha ọnọng-mik kw'Israẹl ọmaana kwa Juda.”
2SA 24:2 Mẹ wọ, ọvaarnọng oben Joab ọmaana adenho p'agbong-nọng p'awobh ttar-ẹ bi, “Bọng nọhng makhọra nnọmma s'Israẹl, bọng ttẹwọr ka Dan maa, apyiri ka Beershẹba, abhik ajinọng ifha kaam mfha nnonga obhik kwabẹ.”
2SA 24:3 Mando kwa Joab obhin ọvaarnọng bi, “Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ ọttara ọnọng-mik kw'agbong-nọng igbe arọbh azen ayongi-oyongi. Tte itta ọvaarnọng kwaam otzima chen pẹ ore kwẹ. Osi yan itta ọvaarnọng kwaam oben bi, osi odik-dema nwa o?”
2SA 24:4 Wa atzim p'ọvaarnọng agaangi ayọhnga pa Joab ọmaana adenho mba pa agbong-nọng. Mando kwa bẹ abin aji ọvaarnọng, atza abhik agbong-nọng p'Israẹl.
2SA 24:5 Mada bẹ akk'Jọrdan ajekha, bẹ abhing abaanga Aroẹ, k'ẹrakha-ẹrakha kw'obhon kw'owobh k'ẹttẹri. Bẹ arenga ka Gad achina ka Jaza.
2SA 24:6 Bẹ arenga achina ka Gilead ọmaana k'ẹkhọma cha Tatim Hodshi, achina ka Dan Jaan, akhọri achina ka Sidon.
2SA 24:7 Bẹ an-arenga achina k'ichubhabe sa Taya, ọmaana k'ibhon sa abaHiv ttara sa abaKenaan biphyir. Bẹ an-akponga nnam achina ka Beershẹba kw'owobh ka Nẹgẹv k'ẹkhọma cha Juda.
2SA 24:8 Mada bẹ akk'arenga akpaanga irerek nna biphyir, bẹ akpa nnam ka Jẹrusalẹm k'okpong kw'aphe ọhawani ọmaana iwu ẹrọbh.
2SA 24:9 Iwa Joab ọgbaak ọvaarnọng ọnọng-mik kw'agbong-nọng: Wa ọnọng-mik kw'afanọng p'Israẹl ode, nnọhna arọbh azen p'afha abọkha ọkkangkkaang. Ọnọng-mik kwa Juda ode nnọhna arọbh attaan obhiri arọbh afa obhiri jobh.
2SA 24:10 Mada iwa Devid, okk'ẹnọng-mikha ch'agbong-nọng okyera, achibhi ayakh-ẹ atzim maa, on-oben Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “Kaam nkk'ẹkhọhngkwuri ch'ideden nsa k'odik nwa kwa nsi. Tzotzokhaan, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, bina anang oponga-pyibha kwa kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ. Kaam nkk'odidingi-dik nsa e.”
2SA 24:11 Yina Devid ọphyọbha k'ekpebha, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'Gad kw'ode ọsẹjaakhi, obiro ode ore-ka-chen-anna kwa Devid, atzim ọgbaakha, oben bi:
2SA 24:12 “Rọhng atza agbaak Devid bi, ‘Ma wọ ode odik kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọgbaakhi: Kaam njọ-ọ achibhi attaan k'itzitzikha bi, atzekha wani kwa kaam ńdima mkpaara aponga pọ.’ ”
2SA 24:13 Mando kwa Gad ọtza okhebha Devid, oben-ẹ bi, “Ma na ọdaakh-ọ bi okwo f'ideden owobha k'irerek sọ, ka cho attaan o? Na obiro ọdaakh-ọ bi, arọbh abharkpa p'attattaanga-nọng pọ akhubh bọng k'aphe attaan o? Na obiro ọdaakh-ọ bi, ọkhọhmana f'ideden otto okhebha irerek nna k'iwu ittaan o? Kọ nang ochibhi m'idik nna, ifha agbaakh-m ochibhi kwa nda mgbaak ọnọng kw'ọtzọhm-m.”
2SA 24:14 Iwa Devid oben Gad bi, “Kaam ettem ẹyakh-m atzim. Tte motzer ọkhaama ottotto k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'inọngkwo sẹ ibar-ọbar, ottu kw'ámotto ka mbọhk s'anọng ọkhaam e.”
2SA 24:15 Mando kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọtzọhmi itzama s'ideden k'Israẹl, s'ittẹwọr k'ekpebha maa opyiri k'ogbe kwa bẹ akhe. Wa anọng nnọhna arọbh azenattaan obhiri chi, ape, ttẹwọr ka Dan maa apyiri Beershẹba.
2SA 24:16 Mada orenga-eden kw'Ibinọkpaabyi onemi ọbọhk bi, odimi Jẹrusalẹm, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhona ochibhi kwẹ kw'ọmmamma nwa. On-oben orenga-eden kwẹ bi, “Dọk kàsi! Tọr ọbọhk kwọ.” Wa orenga-eden nwa kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi on-owobh k'ibe sa bẹ am-awobha agwuma abọkpa-mọma s'Arawuna kw'ofon Jẹbus.
2SA 24:17 Mada Devid ore orenga-eden nwa kw'om-ofhu anọng, oben Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi, “Kaam nkk'ẹkhọhngkwuri nsa e; Kaam, okkeri-ayok, nkk'epina nsa e. Bẹ-bẹ ade mach'arukhimaan e. Bẹ ọttọhk kasi. Tte ettuma chọ ewobha ẹnang kaam, ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chaam.”
2SA 24:18 M'ewu nduma, Gad ọtza okhebha Devid oben-ẹ bi, “Rọhng avura atza asi ijafọhnibe anang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, k'ibe sa bẹ am-awobha agwuma abọkpa-mọma s'Arawuna kw'ofon Jẹbus.”
2SA 24:19 Mando kwa Devid ovur mach'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi okk'orenga ka Gad ọtzọhn-ẹ.
2SA 24:20 K'ogbe kw'Arawuna on-okkeri, ore da ọvaarnọng ọmaana akhaan-nọng pẹ am-arenga atzor-ẹ, oyin k'iyaan ọtza ọrakha ottima k'itzitzikha k'irerek, m'itzitzikha s'ọvaarnọng.
2SA 24:21 Arawuna ọbọbh bi, “Ode yan kw'itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, orori kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ o?” Devid obhina bi, “Kaam nkwu bi nkwu ndebh ibe sọ sa bẹ am-awobha agwuma abọkpa-mọma, ifha nsi ijafọhnibe mẹ nnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi e, k'odem kw'itzama s'itto ikhebha anọng mba ikwọhbha e.”
2SA 24:22 Arawuna oben Devid bi, “Tte itta ọvaarnọng kwaam ọtzọkha ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'ọdaakh-ẹ, otzima osi ẹnanga e. Kkeri abhaam p'ẹnanga ẹkwọmichẹ ma, ọmaana atzekpa pa bẹ am-atzima agwuma abọkpa-mọma, ttara ayak p'abhaam p'atzima mach'ommen.
2SA 24:23 K'ẹvaar chọ, kaam Arawuna ndọk ekpo mbya biphyir nnang ọvaarnọng. Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ, ọtzọkha ẹjafọhni chọ.”
2SA 24:24 Yina, ọvaarnọng obhina Arawuna bi, “Mma e, kaam ngaam bi ndebh ekpo mbya k'agbukha e. Kaam ẹjafọhni ẹkwọmichẹ, ch'eni kaam ọttọhk epe, kínsi nnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwaam.” Mẹ wọ, Devid odebh ibe nna sa bẹ am-awobha agwuma abọkpa-mọma, ọmaana abhaam k'ashẹkẹl pa silva arọbh afa obhiri jobh.
2SA 24:25 Wa Devid osi ijafọhnibe mẹ ọnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi. Osi ẹjafọhni ẹkwọmichẹ ọmaana ẹnanga ch'odidiri mẹ. Mẹ wọ e, Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi obhina njọhm sẹ s'irerek nnuma. Mando kw'itzama s'itto ikhebha anọng p'Israẹl ibiri ikwọhbha.
1KI 1:1 Iwa ọvaar Devid ọkk'ọn-ọtzama maa, chibhi da bẹ abubh-ẹ nnọhnmakpa, chua kẹ ọbọhk kotte.
1KI 1:2 Mẹ wọ, atzọhmnọng pẹ aben-ẹ bi, “Tte moror ominanwa wani kw'ówobha ttara ọvaarnọng, obiro okker-ẹ. Tte ominanwa nwa oyima ọbaang-ẹ, ifha chua otte itta ọvaarnọng kwaman ọbọhk.”
1KI 1:3 Mando kwa bẹ arori ominanwa kw'ojibh-ojibh makhọra Israẹl, bẹ atza are Abishag kw'ofon Shunam atzim-ẹ akwu achena ọvaarnọng.
1KI 1:4 Wa ominanwa nwa ojibhi kwanọng oyongi-oyongi, okkeri ọvaarnọng obiro owobha ttar-ẹ. Yina, wa ọvaarnọng kẹ abẹ koyim.
1KI 1:5 Iwa Adonija, nnwa kwa Hagit ọmaana Devid, otzim for sẹ osi ẹmma, oben bi, “Kaam wọ ńde ọvaarnọng.” Mando kw'ofon ọtza ọtzọkha akpaar pa nnyanyaang mmindọr ọmaana ayaari-nnyanyaang, okwu ọttara k'ajinọng arọbh afa obhiri jobh, p'arọbh-ẹ k'itzitzikha.
1KI 1:6 (Iwa otte kẹ eden kọkpa k'ogbe manda wani bi, ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ asi yan asi mando?” Wa kẹ ojibhi odikkobh oyongi-oyongi, obiro otzor Absalọm nnam k'otte.)
1KI 1:7 Iwa Adonija okwu ọkhaama nttọhna ttara Joab kw'ode nnwa kwa Zeruya, ọmaana Abiyata kw'ode ọfọhnẹja, p'abẹ-ẹ mbọhk ka nnam.
1KI 1:8 Yina, Zadọk kw'ode ọfọhnẹja, ọmaana Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹhoyada, ọmaana Natan kw'ode ọsẹjaakhi, ọmaana Shimeyi, ọmaana Reyi, ttara abaabhi pa Devid, bẹ Adonija abẹ katzọni.
1KI 1:9 Adonija otzima arukhimaan, ọmaana abhaam ttara abhaamva adimpẹ p'ajibhi for osi njafọhni, k'ọtza kwa Zohẹlẹt ọbaanga Ẹn-Rogẹl. Obher votte pẹ biphyir, p'ade va p'ijinọng p'ọvaarnọng, ttara akhaan-nọng p'ọvaarnọng biphyir p'afon Juda.
1KI 1:10 Yina, iwa Natan kw'ode ọsẹjaakhi, kobheri. Bẹnaya ọmaana abaabhi akkakka, kaambi Sọlọmọn kw'ode ọgbaanotte wọ, kobiro obher.
1KI 1:11 Mẹ wọ, Natan oben Batshẹba kw'ode ọkka kwa Sọlọmọn bi, “Kọ atzima abhaanga bi, Adonija kw'ode nnwa kwa Hagit, ọkk'ọvaarnọng ọda o? Yina, itta kwaman Devid odik nwa, korong.
1KI 1:12 Mẹ wọ, tte kaam ndọhn-ọ eden ch'afha akkaana akpen pa kọ kaam, ọmaana pa nnwa kwọ Sọlọmọn.
1KI 1:13 Rọhng m'ẹbaa nda atza akhebha ọvaar Devid aben-ẹ bi, ‘Itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, kọ arang achekhi anang kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ bi: “K'odik-ọkka, nnwa kwọ Sọlọmọn wọ ọ́tzọkha ẹvaar chọ, óbiro ówobha ẹwọr ka ẹvaarchi chọ o?” Ka yan wọ kw'Adonija on-ode ọvaarnọng o?’
1KI 1:14 Kaam ńkwu-okwu mada am-agbaak ọvaarnọng atzim, nkwu nttara ọwọhng kwaam k'idik s'agbaak.”
1KI 1:15 Mando kwa Batshẹba ofon ọtza okhebha ọvaar Devid kw'ọkk'ọn-ọtzama, k'ẹmaanggọ chẹ ẹtzaanga, kẹ da Abishag kw'ofon Shunam om-okker-ẹ.
1KI 1:16 Batshẹba ọrakha, orururi m'irerek k'itzitzikha s'ọvaarnọng. Ọvaarnọng ọbọbh bi, “Kọ arori mbọng o?”
1KI 1:17 Oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ ọkhaam wọ atzim che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ, achekhi anang-m bi: ‘Nnwa kwọ Sọlọmọn wọ ọ́tzọkha ẹvaar chọ, kẹ óbiro ówobha ẹwọr k'ẹvaarchi chọ.’
1KI 1:18 Yina, kọ itta ọvaarnọng kwaam karong bi, Adonija ọkk'ọvaarnọng ọda.
1KI 1:19 Kẹ okk'abhaam, ọmaana abhaamva adimpẹ ttara arukhimaan k'ọhaabh, ọtzọkha otzima osi njafọhni. Kẹ obher va p'ọvaarnọng p'ijinọng biphyir, ọmaana Abiyata kw'ode ọfọhnẹja ttara Joab kw'ode odenho kw'arim-egbon. Yina, Sọlọmọn kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, kobheri.
1KI 1:20 Itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, chen p'anọng p'Israẹl biphyir akkeri kọ bi, agbaak bẹ ọnọng kw'ótzor-ọ nnam, ówobha ẹwọr k'ẹvaarchi cha kọ itta ọvaarnọng kwaam.
1KI 1:21 Óni mando ode, itta ọvaarnọng kwaam ope ma, bẹ anọhng-ẹ otzor ab'otte. Bẹ an-atzọkha kaam ọmaana nnwa kwaam Sọlọmọn, ási ọgbaan mach'ariribha e.”
1KI 1:22 Mada otzim ọm-ọgbaak ọvaarnọng atzim mẹ, Natan kw'ode ọsẹjaakhi opyiri.
1KI 1:23 Iwa bẹ agbaak ọvaarnọng bi, “Natan kw'ode ọsẹjaakhi owobh ma e.” Mando kw'ofon otza okhebha ọvaarnọng, ọrakha ottima itzitzikha k'irerek.
1KI 1:24 Natan oben bi, “Ma, kọ itta ọvaarnọng kwaam akk'ẹjaakhi asa bi, Adonija ọ́tzọkha ẹvaar chọ, obiro ówobha ẹwọr k'ẹvaarchi chọ o?
1KI 1:25 Kẹ okk'ofona ọtza ọtzọkha abhaam-haabhada, ọmaana abhaamva adimpẹ, ttara arukhimaan. Kẹ okk'va p'ọvaarnọng p'ijinọng biphyir obhera, obiro obher odenho kw'arim-egbong, ttara Abiyata kw'ode ọfọhnẹja. Bẹ awobh kẹ madẹdẹn nwa da bẹ achi, abira agwo ttar-ẹ, am-aben bi, ‘Tte ọvaar Adonija oruk akpen p'adum-odum!’
1KI 1:26 Yina, kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, ọmaana Zadọk kw'ode ọfọhnẹja, ọmaana Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹhoyada, ttara ọtzọhmnọng kwọ Sọlọmọn kobheri.
1KI 1:27 Ode bi, odik kw'itta ọvaarnọng kwaam osi wọ ma, kw'on-osi moronga ọnọng kw'ọtzọkha ẹvaar chẹ, obiro owobha ẹwọr k'ẹvaarchi ch'itta ọvaarnọng kwaam o?”
1KI 1:28 Iwa ọvaar Devid oben bi, “Bọng yeri Batshẹba odim ka.” Mando kw'odimi okhebha ọvaarnọng k'ẹtzaanga, ọtza ọbẹ-ẹ k'itzitzikha.
1KI 1:29 Mẹ wọ, ọvaarnọng ọn-ọtzọkha ọnwọhngi oben bi, “Odem nwa kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, kw'ọkkaan ọrọbh-m ka dama-dama kpenamkpen,
1KI 1:30 mayina, kaam ńsi odik kw'iwa nchekhi ka che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl bi: Nnwa kwọ Sọlọmọn wọ ọ́tzọkha ẹvaar chaam, kẹ wọ óbiro ówobha k'ẹvaarchi chaam, k'ẹvaar-ttọhmma chaam.”
1KI 1:31 Mando kwa Batshẹba ọrak ottima itzitzikha k'irerek, oruri for sẹ m'itzitzikha s'ọvaarnọng, oben bi, “Tte itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, Devid, oruk akpen maa, ogbe ode.”
1KI 1:32 Ọvaarnọng Devid oben bi, “Bọng yeri Zadọk kw'ode ọfọhnẹja, ọmaana Natan kw'ode ọsẹjaakhi ttara Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹhoyada.” Mada bẹ akwu ayin ọvaarnọng k'itzitzikha,
1KI 1:33 ọvaarnọng oben bẹ bi: “Bọng dọkha atzọhmnọng p'itta kwabọng bẹ atzọn bọng abẹ. Bọng ben nnwa kwaam Sọlọmọn ọyaar ẹnyanyaang chaam, atzim-ẹ achina ka Gihọn.
1KI 1:34 Mẹ wọ kwa Zadọk kw'ode ọfọhnẹja, ọmaana Natan kw'ode ọsẹjaakhi ábyeng-ẹ ana k'eho, ásẹ-ẹ ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl. Bọng ágyi obukpọhng ábira ási ẹjaakhi bi, ‘Ọvaar Sọlọmọn oruk akpen p'adum-odum!’
1KI 1:35 Bọng dọn-ẹ abẹ akpa nnam, ifha ókwu owobha ẹwọr k'ẹvaarchi chaam, óbiro ọ́dabh ẹvaar chaam. Kaam nkk'ẹ ndekha bi, óde ọvaarnọng kw'Israẹl ọmaana kwa Juda.”
1KI 1:36 Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa kw'Jẹhoyada obhina ọvaarnọng bi, “Tte kwẹ ode mando! Tte Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, osi ẹjaakhi ch'odik nwa.
1KI 1:37 Odem nwa kw'iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobh ọmaana itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, tte obiro owobha ttara Sọlọmọn, ifha osi ẹvaar chẹ ẹbar ọtzam ẹyọhnga ẹvaar ch'itta ọvaarnọng kwaam, Devid!”
1KI 1:38 Mando kwa Zadọk kw'ode ọfọhnẹja, ọmaana Natan kw'ode ọsẹjaakhi, ọmaana Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹhoyada, ọmaana anọng pa Kẹrẹt ttara anọng pa Pẹlẹt, afon atza agboma Sọlọmọn kw'ọyaari k'ẹnyanyaang ch'ọvaar Devid, bẹ achina ka Gihọn.
1KI 1:39 Zadọk kw'ode ọfọhnẹja ọtzọkha obhik kw'ana p'afon k'ikhira s'awurada, obyengi Sọlọmọn ana k'eho. Mando kwa bẹ agyi obukpọhng, anọng biphyir abira asi ẹjaakhi k'ẹrọng bi, “Tte ọvaar Sọlọmọn oruk akpen p'adum-odum!”
1KI 1:40 Anọng biphyir agyi aphoropho abira atzima ọdadaami kw'ideden, kwa bẹ asi maa, irerek inyengi, atzọn-ẹ abẹ akpa nnam.
1KI 1:41 Iwa Adonija ọmaana akhekhennọng p'awobh ttar-ẹ bipyhir, abhaanga odik nwa k'ogbe kwa bẹ an-am-akyera ẹrọm chabẹ okyera. Mada Joab ọbhaang obukpọhng kw'anọng mba agyi, ọn-ọbọbh bi, “Iyọkhi-haabhada nnuma k'odedenmon, iyini yan o?”
1KI 1:42 Mada otzim ọm-ọgbaak atzim, Jonatan kw'ode nnwa kw'Abiyata kw'ode ọfọhnẹja, opyiri. Adonija oben bi, “Dim k'ẹtzaanga. Ojinọng ọkkakka mach-ọ, otzima ẹkkaabha ẹkkakka okwu e.”
1KI 1:43 Jonatan obhina Adonija bi, “Kwẹ mando kode! Itta ọvaarnọng kwaman Devid, okk'Sọlọmọn ọvaarnọng ọsa e.
1KI 1:44 Ọvaarnọng okk'Zadọk kw'ode ọfọhnẹja, ọmaana Natan kw'ode ọsẹjaakhi, ọmaana Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹhoyada, ọmaana anọng pa Kẹrẹt, ttara anọng pa Pẹlẹt ọtzọhma bi, bẹ atzọn-ẹ abẹ ọyaar k'ẹnyanyaang ch'ọvaarnọng ọkpa nnam.
1KI 1:45 Zadọk kw'ode ọfọhnẹja, ọmaana Natan kw'ode ọsẹjaakhi akk'ẹ ana abyengi k'eho, asẹ-ẹ ọvaarnọng ka Gihọn. Bẹ akk'afona kẹ ttara ọdadaami, kw'on-otzim iyọkhi okwu k'odedenmon. Iyọkhi nnuma rọ s'am-abhaanga mẹ e.
1KI 1:46 Ayongi mẹ, Sọlọmọn ọkk'ẹwọr owobha k'ẹvaarchi e.
1KI 1:47 Akhaan-nọng p'ọvaarnọng akk'abira akwu bi, akwu arima itta ọvaarnọng kwaman, Devid, aben bi, ‘Tte Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ osi Sọlọmọn ọtza che ọyọhng-ọ, obiro osi ẹvaar chẹ ẹbar ẹyọhnga chọ!’ Mando kw'ọvaarnọng ọrak m'eyima chẹ k'ikpokpobha,
1KI 1:48 oben bi, ‘Tte ẹtzọhnga ewobha ẹnang Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Israẹl kw'ọkk'ọsa bi, ndima chen paam nne ọnọng kw'ọtzọk ẹvaar chaam, mayina.’ ”
1KI 1:49 Ofona mẹ, akhekhennọng p'Adonija abina k'opoma, apfuri.
1KI 1:50 Yina, Adonija obina, okhuri ojora fa Sọlọmọn, ọtza ọbọkha k'abhik p'ijafọhnibe.
1KI 1:51 Mando kwa bẹ agbaakhi Sọlọmọn bi, “Ọvaar Sọlọmọn ojor Adonija ojora, kw'osi ọtza ọbọkha k'abhik p'ijafọhnibe. Oben bi, ‘Tte ọvaar Sọlọmọn ochekhi ọnang-m mayina bi, ọkkangkkaang kotzima ofhu kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwẹ.’ ”
1KI 1:52 Sọlọmọn obhina bi, “Idikha ọkhọhk for sẹ mach'ọnọng ọkkakka, esisaa-naanga chẹ ch'etto k'irerek kede. Idikha otzim ebibya, kẹ ópe-ope.”
1KI 1:53 Mando kwa ọvaar Sọlọmọn ọtzọhmi anọng bẹ atza achaar-ẹ k'ijafọhnibe, atzima akwu. Adonija e, okwu ọrakha k'itzitzikha s'ọvaar Sọlọmọn, kw'oben-ẹ bi, “Rọhng abhana k'ọhọhm kwọ.”
1KI 2:1 Mada obo kwa Devid om-ofor, wa ọnangi nnwa kwẹ Sọlọmọn ndọhna bi:
1KI 2:2 “Kaam nna nkkekkeni mpe, kọ be bi gbuk, asi idik mach'ojinọng,
1KI 2:3 asi idik nnuma s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwọ, orori: Kọ renga k'ikpokpobha ttar-ẹ, ahok akpebhi pẹ, ọmaana asana pẹ, ọmaana aphaangi pẹ ttara ndọhna sẹ, macha bẹ akkẹri k'aphaangi pa Mosẹs. Si idik nna ifha árenga mẹ akhaama ẹnaanga k'ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'asi, k'ibe kpenamkpen s'átza,
1KI 2:4 k'odem kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọfha óhok echekhi chẹ ch'ọnang-m bi: ‘Idikha va pa va pọ arukhi akpen pa bẹ abaan bi aruk, bẹ abira atzima nttem sabẹ biphyir ọmaana agbagba pabẹ biphyir atzọn-m abẹ, kọ echuni kede bi, ákhaama ọnọng ọkhaama kw'ọ́tzọkha ẹvaarchi k'Israẹl.’
1KI 2:5 “Kọ ọkhaam arong odik kwa Joab kw'ode nnwa kwa Zeruya, osi-m kẹ e, odem kw'ofhu adenho afa p'arim-egbong p'Israẹl p'ade: Abnẹr kw'ode nnwa kwa Nẹr ọmaana Amasa kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹtẹr. Ofhu bẹ, obyengi izi sabẹ k'ogbe kw'ẹmẹm ọmaana ogbong-gbe, otzima izi nnuma ọkpan k'odikpa kwẹ kw'erin, ọmaana k'ekpo pya mmo.
1KI 2:6 Kọ tzima ekkoji chọ asẹ-ẹ mach'ọdaakh-ọ, kakhera bi oruk akpen maa, ọn-ọkhaama epekhubh.
1KI 2:7 “Yina, si ejibha anang va pa Barzilayi kw'ofon Gilead. Tte bẹ attara k'anọng p'am-achi ọchattọhk k'okpokkoro kwọ. Kkeri wa bẹ abe ttara kaam, k'ogbe kwa nnọbhi k'agbaanatte, Absalọm.
1KI 2:8 “Karaama bi, Shimeyi kw'ode nnwa kwa Gẹra kw'ofon Bahurim k'ẹkhọma cha Bẹnjamin owobh mẹ ttar-ọ, kẹ wọ ọsaakh-m itzama-itzama, k'ewu cha mminda Mahanayim. Mada ọhak okhebh-m ka Jọrdan, ndim che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi nchekhi nnang-ẹ bi, ‘Kaam ọkkangkkaang kíndima mfhọ-ọ.’
1KI 2:9 Yina, kẹ kàtzọkha mach'ọnọng kw'aponga anapyibhi. Kọ ade ojinọng kw'ekkoji, áronga-oronga odem kw'asi. Kọ re bi, akhọhbhi pẹ akhaama epekhubh.”
1KI 2:10 Iwa Devid ope otzor ab'otte, bẹ anọhng-ẹ k'odedenmon kwa Devid.
1KI 2:11 Wa Devid ode ọvaarnọng ka Hẹbrọn ka cho azenamfa, obiro ode ọvaarnọng ka Jẹrusalẹm ka cho ẹrọbh obhiri jobh obhiri attaan. Biphyir-phyir wa ọdabhi Israẹl ka cho arọbh afa.
1KI 2:12 Mando kwa Sọlọmọn owobh ẹwọr k'ẹvaarchi ch'otte Devid, wa ẹvaar chẹ ebire ettima aranga bi gbuk.
1KI 2:13 Iwa Adonija kw'ode nnwa kwa Hagit, ofona ọtza okhebha Batshẹba kw'ode ọkka kwa Sọlọmọn. Batshẹba ọbọbh-ẹ bi, “Kọ akwu ttara odidiri o?” Obhina bi, “Oo, nkwu ttara odidir e.”
1KI 2:14 Ọn-ọttara bi, “Kaam ngaam odik kwa mbeni bi mgbaakh-ọ e.” Batshẹba oben bi, “Gbaakh-m.”
1KI 2:15 Oben bi, “Kọ arong kẹ bi, ọvaarbhon nwa ode kwaam. Anọng p'Israẹl biphyir ahokhi chen bi, kaam ndabh bẹ. Yina, idik ikwu ibhakhi ewobha. Ma, ọgbaanotte kwaam wọ ọn-ọkhaam ọvaarbhon, okhuri da Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọttẹ-ẹ ọbọhk ọnang-ẹ.
1KI 2:16 Kaam ngaam odik wani kwa mbeni bi mphyem-ọ, kaam kwẹ karam o.” Oben bi, “Gbaakh-m kwẹ.”
1KI 2:17 Mẹ wọ, ochina ororo oben bi, “Tzotzokhaan, ben ọvaar Sọlọmọn ọnang-m Abishag kw'ofon Shunam, ńdọkha macha kwanọng kwaam. Kaam nnong kẹ bi, kọ odik nwa kọ́ram.”
1KI 2:18 Batshẹba obhina bi, “Kwẹ ojibhi kẹ, kaam mgbaak ọvaarnọng odik nwa ọgbaak k'eho chọ.”
1KI 2:19 Mada Batshẹba ofon bi ọtza ọgbaak ọvaar Sọlọmọn odik nwa k'eho ch'Adonija, ọvaarnọng obina ọtza okhebh-ẹ, ochunga orima ọkka, yina on-owobh ẹwọr k'ọvaar-gbera kwẹ. Oben bẹ atzima ọvaar-gbera kw'ọkka owobha ẹwọr akwu. Mando kw'ọkka owobh ẹwọr k'odimbọhk kwẹ.
1KI 2:20 On-oben bi, “Kaam ngaam ididikha kwa ḿphyem-ọ. Tzotzokhaan, kaam karam.” Ọvaarnọng oben bi, “Nna kwaam, kọ phyem, kkeri kọ kínnam.”
1KI 2:21 Mẹ wọ, oben bi, “Tte Abishag kw'ofon Shunam ọbọhk, anang agbaanatte Adonija ọtzọkh-ẹ k'ọbada.”
1KI 2:22 Ọvaar Sọlọmọn obhina ọkka bi, “Osi yan aphyem-m bi, ndọkha Abishag kw'ofon Shunam nnang Adonija k'ọbada? Ira abira aphyem bi, ndọkha ọvaarbhon nnang-ẹ, mgba kẹ wọ ode ọgbaanotte kwaam kw'ideden. Mando kw'ira bi aphyem anang Abiyata kw'ode ọfọhnẹja, ttara Joab kw'ode nnwa kwa Zeruya!”
1KI 2:23 Ọvaar Sọlọmọn ochekhi ka che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi bi: “Tte Ibinọkpaabyi ọnang-m ettuma, kaambi ode bi, ch'ẹbar-ọbar dọ, idikha Adonija oni akpen pẹ otzim otzera eho ch'odik nwa kw'ophyemi ma!
1KI 2:24 Odem nwa kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi orukhi akpen, kẹ kw'ọkk'aam aranga ottima bi gbuk, k'ẹvaar ch'otte kwaam Devid, obiro osi ẹnọmma chaam ebe, mach'ochekhi, bẹ akhaambi áfhu Adonija mayina!”
1KI 2:25 Mando kw'ọvaar Sọlọmọn ọnangi Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹhoyada ẹfa, ọtza obun Adonija ofhu.
1KI 2:26 Ọvaarnọng oben Abiyata kw'ode ọfọhnẹja bi, “Kpa nnam k'iwoni sọ s'iwobh k'Anatọt. Kọ ọbaan bi, ape e. Yina, kaam kọ madẹdẹn kímfhu, okhuri bi, kọ atzini Ẹkkọhbhi ch'Echekhi ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kw'Ọyọhng, k'itzitzikha s'otte kwaam Devid, abira atzọkha ekkema k'ihem s'otte kwaam.”
1KI 2:27 Mando kwa Sọlọmọn ọrọbh Abiyata k'ọtzọhm f'afọhnẹja p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'atzim p'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọgbaakhi ka Shilo, okhuri ẹhọhmmọr ch'Ẹli, an-areng mẹ akhaama ẹjaakhi.
1KI 2:28 Mada ẹkkaabha nda epyiri Joab kw'okk'nttọhna ọkhaama ttara Adonija, okhiri Absalọm oji, ọrọbh ochina k'ikhira s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọbọkha abhik p'ijafọhnibe.
1KI 2:29 Iwa bẹ agbaak ọvaar Sọlọmọn bi, Joab ọkk'ọrọbha ochina k'ikhira s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọtza owobha ọbaanga ijafọhnibe. Sọlọmọn ọnang Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹhoyada ẹfa bi, “Rọhng atza abun-ẹ afhu!”
1KI 2:30 Mando kwa Bẹnaya ochin k'ikhira s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ọtza oben Joab bi, “Ọvaarnọng obeni bi, ‘Yin k'iyaan.’ ” Yina, oben bi, “Mma, kaam ḿpe ma e.” Bẹnaya obiro otzima ẹkkaabha ochena ọvaarnọng, oben bi, “Kkeri odem kwa Joab obhin-m e.”
1KI 2:31 Mando kw'ọvaarnọng obeni Bẹnaya bi, “Kọ si mach'obeni.” Bun-ẹ afhu, anọhng-ẹ, ifha ofona mẹ, kaam ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr chaam biphyir mọnaanga oponga-pyibha kw'izi s'anọng pa Joab ofhu.
1KI 2:32 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi wọ ọ́nang-ẹ ettuma k'izi s'okk'obyengi, okhuri bi, kẹ otzim ọkkangkkaang ofhu ajinọng afa, k'ogbe kw'otte kwaam Devid on-orong. Bẹ anọng afa p'ade; Abnẹr kw'ode nnwa kwa Nẹr, obiro ode odenho kw'agbong-nọng p'Israẹl, ọmaana Amasa kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹtẹr, obiro ode odenho kw'agbong-nọng pa Juda, ajibhi abira atzor-otzor ọtzam ayọhng-ẹ.
1KI 2:33 Tte oponga-pyibha kw'izi sabẹ ọnana Joab ọmaana va pa va pẹ, k'eho. Yina, tte odidiri kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi owobha ttara Devid ọmaana va pa va pẹ, ọmaana ẹhọhmmọr ttara ẹvaar chẹ maa, ogbe ode.”
1KI 2:34 Mando kwa Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa Jẹhoyada ofon ọtza obun Joab ofhu, wa bẹ anọhng-ẹ k'ọhọhm kwẹ k'ibe s'anọng anarukhi.
1KI 2:35 Ọvaarnọng ọn-ọtzọkha Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹhoyada osi odenho kw'agbong-nọng, otzima otzera eho cha Joab, obiro ọtzọkha Zadọk kw'ode ọfọhnẹja otzera eho cha Abiyata.
1KI 2:36 Iwa ọvaarnọng ọtzọhm bẹ ayeri Shimeyi, oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ ibe ọdọdọk k'atza, si ọhọhm kw'aruk ka Jẹrusalẹm anang for sọ.
1KI 2:37 Ronga k'odik-ọkka bi, ewu ch'ajek Ẹttẹri cha Kidrọn, ápe-ope e; izi sọ íbhakhi inan-ọ k'eho e.”
1KI 2:38 Shimeyi obhina ọvaarnọng bi, “Odik kw'agbaakhi, ojibh-ojibh. Kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ńsi-osi mach'itta ọvaarnọng kwaam ọgbaakhi.” Wa Shimeyi owobha ka Jẹrusalẹm k'ogbe-bhirada.
1KI 2:39 Okwu opyiri cho attaan, atzọhmnọng afa pa Shimeyi arọbh atzor Akish kw'ode nnwa kwa Maaka, obiro ode ọvaarnọng kwa Gat. Wa bẹ agbaak Shimeyi bi, “Atzọhmnọng pọ awobh ka Gat e.”
1KI 2:40 Mando kwa Shimeyi ovur ẹnyanyaang chẹ otza okhebha Akish ka Gat, oror atzọhmnọng pẹ ore. Shimeyi otzima atzọhmnọng pẹ ofona ka Gat, okhuna.
1KI 2:41 Mada Sọlọmọn ọbhaang bi, Shimeyi okk'obina ma Jẹrusalẹm ochina ka Gat maa okhuna,
1KI 2:42 ọvaarnọng oyeri Shimeyi, oben-ẹ bi, “Kọ arang kw'iwa nsi echekhi ka che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, mbiri ndọr-ọ itzọhng bi, ‘Ewu manda dani ch'atza ibe manda rani, ápe-ope e?’ Wa aben-m m'ewu nduma bi, ‘Odik kw'agbaakhi, ojibh-ojibh. Kaam ńhakha eho ọhakha.’
1KI 2:43 Mbọng vọ osi yina ọnwọhngi kw'atzọk k'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi kahokhi, eho kabira ahakha anang ọsana kwaam o?”
1KI 2:44 Ọvaarnọng obiro oben Shimeyi bi, “Kọ arong m'ettem chọ itzama kpenamkpen s'iwa asi atzima atzor otte kwaam Devid kẹ. Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọ́nang-ọ ettuma k'itzama sọ.
1KI 2:45 Yina, ọvaar Sọlọmọn ọ́tzọkha ẹdaa, ẹvaar cha Devid ébe bi pyir k'itzitzikha s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi maa, ogbe ode.”
1KI 2:46 Mando kw'ọvaarnọng ọnangi Bẹnaya kw'ode nnwa kwa Jẹhoyada ẹfa. Oyin k'iyaan ọtza obun Shimeyi, ofhu. Mando kw'ẹvaar ettim aranga ka mbọhk sa Sọlọmọn.
1KI 3:1 Iwa Sọlọmọn orenga iyok ttara ọvaar Phero kw'Ijip, orenga mẹ ọtzọkha nnwa kwa Phero k'ọbada. Otzim-ẹ okhuna k'Odedenmon kwa Devid maa, okyera ọtzọhm f'ẹvaar-ttọhmma ọmaana Ọhọhm kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, ttara ọbaakha kw'ọkhọri Jẹrusalẹm osisi.
1KI 3:2 Wa anọng mba am-asi njafọhni k'ọjafọhnibe f'ikpokpobha k'ọyaankpa, okhuri da iwa bẹ ani Ọhọhm kwa che ch'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi atzima asa.
1KI 3:3 Sọlọmọn ọkhọhkha idadaakha sẹ s'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, oruk akpen otzor ka ndọhna s'otte Devid ọnang-ẹ, kw'oyongi bi, wa kẹ ọfọhni nja obiro ọkwọmi insẹns k'ọjafọhnibe f'ikpokpobha k'ọyaankpa.
1KI 3:4 Iwa ọvaarnọng ọm-ọtza ọfọhni nja ka Gibeọn, okhuri bi, kẹ wọ iwa ode ọjafọhnibe f'ikpokpobha f'ọbari odik ọtzam. Wa Sọlọmọn ọnangi nnanga nkwọmisẹ nnọhna mfa obhiri arọbh jobh, m'ijafọhnibe nna s'ikpokpobha.
1KI 3:5 Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oyin Sọlọmọn abẹ k'erungi k'idachen ka Gibeọn. Ibinọkpaabyi oben bi, “Kọ phyem ọttọhk kpenamkpen f'arori bi, nnang-ọ.”
1KI 3:6 Sọlọmọn obhina bi, “Kọ akk'ejibha-barada asa anang otte kwaam Devid, kw'ode ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, okhuri da iwa kẹ ophe nnam ka kọ, obiro otzor-otzor, ọkhaama ettem ọkkakka. Kọ achin ororo asi ejibha-barada nda anang-ẹ, anang-ẹ nnwa kw'ijinọng bi, ọtzọkha ẹvaar chẹ maa, pyiri ma.
1KI 3:7 “Manya, o Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi, kw'ode Ibinọkpaabyi kwaam, kọ akk'kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ, ọvaarnọng asa bi, ndera eho ch'otte kwaam Devid. Yina, kaam ndimi nde nnwa-nnwa, kaam odem kwa nsi itzọhmbọhk saam kinnọng.
1KI 3:8 Kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ nwobh k'ottem kw'anọng p'akk'atzekha, anọng-barada, p'ahaabhi ayọhnga odem kw'ọnọng ofha obhik.
1KI 3:9 Mẹ wọ, nang kaam ọtzọhmnọng kwọ ekkoji k'ettem cha ndima ndabh anọng pọ. Mbiri mfha ndima chẹ ngọhkha odengọmi kw'odik kw'otzor-otzor ttara epina. Ọnọng kw'ọfha ọdabh anọng-barada mba pọ kode e.”
1KI 3:10 Iwa Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi ọdaam ettem ttara Sọlọmọn bi, okk'odik nwa ophyema.
1KI 3:11 Mando kw'Ọvaar Ibinọkpaabyi oben-ẹ bi, “Mada kọ akhiri akpen p'adumi eden, ọmaana ikkọ, ttara obo kw'attattaanga-nọng pọ aji, an-aphyem, ekkoji ch'atzima asi eponga-ttọhna ẹkkakka,
1KI 3:12 kaam ńnang-ọ f'aphyemi ọnang. Kaam ńnang-ọ ettem ch'ekkoji ọmaana ch'eronga maa, ọnọng kode kw'iwa ọkk'ọda mach-ọ, ọnọng kóbiro ode kw'óde mach-ọ.
1KI 3:13 Ayongi mẹ, kaam ńnang-ọ f'an-aphyemi, ikkọ ọmaana abarada, ifha k'akpen pọ biphyir, ọvaarnọng kw'obeng-ọ abẹ, kóde.
1KI 3:14 Idikha kọ ahak eho anang-m, abira ahok aphaangi ọmaana asana paam mach'iwa atte Devid ohokhi, kaam ńnang-ọ akpen p'adum-odum.”
